igbo: Shish na asụsụ Syrian-Arabic ma ọ bụ şiş na Turkish pụtara skewer
Ụfọdụ ndị ọkà mmụta na-ekwusi ike na ọ bụ n'onwe ya okwu mgbazinye nke ndị Peshia site na Sikh, ndị ọzọ na-ekwu na ọ sitere na mgbọrọgwụ 'sı' na Turkish ochie nke pụtara 'ịkpụ'
A nabatara ya n'asụsụ Arabic nke Ijipt, Lebanese-Arabic na Syrian-Arabic
Tavuk (nke a na-akpọ ) sitere na takagu ochie nke Turkic ma ọ pụtara ọkụkọ
Nri ahụ nwere cubes nke ọkụkọ nke a na-eme ka ọ dị nro, mgbe ahụ, a na-etinye ya ma sie ya
Marinades a na-ahụkarị na-adabere na yogọt na mmiri lemon ma ọ bụ tomato puree, ọ bụ ezie na e nwere ọdịiche ndị ọzọ
A na-eri nri ahụ ma ọ bụ dị ka bred ma ọ bụ na efere nwere akwụkwọ nri, mgbe ụfọdụ na osikapa ma ọ bụ French fries
A na-ejikarị osikapa, yogọt, na akwụkwọ nri a na-esi na skewer eri eri nri ndị Turkey
A na-ejikarị toum (a garlic paste sauce), hummus na tabbouleh na-enye nsụgharị Siria na Lebanọn
Ụdị bred na-abịa n'ozuzu ya na achịcha dị larịị ma ọ bụ dị ka dürüm, ma na-esokarị lettuce, tomato, na turnips

N'ihe oriri ndị Israel, a na-enye ya tahini na-atọ ụtọ, yabasị e siri esi, achịcha dị larịị / pit na ose chili ọkụ a siri esi tinyere tabbouleh ma ọ bụ salad na pickles nke Israel (olive, karọt, ose, cabbage na turnip)
Shishani (Chechen Шишани / ; Arabic شيشاني 'Chechen') bụ aha ezinụlọ nke a na-ahụkarị n'etiti ndị Chechen bi na mba ndị Arab
Shitaye Eshete Habtegebrel (amụrụ n'abali iri na otu nke ọnwa Mee afo 1990) bụ onye Etiopia a mụrụ na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke na-asọro ndị mba Bahrain asọmpi mba ụwa
Ọ malitere ịsọ mpi nke steeti Gulf ala jupụtara na mmanụ na afọ 2009, na-eme mpụtara nke mbụ ya na Asian Cross Country Championships na Manama
O meriri n'asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị ndi junịọ mgbe onye otu ya bụ Tejitu Daba, onye ọzọ bụbu onye Etiopia, mechara Bahraini 1 Xia2
Mbido mbụ ya na ọkwa ụwa bịara n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị na 2009 IAAF World Cross Country Championships ma ọ gbara onye nke iri abụọ na anọ na asọmpi ndị junịọ, otu ebe n'azụ Daba
A banyere ya n'ọsọ mita 5000 na 2009 Asian Athletics Championships na Nọvemba wee bịa nke isii

Shitaye mere mpụtara mbụ ya n'afọ sochirinụ, na-agba ọsọ na 2010 IAAF World Cross Country Championships ma ọ bụ onye nke iri na otu n'ozuzu na ọkwa, na-edu ụmụ nwanyị Bahrain tinyere Mimi Belete na nke itoolu na asọmpi otu
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, ọ mere mpụtara mbụ ya na IAAF Diamond League, setịpụ 5000 m kacha mma nke 15 2567 nkeji na DN Galan
Ọ bụ naanị onye nnọchi anya Asia-Pacific na ihe omume ahụ na 2010 IAAF Continental Cup, ebe ọ bụ nke isii
Ọ nwere obere nlahachi azụ karịa ọnọdụ mbụ ya na 2011 IAAF World Cross Country Championships, naanị na-abanye n'ogo iri na abụọ nke asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị
Otú ọ dị, ọ duuru ndị otu mba gaa n'ọkwa nke anọ na ogo, site n'enyemaka nke ọnụnọ nke Maryam Yusuf Jamal

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke ọma n'egwuregwu n'afọ ahụ, na Nweta otutu aha nke Puku Mita iri n'asọmpi 2011 Asian Athletics Championships, ma Mita puku ise n'egwuregwu 2011 Military World Games, wee nweta akụkọ ihe ndekọ na Bahraini site na ịgba ọsọ nke nkeji 31 2157 ma gbaa onye nke isii na Puku Mita iri n'egwuregwu ikpeazụ na 2011 World Championships in Athletics
O ji ọla nchara 5000m na ọlaọcha 10,000m mechie afọ ahụ na 2011 Pan Arab Games
Shitaye malitere oge ọzọ n'ime ụlọ, na-etinye ihe ndekọ mba maka mita 3000 iji nweta aha na 2012 Asian Indoor Athletics Championships
O mechara bụrụ onye nke ise na ngwụcha nke ihe omume ahụ na 2012 IAAF World Indoor Championships
Ka ọ na-aga n'èzí, ọ meriri n'asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na Asian Cross Country Championships, na-eduga ụmụ nwanyị n'ime atọ kachasị elu
Na 2012 Summer Olympics, ọ gbara ọsọ na 5000 m na 10000 m, ma gbaa nke iri na nke isii n'otu n'otu, ma na-etinye ihe ndekọ mba ọhụrụ na mita puku iri m
N'afọ sochirinụ, 2013, ọ gbakara onye nke isii na 10000 m na World Championship mgbe ọ meriri Asian Championship
Ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ n'afo 2014 n'ihi ọmụmụ nwa wee laghachi na asọmpi na ngwụcha afọ 2015
O sonyere na 10000 m na 2016 Summer Olympics mana o nweghị ike ịgbacha ọsọ ahụ
Ọ laghachiri iji merie asọmpi 10000m na asọmpi Asia na 2019
Shitaye Gemechu (amụrụ n'abali iri na asaa nke onw June afọ 1980) bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge, onye ọkachamara na agbụrụ marathon
Shitaye bụ onye mmeri ụmụ nwanyị nke Rock 'n' Roll Arizona Marathon maka afọ 2004 - 2006
O meriri na 2007 nke Treviso Marathon
Shitaye bu ụzọ bụrụ onye a ma ama site na mmeri na 2001 Amsterdam Marathon
Ọ gara n'ihu na-anọchite anya Etiopia na marathon na World Championships na ọgbụgba ọsọ ugboro anọ n'usoro site na 2001 ruo 2007
Ihe kacha mma o mere bụ nke asaa na mbipụta 2001
A machibidoro ya iwu afọ abụọ na 2009 mgbe ọ dara ule maka Erythropoietin (EPO) na asọmpi na Luxembourg

Ọ laghachiri na asọmpi na 2011 wee bụrụ onye nke anọ na Turin Marathon Na 2012 Hong Kong Marathon ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na Misiker Demissie, gafere akara ahụ n'ime awa 2 31 44 n'agbanyeghị mmerụ ahụ mkpịsị ụkwụ
Ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na Ashu Kasim na Lanzhou Marathon na ọnwa June afọ 2013
Di ya, Asnake Fekadu, bụkwa onye na-agba ọsọ marathon
Ụlọ okpukperechi alakụba Shitta-Bey bụ ụlọ ụka nke ndị alakụba, ebe mmụta okpukpe, bụrụkwa otu n'ime ụlọ alakụba kachasị ochie na Naịjirịa
Ụlọ alakụba ahụ dị na Martins Ereko Street, Lagos Island, Lagos, Nigeria
E guzobere ya n'afọ 1892, ndị Ụlọ ọrụ Naijiria n'ahụ maka Ọ́bánka na ihe ndị akpụrụ akpụ (Nigerian Commission for Museums and Monuments) ahọpụtakwa ya dịka ihe ncheta mbụ n'afọ 2013

Ụlọ alakụba a, nke a na-ewere dị ka otu n'ime ihe nketa akụkọ ihe mere eme kachasị mkpa nke Naijiria, ka akpọkwasịrị aha onye guzobere ya bụ onye Naijiria a mụrụ na Sierra Leone, Mohammed Shitta Bey, onye bụ onye aristocrat, onye ọrụ ebere na onye ọchụnta ego
Owuwu ụlọ ụka ndị alakụba ahụ bụ Mohammed Shitta Bey, (onye ọchụnta ego na onye ọrụ ebere, onye Yoruba nne na nna ya mụrụ na (Sierra Leone) bidoro ya n'afọ 1891
Otu Onye Brazil na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ João Baptista da Costa lekọtara owuwu ụlọ ahụ nke e ji tebulu rụọ na-egosi ihe owuwu Afro-Brazilian
Ụlọ ụka Shitta-Bey mepere n'abalị anọ nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 1894, n'ememe nke Gọvanọ Lagos, Sir Gilbert Carter duziri

Ndị ọzọ bịara gụnyere Oba Oyekan I, Edward Wilmot Blyden, Abdullah Quilliam (onye nọchitere anya Sultan Abdul Hamid II nke Alaeze Ukwu Ottoman), na Ndị Kraịst Lagosian a ma ama dị ka James Pinson Labulo Davies, John Otunba Payne, na Richard Beale Blaize yana ndị nnọchi anya mba ọzọ
Quilliam wetara Sultan nke Turkey akwụkwọ ozi a kwadoro na-arịọ ndị Alakụba Lagos ka ha nabata agụmakwụkwọ ọdịda anyanwụ
Ọ bụ na oge mbido ahụ ka Sultan Abdul Hamid nke Abụọ nyere Mohammed Shitta aha 'Bey', Ottoman Order of Medjidie 3rd class (nke kachasị elu maka onye nkịtị)
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a maara Mohammed Shitta site na aha mgbagwoju anya Shitta-Bey
Mpaghara Mpaghara Shizishan ( China), enyere ya aha ya site n'ugwu Shizi ( China 'Ọdụm oke ugwu' ) nke dị na mpaghara mpaghara, bụ mpaghara mpaghara ndịda Mpaghara Hongshan, Wuhan, Hubei, China

N'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ ọ nwere oke Ọdọ Ndịda akwa mmiri Shizitou (狮子头南湖大桥) n'ofe Mahadum Zhongnan nke Akụ na Ụba na Iwu ; na ndịda ọ nwere oke ọdụ azụ Liqiao (李桥渔场) n'akụkụ ụsọ mmiri nke ọdọ mmiri Yezhi (野芷湖) Na Mpaghara mpaghara Hongshan (洪山街道); n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ ọ rutere n'ọdụ Wunan (武南车站) n'okporo ụzọ ụgbọ oloko mpaghara mpaghara Beijing 张家湾 Zhangjiawan (张家湾); n'ebe ugwu ọ rutere Port Liantong nke Ọdọ mmiri ndida anyanwụ 连通港na Osimiri Xunsi (巡司河)
203 Mahadum ọrụ ugbo Huazhong na ogige isi ụlọ akwụkwọ Mahadum Hubei nke teknụzụ dị na mpaghara mpaghara
Mpaghara mpaghara Shizishan e hiwere n'afọ 1961
N'ọnwa Julaị nke afọ 1986, Mpaghar mpaghara Shizishan gafere site na Mpaghara Wuchang gaa na mpaghara Hongshan
Akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke mpaghara mpaghara dị n'etiti ọdọ mmiri abụọ (ọdọ mmiri ndịda na ọdọ mmiri Yezhi) na gburugburu ugwu nke na -enye mpaghara aha ya
Ugwu Shizi (Asụsụ China A na -akpọ 'Ọdụm oke ugwu') aha ya n'ihi na o yiri ọdụm
Ugwu Shizi ruru mita puku abụọ na narị asatọ (Ft puku itoolu, otu narị na iri asatọ na isii) n'ịdị elu ma kpuchie ala otu puku na mu narị itoolu na iri asaa kpuchie n'oké ọhịa N'afọ 2016
N’afọ 2015, atọrọ ụzọ okporo ụzọ dị larịị gburugburu Ugwu Shizi
Na 1957, e wuru Mahadum Ọrụ Ugbo nke Huazhong gburugburu Ugwu Shizi, ugwu nke mpaghara mpaghara ahhu na-ewere aha ya
Dịka o ruru afọ 2017, Mpaghara mpaghara Shizishan Chịkwara obodo ebe obibi iri na atọ
Nkewa ngalaba nhazi nke mpaghara mpaghara mbụ gụnyere
Àtụ Historical populationsDịka ọ na eru 1996, Ngụkọta mpaghara nke mpaghara mpaghara Shizishan bụbu km2 iri na ise na otu ụma (sq mi isii)
Gụnyere ma ndị obibi ogologo oge, ụmụ akwụkwọ kọleji na ndị ọrụ ike, Ọnụ Ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ ka emere atụmatụ na ọ ga eru otu narị puku na puku iri asatọ
Ọtụtụ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri na-eje ozi na mpaghara mpaghara Shizishan na njedebe ndịda nke ahịrị asaa (Wuhan Metro)
Mpaghara mpaghara Shizishan dị n'ebe ugwu nke okporo ụzọ mgbanaka nke atọ

Oluwaseyi Akerele, onye amara nke ọma dịka Shizzi, bụ onye na-edekọ egwu na onye na-ede egwu
Shizzi bidoro dị ka onye ịgba na chọọchị
O nwetere otuto maka ọrụ ya na egwu Davido nke 2011 ' Dami Duro ', wee mepụta egwu isii na mbido egwu abọm nke Omo Baba Olowo (2012)
O mepụtara egwu Wizkid ' Love My Baby ', egwu sitere na studio abọm izizi Superstar (2011)
Enweela otuto maka imepụta ' Skelewu ' na ' Gobe '
Ọ bụkwa onye mepụtara egwu Wande Coal na-ese okwu 'Baby Face' na 'Go Low'
Shizzi na ndịa Sasha, Harrysong, OD Woods, Naeto C, Sauce Kid, Wande Coal, Wizkid, D'Prince, May D, Danagog, Emmy Gee, Shank na Skuki, tinyere ndị ọzọ na-arụkọ
Na 2013, o mepụtara egwu Davido 'Tchelete' ya na Uhuru / dj maphorisa nke gosipụtara Mafikizolo
Na 26 Juunu 2014, Shizzi rụrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ Davido, Tiwa Savage, Lola Rae, Sarkodie, Diamond Platnumz na Mi Casa iji mepụta egwu mgbasa ozi nke MultiChoice nke ikuli Afrika
Na 2015, o gosipụtara ka esi eme egwu na-ewu ewu, n'akụkụ Davido na 'NEC Live masterclass'
Na 2016, ọ bịanyere aka na akwụkwọ mbipụta egwu Sony / ATV Music Publishing dị ka onye na-edekọ egwu na onye na-ede egwu
Ngwusi 2016, Shizzi kpughere ndekọ lebeelụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ njikwa nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Magic Fingers nke onye izizi debatanye aha ya bụ Teni na 23 Disemba 2019 mgbe o wepụtara egwu ya 'Amen'
Na 2019, Shizzi pụtara na akwụkwọ maka abom Beyonce ụda olu The Lion King The Gift
E meputara ihe nkiri a na 16 Septemba na ABC ; n'ime ya, Shizzi kwuru banyere ịdekọ egwu maka abọm
Na 2020, o sonyere na ndepụta Pulse Naịjirịa nke ndị na-emepụta egwu iri kacha elu nke afọ iri
Na 4 Machị 2020, o mekwara nsonye ndepụta PM News nke iri abuo na ise kacha eru, ndi na-erubeghi afo iri atọ na Naịjirịa
Shizzi na Sarz jikọrọ ka ha mee nkiri na-egosipụta ugbua nke akpọrọ 'The Battle of Hits', na Instagram
Ha abụọ gosiri biiti kachasị amasị ha, ma kpọọ egwu a na-ewepụtaghị
Ndị na-ekiri ihe nkiri nnọkọ ahụ gụnyere Timbaland, Swizz Beatz, Wizkid, Don Jazzy, Davido, DJ Spinall, Niniola, Kel P na Tiwa Savage, tinyere ndị ọzọ
Na 16 Jenụwarị 2016, Shizzi boro 'Tunde Ednut' & ' Masterkraft ' maka izuru ngwa egwu ya iji mee egwu ya Kosowo nke Masterkraft mepụtara

Maya Christinah Xichavo Wegerif (amụrụ 9 Mee 1992), onye amara dị ka Sho Madjozi ( / ʃ ɒˈmɑː dj ɔːr zɪ / shoh-mah-JOH -zee ), bụ onye South Africa onye na-agụ egwú rap, onye na-agụ egwú, onye na-ede abụ, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ede uri
Madjozi tinyere omenala Tsonga site na egwu ya na onyonyo ọhaneze
Na 2019, akpọrọ Madjozi ka otu n'ime mmadụ iri atọ nke Africa nọ ọgọ afọ iri atọ maka ntinye aka ya na mpaghara egwu na ntụrụndụ

A mụrụ Madjozi N'abalị iteghete nke ọnwa Mee afọ 1992 na Shirley Village, Elim, Limpopo, ada Rosemary Phweni na Marc Wegerif bụ onye na-elekọta otu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị nke e mere iji nyere ndị mmadụ aka na nkwupụta ala ha
Nne ya si na Africa ebe nna ya si Europe
Mgbe nne na nna ya gbara alụkwaghịm mgbe ọ ka dị obere, ọ bụ nne ya zulitere ya
Majozi nwere ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ sitere n'akụkụ nne ya na nna ya

Dị ka nna ya, Marc Wegerif, na-eme njem mgbe nile na mpaghara ụfọdụ nke kọntinent ahụ, Madjozi nwere ohere iso nna ya mee njem - o soro ya gaa Dar es Salaam, Tanzania, bụ ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ maka òtù ọrụ ebere bụ Oxfam mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma
O jikwa ụfọdụ oge na-ere uwe n'ahịa ndị dị na Senegal n'afọ 2016 iji gboo mkpa na ezinụlọ

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na International School of Tanganyika na Tanzania, e nyere Madjozi akwụkwọ mmụta na Mount Holyoke College na South Hadley, Massachusetts , US, iji mụọ ihe okike na ọmụmụ Africa
Mgbe ọ nọ na US, ọ malitere ide abụ n'okpuru aha odide nke MayaThePoet
Abụ ndị ahụ bụ gbasara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, njirimara na agbụrụ
Majozi laghachiri na South Africa, ebe ọ malitere mkpakọrịta n'ịmụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum South Africa, Johannesburg, ma meekwa atụmatụ ịde abụ maka ndị ọzọ na-ese ihe na mpaghara
Ọ malitere rap na ide egwu n'okpuru aha ogbo ya 'Sho Madjozi'
Madjozi ghọrọ onye ama ama ka ya na onye rapper Okmalumkoolkat jikọrọ aka na egwu 'Ngiyashisa Bhe' na egwu bụ otu egwu bụ 'Gqi'
N'April 2017, Majozi mere ihe ngosi telivishọn ya dị ka otu n'ime ihe nkiri nke Mzansi Magic drama telenovela Isithembiso
Ọ gosiputarakwara kaTsakane Mboweni - agwa tinyere aka na ngosipụta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ụmụ akwụkwọ - maka oge mbido

Madjozi wepụtara otu mpụta mbụ ya, 'Dumi HiPhone', na-egosi diski jockey duo PS DJz, n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ nke ọnwa Eprel 2017, nke ọha na eze nabatara nke ọma Egwu a erughị na ndepụta egwu ikpeazụ na album mpụta mbụ Ọ pụtakwara na DJ Maphorisa BlaqBoy Music Presents Gqom Wave (2017), ebe egosipụtara ya na egwu 'Probleme'
N'abalị iteghete nke ọnwa Maachị afọ 2018, o wepụtara onye ndu otu 'Huku' na ọba mpụta mbụ ya
N'abalị irí abụọ na asaa nke ọnwa Jun 2018, Trace Urban South Africa kwuputara mmekorita ha na Majozi, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya maka ndị na-eweta ekwentị mbụ TRACE Mobile
N'August, Madjozi n'akụkụ onye na-abụ abụ Chris Martin kwupụtara ma kọwaa otú ntinye ọrụ nke Global Citizen Festival Mandela 100, site na vidiyo YouTube nke Global Citizen tinyere
Mgbe e mesịrị na abalị abụọ nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 2018, Sho Madjozi rụrụ na Global Citizen Festival Mandela 100, nke Beyonce na Jay-Z gbara isiokwu ya
Limpopo Champions League, album studio mpụta mbụ nke Madjozi, ka ewepụtara n'abali iri na anọ nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 2018
N'abalị mbụ nke ọnwa Jun afọ 2019, Majozi nwetara mmeri abụọ na mbipụta nke iri abụọ na ise nke South Africa Music Awards maka onye bịara ọhụrụ nke afọ yana maka album nwanyị kacha mma
Ọ natakwara ndị nhọpụta maka otu Best Music Video maka 'Huku' na maka Best Kwaito, Gqom & AmaPiano Album maka Limpopo Champions League
ma n'abalị iri abụọ na atọ nke ọnwa Jun afọ 2019, Madjozi nwetara nturu ugo BET maka iwu mba ụwa kacha mma na BET Awards 2019

N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2019, akwụkwọ akụkọ Forbes kpọrọ Madjozi n'etiti ndị iri atọ n'okpuru ndepụta ihe okike ndepụta ndị ogo afọ irí atọ maka ntinye aka ya na mpaghara egwu na ntụrụndụ, ndepụta ahụ gosipụtara ihe okike ndị ntorobịa Africa ndị ọzọ dị ka onye egwu Naijiria Burna Boy, onye na-eme ihe nkiri South Africa, TV

na àgwà redio Thando Thabethe, onye Ghana oge a na-eme ihe Joseph Awuah-Darko, nke a makwaara dị ka Okuntakinte na onye nduzi ihe nkiri Kenya, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye na -edepụta ihe nkiri Njue Kevin

N'abali iri na ise nke ọnwa ọgọstụ afọ 2019, Madjozi pụtara ngosipụta egwu zuru ụwa ọnụ bụ COLORS, ebe ọ rụrụ egwu ya akpọrọ ' John Cena ' nke a na-akpọkarị onye Na enye ya mkpalị mmụọ bụ onye mgba aha ya bụ John Cena
Egwu gqom -genre wuru ewu na mpaghara, tumadi na South Africa ka o nwetara ndị nkiri nde abụọ, bụ ihe ịga nke ọma abịa na ngalaba egwu [COLOURS]

Ọtụtụ ndị a ma ama na-eto Madjozi maka abụ ahụ, gụnyere onye na-agụ egwú Missy Elliott, bụ onye gosihachiri vidiyo ya na ibe nzirite ozi Twitter ya, ebe ọkachamara mgba John Cena tinyere Madjozi na akaụntụ Instagram ya
O mechara wepụtaegwu a akpọrọ 'John Cena' dị ka otu egwu ama ama n'abalị iri abụọ na asaa nke ọnwa Septemba nke afọ 2019
N'abalị asaa N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2019, Madjozi pụtara na Kelly Clarkson Show iji kwuo maka egwu ahụ
Mgbe ọ n'eme ngosi dị ka ọbịa, John Cena si azụ ya bịa nke tụrụ ya n'anya
Vidiyo nke mmeghachi omume ya wee gbasaa, dịka o kwuru na ọ bụ nrọ nke ya izute Cena n'onwe ya
Na emume nke anọ nke Mzansi Kwaito na House Music Awards, ọ meriri ihe nrite Gqom Artist kacha mma

N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa nke ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2020, Madjozi wepụtara mixtape mbụ ya akpọrọ What a Life, na-egosipụta ụfọdụ talent obodo ndị sitere na mpaghara obibi ya na Limpopo, gụnyere omume dịka Makhadzi na akụkọ egwu ọdịnala Xitsonga Dr Thomas Chauke

Ngwakọta ahụ bụ otu n'ime ihe ndị a ma ama nke Madjozi wepụtara bụ nke o lekwasịrị anya nke ukwuu n'ịkwalite ahịa obodo ya na ịkwalite ndị na-eme ihe na-ewu ewu site na omenala Xitsonga ya, mana ọba ahụ nwere egwu dị otú ahụ nke nwere ike ịbanye n'ahịa mba ụwa na obere gqom bangers na ụda nnwale
Majozi na-eji ụdị mbinye aka Tsonga gbasara egwu ya na ụdị ejiji ya
N'ịbụ onye na-anya isi na omenala ya, Tsonga, ọ na-ejikarị ejiji omenala eme egwuregwu
Madjozi na- agbakarị egwu xibelani ebe ọ na-eyi sket a na-akpọ tinguvu n'úkwù, wee maa jijiji n'úkwù nke na-eme ka a na-ege ntị n'ihe omume ya
E wezụga ụdị omenala ya nwere mmetụta, Madjozi na-egosipụta ihe oyiyi mara mma nke nwere ọtụtụ ihe agbakwunyere

Onye edemede na-enweghị atụ Kenny Morifi-Winslow gbakwụnyere, 'Echere m na enwere ike ịnyefe ume mgbe akụkụ ọkacha mmasị anyị nke ọha ọha na-aghọ ihe anyị zoro n'onwe anyị ma ọ bụ gbalịa ịgbanwe', na-aja Madjozi mma
Na mgbakwunye asụsụ Tsonga, Madjozi na-asụkwa asụsụ Swahili nke ọma
Egwu ya jikọtara asụsụ abụọ tinyere Bekee ma na-amasị ọtụtụ ndị na-ege ntị
'Ntutu isim n'egosipụta ọdịnihu nke Afro
Ajụjụ abụrụ Gịnị ga ka nwa Nwanyi Afrịka n'etolite etolite ama ama ga-abụ ọ bụrụ na ihe ike nke ino n'okpuru ọchịchị ndị isi ọcha na nkewa agburu? Ntụtụ isim bu ọsịsa ya
A maara Madjozi nke ọma maka ntutu isi ya nke dị ka ụmụ nwanyị Fulani na ndị Tuareg
Ụkpụrụ ndozi isi na-emetụta ụmụ agbọghọ na ụmụ nwanyị bụ nke ghọrọ ihe na-emekarị site na afọ ọganihu ya (2016) na South Africa na mpaghara ndị ọzọ
O nwetakwara mkpali site n'otu egwu Boom Shaka ụmụ nwanyị na-abụ abụ, Thembi Seete na onye nwụrụ anwụ bụ Lebo Mathosa, yana kwa onye ọbụ abụ Thandiswa Mazwai 's braids iconic
Shola Adewusi (amụrụ ya na n'afọ 1963) bụ onye England na-eme ihe nkiri, ihuenyo na redio
Na mgbakwunye, Adewusi apụtawo na telivishọn na 'Lewis'(Season 3, Episode 4), My Hero, The Bill, Casualty, Bad Girls, Family Affairs, Emmerdale, na Chewing Gum
Ọ na-eme ihe nkiri ugbu a na CBS's Bob Hearts Abishola dị ka Auntie Olu
Ọrụ ya gụnyere CRAZYBLACKMUTHAFXXKINSELF [nkọwa dị mkpa] na Royal Court Theatre
Ọ bụkwa onye otu ndị ọrụ na Intermission Youth Theatre
O mere ihe nkiri na egwu ha 'Verona Road'
Ọrụ ya gụnyekwara ọrụ ya na Paddington 2
Shola Lynch (amụrụ n'afọ 1969) bụ ónyé America na-eme ihe nkírí, ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé bụbu ónyé na-eme ụmụaka

A maara ya nke ọma màkà ihe nkírí ya bụ Chisholm '72 Unbought and Unbossed (2004) na Free Angela and All Political Prisoners (2012), nke abụọ na-elekwasị anya na ụmụ nwanyị Africa-America na akụkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ onye otu Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
A mụrụ Lynch na Buffalo, New York, ma too na New York City
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke Hollis na Sharon Lynch (née Fisher) ma nwee nwanne nwanyị nke obéré aha ya bụ Nnenna
Ọ bụ agbụrụ dị iche iche
Nna ya sitere na Trinidad & Tobago na nne ya bụ ónyé Canada
Mgbè ọ dị afọ abụọ, ọ malitere ime ihe nkírí na usoro ụmụaka PBS Sesame Street ma mee ya ruo mgbè ọ dị afọ 6
Mgbe ọ nwetasịrị ákàrá ugo mmụta ya, Lynch si Texas laghachi New York iji gbalịa ịmalite ọrụ nka
Nke a emeghị nke ọma n'ihi enweghị ego màkà ndị na-ese ihe na New York n'oge a
Kama nkè ahụ, ọ nwetara ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta Ken Burns ma soro ya rụọ ọrụ afọ ise na ihe ngosi gụnyere usoro ya Jazz (2000)
Olympic Hockey Team (2001)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Matters of Race EveryOther (2003), nke lekwasịrị ányá na nsogbụ agbụrụ na United States
Lynch bi na Harlem na New York City na di ya na ụmụ ha abụọ
Ferguson malitere njem ya n'ime ụwa ntụrụndụ na Lesotho dịka onye DJ klọb na The Palace Hotel Night Club n'afọ 1992
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Botswana, ọ tụgharịrị uche ya gaa n'ụwa ụlọ ọrụ ma ọ mechie na azụmahịa IT

Ebe ọ malitere dịka a onye na-ere ahịa, ọ rụrụ ọrụ ya ruo mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye ọchụnta ego a na-akwanyere ùgwù ebe ọ meriri ọtụtụ ihe nrite, gụnyere Top Sales Manager Award 1998 Xia99 mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na EDUTECH
Ọrụ mbụ Ferguson rụrụ bụ Dr Leabua na South African Venda language soap opera Muvhango
Ọ hapụrụ ihe ngosi ahụ n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2007
Mgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara dịka Itumeleng site n'afọ 2011 na 2013 na The Wild, ihe nkiri ncha nke M-Net
Ya, ya na nwunye ya Connie Ferguson, guzobere Ferguson Films ma ha abụọ gosipụtara na usoro ihe nkiri mbụ nke mmepụta ihe nkiri ha Rockville
Ọ pụtara dịka JB site n'afọ 2013 ruo ihe omume ikpeazụ ya n'afọ 2016
O mekwara ihe nkiri na 2014's The Gift, usoro Ferguson Films, ma mee ihe nkiri dịka Jerry Maake na The Queen, nke bụkwa usoro Ferguson Filmes nke malitere n'afọ 2016
Ihe ngosi TV ndị ọzọ ya gụnyere Isidingo The Need dịka Tyson na Scandal! dịka Alex
N'afọ 2010, ya na nwunye ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Connie Ferguson malitere Ferguson Films
Ihe ha mepụtara gụnyere Rockville, iGazi, The Gift, The Throne, The Herd, The Queen, The River na The Imposter
N'afọ 2020, ha mepụtara usoro Netflix nke isii akpọrọ Kings of Joburg
A tụbara Ferguson na ihe nkiri 2010 Mrs
Mandela
Ferguson zutere onye na-eme ihe nkiri Connie Masilo na 31 Julaị 2001
Ha lụrụ na Nọvemba nke afọ ahụ
Ọ natara Golden Horn Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na TV Soap na Golden Horn Award for Best Achievement by a Lead Actor in a Made for TV Movie
N'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2021, a nabatara Ferguson n'ụlọ ọgwụ Pinehaven na COVID-19
Ka ọnọdụ ya na-akawanye njọ, e bugara ya n'etiti ụbọchị nke July na Milpark Hospital na Johannesburg, ebe ọ nwụrụ na 30 July 2021, mgbe ọ dị afọ 47
E liri ya na Fourways Memorial Park, mgbe emesịrị olili ozu onwe onye
E mere emume ncheta ụbọchị abụọ ka e mesịrị, ebe ndị bịara naanị 50 n'ihi iwu mkpọchi COVID-19
Shona (/ ˈʃoʊnə/; Shona chiShona) bụ asụsụ Bantu nke ndị Shona nke Zimbabwe
Ndị ọchịchị colonial chịkọtara ya na 1950s
Dị ka Ethnologue si kwuo, Shona, nke nwere olumba Zezuru, Korekore na Karanga, bụ ihe dị ka nde mmadụ 75 na-asụ
Ethnologue depụtara asụsụ Manyika nke Shonaiche, ndị mmadụ 1,025,000 na-asụ ya
Shongom bụ mpaghara ime obodo nke dị na Gombe Steeti, Naịjịrịa
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Boh nke dị n'ebe ugwu nke mpaghara ahụ

Ọchịchị ime Obodo Shongom nwere mkpokọta narị iteghete na iri abụo na abụọ square kilomita ma nwee nkezi okpomọkụ celsius nke dị iri atọ na abụọOchịchị ime Obodo ahụ na-enwe oge abụọ kàrà naa uru nke bụ, oge udu mmiri nke na-abịakarị n'etiti ọnwa Mee na Septemba ya na oge ọkọchị nke na-adịkarị n'etiti ọnwa Ọktoba na Eprel
Azụmahịa bụ ọrụ akụ na ụba dị oke egwu na ime obodo Shongom ebe mpaghara a nwere nnukwu ahịa ehi mba ụwa dị na Lalaipido ebe a na-ere anụmanụ dị iche iche
Ọrụ ugbo na-amakwa ifuru na ọchịchị ime Obodo Shongom ebe a maara maka ịkọ ọtụtụ ihe ọkụkụ dịka agwa, osikapa, sorghum, ọka-aghịrịgha na millet
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ ndị ọchịchị ime obodo Shongom na-arụ gụnyere ịchụ nta, ịtụ osisi, na ịzụ anụmanụ
Bengunji; Bango, Bangunji, Bikutture, Bikwala, Bishiwai, Dilange (Dutse), Kalo, Kulan, Laluwa, Najeji, Suli, Yelchen-Yelchen
Burak; Dabuki, Dajanwani, Kwanankukah, Lasanjang, Pirim, Sabonlayi, Shemyam, Tauni, Burak
Filia; Chengun, Disga, Farin-Kasa, Filiya, Jauro-Sajo, Lababali, Yapandi, Yarana
Gundale; Anguwar Jauro Sule, Bebulo, Gundale, Gurwa, Kambuluk, Marke, Sakram, Swaja, Tudun Wada, Yelwa Gurwa
Gwandum; Danjigiri, Garko, Golombi, Gujuba, Gwandum, Gwanlammeche, Gwere Yelwa, Katagum, Keffi, Kukah, Lalingling, Majidadi, Pamadu, Pilame, Popandi, Sabongari, Tambau, Toro, Yabayo, Yafuto
Kushi; Dankunni, Dirang, Gomle, Kaure, Kommo, Kugwayam, Kushi, Ladongor, Lapandintai, Sabongari, Tanjania, Tatadar
Ọṅụ ọgụgụ Shongom na ngụkọ nke afọ 2006 bu puku narị iri ise na otú, narị ise na iri abụo
Koodu nzipu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ narị asaa na iri asaa
Shoo, Minda na Nye bụ olumba atọ mejupụtara asụsụ Jukunoid nke Naijiria nke na-enweghị aha otu
Frederick Earl 'Shorty' Long (May 20, 1940 — June 29, 1969) bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu, ónyé na-ede egwu, ónyé egwu, na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ maka Motown's Soul Records
A nabatara ya na Alabama Jazz Hall of Fame na 1980
A mụrụ ya na Birmingham, Alabama, Long bịara Motown na 1963 site na akara Tri-Phi / Harvey, nke nwanne nwanyị Berry Gordy, Gwen, na di ya, Harvey Fuqua

Ihe mbụ ọ wepụtara, 'Devil with the Blue Dress On' (1964), nkè ya na William 'Mickey' Stevenson dere, bụ ihe ndekọ mbụ e wepụtara na Motown's Soul label, nke e mere màkà ndị na-ese ihe na-adabere na blues dịka Long
Ọ bụ ezie na abụ a edeghị na mba, Mitch Ryder na Detroit Wheels kpuchiri abụ ahụ ma mee ka ọ bụrụ ihe na 1966
Otu egwu Long nke 1966 'Function at the Junction' bụ nke mbụ ya na-ewu ewu, na-eru No
42 na chaatị R&B nkè mbà
Ndị ọzọ a tọhapụrụ gụnyere 'It's a Crying Shame' (1964), 'Chantilly Lace' (1967), na 'Night Fo' Last' (1968)
Mohamed Shoukry El Husseiny Sarhan (1925), nke a maara nke ọma dịka Shoukry Sarhan (شُكري سرحان), bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
A na-ewere ya dịka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Egypt kachasị ukwuu n'oge niile
A mụrụ Sarhan na El Sharqiya, Egypt na 12 Machị 1925
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 'High Institute of Acting in Egypt' n'afọ 1947
N'afọ 1949, Sarhan mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Lahalibo (لهاليبو)
Ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama n'afọ 1951 mgbe Youssef Chahine, onye nduzi ihe nkiri Egypt a ma ama, họọrọ ya maka ọrụ ndu na ihe nkiri Ibn El-Nile (ابن النيل, 'Nwa Naịl')
Sarhan nwetara aha 'Nwa okorobịa nke ihuenyo'
Ọ natara ọtụtụ onyinye n'oge ọrụ ya
Onye isi ala Gamal Abdel Nasser sọpụrụ Sarhan na 'ihe ịchọ mma Egypt'

N'afọ 1984, ọ natara onyinye onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma maka ọrụ ya, ya na Faten Hamama, na ihe nkiri Lelt El qabd 'Ala Fatema (ليلة Atlantaض على فاطمة, 'N'abalị nke Fatima's Arrest'), nke Henry Barakat duziri

N'oge emume nke otu narị afọ nke ihe nkiri sinima, ndị nkatọ Egypt họpụtara ya dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma nke narị afọ na Egypt, ebe ọ sonyere karịa onye ọ bụla ọzọ na-eme egwuregwu na ihe nkiri 100 kacha ukwuu nke Egypt
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1997
Md Mehedi hasan, (amuru Eprel 08, 2003) nke amara aha ya dika Shovon Ahmed
Ọ bụ onye ọchụnta ego Bangladesh, Digital Marketer, ọkachamara SEO, Ọkachamara Panel Ọmụma, Onye ode akwụkwọ, onye nrụpụta weebụsaịtị na onye okike ọdịnaya
A maara ya nke ọma dị ka onye nchoputa nke Raw Marketer
Ntanetị ahịa dijitalụ n'ịntanetị nke na-enye ọrụ ahịa ahịa dijitalụ niile & ngwọta gbasara SEO, SMM, SEM wdg Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-akpa ike na Bangladesh
Simon Njoroge' (24 Ọktoba 1993 - 30 Ọgọstụ 2015), nke a maara dịka Shrekeezy, bụ onye Kenya na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi
O tinyekwara aka na nka na ntụrụndụ dịka onye na-ahụ maka redio, onye na-egosi TV, onye na-eti egwu, DJ na Entertainment Executive

O bu ụzọ nweta nnukwu nlebara anya maka ihe ngosi redio ya na-aga nke ọma n'ịntanetị Shrekeezy Live nke e mechara were dịka ihe ngosi redio kwa ụbọchị na Hero Radio Kenya mgbe ọ nwetasịrị ihe karịrị puku mmadụ iri anọ na mgbasa ozi ọha na eze
Dịka onye isi ahịa na Hero Radio, Simon nwere nnukwu mmasị na ahịa Ịntanetị ma were klas oge na Chartered Institute of Marketing
N'oge a, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ukwuu n'ịzụ ahịa muicbookcom, ebe nrụọrụ weebụ na-elekọta mmadụ nke onye ọrụ ibe ya na ezigbo enyi ya bụ Samuel Keige hiwere
Otú ọ dị, e rere saịtị ahụ na Afroleocom
Ọ hapụrụ Kenya otu afọ ka e mesịrị ka ọ bụrụ onye enyemaka nke onye ọchụnta ego India bi na Tanzania bụ Nilesh Bhatt
O mechara n'afọ ahụ sonye na Pilipili Entertainment, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri nke Tanzania nke Nilesh Bhatt nwere dị ka onye njikwa ahịa
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Digital Strategist na nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi East Africa dịka Scanad, MetropolitanRepublic, Express DDB na BrandVision Advertising

Dịka onye ọchụnta ego na onye na-etinye ego, Shrekeezy nwere ihe omume Trans Africa, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahazi ihe omume nke dị na Tanzania ma bụrụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke Phorex East Africa ụlọ ọrụ na-eme ihe ngosi na PR na-arụ ọrụ na mpaghara East Africa

Ọ tọrọ ntọala The Nigerian Festival na Tanzania ( Naija Fest), Tanzania Social Media Awards (TSOMA Awards) na East Africa Awards na-abịanụ nke a maara dịka Mashariki Awards nke a ga-eme na Disemba afọ 2015 na Carnivore Nairobi
O tinyekwara aka na atụmatụ Club Music Video Awards na Uganda n'afọ 2013 na mmekorita ya na ROCKSTAR4000 / Sony MUSIC AFRICA
N'ụtụtụ nke 29 August 2015
Shrekeezy kpebiri iji ụgbọ mmiri si Whitesands Hotel gaa n'àgwàetiti Mbundya na Dar Tanzania tupu mmiri mmiri erie ya
A mụrụ Shrekeezy Simon Njoroge na Nakuru, Kenya
O si n'ezinụlọ mmadụ atọ
Ọ malitere inwe mmasị na teknụzụ na nka mgbe ọ dị afọ iri
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ kwagara Nairobi mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa
N'oge a, Simon zutere ọtụtụ ndị na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ egwu Kenya bụ ndị kpaliri ya isonyere mgbasa ozi Kenya
Ọ na-apụta mgbe niile na WAPI(Words And Pictures) Concert Freestyle agha ebe ọ zutere ndị mgbasa ozi nke nyere aka kesaa egwu ya

Shrekeezy zutere MC na onye mgbasa ozi na-ewu ewu na Kenya bụ DNG bụ onye nwere mmasị na egwu ya ma kpọọ ya maka ajụjụ ọnụ redio na ụlọ ọrụ redio a ma ama na Kenya 971 One FM ebe ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka redio mgbede nke Fired Up Radio show
DNG rụrụ nnukwu ọrụ n'ịgbasa egwu ya n'oge ahụ
O mechara laghachi n'obodo ya bụ Nakuru ruo oge ụfọdụ ebe ọ matara na a na-ebido ụlọ ọrụ redio
Ọ zụlitere mmasị na redio, n'ike mmụọ nsọ ma kpalie ya site na DNG, ọ gakwuuru ụlọ ọrụ redio maka ebe ọ ga-ekwe omume maka HIPHOP Show
Ndị nwe ọdụ ahụ nwere obi ụtọ site na ngosi Shrekeezy n'oge nzukọ mbụ ya ma nye ya ebe ahụ ozugbo
E kwuru na ọ malitere ihe ngosi SHREKEEZY LIVE n'otu ụbọchị ahụ
SHREKEEZY LIVE toro wee bụrụ otu n'ime ihe ngosi redio kachasị na mpaghara ahụ ma mee ka ọ bụrụ onye ama ama

Ọ kwụsịrị mgbasa ozi mgbe ọ ghọchara onye ọkachamara n'ihe gbasara dijitalụ na Nairobi, o mechara kwaga Dar es Salaam na Kampala na-arụ ọrụ na ụdị ndị isi na mpaghara gụnyere Pilsner Ice, Tusker Lager, Kenya Commercial Bank, Airtel, Samsung Mobile, MTN Uganda, na Coca-Cola
Ọ furu na Tanzania na 30 August 2015, ebe ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ ma hụ ya ka ọ nwụrụ mgbe ụbọchị abụọ gasịrị
Mmiri riri ya na Satọdee na nso Mbudya Island, n'ụsọ oké osimiri Dar es Salaam na Tanzania
A hụrụ ozu ya na Tuesday mgbe a chọchara ya ụbọchị atọ, dịka onye ikwu ya si kwuo
E liri ozu ya n'ụlọ nne na nna ya na mpaghara Kabatini na Nakuru County, Kenya na 5 Septemba afọ 2015
Shrekeezy rụrụ ọrụ dị ukwuu n'ịchịkọta ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche, òtù na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iji kwado mgbasa ozi JIKINGE, mmemme mmata nke ndị ntorobịa HIV Aids ọ tọrọ ntọala n'afọ 2012
Aha ezinụlọ Cheriqui ma ọ bụ Cheriki bụ aha nna ndị Juu Sephardi nke sitere na obodo Xèrica dị na obodo Spain, n'etiti Zaragoza na Valencia
Aha Arabic nke obodo ahụ bụ H̱īrīkā
Ụdị dị iche iche nke aha ezinụlọ gụnyere Chriqui, Chrequi, na Chreki, yana Sreki na Sriki
E dere Cheriqui dị ka aha ezinụlọ ndị Juu na Morocco na ọkara mbụ nke narị afọ nke iri na isii
Shriki ma ọ bụ Shriqui, Chriqui bụ ụdị Asharqui na Esharqui, okwu Arabic nke pụtara 'Eastern / Easter'
Na mpaghara Iberian, ha jikọtara ya na Sharquia, akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke mba Spain na-ekpuchi mpaghara Alicante, Almeria na Cartagena
N'akwụkwọ Spanish ochie, a na-ahụ aha ndị Juu Arabic abụọ dị ka Axarqui na Exarquino
Ụdị dị mkpirikpi gụnyere ndia Ashriqui, Eshriqui, Chriqui na Shriqui
E dekọrọ Eshriqui na Shuriqui na narị afọ nke iri na asatọ
A chọtara Shriqui na narị afọ nke iri na itoolu
Ọ nwere ike izo aka na

Ebe Nsọ nke Imam Shadhili bụ ebe a na-asọpụrụ nke ukwuu maka ndị Alakụba, na-echeta onye ọkà mmụta Alakụba a ma ama, imam na onye guzobere usoro Shadhili Sufi, Abu'l Hasan al-Shadhili, nke dị na Humaithara, Ijipt
Ọ na-ewe ihe dị ka awa 3 site n'okporo ụzọ site na Aswan, na awa 4-5 site na Edfu
Ewubere isi ụlọ ili nke a chọtara ili Imam Shadhili n'afọ 1259 (656 Hijri), ozugbo Imam Shadhili nwụsịrị
Mgbe ngwụcha narị afọ nke 13 gasịrị, ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị njem ala nsọ na-eleta ili Imam Shadhili mụbara ma gbasaa ụlọ nsọ ahụ iji nabata ọtụtụ mmadụ

Ndị ọbịa na ụlọ nsọ a gụnyere Imam Fassi nke Makkah, onye a na-akpọkwa al-Shadhili nke abụọ na otu n'ime ndị na-eso ụzọ ya dị mkpa, 21st khalifah ya, na onye guzobere ngalaba Fassiya nke usoro Shadhili
Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ndị isi niile (shuyūkh) sitere na Bait Al Fassi, Makkah agawo ụlọ arụsị nke Imam Shadhili, onye isi ala ha ebe a na Humaithara
E nwere olulu mmiri dị n'èzí ụlọ nsọ ahụ
A na-awụsa mmiri Imam Shadhili a kpụkọrọ akpụkọ n'olulu mmiri a ụbọchị tupu ọnwụ ya
Mmiri dị n'olulu mmiri a dị n'etiti ọzara mana ọ naghị akpọnwụ n'ime afọ
Mmiri nke olulu mmiri a dị ọcha ma na-egbo mkpa mmiri ọṅụṅụ nke obodo nta ndị dị n'ógbè ahụ
Shuga, nke a makwaara dị ka MTV Shuga, bụ usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn nke e mere na mbụ na November 2009 na MTV Base dị ka akụkụ nke atụmatụ akpọrọ 'MTV Staying Alive Ignite!'

MTV Networks Africa nyere ya ọrụ oge abụọ mbụ ya na MTV Staying Alive Foundation, PEPFAR, Partnership for an HIV-Free Generation (HFG) na Gọọmenti Kenya, dị ka akụkụ nke mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi iji gbasaa ozi gbasara ọrụ
omume mmekọahụ na ndidi
A na-eche na ihe nkiri a bụ usoro na-akpata arụmụka nke ukwuu site n'aka ndị agadi ọgbọ nke ndị Kenya n'ihi na ọ nwere ihe nkiri ụfọdụ nwere ihe ndị na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ

Ọ natara ihe nrite ọla edo na Mee 2010 na World Media Festival na Hamburg, Germany na ngalaba ahụike mmekọrịta ọha maka itinye uche ya na ịhụnanya, mmetụta uche, na omume mmekọahụ n'etiti ndị ntorobịa Kenya
N'afọ 2013, a na-ebugharị mmepụta nke usoro ahụ na Nigeria, ebe a na-edozi oge nke atọ na nke na-esote
Nke akpọrọ ' Shuga Naija ', ụdị ọhụrụ a bụ mgbasa ozi nke na-akụziri ndị ntorobịa gbasara oria HIV, inwe mmekọahụ na afọ ime ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma
Shuga metụkwara aka na ahụike nne na ụmụaka, atụmatụ ezinaụlọ, ime ihe ike dabere na nwoke na nwanyị, na inye ụmụ nwanyị ike
Emepụtara ya na mmekorita ya na ụlọ ọrụ 'National Agency for Control of AIDS' nke Nigeria (NACA)
Agbasara oge nke 3 nke usoro ihe omume a site na ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn 88 n'ofe ụwa, yana ndị na-ekiri ezinụlọ nwere ihe karịrị nde 550
Oge nke mbụ nwere omume atọ sochiri ndụ na ịhụnanya nke otu ụmụ akwụkwọ na-eto eto bụ ndị ndụ ha na-egbuke egbuke na ọmarịcha ọdịnihu ha kwụziri n'akụkụ mmá n'ihi ịhụnanya ha nwere maka ihe egwu
Oge a kọrọ akụkọ banyere nwa Ayira ( Lupita Nyong'o ) bụ onye maara ihe ọ chọrọ na otu esi enweta ya
Ọ malitere inwe mmasị n'ebe agadi nwoke ọ hụrụ ogologo oge n'anya bu Ty
Oge a gosikwara ndụ nke abụọ ndị ọzọ hụrụ Virginia na Leo bụ ndị nwere ihe mgbochi dị iche iche na mmekọrịta ha mana ha kpebisiri ike ime ka ọ rụọ ọrụ
Oge a na-egosipụtakwa ihe ngosi cameo si Madtraxx, P-Unit, Nonini, Nameless, Juliani, Jimmy Gate na Dj Adrian
Usoro nke asaa gbadoro ụkwụ na South Africa wee kpọọ 'MTV Shuga Down South'
Stephanie Sandows onye gosiputara ka Tsholo na usoro nke mbụ pụtaghachiri dị ka onwe ya maka ihe pụrụ iche
N'ihi ọrịa Coronavirus, Shuga batara na obere ihe ngosi abalị nke akpọrọ MTV Shuga Alone Together egosipụta nsogbu nke Coronavirus na 20 Eprel 2020
A ga-agbasa ihe ngosi a ruo abalị iri isii na ise na ndị na-akwado ya gụnyere United Nations
Usoro a dabere na Nigeria, South Africa, Kenya na Côte D'Ivoire ma kọwaa akụkọ a na mkparịta ụka ịntanetị n'etiti ndị isi
Edemede bụ Tunde Aladese na Nkiru Njoku

Shukrallah, Shukralla ma ọ bụ Shokrallah (Arabic ) bụ aha nna na Arabic
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
Shukri (Arabic ) (Turkish ), ma ọ bụ Shoukri, Shoukry, Shokri, Choukri, Choucri, Chokri wdg, bụ aha Arabic maka ụmụ nwoke / ụmụ nwanyị nke pụtara 'obi ụtọ'
Ọ bụ akụkụ nwoke na-arụ ọrụ nke ngwaa Arabic, شَكَرَ, nke pụtara 'inwe ekele'
Ụdị nwanyị nke aha ahụ bụ Shukriya ma ọ bụ Shukria (شكريّة), ma ọ bụ Şükriye na Turkish
Enwere ike iji ya mee ihe dị ka aha ma ọ bụ aha nna madu
Aha Arabic yiri ya bụ Shakir (ụdị nwanyị Shakira)
A mụrụ Shwikar n'obodo Alexandria nke dị n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Mediterenian nke Ijipt n'aka nne na nna ndị Ijipt
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụbọchị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2020, site n'ọrịa

Si Mohand ou-Mhand n At Hmadouch, nke a makwaara dị ka Si Mhand, (Icerɛiwen, Tizi Rached, n'ihe dị ka 1848 - Ain El Hammam, 28 Disemba 1905) bụ onye na-ede uri Berber-Amazigh a ma ama site na Kabylie na Algeria
Ndị ọkà mmụta French kpọrọ ya 'Kabyle Verlaine', ndị Algeria ibe ya Mouloud Feraoun, Mouloud Mammeri na Boulifa tụgharịrị ọrụ ya na otu n'ime nsụgharị ya bụ Les poémes de Si-Mohand (1960)
N'ihi ọdịiche nke ozi na isi mmalite, a maghị nkọwa ụfọdụ nke ndụ ya nke ọma

A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ bara ọgaranya dị mkpa, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na nkuzi okpukpe ọdịnala (ya mere e jị nye ya aha Si, 'Dọkịta', nke agbakwunyere na aha ya), ndụ ya gosipụtara mmegide siri ike nke sochiri nnupụisi Kabyle megide ọchịchị ndị France na 1871
Ọ tụfuru ihe niile
A mara nna ya ikpe ọnwụ, e zigara nwanne nna ya na New Caledonia, a napụkwara ihe onwunwe ezinụlọ ya
N'adịghị ka nne ya na ụmụnne ya, ndị kwagara Tunis, ọ họọrọ ịnọ ma biri na Algeria dị ka otu n'ime ndị a napụrụ ihe ha, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ ụbọchị ma ọ bụ na-arụkọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-akwụghị ụgwọ
Ọ dịghị mgbe ọ biri ebe ọ bụla, mana ọ na-awagharị ndụ ya niile na Algiers ma ọ bụ n'obodo na obodo nta ndị ọzọ dị na Algeria n'ime na gburugburu Kabylie
Ọ bụ nkọwa ole na ole banyere ndụ ya ka a maara nke ọma
Omenala ahụ na-echeta nleta ọ gara na Cheikh Mohand ou-Lhocine, onye ya na ya lụrụ ọgụ, yana njem ụkwụ gaa Tunis, ebe ọ zutere ụmụnne ya mana a nabataghị ya nke ọma
Ọ nwụrụ n'ọrịa ụkwara nta mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ise na asaa n'ụlọ ọgwụ Sainte-Eugénie dị na Michelet (nke bụzi Ain El Hammam)
O dekwara akụkọ na akwụkwọ Younes Adli nke afọ 2000 Les Éditions de Minuit nke e bipụtara bụ Mohand et un révolte
N'oge ndụ ya ọ na-awagharị awagharị, o dere ọtụtụ isefra ma ọ bụ uri na Berber
Ụfọdụ narị ndị lanarịrị site na nnyefe ọnụ ma dekọọ ha n'akwụkwọ site na Boulifa, Mouloud Feraoun, Moulou Mammeri na Younes Adli
Sibonelo bụ aha South Africa nyere
Ndị ama ama nwere aha gụnyere
Millicent Ntombizodwa Sibongile Manana bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Obodo South Afrika si Mpumalanga
Ọ nọchitere anya African National Congress (ANC) dịka onye omeiwu site na 1994 ruo 2019, nke kachasị na National Assembly site na afo 2014 ruo afo 2019 ya na 2004 ruo 2009
Ọ nọdụrụ na Mpumalanga Provincial Legislature, ebe ọ jere ozi na Mpumalanga Executive Council site na afo 1999 ruo 2004 ya na afo 2009 ruo 2014

A maara Manana nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dịka onye otu Mpumalanga nke Executive Council (MEC) maka ahụike site na afo 1999 ruo 2003 n'oge ọrịa HIV / AIDS; ọ guzogidere ike iwepụta ọgwụ antiretroviral na ụlọ ọrụ ahụike ọha na eze nke mpaghara ahụ
Ọ bụ onye otu National Executive Committee nke ANC site na afo 2007 ruo 2012

Manana rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nọọsụ n'oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ma họpụta ya ka ọ nọchite anya ANC na Mpumalanga Provincial Legislature na ntuli aka nke afọ 1994, nke mbụ na South Afrika n'okpuru ikike ntụli aka zuru ụwa ọnụ
O mechara bụrụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Ahụike nke ndị omeiwu ruo mgbe a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche na onye isi oche ya nke ANC
Sibongile Mlambo bụ onye omere na Zimbabwe nke bi na United States

A maara ya maka ịsonye na ihe nkiri nke Netflix hibere nke a kpọrọ 'Lost in Space', usoro ihe onyonyo akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Starz Black Sails nakwa ihe nkiri a kpọrọ 'Honey 3' ya na 'The Last Face' A makwaara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka Tamora Monroe na usoro telivishọn MTV nke a kpọrọ 'Teen Wolf', dị ka Donna na usoro telivishọn Freeform Siren, na ikwupụta Melusi na egwuregwu Ubisoft, Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
A mụrụ Mlambo na Zimbabwe, nna ya bụ dọkịta
Mlambo nwere nwanne nwanyị nke tọrọ ya, ọ bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Mlambo hapụrụ Zimbabwe na 2005 ịga agụ akwụkwọ na United States ma biri na Texas, New York, o mechara biri na Spain obere oge
Na 2011, Mlambo gara biri na South Africa, wee na-arụ ọrụ na Johannesburg na Cape Town
Mlambo mechara laghachi ala United States, biri na Los Angeles
Mlambo gụrụ French na Spanish na Mahadum Southern Methodist ma nweekwa ezigbo ntọala n'ịgba egwu
Mlambo abụrụla ihu mkpọsa Nivea n'ofe Africa na onye nnọchiteanya Ice Genetics na Cape Town
Na 2007, Mlambo bụrụ ada nke abụọ na Miss Zim-USA 2007
Ọ mere ihe nkiri dị ka Eme na ihe ngosi netwọkụ Starz Black Sails wee mee ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-edu ndú
O mekwara ihe nkiri dika Ishani na 'Honey 3' nakwa dika Cassie Ventura na Kenny Wormald nke Footloose
Ọ sokwa na ndị mere ihe nkiri The Last Face dị ka Assatu, ma bụrụ nwanne Chadwick Boseman, Bianca, na ihe nkiri ama ama a kpọrọ 'Message From the King'
Na 2018, Mlambo rụrụ ọrụ n'usoro ihe onyonyo Siren dị ka Donna
N'afọ 2021, onye ọbịa Mlambo mere ihe nkiri na mmemme 'ihe mgbu' nke Black Lightning dị ka Maya Odell
Àtụ Wikiquote
Sibongile Sambo (amụrụ 1974 na Bushbuckridge ) bụ onye isi ụgbọ elu South Africa
Ọ tọrọ ntọala SRS Aviation
Akpọrọ Sambo aha na ndepụta '20 Young Power Women in Africa 2013'
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Zululand
Sambo enweghị ike ịbụ onye nlekọta ụgbọ elu na South African Airways
Na 2004, ọ meriri nkwekọrịta gọọmentị South Africa

Ọ tọrọ ntọala SRS Aviation, nke na-enye ọrụ mgbazinye ụgbọ elu na helikopta, ọrụ iji ụgbọ elu wee buo ngwaahịa, nnyefe ndị njem nlegharị anya, nchekwa ikuku n'ozuzu, ọpụpụ ahụike na ọrụ ụgbọelu ndị ọzọ
SRS Aviation bụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị isi ojii mbụ nwere na South Africa
N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2020, Sambo gbara akaebe n'ihu Kọmịshọn Zondo nke nyocha gbasara njide steeti na Parktown, Johannesburg, dịka akụkụ nke nyocha ya na njikwa South African Airways

Sibulele Cecilia Holweni (a mụrụ n'abali iri abụo na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2001) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ South Africa nke na-agbara Sophakama / HPC dị ka onye ọnọ n'etiti na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị South Africa bọọlụ
Holweni gbara egwuregwu bọọlụ mbụ ya n'abalị iri na abụọ nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2019 na mmeri enyi na enyi ọkpụ atọ asara ha ma ha asataghị ọtú na United States

N'abalị iteghete nke ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2020, Holweni nyere goolu ise na mmeri asaa na asataghị otu nke otu ahụ meriri Comoros na ngalaba A nke 2020 COSAFA Women's Championship South Afrịka mechara soro n'elu ngalaba otu ha wee gaa n'ọkwa mgbapụ
Sid Ali Kouiret (3 Jenụwarị 1933 5 Eprel 2015) bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Kouiret na Algiers
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri sinima
O nwere oge nwata siri ike
Nna ya bụ onye ọkwọ ụgbọala tagzi, na-aṅụbiga mmanya ókè n'ụlọ ugboro ma na-emeso nne ya ihe ike
N'ehihie, obere Sid Ali Kouiret, nke a na-emebiga ihe ókè, mara nna ya mma n'azụ ma manye ya ibi n'okporo ámá mgbe ọ dị obere
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, ọ bụ onye na-azụ ahịa n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Algiers ma ọ nweghị njikọ ọ bụla na nka
Mana ọ hụrụ egwuregwu n'anya, ọkachasị igwu mmiri
Iji mee nke ahụ, ọ ga-agafe okporo ámá 'La Rue de la Marine'
Otu ụbọchị, ọ zutere n'ebe ahụ (na 'Le Café de Daniel') Mustapha Kateb onye duziri na iri ise otu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ malitere njem ya n'elu ikpo okwu
N'afọ 1951, ọ gara Berlin na ndị otu ihe nkiri 'El Mesrah El Djazairi'
N'afọ 1952, ha nọ na Paris; na-abụ abụ ịhụ mba n'anya na kọfị Algeria
N'afọ 1953, ọ gara Bucharest maka 4th World Festival of Youth and Students for peace
Ka e mesịrị n'otu afọ ahụ, ọ ghọrọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri ma sonye n'òtù obodo Algiers, nke Mahieddine Bachtarzi duziri
Mana n'afọ 1955, na n'ihi mmekpa ahụ na mkpagbu nke DST (French domestic intelligence agency), na maka nchekwa ya, a manyere ya ịpụ
Ya mere ọ gara Marseille, wee gaa Paris ebe ọ zutere Mohamed Boudia, Hadj Omar, Missoum, na Noureddine Bouhired
N'afọ 1958, ọ bụ onye otu ihe nkiri nke nwere njikọ na FLN (National Liberation Front) nke na-anwa ime ka Algeria bụrụ onye a ma ama n'ụwa niile na ịkwalite ọgụ Algeria maka nnwere onwe
Mgbe nnwere onwe nke Algeria gasịrị, ọ so n'ime ihe ndị ga-eme ka Algeria National Theatre
N'afọ1963 bụ mmalite nke ọrụ ihe nkiri na-egbuke egbuke
Mpụta mbụ ya na ihe nkiri bụ na TV nke egwuregwu 'Les Enfants de la Casbah' nke Mustapha Badie (afọ 1963)
Mana ezi nraranye ya bụ na 'LXOpium et le Bâton' (afọ 1970) nke Ahmed Rachedi duziri

Mgbe ahụ bịara 'Décembre'(afọ 1971) na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ nke Algeria na mba ọzọ dịka 'Le Retour de LʹEnfant Prodigue', nke Youssef Chahine duziri n'afọ1976; na 'Destins Sanglants' nke Kheiri Bichara duziri n'afọ 1980
Ọ nwụrụ n'abalị 5 ọnwa Eprel afọ 2015 na Algiers
Telivishọn

Sidney James (onye a mụrụ Solomon Joel Cohen; 8 Mee 1913 na 26 Eprel 1976) bụ onye Britain na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ọchị, amụrụ na South Africa, onye ọrụ ya gụnyere redio, ihe nkiri na ihuenyo, a maara ya nke ọma maka ọtụtụ ọrụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri Carry On

James, ọ bụ ezie na ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'obodo ya, chọtara ihe ịga nke ọma ya kachasị ukwuu na England, malite na ọrụ na ihe nkiri site n'afọ 1947, a tụbara ya n'ọtụtụ obere ọrụ na nkwado n'ime afọ 1950
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri The Lavender Hill Mob n'afọ 1951, nke Alec Guinness gosipụtara
A zụlitere profaịlụ ya dịka onye na-arụkọ ọrụ Tony Hancock na Hancock's Half Hour, nke mbụ na usoro redio na mgbe e mesịrị mgbe emere ya maka telivishọn ma malite n'afọ1954 ruo 1960

Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a maara ya dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri mgbe niile na ihe nkiri Carry On, na-apụta na ihe nkiri iri na itoolu nke usoro ahụ, yana ọrụ ịkwụ ụgwọ kachasị elu na 17 (na abụọ ndị ọzọ, a tụbara ya n'okpuru Frankie Howerd)
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri telivishọn gara n'ihu n'oge ndụ ya niile
Ọ pụtara na 1970s sitcom Bless This House ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1976

A mụrụ James Solomon Joel Cohen n'abalị 8 ọnwa Mee afọ 1913, nne na nna ndị Juu nọ na South Africa, mgbe ahụ ọ bụ ọchịchị Britain, mgbe e mesịrị gbanwee aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Sidney Joel Cohen, na Sidney James
Ezinụlọ ya biri na Hancock Street na Hillbrow, Johannesburg

Mgbe ọ kwagara UK e mesịrị na ndụ [mgbe?], ọ kwuru na ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị iche iche n'oge gara aga, gụnyere onye na-egbutu diamond, onye nkuzi ịgba egwu na onye na-akụ ọkpọ; n'eziokwu, ọ zụrụ ma rụọ ọrụ dịka onye na-edozi isi
Ọ bụ n'ụlọ ntutu isi na Kroonstad, Orange Free State, ka ọ zutere nwunye mbụ ya
Ọ lụrụ Berthe Sadie Delmont, nke a maara dịka Toots, na 12 August 1936 ma ha nwere nwa nwanyị, Elizabeth, amụrụ n'afọ 1937

Nna di ya, Joseph Delmont, onye ọchụnta ego Johannesburg, zụrụ ụlọ ịkpụ isi maka James, mana n'ime otu afọ ọ mara ọkwa na ọ chọrọ ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri wee sonye na Johannesburg Repertory Players
Site n'ìgwè a, ọ nwetara ọrụ na South African Broadcasting Corporation
Toots gbara ya alụkwaghịm n'afọ 1940
N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye isi na otu ntụrụndụ nke ndị agha South Africa, ma mesịa malite ime ihe nkiri dịka ọrụ
Ọ kwagara United Kingdom na Disemba afọ 1946, nke ego ya sitere na ọrụ ya
Na mbido, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na repertory tupu a hụ ya maka ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Britain na-amalite mgbe agha gasịrị
James mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na Night Beat na Black Memory n'afọ 1947, ihe nkiri mpụ abụọ ahụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ere mmanya na-aba n'anya na Powell na Pressburger's The Small Back Room n'afọ 1949
N'afọ 1967, James bu n'obi igwu Sergeant Nocker na Follow That Camel, mana o kpebisiri ike idekọ usoro TV George and the Dragon (1966ī 1968) maka ATV, mgbe ahụ otu n'ime ndị ọrụ ITV
Onye America na-eme ihe ọchị bụ Phil Silvers nọchiri James na Follow That Camel
N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1967, izu abụọ mgbe ihe nkiri ahụ malitere nke mechara bụrụ ihe ntinye na usoro Carry On, James nwere ajọ nkụchi obi
N'otu afọ ahụ na Carry On Doctor, e gosipụtara James ka ọ na-edina n'àkwà ụlọ ọgwụ, n'ihi nsogbu ahụike ya n'ezie

Mgbe nkụchi obi ya gasịrị, James kwụsịrị ịṅụ sịga siri ike ma kama ọ na-ese anwụrụ ma ọ bụ sịga mgbe ụfọdụ; ọ belatara ibu, rie naanị otu nri dị mkpa n'ụbọchị, ma na-aṅụ naanị mmanya abụọ ma ọ bụ atọ kwa mgbede
Ihe ịga nke ọma ya na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị na TV gara n'ihu na mmemme Two in Clover (1969ī70) na Bless This House (1971ī-1976); nke ikpeazụ dugara na ihe nkiri nkiri n'afọ1972
James nwanyị ugboro atọ
Ya na nwunye mbụ ya, Berthe Sadie Delmont, lụrụ n'afọ 1936 ma mụọ nwa nwanyị, Elizabeth, n'afọ 1937; ha gbara alụkwaghịm n'afọ 1940, karịsịa n'ihi ọtụtụ mmekọrịta ya na ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 1943, ọ lụrụ onye na-agba egwú, Serge Megi, née Williams (1913-1977); n'afọ 1948, ha nwere nwa nwanyị Reina; ha gbara alụkwaghịm na 17 August 1952
Na 21 Ọgọstụ 1952, James lụrụ Valerie Elizabeth Patsy Assan (a mụrụ na 1928), onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke jiri Ashton dịka aha ya
Ha nwere nwa nwoke, Steve James, a mụrụ na 1954, onye ghọrọ onye na-emepụta egwu, na nwa nwanyị, Sue, onye ghọrọ onye mmepụta telivishọn

N'oge ikpeazụ nke alụmdi na nwunye ha, ha biri n'ụlọ nke James n'onwe ya mepụtara, nke a na-akpọ Delaford Park, nke dị na Iver, Buckinghamshire, ebe dị nso na Pinewood Studios iji nye ya ohere ịlaghachi n'ụlọ maka nri ehihie mgbe ọ na-ese ihe nkiri
N'oge ọ lụrụ Valerie, ya na onye na-arụkọ ọrụ na Carry On bụ Barbara Windsor nwere mmekọrịta a kpọsara nke ọma ruo afọ 3
E gosipụtara ihe omume ahụ na 1998 Cleo, Camping, Emmanuelle na Dick na ihe nkiri telivishọn ya nke afọ 2000 Cor, Blimey!

Mmasị James nwere na Windsor dị ukwuu nke na a nụrụ na di ya n'oge ahụ bụ Ronnie Knight nwere arịa ụlọ James niile a haziri n'ụlọ dịka ihe egwu aghụghọ na, n'oge ọzọ, na o tinyere anyụike n'ala James, mana ezigbo ndị enyi nke oge ahụ, gụnyere Vince Powell na William G
Stewart, ajụla aro ahụ
James bụ onye na-agba chaa chaa na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma, na-efunahụ ọtụtụ iri puku pound n'oge ndụ ya

Ịgba chaa chaa riri ya ahụ nke mere na ya na onye nnọchi anya ya, Michael Sullivan, nwere nkwekọrịta, nke a na-agwaghị nwunye ya ego ole a na-akwụ ya, ka e wee nwee ike idebe akụkụ maka ịgba chaa chaa
James nọ na njem nlegharị anya na mmepụta nke The Mating Season, na 26 Eprel, 1976 mgbe ọ nwere nkụchi obi n'elu ikpo okwu na Sunderland Empire Theatre
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri Olga Lowe chere na ọ na-eme egwuregwu na mbụ mgbe ọ zaghị mkparịta ụka ya
Mgbe ọ zaghị ad libs ya, ọ gara n'ihu na nku ịchọ enyemaka

Onye njikwa teknụzụ, Melvyn James (enweghị onye ikwu), kpọrọ oku ka a mechie ákwà mgbochi ahụ ma rịọ dọkịta, ebe ndị na-ege ntị na-amaghị ihe na-eme chịrị ọchị, na-ekwere na ihe omume ahụ bụ akụkụ nke ihe ngosi ahụ
A kpọrọ ambulance ma kwupụta na ọ nwụọla mgbe ọ rutere Sunderland Royal Hospital
Ọ dị afọ 62

Side Chick Gang bụ ihe nkiri Ghana/ihe nkiri nto ọchị 2018 nke Peter Sedufia duziri
Ndị enyi nwanyị atọ bụ ndị hapụrụ ezigbo ọrụ ha dị ka ndị nnabata ịchụso ọrụ nke na-akwụ ụgwọ karịa ma dị mma karịa ọrụ ochie ha, ha hibere 'Side Chic Gang'
Ndị otu Sidechic na-enye naanị ụmụ nwanyị ọrụ
Nke a na-eme ka ndị ikom ahụ ghara inwe obi ụtọ na ihe ngosi ha na-ewu ewu na mberede
Ọrụ ahụ na-ekenye ha ka ha na-amachi di ma ọ bụ enyi nwoke na-aghọgbu nwunye ha ma ọ bụ enyi ha nwanyị
Ndị otu a na-enweta ọrụ n'aka nwoke bara ọgaranya nke bụ nnukwu nkwekọrịta ha na onye ọlụlụ a na-enyo enyo na ọ na-aghọ aghụghọ
Nke kasị n'imegide ha nke ukwuu bụ ndị ikom were iwe ma rite uru na ọrụ nke ndi enyi nwaanyị
'Sidede Onyulo (1955–2008) bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri, onye ama ama maka ọrụ ya dịka Owour na ihe nkiri Oscar-winning Nowhere in Africa

A mụrụ Sidede Onyulo Peter Sidede Onyulo na Kajulu (Kenya), ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Muthaiga Primary (1965–1968) na Nairobi School (1969–1976) tupu ọ debanye aha na Mahadum Nairobi ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu n'etiti afọ 1975 na 1978
N'afọ 1979, Onyulo kwụsịrị ọrụ iwu ya wee kpebie ịnabata ihe nkiri, mkpebi nke ndị enyi ya na ezinụlọ ya katọrọ
Onyulo kọwara n'ajụjụ ọnụ ihe mere ime ihe nkiri ji nwee ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta nke ndị na-akwado ya na Kenya “Ha chere na nke a bụ ọrụ a na-ekwesịghị iji kpọrọ ihe ma na-eleda ndị na-eme ihe nkiri anya
Ha na-eche na anyị bụ ndị ara dịka ndị Kafira chere na Jasper Wendo nọ na Betrayal of the city”
Ya na Jero mere ihe nkiri izizi ha na Wole Soyinka's play Trials of Brother Jero

Ọ gbasoro nke a na ọrụ dị iche iche na Micere Githae Mugo na Ngũg· wa Thiong'o's Trial of Dedan Kimathi na Francis Imbuga's Betrayal in the City nke e gosipụtara na All Africa Festival of Arts and Culture (FESTAC) na Nigeria n'afọ 1977
Onyulo mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya n'afọ 1987 mgbe ọ natara ọrụ nke nwa nwoke ụlọ na Shadow on the Sun
A na-ekwu na ndị ọkachamara n'ihe nkiri Kenya tụrụ ya aro na mbido maka ọrụ Owour, na Nowhere in Africa, mana a hụghị ya, ebe o si Nairobi kwaga Kisumu, na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke Kenya
Otu onye na-ahụ maka nhazi obodo chọtara ya n'obodo ya dị nso na Ọdọ Mmiri Victoria ma nye ya ọrụ nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye ama ama na ọkwa mba ụwa
E kwuru na ọ bụ nwoke dị umeala n'obi, n'amaghị na o ritere ihe nrite Best Supporting Actor na Dublin Film Festival maka ọrụ ya dịka Owour
Onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri bụ Peter Herrman mechara nye ya onyinye ahụ
Ọ nọwo na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, gụnyere Ivory Hunters (aka 'The Last Elephant') (1990), Eyes of a Witness (1991), Nowhere in Africa (2003), King Solomon's Mines (2004), na The Constant Gardener (2005)
Onyulo tinyere aka na nhazi nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na Kenya, na-arụ ọrụ na ndị otu dị iche iche na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na òtù ndị na-abụghị nke gọọmentị, na-enyefe talent ya na ihe nkiri Swahili na-emegide ụmụ nwanyị-egbu ụmụ nwanyị Price of a Daughter
Onyulo dara ọrịa mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ ime obodo ya dị n'okpuru ugwu Kajulu ma gbaga n'ụlọ ọgwụ onwe ya ma nwụọ otu izu mgbe e mesịrị
Sidi Abdel Rahman (Arabic) bụ obodo dị n'ụsọ Oké Osimiri Mediterenian n'Ijipt
Sidi Abdel Rahman dị na Ọzara Ọdịda Anyanwụ Egypt nke dị n'ọnụ mmiri nke Oké Osimiri Mediterenian, nwere ọmarịcha osimiri, ma bụrụkwa ebe izu ike
Enwere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke ogbunigwe a na-atụghị anya ya, nke malitere site na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ na mpaghara nke kpatara ọnwụ mmadụ ma gbochie mmepe na mpaghara ahụ kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ
Sidi Abdel Rahman anọghị n'ebe a ma ama n'afọ 1942 nke Agha El Alamein nke Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Enwere ike ịchọta ili ozu na ili ozu maka ndị Allies n'ebe dị nso, na ọ dịkarịa ala ndị agha iri itoolu na itoolu na-ehi ụra n'ebe ahụ
A pụkwara ịchọta ozu ndị a na-amaghị aha ha nke ọtụtụ puku ndị agha Germany n'ebe ili ozu
Na Septemba 30, 1942, onye isi Luftwaffe bụ Hans-Joachim Marseille, onye kwuru na e gburu ụgbọelu 158 e bibiri megide ndị Allies, n'akụkụ ebe obibi ahụ
E ji pyramid mee akara n'ebe ahụ ihe dị ka kilomita 10 n'ebe ndịda obodo ahụ
Sidi Abdel Rahman bụ naanị 'ebe ezumike dị ala'

Gulf of Sidi Abdel Rahman na Mediterenian gụnyere Al Alamein Hotel bụ nke ụlọ ọrụ Egypt General Company for Tourism and Hotels (EGOTH) rere na 2006, Emaar Egypt, onye enyemaka nke Emaar Dubai meriri ikike ịzụlite mpaghara ahụ
A ga-eji ego a natara site na ire ya mee ihe maka ịkwalite ụlọ nkwari akụ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Ijipt, dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka itinye ego Mahmoud Mohieldin si kwuo
Onye mmepe ahụ, nke nwere nnukwu akpa, onye zụrụ Sidi Abdel Rahman tụrụ aro ịzụlite obodo n'afọ niile na nnukwu ego nke ijeri 174
Dị ka o kwere nkwa n'oge ire ere, Emaar wuru nnukwu ebe ezumike a na-akpọ Marassi Resort ozugbo ma ọ dị kilomita 24 ( mi) site na Al Alamain International Airport
DJ Bob Sinclair rụrụ ọrụ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, 2008 na Marassi
Ihe mbụ Emaar Egypt nyere n'ihu ọha na Egypt na 2015 bụ IPO kachasị ukwuu na Egypt, kemgbe 2007

Sidi Boushaki (1394-1453) bụ ọkà mmụta okpukpe maliki amụrụ nso obodo Thenia, 54 km (34 mi) n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Algiers
A zụlitere ya na mpaghara ime mmụọ nke nwere ụkpụrụ Islam dị elu na ụkpụrụ omume n'ime akwụkwọ ntụaka Alakụba nke Algeria
A mụrụ Sidi Boushaki Ez-Zaouaoui na 1394 OA na Col des Beni Aïcha, na obodo Soumâa n'ime mpaghara Tizi Naïth Aïcha, na Khachna massif, ndọtị nke Djurdjura
Ezinụlọ ya gbatịkwuru bụ Abu Ishaq Ibrahim bin Faïd bin Moussa bin Omar bin Saïd bin Allal bin Saïd al-Zawawi
Ọ malitere ọmụmụ ihe n'obodo nta Thala Oufella (Soumâa) dị na Thénia na 1398 OA, tupu ya abanye na Béjaïa na 1404 OA, ọ dị obere ka ọ gaa n'ihu n'ọmụmụ ihe ya
N'ebe ahụ, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ-Quran na Maliki fiqh dị ka nwa akwụkwọ na Ali Menguelleti, onye ọkà mmụta okpukpe a ma ama sitere na Kabylie
Béjaïa bụ mgbe ahụ na mmalite narị afọ nke iri na ise bụ ebe okpukperechi na ebe mmetụta nke Sufism
O mere njem ya na 1415 na Tunis, ebe o mere ka ọ ghọtakwuo Maliki Madhhab
N'ebe ahụ, ọ gụrụ tafsir nke Quran n'aka onye ọka ikpe Abu Abdallah Al Kalchani, ma nweta Maliki fiqh n'aka Yaakub Ez-Zaghbi
Ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ nke Abdelwahed Al Fariani na ntọala (Oussoul) nke Islam
Ọ laghachiri na 1420 n'ugwu nke Béjaïa bụ ebe o mikpuru n'asụsụ Arabic na Abd El Aali Ibn Ferradj
Ọ gara Constantine na 1423 ebe o biri ọtụtụ afọ, na ọ natara nkuzi na Muslim okwukwe (Aqidah) na mgbagha na 'Abu Zeid Abderrahmane', utu aha 'El Bez'

Ọ gụrụ prose, amaokwu, fiqh na ọtụtụ sayensị nkà mmụta okpukpe nke oge ahụ na Ibn Marzuq El Hafid (1365 - 1439), ọkà mmụta Maghreb na Tlemcen bụ onye gara leta Constantine ikwusa ihe ọmụma ya, ka ọ ghara inwe mgbagwoju anya na nna ya Ibn
Marzuq El Khatib (1310 - 1379)
Ọ sonyeere Mecca maka njem njem na ọmụmụ ihe, wee kwaga Damaskọs ebe ọ gara nkuzi Imam Ibn al-Jazari na sayensị nke Qur'an
Ọ nwụrụ na 1453, e wee lie ya n'Ugwu Thenia dị nso na Zawiyet Sidi Boushaki n'ebo Kabyle nke Igawawen
Laa azụ na Kabylia n'ime afọ ole na ole ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya, Sidi Boushaki wee hiwe otu zawiya nke ọ kụziiri ndị na-eso ụzọ ya (murids) dịka òtù ụmụnna Qadiriyya Sufi nke Sunni Sufism siri dị
Zawiya a bụ ebe mmetụta ọgụgụ isi na nke mmụọ na Kabylia dị ala site na nkuzi ya na nkuzi mmalite nke enyere na mpaghara a nke Oued Isser na Oued Meraldene gbara n'ihu oke osimiri Mediterenian
A naghị agbaso usoro Sufi nke Qadiriyya na zawiya a ruo narị afọ atọ ruo mgbe tariqa Rahmaniyya weghaara na mpaghara Algérois na Kabylia dị ka ihe atụ nke usoro mmụta
Ọrụ ya na-ekpuchi ọtụtụ akụkụ nke sayensị Islam, gụnyere
Sidi Brahim bụ ụdị mmanya a na-emepụta n'ugwu Atlas, nke mbụ na obodo Algeria, mgbe ahụ na obodo Morocco na ugbu a na obodo Tunisia
A na-agwakọta mmanya ahụ ma tinye ya na karama maọbụ jupụta n'ime akpa na France, a na-erekwa ya ebe ahụ
Ọ bụ mmanya nke abụọ kachasị ere na obodo France, n'azụ Boulaouane (nke bụkwa akara Castel), ka ọ na-erule afọ 2005
Ọnụ ọgụgụ mmepụta bụ ihe dịka nde karama atọ kwa afọ
A gụrụ mmanya ahụ aha mgbe Agha Sidi-Brahim (1845)
Ọ bụ Groupe Castel nwe akara ahụ ugbu a, nke nwetara ya (na Malesan) na afo 2003 site na William Pitters, ụlọ ọrụ nke Bernard Magrez guzobere
Magrez/Pitters zụrụ ya na afo 1982
Akara nke karama mmanya na-acha ọbara ọbara na-ekwu na a 'eji aka ewepụta ya kemgbe afo 1924'
Ihe mejupụtara mkpụrụ vaịn nke Sidi Brahim na ụdị mmanya dị iche iche a na-enye agbanweela kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, mana na afo 2010 a na-egosi ihe mejupụtara ya dịka ihe ndị a
Ngwakọta nke mmanya na-acha ọbara ọbara gụnyere ụdị ọdịnala nke North Afrika (nke ya na Languedoc-Roussillon na-ekerịta), dịka Alicante, Aramon, Carignan, Cinsault, na Grenache
Ihe mejupụtara ugbu a bụ 'New World-like'
Sidiki Bakaba (a mụrụ na Abengourou, n'afọ 1949) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ede ihe nkiri na onye nduzi si Côte d'Ivoire
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ n'obodo Abidjan
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na National School of Drama nke Abidjan, ọ zụrụ ọzụzụ na Living Theatre na Grotowski
N'afọ 2000, ọ ghọrọ onye nduzi nke Obí Ọdịbendị nke Abidjan (Palais de la Culture d'Abidjan) nke dị na Treichville
O guzobekwara Actor's Studio (ụlọ akwụkwọ ọzụzụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na Palace of Culture)

Tinyere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri dị ịrịba ama, o mepụtara ihe nkiri akụkọ ifo, ihe ngosi dịka Les Guérisseurs (1988) nke meriri ihe nrite maka egwu kachasị mma na Francophone Film Festival, yana Voice of Hope na FESPACO Ouagadougou n'afọ 1989

O duziri ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi dịka Le Nord est tombé sur la tête (1985-1998) maka TV5, Le Parole (1992), L'Anniversaire de Daymios (November 1992) na ihe ngosi dị ka Cinq siècles de solitude na La victoire aux mains nues n'afọ 2002
Onye na-akwado onye bụbu onye isi ala Laurent Gbagbo, Bakaba n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011 ọ nọ n'ụlọ Gbagbo na Abidjan n'oge nnọchibido nke mere ka e jide Gbagbo ma kọọrọ na e merụrụ ya ahụ n'oge ya
Sidney George Stuart Hinkes (1925-2006) bụ onye Britain na-eme udo na onye ụkọchukwu na Chọọchị England
A mụrụ Hinkes na Dagenham
Nna ya bụ onye na-ahọrọ akwụkwọ ozi na ụlọ ọrụ London Sorting
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Dagenham County School site na 1936 ma a kpọpụrụ ya na Ilfracombe n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Ọ gara n'ihu na-eje ozi na 6th Airborne Division na Ardennes na Rhine site na 1943
Ọ lụrụ nwunye ya, Elsie, na 1945 ma bụrụ onye a họpụtara na 1952
Hinkes ghọrọ onye na-eme mkpọsa udo ma na-etinye aka na udo n'oge Agha Suez nke 1956 ma tinye aka na Aldermaston March mbụ na 1958
Mmekọrịta ya na CND toro ma ọ ghọrọ onyeisi oche nke Christian CND na 1964
Mgbe ọ gara Oxford n'afọ ndị 1960, Hinkes tinyere aka n'ihe gbasara mmekọrịta agbụrụ ma bụrụ onye isi oche nke Oxford Community Relations Council
O mechara rụọ ọrụ na ndị isi mba nke Joint Council for the Welfare of Immigrants
O mechara tinye aka na mmegide megide Agha Iraq nke afọ 2003 ma bụrụ onye otu Stop the War Coalition na Anglican Pacifist Fellowship
Sidney Sokhona (amụrụ n'afọ 1952) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mauritania
Sokhona mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Nationality Immigration, site na 1972 ruo 1975 dị ka onye mbịarambịa na Paris

Sokhona dere banyere ihe nkiri sinima Africa maka Cahiers du Cinéma, na-ekwu na 'Afrịka bụ ndị a chiri na mgbe gara aga, etụ ahụ ka sinima ya dịkwa', nakwa na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri n'Afrịka amalitela 'ịdepụta atụmatụ agha maka nnwere onwe sinima'
1976 n'afọ nke ise FESPACO na Ouagadougou, Burkina Faso na-aga wwwfespacobf
1975 gaa Paris, France

Siegfried Mynhardt (5 Machị 1906 na 28 Machị 1996) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Mynhardt na Johannesburg ma o biri n'ogige ndị agha Wynberg, ebe nna ya bụ padre
Ya na nwunye ya, Jocelyn, mụrụ ụmụ atọ
Tinyere ịpụta na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na ọtụtụ ọrụ telivishọn, a makwaara Mynhardt maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri South Africa na British
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ malitere ịpụta na ihe nkiri na South Africa
O kwetara na ọ mụtara ezigbo ọrụ n'afọ ndị 1930, mgbe ọ na-eme ihe na Old Vic na London ma soro Alec Guinness na-ekerịta ụlọ
Ihe nrite ya gụnyere ịpụta na Dingaka, ihe nkiri afọ 1965 nke onye nduzi South Africa a ma ama, Jamie Uys
O mechara pụta ya naJacqueline Bisset na A Cape Town Affair
N'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2020, a raara Siegfried nye dịka akụkọ ifo dị ndụ na South African Legends Museum
Nwa nwanne ya, Shaun Mynhardt raara ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie ahụ nye ncheta Siegie
Siemon Allen (amụrụ na Durban, South Africa) bụ onye na-ese ihe na-arụ ọrụ karịsịa na ntinye ihe
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na mba United States
A na-ewere Allen dị ka otu n'ime ndị a ma ama na-egosipụta nka South Africa na Northeastern USA
Siemon Allen gụrụ maka ihe osise na Technikon Natal na Durban, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Master of Arts na 1999
N'oge ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ, ọ matara onye ga-abụ nwunye ya, onye America, ha wee kwaga US mgbe e mesịrị
Taa, Allen na-arụ ọrụ dị ka prọfesọ nleta na ngalaba maka ihe ọkpụkpụ na mgbasa ozi mgbasa na Mahadum Virginia Commonwealth na Richmond, Virginia
Mgbe ọ ka bi na South Africa, Allen bụ onye guzobere FLAT Gallery (1993 - 1995) n'ime ihe gbasara atụmatụ ndị na-ese ihe
E gosipụtara ọrụ Allen na 2nd Johannesburg Biennale dị ka akụkụ nke ngosi 'Graft'

O kwubeghi ọtụtụ ihe gbasara ndụ onwe ya na ndụ ọha na eze Ọrụ ya bụ akụkụ nke ọtụtụ nchịkọta n'ime na n'èzí South Africa, nke gụnyere nchịkọta nke Durban Art Gallery, Guggenheim Museum na New York City na Standard Bank Collection
Siemon Allen bụ onye na-ewekọta ihe na onye na-echekwa ihe ndị na-adịghị adịte aka na South Africa, nke ọ na-eji emepụta nnukwu ihe ngosi na ihe ọmụma
N'ihi ya, a na-akpọ ọrụ ndị a 'ọrụ nchịkọta' ma na-enyocha echiche nke ịmepụta njirimara site n'ebe dị anya na onyinyo nke South Africa n'ozuzu
Maka ihe owuwu ya, Allen na-achịkọta ihe ndị e biri ebi, nke ọ na-edepụta ma gosipụta
Usoro ọrụ ahụ yiri nke onye na-edebe ihe ochie
Dị ka onye South Africa bi na mba ọzọ, Allen nwere mmasị karịsịa na ịchọpụta na ịghọta otú a na-ahụ mba site na mpụga na ihe bụ ọrụ mba ahụ na-ewu onyinyo a

Na mbido afọ 2000 ọ hụrụ ebe weebụsaịtị nke gọọmentị South Africa nke na-akpọsa arịrịọ maka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị mma na mpụga mba ahụ yana maka iwebata ndị South Africa na-abụghị gọọmentị bi na mba ọzọ ka ha rụọ ọrụ dị ka 'ndị nnọchiteanya' maka mba ahụ
Ihe ntinye Allen na-agbagha echiche a dị mkpa nke 'akara' South Africa ma nye aka na ya
Ọrụ Allen n'ezie bụ maka ịmepụta nnukwu ihe ncheta nke dabeere na ịntanetị nke akwụkwọ ọdịyo gbasara akụkọ ihe mere eme nke South Africa
A kpọrọ ihe ngosi nke sitere na ihe ncheta a 'Records' ma gosipụta ya na South Africa na 2009 na US na 2010

E hiwere Sierra Leone Selection Trust na 1934 na-eso nkwekọrịta n'etiti gọọmentị Britain Sierra Leone na Consolidated African Selection Trust Ltd (CAST)
E hiwere CAST na 1924 ma bụrụ akụkụ nke nnukwu ụlọ ego ngwuputa ego nke Selection Trust Ltd nke Alfred Chester Beatty (onye na-egwupụta akụ America) hibere na 1913
Agbanyeghị na ndị Oppenheimers (De Beers) tinyere ego na CAST na ndị enyemaka ya site na 1920s wee nwee nnọchi anya ụlọ, CAST nọọrọ onwe ya na alaeze ukwu Oppenheimer
Ụlọ ọrụ SLST nke nwere ikike ịgwupụta mineral pụrụ iche na Sierra Leone malite na 1935 ka e mere atụmatụ ịdịru afọ 99
N'afọ 1955, ndị SLST gbahapụrụ n'ịgwupụta ihe ndị dị n'ime ala wee biri n'ubi Yengema na Tongo
Agbanyeghị, site na okike nke Sierra Leonean parastatal National Diamond Mining Company na 1971, ụlọ ọrụ diamond ahụ bụ mba nke ọma, mechie SLST na Sierra Leone
Sierra Wave bụ ụdị ikuku nké ifufe na-ebuli ugwu Sierra Nevada nke California

A maara dị ka ebili mmiri lee, Sierra Waves na-apụta ka ifufe kụrụ Sierra Nevada ma na-amanye ya ịrị elu, na-eme ka anwụrụ mmiri na-agbakọta ka ọ na-ajụ oyi ma na-emepụta ígwé ojii lenticular n'akụkụ leeward nke ugwu ahụ
Ígwé ojii ndị a nwèrè ike ịnọ otu ébè ruo ọtụtụ awa
Ọdịdị nke Sierra Wave dabere na ọtụtụ ihe, gụnyere ọsọ na ntụziaka nke ifufe, usoro ifufe nke leeward, na ikuku mmiri
Ébé ọ bụ na Sierra Waves na-adabere n'ọtụtụ mgbanwe, ọdịdị ha bụ ihe a na-apụghị ịkọwapụta
A chọpụtara ma mụọ ya na mbụ n'ihe dị ka afọ 1950, ndị na-anya ụgbọelu na-eji ha eme ihe iji nweta elu ma gbasaa ụgbọ elu ha
Sifan Hassan (Oromo Siifan Hassan; amụrụ na 1 Jenụwarị 1993) bụ onye Dutch a mụrụ n'Etiopia na-agba ọsọ n'etiti na ogologo oge
O mechara okpukpu atọ a na-ahụtụbeghị mbụ na afọ 2020 Tokyo Olympics na-emeri ihe nrite ọla edo na mita 5000 na mita 10,000, na ọla nchara maka mita 1500
Hassan bụ naanị onye na-eme egwuregwu n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Olimpik iji merie ihe nrite n'ofe ihe omume dị n'etiti na agbụrụ abụọ dị anya n'otu egwuregwu
Ọ bụ naanị nwanyị nke abụọ mezue ọsọ Olympic okpukpu abụọ

Na World Athletics Championships, Hassan nwetara 1500m na 10,000m n'afọ 2019, na-aghọ naanị onye na-eme egwuregwu (nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị) n'akụkọ ihe mere eme iji merie ihe omume abụọ a na otu Ndọrọ ndọrọ mmeri nke uwa ma ọ bụ Olympic Games
O meriri ọla nchara na 1500m na 2015, na 5000m na afọ 2017 mgbe ọ gwụchara nke ise na 1500m
Hassan bụ onye nwetara ihe nrite ugboro atọ na World Indoor Championships, merie ọla edo na 1500m na 2016 yana ọlaọcha na 3000m na ọla nchara maka 1500m na afọ 2018
O nwetara ihe nrite Europe isii (gụnyere utu aha mba abụọ), na otu ihe nrite ime ụlọ Europe
Ọ bụkwa onye mmeri Diamond League ugboro atọ, ebe ọ nwetara 1500m/5000m okpukpu abụọ na 2019
Hassan bụ onye na-edekọ ihe ndekọ ụwa maka ma otu kilomita na 5 kilomita n'okporo ụzọ ọsọ, ha abụọ setịpụrụ na afọ 2019, yana otu awa ọsọ, setịpụrụ n'afọ 2020
O nwere ihe ndekọ ụwa na 10,000 m maka ụbọchị abụọ na ọnwa nke isii, na afọ 2021
O nwere ihe ndekọ Europe ise (1500m, 3000m, 5000m, 10,000m, ọkara marathon) na ihe ndekọ Dutch atọ
A mụrụ Sifan Hassan na Adama, Oromia, Ethiopia ma zụlite ya n'ime ime obodo Kersa na mpaghara Munesa nke mpaghara Arsi nke Oromia
Ọ bụ onye na-agba ọsọ ntụrụndụ n'ebe ahụ
Ọ hapụrụ Etiopia dị ka onye gbara ọsọ ndụ wee rute Netherlands na afọ 2008 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise
Ọ malitere ịgba ọsọ mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ iji bụrụ nọọsụ
Hassan ghọrọ nwa amaala Dutch n'afọ 2013
N'ịbụ onye ya na Eindhoven Atletiek, Hassan banyere na ọkara marathon nke Eindhven na 2011 wee merie ọsọ ahụ na oge nke 77 10 nkeji
Ọ bụkwa onye nke abụọ na agbụrụ abụọ (Sylvestercross na Mol Lotto Cross Cup)
O meriri agbụrụ ndị ahụ na 2012, yana 3000 m na Leiden Gouden Spike
Hassan mere ọganihu ya n'afọ 2013
Ọ gbara ọsọ 800 mita kachasị mma nke 2 0086 nkeji iji merie na KBC Night of Athletics ma merie na 1500 m na Nijmegen Global Athletics na Golden Spike Ostrava

Na afọ 2013 IAAF Diamond League circuit ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na 1500 m na Athletissima na nke kachasị mma nke 4 0373 nkeji ma bụrụ onye nke atọ na DN Galan 3000 m na nke kachasị elu nke 8 3253 nkeji oge a mere ka ọ bụrụ onye nke anọ na-agba ọsọ n'ụwa n'afọ ahụ
Hassan ghọrọ nwa amaala Dutch na Nọvemba, na afọ 2013, oge agafeela maka ịsọ mpi na afọ 2013 World Championships, n'ọnwa sochirinụ, ọ pụtara nke mbụ ya na Netherlands
Na afọ 2013 European Cross Country Championships ọ meriri nrite ọla edo na ngalaba na-erubeghị afọ iri abụọ na atọ ma nyere ndị otu Dutch aka ịbụ nke atọ na ọkwa
O merikwara asọmpi Warandeloop na Lotto Cross Cup Brussels n'oge oyi ahụ
Na mbido afọ 2014 ọ gbara ọsọ ọsọ nke nkeji 8 4532 maka 3000 m na Weltklasse na Karlsruhe, wee mebie ihe ndekọ Dutch na 1500 m n'ime ụlọ na oge nke 4 0534 nkeji na Birmingham Indoor Grand Prix
Na afo 2015 World Championships na Beijing, Hassan meriri ọla nchara na mita 1500
Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị Dutch nke abụọ na-eme egwuregwu iji merie ihe nrite na World Championships, mgbe Dafne Schippers gasịrị
Ọ bụ nwanyị Dutch nke atọ meriri na afo 2015 European Cross Country Championships, na-eso nzọụkwụ nke ndị Afrịka ibe ya Hilda Kibet na Lornah Kiplagat
Hassan meriri okpomọkụ ya na 1500m na afọ 2016 Summer Olympics na 4 0664 tupu Faith Kipyegon
Na ọkara ikpeazụ ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ na 4 0362 mgbe Genzebe Dibaba meriri na 4 0306
Na ngwụcha Kipyegon nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo nke Olympic na 4 0892, Dibaba bụ onye nke abụọ na 4 1027 na Jennifer Simpson nwetara ọla nchara na 4 1053
Hassan nọ n'ọnọdụ nke ise n'ime oge nke 4 1123
Ọ bụ onye nke ise na 1500m na 2017 World Athletics Championships wee merie ọla nchara na 5000m
N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Julaị, ọ mebiri ihe ndekọ Europe maka mita 5,000 site n'ịbụ onye nke abụọ na Rabat Diamond League na 14 2234
Ụbọchị ole na ole ka e mesịrị, Hassan meriri Millicent Fawcett Mile mbụ na afọ 2018 London Anniversary Games na oge nke 4 1471, nke anọ kachasị ọsọ n'oge ahụ
Na afọ 2018 European Championships, o ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na 5000 m na oge 14 46 12, na-etinye ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ nke asọmpi
Na 'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Septemba, ọ meriri ihe ndekọ Europe maka ọkara marathon na oge nke 65 15, merie ọkara maraton Copenhagen
N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Febụwarị, Hassan setịpụrụ ihe ndekọ ụwa maka ọsọ okporo ụzọ kilomita ise na-akwụsị elekere na 14m 44s na Monaco
Ọsọ okporo ụzọ 5 kilomita abụwo ihe omume ụwa kemgbe 1 Nọvemba, na afọ 2017
Na Prefontaine Classic na June, ọ mebiri ihe ndekọ Europe 3000m na oge nke 8m 1849s
N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Julaị, Hassan banyere na ọsọ kilomita na Herculis na Fontvieille, Monaco
Olha Lyakhova bụ onye na-agba ọsọ, na-ewere egwuregwu site na agba abụọ mbụ (nke a tụrụ na akara mmalite, ọ bụghị nkewa nke kilomita anọ) na 6426 na 6394 (2 0820)
Dị ka ọ na-adịkarị na Hassan, ọ bụ onye ikpeazụ na akara mmalite, mana n'ime mita 150 sochirinụ, jiri nwayọọ nwayọọ mee ka onwe ya dị nro n'ọhịa n'èzí n'ime ọnọdụ akara n'azụ Lyakhova
Gabriela DeBues-Stafford gafere n'ọhịa n'etiti Hassan na Lyakhova maka agba ọzọ tupu Hassan na Gudaf Tsegay kewapụ n'ọgbọ ahụ dị ka naanị ndị na-achụ nta
N'etiti mita 800 na 1000, Lyakhova gbalịrị ịnọgide na-aga n'ihu, mana Hassan na Tsegay na-agafe
Mgbe Lyakhova si n'èzí pụta, ha abụọ hụrụ onwe ha mita 15 n'ihu ìgwè ahụ
Na mita 1,200, Hassan na-eleghachi anya azụ na onye na-achụ ya nso Tsegay na 3 1013 (a 6193 lap)
Hassan mere ngwa ngwa, na-emeghe oghere mita 5 n'ime mita 100 sochirinụ
N'ịga n'ihu na ọsọ a, ọ gafere mita 1500 n'ihe dị ka 3 55
Hassan kpuchiri mita 409344 ikpeazụ na 6220, oge ikpeazụ ya nke 4 12 33 na-emebi ihe ndekọ ụwa nke Svetlana Masterkova nke fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ 23

Ndị na-eme egwuregwu na-eso Hassan degharịrị ndepụta 25 kachasị elu, na Laura Weightman na-aga n'ọnọdụ # 15, DeBues-Stafford na # 17, mgbe # 5 oge niile Tsegay na-apụ n'anya n'ime mkpọ ahụ, Rababe Arafi, Axumawit Embaye, Winnie Nanyondo na Ciara Mageean na-aga na ọnọdụ # 20 ̆23
Ọ bụ onye mmeri Diamond League ugboro abụọ na afọ 2019, na-emeri ma 1500 na 5000 mita Trophies
N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Septemba, ọ ghọrọ onye mmeri ụwa nke afọ 2019 na mita 10,000 na asọmpi nke abụọ ya maka ebe ahụ
Ọsọ mbụ ya na ihe omume ahụ bụ na Stanford n'oge nke 31 1812, ngwa ngwa iji nweta ọkwa iru eru maka asọmpi World Championships
Oge mmeri nke 30 1762 bụ oge kachasị mma n'afọ n'okporo ụzọ ahụ
Alina Reh (Germany) butere ụzọ n'ọhịa mgbe mita 3000 gasịrị na 9 2969
Onye na-agba ọsọ n'ihu ruru ọkara n'ime 15 3270
Letesenbet Gidey mechiri na 30 2123, na Agnes Tirop (Kenya) na-abịa n'ọnọdụ nke atọ na 30 2550
E kpuchiri ọkara nke abụọ nke ọsọ ahụ na 14 45
Hassan merikwara ọsọ 1500 mita na oge nke 3 5195 (ebe nke isii na 1500 m niile-oge-ndepụta), na-eguzobe asọmpi ọhụrụ na ndekọ Europe
Onye nke abụọ bụ Faith Kipyegon na 3 5422, ihe ndekọ mba Kenya ọhụrụ, ebe nke atọ gara Gudaf Tsegay na 3 5438

N'abalị iri n'ọnwa Ọktoba, Hassan setịpụrụ ihe ndekọ Europe maka mita 10,000 nke ụmụ nwanyị n'ime oge nke 29 3667, na-emebi akara nke Paula Radcliffe nke Great Britain setịpụrụ na afọ 2002 site na ihe karịrị sekọnd 24
Na 6 June, na afọ 2021, ọ meziwanyere arụmọrụ ya na ihe omume ahụ iji setịpụ ihe ndekọ ụwa nke 29m 0682s na Hengelo, na-emeri ihe ndekọ 2016 nke onye Etiopia Almaz Ayana site na ihe karịrị 10 sekọnd
Otú ọ dị, Hassan tụfuru ihe ndekọ ụbọchị abụọ ka e mesịrị, mgbe Letesenbet Gidey nke Etiopia nwetara oge nke 29m 0103s n'otu ámá egwuregwu ahụ
Hassan ritere ọla edo na mita 5000 na mita 10,000 na 2020 Tokyo Olympic Games
O nwetakwara ọla nchara na mita 1500
Ọ ghọrọ naanị onye na-eme egwuregwu nwetara ihe nrite na 1500, 5000, na 10,000 mita ihe omume n'otu egwuregwu Olimpik ahụ
Oge mmeri ya na 5000m bụ 14 3679 n'ihu Hellen Obiri si Kenya na 14 3836, Gudaf Tsegay si Etiopia nwetara ọla nchara n'oge 14 3887
Mmeri ọla edo ya mere ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị Dutch mbụ nwere ihe nrite egwuregwu Olympic na ihe omume dị anya
Ọ bụ onye mbụ na-abụghị onye Kenya ma ọ bụ onye Etiopia na-eme egwuregwu iji merie ihe omume ahụ kemgbe Gabriela Szabo meriri na 2000 Sydney Olympics
Malite na 2016, Alberto Salazar zụrụ Hassan na Nike Oregon Project N'afọ 2019, Salazar malitere ịrụ ọrụ afọ anọ n'egwuregwu maka mmebi iwu doping site na tupu ya amalite ịzụ Hassan
N'afọ 2021, ụlọ ọrụ United States Center for SafeSport kwụsịtụrụ ya maka omume mmekọahụ
Onye nkuzi Hassan ugbu a bụ Tim Rowberry onye malitere ịzụ ya na Julaị 2018
Rowberry bụkwa onye nkuzi nke onye na-agba ọsọ Yomif Kejelcha, onye na-azụ Hassan ruo mgbe ọ hapụrụ Adidas na nso nso a
Ozi sitere na profaịlụ World Athletics ọ gwụla ma edepụtara ya

Signal Alliance Technology Holding bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ahụ maka teknụzụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ na Naịjirịa nwere ahụmịhe na ọrụ teknụzụ ụlọ ọrụ, site na Cloud Technology, Infrastructure & Service Management, Data & AI, IT Security, Managed / Outsourced Services na ọrụ Enterprise Software
E hiwere Signal Alliance Technology Holding n'afọ 1996 wee malite ọrụ ya n'otu afọ ahụ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere dị ka Signal Alliance, ọrụ ya bụ ahịa nke mgbanwe netwọk tupu ọ gbasaa ọrụ ya n'ime ọrụ ngwanrọ

Na úbọchị mbụ nke ọnwaJulaị 2021, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gbara afọ iri abụo na ise, na Septemba nke otu afọ ahụ, ọ gbanwere n'ime ụlọ ọrụ Holding - Signal Alliance Technology Holding - nke nwere ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka atọ e guzobere iji gboo mkpa nke ndị ahịa ya na-eto eto ma gbasaa ikike ya na ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ
Signal Alliance Technology Holding bụ onye mmekọ Microsoft Gold Certified Partner nyere ikike ire ngwaahịa Microsoft ma nye nkwado teknụzụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ gafee Naịjirịa
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụkwa onye mmekọ Cisco nke na-enye ngwọta teknụzụ Cisco

Dabere na Lagos Steeti na Abuja, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ndị ahịa gafere ụlọ ọrụ, ụlọ ọrụ onwe na nke ọha na eze na Naịjirịa, gụnyere FMCG, nkwukọrịta, Pharmaceutical, Finance, Logistics, Health, Government, NGO na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-ebipụtakwa akụkọ banyere isiokwu ndị metụtara IT ma nye ịdọ aka ná ntị banyere malware site na mgbasa ozi

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ enwetala Microsoft Gold Competencies iri na ise na Silver Competencies abụọ gụnyere Enterprise Resource Planning, Data & Analytics, Application Integration, Project and Portfolio Management, Cloud Productivity, Enterprise Mobility Management na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ enwetala ọtụtụ Microsoft Advanced Specializations na-ekpuchi - Nchebe Egwu, Nchịkwa Nkwado & Mgbanwe, Ịkpọ maka Microsoft Teams, Nzukọ & Ụlọ Nzukọ maka Microsoft Tems, Identity & Access Management, Ntinye Ọrụ na Nchebe Ozi / Gọọmenti
Signal Alliance Technology Holding bụ onye mmekọ Cisco mbụ na West Africa iji nweta Cisco Customer Experience Specialization

Sassy Sika Osei (amuru 1985) bu onye omere Ghana, onye na-emeputa ihe na TV onye rụworo ọrụ dị ka mmetụta akara maka ụdị ama ama gụnyere L'Oreal Paris na Woodin

Ugbu a ọ bụ onye na-akwado ihe ngosi TV ama ama na ihe omume kapeeti uhie nke gụnyere DStv's Studio 53 extra, NdaniTV's Fashion Insider, 2019 VGMA ahụmahụ kapeeti uhie, Channel O News Live na Accra na Glitz Africa Fashion Week maka Star Gist na DStv
A mụrụ Osei na Ghana mana n'ihi ọrụ nne ya, onye nnọchiteanya nke United Nations, ọ gàrà ibi na mba dị iche iche gụnyere South Africa, USA na India
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Ghana, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na SOS wee nweta akara ugo mmụta bachelor na nka na Mahadum Ghana
Ọ gara Ghana Institute of Management and Public Administration (GIMPA) ebe ọ gụrụ Iwu

Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na-eme ihe ngosi Phamous TV, ihe ngosi ndụ na ihe nkiri a ma ama
Dị ka nke 2017 ọ bụ ihu Habiba Shea Butter mgbe ọ bụ aha onye nnọchianya maka Ghandour Cosmetics Limited, onye ịchọ mma Giant
N'afọ 2016, o mere emume izuụka ejiji na imewe nke Africa na Naịjirịa
N'afọ 2019, ya na Giovani Kaleb kwadoro ahụmịhe kapeeti uhie VGMA
Ugbu a, ọ na-akwado ndị ọbịa Ihe ngosi TV ama ama gụnyere DStv's Studio 53 extra na Ejiji Insider nke NdaniTV
