Silas Adekunle bụ onye ọchụnta ego na-emepụta nkà na ụzụ nke Naijiria nke a maara maka ịmepụta robot ịgba chaa chaa mbụ nwere ọgụgụ isi n'ụwa
Adekunle bụ onye nchoputa na onye bụbu onye isi nke Reach Robotics, ụlọ ọrụ ịgba chaa chaa nke na-emepụta robots maka ịgba chaa chaa na maka agụmakwụkwọ STEM
Mmalite ahụ mepụtara robot nwere ụkwụ anọ nke nwere mmegharị dị ka ndụ nke a na-akpọ MekaMon
N'elu ikpo okwu na-eweta ndị egwuregwu vidio na ndụ site na ijikọta robotics na eziokwu agbakwunyere
Reach Robotics emepụtala ngwa, nke na-achịkwa MekaMon ma na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ọnụ ụzọ na ọdịnaya dijitalụ
Adekunle enwetawo nde $ 12 site n'aka ndị na-etinye ego, gụnyere London Venture Partners, na-enye ụlọ ọrụ UK ohere ịgbasa na ndị ọrụ oge niile 65+ na ọnụ ọgụgụ ya kachasị elu
N'afọ 2018, Adekunle sonyere Apple, bịanye aka na nkwekọrịta nkesa pụrụ iche iji ree ngwaahịa ya na United States na Britain
Reach Robotics mechiri na Sept
2, 2019 n'ihi 'ihe ịma aka dị na ngalaba ndị na-azụ ahịa robotics'
Adekunle lekwasịrị anya ugbu a n'iji MekaMon mepụta usoro mmụta Robotics n'ofe Africa na akụrụngwa igwe ojii maka akpaaka ụlọ ọrụ na UK
Ọ tọrọ ntọala ụlọ ọrụ Awarri, nke ebumnuche ya bụ ime ka mmepe na mgbanwe nke teknụzụ AI & Robotics dị elu na Africa
Ka ọ dị na Jenụwarị 2020, Adekunle bụkwa onye nchoputa na onye isi nke (RI)
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-ezube inyere ndị mmepe aka ngwa ngwa na nchekwa mejuputa akụrụngwa igwe ojii dị mkpa iji nyochaa, jikwaa ma chịkwaa robots ha, akpaaka ụlọ ọrụ na ngwaọrụ IOT
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2018, akpọrọ Adekunle na ndepụta Financial Times nke 'Top 100 minority ethnic leaders in technology'
N'otu afọ ahụ, a họpụtara ya maka ndepụta Forbes 30 Under 30 Europe 2018 Technology
A mụrụ Adekunle na Naịjirịa ma kwaga UK mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta klas mbụ na robotics na akara ugo mmụta nke Doctor of Technology na Mahadum nke West of England, Bristol
Silas Adekunle bụ onye ọchụnta ego nke Naijiria-British na onye injinia robotic, mara amara maka ịtọlite Reach Robotics, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka imepụta ahụmịhe egwuregwu agbagoro agbagoro na robots
A mụrụ Adekunle na Naijiria wee kwaga UK mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu, ebe ọ malitere inwe mmasị maka injinia na robotics
Ọ gara n'ihu mụọ robotics na Mahadum West nke England, Bristol, ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta ya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Adekunle tọrọ ntọala Reach Robotics na 2013 iji mepụta ihe egwuregwu ụmụaka na-emepe emepe, nke ga-akpali ụmụaka ịchụso isiokwu STEM
Ngwaahịa flagship nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ MekaMon, robot nwere ụkwụ anọ enwere ike ịchịkwa site na iji ngwa ama ma gosipụta egwuregwu egwuregwu n'ezie
Na 2018, Reach Robotics nwetara $75 nde na ego sitere n'aka ndị na-etinye ego, gụnyere London Venture Partners na Qualcomm Ventures
Aghọtala Adekunle maka mmezu ya site na ọtụtụ onyinye, gụnyere ịkpọ aha ya na Forbes 30 Under 30 Europe na 2018

Silas Gnaka (amụrụ na 18 Disemba 1998) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ nke Ivorian nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-azụ azụ n'aka ekpe maka Belgian First Division A club KAS

Nwankwo gbaara klọb Naijiria Crown FC ruo ọnwa July n'afọ 2019, tupu ọ gafeeSunshine Stars
Mgbe otu afọ gara,, ọ gara n'ihu igbara Nasarawa United na NPFL na-eme ngosi 35 ma na-enye goolu 19 na oge 2020-21
N'ubochi 3 n'ọnwa Febrụwarị n'afọ 2022, Nwankwo bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ nkwekọrịta afọ atọ na klọb Sweden Mjällby

Siltʼe (Siltʼe (siltwụrụ [siltʼiɲə] ma ọ bụ nke slịfe [jəsiltʼe af]) bụ asụsụ Semitic Etiopia a na-asụ na etiti Etiopia
Onye otu ezi na ụlọ Afroasiatic, ndị na-ekwu okwu ya bụ Silt'e, bụ ndị bi na mpaghara Silt'e na mpaghara ndịda Mba, mba na ndị mmadụ
Ndị na-asụ olumba Wolane na-ebikarị na Kokir Gedebano district nke Gurage, yana mpaghara Seden Sodo dị nso na mpaghara Oromia
Ụfọdụ ebiela n'obodo mepere emepe n'akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke obodo ahụ, karịsịa Addis Ababa
Olumba nke asụsụ Siltʼe gụnyere Azernet-Berbere, Silti, Wuriro, Ulbareg na Wolane
Enwere ihe dị ka ndị na-asụ Silt'e 940,000 (ọnụọgụ 2007); 125,000 ndị na-ekwu okwu Wolane
Siltʼe nwere usoro ụdaume dị mma maka asụsụ Semitic nke Etiopia
E nwere ụdaume ndị a na-a/h/ụkarị, n'akụkụ ụdaume na-enweghị olu na ụdaume niile, ma e wezụga /h/ na //ʔ//, nwere ike ịme geminated, ya bụ, gbasaa
Chaatị ndị dị n'okpuru na-egosi phonemes nke Siltʼe

Maka nnọchiteanya nke ụdaume Siltʼe, isiokwu a na-eji mgbanwe nke usoro a na-ahụkarị (ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị zuru ụwa ọnụ), n'etiti ndị ọkà mmụta asụsụ na-arụ ọrụ na asụsụ Semitic nke Etiopia, mana ọ dịtụ iche na mgbakọ nke International Phonetic Alphabet
Mgbe akara IPA dị iche, a na-egosi ya na brackets na chaatị
Mkpụrụedemede Siltʼe dị nnọọ iche na ụdaume asaa dị n'asụsụ ndị dị ka Amharic, Tigrinya na Geʽez
Siltʼe nwere usoro ụdaume ise dị mkpirikpi na ise dị ogologo nke bụ ihe atụ nke asụsụ Cushitic dị nso, nke nwere ike ịbụ mmalite nke usoro Siltʼ e
Enwere nnukwu ọdịiche allophonic n'ime ụdaume dị mkpirikpi, ọkachasị maka a; a na-egosikarị allophone nke /a/, [ə], na chaatị ahụ
Enwere ike iwepu ụdaume niile dị mkpirikpi tupu nkwụsịtụ
Usoro odide a na-eme ka ọdịiche dị n'etiti naanị ụdaume asaa
Ụfọdụ n'ime ndịiche dị mkpụmkpụ dị na Silt'e enweghị akara
Na omume, nke a nwere ike ọ gaghị egbochi nghọta n'ihi na enwere obere ụzọ abụọ dị ntakịrị dabere na ogologo ụdaume
N'ime Silt'e edere, a na-edepụta ụdaume Geʽez asaa ahụ na udaume Silt'e iri dị ka ndị a
Meshesha Make Jobo na-akọ na a na-eji asụsụ Amharic dochie anya iji asụsụ Siltʼe eme ihe site na ụfọdụ ndị na-asụ ya maka ngalaba ụfọdụ
Ọ na-ezo aka na nnukwu ihe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ọtụtụ n'ime ha sitere na mba
Ọ na-ekwukwa obere ihe ndị dị n'ógbè, dị ka enweghị ụdị okike
Silveira Bụ aha nna Portuguese
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Silverbird Galleria bụ ụlọ ahịa na ebe ntụrụndụ na Victoria Island, Lagos
Ehiwere ebe ihe ngosi Silverbird Galleria g na afọ 2004 site na Silverbird Group, ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na ụlọ nke Ben Murray-Bruce guzobere na 1980s
Ụlọ ihe nkiri, Silverbird ebe ihe ngosi nke gbanwere ihe nkiri sinima na Naịjirịa bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ nke ise mbụ Cineplex na mpaghara Sahara Africa
Silverbird ebe ihe ngosi nwekwara nnukwu ụlọ ihe nkiri na West Africa nwere ọtụtụ ebe na Lagos, Abuja, Port Harcourt, Uyo na Accra, Ghana
Silverbird Galleria nwere onye na-ere uwe elu, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na ụlọ ọrụ netwọk mkpanaka maka nkwurịta okwu na ohere ịntanetị, niile dị na ala ala
Ndị na-ere ngwá electronic na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Rhythm 937 FM (nke Silverbird na-arụ ọrụ) nọ na ala nke mbụ
Ala nke abụọ nwere arcades na ọrụ nri
Silverbird Cinema dị na okpukpu nke atọ na nke kachasị elu
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere ụlọ ọgwụ, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na ụlọ ahịa ịchọ mma
E nwekwara ụlọ ngosi Silverbird dị na Ikeja CityMall, Lagos
Ọ dị n'elu steepụ ndị dị n'aka nri
Galleria nwere ebe ụmụnne nwanyị n'akụkụ ebe ndị ọzọ nke Naịjirịa na mba ụwa

Silviya Germanova (Bulgarian; amụrụ na 19 Julaị 1959) bụ onye Bulgaria bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ basketball nke sonyere na 1980 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Silya Magnana (amụrụ na Machị 16, 1991, n'ime Béjaïa) bụ onye Algeria na egwu volleyball mba ụwa, na egwu dị ka onye na etinye ihe

Simbo Olorunfemi bụ onye Naijiria na-ede uri, ónyé nta akụkọ, na ónyé ọchụnta ego nwere nzụlite na mmepụta TV na njikwa akara
Ónyé sochiri ya, Eko Ree, nwetara ihe nrite mbụ na asọmpi afọ 2004
Dị ka ónyé nta akụkọ, o dere kọlụm màkà ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ Naijiria
Olorunfemi na-arụ ọrụ dịka ónyé na-emepụta telivishọn
A na-eto ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi obodo a ma ama, a họpụtakwara ya dị ka ónyé na-emepụta TV nke afọ na 1991
Simbo Olorunfemi nwetara agụmakwụkwọ ya n'ozuzu ya na Federal Government College, Idoani na nzèrè sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum Ondo State
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ka ọ bụrụ ónyé nta akụkọ na Nigerian Institute of Journalism, ma mesịa nweta nzèrè masta na Iwu mba ụwa na mmekọrịta mba na mba na Mahadum Lagos
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na ise, Olorunfemi dere akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, The Cardinal Mafia
Olorunfemi bipụtara ọrụ mbụ, Rhythm of the Coins, ka ónyé nta akụkọ Naijiria bụ May Ellen Ezekiel Mofe-Damijo kọwara dị ka 'ọrụ na-adọrọ mmasị' nke nwéré 'asụsụ doro ányá, dị mfe, ma dị mfe nghọta'
The Punch kọwara akwụkwọ ahụ dị ka 'ọrụ nka dị mfe, nke doro anya, na nke na-egosipụta echiche,' ébé Daily Champion kpọrọ ya 'ekwe nkwa na ihe odide Naijiria abụghị ihe na-adịghị mmá'
E depụtara Rhythm of the Coins màkà 1993 Association of Nigerian Authors (ANA) Poetry Prize, na-enweta aha nsọpụrụ
Rhythm of the Coins sochiri nchịkọta uri a na-atụ ányá ya nke ukwuu Eko Ree (Nke a bụ Lagos) n'afọ 2004
Ndị a tụrụ ányá na ha ga-abịa na mwepụta akwụkwọ ahụ gụnyere Gọvanọ Ọchịchị nke steeti Lagos, Asiwaju Bola Ahmed Tinubu, Dr
Bode Olajumoke, na Chief Segun Olusola, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Nchịkọta ahụ na-eji asụsụ dị mfe iji gosipụta Lagos State dị ka ébé ndị bi na ya na-ebi ndụ n'ụzọ pụrụ iche
N'okwu mmeghe ya n'akwụkwọ ahụ, ónyé ọrụ ọdịbendị Ambrocio Lopez dere 'Ekwenyere m na Simbo ejidewo ndụ nke obodo ahụ n'ụzọ magburu onwe ya
[ọ na-egosi] mkparịta ụka obodo nke na-ama anyị aka inyocha ónyé anyị
Eko Ree The Many Faces of Lagos nwetara ọnọdụ mbụ na asọmpi 2004 ANA / Cadbury Poetry Prize
Ihe nrite $ 1000 na-esote bụ nke kachasị ukwuu nke asọmpi ahụ nyèrè
Kọmitii na-ekpe ikpe kọwara ya dị ka 'ihe doro ányá ma na-ese onyinyo n'ọtụtụ ihu Lagos' na-agbakwụnye 'Eko Ree dị egwu
Nchịkọta ahụ na-adọrọ mmasị, aha ahụ dị mmá ma na-ejide ihe atụ nke ndụ Lagos
' N'ide maka Vanguard, Uzor Uzoatu ekwenyeghị na ndị ọkàikpe, na-ede 'ọ dịghị ihe a na-akpọ uri na nchịkọta ahụ dị nso na ihe ịga nke ọma
Eko Ree nwèrè amaokwu kachasị mfe ị gụrụ n'ebe ọ bụla kemgbe ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara, okwu ndị na-adịghị elu ma ọ bụ siri ike
' Nkatọ Uzoatu nwetara nzaghachi site n'aka Ayodeji Fashikun nke This Day
Olorunfemi n'onwe ya mèrè ihe ọchị na nkatọ ahụ n'ogè okwu nnabata ya
N'afọ 2007, Olorunfemi wepụtara akwụkwọ nke atọ ya, Singing in the Rain, site na Raider Publishing International
A họọrọ ọrụ ya màkà itinye ya n'afọ 2009 anthology nkè Nigerian Poetry Lagos of the Poets
A sụgharịrị ọrụ Olorunfemi n'asụsụ Hindi na German
Olorunfemi edeela kọlụm màkà akwụkwọ akụkọ nà magazin gụnyere TheNEWS, The PM News, na The Independent na Sunday
Olorunfemi na-arụ ọrụ dịka ónyé na-emepụta telivishọn
Dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe, o nwèrè ọtụtụ ihe nrite gụnyere ihe ngosi TV MEE & YOU na mmemme akụkọ The Globe This Week, nké gbara afọ atọ na ụlọ ọrụ TV Naịjirịa Lagos Television (LTV 8), Ikeja
N'afọ 1991, a họpụtara ya dị ka ónyé na-emepụta TV nkè afọ na Nigerian Media Merit Awards (NMMAs)
Mmekọrịta kachasị ọhụrụ nke Olorunfemi na telivishọn bụ mmepụta Nké mmemme na teknụzụ ozi a na-akpọ Cyberdrive
Simeon Osuji Ekpe (9 Eprel 1935 - 16 Machị 2011, na Nwangele) bụ onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe mkpegharị nke Naịjirịa na onye bụbu onye ọka ikpe ukwu nke Imo Steeti
Ekpe gụrụ akwụkwọ na Bishop Shanahan College, Orlu nakwa Mahadum dị na London

Simisola Kosoko ( nee Ogunleye; amụrụ ya ka ọnwa April di na mkpụrụ ụbọchi iri na itenani, n'afo 1988), bụ onye eji aha o ji eti egwu bụ Simi nwe mara bụ onye Naijiria na- agụ egwu, ede egwu ma ne-emekwa ihe nkiri
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dịka onye na-abụ abụ ozioma, nwe wepụta egwu izizi ọ n'ụlọ ọbọ egwu ọ kpọrọ Ogaju n'afọ 2008
Amatara ya nke n,afọ 2014 mgbe O weputasiri egwu ya nke ọ kpọrọ 'Tiff' , abụ a họpụtara dika Best Alternative Song na The Headies 2015
Simi na ndị ụlọ egwu a kpọrọ X3M Music binyere aka n'akwụkwọ n,afọ 2014, mana ọ hapụrụ ha n'ọnwa May afọ 2019 ka oge mbinye aka n'akwukwọ ahụ gwụrụ
O wepụtara alụbọm ụlọ egwu nke abụọ ya bụ Simisola na kpụrụ ụbọchi asatọ n'ọnwa Septemba , n'afọ 2017
Alụbọm nke atọ ya bụ Omo Charlie Champagne, Vol
1 pụtara ka o dabaa na ubochi ọ di afọ iri atọ na otu nke bụ mkpụrụ ụbọchi iri na itolu n'afọ 2019
O bidoro ụlọ egwu ya ọ kpọrọ Studio Brat n'ọnwa Jun afọ 2019
A mụrụ Simi na Ojuelegba, nke dị na Surulere , dịka nwa ikpeazụ n’ime ụmụ anọ
Na mkparịtaụka ya na Juliet Ebirim nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Vanguard, Simi gosipụtara na ndị mụrụ ya kewara mgbe ọ dị afọ itolu
O kpughekwara na o tolitere dị ka tomboy
Simi gara Stars International College, ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị na Ikorodu, Lagos State
Ọ gara akwụkwọ na mahadum Covenant University , ebe ọ nwetara nzere na mass communication
Simi tolitere ịgba egwu na ịbụ abụ dịka onye otu ukwe ukwe nke ụka dị na mpaghara ya
O dere abụ izizi ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri
Ọlụ aka nka ya bidoro n’afọ 2008 ka e wepụtara album album ya bụ Ogaju nke izizi, nke nwere ọtụtụ egwu dịka “Iya Temi” na “Ara Ile”
Ọ bụ Samklef mepụtara album ahụ
Simi Bedford bụ onye na- ede akwụkwọ akụkọ Naijiria dabere na Britain
E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke abụọ, Ọ bụghị na Silver, n'afọ 2007
A mụrụ Bedford na Legoosi, Nigeria, nye nne na nna si Sierra Leone bịa ebe ahụ
Nna nna ya ochie si Naijiria wee napụta ha n’ụgbọ ohu
Bedford nọrọ na nwata ya na Legoosị tupu ezigara ya akwụkwọ na Britain, ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ site na afọ isii
Ọ gụrụ Iwu na Mahadum Durham, ma mesịa rụọ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi, gụnyere dịka onye na-eweta redio na onye nyocha telivishọn
N'ịbụ onye bi na London, ọ lụrụ ma zụlite ụmụ atọ
Ugbu a, ọ gbara alụkwaghịm na di ya na-ese ihe, bụ Martin Bedford, ma ha ka na-enwe mmekọrịta enyi na enyi, ọbụna na-ekerịta ohere ọnụ n'otu ụlọ dị na Devon
Ewepụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ a n'afọ 2019 anthology New Daughters of Africa
Akwụkwọ akụkọ nke abụọ Bedford, Ọ bụghị na Silver (2007), bụ akụkọ ifo akụkọ ihe mere eme, na-elekwasị anya na etiti narị afọ nke 18 West Africa, ịgba ohu na aghụghọ ụlọ ikpe
N'ịdabere na akụkọ nna ochie nke onye edemede ya, Ọ bụghị na Silver pụrụ iche n'ime akwụkwọ gbasara ịgba ohu n'igosi ndụ ndị mmadụ n'Africa tupu ha agbao ohu
Onye na-enyocha Spectator ’s kwubiri, sị “Akwụkwọ a na-akwụwa aka ọtọ enweghị ihe ndetu ụgha ma ọ bụ nke mmetụta uche, ọ nweghị ihe mara mma
A na-akụziri onye agha ojii chere ihe ize ndụ a na-atụghị anya ya ihu ka ọ chetụ n'echiche nke kacha njọ, 'Lee agụ n'anya' Simi Bedford na-eme nke ahụ
Ọrụ ịhụnanya nke nwere obi ike na nke na-adịghị ahụkebe'

Simisola Olayemi Onibuwe Johnson (1929), bụ dọkịta ezé Naijiria na onye na-akwado oké dị nhatanha n'etiti ụmụ nwoke na nwanyị bụkwa onye nke jere ozi dịka Minista na-ahụ maka mmepe ọha na eze na ọdịbendị n'oge mba nke abụọ
Ọ bụbu onye isi oche nke Allied Bank na alaka Lagos State nke National Council of Women Societies
Johnson na Grace Guobadia ruru eru dịka ndị dọkịta ezé na 1957, na-eme ka ụmụnwanyị abụọ ahụ bụrụ ndị mbụ a zụrụ azụ na mba ahụ
Ọ bụ onye otu National Postgraduate Medical College of Nigeria
A mụrụ Johnson na Lagos Island n'ezinụlọ Alfred Latunde na Harriet Susan Johnson (née Crowther Nichol)
Ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ nke nne na nna ya
Nna ya bụ onye ọka iwu na onye guzobere National Bank of Nigeria na 1933, nna nna ya bụ Ajayi Crowther, ebe nna nna ya bu Herbert Macaulay
Johnson gụrụ akwụkwọ na CMS Girl's School Lagos
Site na 1954 ruo 1957, ọ gara Sunderland Technical College na Mahadum Durham na-eru eru dị ka dọkịta ezé
Ya na onye Naijiria ibe ya, Grace Guobadia gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'otu afọ ahụ, na-aghọ ụmụnwanyị abụọ mbụ zụrụ ezé na mba ahụ
Johnson nwetara nzere Bachelor of Dental Surgery na Guobadia Licentiate in Dental Survention
Johnson mechara gaa Royal College of Surgeons, Glasgow ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ahụ maka ezé
N'ime usoro ahụ, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ na-ahụ maka ezé na Naịjirịa na-arụ ọrụ na mba ahụ
Na obodo Naijiria, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na gọọmentị etiti na-etolite ịghọ Chief Consultant, Dentistry na Federal Ministry of Health
Johnson malitere ịrụ ọrụ na gọọmenti na 14 Julaị 1958 dị ka dọkịta na-awa ezé ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ General Hospital, Lagos site na 1958 ruo mmalite afọ 1960
Dị ka dọkịta ezé, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na mmepe nke ubi na Naịjirịa
N'afọ 1962, ọ bụ onye ọsụ ụzọ nke Nigerian Dental Association
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi na-akụzi ezé na Mahadum Lagos n'oge ọ na-eto eto ma bụrụ onye isi nke Federal School of Dental Hygiene and Technology
N'afọ 1983, a họpụtara ya dị ka Minista nke Mmepe Ọha na Ọdịbendị
Johnson so n'ime ndị ọzi ụzọ na-akwado ikike ụmụnwanyị nwere mmetụta miri emi gbasara ezinụlọ ha, ọrụ na ikike ụmụ nwanyị mana a katọkwara ha dị ka ndị otu ndị isi na Naịjirịa
N'oge ọchịchị Shagari, Johnson ghọrọ Minista na-ahụ maka mmepe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Na mba nke abụọ, ọ na-etinye aka nke ukwuu na otu kọmitii mba inter-sectoral na mmepe ụmụ nwanyị, kọmitii e nyere ikike ịmepụta mmekọrịta ọrụ n'etiti gọọmentị na òtù ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ na mba ahụ
Mgbe ọchịchị Shagari gasịrị, Johnson gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ndụmọdụ na okwu gbasara nwoke na nwanyị
N'afọ 1985, ọ bụ onye isi nke ndị nnọchi anya Naịjirịa na Nzukọ nke Atọ nke Ụwa na Ụmụnwanyị, nke emere na Nairobi, Kenya
Akụkụ nke aro nke nzukọ ahụ bụ maka mba ndị mejupụtara ya iji kpochapụ ịkpa ókè megide ụmụ nwanyị ma nabata atụmatụ ndị ga-agụnye itinye aka ụmụ nwanyị na mgbalị ịkwalite mmepe
Johnson bụ onyeisi nke kọmitii ndụmọdụ ụmụnwanyị, nke a na-enye ọrụ inye ndụmọdụ nye nchịkwa Babangida maka atụmatụ iji mụbaa ụmụ nwanyị na gọọmentị
Kọmitii ahụ n'etiti ihe ndị ọzọ tụrụ aro ka e mepụta Ministrị maka Ihe Ndị Ụmụ nwanyị
Ministrị ahụ apụtaghị ruo n'afọ 1989 site na nguzobe nke National Commission for Women nke Maryam Babangida kwadoro
Mkpúrù èdè íke
Simidele Adeife Omonla Adeagbo (amụrụ na Julai 29, 1981 na Toronto, Ontario, Canada) bụ onye Naijiria nke Canada na-eme egwuregwu ọsọ skeleton zọrọ asọmpi na 2018 Olympik
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na Nigeria ma na Africa na-eme egwuregwu skeleton
Ọ bu nwaanyị oji nke mbụ zọrọ asọmpi Olympik maka egwuregwu a
Tupu ọ zọọ mpi skeleton, ọ zọrọ mpi egwuregwu iwụli elu nke ikpeazu na 2008
A mụrụ Adeagbo na Toronto, na Ontario, Canada, nne na nna ya bụ ndị Naijiria; ma ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa mgbe ọ ka bụ nwa ọhụrụ, nọrọ ebe ahụ ruo afọ isii
Adeagbo jere ozi dịka onye na-anochite Serena Williams anya na ihe nkiri Nike kere
Adeagbo bu onye njikwa ahia Nike na South Africa kemgbe 2012
Na August 18, 2018, Adeagbo na ndị ọzọ ama ama okwu n'oge ihe mmeme TEDxLagos nke emere na Muson Centre
Ya na onye ọkaiwu Supo Shasore, onye teknuzu, Ade Olufeko, onye nhazi ihe osise Tokini Peterside na onye mgbasa ozi bụ Banky W
ya na ndị ọzọ
Adeagbo malitere egwuregwu ọsọ na-ubi mgbe ọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekondarị
Ọ lara ezumike nká na June 2008
N'oge ahụ, ekweghị ya ka ọ gaa Olimpik n'ihi na ogo ya foro 8-inch
ọ bụ onye na-ejide ọtụtụ ihe ndekọ gụnyere onye egwurewgu kachasị mma ụgbọrọ anọ yana ndekọ nke eguregwu iwụli elu maka Mahadum Kentucky
Adeagbo nwere mmasị n’egwuregwu nke skeleton n’ọnwa Disemba afọ 2016, mgbe ọ nụrụ banyere otu ndị otu egwuregwu bobsled na Naijiria na-achọ iru eru maka asọmpi Olimpik
Ọ malitere skeleton na Septemba 2017
Nike bụ ndị na-akwado ya maka egwuregwu a
Adeagbo sonyere na-asọmpi egwuregwu mbụ ya na 2018 Olympik na egwuregwu skeleton, dịka onye otu Naịjirịa bụrụ onye Naịjirịa izizi na-esonye na asọmpi Olymik a
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Naijiria na emume mmechi nke Olymik na 2018
Na Disemba 2017, Adeagbo ka bi na Johannesburg, South Africa, kemgbe afọ 2012

knoxhtml|accessdate=November 25, 2013}} (amụrụ n'ubochí irí na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1935) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke sere onyinyo White House nke ónyé bụbu onye isi ala United States Bill Clinton na First Lady Hillary Clinton
Ọ bụ ónyé America ojii mbụ na-ese ihe na-anata ọrụ foto ónyé isi ala
A mụrụ Simmie Knox na úbọchị irí nà asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọst, 1935 na Aliceville, Alabama na Simmie Knoux Sr, ónyé ọkwá nkà na onye na-arụzi ụgbọala, na Amelia Knox
Mgbè ọ dị obere, nne na nna Simmie gbara alụkwaghịm ma zigara ya ka ya na ụmụnne ya asatọ biri n'ugbo nwanne nne ya na nwanne nna ya na Leroy, Alabama
Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, baseball kụrụ ya n'anya mgbè ọ na-egwu egwuregwu, a tụkwara aro na ise ihe ga-enyere ya aka ịgbake

Ụlọ akwụkwọ ya nke kewara ekewa (nke jikọtara ya na Most Pure Heart of Mary Catholic Church na Mobile, Alabama) enweghị mmemme nka, mana ndị nọn Katọlik kụziiri ya ghọtara nkà ya wee chọta ónyé ga-akụziri ya
Ọ gara Central High School na Mobile
N'ikpeazụ, Knox gụrụ akwụkwọ na Delaware State College mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ akwa
O mechara banye na Tyler School of Art, Pennsylvania, ebe o nwetara nzere masta ya
Knox malitere ọrụ nkuzi ya na Bowie State College, Maryland na Duke Ellington School of the Arts, Washington DC
Ọ na-ese ihe ndị nwụrụ anwụ ma ree ha n'ahịa
Mgbe ọ hapụrụ kọleji, ihe osise abstract na-ewu ewu
Ọ gàrà n'ihu n'ụdị a n'ime afọ ndị 1970 tupu ya etinye onwe ya n'ihe osise na 1981
'Site na ihe osise abstract, enweghị m mmetụta nkè ihe ịma aka
Ihu bụ ihe kachasị mgbagwoju anya
Ihe ịma aka bụ ịchọta ihe ahụ, nké na-eme ka ọ dị iche na ihu ọzọ, 'ka o mechara kwuo
A na-edebe ihe osise Knox n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta nka ọha na eze, gụnyere Maryland State Art Collection, Oklahoma State Capitol Collection, na United States Senate
Knox lụrụ di ugboro abụọ
O nwèrè nwá nwanyị, Sheri, site na alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya na ụmụ Zachary na Amelia na nwunye ya ugbu a, Roberta
Onye ọka ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu, Ruth Bader Ginsburg (2000)
Foto nke Joseph H
Rainey (2004)
Foto nke Blanche Kelso Bruce (2001)
Simphiwe Majobe Nhlangulela, nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Simmy, bụ onye South Africa na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama na 2018, mgbe ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ EL World Music ma wepụta abọm izizi ya a kpọrọ Tugela Fairy (2018), nke sitere na egwu 'Ngiyesaba', 'Ubala', 'Umahlalela'
Ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ nke South Africa nyere abọm ahụ onyinye ọla edo
Abọm studio ya nke abụọ Tugela fairy (Made of Stars) (2020), nke gosipụtara na nọmba nke atọ n'otu mba
A mụrụ Simphiwe Majobe Nhlangulela na South Africa, dị ka nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ anọ
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ Emmanuel Tjiya Sowetan, Simmy kpughere na ọ bụ ndị nne na nna siri ike zụlitere ya mgbe ọ na-etolite
Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum KwaZulu-Natal, ebe ọ gụrụ Social Sciences
N'afọ 2013, mgbe ọ na-aga Mahadum KwaZulu-Natal, Nhlangulela zutere Sandile Sithole onye mere ka ọ mata Sun-El Musician
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị wee nweta akara ugo mmụta ya na Social Science, Simmy kwagara Johannesburg iji chụsoo ọrụ egwu ya
Simmy malitere ọrụ ya site na ịsonye na ịnwale maka SA Idols na SA Has Got Talent mana enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma

Ọrụ egwu ya malitere na 2017 site na ịbịanye aka na El World Music mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya nke a na-esote mwepụta nke abọm studio mbụ ya Tugela Fairy, nke gosipụtara na onye na-ese egwu Apple Music Spotlight
Na Febụwarị 22, a tọhapụrụ egwu ya 'Ubala' nke gosipụtara Sun-El Musician
E nyere abụ ahụ akara ọla edo
A tọhapụrụ abọm ahụ na Ọktoba 26, 2018 ma ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ nke South Africa (RiSA) kwadoro ọla edo maka ahịa 25 000 nke South Africa
Otu egwu ya 'Umahlalela' bụ platinum plaque
Na 25th South African Music Awards, a họpụtara Tugela Fairy maka Best Afro Pop Album
Na 2019 South African Dance Music Awards, ọ meriri Best Female Vocalist award
Simmy kwupụtara ọrụ na abọm studio nke abụọ ya tupu ntọhapụ nke Tugela Fairy, na ọganihu na ndekọ ahụ na-aga n'ihu n'afọ 2020
N'ọnwa Machị 2020, ọ wepụtara otu 'Ngihamba Nawe' jikọtara ya na Afro-House / neo-soul nke gosipụtara olu sitere na Sino Msolo
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2020, Simmy bụ onye isi na Rose Fest
Na Nọvemba 9, 2020, a tọhapụrụ abọm studio ya nke abụọ Tugela Fairy (Made of Stars), nke gosipụtara nọmba 3 na Apple Music Charts
Abọm ahụ gosipụtara Mthunzi, S-Tone, Da Capo, Sun-El Musician, Sino Msolo, Ami Faku, na Khuzani
Tugela Fairy (Made of Stars) natara nhọpụta maka Best Afro Pop album na 27th South African Music Awards
Iji kwalite abọm ya, Simmy malitere Tugela Fairy (Made of Stars) Special Virtual Concert
E gosipụtara ya na mkpọsa White Star, nke gụnyere ụbọchị abụọ, na Mee 2022
E mere ihe ngosi mbụ na Johannesburg na 12 Mee, na nke ikpeazụ na Durban na 21 Mee
Ka ọ na-etolite na Tugela, ọ na-ege ntị na Mbaqanga, egwu obodo na Maskandi
Egwú Simmy bụ n'ozuzu Afro-house na Neo-Soul mana ọ na-etinyekwa Maskandi na RnB na egwu ya ndị ọzọ
O depụtara ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe dị ka ihe mkpali ya Dolly Parton, Soul Brothers, Letta Mbuli, na Brenda Fassie
A maara Simmy ka ọ na-edebe ndụ onwe ya na nzuzo

Simoné Pretorius (onye a mụrụ Nortmann; a mụrụ na 18 Mee 1990) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, telivishọn, na ihe nkiri na South Africa, onye a maara maka igosipụta Irma Humpel na ihe nkiri akụkọ ndụ Afrikaans nke afọ 2016 Vir die voëls [af], nke o nwetara ọmụma na nkwado mba ụwa
A makwaara ya maka ọrụ ya dịka Jony na mockumentary nke Kyknet, HOTEL, nke ọ natara nhọpụta maka South African Film and Television Award maka Best Actress in a TV Comedy n'afọ 2018
Ọrụ ya bụ Nadia Croukamp na 7de Laan (2013[[2015) nke wetara ya onyinye site na Royalty Soapie Awards n'afọ 2014 maka Best Newcomer
A mụrụ ya na 18 Mee 1990 na Pretoria, South Africa, Nortmann sitere na agbụrụ Afrikaans ma na-ebi ugbu a na Johannesburg ya na di ya, Andries Levi Pretorius, onye ọchụnta ego na onye na-ahụ maka ego
Nne na nna ya abụọ jere ozi na South African Air Force
Nna ya, Hannes Nortmann, jere ozi na South African Border War ma nye ya Honoris Crux Award maka obi ike n'afọ 1988
Nortmann bụ naanị nwa nne na nna ya gbara alụkwaghịm mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ
Nne ya, Tinkie Nortmann, chọpụtara mmasị nwa ya nwanyị nwere maka ime ihe nkiri mgbe otu ụbọchị ọ rịgooro n'elu tebụl KFCz wee malite ime ihe maka ndị na-akwado ya
Nortmann bụ onye ndu na onye na-eme nke ọma n'afọ ụlọ akwụkwọ ya, na-eje ozi dịka Headgirl na Primary School yana ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, Hs Centurion, ma na-agafe matric na ọdịiche asaa
Ọ gara n'ihu nweta nzere BDram na Theatre Studies na Mahadum Stellenbosch n'afọ 2012

N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ laghachiri South Africa, ọ nwetara ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya dịka onye ndu, Irma Humpel, na ihe nkiri Huisgenoot Magazine nke nwetara ihe nrite, 'Vir die Voëls' (2016) nke ọ natara nkwado mba ụwa mbụ ya site na mmeri Best Actress na Tallgrass International Film Festival n'afọ 2017, ebe a kpọkwara ya ka ọ bụrụ akụkụ nke mkparịta ụka Female Filmmaker nke a họpụtara mgbe Rose McGowan ka ọ kagbuo ihe nkiri mbụ na emume ahụ mgbe ikpe Harvey Weinstein pụtara ọzọ
Nortmann nwetakwara mmeri Best Actress maka otu ihe nkiri ahụ na Huisgenoot Tempo Awards n'afọ 2017
O mechara gaa n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri na South African box office hits na ihe nkiri mba ụwa 'Vuil Wasgoed' (2017), 'Stroomop' (2018), na 'Wonderlus' (2018)
Televishọn Nortmann mere ihe nkiri telivishọn mbụ ya na ncha Afrikaans a ma ama 7de Laan n'afọ 2013, na-egwu Nadia Croukamp nke e nyere ya Best Newcomer Award na Royalty Soapie Awards (2014)
Ihe ngosi telivishọn nke Nortmann gụnyekwara ihe ngosi mockumentary nke Kyknet, 'Hotel' ma ọ na-apụta ugbu a dịka Sr
René Spies na ncha a ma ama na South Africa, Binnelanders (2019)
Ọ gara n'ihu na-ekere òkè na mmepụta dị iche iche ma gaa n'ihu ịpụta na egwuregwu otu nwanyị nke ya, Please Leave a Message, nke gosipụtara na mmemme dị iche iche na South Africa n'afọ 2017 na 2018
Nortmann malitere ụlọ ọrụ ime ihe nkiri nke ya n'afọ 2017 nke akpọrọ Art of Acting South Africa
N'afọ 2018, ọ kpughere na ya na onye mmekọ ya, Andries Levi Pretorius, onye na-ahụ maka ego na onye ọchụnta ego, onye ọ maara kemgbe afọ 2011, kwere nkwa ọlụlụ
Ha abụọ kwere onwe ha nkwa ọlụlụ na 20 Ọktoba 2018 wee lụọ n'afọ sochirinụ na 23 Febụwarị 2019
Simon Ekpa (amụrụ na Maachị 21, 1985) bụ onye ọkaiwu Naijiria-Finnish, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye bụbu onye na-eme egwuregwu
Amara ya nke ọma maka ịgbasa akụkọ adịgboroja na ebubo na ọ na-akpalite ọgbaghara na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria
Nke sitere na Ohaukwu, Ȯra Ebonyi, Ekpa biri na Lahti, Finland kemgbe afo 2007
Finnish police detain Biafran separatist leader Simon Ekpa]
Simon Gush (amụrụ n'afọ 1981) bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bi na Johannesburg, South Africa
Ihe osise ya na ihe nkiri edemede ya na-enyocha ihe oyiyi nke ọrụ, ụkpụrụ ọrụ, usoro ọrụ nke kpụrụ Johannesburg
Ọrụ ya bara uru na-eduzi n'ụzọ bụ isi site na nnyocha; ọ na-enweta mkpali ya na ederede dị iche iche, ihe nkiri, egwu oge ochie na ọdịbendị a ma ama
Gush na-ebu ụzọ weghara ma mezigharịa ihe na ahụmịhe site na ndụ kwa ụbọchị ka ọ na-anwa iche echiche banyere ụzọ gọọmentị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị si arụ ọrụ site na quotient
N'afọ 2014, Gush mepụtara ihe ngosi Red banyere ọgba aghara ọrụ nke 1990 na ụlọ ọrụ Mercedes Benz dị na East London, South Africa

Ihe ngosi ahụ gụnyere nrụzigharị nke ụgbọala Mercedes na-acha ọbara ọbara nke a rụrụ maka Nelson Mandela, ntinye nke nrụzigharị na-eche n'echiche nke ejiji ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe nke Mokotjo Mohulo, na àkwà ndị na-eji eme ngagharị iwe
Isi ihe ngosi ahụ bụ ihe nkiri Red, nke ya na James Cairns jikọrọ aka mee
Simon Norfolk (amụrụ n'afọ 1963) bụ onye amụrụ na Naijiria, bụ onye Britain na-ese ihe owuwu na onye na-ese foto
O mepụtala akwụkwọ foto anọ nke ọrụ ya
E nwere foto ya n'ihe karịrị ihe ngosi nka ọha na eze ịrị na abụọ
A mụrụ Norfolk na Naịjirịa mana a zụlitere ya na England
Norfolk gụrụ akwụkwọ foto na Newport College of Art
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Brighton & Hove na Kabul

Norfolk emeriela Prix Dialogue de l'Humanite award na Rencontres d'Arles, ọtụtụ World Press Photo na Sony World Photography Awards, Foreign Press Club of America Award, European Publishers Award for Photography na Infinity Prize site na International Center of Photography
N'afọ 2003, edepụtara ya maka Citibank Prize (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Deutsche Börse Photography Prize), na 2013 o meriri Prix Pictet Commission
Museum of Fine Arts, Houston na Tate Modern, London anakọtara ọrụ ya
A na-edekọ ọrụ Norfolk na nchịkọta ọha na eze ndị a
Simon Cosmas Michael nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Simon Rieber bụ onye omenkà na-ahụ anya nke Tanzania nke na-arụ ọrụ ngalaba nka nka, ihe nkiri, eserese na ihe atụ iji kwuo okwu na idekọ nkwenye ya
O meela ihe ngosi n'ọtụtụ ebe na Tanzania na East Africa, na-ewuli niche dị ka onye na-ese ihe n'oge Tanzania na-apụta na ihe ngosi nka East Africa
Simone Ponte Ferraz (amụrụ na 12 Machị na afọ 1990) bụ onye Brazil na-eme egwuregwu na-ahụ maka 3000 mita steeplechase
O ritere ihe nrite abụọ na South American Championships
O sonyere na 2020 Summer Olympics
Ihe kacha mma ya n'ihe omume ahụ bụ 9 4515 setị nke abụọ na Guayaquil na 2021
Simone Hochgreb bu onye mba Brazil nke na ahụ maka mekanikal injinia, onye mere nchoputa ihe gbasara mgbasi ike na mmeto nke metụtara injin combushon nakwa etu hazie ụkuru na esi n'ime ya
Ọ bu profeso nke na eme ihe nnwale combushon na mahadum nke kambridge, onyeisi na ahụ etu otu cambriji nke na ọbụkwa director na ahu maka agụmakwụkwọ injinia
Hochgreb gụrụ injinia igwe na Mahadum São Paulo, ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na 1985
Ọ gụsịrị PhD
na injinia igwe na aerospace na 1991 na Mahadum Princeton
Frederick L
Dryer lekọtara akwụkwọ edemede ya bụ An Experimental and Numerical Study on the Oxidation of Formaldehyde,
Ọ ghọrọ onye enyemaka prọfesọ nke injinia igwe na Massachusetts Institute of Technology, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ site na 1991 ruo 1999
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ nwa oge maka Sandia National Laboratories na ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ injinia Exponent, ọ were ọnọdụ ya ugbu a dị ka prọfesọ na Mahadum Cambridge na 2002
Hochgreb meriri Ralph R
Teetor Educational Award nke SAE International na 1996, na Royal Society Wolfson Research Merit Award na 2003

A kpọrọ ya Fellow nke Royal Aeronautical Society na 2011, ma họpụta ya na klas mbụ nke 2018 nke Fellows nke The Combustion Institute, 'maka nnwale magburu onwe ya na ọkụ ọkụ gafee ebe ndị dị mkpa na ebe ndị a na-etinye n'ọrụ, gụnyere ọkụ onwe onye, ọgba aghara na ọgba aghụghọ'

Simone Jones bụ ónyé Canada na-ese ihe dị iche iche nke a maara màkà ọrụ nka ya
Ọrụ mbụ Jones lekwasịrị ányá na ihe ọkpụkpụ, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Ontario College of Art (nke bụzi Mahadum OCAD) na-elekwasị ányà na Experimental Art, na MFA na Sculpture Installation na Mahadum York
Ọrụ ya gbasaa ịgụnye ihe nkiri, vidiyo, na arụmọrụ
Ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-adịbeghị ányá na-enyocha itinye robotics, mgbasa ozi dijitalụ na ngwá electronic na ọrụ ọkpụkpụ na kinetic
N'afọ 2014, a gụnyere Jones na Biennale de Montreal N'afọ 2015, e tinyere ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi Lively Objects na Museum of Vancouver

N'afọ 2016, ya na Laura Millard rụkọtara ọrụ na 'Recursive Tracks' na ọrụ arụmọrụ na isiokwu nkè ice n'ime ime ụlọ dị ka akụkụ nke emume In / Future na ntinye nke saịtị na agwaetiti ọdịda anyanwụ nkè Ontario Place
N'afọ 2000, Jones na ónyé mmekọ ya, ónyé édémédé Hope Thompson kwagara Pittsburgh
Simone Saint-Dénis (1934 - 2008) bụ onye ndu otu ndị ọrụ si Gabon, onye na-ekere òkè na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'oge nnwere onwe gasịrị
A mụrụ Saint-Dénis na Libreville na 1934, ndị nne na nna sitere na agbụrụ Mpongwe
Nna ya bụ Mathurin Anguiley, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị; edeghi aha nne ya
Nna ya nakweere aha nna ya Saint-Dénis mgbe ọ chọpụtara na nna mụrụ ya bụ onye ọkwọ ụgbọ mmiri Danish, karịa di nne ya
Nna ya jere ozi na ndị agha France, ezinụlọ ahụ na-enwetakwa mmanya na achịcha n'ọtụtụ nrii

N'afọ 1948, Saint-Dénis gụchara akwụkwọ sekọndrị na ụlọ akwụkwọ ozi ndị Katọlik wee banye ozugbo na Balé - onye ọrụ ogige osisiN'oge ọhụrụ ahụ, nna ya chụpụrụ ya n'ụlọ, nkwekọrịta ahụ dị mkpụmkpụ ma mebie ya site na Balé; Saint-Dénis wee bata na nne ya
Enwere ọrụ ole na ole maka ụmụ nwanyị gụrụ akwụkwọ na Libreville agha mgbe agha gasịrị, ya mere Saint-Dénis kpebiri ịzụ ọzụzụ dịka onye nkuzi
N'afọ 1950, ọ malitere izi ihe n’ụlọ akwụkwọ ozi ndị Katọlik na Donguila, bụ́ obodo dị n’ime ime obodo Estuaire, bụ́ ebe ọtụtụ n’ime ụmụaka na-asụ Fang
Ụgwọ ọrụ dị ala nke ndị nkuzi bu ụzọ mee ka Saint-Dénis tinye aka na unionism site na Confédération Française des Travailleurs Chrétiens (CFTC)
Site na mmegide Saint-Dénis, CFTC kwurịtara mmụba ụgwọ maka ndị nkuzi na ụlọ akwụkwọ Katọlik n'afọ ndị 1950
Ọrụ ya na CFTC gara n'ihu mgbe Gabon nwesịrị nnwere onwe na site na 1960-67 ọ nọchitere anya otu ndị Gabon na nzukọ mba dị iche iche, na-aga Copenhagen, Rome, na Bucharest
Otú ọ dị, mgbe ndị agha nwara iwe ọchịchị n'afọ 1964, gọọmentị Gabon n'okpuru Léon M'ba gbalịrị ịbawanye ikike ịchịkwa ndị otu
Onye nọchiri ya Oumar Bongo Ondimba jikọtara njikwa, na-ahapụ obere ohere maka otu ndị ọrụ na ndị nnọchi anya ha dị ka Saint-Dénis

N'afọ ndị 1970, Parti Démocratique Gabonais (PDG) manyere Saint-Dénis ịnakwere ọrụ ha na-ahazi mmemme egwu, ebe otu ụmụ nwanyị na-anọchite anya ụdị dị iche iche nke Gabon na-abụ abụ ma na-agba egwu iji gosi nkwado maka PDG
N'agbanyeghị nke a ọ nọgidere na-etinye aka na unionism na na 1976 a họpụtara Joint Secretary nke Fédération Syndicale Gabonaise (FESYGA) na Owondault Berre; na 1980 a họpụtara ya odeakwụkwọ
Saint-Dénis nwere ụmụ abụọ na onye nnọchi anya mba Gabon
Ọ lara ezumike nká na PDG na 1981 wee nwụọ na Libreville na 2008 site na nsogbu n'ihi ọrịa shuga
N'oge ndụ ya, ọ gwara ọtụtụ ndị na-eme nchọpụta n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Ụwa okwu, bụ́ ndị ihe ndekọ banyere ndụ ya na-enye echiche nghọta banyere Gabon narị afọ nke iri abụọ
Simone Tanner Chaumet (c
1916 ̊ 25 Mee 1962) bụ onye France na-eme udo ma bụrụ onye ọrụ afọ ofufo maka SCI (Service Civil International) n'etiti afọ 1943 nakwa afọ 1945 na mba France France na n'etiti 1951 na 1956 na Algeria
Steeti Israel kwanyeere ya ugwu dị ka onye ezi omume n'etiti mba n'afọ 2011 maka omume ya iji zọpụta ụmụaka ndị Juu n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
A mụrụ Chaumet n'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, mana a maghị kpọmkwem ụbọchị a mụrụ ya na ebe a mụrụ ya
Ọ maghị nna ya
Ọnọdụ a metụtara ọrịa ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata
Nne ya lụrụ di ọzọ
Nna nna ya bụ nwoke dị mma kpọọrọ nwunye ya na ụmụ ya nwanyị abụọ gaa Cannes ka ha biri n'ebe ahụ
Mmekọrịta dị n'etiti Chaumet na nna nna ya siri ike
N'afọ 1942, ya na enyi ya Jamy Bissérier sonyeere CLAJ (Club loisirs action jeunesse) ma n'afọ 1943 ọ ghọrọ odeakwụkwọ nke CLAJ nke jikọtara ya na 'Amitiés Chrétienne' na Col du Fanget na French Alps
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ, ọ zọpụtara ndụ ụmụaka ndị Juu (François Gelbert, Maurice na Charles Wrobel, Gilbert na Maxime Allouche) n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ na France
SCI dị ezigbo mkpa maka Chaumet na ndụ ya
Ọ lekwasịrị anya na oku SCI wee kpebie ịbụ onye ọrụ afọ ofufo maka SCI
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na France n'etiti afọ 1945 na afọ 1950 maka otu a ma ọ nọgidere na-arụ ọrụ afọ ofufo ogologo oge na Algeria n'etiti afọ 1951 na afọ 1956
Ọ lụrụ odeakwụkwọ SCI Emile Tanner
Chaumet onye nyochara akụkụ bara uru nke agụmakwụkwọ mgbe ọ bụ onye ọrụ afọ ofufo maka SCI, guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ na Bouzareah
Ọ chọrọ inyere ndị na-amaghị otú e si agụ na ide na ụmụaka ndị chọrọ agụmakwụkwọ aka
E gburu ya na 25 Mee n'afọ 1962 n'ọgụ nke agha nnwere onwe Algeria
E debere ihe ncheta na Col du Fanget na 7 Mee n'afọ 2005
Ụmụaka; François Gelbert, Gilbert na Maxime Allouche nke Chaumet zọpụtara ndụ ha, gara ememe ncheta iji sọpụrụ ya
Ọzọkwa, a na-echeta ya na Israel ka ọ zọpụtara ndụ ụmụaka ndị Juu n'oge WWII na France
N'ikpeazụ, a kwanyeere ya ugwu n'ụbọchị 24 n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2011 dị ka onye ezi omume n'etiti mba na Salle des Fêtes de la Mairie du 6e arrondissment, 78 rue Bonaparte, na Paris
E depụtara Tanner-Chaumet na mbadamba 10 nke Algeria Ministry of Foreign Affairs Wall of the Missing of people lost during wars in Algeria
Simonet Biokou bụ onye Beninois Vodou artist
Ọ bi na Porto Novo, Benin, ebe Vodou (ma ọ bụ Voodoo) bụ okpukpe gọọmentị nke pasentị iri anọ (40%) nke ndị bi na ya na-ekpe
A maara Biokou maka ọrụ ya site na iji ọla, gụnyere rims nke wiil na agbụ ígwè, bolts, na isi iyi, nke ọ na-eji eme ihe iji rụọ ọrụ ígwè nke chi Voodoo
Onye na-ese ihe na-egosipụtakarị na Africa, Europe, na Canada
Ọ bụ naanị onye African Biokou sculptor gosipụtara na Contemporary art Museum of Liège
Biokou mere onwe ya na ihe nkiri afọ 1998 Divine Carcasse

naSimphiwe Mendy Dludlu (a mụrụ n'abalị niri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 1987) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ South Africa nke gbara bọọlụ dị ka onye na-agba dị ka onye nchekwa nke Mamelodi Sundowns na gbakwarala ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị South Africa
Ọ bụkwa onye nkuzi nke otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Mahadum Tshwane nke Teknụzụ
Simphiwe bụ onye isi nkuzi nke ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị U17 nke South Africa kemgbe afọ 2017
O duru ndị otu ahụ gaa iko mba ụwa nke abụọ nke Youth FIFA na 2018 Uruguay
Dludlu gụrụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ TuksSport High School
N'afọ 2007, ọ malitere ọmụmụ ihe na Mahadum nke Pretoria ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nweta nzere sayensị egwuregwu n'afọ 2012
Na ọkwa klọb, Dludlu na-nọ n'egwuregwu boólụ ugbu a dị ka onye nchekwa Mamelodi Sundowns Na gburugburu egwuregwu bọọlụ, a na-akpọ ya 'Shorty'
Dludlu mere Mpụta mbụ ya nke ndị otu mba South Africa na 2006 n'oge egwuregwu megide Mozambique
Ọ bụ onye isi ndị otu ahụ site na 2009 ruo afọ 2010
Ọ bụ onye isi ndị otu mba ahụ n'agbata afọ 2009 na afọ 2010
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2014, Dludlu mere nbuli nke iri ise ya maka ndị otu ndị isi South Africa n'oge egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Ghana

N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2014, a kpọrọ ya aha na ndepụta maka nkwadebe maka 2014 African Women's Championship na Namibia O kwupụtara ezumike nká ya na bọọlụ mba ụwa na Machị 2014,ma na-nchọ ịchụso ọrụ ikuzi gbasara egwuregwu bọọlụ
Ọ gụsịrị ọrụ egwuregwu ya maka ndị otu South Africa na iko iri isii na atọ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Pretoria n'afọ 2012, ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi nke otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Mahadum, na-agba egwuregwu bọọlụ na Mahadum Sports South Africa (USSA)
N'ime afọ abụọ mbụ ya na ndị otu ahụ, ha rutere na ngwụcha nke USSA Football National Club Championship
Na Mee 2013, Dludlu nwetara asambodo UEFA B Licence coaching
N'akụkụ ndị ọzọ bụbu ụmụ nwanyị mba South Africa, ọ bụ onye nyocha maka mmemme Vodafone NXT Level
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Dludlu na-azụ ndị otu ụmụ nwany ogologo ị U17 nke South Africa na-egwu FIFA U17 Women's World Cup na Uruguay

Simphiwe Ndzube (amụrụ n'afọ 1990 na Hofmeyr, Eastern Cape, South Africa) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nà South Africa nké sitere nà Xhosa na-ebi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Los Angeles, California na Cape Town, South Africa
Ọ natara BFA ya na Michaelis School of Fine Arts nà Mahadum Cape Town n'afọ 2015

E mèrè ihe ngosi nka mbụ nkè Ndzube na United States 'Oracles of the Pink Universe' na Denver Art Museum site n'ubochí irí na àtó n'ọnwa Juun, n'afọ 2021 rụọ úbọchị irí abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2021 ma gosipụta ọtụtụ ihe osise nke na-azaghachi onye na-ese ihe Dutch / Netherlands Hieronymous Bosch's The Garden of Earthly Delights (afọ 1490 rụọ afọ 1510) ma na-emeso ndụ na Post-apartheid South Africa
Ndzube tolitere n'obodo Masiphumelele nke South Africa, aha ya sitere na okwu Xhosa nke pụtara 'ka anyị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma'
A kọwaala ọrụ Ndzube ma onye na-ese ihe n'onwe ya ma ndị ọzọ dị ka ndị nọ n'ọdịnala nke 'ihe dị adị nke anwansi'
Ụlọ ngosi Nicodim dị na New York City na Los Angeles na ụlọ ngosi Stevenson dị na South Africa na-anọchite anya ya

Osinachi Joseph (nke na-azabu Kalu ), nke a ma ama dịka Sinach, bụ onye Naịjirịa na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede abụ na onye isi, na-ife ofufe na Loveworld O weputara otutu egwu ofufe di nma, tinyere 'Way Maker', 'I Know Who I Am', 'Great Are You Lord', 'Rejoice', 'He Did It Again', 'Precious Jesus', 'The Name of Jesus', 'This Is My Season', 'Awesome God',' For This', 'I Stand Amazed', 'Simply Devoted' na 'Jesus is Alive'
Sinach natara asambodo Betlehem Hall of Faith maka ncheta oge ọ gara Israel na Disemba 2017
Na onwa Machị 2019, ihe onyonyo maka “Way Maker” ghoro ihe nlere nke ato, ndi obodo Naijiria nwere ndi nkiri otu nari nde mmadu na YouTube n’azu Davido “ Fall ” na Yemi Alade Johnny ”
Otutu ndi egwu ozioma sonyere na 'Way Maker' bu ndi dika Michael W
Smith, Darlene Zschech, Leeland, Music Music, na Mandisa
Na Septemba 2019, Sinach ghọrọ onye egwu ozioma mbu si Africa wee jegharia India, na-emebe isi akuko ogbako egwu ọtụtụ puku mmadụ biara
Na May 2020, ọ ghọrọ onye artisiti mbu na Afrika butere isi igba n'ihe osise nke Billboard Christian Songwriters
Sinach sitere na Ebonyi State, Eastern Nigeria, ma bụrụ nwa nwanyị nke abụọ na ụmụ asaa
Sinach malitere ịgụru ndị ezi n'ụlọ ya na ndị enyi ya egwu na 1989 ka ihe omume nturundu, ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ na onye otu ukwe na Christ Embassy, Ulo uka Pastor Chris Oyakhilome
Ọ mụrụ Physics ma gụsịa akwụkwọ na Mahadum Port Harcourt, Rivers State, Naijiria
Ọ tụlere ịsi Naịjirịa kwagharia mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum, mana onye ụkọchukwu Chris Oyakhilome dụrụ ya ọdụ ka ọ ghara
Na 2014, Sinach lụrụ Joseph Egbu Church Christ Embassy n'obodo ya
Na Nọvemba 17, 2019, na LIMA Awards, pastọr Chris Oyakhilome, kwuputara ọbịbịa nke nwa mbụ Sinach, afọ ise ka olụchara di

Dika nwatakiri, Sinach kwuputara na ya nwere nro, ebe o huru onwe ya na ekwere otutu igwe mmadu ukwe, ma o dighi ihe obula otinyere uchu n'egwu karia isonye ndi ukwe, ma na aru oru dika ndi oru nlekota na Nzuko
Sinach edeela ọtụtụ abụ tupu ya ewepụta album mbụ ya, Isi nke mbụ na 2008
Abụ ya 'This Is Your Season' nwetere nmeri Abụ nke Afọ na 2008
Mgbe ọ na-ekwu maka etu o siri nwete aha ọgbo ya Sinach, o kwuru ' Ahọrọ m nke ahụ site na aha m Osinachi n'ihi na ọ dị mfe mkpọpụta na ịdọta'
Na 2016, Sinach bụ onye mbụ natara LIMA Songwriter onyinye nturu ugo nke afọ iri, na-nhota nkwado ya na egwu ozioma n'ime afọ iri gara aga
A na-abụ abụ ya n'ọtụtụ mba, sụgharịsia ya n'ọtụtụ asụsụ, na mbu uwa gbaa gburugburu
N'afọ ahụ, ọ natara onyinye nturu ugo nke African Achievers for the Global Excellence

N'otu afọ ahụkwa, nke ugboro abụọ na-ahiri, ọ nwetara nmeri na Western Africa Artist Of The Year, nke si na Groove Awards na Kenya, na YNaija n'akuku Chris Oyakhilome, Enoch Adeboye dị ka otu n'ime otu nari ndị isi kachasị emetụta Ndị otu Kraịst na Nigeria
Dịka onye na-ede abụ, Sinach edeela ihe karịrị abu narị abụọ wee nweta ọtụtụ onyinye nturu ugo
Abụ ya 'This Is Your Season' nwetere nmeri Abụ nke Afọ na 2008
Otu n’ime egwu ndị ama ama bụ ‘I Know Who I Am’

Sinach arụọla ma mebe isi okwu n'ihe nkiri egwu na ihe karịrị mba iri ise gụnyere Kenya, Dominica, South Africa, United States, Canada, Antigua & Barbuda, Trinidad na Tobago, Jamaica, Grenada, Uganda, Barbados, The British Virgin Islands, Zambia, Saint Maarten, the United Kingdom na India
Sinai na-ezo aka na ndia
Sinai nwekwara ike izo aka na ndia
Alhaja Sinatu Aderoju Ojikutu bụbu osote gọvanọ Legọs steeti site n'afo 1992 ruo 1993
Ọ bụ osote gọvanọ Michael Otedola ruo mgbe ndị agha weghara ọchịchị n'afọ 1993
A mụrụ Alhaja Sinatu Ojikutu na steeti Ekiti, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya
Ọ hapụrụ Ekiti ka ọ gachara akwụkwọ praịmarị isii gawa Legọs
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Our Lady of Apostle dị n'Ijebu Ode
Site n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Our Lady of Apostle, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Grammar Ilesha ka ọ gụchaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ na Nigerian Bank for Commerce and Industry
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara n'ọkwa dị otú ahụ
Ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka njem na steeti Legọs
Sir Michael Otedola họpụtara ya dị ka onye ga-eso zọọ ọchịchị n'okpuru nche anwụ National Republican Convention o wee bụrụ osote gọvanọ Legọs steeti ka ha nwesịrị mmeri na ntuliaka n'afọ 1992
Mgbe ndị agha kwagidere ọchịchị n’afọ 1993, e wepụrụ ha n’ọkwa
N'afọ 2013, eboro Alhaja Jinatu na nwa ya nwoke, Samson ebubo na ha nara otu nwoke nde naira 130 maka otu ala dị n'akụkụ Admiralty Way na Lekki, Lagos State n'anya ọcha
E rere ala ahụ nye otu nwoke na-amaghị aha ya bụ onye kwụrụ ego ahụ n'akaụntụ ya naanị ka ọ chọpụta na ala ahụ bụ nke otu Mazị Afolabi
Dịka nkwupụta ndị uwe ojii siri kwuo, ọ kwetara mpụ ahụ mana o kwuputara na ọ bụ ezigbo mmejọ nke njirimara nkata
Ọ kwụghachiri onye ahụ gbara akwụkwọ nde naira iri ise ma kwe nkwa ịkwụghachi ya mgbe ọ tụfuru ngwongwo ya abụọ o debere ere
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na The Punch gbara, o kwuru na ala ahụ bụ nke di ya nwụrụ anwụ
Sinazo Pelisa Yolwa (a mụrụ n'abali iri abụo na isii n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1988), bụ onye nlereanya South Africa, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, MC na onye na-egosi ihe oyoyo
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na usoro ihe nkiri Impilo, The Wild, Single Guyz ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-egosi ọtụtụ mkpọsa ejiji na ndụ mba ụwa
A mụrụ Yolwa n'abali iri abụo na isii nke ọnwa Julaị 1988 na Eastern Cape, South Africa
Ọ bụ nne ya zụlitere ya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ kwagara Cape Town n'afọ 2004
Mgbe ahụ, o nwere ndụ siri ike na Khayelitsha ruo ọnwa ole na ole mana o mechara chọta ụlọ na Green Point
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Sea Point High na 2006 na ọdịiche abụọ maka Bekee na Afrikaans
Maka ịdị mma ya, o ritere Stephen Young Scholarship
N'afọ 2007, ọ banyere Mahadum nke Cape Town (UCT) iji mụọ Bcomm
na Accounting ma mesịa gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2010
N'afọ 2009, o meriri na UCT Association of Black Alumni bursary
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi ihe oyoyo maka Vodacom, Sasol, Ackerman's na Brut
N'afọ 2010, o mere ihe ngosi oyoyo mbụ ya site na ịme ihe omume ntụrụndụ SABC3 The A List
N'afọ 2011, o mere ihe nkiri oyoyo nke mbụ na M-Net ihe oyoyo The Wild ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado 'Victoria'
Mgbe ihe ịga nke ọma ahụ gasịrị, ọ sonyeere usoro ihe nkiri redio nke PEP, Impilo na ọrụ nke 'Sindi'
N'afọ 2011, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-egosi ihe ngosi gburugburu ebe obibi nke Tshwane TV Water is Life
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2011, ọ sonyeere ihe ngosi magazin SABC3 Top Billing dị ka onye na-eweta oge
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ sonyeere oge ikpeazụ nke ihe ngosi Real Goboza, nke gara n'ihu ruo afọ iri na anọ n'usoro
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2012, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ede akụkọ ntụrụndụ maka usoro ihe omume magazin ndụ SABC1 The Link
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ bụ onye na-egosi ihe ngosi The Link na saịtị vidio Zoopy
N'afọ 2013, ọ sụgharịrị olu ya na asọmpi SABC1 So You Think You Can Dance oge 3
N'ọnwa Nọvemba nke otu afọ ahụ, ọ nọchiri Pearl Thusi na ihe ngosi ntụrụndụ SABC1 The Real Goboza
Ka ọ dịgodị, o mere ihe nkiri oyoyo Single Guyz site n'ịrụ ọrụ 'Sibahle'
Sindiswa Dlathu (a mụrụ na Jenụwarị 4, 1974) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eti egwu na South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka igosipụta Thandaza Mokoena na Muvhango, ọrụ ọ rụrụ site na mmalite nke ihe ngosi ahụ n'afọ 1997 ruo mgbe ọ hapụrụ n'afọ 2018

Dlathu hapụrụ Muvhango ka ọ rụọ ọrụ dị mkpa na telenovela The River, ebe ọ na-arụ ọrụ Lindiwe Dlamini-Dikana, nwanyị na-eme ihe ike, onye ga-eme ihe ọ bụla iji chebe akụ na ụba ya ma nọgide na-ebi ndụ ya
A họpụtara Dlathu dịka onye na-esote ya na Sarafina!
N'ihe nkiri ahụ, ya na Whoopi Goldberg rụkọtara ọrụ ma nye ya ọrụ dịka onye na-enyere Michael Peters aka
N'afọ 1988, ya na ndị nke abụọ nke Seipati Sothoane duziri bụ onye Sindi na-amụchaghị
Mgbe egwuregwu ahụ gara njem, ọ nọrọ n'azụ wee mee Township fever n'afọ1989 na 1990 na-agagharị na US na egwuregwu ahụ ruo otu afọ
Dlathu laghachiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe afọ anọ nke ịnọ na ndị na-ese ihe nke Mbongeni Ngema
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1996, wee laghachi n'ime ihe nkiri, ihe nkiri nafọ 1997 ọ nọ na FNB Vita Award-winning Game, ebe ya na Mary Twala, Abigail Kubeka, na onye nwụrụ anwụ Nomhle Nkonyeni rụrụ ọrụ
O meriri ihe nrite maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị amasị ya na 2020 DStv Mzansi Viewers' Choice Awards
Dlathu, dịka Lindiwe Dlamini-Dikana si The River, pụtara na ihe omume crossover nke The Queen dịka enyi nke onye isi nwanyị, Harriet Khoza - Sebata
N'afọ 2021, o ritere ihe nrite SAFTA na Best Actress category maka ọrụ ya nke Lindiwe na The River

Bedaya Singuila N'Garo (amụrụ na 19 na ọnwa Septemba 1977 na Suresnes), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Singuila (Nkọwa okwu French ), bụ onye na-agụ egwu French nke sitere na Congolese na Central Africa
Singuila pụtara 'ekele' na Sango, asụsụ a na-asụ na Central African Republic
O weputara abọm izizi ya na ngwụcha afọ 2004 nke akpọrọ On ne vit qu'une fois (nke pụtara 'Anyị na-adị ndụ naanị otu ugboro') nke Secteur Ä, ụlọ ọrụ rap French a ma ama mepụtara
Singles sitere na abọm ahụ gụnyere 'Aïcha' na 'C'est Trop'
Mgbe ọ malitere nke ọma, ọ nwetara ewu ewu na mba ndị na-asụ French na Europe dum

Ya na onye na-agụ egwu R'n'B nke Britain bụ Jamelia jikọrọ aka na 2004, maka nsụgharị French nke egwu egwu ya bụ Thank You, nke nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ọtụtụ mba Europe, gụnyere United Kingdom na Netherlands
Ụdị ọhụrụ ahụ bụ asụsụ abụọ na Jamelia na-abụ abụ na Bekee, na Singuila na French
Vidio ahụ gosipụtara vidiyo nke vidiyo Bekee mbụ na vidiyo ọhụrụ nke Singuila
Na afọ 2006, Singuila laghachiri na abọm ọhụrụ a na-akpọ Ghetto Compositeur
Singles sitere na abọm ahụ gụnyere 'Le temps passe trop vite' (nke pụtara n'ụzọ nkịtị 'Oge na-agafe ngwa ngwa') na 'Ma Nature', mee ka ọnọdụ ya sie ike na French R'n'B circles
Na afọ 2003, o wepụtara abọm izizi ya 'On ne vit qu'une fois'
Site na abọm mbụ a, egwu; 'Aisha' na 'C'est trop' ga-abụ egwu
Na afọ 2006, ọ laghachiri na abọm ọhụrụ a na-akpọ 'Ghetto Composer' na Lino
Ndị otu sitere na abọm ahụ bụ 'Le temps passe trop vite' na 'Ma nature'
Na afọ 2007, o sonyere na nchịkọta Trimmed Offset Mania 'Ca n'ment' ya na Kamnouze na Petit Denis
Ọ na-esokwa na okike nke album Sheryfa Luna nke gụnyere aha 'Il avait les mots' nke ga-aghọ tube ngwa ngwa
Na afọ 2008, ọ na-ewere egwu nke 'Il avait les mots' Sheryfa Luna (nke ọ bụ onye dere ya) iji mepụta 'Je cherchais les mots - La reponse'
Abụ a dị ka aha a tụrụ aro ya, azịza nye 'Il avait les mots'
Na afọ 2009, o wepụtara abọm ọhụrụ, 'Ca fait mal', dịka egwu 3 nke otu abọm ahụ, na ọ bụ ụtụ nye nna ya nwụrụ anwụ
'Viens, je t'en prie' na 'Je suis KO' duet na Marc Anthony, bụ egwu sitere na abọm ahụ
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ na-akwadebe abọm ọhụrụ nwere aha, nke akpọrọ 'Sang chaud', ka ewepụtara ma gbasaa ya na Ịntanetị malite na Mee 2011
Singuila esorowo onye Naijiria na-ese ihe DonTom rụkọọ ọrụ n'abụ enyi nwanyị akpọrọ 'I Love You', nke e wepụtara na ọnwa Febụwarị 2014
Singuila bụ onye nkuzi na 'The voice Afrique francophone' 2016 2017

Sinivie Boltic (ka amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1982 na Famgbe, Naịjirịa) bụ onye mgba Naịjirịa nke sọrọ mpi na freestyle 96 kg na 2012 Summer Olympics Ọ bụ onye na-ebu ọkọlọtọ Naịjirịa n'oge emume mmeghe
Shemya (tàar ʃàmɲà) bụ asụsụ nkè ndị Sinyar
Ọ bụ asụsụ Central Sudan nkè á na-asụ ná Chad ná n'oge gàrà aga ná Darfur, Sudan
Á na-asụ yá n'ụzọ dịgasị ichè ichè S cru, Shamyan, Shemya, Sinya, mà màrà yá dị kà Symiarta, Taar Shamyan, Zimirra
A na-asụ asụsụ ahụ ná Goz Beïda, Chad ná Foro Boranga, Sudan
E nwèrè ụda abụọ dị élú na ụda dị ala
Usoro okwu bụ SVO
Dimmendaal hapụrụ yá dị ka asụsụ dịpụrụ adịpụ, ébé Blench jikọtara yá ná Formona
Doornbos dekọrọ agbụrụ Sinyar irí ná asatọ
Ezinụlọ Kijaar, nkè dị nsó ná Kujargé, nwèrè ike ịlụ ndị Kujargé
Sinyar yiri kà ọ nwere superstratum Bongo Bagirmi na substratum na-abụghị nkè Congo Bagirmi
Ụfọdụ ókwú ókwú ná Sinyar nwèrè njikọ n'asụsụ Bongo Bagirmi (karịsịa otu Yulu-Gula dị nso), ébé ndị ọzọ anaghịÀtụ Col-begin

Siobhán Hoey (amụrụ na 17 Julaị na afọ 1970) bụ onye Irish na-eme egwuregwu si Portarlington, County Laois Ọ na-asọ mpi na track na field na bobsleigh
Ọrụ egwuregwu Hoey hụrụ ka ọ lekwasịrị anya na sprinting na ogologo jump
Dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu dị elu, ọ bụ onye mmeri mba na-agba ọsọ ogologo na onye na-edekọ ihe ma n'ime ụlọ ma n'èzí
Site na 1993 ruo 2000, ọ bụ onye mmeri mba na triple jump, yana onye mmeri ime ụlọ nke mba (1993, 1996ī1999)
Hoey bụ onye mmeri mba na-awụli elu ogologo n'afọ 1989
Ọ bụ onye mbụ Irish nwere ihe ndekọ maka ịwụli elu atọ nke ụmụ nwanyị
Na asọmupi inter-varsity na-asọmpi maka Mahadum College Dublin (UCD), ọ meriri ọla edo na ogologo ịwụli elu, ịwụli atọ, ịwụ elu na abụọ sprint relays
N'afọ 1992, Hoey bụ onyeisi ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị UCD na Ireland na ihe omume na Belgium na America
A họpụtakwara ya ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Ireland na Europa Cup
N'afọ 1999, a họpụtara Hoey na nwanne ya nwanyị, Aoife, maka otu ụmụ nwanyị bobsleigh ndi nke Ireland, mana ebe ọ bụ na ọ dị obere, Aoif enweghị ike ịsọ mpi
Hoey ghọrọ nwanyị Irish mbụ na-anya bobsleigh na ụlọ akwụkwọ bob na Lillehammer, Norway
Dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu brek, ọ sonyeere onye na-anya ụgbọ ala Audrey Garland (onye mmeri nke asọmpi British Gladiator a ma ama) na Lillehammer na Igls, Austria (2000)
Sheesley Fitzgerald bụ ụmụ nwanyị Irish mbụ sonyere na FIBT World Championships, na-eme ya na Calgary, Canada na 2001
Ya, Lesley na Aoife sonyere na European Cup na World Cup na mgbalị ha iru eru maka Salt Lake City Games na 2002
N'afọ 2001 na 2002 ọ wepụrụ otu afọ n'ọrụ nkuzi na Dublin mgbe Aoife wepụrụ ezumike ọmụmụ
Ụmụnne nwanyị ahụ nwetara ego ụfọdụ site na Kansụl Olympic nke Ireland mana enweghị nkwado azụmahịa
Na esonye egwuregwu nke 2002, ụmụnne nwanyị Hoey jikọtara aka; Aoife na oche ọkwọ ụgbọala na Siobhain dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu brek
Ụmụnne nwanyị ahụ sonyere na European Cup na World Cup, na European na World Championships
Ụmụnne nwanyị ahụ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke iri na atọ na FIBT World Championships na Koenigssee, Germany ma tinye ya n'etiti ihe nrite na asọmpi mmalite Europe
Mgbalị ha maka iru eru maka egwuregwu 2006 malitere na ọdachi mgbe Siobhán merụrụ ahụ nke ukwuu n'ihe mberede dị egwu na ụlọ ice na Calgary, Canada
N'etiti ọzụzụ, onye na-agba ọsọ na-agba ịnyịnya kụrụ ya n'ụkwụ ụkwụ ya wee gbasaa ya ruo n'akụkụ Achilles
Ọ ga-asọ mpi na ihe omume Calgary na Lake Placid na ụkwụ ya
Ihe omume ndị fọdụrụ na World Cup circuit gara nke ọma, agbanyeghị na ndị otu ahụ erughị eru maka 2006 Winter Olympics
Na isonye ihe omume iru eru nke ikpeazụ na Koenigssee, Germany na Jenụwarị 2006, Hoey lara ezumike nká na egwuregwu ahụ
Dị ka onye ọrụ nke IBSA, ya na ndị na-eto eto na-eme egwuregwu arụkọwo ọrụ
Nchịkọta David Connolly onye ruru eru na ihe omume ọkpụkpụ maka Torino Games 2006 na Patrick Shannon onye ruru eru maka Skeleton maka Vancouver Games 2010
Nchịkọta na nkuzi Jennifer Corcoran, onye ya na Aoife Hoey nwetara ihe nrite na bobsleigh World Junior Championships, na Claire Bergin onye sonyeere Aoife maka Vancouver Games 2010

N'ịkwado onyinye ya na egwuregwu oyi nke Irish, a họpụtara Siobhán ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ọrụ maka egwuregwu Olympic nke Winter na Vancouver, Canada 2010 (Siobhán bụ nwanyị Irish mbụ e nyere ọrụ a na Winter ma ọ bụ Summer Games)
Siphelele bụ aha South Africa nyere
Ndị ama ama nwere aha gụnyere
Siphiwe Gloria Ndlovu (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1977) bụ onye mba Zimbabwe na-ede akwụkwọ na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ ya ma o tolite na obodo Bulawayo
Ọnwa ole na ole ka a mụsịrị ya, ezinụlọ Ndlovu kwagara Sweden dị ka ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ bụkwa ebe a ka ọ nọrọ afọ ndụ ya
Ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara mba United States, wee laghachi Zimbabwe mgbe afọ 1980 gasịrị mgbe mba ahụ nwetara nnwere onwe ya
Ọ gara Girls College ma mesịa gaa US ịga gụọ akwụkwọ mahadum ya na Boston, Massachusetts (Emerson College); Athens, Ohio (Ohio University) na Palo Alto, California (Stanford University)
Ọ nọrọ afọ iri na asatọ na US, tupu o kpebie ịlaghachi Africa ebe ọ bi n'etiti mba South Africa nakwa mba Zimbabwe
Akwụkwọ izizi ya, The Theory of Flight (2018) sochiri The History of Man (2020) n'oge na-adịghị anya
Akwụkwọ abụọ ahụ enwetala otuto, mee ya na ndepụta dị mkpirikpi, ma nweta ebe ndị edemede ha na ụlọ ọrụ ndị a ma ama gburugburu ụwa
E wezụga edemede okike, Ndlovu bụ ọkà mmụta edemede a zụrụ azụ
Ọ bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ihe nkiri ya amalitela na Zanzibar International Film Festival n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Sipho Mangindi Burns-Ncamashe Aa! Zilimbola! (n'afọ 1920 wee rụọ afọ 1996) bụ onye na-ede uri South Africa, onye na-akọ akụkọ mkpirikpi na Xhosa imbongi (onye na-ede abụ otuto)
Ọ bụkwa onye isi nke AmaGwali Xhosa sub-group na Alice

Ọ bụkwa onye ndú nke Ciskei National Unionist Party site na afọ 1972 na n'afọ 1978, naanị onye otu ya nwetara oche na Republic of Ciskei Nation Assembly, ruo 1978 mgbe ọ sonyeere otu Ciskei na-emegide ya, Ciskei Nacional Party nke Chief Justice Mabandla duziri
N'afọ 1979, Ciskei ghọrọ steeti otu pati n'okpuru ọchịchị Lennox Sebe na Burns-Ncamashe nọgidere dị ka otu n'ime ndị otu Ciskei National Assembly
Sipho Burns-Ncamashe bụ onye na-agụ egwú otito na nke Rharhabe Paramaount Chief, Velile Sandile, nna nna nke eze Rharhape Xhosa Eze Maxhob'ayak Canz Sandile Aa! Zanesizwe!
Nwa Burns-Ncamashe bụ Chief Sisanda Sipuxolo Burns- Ncamashe nọchiri ya mgbe ọ nwụsịrị
Nwa ya nwoke nke nta Zolile Burns-Ncamashe bụ ọnụ na-ekwuru ezinụlọ eze AmaRharhabe
Sipho Moyo onye bụ Zimbabwe gùrù maka akụnụba
Ọ bụ 'Onye isi oche nke Cabinet na onye isi ndị ọrụ na Office nke Onye isi ala', na African Development Bank (AfDB)
Ọ bụ Akinwumi Adesina, onye isi oche AfDB họpụtara ya, O weghara ọrụ na 1 Nọvemba 2019
Moyo bụ onye Zimbabwe
O ji nzere mmụta Masters na Development Economics (1989) nakwa Doctorate na Financial Economics (1994), ha abụọ sitere na Mahadum Howard dị na Washington, DC
Tupu ọkwá ya ugbu a, site na 2010 ruo 2015, ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa Africa maka Mgbasa Ozi 'The ONE Campaign' (ONE)
Tupu ọ sonye n'otu ONE, ọ jere ozi afọ irí na asatọ na African Development Bank (AfDB), United Nations (UN) na World Bank

Ọ bụ onye otu Global Agenda Council (Africa) nke World Economic Forum, onye bụbu onye isi ala Tanzania, Jakaya Kikwete họpụtara n'oge na-adịbeghị anya ka ọ nọrọ ọdụ na nyocha nke onwe nke Panel of the Big Results Now (BRN) Initiative
Okwu Dr
Moyo kwuru na One World Media Award emume nke AfDB Women's Rights in Africa Award 2016 bu nke na-enye ndị inyom ọzọ ike na agbamume n'ofe Africa

Na March 2018, akụkọ dị iche iche sitere n'ọnụ ndị ọrụ na ndị bụbu ndị ọrụ kwụrụ maka mmegbu a na emegbu ndị ọrụ n'oge Dr Moyo nọ dika onye isi nchịkwa Africa nke ONE Charity, ebubo a bu nke Dr Moyo gọrọ
Onye isi oche nke otu ọrụ ebere a, Gayle Smith, kwụrụ na nyocha kpughere mmegbu na omume mkparị nye ndị ọrụ n'etiti 2011 na 2015 na ụlọ ọrụ South Africa
Ndị ọrụ ebere ahụ abụbeghị ndị na-atụ ụtụ isi aha na South Africa, n'ihi nke a ndị ọrụ ha si mba ọzọ ga-eji visa njem nlegharị anya we na-arụ ọrụ

Sir Patrick Bijou (amụrụ 1958) bụ onye na-ahụ maka itinye ego na Britain, onye nnọchi anya United Nations na World Peace Tracts, Onye ọka ikpe kachasị elu maka ICJ-ICC, Onye njikwa ego, na onye edemede ebipụtara
Sir Patrick bụ ọkachamara n'ahịa isi obodo ụgwọ, ntinye nke onwe, equities, usoro na azụmaahịa ọdịnihu n'ahịa isi obodo, yana ngwaahịa ahaziri ahazi

Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ ụlọ akụ na-eduga dị ka Wells Fargo, Deutsche Bank, Credit Agricole CIB, Crédit Agricole Corporate na Investment Bank, Merrill Lynch ịkpọ aha ole na ole na dị ka onye na-ere ahịa Wall Street
Onye isi ala Sir Patrick Bijou mụrụ na Georgetown, Guyana, South America
Mgbe ọ dị afọ ise, Sir Patrick na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Britain na ịnakwere agụmakwụkwọ nna ya
Ọ gụchara akwụkwọ praịmarị na Lọndọn wee gụchaa akwụkwọ dị elu, kwagara USA
Onye isi ọchịchị nke China na Hong Kong gbara Sir Patrick akara na 2018 wee nye ya onye Knights Templar maka ụlọ akụ na ọrụ ebere ya
Sir Patrick Bijou malitere ọrụ ya na 1986 dị ka onye na-edeba aha na ụlọ akụ na Wells Fargo
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ afọ anọ n'ebe ahụ, n'oge nke ọ rụrụ ọtụtụ ọrụ na ọ bụ maka ikwado mpụta ngwaahịa ahịa na ahịa ọrụ
Na 1990 ọ ghọrọ T1 Banker maka Wells Fargo ọkachamara na ahịa isi ego ụgwọ, MTNs & Private Placements, na ngwaahịa ahaziri ahazi
A mụrụ Sir Patrick Bijou nye nne Amerindia (Easther) na nna agbụrụ agbụrụ nke Amerindian na Africa (Eric)
Nne nne ya bụ onye Africa si Sekondi-Takoradi na Ghana
Na 2021, HRM Eze Dr Amb
Chukwudi Ihenetu (Eze ndị Igbo nke Ghana)
Sir Patrick na-akwalite ego maka òtù dị iche iche, gụnyere Cancer Support Community na Great Ormond Street Children's Hospital Charity na Creative Society, maka udo ụwa

Sir Patrick Bijou bụ onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ nke 17 na onye na-ere ahịa Wall Street Tier 1, onye nnọchi anya UN na Onye ọka ikpe Ọkachamara Ọchịchị maka International Court of Justice na International Criminal Court, n'etiti ọrụ ndị ọzọ dị elu
A na-ele ya anya dị ka otu n'ime ndị ọkachamara na-eme nke ọma na ntinye nkeonwe, nha nha nhata onwe, itinye ego na ngwaahịa a haziri ahazi
Sir Patrick jisiri ike na tọrọ ntọala Tiger Fund nke nwetara nloghachi kwa afọ nke 30% site na 1988 ruo 2002
Ọ na-anọgide na-abụ onye ndụmọdụ na onye ndụmọdụ na gọọmentị, ụlọ akụ, ụlọ akụ ụwa na ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ ma na-enye ndụmọdụ ya na ọrụ ntinye ego na SMEs
na ego oru ngo
Ekwenyere Sir Patrick Bijou na ọ bara uru ego akọwapụtaghị, mana atụmatụ akụ na ụba ya dị ọtụtụ ijeri dị ka nke 2021, ma enyela ihe karịrị $ 50 nde maka ọrụ ebere
Ọtụtụ n'ime ego ahụ agaala iji kwado mmemme mmụta na ahụike, mbọ ndị ruuru mmadụ, na ịkwalite ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya

N'ime afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, o nyela ego iji mepụta ndị ọrụ na South America, ebe o guzobela akụrụngwa, ụlọ ọgwụ, nlekọta ahụike na ụlọ akwụkwọ maka ụmụ amaala Amazonian India na ebe nchekwa nne ya nwụrụ anwụ, Ista onye Amerindian n'onwe ya
Sir Shina Peters (amụrụ ya na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri atọ nke ọnwa Mee n'afo 1958) bụ onye egwu Jùjú nke Naijiria
A mụrụ Oluwashina Akanbi Peters na Ogun State, ọrụ Peters n'egwú malitere mgbe ọ dị obere mgbe ya na ndị enyi ya kụrụ egwu n'okpuru Olushina na ụmụnne ya iri na abụọ
Mgbe ya na ndị enyi ya nọ na-egwuri egwu, ọ kụziiri onwe ya otu esi akpọ piano ma mesịa sonye n'òtù Ebenezer Obey
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ hapụrụ òtù Obey wee sonye n'òtù General Prince Adekunle dị ka onye na-akpọ ụbọ
Ndị otu Adekunle na-egwuri egwu na họtel Lagos dị ka Western Hotel, Palm Beach Hotel na Executive Hotel
Mgbe Adekunle na-arịa ọrịa, oge ụfọdụ Peter na -agu egwu Ọ hapụrụ Adekunle iji guzobe Shina Adewale, otu egwu ya na Segun Adegale
Otú ọ dị, ha abụọ kewara n'oge na-adịghị anya
Mgbe Shina Peter na Segun Adewale weputachara ọtụtụ abọm n'ime afọ 1980, ọ gara n'ihu guzobe otu egwu nke ya, 'Sir Shina Petersburg & His International Stars'
Peters bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na 'Money Power', ihe ngosi nke Ola Balogun mepụtara
Ọ zutere ma malite mmekọrịta ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Clarion Chukwura n'oge a
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere nwa nwoke, Clarence Peters
Sir Shina Peters na ndị egwu ya bụ International Stars wepụtara abọm mbụ ha Ace (Afro-Juju Series 1) n'afọ 1989
Abọm ahụ, nke e wepụtara n'okpuru CBS Records nke Naịjirịa, gara platinum okpukpu abụọ
'Ace,' nke Laolu Akins mepụtara, bụ ngwakọta egwu dị n'etiti Juju na Afrobeat
Ụdị egwu Afro juju na-agwakọta ngwa ngwa na iji keyboard eletrọniki, saxophone na guitar
Ụfọdụ n'ime okwu ndị dị na abọm ahụ karịsịa na 'Ijo Shina' dị oke egwu n' oge ahụ
Abọm ahụ gara n'ihu nwetalu Peter ihe onyinye nke gụnyere onye na-ese ihe na abọm nke Afọ na Naịjiria Musical Awards
Ọ sochiri 'Ace' na 'Shinamania'; abọm ahụ nwere egwu dịka 'Oluwa Yo Pese', 'Omo Bo' da 'Give Our Women Chance'

O nwekwara nwa amaala Slovak
Abụ ahụ na-gosipụta ihe oyoyo ịhụnanya nke ndị na-agba ịnyịnya, ndị agha na ndị nchọpụta
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, n'ịkọ akụkọ banyere ndị Ismaili Siria nke oge Mamluk, a na-egosipụta Banu Ismaïl, ụmụ ụmụ nke ŌAli, dịka ihe atụ nke nsọpụrụ na ikpe ziri ezi

Obotuke Timothy Ochuko Sirbalo, onye ejikwa Sirbalo mara ma ọbụ Sirbalo Clinic (amụru n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa March n'afọ 1992) bụ onye na-eme ịhe nkiri ndị Naijiria, onye na-akpa ọchị na onye na-ede blọgụ
A mụrụ Sirbalo na Warri, Delta Steeti, Naijiria
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Kọleji Gọọmentị Etiti dị na Idoanị ya na Mahadum nke Lagos Steeti
Sirbalo malitere ndezi-akwụkwọ na Nollywood n'afọ 2014 ma bụrụ kwa Onye-Nduzi mmetụta pụrụ iche
Sirbalo batara n'ịhe mmemme ịkpa ọchị na afọ 2016 dịka Onye-Ndezi na Onye-Nduzi
Ọ malitere ịme ịhe nkiri n'afọ 2017
A maara ya nke ọma na isonye ịme ịhe nkiri Nollywood gara nke ọma dịka Okafor's Law(2017), Bling Lagosians(2019)
Ọ nwere ọwa YouTube ise na Otu nde ndị ndebanye aha
Ọ nwere nde 75 ndị na-eso ụzọ na Facebook
A kacha mara ya maka 'Sirbalo and Bae' na kwa 'Mallen College'
Sirbalo ugbu a bụ otu n'ime ndị na-akpa ọchị bara ọgaranya na Naijiria
Sirron Norris bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe osise, onye na-ese mgbidi, na onye nkuzi nka

A maara ya màkà ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi telivishọn FOX animated Bob's Burgers na màkà ọtụtụ ihe osise ọha na eze, gụnyere ndị dị na Balmy Alley, Clarion Alley, na Mission Dolores Park, na gallery gbụrụ-gbúrụ San Francisco
Ihe osise ya na-agụnyekarị ozi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, isiokwu obodo, na akara ya na-acha anụnụ anụnụ
Ọ rụkọtara ọrụ na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ na-enweghị uru, gụnyere SPUR na El
Ụlọ ọrụ na gallery Norris dị na Mission District, San Francisco
Norris was born in Cleveland, Ohio
He is from a Black family, and has cited in interviews how living in the Midwest was a difficult experience
Norris gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Art Institute nke Pittsburgh wee si Pittsburgh kwaga San Francisco na 1997
Norris malitere ise ihe osise na 1999 dị ka ụzọ isi kpọsaa ọrụ ya
Ihe osise mbụ ya dị n'èzí ụlọ ahịa dị n'akụkụ 20th na Bryant Street
Tupu nke a, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ndị na-ese ihe nkírí egwuregwu vidio ma ọ nweghị ọzụzụ ọ bụla na eserese murals
Norris mepụtara ihe ngosi màkà San Francisco Public Library Summer Read SF program na 2012
N'afọ 2000, ọ bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na De Young Museum
N'afọ 2002, ọ bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na Yerba Buena Center for the Arts
N'afọ 2005, ọ nọrọ ọnwa atọ dị ka onye na-ese ihe na Recology
N'afọ 2017, ọ natara 'Greater Bay Area Journalism Award' màkà 'Kaepernick' na El Tecolote, akụkụ nke usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya na-aga n'ihu nkè akpọrọ 'Cityfruit'

Western Saịladia na-etiti n'etiti Burkina na Tuluwng Sasala

Sefora Hixsonia 'Sisi' Ntombela (amụrụ n'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1957) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa bụ onye isi ala nke isii nke Free State na onye otu Free State Provincial Legislature
Ọ rụburu ọrụ dị ka Free State MEC maka Cooperative Governance na Traditional Affairs and Human Settlements
Ọ bụkwa Free State MEC for Social Development
Ntombela bụ osote onye isi oche nke African National Congress Women's League na onye na-ahụ maka akụ nke Free State ANC
Otu n'ime ụmụ isii, a mụrụ Sefora Hixsonia Ntombela na obere obodo ọrụ ugbo nke Tweeling na Free State
E nyere ya aha njirimara 'Sisi' mgbe ọ dị obere
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Tweeling Combine School ma banye na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Kganyeng
Ọ gara n'ihu gụọ akwụkwọ na Bonamelo Training College wee laghachi na Tweeling Combine School dị ka onye nkuzi
N'ihi ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị egwu n'oge ahụ, ọ kụziiri ụmụ akwụkwọ ya na nzuzo banyere Nelson Mandela
Otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ ahụ bụ nwa onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ ma kọọrọ ya maka nkuzi nzuzo
Ọ hapụrụ ọrụ nkuzi n'ihi okwu ahụ
Ntombela rụrụ ọrụ na Ngalaba Ahụike dị ka onye na-eme atụmatụ ezinụlọ na onye ndụmọdụ ndị ntorobịa
Ka oge na-aga, Ntombela ghọrọ onye otu African National Congress ma họpụta ya dịka onyeisi oche nke Tweeling African National Congress Women's League branch
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ ghọrọ Onye isi oche mpaghara
Mgbe ntuli aka nke afọ 1994 gasịrị, a họpụtara Ntombela ka ọ bụrụ onye isi obodo Tweeling ma jee ozi n'ọkwa ahụ ruo mgbe a họpụtara ya na Free State Provincial Legislature na 1999
Ọ nọgidere na ndị omeiwu ruo mgbe a họpụtara ya na National Assembly na 2001
Ọ laghachiri na ndị omeiwu mpaghara na 2004 ma kpọọ aha ya dịka Onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Social Development na Health Portfolio
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2009, onye isi ala Free State a họpụtara ọhụrụ bụ Ace Magashule kwupụtara na Ntombela ga-ewere ọkwa MEC maka mmepe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
A họpụtara Ntombela ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke African National Congress Women's League n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2015
Magashule gbanwere ndị isi ya n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2016 wee họpụta Ntombela ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ahụ maka ọchịchị na ọdịnala na ebe obibi mmadụ nke ndị isi
Na Machị 2018, African National Congress họpụtara Ntombela ka ọ nọchie Ace Magashule dị ka onye isi ala nke Free State
Ọ malitere ọrụ na 27 Machị 2018 wee bụrụ nwanyị nke anọ bụ onye isi ala nke mpaghara ahụ
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Treasurer nke alaka Free State ANC na Mee 2018
Mgbe ntuli aka nke Mee 2019 gasịrị, African National Congress kwupụtara na ọ nọgidere na Ntombela n'ọkwa ya dị ka onye isi ala nke Free State
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a n'oge zuru ezu nke malitere na 22 Mee 2019
Ntombela lụrụ onye omeiwu ANC, Madala Louis David Ntombela
Ọ chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa COVID-19 n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2020

Sister Charity (Ezi aha Kobutungi Charity) bụ onye na-ese egwu na onye TV n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ Uganda
Ọ na-egosi ihe ngosi ụtụtụ (Sisimuka) na TV ọdịda anyanwụ na Mbarara, Uganda
A maara ya nke ọma maka ịgụ egwu ya nke afọ 2001 bụ Grade
Ọ na-abụkarị abụ n'asụsụ ala ya bụ Runyankole na Luganda na Bekee
E depụtara ya n'etiti ndị na-ese ihe kachasị mma si ọdịda anyanwụ Uganda n'akụkụ ụzọ Julina Kanyomozi, Ray G,Angella Katatumba na Toniks na Hi Pipo
Ọ malitere ịbụ abụ na otu akpọrọ TYE (Train the youth effort) band na afọ 2000
Charity sonyeere Rays Band nke Rasta Charz nwere, nke ya na ya na-eme
O nyekwara aka na ọrụ Am A Uganda site n'iweta ozi ya n'abụ akpọrọ 'Ndi Omunya Uganda' abụ nke ya na Santana onye na-akwado ya na ihe nkiri odida anyanwu na onye egwu
Sister Charity nwere abọm itoolu na ndị a gụnyere Grade, Omufumbo, Pound, Choice, Nkyalimbooko, Jambuura na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime abụ ndị a dị n'asụsụ obodo ya (Runyankole) ma e wezụga ụfọdụ ole na ole nke dị na asụsụ Luganda na Bekee
N'afọ Sister Charity was announced as a presenter for the morning show (Sisimuka) on Vision Group's TV West in Mbarara where she works until now
A mụrụ ya na abalị asaa na onwa Juun nke afọ1980 nye Maazị na Oriakụ
Enoth Buriita n'ime ezinụlọ nwere ụmụ isii ma ọ bụ onye nke abụọ a mụrụ

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Rweibaare Primary school, Rweibaare Secondary school, gukwa na Train The youth Effort (TYE) maka ọkwa dị elu ma mesịa sonye na Mbarara Business School (MBI) ebe ọ nwetara UNEB Dip na Accountancy Ọ lụrụ onye ndụmọdụ ya bụ Rasta Charz mana ọ gbara alụkwaghịm n'afọ 2013 na-ekwu maka enweghị nkwanye ùgwù na mmekọrịta ha

Ụmụnna nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri na Television (SWIFT) bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-abụghị nke South Africa hiwere na 2016 iji kwalite nha anya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na-achịkwa akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nwoke na inye ohere maka ụmụ nwanyị ịkwalite na ịkparịta ụka n'etiti ibe ha
KwaZulu-Natal Film Commission bụ onye na-akwado nzukọ a
SWIFT tọrọ ntọala na 2016 n'oge Durban International Film Festival, ya na onye na-ese ihe nkiri na onye mmepụta Sara Blecher dị ka onye nchoputa
Òtù ahụ na-eme ka ndị mmadụ mara ihe mgbochi dị iche iche nke ụmụ nwanyị na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri telivishọn na-eche ihu
N'afọ 2017, nzukọ ahụ bipụtara nchọpụta nke chọpụtara na ihe karịrị ụzọ abụọ n'ime ụzọ atọ nke ụmụ nwanyị a gbara ajụjụ ọnụ ka a kpagburu ma ọ bụ kpagbuo n'ebe ọrụ na-amaghị
N'ihi ya, SWIFT malitere mgbasa ozi #ThatsNotOkay, nke na-eji vidiyo na-eme ka ndị mmadụ mara banyere mwakpo mmekọahụ na ime ihe ike mmekọahụ na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri
Ọzọkwa, nzukọ ahụ hibere ụkpụrụ omume nke ya, nke ndị otu ndị ọzọ nọ na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri na-esochi ya
Òtù Na-emepụta Independent Producers Organisation (IPO) emeela ka koodu ahụ bụrụ iwu maka ndị otu ya niile
Otu n'ime ebumnobi SWIFT bụ iguzobe ụkpụrụ iwu yiri ya
SWIFT zigara ndị nnọchi anya ndị nwanyị South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri na Berlinale na nke mbụ na 2018
De Rucci Healthy Sleep Co
(Chinese 慕思; ) bụ ụlọ ọrụ matarasị na China, nke nwere isi na Dongguan, Guangdong
Lin Jiyong na Wang Bingkun guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 2004
Ọfịs mbụ ya dị na Dongguan
O nwere ụlọ ahịa 4,200 na China na 2020, yana ụlọ ngosi dị iche iche na mpụga China
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ahịa ya n'afọ ahụ bụ $ 690 nde US dollar
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2022 ọ natara nlebara anya mgbasa ozi maka iji nwoke sitere na ndị nna Europe na mgbasa ozi ya dị ka ihe nkedo, na ngosipụta nke ihe bụ ọrụ ihu
Nwoke ahụ kwetara ikwe ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ jiri ihu ya mee ihe ruo mgbe ebighi ebi na 2009
N'afọ 2021, China Daily katọrọ ojiji a na-eji ihu ya eme ihe iji tụọ aro mmalite na-abụghị nke China maka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Onye dere edemede ahụ, Zhang Zhouxiang, kwuru 'Ma ofufe kpuru ìsì dị otú ahụ enweghị ike na China ugbu a na ọ ghọwo akụ na ụba nke abụọ kachasị n'ụwa'

David Fickling nke Bloomberg News kwuru na ojiji nke nwoke sitere na Europe na akara sitere na Europe gosipụtara ịdị ala dị n'ime China, nke yiri nke ndị mmadụ na Japan nwere n'etiti narị afọ nke 20, tupu ịrị elu nke akụ na ụba Japan
Sithembiso Gile Gladys Nyoni (amụrụ na 20 Septemba na afo 1949) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Zimbabwe na onye bụbu Minista nke Mmepe Obere na Obere
Ọ bụ minista na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na ndị ntorobịa
Na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke Machị 2008, a họpụtara Nyoni ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchiteanya ZANU-PF na Nkayi North
O nwetara vootu 4,634 megide 4,234 maka Moyo Talent nke Movement for Democratic Change (MDC)-Mutambara na 1,075 maka Mlilo Thembinkosi nke MDC-Tsvangirai
The Herald kọrọ na Jenụwarị ogugu 3, 2009, na a chụpụrụ Nyoni na Cabinet na mbido izu ahụ, ya na ndị minista 11 ndị ọzọ, n'ihi na ọ nweghịzi oche ọ bụla na Parliament
N'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2017, onye isi ala Emmerson Mnangagwa họpụtara ndị isi ọhụrụ, Cde Sithembiso Nyoni ghọrọ Minista ọhụrụ nke ụmụ nwanyị na ndị ntorobịa
Ọ nọ na ndepụta mmachibido iwu nke United States site na na afo 2003 ruo na afo 2014
