Sofia Pernas (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị 31, ọnwa Julaị, afọ 1989) bụ onye America na-eme ihe nkiri nke Moroccan-Spanish nke bi na Los Angeles ugbu a
Ọ pụtara na usoro NBC The Brave ma ugbu a na-apụta na usoro CBS Blood & Treasure
Pernas kwagara United States mgbe ọ dị afọ ise ma too na Orange County, California
Nne ya si Morocco, ebe nna ya si Spain; ha abụọ na-asụ ọtụtụ asụsụ
N'ihi ya, ọ na-asụ asụsụ anọ Arabic, English, Spanish na German
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-eme atụmatụ na mbụ maka ọrụ n'akwụkwọ akụkọ, a tụgharịrị ya gaa n'ọrụ n'ịme ihe ngosi na ime nkiri mgbe a nyochara ya
Pernas mere Marisa Sierras na The Young and the Restless site n'afọ 2015 ruo 2017, wee pụta na telenovela Jane the Virgin site n'afọ 2016 ruo 2017
Ọ pụtara dịka Hannah Rivera na usoro NBC The Brave site n'afọ 2017 ruo 2018, ma kemgbe afọ 2019 ọ na-eme Lexi Vaziri na usoro CBS Blood & Treasure
Pernas malitere ịchị ọwị onye ya na ya na-arụkọ ọrụ The Young and the Restless bụ Justin Hartley n'ọnwa Mee 2020
Ha lụrụ n'ọnwa Machị 2021
Sofiane Feghouli ( Arabic ; amụrụ ya na 26 Disemba 1989) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ nke na-agbara otu Süper Lig nke Turkey Galatasaray na ndị otu mba Algeria
Ọ na
-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye etiti aka nri, mana ọ pụkwara igwu egwu dị ka winger na dị ka onye na-awakpo etiti
Feghouli mere egwuregwu izizi ya na mba Algeria na Febụwarị 2012
Ọ nọchitere anya Algeria na 2013, 2015, 2019 na 2021 Africa Cup of Nations (mmeri asọmpi 2019), yana 2014 FIFA World Cup, ebe o nyere goolu mbụ nke Algeria na asọmpi ahụ kemgbe 1986
A mụrụ Feghouli na Levallois-Perret ebe nne na nna ya bụ dị Algeria
Nna ya si Tiaret, ebe nne ya si Ghazaouet
O nwere ụmụnne nwoke anọ
Feghouli malitere ọrụ ya na Grenoble, mgbe ndị otu France Paris Saint-Germain kpebiri ịghara ịbanye ya mgbe ikpe gasịrị
Maka akụkụ ikpeazụ nke oge 2006–2007 , a kwalitere ya na ndị otu egwuregwu mbụ ma nye ya uwe nọmba 33
O mere egwuregwu izizi ya nke a tụrụ anya ya nke ukwuu, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, maka klọb ahụ na 27 Eprel 2007 na egwuregwu Ligue 2 megide Reims, na-apụta dị ka onye nnọchi
Grenoble meriri egwuregwu ahụ 1–0
Ọ pụtara ugboro abụọ ọzọ n'oge ahụ, gụnyere mmalite mbụ ya n'ụbọchị egwuregwu ikpeazụ nke oge ahụ megide Montpellier na 25 Mee 2007
Montpellier meriri egwuregwu ahụ 1–0 na Feghouli na-egwu nkeji iri ise na isii tupu ewepụ ya
Na 31 Mee 2007, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọkachamara mbụ ya na Grenoble, na-edebe ya n'akụkụ ahụ ruo 2010
N'oge na-esonụ, e nyere ya uwe ọnụ ọgụgụ asatọ ma, n'agbanyeghị na ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, e nyere ya ọrụ dị mkpa na ndị otu egwuregwu mbụ

N'agbanyeghị na enwere nrụgide nke ịbụ onye a kpọrọ 'Zidane ọhụrụ', onyinye ya nye ndị otu ahụ gara nke ọma, na-apụta na egwuregwu iri abụọ na asaa ma na-enye goolu atọ, na-enyere Grenoble aka inweta nkwalite na Ligue 1
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ mbụ ya bịara na 18 Jenụwarị 2008 na mmeri 4-3 megide Reims, klọb ọ chere ihu na mbido ya
Feghouli laghachiri maka oge 2009-10, na-eme nke mbụ ya na 29 August 2009 na mmeri 1–0 nke Rhône-Alpes rivals Saint-Étienne
Mgbe ọ pụtara na egwuregwu ise ọzọ, ndị isi Grenoble chọpụtara na Feghouli adọwaala meniscus n'ikpere aka nri ya
A wara ikpere ahụ nke ọma n'ọnwa Ọktoba
Mgbe ịwa ahụ gasịrị, ndị isi Grenoble, ọkachasị onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Pierre Wantiez, katọrọ onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ nke ukwuu

Wantiez jụrụ ogologo oge Feghouli na-egbu oge n'ịlaghachi na otu ahụ na ebumnobi onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ banyere mbugharị dịka Feghouli ga-apụ na nkwekọrịta n'oge ọkọchị ma na-agwa ọtụtụ klọb okwu, ọkachasị klọb Valencia nke Spain
Wantiez kwuru na ọ bụ 'ndụmọdụ ọjọọ' sitere n'aka onye ọrụ onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ mere ihe Feghouli mere n'oge na-adịbeghị anya
Na 20 Mee 2010, Feghouli bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ anọ na Valencia CF
O mere La Liga mbụ ya na 25 Septemba, dochie Juan Mata na mmeri 2–0 megide Sporting de Gijón
N'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2011, mgbe ọ pụtara obere maka ndị otu Valencian, a gbazinyere Feghouli na otu egwuregwu UD Almería, ruo ọnwa Juun
Ọ na-apụta mgbe niile maka ndị Andalusia, mana ha kwụsịrị na njedebe nke oge ahụ

Mgbe o si mba Almería lọta, ma rite uru site na ọpụpụ Mata na Vicente, Feghouli ghọrọ onye mbido, ma nye goolu mbụ ya maka Los Che na 29 Ọktoba 2011, na-enweta ihe nkedo na mmeri 3-1 n'ụlọ megide Getafe CF
Ngosipụta ya maka Valencia n'afọ 2012 mere ka ọ nweta ihe nrite abụọ nke onye egwuregwu Algeria nke afọ, Le Buteur's Algerian Ballon d'Or na DZFoot d'Or
Na 11 Eprel 2016, klọb ahụ kwụsịrị Feghouli n'etiti akụkọ ọ jụrụ isonye na ikpo ọkụ mgbe mmeri 2–1 meriri Sevilla n'ụlọ n'ụbọchị gara aga
A kọkwara na ọ tụfuru ọzụzụ ụbọchị ole na ole gara aga
Ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ Valencia ya na egwuregwu 202, na-enye goolu ugboro 31 ma na-enye aka 40
Na 14 June 2016, a mara ọkwa na Feghouli ga-esonyere West Ham United na 1 July 2016 na nkwekọrịta afọ atọ

O mere nke mbụ ya na West Ham na 28 Julaị na mmeri 2–1 na NK Domžale na agba nke atọ nke Europa League O nyere goolu asọmpi mbụ ya maka West Ham n'izu sochirinụ na nlọghachi megide Domžale, egwuregwu mbụ West Ham na London Stadium nke West Ham meriri 3–0, na-aga n'ihu na UEFA Europa League play-offs

Feghouli malitere Premier League mbụ ya na egwuregwu mbụ nke West Ham n'afọ 2017, na-anata kaadị uhie siri ike mgbe nkeji iri na ise gasịrị maka ịma aka na onye na-agbachitere Manchester United bụ Phil Jones na mmeri 2–0 n'ụlọ
Mgbe West Ham rịọrọ arịrịọ megide kaadị ahụ, a kagburu ya na 4 Jenụwarị
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2017, Feghouli bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ ise na Galatasaray
Galatasaray kwụrụ West Ham nde euro 425 maka mbufe
Feghouli tozuru oke maka Algeria na France
Feghouli ekwuola na mmasị ya bụ igwu egwu maka France ma pụta n'ọtụtụ ndị otu ndị ntorobịa France
N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2008, onye njikwa otu mba Raymond Domenech depụtara onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ maka ndị otu ya tupu ahọpụtara tupu egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Uruguay
N'agbanyeghị nke a, onye njikwa otu mba Algeria bụ Rabah Saadane kpọtụrụ Feghouli site na ekwentị iji mee ka ọ gbara mba Algeria bọọlụ na egwuregwu enyi na enyi nke otu ahụ na 19 November megide Mali
Onye isi otu Yazid Mansouri kpọtụkwara onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ
N'ụbọchị iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2011, a kọrọ na, mgbe ọ na-agbazinye ego na Almeria, Feghouli zutere Onye isi oche nke Algeria Football Federation Mohamed Raouraoua
Feghouli kwetara igwu egwu maka Algeria ma kpọọ ya ka ọ gaa n'ogige ọzụzụ a na-eme na Spain maka egwuregwu megide Morocco
O nweghị ike ịga nnọkọ ahụ, mana mmegharị ahụ metụrụ ya n'ahụ, na-ekweta na ọ ga-adị maka egwuregwu Tanzania kama

N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2011, ndị Algeria Football Federation kwupụtara na FIFA nabatara arịrịọ Feghouli ka ọ gbanwee ntụkwasị obi site na France gaa Algeria, nakwa na o ruru eru ịnọchite anya Algeria na asọmpi mba ụwa na ụbọchị ahụ
Ụbọchị abụọ ka e mesịrị, na 25 Ọktoba, onye nkuzi Algeria Vahid Halilhodžić kpọrọ Feghouli maka egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Tunisia na Cameroon na Nọvemba
N'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2012, Feghouli mere nke mbụ ya maka ndị otu mba Algeria na mmeri 2–1 Africa Cup of Nations ruru eru megide Gambia, na-enye goolu mmeri
N'oge iru eru maka 2014 FIFA World Cup, o nyere goolu atọ na mpụta asaa maka Les Fennecs
N'egwuregwu mmeghe nke otu ahụ na 2014 World Cup, mmeri 2–1 nke Belgium na Belo Horizonte, Feghouli nyere goolu ntaramahụhụ - goolu mbụ nke Algeria na World Cup n'ime afọ 28
N'ụzọ dị ịtụnanya, e wepụrụ ya na ndị otu iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 2017

Sofiat Arinola Obanishola (ka amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 16 n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2003) bụ onye egwuregwu badminton na Naijiria
O sonyere na nnukwu ihe omume badminton na mpaghara na mba ụwa

N'ihe omume nke obere, o ritere ọla ọcha na ngwakọta abụọ, na ọla nchara abụọ na ụmụ agbọghọ abụọ na ihe omume otu na 2018 Algiers African Youth Games Obanishola sonyeziri na 2019 Rabat African Games nke emere na Casablanca, Morocco, ma nyere ndị otu Naịjirịa aka inweta nrite ọla edo, nwetakwara ọla nchara na mmemme ụmụ nwanyị

Ugboro abụọ nke ụmụagbọghọ

Sofie Junge Pedersen (amụrụ 24 Eprel 1992) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Danish nke na-egwu egwuregwu bọọlụ Juventus nke Italian Serie A yana maka otu mba Danish
Ọ gbara egwu na mbụ maka IK Skovbakken na Fortuna Hjørring nke Danish Elitedivisionen, nke ikpeazụ ya bụ onyeisi, yana maka FC Rosengård na Swedish Damallsvenskan
Junge Pedersen gbara IK Skovbakken ruo 2011 tupu ọ kwaga Fortuna Hjørring
Skovbakken emeela Junge Pedersen na nwa okorobịa ibe ya Pernille Harder nwere nkwekọrịta n'ime ndị egwuregwu n'April 2010, iji kwado ikike ha pụrụ iche
Na June 2015, Junge Pedersen bịanyere aka na FC Rosengård, mgbe ọ masịrị ndị mmeri Sweden Damallsvenskan mgbe ha na Fortuna Hjørring na-egwu megide ha na UEFA Women's Champions League
N'oge ya na Rosengård, Junge nwere nnukwu mmerụ ahụ nke mere ka ọ ghara igwu egwu maka oge 2016 dum
Na 2017, FC Rosengård họọrọ ịghara imeghari nkwekọrịta ya wee bịanye aka na Levante UD na Spanish Primera División
Na njedebe nke nkwekọrịta ya na Levante na July 2018, Junge laghachiri Damallsvenskan ebe o debanyere Vittsjö GIK
Na Disemba 2018, Junge bịanyere aka na Juventus Women na Italy
Na mmalite 2008 FIFA U-17 iko mba ụwa nke ụmụ nwanyị na New Zealand, Junge Pedersen so na otu Denmark meriri otu ha tupu ha rie 4–0 n'aka ndị mmeri North Korea n'ikpeazụ na nkeji iri na ise
Na Disemba 2011, Junge Pedersen meriri na mpụta mbụ mba ụwa, mmeri 4–0 meriri Chile na São Paulo
Akpọrọ ya aha na onye nchịkwa mba Kenneth Heiner-Møller 's Denmark otu maka UEFA Women's Euro 2013
Na 2017, a kpọrọ ya aha na Nils Nielsen 'squad for UEFA Women's Euro 2017 nke hụrụ ka ọ na-egwu oge na njedebe ikpeazụ megide Netherlands na-esote Line Sigvardsen Jensen 's ACL mmerụ ahụ
N'ịbụ onye na-agba bọọlụ, Junge Pedersen bụ onye ọgụgụ isi na-agụkarị nke na-akọwapụta dị ka onye na- elekọta mmadụ
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ football ya na akwụkwọ mahadum ọ na-arụ ọrụ ebere na mmepe na Africa
Sofiene Chaari (31 Julaị 1962 -22 Ọgọst 2011) bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri nke a ma ama maka ọrụ ya nke Sbouï na sitcom Choufli Hal (2005- 2009)
Ọ bụ nwa Habib Chaari, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri nke nyeere ya aka ịmalite ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri tupu ọ tụgharịa na telivishọn

O bu ụzọ kpọọ egwu na Mnamet Aaroussia, At Azaïez na The Hotel tupu ọ bụrụ onye a maara nke ọma dịka Sbouï na Choufli Hal, usoro ihe nkiri TV nke Tunisia nke gosipụtara site n'afọ 2005 ruo 2009 n'oge Ramadan
Ọ gbara egwu n'akụkụ Mouna Nourredine na Kamel Touati
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ nọgidere na-ewu ewu na ọrụ ya nke Hsouna na Nsibti Laaziza nke gosipụtara na Nessma TV
O gosipụtakwara ihe ngosi TV nke ya bụ Sofiene Show nke gosipụtara site n'afọ 2009 ruo 2010
N'akụkụ ọrụ TV ya, ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ihe nkiri na Saâdoun 28 na The Marechal
O nwetara ihe nrite onye isi ala n'afọ 2005 tupu ọ nwụọ na La Marsa, Tunisia, site na ọrịa obi mgbe ọ dị afọ 49
Soham El Wardini (Amụrụ n'afọ a 1953) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Senegal na onye bụbu onye isi obodo Dakar, Senegal
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi obodo nke Dakar mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị na osote onye isi obodo mbụ nke obodo ahụ
A mụrụ Wardini n'afọ 1953 n'ime ime obodo Latmingué, Kaolack Region, Senegal
A mụrụ ya na ụmụnne ya iri n'aka nne Senegalese na nna Lebanọn
Mgbe nna ya nwụsịrị, ezinụlọ ya kwagara n'obodo Kaolack, ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Bekee na Mahadum Cheikh Anta Diop (nke bụ Mahadum Dakar n'oge ahụ) ma kụzie na kọleji dị iche iche
Soheir Ramzi (amụrụ na 3 Maachị 1950) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
Nne ya bụ Dorreya Ahmed bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Oge mbụ Ramzi pụtara na sinima bu mgbe ọ dị ihe dị ka afọ isii, site na mpụta ha na ihe nkiri 'Sahefet Sawaba' na 1956, mana o kpebiri ịkwụsị
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eje ozi na ụgbọelu ma mesịa bụrụ onye nlereanya
Ọ laghachiri na ihe nkiri na 1969
Ramzi rụrụ ọrụ na Elnas elly Gwa, Pleasure and Suffering, The Guilty, A Girl Named Mahmoud, Chitchat on the Nile
Ọrụ ikpeazụ ọ rụrụ bụ na usoro Habeeb El Roh na 2006, ọ na-eyi hijab ma laa ezumike nká mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị
Ramzi lụrụ di ọtụtụ ugboro
Di mbụ ya bụ onye na-ese ihe bụ Ibrahim Khan, onye ya na ya biri otu afọ
Ọ lụkwara Prince Saudi Khalid bin Saud bin Abdulaziz Al Saud, onye a ma ama maka ọtụtụ alụmdi na nwunye ya na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ma soro ya nọrọ otu afọ, mgbe ahụ ha kewara
Ọ lụrụ onye ọchụnta ego Ijipt, onye nwe Al-Masry SC, Sayed Motwali, onye ọchụnta ego Kuwait Mohamad Al Mula onye ya na ya biri ọnwa ise

Ọ lụkwara onye na-ede egwu Hilmi Bakr, onye e nyere ihe ùgwù iji kwado ikike ya, mana ọ dịrịghị ogologo oge n'ebe ọ bụ na ihe kpatara ịgba alụkwaghịm ha nọ na ọrụ nke nnọchiteanya mgbe alụmdi na nwunye nke were afọ anọ gasịrị
Ọ lụkwara Farouk Al-Fishawy
Ugbu a ọ lụrụ onye ọchụnta ego Ijipt Alaa Sharbini
Soheir Zaki (Arabic سهير زكي, amụrụ na Mansoura, Egypt na Jenụwarị 4, 1945) bụ onye Egypt na-agba egwu afọ na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ pụtara na ihe karịrị ihe nkiri otu narị nke ndị Ijipt site na 1960s ruo 1980s
A mụrụ Soheir Zaki na Mansoura, Egypt na Jenụwarị 4, 1945
Mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu, nne na nna ya kpọgara ezinụlọ ya Alexandria
Nna ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị obere, nke mere ka nne ya lụọ di ọzọ
Nna nna ya mechara bụrụ onye njikwa ya
Zaki bu ụzọ mụta otú e si agba egwú site n'ile ihe nkiri ndị gosipụtara Taheyya Kariokka na Samia Gamal
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-agba egwu n'agbamakwụkwọ na Alexandria
Onye na-emepụta telivishọn bụ Mohammed Salem hụrụ ya ka ọ na-agba egwú wee kpebie ịmalite ya dị ka onye na-egosi na telivishọn Ịjipt
Otú ọ dị, o gosipụtara nkà dị ka onye na-agba egwú ma bụrụ onye a maara maka ngosipụta ya na ihe ngosi dị ka Adwoua El-Madina
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gara na-apụta na ihe nkiri ndị Ijipt
Ọ rụrụ obere ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ya, na-elekwasị anya na ịgba egwú
N'ajụjụ ọnụ, o kwuru na Nagua Fouad bụ 'onye mmegide kachasị' ya n'oge ahụ
Zaki na-emekwa ihe ugboro ugboro na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ abalị ndị Ijipt, ọkachasị na Nile Hilton Hotel na Cairo
N'afọ 1964, ọ ghọrọ onye mbụ na-agba egwú afọ iji gbaa egwú Umm Kulthum mgbe ọ na-agba 'Inta Omri'
N'oge ọrụ ya, Zaki gbara egwu maka ọtụtụ ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, nke gụnyere Anwar Sadat, Gamal Abdel Nasser na Richard Nixon
Ọ lara ezumike nká na 1992, ọ bụ ezie na o mechara kụzie ịgba egwú afọ na Raqia Hassan's Egyptian Academy of Oriental Dance na Cairo
Ọ lụrụ onye Egypt na-ese ihe nkiri bụ Mohamed Emara
Ọ mụrụ nwa ha nwoke Hamada na 1987
Soheir Al Bably (14 Febụwarị 1937 - 21 Nọvemba 2021) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gara Institute of Theatrical Arts
Ọ pụtara n'egwuregwu Madrast Al-Mushaghebeen na 1973, nakwa n'ihe ngosiputa nke ndụ Raya na Sakina na 1985
O so onye na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama bụ Salah Zulfikar mee ọtụtụ ihe nkiri
Ọ lụrụ di ugboro ise, di ya nke abụọ bụ Mounir Mourad
Sokari Douglas Camp CBE (a mụrụ n'afọ 1958 na Naịjirịa) bụ onye na-ese ihe na London nke nwere ihe ngosi n'ụwa niile ma bụrụ onye natara bursary site na Henry Moore Foundation
A kwanyeere ya ùgwù dịka onye ọchịagha nke Order nke Ọchịchị British Empire (CBE) na 2005 Birthday Honours list
A mụrụ Camp na Buguma, Nigeria, obodo Kalabari na Niger Delta
Ọ bụ nwanne di ya nwoke, onye ọkà mmụta banyere mmadụ bụ Robin Horton zụlitere ya

Ọ gụrụ nka na California College of Arts and Crafts na Oakland, California (1979–80), nweta nzere BA ya na Central School of Art and Design (1980–83), London, na MA ya na Royal College of Art (1983–86)
O sonyere na 1989 Pachipamwe II Workshop nke emere na Cyrene Mission na mpụga Bulawayo, Zimbabwe ya na Joram Mariga, Bernard Matemera, Bill Ainslie, Voti Thebe, Adam Madebe na David Koloane
A na-akpụkarị ọrụ ya na ígwè ma na-esite n'ihe nketa Kalabari ya, ọdịbendị Naịjirịa na ndụ ya na UK
Ọ rụkọrọ ọrụ na Smithsonian na British Museum na ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta ha na-adịgide adịgide
A na-edebe ihe ọkpụkpụ ya na nchịkọta ihe ngosi nka ndị ọzọ na Europe, Britain na Japan na nchịkọta onwe onye n'ụwa niile
O gosipụtala na mba ụwa na ụlọ ngosi, gụnyere na Austria, Britain, Cuba, France, Germany, Netherlands, Japan, Sicily, South Africa, Spain, United States

Otu n'ime ihe ngosi ya a ma ama bụ Spirits in Steel - Ihe Ǹkà ndi Kalabari Masquerade na American Museum of Natural History, New York (1998–99); na Imagined Steel na Lowry Arts Centre, Manchester, nke gara Oriel Mostyn Gallery, Llandudno; Brewery Art Centre, Cirencester; na Derby Museum na Art Gallery (2002–03)
N'afọ 2005, ya na Ground Force rụkọrọ ọrụ iji mepụta ọrụ maka Ogige Africa na British Museum, dịka akụkụ nke UK-wide Africa 05 Festival
N'afọ 2003, e depụtara atụmatụ ya NO-O-War No-O-War-R maka Trafalgar Square nke anọ
E nyere ya CBE n'afọ 2005
E nyela ya ọtụtụ ọrụ maka ihe ọkpụkpụ ncheta ọha na eze, ọkachasị Battle Bus The Living Memorial to Ken Saro-Wiwa
(2006) N'afọ 2012, e gosipụtara ncheta ihe ọkpụkpụ ya iji cheta ịgba ohu, egosipụtara All the World is Now Richer, na The House of Commons
Akụkụ ya Green Leaf Barrel (2014) sitere n'eziokwu ahụ bụ na ụlọ ya, Niger Delta, na-agbasi mbọ ike n'ihi ọrụ na-abaghị uru na mmetọ dị ukwuu
Ọnụ ọgụgụ nke nwanyị ahụ na-anọchite anya chi nwanyị nke na-emepụta uto site na ite mmanụ nke kewara abụọ
Ka ọ na-emepụta ibe a, ọ chọrọ ilekwasị anya n'ihe dị mma dịka ọ na-eche na ihe ndị na-adịghị mma na-abụkarị nnukwu nke na ha na-ebute mkparịta ụka anyị
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi 2015 No Colour Bar Black British Art in Action 1960–1990 na Guildhall Art Gallery
N'afọ 2016, e gosipụtara ọrụ ya Primavera na October Gallery (7 Eprel - 14 Mee, 2016)
Camp lụrụ onye na-atụpụta ụkpụrụ ụlọ Alan Camp ma biri na London ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Foto 2006 nke Sokari Douglas Camp nke Sal Idriss bụ akụkụ nke nchịkọta National Portrait Gallery
E gosipụtara terracotta nke afọ 2009 na Yorkshire Sculpture Park n'afọ 2013 dịka akụkụ nke Sculpture Series Heads - Contributors to British Sculpture

Foto iri anọ na otu nke Phil Polglaze sere na South London Art Gallery na 8 Septemba 1988 n'oge ọhụụ nke onwe nke ihe ngosi Mmetụta The Art of Sokari Douglas Camp, Keith Piper, Lubaina Himid, Simone Alexander, Joseph Olubo, Brenda Agard
Ọtụtụ foto bụ nke ndị na-ese ihe na ihe osise ya, gụnyere Douglas Camp

Sokari Ekine bụ onye na-akwado Naijiria, blọgụ na onye edemede
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dika onye nta akụkọ na Pambazuka News ma dekwara maka Feminist Africa na New Internationalist
Ekine debere blọgụ n'etiti 2004 na 2014 nke o kpuchiri ọtụtụ isiokwu gụnyere ikike LGBTI, ikike ụmụ nwanyị, na nsogbu gburugburu ebe obibi
Odela ma ọ bụ dezie akwụkwọ anọ, ma kuziere ụmụ akwụkwọ Bekee na Haiti

Ekine edezila akwụkwọ Blood and Oil Testimonies of Violence from Women of the Niger Delta (2001), SMS Uprising Mobile Phone Activism in Africa (2010), African Awakenings with Firoze Manji (2011), na Queer African Reader na Hakima Abbas (2013)
A mụrụ Ekine na Nigeria site na nna Nigeria na nne Britain
O tolitere na Naijiria mana ọ kwagara England ịga mahadum
O nwere nzere bachelọ nke sayensị na teknụzụ ọhụrụ yana nzere Master of Arts na ikike na agụmakwụkwọ sitere na Institute of Education na Mahadum London
Ekine biri na United States ọtụtụ afọ tupu ọ laghachi UK, bụ ebe ọ chọtara ọrụ dịka onye nkụzi i agụmakwụkwọ n'ihu
Ọrụ izizi ya n'ịntanetị bụ n'afọ 1995 mgbe o hibere ndepụta email Black Sisters Network
A gwọchara Ekine maka ọrịa kansa na 2000, ihe kpatara ya na onye ibe ya kwaga Spain na 2004
Ekine dere kolụm kwa izu maka akụkọ Pambazuka afọ itoolu wee jee ozi dịka onye nchịkọta akụkọ ịntanetị ha na 2007
Ọ malitere ide blọgụ, Black Looks, na 2004, nke ọ gara n'ihu ruo afọ iri
Isiokwu ndị a na-edekarị bụ ikike LGBTI n'Africa, njirimara nwoke na nwanyị, ịlụ agha, ikike mmadụ, nka, ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ na Niger Delta, Haiti, ime ihe
na ikike ala
Ọ malitere Black Looks 2 na 2014, blọgụ ọhụrụ lekwasịrị anya na ọrụ foto ya
Ekine bụ onye na-akwado ikpe ziri ezi na-elekọta mmadụ, na-etinye aka na mkpọsa ihe karịrị afọ 20

Sola Asedeko bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme fim na onye nduzi

A mụrụ Asedeko na Lagos State, ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa
Ọ gara Somori Comprehensive High na Ogba ebe ọ nwetara asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ West Africa tupu ọ gaa Mahadum Lagos ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ na nka ihe nkiri ma mesịa nweta nzere masta na nchịkwa ọha
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri na 2006, n'otu afọ ahụ ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na Abeni (ihe nkiri), ihe nkiri nke Tunde Kelani mepụtara ma duzie
O gosipụtara na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Naijiria na ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ
Olusola 'Sola' Adejoke David-Borha, bụ onye isi (CEO) nke Africa Regions na Standard Bank Group kemgbe Jenụwarị 2017

Ọ bụ onye isi na Stanbic IBTC Holdings

Solange Fernex (15 Eprel 1934 na 11 Septemba 2006) bụ onye France na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na udo na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke gburugburu ebe obibi na Europe, o nyere aka chọta French Green Party ma bụrụ onye otu European Parliament ruo afọ ise
Ọ kwadoro ọtụtụ okwu, gụnyere enweghị ime ihe ike, udo ụwa, nkwụsị nuklia, ike ọzọ, na ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ 2019, a gụrụ otu ụlọ akwụkwọ dị n'obodo ya bụ Strasbourg, France, aha Fernex
A mụrụ Fernex na Strasbourg, France
Mgbe ọ dị naanị afọ isii, nna ya nwụrụ dị ka onye agha France na-alụ ọgụ na Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
O mechara kwuo na nke ahụ kpaliri ya itinye aka na enweghị ime ihe ike
Mgbe ọ na-amụ ihe ọmụmụ ihe ndị dị ndụ na kọleji, ọ zutere dọkịta Switzerland Michel Fernex, onye ọkachamara na ọrịa ndị na-ekpo ọkụ
Di na nwunye ahụ lụrụ di ma kwaga Africa, ebe amụrụ abụọ n'ime ụmụ ha anọ
Mgbe ha lara ha biri n'ụlọ ochie dị na Biederthal dị nso n'ókè Switzerland, ebe ha tinyere usoro ike anyanwụ ma zụlịte ezinụlọ
ezinụlọ ha
Mgbe ọ gara France, Fernex guzobere otu isi nke otu enyemaka nke ụwa nke atọ, Terre des hommes
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji chékotà ụlọ akụkọ ihe mere eme ma nyere aka na 'squatting' movement iji mee mkpesa nke ọma maka ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe na Osimiri Rhine na ụlọ ọrụ kemịkal dị nso
Ọ soro ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na-emegide ụlọ ọrụ nuklia, gụnyere otu a haziri na Wyhl na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Germany, ebe ọ mara ụlọ ikwuu n'otu obodo na-eme mkpesa dị nso na saịtị ahụ
N'afọ 1977, a họpụtara Fernex ka ọ bụrụ onye kansụl obodo ya ma nọgide na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ya ruo afọ 24
N'afọ 1979, ọ duziri otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Europe elections maka ntuli aka mbụ nke otu gburugburu ebe obibi na Europe, nke nwetara percent 439 maka ngụkọta nke 888,134 vootu na France
N'otu afọ ahụ, o guzobere otu udo nke ụmụ nwanyị na-eduzi, Femmes pour la Paix, nke ọ duziri ruo 1996
N'afọ 1983, o sonyere na Fast for Life movement, na-ebu ọnụ ụbọchị 38 na Paris maka i wepụ ngwá agha nuklia
N'afọ sochirinụ, ya na Antoine Waechter guzobere Green Party
Ọ bụ onye isi na-ahazi na Europe nke Walk of the People São A Pilgrimage for Life, njem udo gafere kọntinent site na United States ruo Russia nke gafere kilomita 7,000 na 1984 na 1985
Mgbe ihe mberede nuklia Chernobyl na 1986, Fernex gbasiri mbọ ike iji nyere ndị radiation metụtara aka
Ya na di ya mechara bídó Children of Chernobyl, na-ele anya na ndị ntorobịa
Ọ na-ekwu si na ndị ọchịchị leghaara ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị merụrụ ahụ anya nke ukwuu
N'afọ 1989, Fernex meriri ntuli aka na European Parliament, na-anọchi anya Green Party na France ruo n'afọ 1994
Dị ka onye isi nke Kọmitii Ọrụ Ugbo na onye otu Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Azụmaahịa, ọ rịọrọ maka iwu ọrụ ugbo iji kọwaa otu esi enweta asambodo maka nri
N'agbata afọ 1995 na afọ 2003, Fernex bụ onye isi oche nke ngalaba French nke Women's International League for Peace and Freedom
Ọ bụkwa osote onye isi oche nke International Peace Bureau na Geneva ruo afọ anọ n'afọ ndị 1990
N'afọ 2001, ọ natara Nuclear-Free Future Award site na ntọala Germany maka ọrụ ndụ ya megide ngwá agha nuklia
Ka ọ na-eru afọ 2003, Fernex butere ọrịa cancer nke mere ka ọ belata ọrụ ya
Ọ nwụrụ na Septemba 11, 2006, na Biederthal
O dere akwụkwọ banyere ọrụ ya, A Life for a Life (La Vie pour la Vie)
Ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe nkiri na France bụ Dora Films mere ihe ngosi banyere ya na 2014 nke akpọrọ The Little Spark
Solange Yijika bụ onye Cameroon na-eme ihe nkiri nke dị elu nke na-anọkwa na ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Naijiria, yana onye na-agba mbọ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama na mpaghara Central Africa na onye isi nke Cameroon International Film Festival (CAMIFF)
Yijika si North West Cameroon
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Yaoundé nke Abụọ, Soa, Cameroon
Yijika abụwo ihu dị mkpa na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Cameroon kemgbe ọ pụtara na mbụ n'afọ 2005
N'ime ihe ngosi mkpọsa abụọ na-alụso ịba ọgụ na Cameroon nke Global Fund kwadoro maka ọgụ megide ịba, ụkwara nta na ọrịa AIDS, e ji ya mee ihe dịka ihe nlereanya na ihe ngosi ahụ
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ahụ maka ikpe ziri ezi zuru ụwa ọnụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya nke mbipụta nke mbụ nke Cameroon International Film Festival (CAMIFF) n'afọ 2016
Yijika gosipụtara na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Cameroon n'ọtụtụ mmepụta nke dị ihe dịka 20 ma bụrụ onye natara ọtụtụ nhọpụta onyinye gụnyere AMAA na NAFCA
Ọ pụtara na 'Trials of Passion' 2006 TV Series, nke egosiri na CRTV, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Diana'
O mechara pụta n'afọ 2008 na 'Mark of the Absolute', ihe nkiri nke Asaba Ferdinand duziri ma mepụta
Ihe ọzọ bụ 2009 'Land of Shadows', ihe nkiri nke Agbor Gilbert Ebot mepụtara ma bụrụ nke Zack Orji na Neba Lawrence duziri

N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ gosipụtakwara ọzọ na ihe nkiri 'Great Pain' nke Neba Lawrence duziri, ma mesịa, n'otu afọ a gosipụtara na 'Royal Destiny', ihe nkiri Cameroon nke gosipụtara Emeka Ike na Tonto Dikeh, ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood abụọ

Ọ, n'afọ 2012 gosipụtara na 'Troubled Kingdom', ihe nkiri nke Neba Lawrence duziri, nke onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na US Mairo Sanda na onye South Africa Fred Keyanti mepụtara - bụ ndị toro nka onye na-eme ihe nkiri ahụ
N'afọ 2012, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Nollywood, 'Blood or Wine', nke Henry Neba Awantoh na Jim Iyke mepụtara ma bụrụ nke Neba Lawrence duziri, nke Ruth Kadiri dere
N'afọ 2013, a họpụtara ya maka SONNAH Awards

Solapur chaddar (nke a na-akpọ 'Solapur blanket'), bụ akwa akwa ogho e mere n'obodo Solapur nke steeti India nke Maharashtra Akpụkpọ ụkwụ onye na ímé ihe ha na kpo ámá nke ụwa họrọ site n'ime ụmụ gị anụ ndị a na-ewu ewu na India ebe a na-emepụta ha, n'oge gara aga site na ịkpa ákwà aka mana ugbu a site na igwe Jacquard ma mara ha maka nhazi pụrụ iche na ogologo oge ha
Solapuri chaddars bụ ngwaahịa mbụ nke Solapur, na Maharashtra, iji nweta ọnọdụ Geographical Indication (GI)h
A maara Solapur maka ụlọ ọrụ akwa ya
O nwere otu oge igwe ihe kachasị n'Eshia
Mmepe nke ụlọ ọrụ ịkpa ákwà na Solapur yiri ka ọ malitere n'oge ọchịchị nke Peshwas
E nwere ọtụtụ obere ndị na-akpa ákwà n'onwe ha na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ụlọ ọrụ ọ bụla nwere otu ma ọ bụ abụọ nke onye isi ezinụlọ na-ejikarị
Ezinụlọ ahụ bụ otu ọrụ na ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka nyeere onye na-akpa ákwà aka na usoro nkwadebe na n'ọnọdụ ụfọdụ na-acha
Mmụba nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke oge a na India n'afọ ndị 1970 gbanwere nhazi nke ụlọ ọrụ ịkpa ákwà n'ógbè ahụ
Ndị na-akpa ákwà Padmashali si South India emepụtala ha kemgbe ha nọ na Solapur n'afọ ndị 1950
Ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta chaddars na mpaghara Solapur

Ewezuga Maharashtra, Solapuri Chaddar nwere ọchịchọ na Karnataka, Telangana, Andhra Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh، Gujarat, Rajasthan n'ime India, ebe ọ nwekwara ọchịchọ na United Arab Emirates, Kuwait, South Africa, United States, United Kingdom na Canada
Sold bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Patricia McCormick, bipụtara na 2006
Ọ na-akọ akụkọ banyere otu nwa agbọghọ si Nepal aha ya bụ Lakshmi, onye e rere n'ohu mmekọahụ na India
Edere akwụkwọ akụkọ a n'usoro dị mkpirikpi, ụdị vignette, site n'echiche nke onye isi
Brown dabeere n'otu akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ
Lakshmi bụ nwa agbọghọ dị afọ iri na atọ ya na ezinụlọ ya bi n'otu obere ụlọ n'ugwu Nepal
Ezinụlọ ya dara ogbenye nke ukwuu, mana ndụ ya jupụtara n'ihe ụtọ dị mfe, dị ka ịzụ ewu ya nwere ntụpọ ojii na ọcha, na ime ka nne ya na-asa ntutu isi ya site na ọkụ oriọna mmanụ
Mana ugbu a, oke mmiri ozuzo nke Himalaya na-asachapụ ihe niile fọdụrụ n'ihe ọkụkụ ezinụlọ ahụ, nna nna Lakshmi na-ekwu na ọ ghaghị ịhapụ ụlọ ma were ọrụ iji kwado ezinụlọ ya
Ọ na-ewebata ya na onye ọbịa mara mma nke na-agwa ya na ọ ga-achọtara ya ọrụ dị ka onye na-eje ozi ma na-arụ ọrụ maka nwanyị bara ọgaranya n'obodo ahụ
Obi dị ya ụtọ inye aka, Lakshmi mere ogologo njem gaa India ma rute 'Ụlọ Obi Ụtọ' jupụtara na olileanya
Ma n'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ matara eziokwu jọgburu onwe ya e rere ya n'ịgba akwụna
Otu agadi nwanyị aha ya bụ Mumtaz ji obi ọjọọ na aghụghọ na-achị ụlọ akwụna ahụ
Ọ na-agwa Lakshmi na ọ tọrọ atọ n'ebe ahụ ruo mgbe ọ ga-akwụ ụgwọ ezinụlọ ya - mgbe ahụ ọ ghọgbuo Lakshmi maka obere ego ọ na-enweta ka ọ ghara ịpụ
Ndụ Lakshmi na-aghọ ihe egwu nke ọ na-enweghị ike ịgbanahụ
N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, ọ na-ebi ndụ site n'okwu nne ya - 'Nanị ịtachi obi bụ mmeri' - ma jiri nwayọọ nwayọọ, ya na ụmụ agbọghọ ndị ọzọ na-eme ka ọ nwee ike ịlanarị ndụ ọhụrụ a dị egwu
Ọ na-akụzikwara onwe ya ịgụ na ikwu okwu n'asụsụ Bekee site n'ige ntị na mkparịta ụka nke ndị gbara ya gburugburu na akwụkwọ ọ na-enwe ike iwere
N'ikpeazụ, Lakshmi zutere otu nwoke America, onye rutere ma mee onwe ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ahịa iji chịkọta ihe akaebe ọ chọrọ iji kpee Mumtaz na ndị enyi ya ikpe
E mechara jide Mumtaz, si otú a tọhapụ Lakshmi na ụmụ agbọghọ ndị ọzọ
Sold natara nyocha dị mma maka ikpughere ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ na ụwa a na-amaghị

Kirkus reviews, dịka ọmụmaatụ, kwuru na 'McCormick na-enye ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ bi na nchekwa na n'okpuru nchebe nke iwu windo doro anya n'ime ụwa siri ike na obi ọjọọ” Booklist kwetara, na-ekwu na Sold bụ “akụkọ a na-agaghị echefu echefu banyere ịgba ohu mmekọahụ dị ka ọ dị ugbu a”
McCormick, Patricia
E rere ya
New York, New York Hyperion Books for Children, 2008
Soldier Idumota (Yoruba Sojadumota) mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ Onye agha A Na-amaghị Ama, bụ ebe owuwu ncheta nke dị na Idumota, mpaghara Lagos, na Lagos Steeti, Nigeria
Gọọmentị Naijiria wuru ya ma guzobe ya n'afọ 1948 iji cheta ndị agha nwụrụ n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Mbụ na Agha Ụwa Nke Abụọ
Àtụ Lagos27

Soledad 'Chole' Alatorre (1927 - March 25, 2020) bụ onye ọrụ Chicana nke na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Greater Los Angeles Area, a makwaara ya maka ọrụ ya na Centro de Acción Social Autónomo (CASA) na maka nkwado ya maka ikike obodo n'etiti obodo chicano
A mụrụ Alatorre na steeti San Luis potosi na Mexico, na 1927, n'ime nnukwu ezinụlọ nwere ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị
Nna ya bụ onye ọrụ na njikọ nke ndị ọrụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè
Alatorre lụrụ di n'ezinụlọ bara ọgaranya mgbe ọ dị afọ 19
Ya na di ya na nwanne ya nwanyị kwagara na United States wee kwaga Greater Los Angeles Area mgbe ọ dị afọ 27
Na California, di ya enwetaghị ọrụ ọ kwagara
N'ebe ahụ, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka ihe nlereanya maka uwe ịsa ahụ, maka ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke na-eme ihe maka Rosemary Reid
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nlekọta n'otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, di ya rụkwara ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ejiji
Ọ kewara di ya na ngwụcha afọ 1950, ọ nweghịkwa ụmụ ọ na-etinye ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ya na ọrụ ya na-ahazi ọrụ
Ọ bi na ụmụnne ya nwanyị, ndị ya nwanyị, bụ ụlọ ya ruo mgbe ọ laghachiri San Luis Potosí
Ọ nwụrụ na Machị 2020; a maghị ihe kpatara ọnwụ ya
Nna Alatorre zụlitere ya n'akụkọ banyere ọrụ, ọ bụkwa nsogbu nke ndị ọrụ na-akwaga mba ọzọ ọ hụrụ mgbe ọ na-aga United States mere ka ọ bụrụ ihe siri ike
Ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta uwe mere ka Alatorre jikọọ ndị ọrụ ndị ọzọ na ụlọ ọrụ uwe
A maara ya maka ikike ya iwulite mmekọrịta onwe onye, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ejikọ ndị ọrụ uwe na ụlọ ọrụ ha na-arụ ọrụ
Ọ gara n'ihu na-etinye aka na nhazi ọrụ, ma soro ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ rụọ ọrụ, gụnyere Teamsters, United Auto Workers, Maritime Union, na United Farm Workers
N'oge a, ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ọgwụ
Site n'ọrụ ya na òtù ndị ọrụ, ọ zutere onye ọrụ ibe ya Bert Corona
Ha abụọ jikọtara ya na Hermandad Mexicana Nacional (HMN), nke bụ n'oge ahụ otu n'ime naanị Otu na-arụ ọrụ maka ndị Mexico-Amerịka nke ndị Mexico-America na-achịkwa

HMN na-eche nsogbu ihu n'ihi ọrụ nke House Un-American Activities Committee, ya mere Corona na Alatorre weghaara ya na Los Angeles, ebe a maara ọrụ iwu ya dị ka CASA, ma nye ha, gụnyere ọrụ ndị ọrụ ndị ọrụ CASA, wee nye ha
Ọ kwadokwara maka iwu na-akwado ha
otu abụọ ahụ na-arụ ọrụ maka ikike nke ndị mbata na-enweghị akwụkwọ n'oge ọtụtụ òtù Latino na-achọghị ime otú ahụ
HMN na CASA haziri ngagharị iwe megide mwakpo ndị na-elekwasị anya na ndị ọrụ si mba ọzọ, ma nyekwa nkwado mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na nke iwu
Otu n'ime ọrụ ha bụ ime ka ndị mgbasa ozi kwenye iji okwu ahụ bụ 'onye mbịarambịa na-enweghị akwụkwọ' n'ọnọdụ 'onye mbido iwu na-akwadoghị'
N'afọ 1977, CASA so ọtụtụ òtù Latino ndị ọzọ rụkọọ ọrụ iji kwado mgbaghara maka ndị mbịarambịa na-enweghị akwụkwọ na megide ntaramahụhụ a na-etinye n'ọrụ ndị were ha n'ọrụ
Alatorre na Corona mejupụtara olu siri ike n'ime òtù ahụ, na-arụ ụka na ndị mbịara na-enweghị ihe ndekọ nwetara ikike ịrụ ọrụ na US, nakwa na a ga-anabata ha
Ọnọdụ a bụ ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe ma e jiri ya tụnyere echiche nke ọtụtụ òtù ndị Mexico na America, nke kwadoro iwu nke 'Americanization'
Alatorre rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'ime CASA, na-ahụ maka ọrụ nchịkwa ma na-ahọrọ ịnọgide na-abụkarị 'n'azụ ihe nkiri'
Site na ọrụ ya na CASA na ebe ndị ọzọ, Alatorre ghọrọ onye a ma ama maka ikike obodo
N'afọ 1968, Corona na Alatorre sonyekwara na mkpọsa Robert F
Kennedy maka oche Senate nke California
Afọ ole na ole ka e mesịrị, Alatorre na Corona bụ ndị na-eduzi mgbanwe n'ụzọ US Democratic Party si ghọta nsogbu nke mbata, n'akụkụ ụfọdụ site na ọrụ ha na ndị ọrụ
Alatorre sokwa na na iku onye mgbazinye ndị na-akwụ ụgwọ, mee mkpesa na ku Kal kun na San Diego ma kwado maka nnọchiteanya Latino na telivishọn
Rodolfo Acuña, onye ọkà mmụta nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Chicano, kpọrọ ya 'onye pụrụ iche' nke 'na-emetụbeghị ozi ya' na 'na-etinye aka'
Onye omeiwu steeti California Maria Elena Durazo kwuru na Alatorre kpaliri ya ịbanye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ihi na ọ 'na-ekwu ihe ndị dị mfe, ndị mmadụ kwenyere na ya'
Solh (ma ụdị dị iche iche as-Solh, al-Solhi, el-Solha) (Arabic الصلح) bụ aha nna mba Arabic, nke ka ukwuu sitere na Lebanọn
Ndị ama ama nwere aha Solh na ụdị ya gụnyere ndia

Solomon Ehigiator Arase (amụrụ na June 21, 1956) bụ onye uwe ojii lara ezumike nká na Naịjirịa nke jere ozi dị ka onye isi nyocha ndị uwe ojii na Naijiria nke iri na asatọ (IGP) A họpụtara ya dịka onye isi nyocha ndị uwe ojii (IGP) n'afo 2015 site n’aka onye isi ala bụ Goodluck Jonathan mgbe achụrụ Suleiman Abba n’ọrụ Tupu a họpụta ya dịka IGP, Arase bụ onye isi ndị isi ngalaba na-achịkọta ọgụgụ isi nke ndị uwe ojii Naijiria, akpọrọ Ụlọ ọrụ ọgụgụ isi na nyocha ndị omempụ
A mụrụ Arase n'ụbọchị iri abụọ n'otu n'ọnwa juun, afo 1956 na-ọchịchị mpaghara Owan West dị na Edo steeti na ndịda Naijiria
Ọ gara Mahadum Ahmadu Bello maka ọmụmụ akwụkwọ ya
ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ were nzere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị pụta n'afọ 1980
mgbe otu afọ gara, E were ya na-ọrụ ndị uwe ojii Naijiria n'ụbọchị nke mbụ n'ọnwa Disemba, afọ 1981 O nwetere nzere okokporo ọzọ na Iwu na Mahadum Benin ma nzere nna ukwu na Mahadum Lagos
Mgbe Arase na-arụ ọrụ uwe ojii, ọ jere ozi n'ọkwa dị iche iche gụnyere ịbụ onye isi ndị uwe ojii na Akwa Ibom Steeti yana ije ozi ngalaba ọgụgụ isi dị ka onye enyemaka onye isi nyocha ndi ụwe ojii
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị na-ahụ maka nchekwa na Naịjirịa ma rụọ ọrụ na Namibia n'oge ọrụ nchekwa udo nke United Nations
Arase lara ezumike nká n'ọrụ uwe ojii n'ụbọchị iri abụọ n'otu n'ọnwa Juun, afọ 2016

N'ụbọchị iri abụọ n'otu n'ọnwa Juun, afọ 2016 onye isi ala bụ Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara Ibrahim Kpotum Idris ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya onye isi nyocha nke ndị uwe ojii nke Naijiria Mgbe lara ezumike nká ya na ọrụ ndị uwe ojii, a họpụtara Arase dịka onye isi oche nke ndị otu ọrụ maka mmejuputa iwu steeti nke mgbochi mkpakọrịta mmepe obodo Development Edo Steeti
Solomon Lartey bụ onye ọchụnta ego Ghana nke jere ozi dị ka onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Activa Insurance site na 2017 ruo 2020
Solomon Lartey gụrụ akwụkwọ na Accra Academy maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na mahadum Ghana Lartey gara n'ihu maka Masters in Business Administration na Mahadum Bradford
Lartey malitere ọrụ ya na Enterprise Insurance na Ghana

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na London Market dị ka onye njikwa nkwupụta na nkwupụta ihe ọghọm Planet Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ere mkpuchi mkpuchi na Brooklands Financial Services Limited Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka mgbazinye ego na mkpuchi mkpuchi na Simple Group dị na Mitcham, Surrey, United Kingdom wee nwee otu ọnọdụ na Bryant na Menson UK Limited (onye nnọchite anya Mortgage Broking Services Limited na Manchester
N'afọ 2008, ọ laghachiri Ghana wee sonye na Global Alliance Insurance dị ka Operations Manager

Na 2009, a họpụtara ya onye isi ọrụ mgbe ọ nwetasịrị Global Alliance site na Inshọransị International Activa N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara Lartey osote onye isi nchịkwa nke Activa Na 2017, Lartey ghọrọ onye so na kọmitii onye isi nke Group Activa na onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ mkpuchi ya, Activa International Insurance
Solomon Omolayo Omogboye (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 19 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1982) bụ onye Naijiria na-ese ihe na onye na-ese ihe, nke bi na South Africa
Ụdị ya na-agụnye ngwakọta nke icheku ọkụ, pastel, acrylic na mmanụ na akwa iji gosipụta mmetụta uche dị gburugburu ndụ
Omogboye malitere eserese mgbe ọ bụ nwata, mkpebi nke nne ya kwadoro, onye nyere ihe ndị dị mkpa ọ chọrọ
O nwetara diplọma mba dị elu na mmepụta ụlọ ọrụ na Lagos State Polytechnic n'afọ 2007, e nyekwara ya onye na-ese ihe nke afọ ahụ n'otu afọ ahụ
Ọ kwagara Johannesburg n'afọ 2014, ọ na-egosipụtakarị eserese ya ma rụọ ọrụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Lagos na Nasarawa Steeti
Dị ka ya si kwuo, eserese ọkachamara mbụ ya bụ n'afọ 1996 mgbe a chọrọ ka ọ gosipụta eserese na mgbidi ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ọ na-ahụ nka dị ka 'ụzọ mgbapụ' na 'ịhazigharị' ọtụtụ ajụjụ ya banyere ndụ
Mgbe ọ nọ na South Africa, Omogboye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ nka ya, Living Artist Emporium
O nwekwara njikọ ọkachamara na August House Studios
Dị ka African Art Consultants si kwuo, a pụrụ ịkọwa Omogboye dị ka otu n'ime 'ndị na-eto eto na-eto eto na-ese ihe na Naijiria' ndị a na-egosipụtakarị mmetụta uche na nkwenkwe ha na ihe osise ya
N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara ọrụ ya ka otu ụlọ ọrụ na-ere ya iji nweta ego maka ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị gbara ya gburugburu
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2019, e depụtara ihe omume Omogboye, Shades of the Mirror dị ka otu n'ime ihe ngosi nka asatọ a na-ekwesịghị ịhapụ dị ka OkayAfrica si kwuo
Cape Town Etc kọwara ihe ngosi ahụ dị ka 'akụkọ nke ahụmịhe, eziokwu, na nke inwe obi ike ibi ndụ maka ndụ ka mma'
Chief Solomon Osagie Alonge (1911 ruo 1994) bụ onye na-ese foto nke onwe ya na onye ọsụ ụzọ nke foto Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye mbụ na-ese foto maka ụlọ eze nke Benin City, Nigeria, na onye isi n'obí Iwebo
Ihe ndekọ Alonge nke ndị eze Naịjirịa na ndị na-elekọta mmadụ bụ otu n'ime nchịkọta kachasị ukwuu ma chekwaa nke ọma site n'oge ahụ
A mụrụ Alonge na Benin City n'afọ 1911
Ọ mụtara Bekee na Benin Baptist Elementary School ma mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ kwagara Lagos ka ya na nwanne nna ya biri iji mụta ọrụ
N'ebe ahụ, ọ malitere inwe mmasị na foto ma were ọzụzụ
N'afọ 1930, Alonge laghachiri Benin wee malite ịse foto site n'ụlọ ya dị na Ugbague Street
Ọ na-agakarị n'èzí Benin City, na-ese foto ụlọ akwụkwọ ma na-ese foto nnọkọ na klọb mmekọrịta, ihe omume egwuregwu, na ememe gọọmentị
Mgbe nwa nke oba ugbu a, okwu Edo maka 'onye ọchịchị', weghaara na 1933, Alonge ghọrọ onye na-ese foto ya n'ụlọ ikpe, na-edekọ emume olili ozu ọdịnala ikpeazụ na nke nne Oba Akenzua na 1935
Ndị Britain ghọtara talent Alonge n'oge, a gwakwara ya ka o were foto maka ndị nchịkwa ọchịchị na 1930s na 1940s
Na ngwụcha afọ 1930, ọ ghọrọ onye guzobere Benin Social Circle, otu ndị ọchụnta ego, ndị isi, na ndị gụrụ akwụkwọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-echekwa ego nke Central Baptist Church ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ
N'afọ 1942, o mepụtara Ideal Photo Studio na Benin City, ebe ọ zụlitere aha ngwa ngwa dị ka onye na-eto eto, ọkachamara na-arụsi ọrụ ike na onye ọchụnta ego na-akwụwa aka ọtọ
N'oge na-adịghị anya, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ghọrọ ebe a ma ama iji were foto
Ọ nwalere usoro dịgasị iche iche, ọ malitekwara ịmepụta mgbasa ozi ngwaahịa, na-edekọ ọrụ owuwu, na-ese foto nnọkọ, na ikpuchi nzukọ azụmahịa maka ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara dị ka Guinness Brewery
O sere ihe nkiri emume gọọmentị na ihe omume akụkọ ihe mere eme maka gọọmentị Naịjirịa
N'afọ 1956, Alonge sere foto nleta Queen Elizabeth izute Oba Akenzua II na ọdụ ụgbọ elu Benin
O dekwara aka na oba na Princess Alexandra, onye kwupụtara na Naịjirịa nweere onwe ya na 1960, na nleta na Benin na 1963
Ọrụ Alonge karịrị ọkara narị afọ ma dekọọ ọchịchị Oba Akenzua II (1933 ruo 1978) na Oba Erediauwa (1979 ruo uo 2016)

Alonge sere ihe omume ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya gburugburu obí eze, gụnyere ndị nwunye eze na ụmụ, ndị na-eleta ndị isi na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na ememme kwa afọ na ememe ụlọ ikpe
E debere ihe karịrị fopuku atọ 00 nke Alonge na Smithsonian National Museum of African Art
Ụdị ya jikọtara ihe ọdịnala na nke oge a
Alonge sere foto n'èzí na nnukwu ụdị, igwefoto efere iko na ihe nkiri studio nke emere na mpaghara
N'iji oriọna kerosene, o mepụtara ihe ndị na-adịghị mma n'abalị ma na-akpọtụrụ ya na-ebipụta ihe oyiyi ahụ na mpempe akwụkwọ gaslight
N'ịgụ akwụkwọ ntuziaka site na Kodak na Ilford, ọ kụziiri onwe ya ịgwakọta kemịkal nke ya ma jiri ìhè anyanwụ mepụta akwụkwọ ya
N'afọ 1940, Alonge malitere imegharị, ụda sepia, na iji aka na-acha foto ya
Mgbe ọkụ eletrik bịara Benin n'afọ 1945, o nwere ike iwepụta foto studio ma mepụta foto ya n'ime ụlọ
Igwefoto mbụ nke Alonge bụ Kodak Brownie; mgbe e mesịrị, o jiri Rolleiflex na igwefoto 35 mm ndị ọzọ, na n'ikpeazụ ihe nkiri dị elu
N'ọgwụgwụ afọ 1800, ndị Britain weghaara Benin City, na-eweta ọdịnala foto ha
Ndị na-ese foto Britain gosipụtara ndị obodo site n'echiche nke onye ọchịchị ahụ
Foto mbụ nke Benin gosipụtara ezinụlọ ndị eze meriri n'ala ọzọ, ụlọ eze ọkụ, na njem 'ntaramahụhụ'
Dị ka onye mbụ na-ese foto n'obí eze, Alonge gbanwere akụkọ a
Ọrụ ya nyere aka ibute oge nke ndị Naijiria na-anọchite anya onwe ha ma na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ndị na-elekọta akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ha
Mgbanwe a nyere ndị a na-achị ohere igosipụta onwe ha n'ụzọ ha chere na ọ dị ùgwù
Otu foto dị otú ahụ bụ nke Oba Akenzua II dị mpako na-egosipụta uwe eze nke nna nna ya, Ovonramwen, nke ndị Britain weghachiri Benin n'afọ 1938
Foto Alonge na-echekwa ihe ndekọ akụkọ ihe mere eme dị mkpa nke nka na ọdịbendị Benin n'oge ọchịchị ndị Britain na mgbanwe na nnwere onwe Naịjirịa n'oge 1950 na 1960
National Museum of African Art gosipụtara ọrụ Alonge malite na Septemba 2014, na-egosipụta ụfọdụ foto ya a na-adịghị ahụkebe
Ihe ngosi a, nke dabara na ememe Naijiria nke afọ 100 dị ka mba dị n'otu, bụ prọfesọ na onye na-ese foto Flora S
Kaplan, onye ya na Alonge dere akwụkwọ ozi ma gaa Benin na 1982
Otu n'ime ndị ọbịa mbụ bịara ihe ngosi ahụ bụ ndị ụlọ eze Benin na ezinụlọ Alonge
Ndị bịara ya gụnyere ndị ọrụ ibe ya na ndị enyi ya, ụmụ ya, na Prince Ademola Iyi-Eweka, nwa nwa nke oba nke jere ozi site na 1914 ruo 1933
Ndị nọkwa ya bụ ọtụtụ isiokwu nke foto Alonge, mgbe ahụ n'ime afọ iri asaa na iri asatọ
Mgbe emechara ihe ngosi ahụ, nke a ga-aga n'ihu ruo Jenụwarị 2016, a na-atụ anya na ihe ngosi ahụ ga-alaghachi Benin, ebe a ga-anọgide na-egosipụta ya
Solomon Tat (amụrụ ya na Julaị 29, 1986) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ
O sonyere Naịjirịa na FIBA Africa Championship nke afọ 2011, ebe ndị otu ahụ mechara n'ọnọdụ nke atọ
Ọ bụ nwa afọ Jos Plateau, Naijiria ma na-egwu basketball kọleji na otu egwuregwu basket bọọlụ ụmụ nwoke Virginia Cavaliers
Ọ bụ onye isi atọ nke ndị otu Cavaliers nke 2009-10 dị ka onye okenye
Àtụ Nigeria squad 2011 FIBA Africa Championship

Ụlọ alakụba Soltan (Cyrillic Солтан мәчете; nke bụbu ụlọ alakụba Cihanşa bay, The Red Mosque, Ğosman Mosque, The Eighth Mosque, nke a na-akpọkwa Sultan ma ọ bụ Sultanovskaya site na Russian Sultanovskana) bụ ụlọ alakụba dị na Kazan, na mba Russia
E wuru ya na afo 1868 na onyinye nke onye ahịa Cihanşa Ğosmanov
E wuru ụlọ alakụba ahụ n'ọdịnala nke ụlọ Tatar-Bolghar nke oge ochie jikọtara ya na ụdị romance nke mba
E nwere otu ụlọ nzukọ nwere entresol
A na-etinye minaret nwere okpukpu atọ n'elu ọnụ ụzọ
N'afọ 1931, ndị ọchịchị Soviet mechiri ụlọ alakụba ahụ
N'afọ 1990, e weghachiri minaret ahụ, n'afọ 1994, e weghachikwara ndị kwere ekwe nke ụlọ alakụba ahụ
Àtụ Mosques in Russia
Somadina Adinma bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nlereanya
Somadina Adinma malitere ime ihe nkiri na 2003, mgbe ọ ka bụ nwatakịrị di afọ 8 (asatọ) mgbe ọ malitere na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke akpọrọ Charge and Bail
Ihe e jiri mara ya karịsịa bụ maka ọrụ ọ rụrụ na ihe nkiri Nollywood Ordinary Fellows, Breath of Anger, na Forest of Promises
N'afọ 2007, a họpụtara ya maka onyinye nke Best Performance by a Child na 3rd Africa Movie Academy Awards
N'afọ 2019, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri Ordinary Fellows na ọrụ 'DJ Cash'

E guzobere ya na 2003 dịka onye enyemaka zuru oke nke Somafone FZ LLC nke Dubai Internet City
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị na Mogadishu

Abdirazak guzobere ya na afo 1993 na Rockville, Maryland, na United Steeti
Osman, Edmund L
Resor, Abdiaziz Ismail Dualeh na Luis F
George
Dịka ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ si kwuo, ọ bụ 'onye mbụ na-enye ọrụ telecom na obodo Somalia'
STG nwere ọfịs na obodo Somalia iri; isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị ugbu a na Dubai
Mgbe e guzobesịrị ya na afo 1993, STG wuru ọrụ telivishọn n'ụzọ kwesịrị ekwesị
Somali Telecom Group anọgidewo na-agbasawanye ma ka ọ na-erule afọ 2007, ọrụ dị na mpaghara ndị a

Somali shilling (ihe ịrịba ama ShSo; Somali shilin; Arabic شلن; Italian ; ISO 4217 SOS) bụ ego gọọmentị nke Somalia
A na-ekewa ya na 100 senti (Somali), cents (English) ma ọ bụ centesimi (Italian)
Shilling abụwo ego nke akụkụ Somalia kemgbe afọ 1921, mgbe ewepụtara shilling nke East Africa na British Somaliland protectorate

Mgbe nnwere onwe nke afọ 1960 na njikọta nke ókèala ndị bụbu British Somaliland na Italian Somaliland, ego ha, East African shilling na somalo (nke hà nhata na uru) ka Somali shilling dochiri na afọ 1962
Aha ndị e ji mee ihe maka okpukpe ya bụ cent (otu centesimo; otutu centesimi) na Stans (ọtụtụ Stans), tinyere shilling (otu scellino; otutu scellini) na شلن
N'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Ọktoba nke afọ 1962, Banca Nazionale Somala (National Bank of Somalia) wepụtara akwụkwọ ego a kpọrọ ise, iri, iri abụo na 100 scellini / shillings
N'afọ 1975, Bankiga Qaranka Soomaaliyeed (Somali National Bank) wepụtara akwụkwọ ego maka ise, iri, iri abụo na 100 shilin / shillings
Ihe ndị a sochiri na 1978 site na akwụkwọ ozi nke otu okpukpu ahụ nke Bankiga Dhexe Somalia (Central Bank of Somalia) wepụtara
E webatara akwụkwọ ego shilin / shillings 50 na afọ 1983, 500 shilin /shillings sochiri na afọ 1989 na 1000 shilin / sillings na afọ 1990
E mere mgbalị na afọ 1990 iji gbanwee ego ahụ na 100 ruo 1, na akwụkwọ ego ọhụrụ nke shilin ọhụrụ 20 na 50 kwadebere maka mgbanwe ahụ
Somalia bu otu obodo no na Afrịka

Somaliland shilling (Somali , Arabic شلن صومال sensibiliدي; mkpirisi SLS; akara /-, mgbe ụfọdụ prefixed SlSh) bụ ego gọọmentị nke Republic of Somaliland
Shilling abụwo ego nke akụkụ Somalia kemgbe afọ 1921, mgbe ewepụtara shilling nke East Africa na British Somaliland protectorate

Mgbe nnwere onwe na afọ 1960 na njikọta nke ókèala ndị bụbu British Somaliland na Italian Somaliland, ego ha, East African shilling na somalo (nke hà nhata na uru) ka Somali shilling dochiri na afọ 1962
Aha ndị e ji mee ihe maka okpukpe ya bụ cent (otu centesimo; otutu centesimi) na Stans (ọtụtụ Stans), tinyere shilling (otu scellino; otutu scellini) na شلن
N'ọnwa Septemba afọ 1994, ndị omeiwu nke Somaliland kwadoro atụmatụ President Egal iji webata ego ọhụrụ iji dochie shilling Somali
E webatara Somaliland shilling na ubochi iri na asatọ nke ọnwa Ọktoba n'afo1994 na ọnụego nke SlSo1/- na SoSh100/-
A kwụsịrị ịnabata shilling Somalia dị ka ego iwu kwadoro na Somaliland na 31 Jenụwarị na afọ 1995
A na-ejikọta shilling Somaliland na dollar nke obodo United States na ọnụego nke SlSh580/12 na US $ 1
Naanị akwụkwọ ego 100/-, 500/-, 1,000/- na 5,000/- na-ekesa ugbu a
A na-ekewa shilling Somaliland n'ime puku cents, mana enwetụbeghị mkpụrụ ego ndị a na-akpọ cents n'ihi ọnụ ahịa ha dị ala
Mkpụrụ ego nwere ọnụ ahịa kachasị ala e wepụtara bụ mkpụrụ ego 1/- nke mbụ e mepụtara na afọ 1994 na Pobjoy Mint na obodo nke England ma si otú a nwee akara PM mint
N'afọ 2002, e wepụtara mkpụrụ ego abụo/- na ise/- nke nwere ihe ngosi nke onye nchọpụta Sir Richard Burton na oke ọkụkọ, n'otu n'otu
Mkpụrụ ego ndị ọzọ e wepụtara bụ mkpụrụ ego iri/- (nke na-egosi enwe) na mkpụrụ ego iri abụo/- (nke gosipụtara greyhound)
A naghị emepụta mkpụrụ ego Somaliland ma ọ bụ kesaa ya ugbu a

Somatel-Liebherr Spa bụ njikọ aka n'etiti ndi otu German Liebherr Group na Somatel subsidiary nke ENMTP N'ime mgbake ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke gọọmentị malitere maka mmepe na mmepe nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepe nke ngwá ọrụ ọrụ ọha na eze, e guzobere mmekọrịta ọhụrụ n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ abụọ dịka njikọ aka (JV), nke e guzobere na afo 2012 ma dị na mpaghara mmepụta ihe dị na Ain Smara Constantine, malitere mmepụta na afo 2013 n'okpuru akara Somatel-Libherr
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ndị isi abụọ nwere òkè, ha bụ Somatel nwere (51%) Onye nke abụọ nwere òkè bụ Liebherr Group onwekwaziri (49%),
Usoro ngwaahịa ndị ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mepụtara ugbu a gụnyere ndi a
Somaya Saeed Said Fetiha El Khashab (amụrụ na 20 Ọktoba 1976) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 1998, na-esonye n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, wee bụrụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme egwuregwu a ma ama na Egypt, na-emeri ọtụtụ ihe nrite
Ọ ghọkwara onye na-agụ egwu na 2009 mgbe ọ wepụtara abọm mbụ ya bụ Hayessal eh
Somaya El Khashab gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Faculty of Commerce na Mahadum Alexandria na 1997
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 1998, ọrụ mbụ ya bụ na usoro ihe nkiri TV nzuzo nke ụwa n'afọ 1998

Ọrụ ya kachasị ama na usoro ihe omume TV bụ na ezinụlọ Alhaj Metwali n'afọ 2001 ya na Nour El-Sherif, Eziokwu na Illusion n'afọ 2003 ya na Fifi Abdou na Yousuf Shaaban, Raya na Sakina n'afọ 2005 ya na Abla Kamel, Aj Ajmood Almasri na Mahmoud Abdel Aziz, The Satan Gardens na 2006
Ọ malitekwara ọrụ ya na egwu na 2009 mgbe ọ wepụtara abọm ya Hayessal eh, ya na Yehia Saada na Rindala Kodeih na-eme ọtụtụ vidiyo egwu
O wepụtara egwu ikpeazụ ya na 2019 na Jamil Almaghazi
O ritere ọtụtụ ihe nrite site na ọrụ ya, ọ ritere ihe nrite Murex d'Or site na Lebanọn na 2009 dị ka onye Arab kacha mma na-eme ihe nkiri

O nwetakwara onyinye ART site na Arab Radio na Television Network na 2013 dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma maka ọrụ ya na usoro TV Wind herit A na-asọpụrụ ya na Saudi Arabia mgbe ọ wepụtara abụ ya bụ ŌBtstaawaʹ ebe ọ na-ekwu maka ime ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị
O kwupụtara na ọ lụrụ di ugboro anọ na nzuzo
N'afọ 2017, ọ lụrụ onye Egypt na-agụ egwu bụ Ahmed Saad, ha gbara alụkwaghịm n'oge na-adịghị anya na Maachị 2019
O boro Ahmed Saad ebubo mmetọ n'ụlọ n'oge ajụjụ ọnụ TV ya na Basma Wehbe
Some Muge (1959-1997) bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge
A maara ya nke ọma maka mmeri mbụ nke Kenya na IAAF World Cross Country Championships, tupu ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Nke a mere mgbe ọ meriri ọla nchara na ogologo ọsọ nke 1983 World Cross Country Championships
Kenya nwetakwara ọla nchara na asọmupi otu
O meriri ọla nchara nke otu ahụ na 1981 World Cross Country Championships, mgbe ọ gwụchara nke 57 na ọsọ ahụ

Na 1986 World Cross Country Championships ọ mechara nke asatọ na asọmupi ahụ wee merie ọla edo na asọmupi otu, na 1987 World Cross Country Championship ọ mechara nke ise na asọmupi wee merie ihe nrite ọla edo ọzọ
O nwetakwara ọla nchara na 10,000 mita na All-Africa Games, wee bụrụ onye nke iri abụọ na abụọ na 10,000 mita n'asọmupi World Championships nke afọ 1987
Keta-Sometutuza ma ọ bụ Keta-sometutu Festival bụ emume owuwe ihe ubi kwa afọ nke ndị isi na ndị Agbozume na Ketu South District na mpaghara Volta nke Ghana na-eme
A na-emekarị ya izu abụọ mgbe emume Hogbetsotso gasịrị
Ndị Somey nke Agbozume, Denu na obodo ndị gbara ya gburugburu na-eme emume ya iji cheta mbata ha si Keta na 1792-94 mgbe Keta -Anloga War gasịrị
A na-emekarị ya na Satọdee nke atọ na Nọvemba
A na-enwe ihe ngosi ihu akwụkwọ na ihe egwu n'oge ememme ahụ
Enwekwara nnukwu durbar nke ndị isi na ndị ha na-achịEmemme a na-amalite site n'igosi emume ọdịnala na Keta na mbụ durbar n'Agbozume
Ndị isi na-asọpụrụ onye isi ha ma na-emeghachi nkwado ha n'ebe ọ nọ
N'oge ememme ahụ, a na-egosiputa ụdị Ewe Kente dị iche iche, yana akwa ọdịnala na nke ndị ọzọ kpara akpa
A na-eme emume ya iji mee ka ọpụpụ site na Keta, ebe ha si gaa ebe obibi ha ugbu a
Somkele Iyamah-Idhalama bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nlere na Naijiria
Amara ya ama maka ọtụtụ ọrụ ihe nkiri ya gunyere 93 Days (2016), The Wedding Party, The Arbitration (2016), na Gidi Up (2013)
O nwetara nsọpụrụ na onyinye dị iche iche na mmemme nke bụ Toronto International Film Festival ma na Africa International Film Festival
Amụrụ Iyamah na mpaghara Ika (Agbor) South nke Delta Steetị, na ezinulo Andrew na Onyi Iyamah
Ọ bụ nwa nke atọ n’ime ụmụaka anọ
Onye nkuzi bụ Mrs
Abe, webatara ya ịgba egwu na ihe nkiri ka ọ na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ Grange na Lagos
Somkele nwere nzere na biochemistry site na Mahadum McMaster
O wepụtara onwe ya n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi maka ọrụ ebere na McMaster ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nlere n'oge ezumike akwụkwọ na Nigeria
Ọrụ ya a ma ama maka TV nọ na AMVCA ndị a họpụtara na ndị a ma ama nke ọma gụnyere, 'GIDI UP' nke NdaniTv, Amazon 'THE EXPANSE' na 'CORONER' nke CBC

Ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri emeela ka ya na ndị Nollywood kachasị nwee mmeko dịka Steve Gukas na Kemi Adetiba na Danny Glover nke mere ihe nkiri 93 DAYS ebe Somkele mere dika otu n'ime ndị dọkịta dị ndụ bụ ndị oria Ebola jidere na Nigeria nke Steve Gukas duziri nke mechara merie ọtụtụ onyinye na nhọpụta na ụwa niile gunyere ELOY (maka nwaanyị kachasị mma nke afọ ahụ), nhọpụta AMVCA maka onye ọsọte nwanyị kachasị mma, mmeri AMVCA, mmeri TFAA, nhọpụta AMAA na AFRIFF
Ọ bụ onye nnọchite anya ọtụtụ nkwado ụlọ ọrụ dịka Multichoice Nigeria (DSTV Ambassador), Jewel Site Lisa, na The Access Bank Lagos City Marathon
Ọ na-eje ozi dịka Onyeisi Mpaghara otu ejiji nke bụ Andrea Iyamah
Somkele na-achịkwa otu ụlọ ejiji, Andrea Iyamah, nke nwanne ya nwaanyị nke ọ tọrọ Dumebi Iyamahguzobere

Somolu (ma ọ bụ Shomolu) bụ mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo (LGA) na Lagos
Ọ dị na Southwest Naijiria, North of Lagos city na isi ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa ya dị na Durosimi Streeti
Gọọmentị Obodo Somolu bụ akụkụ nke Lagos East Senatorial Zone na onye omeiwu na-anọchite anya distrikti na Federal House of Representatives
Somolu nwere nsogbu nke enweghị ahụike, ụgwọ dị elu, ịda ogbenye n'ozuzu ya na omenala ndị omempụ na-eto eto
A makwaara ya maka ụlọ ọrụ obibi akwụkwọ ya, nke bụ nke kachasị na Lagos na otu n'ime ndị kachasị dị iche iche n'ụwa
Karịsịa, enwere ike ịchọta ụlọ ahịa mbipụta na nke dijitalụ na uzo Bajulaiye
O nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 403,569 na 2006, dị ka ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi na steeti Naịjirịa si kwuo

Ọ bụ ezie na, ọnụọgụ a nwere ike ọ gaghị abụ nke ziri ezi ebe ọ bụ na a gbakọrọ ya site n'ịchọta ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi na Lagos n'ụzọ kwesịrị ekwesị mgbe ahụ site na iji data geospatial iji mata ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ na mpaghara gọọmentị mpaghara ọ bụla, enwere esemokwu banyere ọnụ ọgụgụ maka Lagos n'ozuzu ya
Gọvanọ nke Lagos Steeti, Bola Tinubu, kwuru na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke National Population Commission na Lagos mere n'otu oge ahụ mere ka ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi na steeti ahụ karịa nde 175
Ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ nke afọ 2006 chọpụtara na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị Lagos dị ihe dịka nde 9
Agbụrụ a ma ama bụ ndị Yoruba, nke ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ Egbas, Aworis, Ijebus na ndi Ilajes

A na-ahazi Somolu dị ka ọkwa nke atọ nke gọọmentị na asụsụ kachasị ewu ewu nke ndi Yoruba, ọ bụ ezie na Bekee na Naijiria aghọwo ihe a na-ahụkarị maka nkwurịta okwu n'etiti ndị Yoruba na agbụrụ ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ ihe dị ka 146 km2 n'ozuzu ya
Ọ bụ otu n'ime mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo nari asaa na iri asaa na ano na Naịjirịa, na iri abuo na Lagos
O nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu nke ndị bi na ya ma a raara ala ya nye ụlọ obibi na obere ihe a raara nye ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ
Somolu LGA kewara n'ime obodo asatọ, nke dị n'okpuru ngalaba nchịkwa asatọ; obodo ndị ahụ bụ Onipanu, Okesuna / Alase, Igbari, Fadeyi / Igbobi, Bashua, Orile / Alade, Bajulaiye na Ijebu-Tedo
Ngalaba nchịkwa 8 na-arụ ọrụ n'elu obodo ndị a ma na-akpọ ngalaba A, B, C, D, E, F, G na H

E guzobere gọọmentị ime obodo Somolu na Mee 27, 1976 site na ndị bụbu Kansụl Mpaghara Mushin dị ka nsonaazụ kpọmkwem nke ndị ọchịchị ọdịnala na ndị nọ n'ọkwá dị elu nke mpaghara Somolu na-agba mbọ maka nwere onwe
A na-akpọ ya Mushin East Local Goomenti Area na mbụ

Somolu etoola nke ukwuu n'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, n'ihi n'ụzọ dị ukwuu azụmahịa obibi akwụkwọ ya nke na-aga n'ihu na-adọta ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke ndị bi na ndị ọchụnta ego nke n'aka nke ya dugara na mmụba dị ịrịba ama na ọnụahịa ịgbazite
Ugbu a, Somolu bụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ obodo obibi akwụkwọ, ọ na-ejupụta mgbe niile na mkpọtụ sitere na igwe dị iche iche, dị ka ndị na-emepụta ike eji eme ihe na-ebi akwụkwọ

Dị ka ọ dị na Lagos ka ukwuu, Somolu ataala ahụhụ ma rite uru site na mmepe ngwa ngwa na ime obodo; uru ya gụnyere mmụba nke isi obodo na ụlọ ọrụ na mpaghara ahụ, ahụhụ gụnyere ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ buru ibu, akụrụngwa dara ogbenye, ọrụ na enweghị ọrụ, ịda ogbenye na ahụike na-adịghị mma

Omenala ndị òtù ọjọọ bụ ihe a ma ama na Somolu, ọkachasị ndị òtù ọjọọ dịka (Ndi ogbe), ndị na-anakọta ụtụ isi ugboro ugboro n'ebe ọha na eze, ọkachasị ahịa na ọdụ bọs, site n'aka ụmụ amaala nọ n'okpuru nrụgide, n'ụzọ dị ukwuu site na egwu ime ihe ike ma ọ bụrụ na akwụghị ego ahụ
N'ihi nke a, nkwanye ugwu, ime ihe ike na ịpụnara mmadụ ihe aghọwo ihe a na-ahụkarị n'etiti ndị ntorobịa ka ukwuu nke Somolu
A na-akpọ ndị ntorobịa na-eme ihe omume ndị a 'Touts', ma na-etinye aka n'ihe omume ndị dị ka ịlụ ọgụ n'okporo ámá, izu ohi, ndina n'ike na igbu ọchụ, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Touts na-ekwu na ha bụ ndị nwe ala ha na-achịkwa n'ihi ihe nketa ha, na-ekewapụ ha na ndị òtù ọdịda anyanwụ site na njikọ a guzobere na ala ha nke ha kwenyere na ọ na-enye ha ikike siri ike na ya
[citation needed] ọchịchọ ha maka ime ihe ike emeela ka ha nwee nghọta nke ndị na-anọghị na Tout subculture, nke na-eme ka omume ha nke ime ike, ha nwekwara usoro dị elu nke ndị isi agha

A na-achọ ka ndị na-eto eto na / ma ọ bụ ndị ọhụrụ gee ntị ma soro iwu nke ndị okenye ha ruo mgbe ha toro ma ọ bụ gosipụta nkà ma ọ bụ ike pụrụ iche iji mee ka ha dị iche na ndị otu na-enweghị ahụmahụ
Ógbè dị iche iche dị n'ime Somolu kewara ma bụrụ nke Oga Agberos (Area Boys Kingpins) na-achịkwa

Touts na-amata ibe ha site na iji aha njirimara ụfọdụ ma na-ekwurịta okwu n'etiti onwe ha site na okwu a n’ekwu e wuru ewu nke na-egosipụtakarị onwe ya dị ka ngwakọta nke Yoruba na Naijiria ma ọ bụ ụda Yoruba

N'agbanyeghị ọdịdị ọgụ ha, ha na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na netwọk jikọtara ọnụ nke na-enyere ha aka ịnọgide na-enwe mmekọrịta na kọntaktị yana ijide ndị Agberos n'otu n'otu ka ha kọọrọ ha n'ọnọdụ ebe enwere mkpesa ma ọ bụ ebe ekwere na mmadụ rụrụ ọrụ megide otu ahụ
Enwere ike ịkewapụta Touts n'ìgwè abụọ, nke ọnọdụ ndụ ha kewara
Ụfọdụ enweghị ebe obibi ma biri n'okporo ámá n'obere ìgwè nke Touts
Ha nwere ike, mgbe ụfọdụ, nwee ike ịzụta ụlọ ị ga-akwụ ụgwọ, mana ha na-ehi ụra n'okporo ámá
Ndị ọzọ na ndị mụrụ ha bi ma na-etinye aka na omenala Tout site na nke a
Ọtụtụ oge ha ga-aga megide ọchịchọ ndị mụrụ ha n'ime nke a
Mgbe ụfọdụ, ha nwere ike ịhapụ ụlọ ha iji chụsoo ụdị ndụ nke otu mbụ ahụ, mana ha na ndị mụrụ ha na-anọgide na-ebi n'ụlọ
Ha na-ebi ndụ ehihie yiri nke ndị na-enweghị ebe obibi, agbanyeghị na nchekwa ọzọ nke ụlọ dị nchebe na ikike ịdabere na ego
[citation needed]
Naịjirịa nwere obi abụọ okpukpe zuru oke maka ọgwụ orthodox, nke na-eduga na ịdabere n'ekpere na ndụmọdụ nke ndị ụkọchukwu ha mgbe ha na-eche nsogbu ahụike ihu
Somolu nwere naanị ngalaba ịmụ nwa asatọ, nke a, tinyere ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze ya, emeela ka nsogbu dị ịrịba ama na nke na-aga n'ihu na ọmụmụ nwụrụ anwụ n'ógbè ahụ
N'ógbè Lagos ka ukwuu, ebe obibi maka ndị ogbenye mejupụtara ihe dịka 70% nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ụlọ niile
Nke a bụ ihe dịka nde mmadụ iri na ise, nke pụtara na enwere ike inwe ihe ruru nde ụlọ abụọ ma ọ bụ atọ na-adịghị mma gafee obodo ukwu Lagos
Somolu, na mpaghara ndị okenye nke Mushin, a na-ewere dị ka akụkụ nke nnukwu obodo Lagos ma na-ata ahụhụ site na nke a n'ụdị oke mmadụ na nhazi ụlọ ezumike na-abụghị nke iwu kwadoro
E guzobere Lagos Steeti Urban Renewal Board na 1991 iji lụso nsogbu a ọgụ
A gbanwere ya ma nye ya aha ọzọ ka ọ bụrụ Lagos State Urban Renewal Authority (LASURA) n'afọ 2005

Onipanu, Pedro, Akoka na mpaghara ndị dị otú ahụ na-agbaso ụkpụrụ nke atụmatụ nke na-eme ka ọnọdụ ndụ zuru oke na atụmatụ mpaghara dị irè, mana mpaghara ndị dị ka Ilaje na Bariga na-eme atụmatụ nke ọma ma hụ na ọnọdụ obibi dị ala
Somolu LGA nwere ọtụtụ ụlọ dị elu, nke na-etolite iji gbalịa igbo mkpa ụlọ
A na-azụta ụlọ, nke bara ụba, ma na-ebibi ya iji wuo ụlọ ndị ọzọ
Obodo ukwu Lagos dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri dị warara n'akụkụ Oké Osimiri Atlantic
N'ihi nke a, n'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, usoro dị ukwuu nke mgbanwe ala iji nweta ala maka mmepe obodo; a na-eme nke a site na ijupụta ala mmiri na ala mmiri
N'ime Lagos LGAs niile nwere ụsọ oké osimiri, Somolu nwere 90% nke mpaghara ya niile e wuru, nke kachasị ukwuu, ma e jiri ya tụnyere nkezi nke karịrị 50%
Tụkwasị na nke a, 100% nke ala mmiri dị na mpaghara Somolu efunahụla iwu site na 1986-2006
Nke a bụ n'ụzọ dị ukwuu maka mmepụta nke ebe obibi, nke a na-akwụ ụgwọ, mana na mgbakwunye na iwu okporo ụzọ na ụzọ ndị ọzọ iji gbasaa netwọk Somolu

N'ihi na a manyere ndị bi na Somolu ka ha banye n'ụlọ ndị ogbenye na ebe obibi ndị na-enweghị ọrụ, yana nnukwu ọrụ na enweghị ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ obibi akwụkwọ, ọnụ ọgụgụ mpụ ndị bi n'ógbè ahụ emeela amụba
Na akụkọ mpụ ndị uwe ojii Naịjirịa nke afọ 2005, a chọpụtara na Somolu bụ nke abụọ n'ihe gbasara mpụ ndị e mere n'ime mpụ niile a kọrọ na mpaghara gọọmentị mpaghara Lagos
Nke a na-ejikọta ya na omenala na-agbasawanye nke mpụ ndị ntorobịa na-eme n'ógbè ahụ
Somolu nwekwara ihe owuwu na usoro mmepe nke na-eme ka ọrụ mpụ, yana ọnọdụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya maka ọnụnọ dị ukwuu nke mpụ

Abdul Hamed Salawu, onye isi oche nke Gọọmentị Obodo Somolu, ejirila usoro ' siri ike na mpụ' mee ihe maka ndị uwe ojii kemgbe ọ banyere n'ọkwa, na-akatọ ọtụtụ ugboro ime ihe ike nke ndị òtù na òtù 'ndị òtù', ebe ọ na-ekwe nkwa ịhụ na Somolu enweghị mpụ n'ọdịnihu
Ndị uwe ojii Naịjirịa, gụnyere ndị uwe ojii Lagos Steeti, enweela ọtụtụ mkpesa na ngagharị iwe n'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya n'ihi ime ihe ike na mwakpo mmekọahụ megide ụmụ amaala na ndị e jidere
Ụlọ ọrụ obibi akwụkwọ Somolu es bụ nke kachasị ukwuu na Naịjirịa, yana n'etiti ndị kachasị dị iche iche n'ụwa
Mgbasawanye nke ígwè obibi akwụkwọ gafee mpaghara ahụ emeela ka ọtụtụ ụlọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ụlọ ahịa na ụlọ obibi
[citation needed] Nke a emeela ka ọnụ ahịa ịgbazite dị ịrịba ama na mpaghara ahụ, na-eme ka ọ dịpụrụ adịpụ, ọ bụ ezie na ọ dị oke, n'agbanyeghị ahịa obibi akwụkwọ a siri ike
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2010, ụlọ ọrụ obibi akwụkwọ were ihe karịrị mmadụ 15,000 n'ọrụ dị iche iche

Oodua Trust ekwuola na a ka na-amata ya dị ka onye na-ewe ndị ọrụ n'ọrụ kachasị ukwuu na Lagos n'èzí gọọmentị steeti, nke Somolu kwadoro na-enwe otu n'ime ndị kasị ukwuu, ndị mmadụ kacha biri na mpaghara gọọmentị Lagos niile, ọ bụ ezie na enwere ike ikpebi ọnụ ọgụgụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi n'ihi usoro ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị ọrụ gọọmentị

N'ihi aha ya dị ka mpaghara obibi akwụkwọ, a maara ndị mmanye iwu ka ha na-awakpo ụlọ ọrụ obibi akwụkwọ dị iche iche na mpaghara ahụ mgbe niile, nke nwere ike imenye ndị ahịa egwu, na-emenye ha egwu nke na-emebi azụmahịa

A na-ekwere na Somolu ka bụ ebe ikpeazụ nke ndị na-emepụta ihe site na Oluwole Market, nke a ma ama maka ịbụ isi ebe a na-emepụta na Lagos, nke mere ka ọrụ dị ukwuu na nke dịgasị iche iche na ịghọ aghụghọ

Ụfọdụ ndị a na-amaghị aha ha agba akaebe na nke a, na-azọrọ na ndị na-eduhie eduhie na-abata n'isi ụtụtụ, na-abụkarị n'ihe dị ka elekere 1-3 nke ụtụtụ, iji bipụta asambodo ọmụmụ, paspọtụ, ego mba ọzọ na akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ dị iche iche
Tụkwasị na nke a, a na-azọrọ na ha na-ebipụta ọtụtụ ọrụ iwu iji kpuchie ọrụ ha ma ọ bụrụ na a wakporo ya
N'agbanyeghị na ụlọ ọrụ obibi akwụkwọ na-achịkwa ndị ọrụ Somolu ma na-amanye ụlọ obibi iji kwado ọdịmma azụmahịa, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ka na-arụ ọrụ na obere
Ọ bụghị ọnụ ala ibipụta n'ime Somolu karịa ka ọ dị na mba ndị ọzọ ma ọ bụ mpaghara Naịjirịa, ọ bụghịkwa ọnụ ala maka ndị ahịa ịzụta mbipụta karịa site na ahịa ndị ọzọ a
Nke a bụ n'ihi enweghị mmasị na enyemaka gọọmentị steeti maka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ọ natara obere ego gọọmentị kemgbe ọ pụtara dị ka ahịa dị mkpa, na-arụ ọrụ n'ụzọ dị ukwu n' ime onwe ya
A pụkwara ịchọta obere obodo nke ndị na-ere ọkụkọ n'ebe ugwu Somolu, nke dị na Junction Onipanu
Somrai (Sumrey), nkè á makwaara dị kà Sibine (Shibne), bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic nkè á na-asụ ná mpaghara ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Chadian nkè Tandjilé ná Lai
Ndị na-asụ mà ọ bụ Somrai abụghị asụsụ abụọ; asụsụ ahụ anaghị aghọta ibé yá nà onye ọ bụla ọzọ, ébé ọ bụ ná ọdịdị ókwú yá kachasị élú ná asụsụ ọzọ bụ ná Ndam (42%)
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-ekwu ókwú, ndị na-akpọ onwé há Shibne mà ọ bụ Sibine, na-emekarị okpukpe ọdịnala, Iso Ụzọ Kraịst, mà ọ bụ Islam

Somyev (Somyewe), nke a makwaara dị ka Kila ('onye na-agba oji' na Fulfulde), bụ asụsụ Mambiloid nke fọrọ nke nta ka ọ ghara ịla n'iyi nke obodo abụọ, otu na Nigeria na otu na Cameroon, nke otu ndị na-eji oji bi n'etiti Mambila na-asụ
Ọ bụ ezie na a ka na-eji asụsụ ahụ eme ihe maka nkwurịta okwu kwa ụbọchị, a mụrụ ọgbọ kasị nta nke ndị ọkà okwu n'afọ 1950
Mbufe nke asụsụ ahụ kwụsịrị mgbe ọrụ nke ndị na-agba oji tụfuru ọnọdụ ọha mmadụ, otu akụkụ n'ihi mbubata ngwá ọrụ mba ọzọ
Àtụ Northern Bantoid languages
Sona Jobarteh (amụrụ n'afọ 1983) bụ onye Britain na-egwu ọtụtụ ngwá egwu, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu nke nwere mgbọrọgwụ Gambia
Ọ si n'otu n'ime ezinụlọ ise na-egwu egwu kora nke West Africka, ọ bụkwa nwanyị mbụ na-egwu egwuregwu kora si n'ezinụlọ griot
Ọ bụ nwa nwanne nne nke onye egwu kora a ma ama bụ Toumani Diabate, ọ bụkwa nwanne nwanyị nke onye egwu egwu kora bụ Tunde Jegede
A mụrụ ya na London, Maya Sona Jobarteh bụ onye otu n'ime ezinụlọ ise na-akpọ kora (griot) si West Afrika, na nwanyị mbụ so n'ezinụlọ dị otú ahụ iji bụrụ onye a ma ama na ngwá ọrụ a
Egwú nke ụbọ akwara iri abụọ na otu a na-agafe site n'aka nna gaa n'aka nwa
Ngwá egwu ahụ bụ ihe dị mkpa nke ndị Mandingo nọ n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka ma na-echekwa egwu ha naanị maka ezinụlọ ụfọdụ a na-akpọ griot

Ọ mụọla kora kemgbe ọ dị afọ atọ, nke nwanne ya nwoke Tunde Jegede, onye ji afọ iri na otu tọọ ya, na onye ya na ya na-eme njem ọtụtụ ugboro n'afọ na Gambia dị ka nwatakịrị, na nna ya, Sanjally Jobarteh
Ọ gara Royal College of Music, ebe ọ gụrụ cello, piano na harpsichord, ma n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ gara Purcell Akwụkwọ nke Egwu iji mụọ ihe osise
Ọ gụchara nzere na SOAS, Mahadum London
Ọ na-asụ Mandinka nakwa Bekee nke ọma
O mere ihe ngosi mbụ ya na Jazz Café nke London, mgbe ọ dị afọ 4, ma rụọ ọrụ na mmemme ọtụtụ ugboro n'oge ọ bụ nwata

Mgbe ọ ka bụ nwa akwụkwọ egwu, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ọrụ egwu gụnyere 'River of Sound' na Irish Chamber Orchestra, nke gosipụtara Evelyn Glennie, na ọrụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere arụmọrụ na Royal Philharmonic Orchestra, Britten Sinfonia, Milton Keynes City Orchestra na Viva Chamber Orchestra
Jobarteh na-akụzi kora na London
Ya na nna ya, Sanjally Jobarteh, rụkọrọ ọrụ n'ịmepụta ụlọ akwụkwọ egwu dị na Gambia, nke akpọrọ aha nna nna ya a ma ama
Sona Jobarteh mere nke mbụ ya dị ka onye na-ede ihe nkiri na 2009 mgbe e nyere ya ọrụ ịmepụta ụda maka ihe nkiri ihe nkiri gbasara Afrịka nke akpọrọ Motherland
Akara ahụ bụ nchọpụta ọhụrụ n'ime ihe ngosi ihe nkiri nke ụwa ụda nke Afrika
Ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ n'ime akara Jobarteh sitere na ọdịnala griot nke West Africa, ọ ghaghịkwa imepụta ya iji kwado ihe ndị a chọrọ n'ebe a na-ahụ anya

N'ime ihe okike nke ọdịdị pụrụ iche nke Afrịka bụ izere Jobarteh nke ihe abụọ dị mkpa; nke mbụ, ịdabere na ihe nkiri nke ihe eji egwú ọdịda anyanwụ, na nke abụọ, mmeri nke ịgbà dị ka akara aka nke nnọchite anya egwu Afrịka
A mụrụ ya n'England nke sitere n'ihe nketa Afrịka, ọ na-ejikọkwa ya na nke ikpeazụ
N'ịbụ onye na-etinye oge dị ukwuu na England na Gambia, ọ na-agwakọta ụdị egwu dị iche iche, site na omenala Europe na West Africa
Otú ọ dị, n'adịghị ka ndị ọgbọ ya, ọ na-enyocha ma gbasaa na mgbọrọgwụ ọdịnala Afrika kama ịnwa ijikọta ha na hip-hop na jazz nke oge a
Kama nke ahụ, ọ na-achọ ịkọwa egwu ọdịnala
Na mgbakwunye na kora, ọ na-abụkwa abụ ma na-akpọ ụbọ akwara
SONACOME (Société Nationale de Construction Mecanique) bụ onye na-emepụta ngwá ọrụ owuwu na obodo Algeria
E guzobere ya na Algiers na afo 1967, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ emepụtala ụgbọala na-adịghị agba n'okporo ụzọ maka Dakar Rally
SNVI, onye na-emepụta gwongworo, bụ onye enyemaka ulo oru ahu
Sonagas (Sociedad Nacional de Gas de Guinea Ecuatorial) bụ ụlọ ọrụ gas nke mba Equatorial Guinea
E hiwere ya n'afọ 2005
Ọ na-arụkọ ọrụ na GEPetrol, ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ ala nke mba ahụ, na EG LNG, ụlọ ọrụ gas na-ahụ maka mmiri mmiri nke mba ahụ, iji jikwaa akụrụngwa mmanụ mmanụ nke mba ahụ
Ndị ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ Director General Juan Antonio Ndong Ondo na Assistant Director General Serapio Sima Ntutumu
Christopher Darnell Cook (amụrụ n'October 5, 1988), nke a maara dị ka Sonaro, bụ onye America na-emepụta egwu si Far Rockaway, New York
A maara ya nke ọma màkà ịmepụta egwu màkà ónyé na-eti egwu na Brooklyn bụ Fabolous
O mepụtara maka ọtụtụ ndị rapper ndị ọzọ, dị ka French Montana, Jeezy, Jadakiss, Styles P, Flipp Dinero, Lloyd Banks, Paul Cain, Prodigy, Jim Jones, na Meek Mill
A mụrụ Sonaro na Far Rockaway ma zụlite ya na Brooklyn
N'inwe mmasị na mmepụta egwu site na nwata, Sonaro ghọrọ ónyé na-emepụta ihe n'ụlọ màkà Needlz ebe ọ mụtara imepụta ụda ya
N'oge a, Sonaro rutere ebe mbụ ya na Stack Bundles Biddin' War Vol 2
nke DJ Clue kwadoro, na-emepụta egwu 'Rockin' itī nke gosipụtara Jim Jones na Max B
Sonaro sochiri nkè a n'oge na-adịghị anya na 'Thang On Me' site na Lil' Kimī Ms
GOAT
ọrụ, nké gosipụtara Maino, Mister Cee, na Sha Dash
Na Machị 5, 2010, Fabolous na DJ Drama wepụtara mixtape There Is No Competition 2 The Funeral Service nké gosipụtara Sonaro mepụtara egwu 'Body Ya'
A gbakwunyere égwu ahụ ngwa ngwa na Hot 97, na Def Jam wepụtara égwu ahụ na There Is No Competion 2 The Grieving Music EP
EP gosipụtara mmepụta ọzọ site na Sonaro, na onyinye ọhụrụ site na Lex Luger, Ryan Leslie, na Jahlil Beats
Sonatel (Société Nationale des Télécommunications du Senegal) bụ onye na-eweta ekwentị na Senegal
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na telephony ahịrị ahịrị, ekwentị mkpanaaka, ọrụ ịntanetị, telivishọn na nkwukọrịta ụlọ ọrụ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-etinye aka n'iwu netwọk fiber optics na Africa ma na-ejikwa eriri fiber 2,200 na Senegal
Isi ụlọ ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị na Dakar, isi obodo Senegal
Orange SA
nwere 4233% njikwa na Sonatel, nke edepụtara na Bourse Régionale des Valeurs Mobilières (BRVM)
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ nke abụọ na-enye ọrụ ekwentị mkpanaaka na Bamako, Mali, ma nwee ndị ahịa ekwentị 1,000,000 na mba ahụ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-etinye aka na ịmepụta netwọk fiber optics na Africa ma na-ejikwa eriri fiber 2,200 kilomita na Senegal
Madagascar, Côte d'Ivoire, Mali na Moldova
Sondra Perry bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na-arụ ọrụ na vidiyo, mgbasa ozi kọmputa, na arụmọrụ
Ọ na-enyocha isiokwu agbụrụ, njirimara, akụkọ ezinụlọ, na teknụzụ
Sondra Perry nwetara BFA na Mahadum Alfred na 2012, na MFA na Machị Columbia na 2015
Perry enweela ọtụtụ ihe ngosi onwé ya, gụnyere na The Kitchen, màkà ọrụ ya 'Resident Evil', na Institute for New Connotative Action
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na MoMA PS1 na The Museum of Contemporary Art na Los Angeles, na ntanetị na Rhizome
E gosipụtara ọrụ vidiyo Perry na Tribeca Cinemas na New York, Les Voutes na Paris, France, LuXun Academy of Fine Arts Museum na Shenyang, China, na LOOP Barcelona Media Arts Festival
Site na Jenụwarị ruo Mee 2017, Sondra Perry nwèrè ihe ngosi onwe ya, anụ ahụ, na Squeaky Wheel Film and Media Art Center na Buffalo, New York
E nyèrè Perry 2017 Louis Comfort Tiffany Foundation Grant, na 2017 Gwendolyn Knight na Jacob Lawrence Prize, nke gụnyere ihe ngosi onwé ónyé na Seattle Art Museum na puku iri
Ọ natawokwa Worldstudio AIGA Scholarship na agụmakwụkwọ site na Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculpture, ebe obibi ndị na-ese ihe na Maine
Perry bụ ónyé mbụ natara MOCA Cleveland's Toby's Prize, nke ruru puku iri ise
N'afọ 2018 Perry nwetakwara onyinye Nam June Paik nke puku iri abụọ na asatọ nke ụlọ ọrụ nka Kunststiftung NRW nyèrè iji sọpụrụ ndị na-ese ihe na-arụ ọrụ na nka mgbasa ozi
Perry abụwo ónyé otu ngalaba na Columbia University School of the Arts, ébé ọ kụziiri Advanced Video ma ụmụ akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụmụ akwụkwọ

Ọrụ Perry na-enyocha 'ọchịchịrị, nwanyị ojii, ihe nketa ndị Africa America' na ngosipụta ma ọ bụ nnọchite anya ndị isi ojii n'akụkọ ihe méré eme niile, na-elekwasịkarị anya n'ụzọ ojii si emetụta teknụzụ na ime ihe oyiyi
Perry na-enyocha duality nke ọgụgụ isi na seductivity n'ihe gbásárá ihe nketa ezinụlọ ndị isi ojii, akụkọ ihe méré eme ndị isi ojii

'Perry na-etinye aka na nnọpụiche na echiche nke mmepụta na ime ihe n'otu, na-eji ngwanrọ na-emeghe emezi ọrụ ya ma na-akwụ ya ụgwọ dijitalụ maka iji ya na gallery na klas, ebe ọ na-emekwa vidiyo ya niile màkà n'efu n'ịntanetị

Ụkpụrụ a nke ohere a na-emeghe n'omume Perry na-ezube inye ndụ ndị isi ojii ihe ùgwù, iji mee ka ohere nke nka na ọdịbendị dị mfe, yana inye ikpo okwu dị oke egwu nke dị iche na ngosipụta nke ojii na mgbasa ozi
Màkà Perry, ojii bụ teknụzụ nke na-emepụta oghere na usoro nlekota na njikwa ma si otú a na-emepụta adịghị arụ ọrụ dị ka ohere màkà nguzogide
42 Black Panther Balloons on 125th Street (2014)
N'ile anya màkà ma ndị na-atọ ọchị ma ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Perry mepụtara 42 Black Panther Balloons na 125th Street, ébé ọ na-ebu ụyọkọ mylar black panther balloons gbụrụ-gbúrụ ọbọdọ ahụ
Otu ka na-egosi balloons ndị e jidere n'akụkụ okporo ámá n'ụzọ ga-eme ka ónyé na-ejide ha kpuchie ma jikọta ha ka ha bụrụ ihe a kọwara dị ka ahụ na-adịghị mma na nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A na-eji ụfọdụ n'ime otu ụdị balloons mee ihe na vidiyo YouTube ya, Black Panther Cam, nke obéré ụyọkọ nke black panther mylar balloons na-ese n'elu mmiri na ụlọ ọrụ ónyé na-ese ihe
N'afọ 2017 Perry meriri Gwendolyn Knight na Jacob Lawrence Prize, nkè o gosipụtara ihe ngosi ya Eclogue For Inhabitability na Seattle Art Museum
Ihe nrite ahụ gụnyere ihe ngosi nke onwe a, yana onyinye puku iri
Nke a bụ ógè mbụ n'akụkọ ihe méré eme nke ihe Nríte ahụ na e nyèrè ónyé na-ese vidio
Sonelgaz (Arabic سونلغاز, Société Nationale de l'Electricité et du Gaz, National Company for Electricity and Gas) bụ ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị nwe na-ahụ maka ọkụ eletrik na nkesa gas na ala Algeria
E hiwere ya n'afọ 1969, nọchiri ya bụ Electricité et gaz d'Algérie (EGA), ma nye ya ikike maka ikesa na ire gas dị n'ime obodo yana mmepụta, nkesa, mbubata na mbupụ ọkụ eletrik

N'afọ 2002, a kagburu ikike ya site n'iwu onye isi ala N° 02-195, bụ nke gbanwere ya n'ụzọ iwu ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ ọrụ nzuzo (n'agbanyeghị na gọọmentị nwere kpamkpam); a na-ahazi ugbu a ka ọ kewaa n'ikpeazụ
Dị ka nke 2003, ọ na-emepụta 29 ijeri kWh kwa afọ, na-ere gas 46 ijeri cubic mita kwa afọ, na-ewe ihe fọrọ nke nta ka 20,000 mmadụ n'ọrụ
