Song bụ obodo na mpaghara gọọmentị dị na Adamawa Steeti, Naịjirịa bụ obodo ma bụrụkwa ọchịchị ime Obodo dị na steeti ahụ na kansụl mpaghara nke nwere mpaghara Song, Dumme, Dirma, Kilange, Funa, Gudu, Mboi, Kilange
Hirna, Gari, Waje, Suktu, Zumo, Waltandi na Ditera
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bi na Song bụ 260, 900
Àtụ LGAs and communities of Adamawa State
Songololo Voices of Change bụ ihe nkiri Canada, nke Marianne Kaplan duziri ma wepụta na 1990

Nyocha nke South Africa n'oge mbụ nke mgbanwe site na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ gaa na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, ihe nkiri ahụ na-enyocha ike egwu na nkà dị ka ngwá ọrụ nke ime ihe na mgbanwe mmekọrịta ọha na eze, na-elekwasị anya na onye edemede Gcina Mhlophe na onye na-egwu egwu Mzwakhe Mbuli
Mgbasa ozi ya na TVOntario bụ dị ka ihe omume nke usoro ihe omume nke netwọk Human Edge

Emume Songs of Nigeria Festival (SONIFES) bụ emume a na-eme na Naijiria bụ nke chọrọ ịkwalite ụdịdị dị iche iche dị na omenala Naijiria wee na-akwalite ịdị n'otu udo n'etiti ndị Naijiria site na nka na mmemme omenala ndị ọzọ

Emere emume Songs of Nigeria Festival (SONIFES) nke mbụ n'afọ 2009 nke Ebumnobi ya bu ikpọkọta ndị otu omenala si n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke mba ahụ ka ha na-agbakọta n'otu ọnụ iji mee emume egwu Naijiria
Onye odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke egwu egwu Nigeria (SONIFES) bụ Chuks Akamadu
E mere emume nke iri nke abụ nke Nigeria Festival (SONIFES) n'ụdị dị egwu n'afọ 2018 wee webata ọtụtụ ihe ọhụrụ iji mee ka mmemme ahụ pụta ìhè
Ihe ngosi 2018 nke Songs of Nigeria Festival (SONIFES) mere na Tọzdee, Nọvemba 15, 2018 na Shehu Yar'Adua center na Abuja, Nigeria

Ememme a gosipụtara ọtụtụ ndị ama ama na ndị ọrụ gọọmentị, ụfọdụ ndị ama ama bụ ndị mere emume mmemme gụnyere odeakwụkwọ gọọmentị etiti (SGF), Boss Mustapha na nwunye onye isi ndị agha mbụ bụ Victoria Aguiyi
-Ironsi nọ na ndokwa ikwu okwu na 2018 mbipụta nke Ememme

Onye ode akwụkwọ nchịkwa nke SONIFES, Chuks Akamadu mekwara ka a mara na mbipụta 2018 nke mmemme a bu n'obi ileba anya n'ịdị n'otu n'ụdị dị iche iche, ya mere isiokwu ya bụ 'Ịmepụta mma nke ụdị dị iche iche anyị

Ụlọ ọrụ Seven Up Bottling nwekwara obi ụtọ ịbụ onye nkwado nke 2018 nke Songs of Nigeria Festival (SONIFES) dịka ha gosipụtara obi ụtọ ha n'ịkwado mmemme ọ bụla na-akwalite omenala Nigeria dị iche iche
Songs of Paapieye bụ abọm nke anọ nke onye egwu Ghana bụ SK Kakraba, nke Awesome Tapes From Africa wepụtara n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2015, na-aghọ abọm mbụ nke ihe mbụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ wepụtara

Abọm ahụ gosipụtara ikike Kakraba nwere n'ihe gbasara ike, ụdị osisi, 14-slatted xylophone sitere na obodo Kakraba bụ Ghana nke gosipụtara ụda dị iche iche, nke na-eme mkpọtụ na ụda na-emebi ngwa ngwa nke ududo na-adọkpụ mgbidi silk gafere oghere gourds, nke a maara n'asụsụ Lobi nke Kakraba dị ka pappieye, nke na na-enye abọm aha ya
Ọ dị nro na ụda karịa album ya gara aga Yonye ma na-aga ngwa ngwa, na-egosi mgbagwoju anya, mgbagwoju egwu, drones na mkparịta ụka n'etiti ala, buzzing basslines na elu, syncopated notes
Ọtụtụ egwu nwere ọtụtụ ụzọ ma na-agagharị n'etiti ngalaba dị iche iche
Kakraba dekọtara ọba ahụ n'onwe ya na-enweghị ihe ọ bụla ma ọ bụ nkwado sitere n'aka ndị egwu ndị ọzọ, ma jiri naanị gyil mee ihe
Egwu a bụ okirikiri egwu, nke na-esite na egwu ọdịnala Ghana, n'agbanyeghị na enwere ihe izizi na ọba ahụ
N'ime egwu egwu, enwere iberibe olili ozu atọ
Mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya, ebe e mere ya n'ụdị dị iche iche, album ahụ bụ otu n'ime naanị ọtụtụ ọba egwu gil
Ọ nwetara otuto dị oke egwu, yana ndị nkatọ na-akọwapụta ụda na timbres pụrụ iche nke ngwa ahụ, nka nka nke ọba ahụ na usoro omume ọma nke Kakraba
SK Kakraba bụ onye isi nke xylophone, ngwá ọrụ Ghana nke nwere resonators calabash gourd na slats osisi 14 a kwụnyere n'ofe ha

Ụda mkpọtụ nke na-ada ụda na ọkwa ọ bụla, yana usoro ire ure ogologo karịa ederede ahụ, na-esi na mgbidi silk nke akpa ududo na-adọkpụ gafee oghere gourds, nke a maara n'asụsụ Lobi nke Kakraba dị ka pappieye
Ọ bụ ezie na otu ihe na-esote nke ọzọ, mkpọtụ pappieye site na nke mbụ emebeghị kpamkpam, na-emepụta ụdị ụda nke West Africa nke dị mgbagwoju anya karịa nke naanị ya
Kakraba na-eme, na-ewu, na-akụzi ma na-ere ngwá egwú ahụ

O bu ụzọ zụlite nkà ya na ngwá egwú ahụ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na Saru, Ghana, obodo ọrụ ugbo, wee gaa n'ihu bụrụ otu n'ime ndị a ma ama na ndị a ma ma ama na-egwu egwu, karịsịa mgbe ọ kwagara Accra na 1997 n'ihe dị ka afọ 20, ebe Kakraba na-akpọ ngwá egwú ya gburugburu zongos (Muslim ghettos) na Central Accra, nke nyeere Kakraba aka inweta 'kpu kwa ụbọchị' ya
O mechara malite ịkụzi ngwá egwú ahụ na Mahadum nke Ghana 'International Centre for African Music and Dance'
Sonié Joi Thompson-Ruffin (amụrụ n'afọ 1951 na Joplin, Missouri) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, onye edemede, onye na-ese onyinyo, ónyé nhazi Ọbọdọ, na onye nlekọta
Ruffin na-emepụta akwa site na iji akwa, ihe nnọchianya, na ntinye aka na akwa akwa Africa nke na-enyocha okwu ndị metụtara ikike mmadụ, agbụrụ, na okike
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na United States, Africa, na Europe, na Renwick Gallery nke Smithsonian American Art Museum, White House Rotunda, na Nelson-Atkins Museum of Art
Ọ bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na Charlotte Street Foundation na onye na-elekọta ụlọ na American Jazz Museum
Thompson-Ruffin bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere African American Artists Collective, otu ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka na Kansas City
A họpụtara Thompson-Ruffin ka o mepụta mkpuchi ncheta Nelson Mandela site na South African Consulate na Grace and Holy Trinity Cathedral
A na-edebe ọrụ ya na nchịkọta dịka Spencer Museum of Art na Lawrence, Kansas, na ndị ọzọ
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'ihu akwụkwọ akụkọ New Letters na nke KC Studio Magazine
Sonia Toumia (amụrụ na June 2, 1976) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tunisia bụ onye otu nzukọ iwu site na 23 Ọktoba 2011 ruo mgbe a gbasara ya na 26 Ọktobe 2014
Onye nnọchi anya otu ndị Alakụba Ennahdha maka ịnyịnya Monastir, a maara ya maka ntinye aka ya na-atọ ọchị n'oge nnọkọ zuru ezu
Toumia bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Institute of Press and Information Sciences
Toumia rụrụ ọrụ na Ministry of Agriculture ruo afọ iri, yana ide edemede maka akwụkwọ akụkọ L'Agruculteur na akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 2009, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Democratic Constitutional Rally, mana o kwuru n'afọ 2013 na a chụrụ ya n'ọrụ n'ihi na ọ jụrụ ito ọchịchị ahụ
Mgbe mgbanwe nke afọ puku abụọ na iri na otu gasịrị, Toumia sonyeere Ennahdha ma nọrọ na ndepụta nke ndị na-azọ ọkwa maka ịnyịnya Monastir na ntuli aka 2011
Dị ka onye otu nzukọ iwu, a maara ya maka ntinye aka ya na-atọ ọchị n'oge nnọkọ

Ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ndị omeiwu Islamist ibe ya na-eji Arabic oge ochie eme ihe, Toumia kwuru okwu na French, na-enweta ịkwa emo n'ihu ọha maka ụda olu ya na enweghị nkà n'asụsụ ahụ, ma na-eduga na ndị isi otu ahụ na-arịọ ya ka ọ pụọ na mgbasa ozi
N'oge a na-edepụta iwu ọhụrụ ahụ, Toumia were iwe mgbe ndị ọka iwu kọwara akwụkwọ ahụ dị ka nzọụkwụ azụ azụ maka ụmụ nwanyị, na-ekwu na aghọtaghị ya

N'abalị asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2014, Toumia kwupụtara na ewepụla ya na ndepụta Ennahdha maka ntuli aka na-abịanụ na-ekwu na 'naanị ihe ọjọọ ya bụ eziokwu ya, obi ike ya na akara ya na National Constituent Assembly'
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na isii, ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Ministry of Agriculture, ma kwuo na a kwaliteghị ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya anọ n'ihi ibu iro n'ebe ọ nọ
Toumia lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ nwanyị atọ
Ọ bụ onye Alakụba ma na-eyi hijab
N'afọ 2016, a mara nwanne ya nwoke, Sofiene Ben Toumia, ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ iri na abụọ maka ọrụ ya n'ịkpọbata ndị na-eto eto ka ha sonye n'òtù ndị na-eyi ọha egwu
Soniia Cheah Su Ya (Chinese, amụrụ na 19 June 1993) bụ onye Malaysia na-egwu badminton
Ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị nke Lydia Cheah Li Ya onye bụkwa onye n'eme egwuregwu badminton
N'ọrụ ya dị obere, ọ nọchitere anya Malaysia na 2009, 2010, na 2011 Asian Junior Championships, World Junior Championships، 2010 Summer Youth Olympics, na 2011 Commonwealth Youth Games
O meriri n'asọmpi mba ụwa mbụ ya na- asọmpi mba ụwa nke Belgium na 2016
Cheah sonyere na 2018 Commonwealth Games
Ụmụ nwanyị na-alụbeghị di
Ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
BWF Grand Prix nwere ọkwa abụọ, BWF Grand Prize na Grand Prix Gold
Ọ bụ usoro asọmpi badminton nke Badminton World Federation (BWF) kwadoro kemgbe afọ 2007

Asụsụ Soninke (Soninke Sooninkanxanne), nke a makwaara dị ka Serakhulle ma ọ bụ Azer ma ọ bụ Maraka, bụ asụsụ Mande nke ndị Soninke nke Africa na-asụ

Asụsụ ahụ nwere ndị na-asụ ya na nde mmadụ 21, nke kachasị na obodo Mali, yana (n'usoro nke ọnụ ọgụgụ dị mkpa nke obodo) na obodo Senegal, Ivory Coast, Gambia, Mauritania, Guinea-Bissau, Guinea na Ghana
Ọ na-enwe ọnọdụ nke asụsụ mba na obodo Mali, obodo Senegal, obodo Gambia na Mauritania
Asụsụ ahu bu otụ, na-enwe naanị obere ọdịiche phonological, lexical, na ụtọ asụsụ
N'asụsụ, ndị ikwu ya kacha nso bụ asụsụ Bozo, nke dị na obodo Inner Niger Delta
O kwere omume na asụsụ nke ndị Imraguen na / ma ọ bụ asụsụ Nemadi bụ asụsụ nke, ma ọ bụ nke nwere njikọ chiri anya na, Soninke
A na-ede ụdaume ogologo okpukpu abụọ aa, ee, ii, oo, uu
Sonna Seck (amụrụ Maimouna Seck na 1985) bụ ọnye Guinea na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-agụ egwu, na onye na-eme ọchị
A mụrụ Seck n'obodo Mamou n'afọ 1985, n'ime ezinụlọ griots
Mgbe ọ dị obere, ọ malitere ịbụ abụ ọdịnala na baptizim na emume agbamakwụkwọ
Seck gara Lycee Yimbaya wee nweta nzere bachelọ ya
N'afọ 2007, ọnyere aka guzobe ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Djouri Djaama ma mee ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Yo-Allah Feounou , nke gara nke ọma
Seck pụtara n'usoro ihe nkiri sitere na ndị otu Djouri Djaama, ndị kachasị ewu ewu bụ Guigol Naferai Djoki, Mouyide Allah, na Ahh
Ihe ịga nke ọma nke ihe nkiri ndị a nyere ohere ka otu ahụ mee ọtụtụ njem mba
Na ihe nkiri ya, Gourdan-Païkoun, ọ na-eme onye na-eti egwu ma na-abụ abụ a na-akpọ Saya (La mort)
O gosipụtara ezigbo olu ya na mgbakwunye na nkà ime ihe nkiri ya
Seck malitekwara ọrụ ịbụ abụ ya na ndị otu ahụ, na-abụ abụ dịka Bounguai, Sodanelan, na Inmefidjin, mgbe mgbe n'ụdị ọzụzụ atụrụ
A tọhapụrụ egwu ya kachasị ewu ewu, Tourou Tourou, na 2015 wee bụrụ ihe a ma ama na Guinea na mba ndị gbara ya gburugburu
Isiokwu abụ ahụ bụ nwoke kewara n'etiti nwunye ya n'ezie na 'nwunye ibe ya', na ụda nke na-agba ume ịgba egwú
A kpọtụrụ ya aha n'okwu onye isi ala Alpha Condé kwuru na Machị 2018 n'oge Ụbọchị Ụmụ nwanyị, otu ahụ wee nwee ike izute onye isi ala
N'akụkụ onye otu ya Mama Ambiance, Seck jiri ohere ahụ kwado maka ndị otu onye nkuzi ma kwe ka ụmụaka laghachi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ N'afọ 2020, Seck malitere ọrụ ya n'onwe ya na akara Soudou Daardja Prod
Otu egwu mbụ ya, Midho Yidhouma, bụ abụ ịhụnanya nke na-asọpụrụ di ya bi na United States
Ọ natara ihe karịrị 1 nde mmadụ na YouTube

Sonni Ogbuoji bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria nke a họpụtara dị ka Senator maka Ebonyi South, na Ebonyi Steeti, Naịjirịa na ntuli aka mba nke abalị anọ n'onwa anọ afọ puku abụọ na iri n'otu (9 Eprel 2011)
A họpụtara ya na tiketi People's Democratic Party (PDP)
Ọ hapụrụ ndị omeiwu na afọ puku abụọ na iri n'iteolu (2019)
Sonni si Ebunwana Edda na mpaghara gọọmentị mpaghara Afikpo South nke steeti Ebonyi
Ogbuoji bụ onye isi oche gọọmentị ime obodo nke mpaghara gọọmenti ime ụlọ Afikpo n'oge ọchịchị ndị agha tupu mmalite nke Republic nke anọ nke Naijiria
Ogbuoji bụ Kọmishọna maka Ike Akụnụba na Mbelata Ịda Ogbenye na gọọmentị Martin Elechi
N'ọrụ a, ọ na-ahụ maka iwu na itinye ọdọ mmiri azụ okpo iri atọ na ise (35 catfish ponds) na mgbalị inye ndị ntorobịa ọrụ
Na ọnwa iri n'otu, n'afọ puku abụo na iri (Nọvemba 2010) ka Ogbuoji, gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọkwa ahu
Ọ nọgidere bụrụ onye n'hazi Ebonyi maka mkpọsa Goodluck / Sambo Presidential
Ogbuoji meriri vootu puku iri isii na ise, narị asaa na iri atọ na ise (65,735) na ntuli aka onye omeiwu nke ọnwa anọ afọ puku abụọ na iri n'otu ( Eprel 2011) maka Ebonyi South

Idu Igariwey nke All Nigeria Peoples Party (ANPP) sochiri na puku iri na isii, narị ise na otu1(6,501) na Darlington Okere nke Action Congress of Nigeria (ACN) nwetara puku iri na otu, narị isii na abụọ (11,602)

A mụrụ ya na abalị iri abụọ na iteolu, n'ọnwa iteolu n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri ise na anọ (29 Septemba 1954) na ezị n'ụlọ Maazị Ogbu Nnachi Oji na Oriakụ ya bụ Mary Mai Oji nke Ebunwana, Afikpo South (Edda) LGA, Ebonyi Steetị
Ọ gara Edda Central School, Ebonwana n'etiti afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri isii na anọ ruo afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri asaa (1964 ruo 1970)

Ọ gakwara Government College Umuahia, n'etiti afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri asaa na otu ruo na otu puku, narị iteolu na iri asaa n'ise (1971 ruo 1975) na Mahadum Nigeria, Nsukka, na n'etiti afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri asaa n'isii ruo na otu puku, narị iteolu na iri asatọ n'otu (1976 ruo 1981) ma nwete nzere bachelọ na Ọrụ Ugbo

A họpụtara ya onyeisi oche nke ọchịchị ime obodo Afikpo ochie (Afikpo North na South) A họpụtara kwara ya onyeisi oche ọsụ ụzọ Afikpo South LGA n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu n'otu ruo na otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu na atọ (1991-1993) Onye ode akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi mba nke GDM kwụsịrị n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu na isii ruo n'afọ otu puku, narị iteolu na iri iteolu n'asatọ (1996 ruo1998) Onye isi oche nke Ebonyi Steetị Secondary Education Board n'afọ puku abụọ n'atọ ruo n'afọ puku abụọ n'isii (2003-2006) Onye otu, Ebonyi Steetị Committee on Vision 20 20 20 (2009) Kọmishọna maka nkwado akụ na ụba na mbelata ịda ogbenye afọ puku abụọ n;iteolu (2009) Senator na-anọchite Ebonyi South afọ puku abụọ na iri n'otu ruo n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'ise (2011-2015) Onye isi oche nke abụọ afọ puku abụọ na iri n'ise ruo n'afọ puku abụọ na iri n'iteolu (2015-2019) onye otu Board, Nigerian Shippers' Council (NSC) Onye otu Board, Nigerian Geological Survey Agency (NGSA) N'ime onye isi oche Senate Kọmitii Senate on Appropriations and Special Duties Ndị otu Agriculture, Education, Defence, Air Force, Foreign Affairs, Poverty Alleviation, Senate Services, SDGs, Steetị nakwa gọọmentị ochichi ime obodo
Onye otu nke Teknụzụ site na Akanu Ibiam Federal Polytechnic Unwana, Onye otu nke Nkà na ụzụ nke Akanu Ibiam Federal polytechnic Unwana Onyinye ọrụ aka ọrụ nke Rotary Club of AfikpoMerit
Onyinye nke ụlọ ọrụ sayensị anụmanụ nke Naijiria
Forum ọkachamara nke ndị nnọchianya Ebonyi

Onyinye nke Ọkachamma nke National Association of Imo State Students UIMerit onyinye nke Animal Science Association of Nigeria, South East Zone1 Omeudo nke Amangwu Edda (Peace Maker) Ike Ọdụm Ochioha nke Oso na Ebunwana Edda (Leader of the People) Enyioha nke Etiti Edda (Friend of the Masses) Onioku nke Oziza, Afikpo (The giver of light) Omereoha nke Akpoha, Afikpo (The Philanthropist) Ife Edda Ìhè ndi Edda
Ogbuoji na-enwe mmasị iku tenis, ime njem na ịgụ akwụkwọ
Ọ lụrụ Scholastica Ugo Ogbuoji ma nwee ụmụ nwoke abụọ
Kpọpụta njehie group has no content
Sonnie Ayere bụ onye na-ahụ maka ego na Naijiria, onye isi ọrụ nke Dunn Loren Merrifield Group, na onye isi oche nke Association of Issuing Houses of Nigeria (AIHN)

N'afọ 2020, e nyere ya onyinye dị ka onye isi ụlọ akụ na ụba nke afọ iri site n'aka ụlọ akụ na ụlọ ọrụ ego ndị ọzọ (BAFI) Awards na 2020 ECOWAS Icon of Societal Development site n'aka The West Africa Youth Council maka ọrụ enyemaka ya
Ayere gụrụ Financial Economics na Mahadum Dundee, Scotland na 1993 ma nwetakwa MBA na Cass Business School, London

Ọ malitere ọrụ akụ na ụba ya dị ka Structured Finance Specialist for Sub-Saharan Africa n'afọ 2002 wee sonye na UBA Group Plc n'agbata afọ 2005 na afọ 2009 dị ka onye nduzi nke ụlọ akụ na ụba mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'okpuru Tony Elumelu tupu ọ malite ịmepụta Dunn Loren Merrifield n'afọ 2009 (DLM), ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ego na Nigeria nke meriri Best Investment Company na Nigeria na 2014 World Finance Banking Awards na 2020 Banks’ and Financial Institutions (BAFI) Awards dị ka Most Innovative Investment Bank of the Year Award

Nakwa n'afọ 2012, a họpụtara Ayere dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke Nigeria Mortgage Refinance Company (NMRC) ma tinye ya na The Chartered Institute of Public Resources Management and Politics (CIPRMP) 2020 Fellowship Hall of Fame
Sonya Agbessi bụ onye Benin na-agba ọsọ ogologo
O sonyere na 1992 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ ebe ọ bụkwa onye na-eburu ọkọlọtọ maka Benin n'oge emume mmeghe

Sonya Clark (amụrụ n'afọ 1967, Washington, DC) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke ihe nketa Afro-Caribbean
Clark bụ onye na-ese ihe na-acha anụnụ anụnụ nke a maara màkà iji ihe dịgasị iche iche gụnyere ntutu mmadụ na combs iji dozie agbụrụ, ọdịbendị, klas, na akụkọ ihe mere eme

Ihe mkpokọta isi ya na usoro wig nke na-acha anụnụ anụnụ nke ngwụcha afọ 1990, nke nwetara otuto dị egwu, kpaliri omenala ndị Afrịka nke ịchọ mma onwe ónyé ma mee ka ụdị ndị a na-ahụkarị banye n'ọhịa nke ngosipụta onwe onye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ bụ ezie na nka Africa na nzụlite Caribbean ya bụ mmetụta dị mkpa, Clark na-ewulite na omume nke nchịkọta na nchịkọta nke ndị na-ese ihe dịka Betye Saar na David Hammons
Nna Clark bụ ónyé isi mgbaka si Trinidad ébé nne ya bụ nọọsụ si Jamaica
Ndị ọrụ aka nọ n'ezinụlọ ya nwere mmetụta n'ahụ Clark, gụnyere nne nne na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-akwa ákwà, na nna nna bụ ónyé na-eme oche
Clark nwèrè MFA site na Cranbrook Academy of Art ma na 2011 a kwanyeere ya ùgwù na nke mbụ ha Distinguished Mid-Career Alumni Award

O nwèrè BFA site na Art Institute nke Chicago ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru ónyé na-ese ihe Nick Cave (onye na-ese egwu) na BA na nkà mmụta akparamàgwà mmadụ site na Amherst College na 1989, ebe ọ nwetakwara nzèrè doctorate na 2015
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Sidwell Friends School na 1985
Clark kwuru na prọfesọ Rowland O

Abiodun, Amherst College dị ka mmetụta mbụ na ọmụmụ ya banyéré njikọ dị n'etiti ọdịbendị Caribbean ya na ọdịbendị Yoruba, nke e mekwuru ka ọ dịkwuo mma site na njem gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Ivory Coast, ebe ọ mụtara ịkpa ákwà aka
Clark kwukwara na Nick Cave nyèrè aka n'ịkwalite nyocha ya na fiber
E gosipụtara ọrụ Clark n'ihe karịrị ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbè ochie na ụlọ ngosi ihe nkiri 450 na Europe, Africa, Eshia, Australia, na n'ebe niile Amerịka
Ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta nke ọtụtụ ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie gụnyere Indianapolis Museum of Art, Delaware Art Museum, Philadelphia Museum of Art

A tụlere ọrụ ya nke ọma na akwụkwọ akụkọ dịka Art in America, The New York Times, Sculpture, Surface Design Journal, The Los Angeles Times, Fiber Arts, New American Paintings, Philadelphia Inquirer, Italian Vogue, Hyperallergic, Mother Jones, na Huffington Post
Sonya Dragomirova (amụrụ na 7 Septemba 1961) bụ onye egwuregwu basketball nke Bulgaria
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na 1988 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Abderraouf Derradji (amụrụ na 10 Disemba 1989), nke a maara dịka Soolking, bụ onye Algeria na-agụ egwu na onye na-eti egwu
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'okpuru aha nzuzo MC Sool ruo 2013 tupu ọ nabata aha ọhụrụ ya
Ọ na-etinye reggae, hip hop na raï Algeria na egwu ya
A mụrụ Derradji na Algeria n'ebe ugwu nke isi obodo Algiers, nke a makwaara dị ka Staouali
Nna ya bụ onye na-akụ egwu ma ọ malitere n'oge ọ dị obere n'òtù egwu rock na-etinye egwu na ịgba egwu
Ọ bịarutere na France n'afọ 2008, mana ọ laghachiri Algeria ka etinye ya na usoro rap Algeria Africa Jungle
Otu ahụ wepụtara abọm abụọ
Ọ malitere ọrụ nke onwe ya na 2016 ma bịanye aka na akara Affranchis Music nke Sofiane malitere
O nwere ihe ịga nke ọma mbụ ya na 'Milano' na 'Guérilla' tupu ihe ịga nke ukwuu na 'Dalida', otuto nye onye na-agụ egwu Dalida, na-anwale egwu ya 'Paroles, paroles'
N'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2018, Soolking wepụtara abọm mbụ ya bụ Fruit du démon nke e nyere akara ọla edo na France
A kwadoro 'Guérilla' na 'Dalida' Platinum
N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2019, Soolking mere nnukwu egwu na Stade n'afọ 1955, ya na L'Algérino, Fianso, Alonzo na Dhurata Dora
Mgbe ha na-abanye n'ámá egwuregwu ahụ, mmadụ ise nwụrụ n'ihi mkpọtụ ahụ
Soolking kwuru mgbe egwú ahụ gasịrị na ọ bụrụ na ọ maara ihe merenụ ọ gaara akagbu egwú ahụ, otu n'ime ihe kpatara ihe mberede ahụ bụ na a na-ere tiketi karịa ikike ámá egwuregwu ahụ
Priest Joseph Brooks, (nke a maara dịka Soopafly amụrụ na Disemba 8, 1972) bụ onye na-emepụta hip hop na ónyé na-eti egwu rap si Long Beach, California
Ọ bụ ónyé otu DPGC
Ọ bụ nwá mbụ n'ime ụmụ atọ, Brooks tolitere na Long Beach
Nna ya nyèrè ya keyboard mgbe ndị na-akpọ piano ọ hụrụ na chọọchị kpaliri ya
N'oge ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, Brooks zutere ndị na-eti egwu Snoop Dogg na Dr
Dre
N'igosi onwé ya na nkà keyboard ya, e kenyere Soopafly ọrụ mbụ ya maka Death Row Records na soundtrack Murder Was The Case Ọ kụrụ mkpịsị aka màkà Dr
Dre na Ice Cube na egwu 'Natural Born Killaz' na maka Jodeci na egwu 'Come Up To My Room', yana mmepụta mbụ ya na 'Who Got Some Gangsta Shit' nke gosipụtara Snoop Dogg na Tha Dogg Pound
N'afọ 1995, o mepụtara 'Sooo Much Style' màkà Tha Dogg Pound na abọm mbụ ha 'Dogg Food'
Ọ na-akpọkwa mkpịsị aka na abụ asatọ ndị ọzọ
Mgbe ahụ na 1996, e gosipụtara ya na soundtrack nke ihe nkírí A Thin Line Between Love and Hate na egwu 'I Don't Hang'
A remix ga-esochi
Sophia Kianni (amụrụ na Disemba 13, 2001) bụ onye America na-agba mbọ maka ọdịmma ihu igwe
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Climate Cardinals na onye kachasị nta na United Nations Secretary-General's Youth Advisory Group on Climate Change
Kianni malitere inwe mmasị na ịgba mbọ maka ọdịmma ihu igwe mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na Tehran mgbe otu abalị anwụrụ ọkụ kpuchiri kpakpando
Kianni kọwara ya dị ka 'ihe ịrịba ama na ụwa anyị na-ekpo ọkụ n'ụzọ dị egwu'
O mechara sonye n'òtù Greta Thunberg nke a kpọrọ Fridays for Future, wee wepụ oge n'ụlọ akwụkwọ iji kwado ọrụ gbasara mgbanwe ihu igwe
O nyekwara aka hazie 2019 Black Friday climate strike
N'afọ 2019 ọ ghọrọ onye na-eme atụmatụ mba maka Friday for Future na onye nhazi mmekọrịta mba maka Zero Hour

N'ọnwa Nọvemba nke afọ 2019, Kianni hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ iji sonye n'otu ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe nke Extinction Rebellion haziri bụ ndị bu n'obi ime ngagharị iwe agụụ ruo otu izu ma nọrọ ọdụ na Washington, DC, ọfịs onye isi oche nke ụlọ Nancy Pelosi, na-achọ ka ya na ha kwurịta okwu otu awa na igwefoto banyere mgbanwe ihu igwe
N'ógbè ahụ, e nwere ihe dị ka mmadụ iri na abụọ sonyere; mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, Kianni bụ nke kacha nta, na otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Kianni abụghị onye otu XR, ọ sonyere naanị n'ụbọchị mbụ nke nnọkọ ahụ, mana o nyere okwu a kwadebere na ajụjụ ọnụ na ndị nta akụkọ, wee gaa n'ihu na-aṅụ agụụ n'ebe dị anya
Kianni dere banyere òkè ya na ngagharị iwe maka Teen Vogue
N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2020, a kpọrọ Kianni onye na-ekwuchitere Extinction Rebellion

N'oge opupu ihe ubi nke afọ 2020, mmechi ụlọ akwụkwọ na ihe ndị a chọrọ maka ịhapụ ọha na eze nke ọrịa COVID-19, belatara ọrụ Kianni na kọleji gụnyere Mahadum Stanford, Mahadum Princeton na Mahadum Duke
Kianni nwere ike ịga n'ihu na ọrụ ya site n'okwu ya na Mahadum Nkà na ụzụ nke Michigan
Na mgbakwunye, Kianni kpebiri ime ka mmepe nke ebe nrụọrụ weebụ a haziri ahazi, Climate Cardinals, nke ga-asụgharị ozi mgbanwe ihu igwe n'asụsụ dị iche iche

N'ọnwa Julaị 2020, odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke United Nations bụ António Guterres kpọrọ Kianni aha na Youth Advisory Group ọhụrụ ya na Mgbanwe ihu igwe, otu ndị isi ihu igwe asaa na-eto eto iji nye ya ndụmọdụ maka ime ihe maka nsogbu ihu igwe
Kianni bụ onye kachasị nta n'ìgwè ahụ, nke dị site na afọ 18 ruo 28
Ọ bụ naanị ya na-anọchite anya United States, yana naanị ya na na-anọchi anya Middle East na Iran

N'ọnwa Disemba 2020, a kpọrọ Kianni otu n'ime ndepụta nke 20 Humans of 2020 nke magazin Vice, maka ịbụ onye nnọchi anya US maka United Nations Youth Advisory Group on Climate Change na ịmalite Climate Cardinals
Na Septemba 2021, Kianni bụ otu n'ime ndị isi oche anọ nke ihe omume Youth4Climate na Milan, nke mbụ maka 2021 United Nations Climate Change Conference ma ọ bụ COP26
Climate Cardinals sụgharịrị Youth4Climate manifesto n'asụsụ 6 nke United Nations
Na COP26 n'onwe ya, na Nọvemba 2021 na Glasgow, Kianni kwuru okwu n'ọtụtụ ogwe, wee zute António Guterres, odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke United Nations
N'ọnwa Disemba 2021, a kpọrọ Kianni otu n'ime '21 under 21' nke Teen Vogue maka ọrụ ihu igwe ya
Climate Cardinals bụ òtù na-enweghị uru nke ndị ntorobịa na-eduzi na mba ụwa nke Kianni guzobere na 2020 iji nye ozi gbasara mgbanwe ihu igwe n'asụsụ ọ bụla
A gụrụ ya aha kadinal ugwu, nnụnụ steeti Virginia, na ihe atụ maka ozi na-efe gburugburu ụwa
Kianni sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ site n'afọ ndị ọ nọrọ na-asụgharị akụkọ mgbanwe ihu igwe n'asụsụ Bekee n'asụsụ Persian maka ndị ikwu ya ndị Iran, dịka mgbasa ozi Iran na-ejighịzi okwu ahụ
Ọ na-ekwu na ọ chọpụtara na ihe ọmụma banyere mgbanwe ihu igwe dị naanị na Bekee, ma ọ bụ na nke kachasị mma na Chinese na Spanish, nke mere ka ndị na-asụ asụsụ ndị ọzọ ghara iru ha
A malitere Climate Cardinals na Mee 2020, ma nwee ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo otú pụkụ na otu nari debanyere aha ha ka ha bụrụ ndị nsụgharị n'ụbọchị mbụ ya
Ha sokwa Radio Javan, redio asụsụ Iran nwere ndị nkwado karịrị nde mmadụ iri, iji soro ndị Iran kerịta ihe osise na nsụgharị

Climate Cardinals bụ nke International Student Environmental Coalition na-akwado dị ka 501(c)(3) na-enweghị uru, nke na-enye ụmụ akwụkwọ na-ekere òkè na nsụgharị ya ohere inweta oge ọrụ obodo maka ọrụ ha, ma ọ bụ imezu ihe ụlọ akwụkwọ chọrọ ma ọ bụ melite ngwa kọleji
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2020, otu ahụ nwere ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo pụkụ ise, na nkezi afọ iri na isii
Ka ọ na-erule Disemba 2020, ọ nwere ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo pụkụ asatọ na mmekorita ya na UNICEF na ndị ntụgharị na-enweghị ókèala
Kianni dere edemede 2019 maka Teen Vogue banyere ọgba aghara agụụ nke ụlọ ọrụ Pelosi

N'afọ 2020, o dere edemede abụọ banyere mmetụta nke coronavirus, maka mbipụta Middle East nke magazin Cosmopolitan banyere mmetụta na ememe ezinụlọ ya nke Nowruz, na nke ọzọ maka Refinery29 banyere mmetụta na usoro ihe omume ya kwa ụbọchị dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ihu igwe, nke a na-ejikọta ya n'ọtụtụ ebe
O dere otu edemede maka MTV News maka ncheta afọ iri ise nke Earth Day, nke o nyere aka ịhazi, na nke ọzọ na 2022 maka The Washington Post banyere otu o si ebi ndụ na kọleji
N'afọ 2021, Kianni malitere ịnabata podcast maka The New Fashion Initiative, na-agba ndị ọkachamara na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ejiji ajụjụ ọnụ banyere ịza ajụjụ ọnụ maka mgbanwe ihu igwe
Kianni na nne ya, nna ya, nwanne ya nwanyị nke obere, na ụmụ anụmanụ abụọ bi na McLean, Virginia

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Henry Wadsworth Longfellow Middle School, ebe ndị otu ya meriri na Statewide Science Olympiad, na Thomas Jefferson High School for Science and Technology, ebe ọ bụ onye na-eme nke ikpeazụ na National Merit Scholarship Program
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na 2020, ọ gara Mahadum Indiana
Ọ gara Mahadum Stanford na 2021, ebe ọ na-amụ sayensị gburugburu ebe obibi na iwu ọha

Kianni nwetara nlebara anya mgbasa ozi dị ukwuu dị ka ihe atụ nke onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma na-emeghachi omume na usoro nkewapụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya metụtara ọrịa COVID-19 CNN, magazin Time, na The Washington Post dere banyere otu ya na ndị enyi ya si ebugharị mmekọrịta onwe onye na ọbụna nnukwu mmemme ha a kagburu na Zoom video chats, na vidiyo TikTok
Sophia Mustafa (1922 ruo ụbọchị 1 Septemba 2005) bụ onye edemede na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke sitere na Kashmiri
A mụrụ Mustafa dị ka Sophia Butt na India mana o tolitere na Nairobi
Ọ lụrụ Abdulla Mustafa, onye ọka iwu, wee soro ya kwaga Arusha, Tanganyika n'afọ 1948
Di na nwunye ahụ mechara kwaga Dar es Salaam
Ọ lụrụ ọgụ n'akụkụ Julius Nyerere maka nnwere onwe mba ahụ
N'afọ 1958, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke Tanganyika maka Arusha District dị ka onye otu TANU
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ndị omeiwu nke mba ahụ (mba ahụ mechara bụrụ Tanzania) ruo afọ 1965 mgbe a kpọrọ di ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị omeiwu nwanyị mbụ na-abụghị ndị ọcha na kọntinent ahụ
Ọnụ ọgụgụ dị nta nke ndị bu ụzọ gụnyere Mabel Dove Danquah (Gold Coast, 1954), Senedu Gebru (Ethiopia, 1957), na Ella Koblo Gulama (Sierra Leone, 1957)
N'afọ 1961, e bipụtara akwụkwọ ncheta ya, The Tanganyika Way ( )
N'afọ 1989, ya na di ya kwagara Canada, biri na Brampton
Mustafa bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ In the Shadow of Kirinyaga n'afọ 2002 ( )
Ọ nwụrụ na Brampton n'afọ 2005
E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ nke abụọ The Broken Reed mgbe ọ nwụsịrị n'otu afọ ahụ ( )
Sophia Omotola Omidiji (amụrụ na June 18, 1997) bụ onye Naijirịa-Amerịka na-agba bọọlụ
Ọ gbara bọọlụ maka otu ụmụ nwanyị U-20 nke Naijirịa ma bịanye aka na Dutch Division I Club SBV
Excelsior mgbe ọ gbanwere site na KAA Gent na Belgium na June 2017
A mụrụ Sophia Omotola Omidiji na June 18, 1997, ma zụlite ya na Las Vegas, Nevada, site n'aka nna Naijirịa na nne America
Ọ malitere ịgba bọọlụ mgbe ọ dị afọ ise
Omidiji gbara bọọlụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị maka Sierra Vista High School ebe ọ bụ onye na-ebute goolu 98 n'ime oge anọ gụnyere goolu 38 n'oge ikpeazụ ya
Ọ gbara bọọlụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ gụnyere nke mbụ nke mpaghara / State / NIAA Southern Nevada
Ọ gbakwara bọọlụ klọb na Las Vegas Premier Sports Academy maka onye nkuzi Eyal Dahan
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2015, Omidiji bịanyere aka na PSV / FC Eindhoven Women's Team na Netherlands tupu ya agaa n'ogige na Nigerian U20 Women's National Team
Ndị mmadụ na-abịa
N'afọ 2016, Sophia Omidiji gafere na KAA Gent nke bụ otu na-egwu na Belgium nkewa m ma gbaa bọọlụ iri abụọ ma gbaa goolu iri na asatọ na enyemaka iri na abụọ
SBV
Excelsior
Na June 2017 Sophia Omidiji mere mgbanwe site na KAA Gent gaa na SBV Excelsior nke bụ mgbakwunye ọhụrụ na Dutch Eredivisie nke bụ nkewa I na Netherlands
Mba ụwa
Omidiji natara oku mba mbụ ya na ndị otu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị na-erubeghị afọ 20 nke Naịjirịa maka egwuregwu asọmpi iko mba Afrịka U-20 megide Democratic Republic of Congo n'egwuregwu na Kinshasa
Ọ kpọrọ oku a kpọrọ ndị otu mba ahụ 'nkwanye ùgwù kachasị ukwuu nke ndụ m'
Ọ zụrụ na otu ahụ na Abuja tupu ọ gawa Kinshasa maka egwuregwu megide Congo ebe Naịjirịa meriri 2o1
Ọ natara oku mba n'ime ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị kachasị elu super falcons na Eprel 2 maka egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide France

Omidiji nwere ụmụnne atọ aha ha bụ Lateef Omidiji Jr bụ ndị gbara bọọlụ maka ndị mmeri Dutch nke Netherlands nke 2016-2017 Feyenoord O15's, Rasheed Omidiji bụ ndị gbara kọọlụ maka otu FC Den Bosch's O10, na Amir Omidiji onye gbara bọọọọlụ maka VV Baronie's JY7's
Nchịkọta Sophia Smith na Smith College bụ ebe nchekwa nke mba ụwa nke ihe odide, foto, akwụkwọ akụkọ na isi mmalite ndị ọzọ na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụmụnwanyị

Otu n'ime ebe nchekwa kachasị ama nke ihe odide, ebe nchekwa, foto, akwụkwọ akụkọ na isi mmalite ndị ọzọ nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụmụnwanyị, nchịkọta ahụ nwere ihe karịrị 10,000 feet (3,000 m) nke ihe na-edekọ ahụmahụ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụmụnwanyị na mba United States na mba ofesi site na oge ọchịchị ruo ugbu a
Nchịkọta Sophia Smith na-ekerịta ụlọ ọrụ na Smith College Archives na kọleji kọleji dị na Northampton, Massachusetts

Ike isiokwu gụnyere njikwa ọmụmụ na ikike ịmụ nwa, ikike ụmụnwanyị, ntuli aka, mmegharị ụmụ nwanyị nke oge a, ụmụnwanyị United States na-arụ ọrụ na mba ọzọ, nka (karịsịa ihe nkiri), ọrụ (karịsịa ọrụ nta akụkọ na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya), na ndụ ezinụlọ dị n'etiti na narị afọ nke iri na itoolu na nke iri abụọ New England
Ọtụtụ n'ime nchịkọta ndị a bụ isi mmalite bara ụba nke ọhụụ, yana ihe odide na ihe e biri ebi
Emeghere ọha na eze n'efu, nchịkọta ahụ anaghị agbasa ma ọ dị maka onye ọ bụla, enwere ike ileta ya n'ịntanetị, ma ọ bụ rịọ ya dị ka photocopies
Margaret Storrs Grierson guzobere nchịkọta ahụ n'afọ 1942 iji jee ozi dị ka onyinye dị iche iche nke ọbá akwụkwọ ahụ na ọrụ kọleji nke ịkụziri ụmụnwanyị
E mechara kpọọ nchịkọta ahụ aha onye guzobere Smith College, Sophia Smith, onye mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1870 nyere akụnụba ya nke $ 387,468 (ihe dị ka $ 7,000,00000 na ahịa ugbu a) iji nye Smith College
N'afọ 1941, onye isi oche Smith College Herbert Davis tụrụ aro ka ndị enyi nke Smith College Library were dị ka ọrụ pụrụ iche nchịkọta nke a raara nye ọrụ nke ndị inyom na-ede akwụkwọ
A họpụtara Smith College Archivist Margaret Storrs Grierson ka ọ bụrụ onye isi odeakwụkwọ nke ndị enyi nke Smith College Library na onye isi nke nchịkọta ụmụnwanyị n'afọ 1942
Dị ka Grierson si kwuo, Onye isi ala Davis 'edoghị anya n'uche ya' banyere ihe ọ chọrọ

Onye na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụnwanyị, onye ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme, na onye na-edebe ihe ochie Mary Ritter Beard, 'kama nwere olileanya na [Smith] ga-enwe mmasị ịga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ nke Women's Archives [World Center for Women's Archives (WCWA)] a gbahapụrụ n'oge na-adịbeghị anya,' nke ọ tọrọ ntọala na 1935

N'ime afọ mbụ, oke onyinye, tinyere mmetụta Beard, nyere iwu ka a kọwaa ọrụ ahụ dị ka 'nchịkọta akụkọ ihe mere eme pụrụ iche nke ihe ụmụnwanyị, na-edekọ ọdịmma na ọrụ ụmụnwanyị n'oge akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mmadụ na n'ofe ụwa'
Onyinye ndị ahụ, ọtụtụ sitere n'aka ụmụ akwụkwọ Smith nwere mmasị, na-egosi nkwekọrịta na-arịwanye elu banyere ihe nchịkọta ọhụrụ ahụ kwesịrị ịbụ
Nchịkọta dị otú ahụ ga-abụ isi ma ọ bụrụ na uru akụkọ ihe mere eme, ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na ọ na-enye
ihe ọhụrụ iji degharịa peeji ndị ahụ ma ọ bụrụ na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mba anyị
Nchegbu bụ isi ma ọ bụrụ na ịnakọta ihe gbasara ụmụnwanyị America site n'oge ọchịchị gaa n'ihu ekwesịghị, Otú ọ dị, iduga n'ịjụ [ij] ihe gbasara ụmụnwanyị ma ọ bụrụ na mba ndị ọzọ
N'etiti ndị enyi ma ọ bụrụ na Ọbá akwụkwọ Smith College, ọtụtụ na-achọsi ike karịsịa
na nchịkọta ahụ kwesịrị ịbụ
n'ụzọ dị iche ma, ejiri m n'aka, ga-abụ ma ọ bụrụ na enyemaka dị ndụ na atụmatụ ahụ
Nke a bụ ụdị ma ọ bụrụ na nchịkọta nke ga-achịkọta ume ka ọ na-eto
Ekwenyere m na anyị nwere ohere dị mma ịzụlite nchịkọta nke
nwere ike ịmata
Ka nchịkọta ahụ na-eto, otú ahụ ka ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ihe odide na ihe ndị e bipụtara na mmata ya site n'aka ndị ọkà mmụta mba
Margaret Grierson kọwara ọrụ ya n'ịkpụzi mmepe Nchịkọta ahụ n'afọ ndị mbụ a

'Onye isi ala Davis tụfuru echiche ahụ ma ọ bụrụ na nchịkọta ma ọ bụrụ na ihe odide ma ọ bụrụ na ụmụnwanyị na-ede akwụkwọ, anọ m na-arụsi ọrụ ike ruo ọtụtụ afọ na-akọwapụta ihe ahụ iji nwee ezi uche ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụrụ na ọ

N'ime usoro ahụ, ejiriwo m nwayọọ nwayọọ nweta nkwenye na nkwado na nkọwa ma ọ bụrụ na ọtụtụ ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere ọgụgụ isi na ụmụnwanyị na-abụghị SmithAbụ m naanị onye nọ na campus nke maara ubi ụmụ nwanyị ma ọlị, ezutela m naanị nkwado site n'aka onye isi ala ọ bụ ezie na ejiriwo m nwayọọ nwayọọ, ma eleghị anya n'ụzọ aghụghọ, na-adabere n'eziokwu mezuru iji rụọ ụka maka mN'ọnọdụ ọ bụla, echere m na ị ga-aghọta otú m si bịa n'ihu
ma ọ bụrụ na nghọta ma ọ bụrụ na ndị atụmatụ ha kwesịrị ịbụ
Ekwenyesiri m ike na ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ dị mma ma baa uru
na a ghaghị imepe ya ngwa ngwa o kwere mee'
Mmepe nchịkọta toro ngwa ngwa n'oge mmalite afọ ndị ahụ ọ bụ ezie na site n'afọ 1946 nchịkọta ahụ ka enweghị aha
Dị ka Grierson si kwuo, 'e jighị aha onye guzobere Smith College mee ihe maka ebumnuche ndị ọzọ,

o yikwara ka ọ dabara adaba ịnakwere aha nwanyị tọrọ ntọala kọleji ahụ iji nye ụmụnwanyị agụmakwụkwọ ruru (ọ bụghị nhata) na nke a na-enye ụmụnwoke, maka nchịkọta nke bụ inye ihe ọmụma ka mma banyere mmezu nke ụmụnwanyị site n'oge
A maara Nchịkọta Ụmụnwanyị dị ka Sophia Smith Collection obere oge mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị

Nchịkọta Sophia Smith gụnyere ihe karịrị nchịkọta 650 (ihe karịrị 10,000 linear feet) nke akwụkwọ onwe onye na nke ndị ọkachamara nke ndị mmadụ n'otu n'otu na ezinụlọ, ndekọ nzukọ, nchịkọta isiokwu, akụkọ ọnụ, akwụkwọ akụkọ, foto, na ihe ọdịyo
Akwụkwọ nkeonwe na nke ezinụlọ nwere akwụkwọ ozi, akwụkwọ akụkọ, akwụkwọ mkpochapu, na foto

Nchịkọta ndị a na-ejikarị eme ihe gụnyere nke onye na-ahụ maka mgbochi ọmụmụ Margaret Sanger; Ellen Gates Starr, onye nchoputa ya na Jane Addams nke Chicago settlement, Hull House; Mary van Kleeck, onye na-eme nchọpụta mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na onye na-eme mgbanwe; ezinụlọ Garrison, Hale, na Ames; onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Dorothy Kenyon; akwụkwọ nke onye edemede na onye na-eme ihe ike Gloria Steinem; na nwanyị na-edina nwanyị na-ewu ụlọ Phyllis Birkby

Ihe ndekọ nke Òtù gụnyere nkeji, akwụkwọ ozi, akụkọ, mbipụta na ihe ndị metụtara ya na-edekọ ọrụ nke ihe karịrị òtù iri isii lekwasịrị anya na nsogbu ụmụnwanyị, dị ka Planned Parenthood Federation of America; National Congress of Neighborhood Women; na National Board of the YWCA

Nchịkọta isiokwu gụnyere ihe gbasara ụmụnwanyị Afrịka, ndị na-ese ihe, ndị otu ụmụnwanyị nke oge a, Diaries, Autobiographies, akwụkwọ ezinụlọ, Journalism, Labor, Women in Medicine, Reproductive Rights and Women's Health, Social Work, na Suffrage Movement

Ọrụ ndị a, nke Smith ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ kwadoro, gụnyere ajụjụ ọnụ na teepu ọdịyo, CD-ROM, teepu vidio, DVDS, na / ma ọ bụ ederede ederede, ụfọdụ n'ime ha na-esonyere obere ihe ndekọ akụkọ ndụ, foto, ma ọ bụ ndekọ ọrụ
The Old Lesbian Oral Herstory Project, nke Arden Eversmeyer hiwere na 1999, echekwara dị ka akụkụ nke Sophia Smith Collection

Nchịkọta SSC Periodicals gụnyere ihe karịrị otu puku (1,000) utu aha nke magazin ụmụ nwanyị ugbu a na akụkọ ihe mere eme, akwụkwọ akụkọ, akwụkwọ akụkọ, na akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ọzọ, na ndebanye aha 50 ugbu a

Ihe onwunwe ya na-anọchite anya akwụkwọ akụkọ dịka Godey's Lady's Book (1830–1889), Woman's Journal (1870–1916), Lucifer the Lightbearer (1897–1901), Eugenesia (Mexico, 1943–45), Church Woman (1943–49), na Black Sash (South Africa, 1956–72), yana akwụkwọ akụkọ nnwere onwe ụmụnwanyị mbụ Shrew, Rat, na Velvet Fist
The Girl Zines Collection nwere 9 linear feet ( igbe 18) nke obere, magazin ndị e bipụtara onwe ha (nke a maara dị ka 'zines') nke ụmụ agbọghọ na ụmụagbọghọ mepụtara
Nchịkọta ahụ bụ isi okwu nke onye ọ bụla, ọtụtụ n'ime ha sitere n'afọ 1990s, ha na-ekerịta echiche siri ike nke nwanyị
Sophia Theresa Williams-de Bruyn (Amụrụ n'afọ 1938) bụ onye na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na South Africa
Ọ bụ onye mbụ natara onyinye ụmụ nwanyị maka ọrụ mba pụrụ iche
Ọ bụ onye ndu ikpeazụ dị ndụ nke Women's March
A mụrụ Sophia Theresa Williams-De Bruyn na Villageboard, mpaghara nke bụ ebe obibi nke ndị si n'ọtụtụ mba dị iche iche
Ọ bụ nwa Frances Elizabeth na Henry Ernest Williams
Ọ na-ekwu na ọmịiko nne ya nwere maka ndị ọzọ nyeere ya aka ịzụlite mmetụta ọmịiko
Mgbe nna ya sonyeere ndị agha iji lụọ agha n'Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, nne Sophia kpọgara ezinụlọ ahụ na mmepe ụlọ ọhụrụ, nke e wuru maka ndị na-acha ọbara ọbara, nke a na-akpọ Schauder
Ọ gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Saint James Catholic School
Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ wee malite ịrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ akwa
Ndị ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ Van Lane Textile gwara ya ka o nyere aka 'dozie nsogbu ha na ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ,' ma mesịa ghọọ onye na-elekọta ụlọ ahịa
O mechara bụrụ onye isi nke Textile Workers Union na Port Elizabeth

N'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1956, ọ duziri ngagharị nke ụmụ nwanyị 20,000 na Union Buildings nke Pretoria ya na Lilian Ngoyi, Rahima Moosa, Helen Joseph, Albertina Sisulu na Bertha Gxowa iji mee mkpesa maka ihe achọrọ na ụmụ nwanyị ga-ebu akwụkwọ gafere dịka akụkụ nke iwu gafere
Sophia dị naanị afọ iri na asatọ, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye kacha nta n'ime ndị isi anọ ahụ
Ụmụ nwanyị ndị a na-agafe ndị nche nọ n'ọnụ ụzọ iji nye arịrịọ ha n'èzí ọnụ ụzọ ndị minista
Mgbe e weputara Iwu Ndị Na-acha Ọcha, ndị Coloured People's Congress kenyere Williams-De Bruyn ka ya na Shulamith Muller rụọ ọrụ n'okwu metụtara iwu
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 1963, a manyere di ya ịgba ọsọ ndụ na Lusaka, Zambia ebe a họpụtara ya dịka onye isi oche nke Kọmitii ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mpaghara nke ANC
Ọ sonyeere ya afọ isii ka e mesịrị wee gaa n'ihu mezue ọmụmụ ya wee nweta diplọma onye nkuzi ya n'afọ 1977, mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkwa maka ANC na Lusaka
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere ndị otu agụmakwụkwọ nke ANC guzobere n'afọ 1980
Kansụl ahụ setịpụrụ usoro mmụta maka Solomon Mahlangu Freedom College
E guzobere kọleji ahụ n'afọ 1978 site n'aka ndị African National Congress (ANC) na Mazimbu, Tanzania
Ya na di ya laghachiri South Africa mgbe a machibidoro ANC iwu
Di ya jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya South Africa na Jọdan ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 1999
Ọ bụ onye otu Commission of Gender Equality tupu ọ banye na Gauteng Legislature n'afọ 2004 wee bụrụ osote ọkà okwu ya site n'afọ 2005 ruo afọ 2009, tupu ọ kwaga na ụlọ omebe iwu mba
Ọ bụ onye omeiwu mpaghara ugbu a na Gauteng Province maka ANC
Sophie Aguie (amụrụ na 31 Disemba na afọ1996) bụ onye na-agba ndị Ivorian boolu
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu ndi Ivorian maka 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup
Sophie Rammal Alakija (amụrụ 8 Febrụwarị 1985), bụ onye na -eme ihe nkiri na sinima Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye ama ama maka ọrụ na Halita na Assistant Madams
A mụrụ Alakija n'ụbọchị 8 nke ọnwa Febụwarị 1985 site na ezinụlọ Alakụba bụ ndị Efik (ebo dị na Calabar steeti) na ndị Lebanọn
Ọ pụtara na Holla at Your Boy vidiyo egwu nke enyi nwoke ochie ya Wizkid dị ka onye na-edu igba egwu n'afọ 2010
Ọ meela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri a ma ama, gụnyere ịse ihe nkiri, imeri ya na obere mkpirisi
N’afọ 2017, ọ mere ihe nkiri na onyonyo usoro Scandals, nke bụ mmekorita n’etiti Ghana na Nigeria
N’afọ 2019, ọ mere ihe nkiri Halita na mgbe ahụ n’usoro ihe onyonyo onye Assistant Madams
Ọ mekwara ihe nkiri Timini Egbuson Muslim Wife n'afọ 2020
Sophie Louise Ingle (amụrụ ya na abalị abụọ na onwa nke iteolu, na afo 1991) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Welsh na-agba bọọlụ FA WSL Chelsea ma bụrụ onye isi otu mba Wales
Ọ nọchitere anya Bristol Academy, Cardiff City na Liverpool na mbụ
Ingle na-egwuri egwu dị ka onye na -agbachitere ma ọ bụ onye etiti
Na afọ 2020, a họpụtara goolu Chelsea ya megide Arsenal maka onyinye FIFA Puskas
Ingle bidoro ọrụ bọọlụ ya na otu ụmụ nwoke Vale Wanderers
N'agbanyeghị mkpesa na Football Association of Wales (FAW), iwu gbochiri Ingle ka ya na ụmụ nwoke ndị ahụ gafere ihe karịrị afọ 12
Ọ nọrọ otu afọ na football wee soro ụmụ agbọghọ Vale Wanderers na Dinas Powys Ladies nwee mkparịta ụka dị nkenke
Nke a bu ụzọ ịkwaga Ingle na-eto eto na Cardiff City Ladies
Mgbe oge dị na nchekwa, Ingle batara n'otu egwuregwu Premier League nke ụmụ nwanyị Cardiff n'oge oge 2007–08
Mgbe ya na Cardiff merichara iko Welsh ugboro abụọ, Ingle bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ maka WSL ekike Chelsea Ladies tupu mkpọsa 2012

Onye njikwa Chelsea Matt Beard wepụrụ Ingle dị ka onye na-agbachitere etiti wee too mmetụta ya mgbe Chelsea meriri 2012 FA Women's Cup Final na Birmingham 'Sophie Ingle, anyị butere na mbụ dị ka azụ aka ekpe mana ị nwere ike ịhụ site na àgwà ya na bọọlụ na nkesa na Ịgụ egwuregwu ahụ dịkwa mma, o keere anyị ihe mgbaru ọsọ ole na ole na bọọlụ n'azụ nke ihe anyị na-enwebeghị mbụ'
Na February 2014, Ingle hapụrụ Chelsea ma kwaga nso n'ụlọ site na ịbanye na Bristol Academy
O biliri na onye isi The Vixens, mana agbahapụla klọb ahụ mgbe oge 2015 gasịrị
Ingle ghọrọ ebumnuche mbufe maka klọb ndị ọzọ wee kpebie ịbanye Liverpool na Disemba 2015 'Liverpool bụ nnukwu klọb na mgbe m matara mmasị ha, enwere naanị otu otu m chọrọ ịbanye'
Akpọrọ Ingle ka ọ nọchite anya Wales na ọkwa Under-17, wee bilie bụrụ onye isi ndị otu Under-19
Ingle meriri okpu izizi mbụ ya maka Wales na 2–1 World Cup ntozu meriri Azerbaijan, nke emere na Baku na 28 Ọktoba 2009
Na Disemba 2011, akpọrọ Ingle na ndị otu GB izizi maka asọmpi Olympic 2012
Ọ meriri okpu 50th ya maka Wales na Julaị 2014, n'oge egwuregwu enyi na enyi ya na Scotland na Dumfries 1–1
Onye njikwa Wales Jayne Ludlow kpọrọ Ingle onye isi otu mba ọhụrụ n'ihu 2015 Istria Cup, nọchiri Jess Fishlock bụ onye a tụpụrụ n'ụzọ dị ịtụnanya na ndị otu ahụ
Na 22 Septemba 2020, Ingle gbara Wales egwuregwu 100 ya megide Norway n'oge asọmpi UEFA Women's Euro 2021
Na 27 Mee 2021, ekwuputara na ahọpụtara Ingle ka ọ bụrụ naanị onye ọkpụkpọ Welsh na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị Great Britain maka asọmpi 2020
Soweto, Johannesburg Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi obodo Soweto

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ọgbọ n'afọ 1976 nke ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe dị ka onye otu Soweto Student Representative Council, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa n'ịhazi ngagharị iwe megide steeti ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n'oge nnupụisi Soweto
Masite bụ onye ndú n'ọtụtụ òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, gụnyere Kọmitii nkwado ndị nne na nna Detainees, onye mmekọ nke UDM
Ọ duziri ngalaba Jabavu nke ANC n'etiti afọ 1990 ruo afọ 1994
Masite ghọrọ nwanyị ojii mbụ bụ onyeisi obodo na South Africa mgbe a họpụtara ya na Kansụl Ndịda Johannesburg ka ukwuu na 1995
Kansụl ahụ nwere CBD na mpaghara ndịda ya nke Soweto, Orange Farm, Lenasia na Ennerdale
Sophie Lichaba (a mụrụ na 29 June 1973), nke a mụrụ Mphasane, nke bụbu Sophie Ndaba, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa
Ọ rụrụ Queen Moroka na ncha Generations N'afọ 2016, ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe ọbịa na asọmpi ịma mma Miss South Africa 2016
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Zimbabwe, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ gara n'ihu n'ọrụ ya dịka onye na-ese ihe
Nne ya zigara ya n'ụlọ ụmụ mgbei na Eastlea, Harare, Zimbabwe ka o wee nwee ike inweta agụmakwụkwọ ka mma karịa ihe dị na South Africa
Nna Lichaba, Solly Mphasane, nwụrụ n'afọ 2016
Ọ na-arịa ọrịa shuga
Ya na di mbụ ya, Themba Ndaba, nwere ụmụ abụọ, Rudo na Lwandle
Ọ kuchiri nwa nwanne ya nwanyị, Shallon Ndaba, mgbe ọnwụ nwanne ya nwanyị gasịrị, Tiny Mphasane
Ọ lụrụ Max Lichaba n'afọ 2017
Na ngwụcha afọ 2018, Lichaba bụ onye asịrị, nke kwuru na ọ nwụọla
Sophie Bosede Oluwole (Mee 12, 1935 - 23 Disemba 2018) bụ onye ọkà ihe ọmụma Afrika
Oluwole bụ nwaanyị mbụ nwetara nzere PhD na nkà ihe ọmụma na Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye na-arụ ọrụ na nkà ihe ọmụma Yoruba, ụzọ iche echiche nke sitere na omenala ndị Yoruba na Nigeria
Ọ na-ekwusi ike banyere ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị na nkà ihe ọmụma, na nnọchite na-ezughi oke nke ndị na-eche echiche n'Afrika na agụmakwụkwọ
A mụrụ Sophie Bosede Oluwole na May 12, 1935
Nne na nna ya bụ ndị Edo
O nwekwara ihe nketa Nupe, dịka nna nna ya bụ Tapa, okwu ndị Yoruba jiri mara ndị Nupe
A zụlitere ya na steeti Ekiti

Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ na Ife, ma na-akatọ usoro agụmakwụkwọ nke afọ 1940, na-ekwu na atụmanya ọrụ nke nwanyị 'abụghị ebumnuche gị ọ bụ ebumnuche ndị mụrụ gị' Oluwole kowara na otu ihe mere mgbe ọ nọ na-ụlọ akwụkwọ, e zigara ya ụlọ ọgwụ ka o kesaa nri na ọgwụ maka ndị ọrịa na-arịa ọtụtụ ọrịa
Ọ siri na ụjọ jidere ya, na-asị 'N'ụbọchị ahụ, amaara m Agaghị m abụ nọọsụ'
Ọ gụrụ History, Geography na Philosophy na UNILAG na Lagos, ma mesịa lekwasị anya na nkà ihe ọmụma
Mgbe o nwetara nzere mbụ ya, e were ya n'ọrụ na UNILAG dị ka osote onye nkuzi na 1972, wee gaa mezue PhD na nkà ihe ọmụma na Mahadum nke Ibadan
Oluwole bụ nwaanyị mbụ nwetara nzere PhD na nkà ihe ọmụma na Naijiria
Mgbe ọ ghọrọ prọfesọ, Oluwole kụziri nkà ihe ọmụma nke Afrika na UNILAG site na 2002 ruo 2008
Nkuzi na ọrụ Oluwole banyere na-echiche amamihe nke Yoruba, nke dabere na omenala na okpukpe (Ifá) nke mpaghara dị iche iche nke ala Yoruba
Dị ka Oluwole si kwuo, ngalaba echiche amamihe nke Yoruba tọ karị ọdịnala ọdịda anyanwụ, dị ka onye ọkà ihe ọmụma Afrika oge ochie bụ Orunmila si tọ karụ Socrates site na atụmatụ ya
Mmadu abuo a, ndi nnochite anya ụkpụrụ nke ọdịnala Africa na nke ọdịda anyanwụ, bụ ihe abụọ kachasị emetụta Oluwole, ọ tụnyekwara ha abụọ n'akwụkwọ ya bụ Socrates na Orunmila
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụtụtụ mbido nke 23 Disemba 2018 mgbe ọ dị afọ 83
Sophie Suzan Thembekwayo bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na onye otu ndị omeiwu maka Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF)
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu na Jenụwarị 2017, na-anọchi Hlayiseka Chewane
A họpụtara Thembekwayo ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu n'afọ 2019
Àtụ Current MPs of South Africa

Sophy Gray ma ọ bụ Sophia Gray (ubochí isé n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 1814 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na asaá n'ọnwa Eprel 1871), bụ ónyé nchịkwa diocesan, ónyé na-ese , ónyé na'ụgbọ, ónyé na -agba ịnyịnya na nwunye nke bishọp Cape Town Robert Gray
A mụrụ ya na Easington na Yorkshire, nwa nwanyị nke ise nke ónyé isi ọbọdọ Richard Wharton Myddleton nke Durham na Yorkshire
Ọ nwụrụ na Bishopscourt, Cape Town n'ubochí irí abụọ na asaá n'ọnwa Eprel 1871 ma lie ya na ili nke St Saviour na Claremont
Day 1930 dere 'ónyé enyi ógè niile nke njem (Robert Gray), amanuensis na-adịghị ike na ónyé na-ahụ màkà ego, ónyé na-emepụta ụlọ ụka, ìhè na ịnọ na ndụ ụlọ ya na Bishopscourt
Sophy na ụmụnne ya nwanyị abụọ tolitere n'ezinụlọ bárá ọgaranya, nwéré ala na North Riding na Durham
Ha bụ ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ nke ọma na ndị na-agba ịnyịnya nke ọma site na nwata, àgwà ndị nyeere aka ịkwalite ọbụbụenyi ha na Robert Gray na-eto eto
Sophy lụrụ Robert Gray na 1836 mgbè ọnwa isii gachara, mgbè ọ bụ ónyé isi nke Whitworth, Durham
Oge ezumike ha nyere Sophy na-eto eto ụtọ ihe ndị ga-abịa mgbè ya na Robert malitere njem ogologo n'elu ịnyịnya, na-eleta ụlọ ezinụlọ na mpaghara abụọ

Ruo afọ itoolu, ndụ ha na Old Park na Whitworth, na parish ọbọdọ Stockton nọgidere na-enweghị nsogbu, mana ihe a niile gbanwere n'ụzọ dị egwu mgbè etinye Robert na ndepụta maka otu n'ime ndị bishọp ọhụrụ atọ
A họpụtara ya maka Cape of Good Hope
N'afọ 1847, Sophy na Robert gara Cape Town ebe ọ ga-eguzobe diocese ọhụrụ, mụbaa ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị ụkọchukwu ma guzobe ụka na ụlọ akwụkwọ ọhụrụ
E nwèrè naanị ụka Anglican iri na South Africa n'oge ahụ
Site n'ọnwụ ya afọ 25 ka e mesịrị, ọnụ ọgụgụ a arịgoola ruo 63
Ebe ọ bụ na ha maara ndụ dị elu nke ndị bishọp, gụnyere obí bishọp ahụ, ndị Grays kwagara Cape na ndị na-ejere ha ozi, oche na ọbụna ụgbọ ala bishọp
Chọọchị Atọ n'Ime Otu Dị Nsọ, Caledon (1850)

Barbara Martha Psorakis (onye amụrụ n'abalị iri na otu nke Eprel afọ 1996), nke aha otutu nkwago ya bụ Sorakiss, bụ onye Ghana na-agụ egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara ya maka Best New Act na Ghana Entertainment Awards (USA) nke Medikal meriri
A mụrụ Sorakiss na Tema nye Mr George Psorakis na Madam Elizabeth Frimpong
O debara aha na Ola Senior High School maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya mana o mechara tụgharịa gawa Datus International School ebe ọ gụsịrị
Ọ gara n'ihu na-achụso ọrụ odide ihe n'egosi n'igbe onyonyo na ọrụ nduzi yaS na National Film and Television Institute (NAFTI)
Maka Sorakiss, ọrụ ya na egwu malitere mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya

Egwu ya ọzọ, 'My Honey', nke gosipụtara Akwaboah Jnr nyere ya ohere ịme ihe n'oge dị iche iche gụnyere 4syte TV Music Video Awards na Ghana DJ Awards Ọ sonyeere 4stye TV dị ka onye na-eme ihe ngosi TV n'afọ 2014
Soraya (Persian) Bụ aha nwanyị Persian
O sitere na aha Arabic maka ụyọkọ kpakpando Pleiades, Thurayya (Arabic )
Aha ahụ na-ewu ewu na Europe n'ihi njikọ ya na Soraya Esfandiary-Bakhtiari, nwunye nke abụọ nke Shah Mohammad Reza Pahlavi nke Iran, onye ghọrọ onye Europe
Soraya Miré (amụrụ n'afọ 1961) bụ odee Somalia, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-emegide ibe nwaanyị ugwu
Amuru Soraya Miré na Beledweyne
gbara afo iri na ato, o diri ibe nwaanyị ugwu
Miré's' documentary film Fire Eyes (1994) bidoro mgbe Miré chetara ihe o gabigara mgbe ebere ya ugwu, wee gunye ajuju onu n'ihe ndi ozo sonyere na ya bu ihe
Sosatie (pl sosaties) bụ nri ọdịnala South Afrika nke anụ (na-abụkarị nwa atụrụ ma ọ bụ atụrụ) nke a na-esi na skewers
Okwu a sitere na sate ('anụ a na-etinye n'ime anụ') na saus (sauce na-esi ísì ụtọ)
Ọ sitere na Cape Malay, nke a na-eji na Afrikaans, asụsụ bụ isi nke Cape Malays, okwu ahụ enwetala mgbasa onye ka ukwuu na mba South Afrika
A na-eme anụ a na-eme ka ọ dị nro, anụ a na'ime ya (nke na-abụkarị nwa atụrụ) ma sie ya site na ụdị braaing (barbecued) shish-kebab
Ntụziaka Sosatie dịgasị iche, mana ihe ndị a na-ejikarị eme ya nwere ike ịgụnye cubes nke nwa atụrụ, anụ ehi, ọkụkọ, apricots a mịrị amị, yabasị na-acha ọbara ọbara na ose agwakọta
Iji kwadebe, a na-etinye iberibe atụrụ n'otu abalị n'ime yabasị e siri esi, chillies, galik, akwụkwọ curry na mmiri tamarind, mgbe ahụ a na-agbanye ya na skewers ma ọ bụ pan-esiri ya ma ọ bụ sie ya
Otú ọ dị, ụzọ kachasị ewu ewu isi sie sosaties bụ n'èzí, na braai (ma ọ bụ barbecue)
A na-ejikarị obere yabasị, ose a pịrị apị, apricots a mịrị amị ma ọ bụ prunes na-agwakọta anụ ahụ
Sonwabise 'Soso' Rungqu (amụrụ 24 Mee 1983), bụ onye ome ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwú nke South Africa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe omume n'ewu ewu bụ Isidingo
A mụrụ ya na Mee 24 1983 na Amalinda, East London, South Africa
Na 1991, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Clarendon High School nke ụmụ Umunwanyi
Ọ gụchara jiri nzere nke nka ihe omume na egwu bụ Performance Art na Musical Theatre na Tshwane University of Technology, Pretoria
Nna ya nwụrụ na 2015
Ọ lụọla di, ma bụrụkwa nne nke otu nwa nwoke
N'afọ 2007, o mere ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya n'ihe nkiri The Frog Prince na akụkọ ndị ọzọ e mere n'ụlọ ihe nkiri Civic , (nke a na-akpọ ugbu a dị ka Ụlọ ihe nkiri Johannesburg)
Soso mere olu a ma ama n'ihe nkiri animated 'Smartycat' na ihe ngosi Cool Catz ụmụaka isite na 2008 ruo 2010
Ka oge ahụ, ọ na-eme ihe nkiri na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị
Mgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ngalaba nke nka na Omenala ruo afọ ole na ole
Ọrụ telivishọn mbụ ya bịara dị ka ọmụmụ gbasara nwa PHD maka nchịkọba Mindset Network Health
Na mbụ, o mere Mpụ̀ta kamẹo na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri telivishọn a ma ama Mzansi Love, Scandal!, Obodo Rhythm, Sokhulu & Partners na 7de Laan
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ gosipụtara n'usoro ihe onyonyo a bụ HeartLaughs dị ka akụkụ nke DVD 'Uru dị n'ọrụ'
Na 2014, ọ pụtara na obere fim bụ̀ Awakening na mgbe ahụ na ihe nkiri Beneath the Art na 2015
N'otu afọ ahụ, o kwupụtara ọrụ ya na ihe omume redio uHambolwethu ekesara na TruFM
Na 2016, ọ ghọrọ onye ama ama na ọrụ ọgọstụ pụtara agwa ka 'Kau Morongwa' na soap opera bụ Isidingo
Ọ gara n'ihu n'egosiputa ruo 2018 ebe ọ kwụsịrị na ihe ngosi ahụ iji lekọta nna ya na-arịa ọrịa
Sosoliso Airlines Limited bụ ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu a haziri ahazi, nke ụlọ, nke ndị njem
Maka ọtụtụ oge ọ dị, ọ nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na Ikeja, Lagos State
Na mbụ, isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị na ọdụ ụgbọ elu Enugu na Enugu steeti
E guzobere ya n'afọ 1994
O wee malite ọrụ na July 2000

Gọọmentị Naịjirịa setịpụrụ oge a kara aka n'ụbọchị iri atọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2007 maka ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu niile na-arụ ọrụ na mba ahụ ka ha megharia ma ọ bụ ka ha kwụsị, na mgbalị iji hụ na ọrụ na nchekwa ka mma
Ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu asaa enweghi ike iru oge a kara aka ma n'ihi ya, a gaghị ekwe ka ha felie na mbara igwe Naịjirịa malite na 30 Eprel 2007
Ndị a bụ ADC Airlines, Fresh Air, Sosoliso Airlines, Albarka Air, Chrome Air Service, Dasab Airlines na Space World Airline
Ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọelu ndị ahụ metụtara ga-efe efe naanị mgbe ha mezuru ụkpụrụ nke Nigerian Civil Aviation Authority (NCAA) n'ihe gbasara re-capitalization ma si otú a debanye aha maka ọrụ
Sosoliso Airlines na-arụ ọrụ ụgbọ elu na Enugu, Port Harcourt, Owerri, Abuja na Lagos

Sotelma bụ ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nkeonwe na Mali
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dabeere na Bamako
Sotelma na-enye ekwentị mpaghara, telephony mba ụwa, ọrụ ịntanetị na ọrụ ekwentị mkpanaaka, wdg
enyemaka ọrụ mkpanaka ya bụ Malitel
Ọ bụkwa ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ aha nke ngalaba koodu obodoml
Aha zuru ezu nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'asụsụ French bụ 'Société des télécommunications au Mali'
N'afọ 2008, a mara ọkwa na gọọmentị Mali ga-ewepụ Sotelma n'aka ndị otu nzuzo a na-akpọghị aha
A ga-ekewa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 51% na-aga otu onye na-etinye ego nkeonwe, 20% gọọmentị na-ejide ya, 10% na-aga ndị ọrụ, na 19% na-ere site na ọha
E mechara mee ka ọ bụrụ nke onwe n'afọ 2010
N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2009, Maroc Telecom nwetara pasentị iri ise na otu nke Sotelma

N'ihe dị ka afọ 2002, Sotelma nwere ngụkọta uru nke ijeri CFA 43,817, ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ 1300, na-arụ ọrụ 1100 km nke eriri nnyefe fiber optic, ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri DOMSAT 9, ọdụ VSAT 19, ahịrị ndị debanyere aha ekwentị 110000 na ekwentị ọha 5241
Àtụ Etisalat
Asụsụ Sothozwana bụ otu asụsụ Bantu ndị yiri ibe ha nke a na-asụ na Southern Africa
Otu Sothozwana kwekọrọ na akara S30 na nhazi asụsụ Guthrie nke 1967 na 71 n'ezinụlọ Bantu
Olumba dị iche iche nke Tswana, Southern Sotho na Northern Sotho nwere nghọta nke ukwuu N'ihe karịrị otu oge, ewepụtala atụmatụ iji mepụta nhazi n'otu ma kwusaa asụsụ Sotho-Tswana
Souad Abderrahim (amụrụ n'afọ 1964) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tunisia
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi obodo Tunis, isi obodo Tunisia, na July 3, 2018
Ọ bụ onye otu Islamist Ennahda Movement, na nwanyị mbụ jere ozi dị ka onye isi obodo Tunis
Ọ bụ nwa afọ Métouia
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Lycée Khaznadar na mpụga Tunis
Ọ na-eyi ákwà mkpuchi ahụ n'oge ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Faculty of Medicine nke Monastir
Ọ malitere ime mkpọsa ma zute ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe dịka Ajmi Lourimi, onye mechara bụrụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ennahdha
Ọ bụkwa onye otu ndị isi nke Tunisian General Union of Students (UGTE)
Mmekọrịta agha ya mere ka ọ nọrọ ụbọchị iri na ise n'ụlọ mkpọrọ n'afọ 1985, mgbe ọ gbalịrị ime ka esemokwu dị n'etiti ụmụ akwụkwọ kwụsị
A manyere ya ịhapụ ngalaba ahụ ma mesịa maliteghachi ọmụmụ ya na ụlọ ọgwụ na Monastir
N'afọ otu puku narị itoolu, iri itoolu na otu, ọ malitere usoro agha; ọrụ ya mere ka e jide ya ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ dị ka onye na-emegide ọchịchị ahụ
Ọ sonyeere òtù ndị Alakụba Ennahdha, na-esote nzukọ nke UGTE, nke ọ na-eduzi na ebe ndị isi otu nọ
Ụlọ ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Ennahdha kpọtụrụ ya iji kpọbata ya n'òtù ahụ
N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu, maka Ennahdha na-anọchite anya Tunis
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii ndị omeiwu na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ na nnwere onwe

N'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2011, o kwupụtara na arụmụka banyere Monte Carlo Doualiya na nnwere onwe ga-abụ 'nke omenala, omenala na nkwanye ùgwù maka omumej ọma'; o gosipụtara isi ihe ya site n'ịkatọ ndị nne na-alụbeghị di, 'ihe ihere, ihe otiti na ndị Tunisia', nke 'ekwesịghị ịchọ usoro iwu nke na-echebe ikike ha'
A na-akpọ ya 'Souad Palin', na-ezo aka na Sarah Palin
Ọ bụ onye Ennahdha na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala na kansụl obodo nke Tunis na ntuli aka ime obodo nke afọ 2018
N'abalị atọ n'ọnwa Julaị, a họpụtara ya site na votu iri abụọ na isii nke ndị otu Council Council, na vootu iri abụọ na abụọ megide ya
Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye isi obodo Tunis na nwanyị Arab mbụ nwere ọnọdụ dị otú ahụ
Souad Adel Faress (a mụrụ n'abalị 25 n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 1948) bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri, redio, telivishọn na ihe nkiri na United Kingdom
A mụrụ Faress n'afọ 1948 na Accra, Ghana, nne na nna ya bụ ndị Irish na ndị Siria
O tolitere na Southport, Lancashire, gụrụ ihe nkiri na Guildhall School of Music and Drama ma biri na London
Ọ na-enyocha edemede egwuregwu dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kemgbe tupu afọ 2004
Faress gụsịrị akwụkwọ edemede na City Literary Institute adult education college
Nkà ya ndị ọzọ gụnyere ịgba egwu, ịnya ịnyịnya, cricket na yoga
Kemgbe ahụ, Faress enweela nnukwu ọrụ na ihe nkiri dịka My Beautiful Laundrette (1985) na Sixth Happiness (1997), yana ọtụtụ ọrụ ogbo gburugburu UK
N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2001, ọ pụtara obere oge na Coronation Street dịka nne Dev Alahan bụ Umila
Souad Faress pụtakwara dịka Old Rani na The Sarah Jane Adventures serial The Mad Woman in the Attic na Ọktoba afọ 2009
N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2014, a mara ọkwa na Faress ga-eme ihe nkiri na Hurried Steps, nsụgharị Sharon Wood nke 'Passi Affrettati nke Dacia Maraini sụgharịrị
N'agbata afọ 2010 na afọ 2011, ọ gbara nne nne Jay Faldren, Maryam Shakiba, na Casualty
Faress pụtara na ihe omume nke ihe nkiri nọọsụ a ma ama No Angels dịka onye ndu, nwanne nne Anji Mittel bụ Di
Faress pụtara obere oge dịka dọkịta ụlọ ọgwụ na 'The Dead of Jericho', ihe omume mbụ nke Inspector Morse
N'afọ 2016, ọ sonyeere usoro HBO Game of Thrones na Oge 6 dịka Nnukwu Onye Nchụàjà nke Dosh Khaleen
Faress pụtakwara na ihe nkiri ITV Brief Encounters, 'nhazi na-enweghị isi nke Ann Summers CEO Jacqueline Gold's memoirs, Good Vibrations'
N'afọ 2019, Faress pụtara dịka onye na-eme ihe ugboro ugboro na Daisy Haggard na Laura Solon sitcom Back to Life
Souad Massi (سعاد ماسي), (amụrụ Ougustu 23, na afọ 1972), bụ onye Algeria Berber na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-akpọ ụbọ
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya na-eme ihe na otu egwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Kabyle bụ Atakor, tupu ọ hapụ mba ahụ mgbe usoro egwu ọnwụ gasịrị
N'afọ 1999, Massi rụrụ ọrụ na egwu egwu Femmes d'Algérie na Paris, nke dugara na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Island Records

Egwú Massi, nke na-egosipụta guitar acoustic, na-egosipụtakarị mmetụta egwu ọdịda anyanwụ dị ka rock, mba ma ọ bụ fado Portuguese mana mgbe ụfọdụ na-etinye mmetụta egwu ọwụwa anyanwụ na ngwá egwu ọwụwarị dị ka oud yana ụdị egwu Afrịka
Massi na-abụ abụ na asụsụ Classical Arabic, Algerian Arabic, French, mgbe ụfọdụ na Bekee, na n'asụsụ Kabyle Berber, na-ejikarị ihe karịrị otu asụsụ n'otu abụ ahụ
A mụrụ Massi na Algiers, Algeria n'ezinụlọ dara ogbenye nke ụmụ isii
Ọ tolitere n'ógbè ndị na-arụ ọrụ Bab El Oued nke Algiers ma malite ịbụ abụ na ịkpọ ụbọ akwara mgbe ọ dị obere
N'ịbụ onye nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye gbara ume, ọ malitere ịmụ egwu mgbe ọ dị obere, na-abụ abụ ma na-akpọ ụbọ
Ka ọ na-etolite, ọ mikpuru onwe ya n'ime mba Amerika na ụdị egwu nke ga-emesị nwee mmetụta siri ike n'ide egwu ya
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, ọ sonyeere otu egwu flamenco, mana ọ gwụrụ ya ngwa ngwa wee pụọ
Na mbido afọ 1990, Massi sonyere otu egwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mba Algeria bụ Atakor, bụ ndị egwu ọdịda anyanwụ dị ka Led Zeppelin na U2 nwere mmetụta
O dekọrọ ma soro ndị otu ahụ rụọ ọrụ ruo afọ asaa, na-ewepụta abọm na-aga nke ọma na vidiyo egwu abụọ a ma ama
Otú ọ dị, òtù ahụ, site na okwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya na ewu ewu na-arịwanye elu, ghọrọ ihe a na-elekwasị anya
Massi kpuchiri onwe ya site n'ịkpụ ntutu isi ya ma na-eyi uwe ụmụ nwoke, mana ọ ka bụ onye a na-achọ n'usoro egwu ọnwụ a na-amaghị aha ya
N'afọ 1999, ọ hapụrụ òtù ahụ wee kwaga Paris, France
Souad Massi bi na Paris, France ugbu a na di ya French-Moroccan Mohammed na ụmụ ha nwanyị abụọ Inji na Amira
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado Leonard Cohen ma depụta egwu sitere na AC / DC na INXS dị ka otu n'ime mmetụta ya
N'afọ 1999, a kpọrọ Massi ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na mmemme Femmes d'Algérie ('Women of Algeria') na Paris, nke dugara na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Island Records
N'ọnwa Juun afọ 2001, ọ wepụtara abọm izizi ya, Raoui ('Storyteller'), nke Allmusic jiri tụnyere egwu ọdịnala America nke afọ 1960
A na-abụkarị ya na French na Arabic, abọm ahụ ghọrọ ihe ịga nke ọma na azụmahịa na France
N'afọ sochiri ya, a họpụtara ya maka ọkwa ana akpo 'Best Newcomer' na Radio 3 World Music Awards
N'afọ 2003, o wepụtara abọm nke abụọ ya, Deb ('Heartbroken')
Okwu nke abọm ahụ bụ nke onwe, karịa nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime abọm ndị ndida Afrika kachasị nwee ọganihu n'ụwa niile
Afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, Massi wepụtara abọm nke atọ ya, Mesk Elil ('Honeysuckle')
Abọm ahụ gbasaa na isiokwu nke ịhụnanya na mfu nke a nyochara na Deb, ma gosipụta duets na Daby Toure na Rabah Khalfa
Ọ bụ onye ọbịa na-eme ihe ngosi dị iche iche nke Ịtali 'Non middelci tomar dal panico' na afọ 2006 site n'aka onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-eme emume Gianni Morandi
N'afọ 2010, o wepụtara abọm studio nke anọ ya bụ Ô Houria
Ọ bụ Francis Cabrel na Francoise Michel mepụtara abọm a
Ọ na-egosi Paul Weller na piano na olu na abụ mmechi ya
Souad Yaacoubi bụ Minista na ahụ maka ahụike ọha na eze nke Tunisia n'afọ 1983
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ nwere ọkwa a
Souaid bụ transliteration nke aha nna na mba Arabic dị iche iche
Ọ nwere ike izo aka na ndia
Soueid bụ transliteration nke aha nna Arabic dị iche iche
Ọ nwere ike izo aka na ndia
Souhila Mallem (a mụrụ na 13 June 1988), nke a na-akpọkarị Bibicha, bụ onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ ya n'abalị 13 ọnwa June afọ 1988 na Algiers, Algeria
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu na Faculty of Law nke Mahadum Algiers 1
N'afọ 2010, ọ kwadoro mmemme nke 'Cevital group' kwadoro iji kwado ndị otu mba Algeria nke na-agbasa ozi na ụlọ ọrụ mba ENTV
N'oge ihe ngosi ahụ, onye nduzi Djafar Gassem hụrụ ya, ma mesịa nye ya ọrụ na usoro telivishọn Djemai family 1 dịka 'Faty'
Mgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara na usoro Dar Bahdja dị ka 'Zina'
Otú ọ dị, ihe nkiri telivishọn ya kachasị ewu ewu sitere na ọrụ 'Bibicha' na usoro ihe nkiri a ma ama Bibiche na Bibicha
O mechara rụọ ọrụ dịka 'Princess Abla' na usoro Sultan Achour 10 na ọrụ ndị ọzọ dị ka 'Sabrina' na usoro El Khawa na ọrụ 'Lila' na sitcom Wlad Hlal
Souhir Ben Amara (a mụrụ na 27 Nọvemba 1985) bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri
Nwa nwanyị nke onye nnọchi anya mba ọzọ, ọ biri na Paris ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ isii tupu ọ kwaga Tunisia
N'inwe mmasị na nka site na nwata, ọ bụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii ka o kpebiri ime ya ọrụ ya n'ezie
Nna Ben Amara dara ọrịa n'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, mana ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na nsọpụrụ
O were otu afọ, wee gụọ akwụkwọ na Higher Institute of Multimedia Arts na La Manouba, ebe ọ natara diplọma audiovisual
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ onye nduzi site na ọzụzụ, Ben Amara lekwasịrị anya n'ime ihe nkiri kemgbe nnukwu ọrụ ya
Ọrụ ya malitere na telivishọn na usoro Maktoub na Choufli Hal n'afọ 2008
Ọ pụtara dịka Maliha na Min Ayam Mliha n'afọ 2010
Ben Amara mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na Always Brando (2011), nke Ridha Béhi duziri
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ihe atụ nke Zena ma bụrụ onye a họpụtara na nkeji ikpeazụ mgbe onye nduzi ahụ enweghị mmasị na onye na-eme ihe nkiri ahọpụtara maka ọrụ ahụ
N'afọ 2012, Ben Amara mere Aicha na Millefeuille, nke Nouri Bouzid duziri, na-ekwu maka nsogbu na hijab

N'afọ 2013, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Donia na miniseries Yawmiyat Imraa N'afọ 2019, Ben Amara pụtara na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke akụkọ ihe mere mere eme Kingdoms of Fire O nwere ọrụ dị mkpa na Sortilège (2019), nke Ala Eddine Slim duziri
Ihe odide ya dọtara mmasị ya, onye ya na-ezute onye agha ahụ mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ọhịa
Ben Amara kwadoro Arab Spring ma sonye na ihe omume ahụ, mana ọ na-ewe iwe na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị zuru uche ndị mmadụ
Ọ na-emegide iwu cannabis mana ọ na-akwado ibelata ntaramahụhụ metụtara ya
O kwuru na ọrụ ya kachasị mma ga-abụ nke nwa okorobịa
Souléymane Sy Savané bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Ivorian
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri Goodbye Solo (2008)
A mụrụ ya na mba Côte d'Ivoire, Sy Savané kwagara Paris ma rụọkwa ọrụ dịka onye na-elekọta ụgbọ elu maka Air Afrique
Air Afrique nyere ya visa maka njem na US, n'afọ 2000, Sy Savané biri na New York, ebe ọ gụrụ ime ihe nkiri tupu a tinye ya na Goodbye Solo
N'afọ 2008, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Solo na ihe nkiri Ramin Bahrani nke a na-akpọ Goodbye Solo
A họpụtara ya n'afọ 2009 maka Independent Spirit Award maka Best Male Lead na Gotham Independent Film Award maka Breakthrough Actor

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ mbụ ya n'afọ 2009 mgbe ọ pụtara na American premiere nke ihe nkiri mpụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Ian Bruce nke South Africa Groundswell, nke Scott Eliott duziri, nakwa The New Group na Theatre Row na New York
N'afọ 2011, Sy Savané pụtakwara na ihe nkiri Machine Gun Preacher nke Gerard Butler, nke Marc Forster duziri
Ọ na-eme ihe nkiri nke Deng, onye nnupụisi Sudan
Kemgbe Machine Gun Preacher, Sy Savané apụtala n'ọtụtụ ọrụ na telivishọn, nke gụnyere Master of None, The Detour, Madam Secretary, na Forever
N'afọ 2019, Sy Savané pụtara na Suicide by Sunlight, ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke Nikyatu Jusu duziri ma bụrụkwa onye nhọpụta gọọmentị nke Sundance Film Festival
Ọ pụtakwara na Killerman, nke Liam Hemsworth, nke Malik Bader duziri
Souleymane Démé (a mụrụ n'afọ 1986) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Chad
Ọ bụ onye a ma ama maka ọrụ a na-akatọ ya na ihe nkiri GriGris nke ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa
Souleymane Dela Sacko (bu onye amụrụ na Nọvemba 19, 1984 na Niamey ) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Nigerien nke na-agbara AS SONIDEP na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger
O so na ndị otu egwuregwu ahụ na asọmpi iko mba ụwa
Ọ gbara bọọlụ na Étoile Filante Ouagadougou na Burkina Faso
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger
Ọ na-eyikarị nọmba 12
Ọ bụ onye isi ndị otu ahụ n'afọ 2008
Souliath Ajjouolakpe Saka (amụrụ na 20 Disemba 1991 na Benin) bụ onye Benin na-agba ọsọ nke maara nke ọma na mita 200 na 400
Na 2007 Asọmpi Junior nke Afrika ọ meriri ọla nchara na mita 200 na ọlaọcha na mita 400

O jisiri ike ruo ọkara ikpeazụ na 2008 Asọmpi Afrịka (200 m) na 2012 Asọmpi Afrịka(ma 200 m na 400 m), na 2018 Asọmpi Afrịka (2007) O mekwara asọmpi na 2005 Jeux de la Francophonie (400 m) na 2009 Jeux de l'Francophonie (200 m) n'erughị nke ikpeazụ
Na 4 x 400 mita relay ọ mechara nke ise na 2005 Jeux de la Francophonie, nke ise na 2009 Jeux de the Francophonia
Oge kachasị mma ya bụ 2463 sekọnd na mita 200, nke o nwetara na June 2018 na Blois; na 5476 sekọnd n'ime mita 400, nke o nwetara n'ọnwa Julaị 2018 na Albi

Ndị mmadụ nwere aha nna gụnyere
Soumaya Akaaboune (a mụrụ na 16 Febụwarị 1974) bụ onye mba Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Tangier, Morocco, nne Akaaboune bụ onye na-emepụta ejiji na onye na-ese ejiji ebe nna ya bụ onye hụrụ nka n'anya
Ọ kọwara ụlọ ya mgbe ọ bụ nwata dịka ebe nsọ maka ndị na-ese ihe na ndị nọ ná mkpa
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, onye na-ede egwu Maurice Bejart hụrụ Akaaboune, onye kpọrọ ya ka ọ sonye n'òtù ịgba egwu ya
Ọ nabatara ma zụọ maka awa asatọ n'ụbọchị, oge o kwuru na ọ bụ onye kacha nwee obi ụtọ na ndụ ya
Akaaboune gara Europe, na-agba egwu na Paris, mgbe ahụ Spain na London
N'oge ọ nọ na London, ọ tụgharịrị uche ya na ihe nkiri, na-eme ihe nkiri n'ọtụtụ egwu
Ọ gbajiri akwara Achilles ya n'afọ 1989, na-eme ka ọrụ ịgba egwú ya kwụsị
Na London, Akaaboune zutere Sandra Bernhard, onye kpọrọ ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na ihe ngosi ya 'Up All Night' ma mesịa mee ihe ngosi Broadway 'I'm Still Here'Ọ katọrọ ya'
Akaaboune zụrụ ime ihe nkiri na Loft Studio
N'afọ 2010, ya na Matt Damon gbara na ihe nkiri Green Zone Akaaboune nwere ọrụ na ihe nkiri ịhụnanya Playing for Keeps n'afọ 2012 na ihe nkiri Lovelace n'afọ 2013

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị inyom ise na-elekọta ụlọ gosipụtara na 2013 French show Les Vraies Housewives N'agbata afọ 2015 na 2016, Akaaboune gosipụtara dịka Fettouma na ihe nkiri ncha a ma ama Wadii, nke Yassine Ferhanne duziri
Omume ya bụ nwanyị ọgaranya nke jụrụ ịnabata ikpe na-ezighị ezi, ihe ngosi ahụ nwetakwara nde mmadụ 7 kwa ihe omume
N'afọ 2019, ọ gbara Marcelle na usoro TV The Spy
Akaaboune zutere onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri Peter Rodger n'afọ 1999
Ha abụọ mechara lụọ di ma mụọ nwa nwoke, Jazz
Akaaboune bụ nne nkuchi Elliot Rodger, onye mere ogbugbu nke 2014 Isla Vista
Ha abụọ nwere mmekọrịta na-adịghị mma, Rodger mekwara atụmatụ igbu Akaaboune
Ọ laghachiri Morocco na ngwụcha afọ 2014
Akaaboune na-asụ French, Arabic, English na Spanish
Soumia Hady (Arabic ; amụrụ na 30 Junnu 1998) bụ onye Morocco na agba bọọlụ nke na agbachitere COD Meknès na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Morocco
Hady agbaala bọọlụ maka CODM na Morocco
Hady emeela maka Morocco na ọkwa ndị na erubeghị afọ-20 na ndị okenye
Soumiya Iraoui (amụrụ na 19 Machị na afọ 1996) bụ onye Moroccan judo
Ọ bụ onye nwetara ọlaọcha na African Games na onye nwetara ọla edo ugboro ise, gụnyere ọla edo abụọ, na African Judo Championships
Ọ nọchitekwara anya Morocco na afọ 2020 Summer Olympics na Tokyo, Japan
O meriri nrite ọla edo na ihe omume ya na afo 2018 African Judo Championships nke emere na Tunis, Tunisia
O mekwara asọmpi na ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị nke 57 kilogram na afọ 2018 Mediterranean Games nke emere na Tarragona, Catalonia, Spain
N'afọ 2019, o ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị nke 52 kilogram na African Judo Championships nke emere na Cape Town, South Africa
O nwetakwara ihe nrite ọlaọcha na ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị 52 kilogram na afọ 2019 African Games nke emere na Rabat, Morocco
N'otu ọnwa ahụ, ọ gbakwara asọmpi na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị 52 kilogram na afọ 2019 World Judo Championships nke emere na Tokyo, Japan
Otu ọnwa mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ meriri otu n'ime ọla nchara na ihe omume ya na afọ 2019 Judo Grand Prix Tashkent nke emere na Tashkent, Uzbekistan
O nwetakwara ihe nrite ọlaọcha na ihe omume a na 2020 African Judo Championships nke emere na Antananarivo, Madagascar
N'afọ 2021, ọ sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị 52 kilogram na Judo World Masters nke e mere na Doha, Qatar ebe Réka Pupp nke Hungary wepụrụ ya na egwuregwu mbụ ya
Na afo 2021 African Judo Championship nke emere na Dakar, Senegal, ọ meriri nrite ọla edo na ihe omume ya
N'afọ 2021, ọ nọchitere anya Morocco na afọ 2020 Summer Olympics na Tokyo, Japan
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị nke 52 kilogram
Ọ meriri egwuregwu mbụ ya na Kachakorn Warasiha nke Thailand ma Chelsie Giles nke Great Britain wepụrụ ya
Giles gara n'ihu merie otu n'ime ọla nchara na ihe omume ahụ
Mgbe ọnwa ole na ole gachara, ọ tụfuru ọla nchara ya na ihe omume ya na Judo Grand Slam Abu Dhabi nke emere na Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

Sound Sultan (amụrụ Olanrewaju Fasasi na Nọvemba 27, 1976) bụ onye Naịjirịa na-agụ egwú- odee egwu, omee ihe oyonyo, ome ntọ ọchị, rapa na ndekọ egwu
A na-ahụta ya dịka otu n'ime pafetị nke egwu hipụ họpụ nke oge a na Naịjirịa
Na 1991, o nwere mmasị na egwu, na nnọkọ ụlọ akwụkwọ ma na-ede egwu nke ya
Ọ na-ekwu na mmasị egwu ya bụ site mmetụta nwanne ya nwoke bụ Baba Dee bụ onye gụrụ nka ihe nkiri Ọ malitere ịmụ etú esi akpọ jita mgbe ọ gụchara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndịrị ma nọdụ na gbalaga na 1999
Ọrụ Sound Sultan na azụmaahịa ngosi bidoro na 1990s, mgbe ọ na-akwado ihe ngosi iji nweta ego maka studiyo
Na afọ 1999, ọ meriela ọtụtụ ngosipụta
O wepụtara egwu izizi ya bụ 'Jagbajantis' n'afọ 2000, bụ nke wuru ewu na Naịjirịa
Mgbe o na-egosipụta egwu ya na isonye ndị egwu ndị ọzọ na-iti egwu,Ndị Kennis Music kpọrọ ya
N'okpuru Kennis Music, o wepụtara abọm anọ
N'afọ 2007, nkwekọrịta ya na akara ahụ gwụrụ o soro Baba Dee mepee Naija Ninjas, otu aha ndekọ, uwe mmepụta na akwa uwe
Mgbe ọ malitere dị ka onye rapa, ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ụdị egwu dị iche iche site na R&B ruo Afurobeat, egwu mmụọ na egwu Fuji Naịjirịa1
O kwuru na-ekwesịghị ikpe ndị otii egwu maka ụdịdị ha na-eme, ihe dị mkpa bụ ozi ha na-akụ n'egwú a
N'okpuru Naija Ninjas, o wepụtara Back From The Future (2010) wee were ndị na-eti egwu dịka Karma Da Rapper, Young GreyC, Shawn na Blacka
Sound Sultan malitere mmekọrịta ọrụ ya na Wyclef Jean mgbe egosiri ya n'akụkụ 2face Idibia na Faze na 'Proud to be African' site na Wyclef's Welcome to Haiti Creole 101 album
Ha arụkọtara ọnụ na ọrụ abụọ ọzọ 'King of My Country' (2009) na 'People Bad' (2012)
Na 2012, a mara ọkwa na Sound Sultan bụ onye nnọchi anya UN maka Udo maka ụdị ndụ ya na ọrụ ya
Na 2015, Sound Sultan wepụtara otu egwu rap 'Remember' mgbe ọ nọghị ogologo oge na ọrụ egwu

Mgbe ọdịda nkata bọọlụ nke Afrịka, Sound Sultan sonyeere ndị na-ahazi nke 'Continental Basketball League' ka ọ bụrụ otu onye nwe 'Lagos City Stars' (ndị mmeri 2017) na onye nhazi nke ntụrụndụ egwuregwu
Sound Sultan gosipụtara na Honorebel 's 2019 'Bridal' ya na Joe El
N’afọ 2009, Sound Sultan lụrụ enyi ya nwanyị bụ Chichi Morah, nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Farida Fasasi si agbụrụ Igbo
Di na nwunye a nwere umu ato

Soundcity Radio Network bụ redio FM nke Naijiria na ụlọ ọrụ redio dijitalụ zuru ụwa ọnụ nke na-agbaso usoro egwu Top 40 ma bụrụ nke Alphavision Multimedia, onye enyemaka nke Consolidated Media Associates (CMA)
N'ịbụ nke nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na Lagos, Naijiria, Soundcity Radio Network na-agbasa ozi na mba niile nye ndị na-eto eto

Soundcity Radio Network music quota na-adabere na egwu Naijiria na ihe karịrị pasenti iri asaa (70%) nke egwu sitere n'aka ndị na-ese ihe n'ógbè ahụ na pasenti iri atọ (30%) kewara n'etiti egwu ndị ọzọ nke Afrịka na mba ọzọ
Nnyocha nnyefe maka ụlọ ọrụ mbụ maka Soundcity Radio Network, na Lagos, malitere na nkeji iri na ise nke afọ 2016, mana mmemme na OAPs malitere na 18 Julaị
OAP ndị ọzọ sochiri na mgbanwe awa anọ nke ọ bụla

Soundcity TV na-akọwa onwe ya dị ka 'ụlọ ọrụ TV nke egwu obodo Afrịka'

A mụrụ ihe ngosi egwu Blast dị ka Soundcity MTN Campus Blast na 2007 ebe a na-ewere ndị na-ese ihe na Naijiria gụnyere 2face, 9ice na P Square gburugburu ụlọ akwụkwọ iji mee ihe ngosi egwu nye ọtụtụ puku ụmụ akwụkwọ

N'afọ 2014, mgbawa nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ zuru ike ghọrọ Soundcity Urban Blast Festival, ihe nkiri telivishọn na-eme ihe nkiri site na ihe karịrị iri atọ (30) Naijiria, South Africa na ndị ọzọ na-eme egwuregwu n'Afrịka

Ememe izizi ahụ weere ọnọdụ na Expo Centre, Eko Hotel na Suites Lagos, Nigeria na 29 Disemba 2016

SouthWest Energy Ltd bụ ụlọ ọrụ nyocha na mmepụta mmanụ na gas nke Ethiopia nke dị na Addis Ababa, Ethiopia
Tewodros Ashenafi guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'afọ 2005
E debanyere aha ya na Hong Kong
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2005, SouthWest Energy bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwekọrịta mmepụta na Ministry of Mines and Energy nke Ethiopia maka blọk 9 na 13 na Ogaden Basin
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2008, ọ bịanyere aka na blọk 9A, na-eweta ngụkọta ala ruo uare kilomita 29,000 (11,000 sq mi)
ụlọ ọ ọrụ ahụ na-ezube iweta $100 nde site na ntinye onwe ya na nkeji mbụ nke 2013 iji nyere aka kwado mmemme igwu mmiri nke ọma atọ na Basin Ogaden
Na mgbakwunye, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ala na Gambella na Jijiga

Pound (Afrikaans ọdọ mmiri; akara £, £SA maka ọdịiche) bụ vu ego nke Union of South Africa site na mmalite nke mba ahụ dị ka British Dominion na afọ1910
E ji rand dochie ya na afọ 1961 mgbe South Africa decimalised
N'afọ 1825, iwu nke eze ukwu mere ka mkpụrụ ego sterling bụrụ ego iwu kwadoro na mpaghara niile nke Britain
N'oge ahụ, naanị ógbè Britain dị na Southern Africa bụ Cape of Good Hope Colony
Ka oge na-aga, sterling na mkpụrụ ego ya ghọrọ ego nke mpaghara Britain ọ bụla dị na Southern Africa
N'oge ahụ, sterling gbasoro usoro ego Carolingian nke otu pound kewara na shilling iri abụo, nke ọ bụla bụ penny iri na abụọ
pound sterling ghọrọ ego a na-ahụkarị na Cape of Good Hope na afọ 1825 na-esote iwu eze ukwu nke e nyere maka ebumnuche nke iwebata mkpụrụ ego sterling n'ime mpaghara niile nke Britain
Mkpụrụ ego ndị Britain nọchiri ego Dutch
Tupu South Africa dị n'otu, ọtụtụ ndị ọchịchị wepụtara mkpụrụ ego na akwụkwọ ego na ọnụ ahịa ha dị ka sterling
Transvaal Republic, steeti Boer nke ga-aghọ Transvaal Colony na afọ 1902, wepụtara akwụkwọ ozi site na afọ 1867 ruo n'afo 1902 na mkpụrụ ego site na n'afọ 1892 ruo afọ 1902
A na-ede mkpụrụ ego ọla edo n'asụsụ Afrikaans, n'ihi ya, a na-agụ 'ọdọ mmiri' kama 'pound'
A gbanwere pound South Africa n'oge decimalisation site na rand na ubochi iri na anọ na onwa Februari na afọ 1961 na ọnụego nke R 2 = £SA 1
Rand nọgidere na-enwe ọnụọgụ 2 1 na sterling ruo mgbe sterling dara na afọ 1967 mgbe South Africa emeghị ya
