CBN batara site na itinye isi obodo ọhụrụ iji nọgide na-akwụ ụgwọ ma họpụta njikwa ọhụrụ
N'abalị ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2011, CBN wepụrụ ikike ụlọ akụ nke Spring Bank
E guzobere ụlọ akụ Enterprise Bank n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2011 site n'iweghara akụ na ụfọdụ ụgwọ nke ụlọ akụ Spring Bank, nke a kagbuola ikike ụlọ akụ azụmahịa ya
E nyere EBL ikike ụlọ akụ azụmahịa na 5 Ọgọst 2011
Ka ọ na-erule Jenụwarị 2012, akụ nke Enterprise Bank Limited bụ 100% nke Asset Management Company of Nigeria (AMCON), otu aka nke Gọọmentị Federal nke Nigeria
N'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2012, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naịjirịa, na Lagos nyere iwu ka a kwụsị ọrụ nke Spring Bank Plc, ebe ọ bụ na a kagbuola ikikere ya
Mgbe Central Bank of Nigeria batara n'ọrụ na 2009, a họpụtara Bernadina Sola Ayodele dịka onye isi nchịkwa na onye isi nchịk
Ndepụta nke Ụlọ Akụ̀ Ndị mechiri emechi na Naịjirịa

Squamous-cell carcinoma (SCC), nke a makwaara dị ka carcinoma epidermoid, nwere ọtụtụ ụdị ọrịa cancer dị iche iche na-amalite na sel squamousSelụ ndị a na-etolite n'elu akpụkpọ ahụ, na mkpuchi nke akụkụ ahụ ndị nwere oghere dị n'ime ahụ, na mkpuchi nke iku ume na tract digestive
Ụdị ndị a na-ahụkarị gụnyere
N'agbanyeghị na-ekerịta aha 'squamous-cell carcinoma', SCC nke saịtị ahụ dị iche iche nwere ike igosi ọdịiche dị na mgbaàmà ha gosipụtara, akụkọ ihe mere eme, prognosis, na nzaghachi ọgwụgwọ
A na-ejikọta nje virus nke mmadụ na SCCs nke oropharynx, akpa ume, mkpịsị aka, na mpaghara anogenital
Ihe dị ka 90% nke ọrịa kansa isi na olu (ọrịa cancer nke ọnụ, oghere imi, nasopharynx, akpịrị na ihe ndị metụtara ya) bụ n'ihi SCC
Carcinoma akpụkpọ ahụ squamous-cell bụ ọrịa kansa akpụkpọ ahụ nke abụọ a na-ahụkarị, na-akpata ihe karịrị 1 nde na United States kwa afọ
Primary squamous-cell carcinoma nke thyroid na-egosi phenotype na-eme ihe ike nke na-akpata amụma ọjọọ maka ndị ọrịa
Ọrịa kansa esophageal nwere ike ịbụ n'ihi ma ọ bụ esophageel squamous-cell carcinoma (ESCC) ma ọ bụ adenocarcinoma (EAC)
SCCs na-emekarị nso ọnụ, ebe adenocarcinomas na-eme nso afọ
Dysphagia (isi ike ilo, ihe siri ike karịa mmiri) na ihe mgbu ilo bụ ihe mgbaàmà mbụ a na-ahụkarị
Ọ bụrụ na ọrịa ahụ dị n'otu ebe, ịwa ahụ wepụ esophagus metụtara nwere ike inye ohere ọgwụgwọ
Ọ bụrụ na ọrịa ahụ agbasaala, a na-ejikarị ọgwụgwọ na radiotherapy eme ihe
Mgbe ejikọtara ya na akpa ume, ọ na-abụkarị ọrịa kansa nnukwu mkpụrụ ndụ dị n'etiti (ọ bụghị obere mkpụrụ ndụ kansa akpa ume)
Ọ na-enwekarị ọrịa paraneoplastic na-akpata mmepụta ectopic nke protein metụtara parathyroid hormone, na-akpatara hypercalcemia, mana ọrịa paraneplastic na-ejikọkarị ya na obere ọrịa kansa akpa ume
Ọ bụ n'ihi ịṅụ sịga
Human papillomavirus (HPV), nke bụ isi HPV 16 na 18, na-emetụta ya nke ukwuu na mmepe nke SCC nke penis
Carcinomas atọ na-ejikọta na SCCs nke penis [citation needed]
Mgbe ejikọtara ya na prostate, carcinoma squamous-cell na-eme ihe ike n'okike
O siri ike ịchọpụta ebe ọ bụ na a hụghị mmụba na ọkwa antigen nke prostate, nke pụtara na a na-achọpụta ọrịa kansa mgbe ọ dị elu
[citation needed]
Carcinoma squamous-cell nke akụkụ ahụ nwanyị na-agbasa nwayọọ nwayọọ ma na-anọkarị nso n'akụkụ akụkụ ahụ nwanyị, mana ọ nwere ike ịgbasa na akpa ume na imeju
Nke a bụ ụdị ọrịa kansa a na-ahụkarị n'ahụ nwanyị
Ọtụtụ ọrịa kansa ụkwara bụ mkpụrụ ndụ na-agafe agafe, mana ọrịa kansa ụgbụ metụtara schistosomiasis na-abụkarị SCC
[citation needed]
TP63 staining bụ isi ihe na-egosi histological maka squamous-cell carcinoma
Na mgbakwunye, TP63 bụ ihe dị mkpa maka transcription iji guzobe njirimara nke mkpụrụ ndụ squamous
SCC dị iche iche nke ọma, aka ekpe elu paraspinal azụ akara maka biopsy na adjacent actinic keratosis
SCC, canthus n'akụkụ aka ekpe nke akara maka biopsy
SCC, aka ekpe ventral forearm
Enwere ike iwere kansa dị ka nnukwu ezinụlọ dị iche iche nke ọrịa ọjọọ, yana squamous-cell carcinomas mejupụtara otu n'ime nnukwu subset
A na-eche na mmerụ ahụ SCC niile na-amalite site na nkewa ugboro ugboro, nke a na-achịkwaghị achịkwa nke mkpụrụ ndụ cancer stem nke agbụrụ epithelial ma ọ bụ njirimara
[citation needed] SCCs na-esite na mkpụrụ ndụ squamous, nke bụ mkpụrụ ndụ dị larịị nke dị n'ọtụtụ ebe nke ahụ
Ụfọdụ n'ime ha bụ keratinocytes
Nchịkọta nke mkpụrụ ndụ kansa ndị a na-akpata microscopic focus nke mkpụrụ ndụ na-adịghị mma nke, ọ dịkarịa ala na mbido, na-ejide n'ime anụ ahụ a kapịrị ọnụ nke mkpụrụ ndụ nna ya bi
A na-akpọ ọnọdụ a squamous-cell carcinoma in situ, a na-achọpụta ya mgbe akpụ ahụ abanyebeghị n'ime ala ma ọ bụ ihe ndị ọzọ na-eme ka ọ ghara ịbanye anụ ahụ ndị dị n'akụkụ
Ozugbo mmerụ ahụ toro ma gaa n'ihu ruo n'ókè ebe ọ gbawara, banye, ma banye n'ime ihe ndị dị n'akụkụ ya, a na-akpọ ya 'invasive' squamous-cell carcinoma
Ozugbo carcinoma na-awakpo, ọ nwere ike ịgbasa na akụkụ ndị ọzọ ma mee ka ọ gbasaa, ma ọ bụ 'ọkpụkpụ nke abụọ'
[citation needed]
Usoro International Classification of Diseases for Oncology (ICD-O) depụtara ọtụtụ ụdị ọdịdị na ụdị dị iche iche nke malignant squamous-cell neoplasms, gụnyere
A na-amata ụdị SCC ndị ọzọ n'okpuru usoro ndị ọzọ, dị ka keratoacanthoma
Otu usoro nke ịkewapụta carcinomas squamous-cell bụ site na ọdịdị ha n'okpuru microscope
Ụdị ndị ọzọ nwere ike ịgụnye
Ọrịa cancer nke mkpụrụ ndụ squamous nke Adenoid
Carcinoma nke mkpụrụ ndụ squamous nke basaloid
Ọrịa cancer nke mkpụrụ ndụ na-acha ọcha
Carcinoma nke mkpụrụ ndụ spindle
YouNnyocha achọtawo ihe akaebe maka njikọ dị n'etiti nri na ọrịa kansa akpụkpọ ahụ, gụnyere SCC
Iri nri mmiri ara ehi nwere abụba dị elu na-eme ka ihe ize ndụ nke SCC tumor dịkwuo elu n'etiti ndị nwere ọrịa kansa akpụkpọ ahụ n'oge gara aga

Akwụkwọ nri na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ nwere ike inye aka gbochie mmepe nke SCC na-esote na ọtụtụ ọmụmụ chọpụtara na akwụkwọ nri na mkpụrụ osisi na-enweghị isi na-echebe nke ukwuu megide ihe ize ndụ SCC
N'aka nke ọzọ, iri mmiri ara ehi zuru oke, yogọt, na cheese nwere ike ịbawanye ihe ize ndụ SCC na ndị nwere ike ibute ya

Na mgbakwunye, usoro nri anụ na abụba nwere ike ịbawanye ihe ize ndụ nke SCC na ndị na-enweghị akụkọ ihe mere eme nke SCC, mana njikọ ahụ bụ ihe a ma ama na ndị nwere akụkọ ihe mere anya nke ọrịa kansa akpụkpọ ahụ
Ịṅụ sịga na usoro nri nke a na-ahụkarị site na nnukwu biya na mmanya na-aba n'anya na-emekwa ka ihe ize ndụ nke SCC dịkwuo ukwuu
Square Chikwanda (a mụrụ n'afọ 1972) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe, nke bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Harare, Zimbabwe
O bu ụzọ mụta nka ya site n'aka nna ya, onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
A mụrụ ya na Mvurwi, Chikwanda kwagara Tengenenge Sculpture Community na nna ya mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa
N'ebe ahụ, nna ya kụziiri ya mgbe ọ dị obere ịsa na ịcha nkume
Ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ma mụta nka nke ihe ọkpụkpụ iji bụrụ onye na-ese ihe oge niile mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, na-emepe ụdị nke ya
N'obodo ha, o nwere ọtụtụ ụmụ akwụkwọ, nke Jonathan Mhondorohuma ghọrọ ezigbo enyi
N'afọ 1993, ọ hapụrụ obodo ahụ gaa rụọ ọrụ na Harare na Chapungu Sculpture Park
N'ogige a, Square gara n'ihu na-agbasawanye nkà ya, nke mere ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị isi na-akpụ ihe na Harare
Square ugbu a (2006) na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya na Chitungwiza, nke dị na Harare
E gosipụtala ọrụ ya n'ụwa niile
Ihe ọkpụkpụ Square na-ahụkarị ihe osise na ụmụ anụmanụ dịka ọmụmaatụ
'Blind Portrait', Berlin, Germany ma ọ bụ 'Hippo', Tengenenge, Zimbabwe
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ya n'ozuzu ya dị oke square na ejiji ogwe aka, ụkwụ na mkpịsị aka na-abụkarị square ma na-egosi akara siri ike; imi nwere mma dị nkọ
Ihe ọkpụkpụ ya na-echetara n'ezie ihe osise nka nke 1930-1940 ma a na-achacha ya mgbe niile ruo ogo zuru oke
Ọ na-eji nkume Zimbabawean nke obodo, nke gụnyere springstone

Chinmoy Kumar Ghose onye amụrụ (na ụbọchị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa August n'ọnwa 1931 - ụbọchị iri na otu n'ọnwa October n'afọ 2007), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Sri Chinmoy, bụ onye ndú nke ime mmụọ na India, nke kụziri ntụgharị uche na West mgbe ọ kwagara New York City ná afọ 1964
Chinmoy guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ntụgharị uche mbụ ya na Queens, New York, ma mesịa nwee ụmụ akwụkwọ 7,000 na mba iri isii
Onye edemede, onye na-ese ihe, onye na'ede uri, na onye na-eti egwu, ọ na-emekwa ihe omume ọha na eze dị ka kọntaktị na ntụgharị uche na isiokwu nke udo dị n'ime
Chinmoy kwadoro ụzọ ime mmụọ gaa na Chineke site n'ekpere na ntụgharị uche
Ọ kwadoro egwuregwu gụnyere ịgba ọsọ, igwu mmiri, na ibu arọ
Ọ haziri marathons na agbụrụ ndị ọzọ, ọ bụkwa onye na-agba ọsọ na, mgbe mmerụ ahụ n'ikpere gasịrị, ọ na-ebu ibu
Chinmoy bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ asaa, amụrụ na Shakpura, Boalkhali Upazila, na Chittagong District nke East Bengal, British India (nke bụ Bangladesh ugbu a)
Nna ya nwụrụ n'ọrịa n'afọ 1943, nne ya ọnwa ole na ole ka e mesịrị
Chinmoy malitere omume ntụgharị uche ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu
N'afọ 1944, Chinmoy dị afọ iri na abụọ sonyeere ụmụnne ya ndị nwoke na ndị nwanyị na Sri Aurobindo Ashram na Pondicherry, ebe ụmụnne ya nwoke ndị okenye Hriday na Chitta amalitelarị ọnụnọ
Ọ bụ Chitta nyere Chinmoy aha ya nke pụtara 'jupụtara n'uche Chineke'
N'ime ashram ọ nọrọ afọ iri abụọ sochirinụ n'omume ime mmụọ, gụnyere ntụgharị uche, ịmụ akwụkwọ Bengali na Bekee, egwuregwu, na ịrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ nke ashram
Chinmoy kwuru na ruo ihe dị ka afọ asatọ, ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ nke odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke ashram, Nolini Kanta Gupta
Chinmoy sụgharịrị ihe odide ya site na Bengali gaa na Bekee
Dị ka Chinmoy si kwuo, n'afọ 1964, a kpaliri ya ịkwaga na United States n'ihi 'ozi sitere n'ime' iji jeere ndị mmadụ nọ n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ na-achọ mmezu ime mmụọ ozi
Site n'enyemaka nke Sam Spanier na Eric Hughes, ndị nkwado America jikọtara ya na Sri Aurobindo Ashram, ọ kwagara New York City
O tinyere akwụkwọ maka ọrụ dị ka onye ode akwụkwọ dị ala na onye nnọchi anya India, n'agbanyeghị enweghị agụmakwụkwọ ya
Ọ natara nkwado na agbamume site n'aka ndị ọrụ ibe ya na ndị isi ya ma kpọọ ya ka ọ kwuo okwu gbasara okpukpe Hindu
Ọ malitere ikwu okwu na mahadum ma mesịa, na United Nations
Na ngwụcha afọ 1960 na mmalite afọ 1970, Chinmoy gara n'ihu na-ekwu okwu na okwu na mahadum dị na US na isiokwu ime mmụọ
N'afọ 1974, o kwuru okwu na steeti iri ise na mahadum iri ise, e bipụtakwara okwu ndị a dị ka usoro akwụkwọ isii akpọrọ 50 Freedom-Boats to One Golden Shore (1974)
N'afọ 1970 na 1980 ọ gara Europe, Eshia, na Australia na-akụzi na mahadum, nke mere ka e bipụta The Oneness of the Eastern Heart and the Western Mind
Chinmoy ebipụtakwala akwụkwọ, edemede, uri ime mmụọ, egwuregwu, na nkọwa banyere Vedas
N'afọ 1966, Chinmoy meghere Sri Chinmoy Center na San Juan, Puerto Rico
Ruo na ngwụcha afọ 1970, isi ụlọ akwụkwọ Chinmoy dị na New York, Florida na West Indies
N'ime iri afọ ole na ole sochirinụ, e meghere ma guzobe Sri Chinmoy Centers n'ọtụtụ obodo na US, Europe, Australasia, South Africa na South America mechara nwee ngụkọta nke ụlọ ọrụ 350 n'ụwa niile
N'afọ 1973, akwụkwọ akụkọ New York Times dere na Chinmoy 'na-asọpụrụ na India dị ka otu n'ime ndị nsọ ole na ole ruru Nirvikalpa Samadhi, ọkwa kachasị elu nke ịma ihe'
N'ime afọ ndị 1970 Chinmoy malitere ịkpọ egwu na ide egwu na ọjà na esraj
N'afọ 1984, ọ malitere inye 'Peace Concerts' n'efu gburugburu ụwa
Mgbe ọ nọ na America na 1970s, Chinmoy dọtara ndị na-eso ụzọ dị ka ndị egwu Carlos Santana, John McLaughlin, Narada Michael Walden, Roberta Flack, Clarence Clemons, na Boris Grebenshchikov
Chinmoy nyere ndị na-agụ egwú ụzọ ime mmụọ a na-adọ aka ná ntị nke machibidoro iji ọgwụ ọjọọ na mmanya na-aba n'anya ma gbaa egwu na uri ume dị ka ngosipụta nke ekele nye Chineke
Santana na McLaughlin nọrọ na Chinmoy ọtụtụ afọ tupu ha ahapụ
N'afọ 1973, ha wepụtara abọm dabere na nkuzi Chinmoy, nke akpọrọ Love Devotion Surrender
McLaughlin bụ onye na-eso ụzọ Chinmoy site na 1970 ruo 1975
N'afọ 1971, o guzobere Mahavishnu Orchestra, nke akpọrọ aha ime mmụọ Chinmoy nyere ya
McLaughlin mere ka Santana mata guru ahụ, Santana na nwunye ya Deborah mechara bụrụ ndị na-eso ụzọ Chinmoy site na 1972 ruo 1981
Santana kwuru, 'Na-enweghị guru, m na-ejere naanị ihe efu nke m ozi, mana ya na ya enwere m ike ijere gị na onye ọ bụla ozi
Abụ m eriri, mana ọ bụ onye na-eti egwu
Guru gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Harvards nke ịma ihe ma nọdụ ala n'ụkwụ Chineke

' Santana wepụtara abọm atọ n'okpuru aha ime mmụọ Devadip ː nke pụtara 'Lamp of God', 'Eye of God', na 'Light of God' nke Chinmoy nyere ya Illuminations (1974), Oneness (1979), na The Swing of Delight (1980)
N'afọ 2000, ọ gwara Rolling Stone na ihe dị njọ n'etiti ya na Chinmoy n'afọ ndị 1980
Santana kwusiri ike na ọ na-ewere ọtụtụ ihe dị mma site na afọ ya na guru, ọ bụ ezie na mgbe ọ hapụrụ, Chinmoy 'bụ ezigbo onye na-abọ ọbọ ruo oge ụfọdụ
Ọ gwara ndị enyi m niile ka ha ghara ịkpọ m ọzọ, n'ihi na mmiri ga-eri m n'oké osimiri gbara ọchịchịrị nke amaghị ihe maka ịhapụ ya
' N'afọ 2017, Santana gwara Rolling Stone, 'Enwere m ekele maka afọ iri ahụ mụ na nna m ukwu ime mmụọ ahụ nọrọ
Onye nkuzi ime mmụọ Frederick Lenz ghọrọ onye na-eso ụzọ n'ihe dị ka afọ 1972, mana n'afọ 1981 ọ hapụrụ Chinmoy wee ghọọ guru n'onwe ya
Onye edemede ime mmụọ Lex Hixon bụ onye otu Sri Chinmoy Centre na 1970's
Chinmoy kwadoro 'ịgafe onwe onye' site n'ịgbasawanye uche iji merie ihe uche na-eche na ọ ga-eme, a na-ejikarị nke a eme ihe na egwuregwu
Chinmoy nyere onye na-agba ọsọ ọla edo nke Olympic bụ Carl Lewis ndụmọdụ
Ọ mụtara ịtụgharị uche site na Chinmoy, ma na-eme usoro ahụ mgbe niile
Onye Kraịst raara onwe ya nye, Lewis kwuru na itinye aka ya na Chinmoy bụ nzọụkwụ na-aga n'ihu na mmezu ime mmụọ nke mere ka nkwenkwe Ndị Kraịst ya sie ike
N'afọ 2011, Lewis pụtara na obere ihe nkiri Challenging Impossibility, nke gosipụtara ike nke Chinmoy gosipụtara
Dị ka ebe nrụọrụ weebụ nke otu ahụ si kwuo, ndị otu Sri Chinmoy Marathon Team agwọwo mmiri na English Channel ihe karịrị ugboro iri anọ
Ihe omume egwuregwu ndị ọzọ Chinmoy kwadoro gụnyere ịgba ọsọ ọsọ, gụnyere Self-Transcendence 3100 Mile Race; ịrị ugwu; na ịgba ịnyịnya ígwè ogologo
N'afọ 2010, Ashrita Furman, onye nwere ihe karịrị 150 Guinness World Records, kwuru na 'ntụgharị uche ọ mụtara n'aka Sri Chinmoy na-enyere ya aka ịrụ ọrụ karịa ihe ọ tụrụ anya ya'
N'afọ 1987, Sri Chinmoy meghere Sri Chinmoay Oneness Home Peace Run, ụdị ihe nnọchianya na-agba ọsọ maka udo site n'ọtụtụ mba n'ụwa ebe ndị na-agbaagba ọsọ na-ebu ọkụ na-anọchite anya nkwekọrịta
Sri Chinmoy kọwara echiche ya dị ka 'mgbalị siri ike maka udo'
Isiokwu 'Oneness Home' nke Peace Run, bụ na ndị mmadụ niile bụ ụmụ amaala na-achọ udo n'otu mbara ala
N'afọ 1991, Chinmoy malitere ọrụ enyemaka 'Oneness Heart Tears and Smiles' nke na-eziga nri na ọgwụ nye ndị nọ ná mkpa
Nzukọ ahụ, nke na-eje ozi na mba 136, malitere site na ndị otu Sri Chinmoy Center na-ekesa enyemaka enyemaka maka ụmụaka na ndị okenye nọ ná mkpa n'ụwa niile
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na NGO ma ọ bụ gọọmentị, ma na-enye ahụike, ahụike, na ihe agụmakwụkwọ maka mba ndị na-anata ya
Ọ bụ ndị ọkachamara ahụike na ndị ọrụ afọ ofufo onwe ha na kọntinent ise na-eje ozi na ya, na mmemme ndị na-enye enyemaka ọdachi, mmepe mpaghara, na ahụike na ọgwụ

Ihe omume 'Kids to kids' nke Oneness Heart Tears and Smiles kwadoro na-agba ụmụaka ụlọ akwụkwọ ume ịkwadebe ngwugwu ihe ụlọ akwụkwọ na ihe egwuregwu maka ụmụaka na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma na obodo ndị ọzọ
Chinmoy gara ọtụtụ ebe, ma nyefee ọtụtụ ọrụ ya na ihe omume ndị o guzobere maka udo
Ọ zutere ndị mmadụ n'ụwa, a na-akọwakarị ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya udo
Chinmoy zutere Nne Teresa n'oge ise dị iche iche
Na nzukọ nke abụọ ha na Rome, Ịtali n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1994, Chinmoy nyere ya onyinye
N'oge emume ahụ, Nne Teresa gwara Sri Chinmoy, sị 'Enwere m obi ụtọ na ọrụ ọma niile ị na-arụ maka udo ụwa na ndị mmadụ n'ọtụtụ mba
Ka anyị nọgide na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ ma na-ekerịta ihe niile maka ebube nke Chineke na maka ọdịmma nke mmadụ
' Chinmoy zutere Diana, Princess of Wales, na Kensington Palace na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri abụọ na otú n'ọnwa Mee 1997
Ọ naghị akwụ ụgwọ maka nduzi ime mmụọ ya ma ọ bụ egwu egwu
Ọ na-akwanyere okpukpe niile na ndị okpukpe ụwa ùgwù
Ọ dọtara ihe dịka ụmụ akwụkwọ 7,000 n'oge ndụ ya
Ụzọ ya bụ usoro ime mmụọ nke yoga nke oge a, nke a na-eme n'okpuru nduzi nke guru, ma ọ bụ onye nkuzi ime mmụọ
Chinmoy kwadoro Brahmacharya na-alụbeghị di maka ndị lụrụ di na nwunye na ndị na-alụghị di, ma na-elekwasị anya n'inweta ọṅụ ime mmụọ karịa obi ụtọ
Dị ka edemede n' afo 1987 na Hinduism Today si kwuo, Chinmoy dị ka onye nkuzi ime mmụọ yoga bụ onye na-alụbeghị di
N'adịghị ka omenala ndị ọzọ ochie, Chinmoy kụziri na ịpụ kpamkpam n'ụwa adịghị mkpa maka ọganihu ime mmụọ, kama ọ bụ 'nnukwu nghọta nke ndụ'
Ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na ngwụcha afọ 2007, Chinmoy bụ onye ndú ime mmụọ nke ọtụtụ puku ndị na-eso ụzọ raara onwe ha nye n'ụwa niile
Site n'etiti afọ 1960 ọ biri n'isi ụlọ ọrụ ụwa ya na Queens, New York City, ọtụtụ narị ndị na-eso ụzọ ya gbara ya gburugburu bụ ndị kwagara n'ógbè ahụ
Ụfọdụ ndị weere otu Chinmoy dị ka òtù nzuzo

Akwụkwọ 1994 The Joy of Sects kwuru na 'ụfọdụ n'ime ndị na-eso ụzọ ya hapụrụ, Otú ọ dị, n'etiti ebubo na Chinmoy na-eme ka ndị nwunye nke ndị na-azụ ụzọ ya nwee mmekọahụ', n'afọ 2005 n' afọ 2014 San Diego CityBeat na Saloncom onye ọ bụla biputere profaịlụ nke nwanyị dị iche bụbu onye na-esote nke na-ebo ebubo na omume mmekọahụ na-ekwesịghị ekwesị

Na Febụwarị afọ 2016 PIX 11 News na New York mere akụkụ abụọ na Chinmoy, ebe otu onye bụbu onye na-eso ụzọ kwuru na ọ bụ mmekọahụ na-ekwesịghị ekwesị, ebe ndị ọzọ toro Chinmoy na ọnụ na-ekwuchitere Sri Chinmoy Center kwuru na nzaghachi edere na 'Onye guzobere anyị na onye nkuzi anyị, Sri Chinmoay, biri ndụ nke ịdị ọcha na iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe'
Ọ dịghị mgbe e boro Chinmoy akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ boo ya ebubo mpụ ọ bụla, onye ọka iwu ya gọnahụrụ ebubo n'afọ 2004 n'oge ahụ
Ụfọdụ ndị nta akụkọ na ndị na-eso ụzọ n'oge gara aga akatọwo ihe ha na-ele anya dị ka nkwalite onwe onye nke Chinmoy

N'afọ 2009, Jayanti Tamm bipụtara akụkọ ndụ dị ka onye na-eso ụzọ Chinmoy, Cartwheels in a Sari A Memoir of Growing Up Cult Tamm, onye amụrụ n'ime nzukọ Chinmoy, kwuru na Chinmoy buru amụma na ọ ga-abụ onye na-eso ụzọ ya zuru oke
A chụpụrụ ya n'òtù ahụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na ise
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-akọwa ndụ ya n'ime ndị guru na mbọ ọ na-agba ịpụ na mmetụta ya
Dị ka akwụkwọ ahụ si kwuo, Chinmoy machibidoro mmekọahụ, a gwakwara ọtụtụ ndị na-eso ụzọ ka ha nọrọ n'alụbeghị di

Akwụkwọ ahụ kwukwara na guru ahụ mebiri agụmakwụkwọ ụwa, na mmachibido iwu ya gụnyere ịṅụ mmanya na-aba n'anya, caffeine, na anụ; ịgba egwú; mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwanyị; iso ndị si n'èzí na-akpakọrịta; na inwe anụ ụlọ, ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-edebe nchịkọta anụ ụlọ dị iche iche n'okpuru ala Queens ya
Otú ọ dị, Tamm na-ekwu na ndị na-eso ụzọ 7,000 ndị ọzọ gburugburu ụwa, na ndị ọzọ zutere Chinmoy, nwere ike ịnwe ahụmịhe na nghọta dị iche iche
Chinmoy nwụrụ site na nkụchi obi mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ ya na Jamaica, Queens, New York na ụbọchị iri na otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2007
Mikhail Gorbachev dere na ọnwụ ya bụ 'mfu maka ụwa dum' nakwa na 'n'obi anyị, ọ ga-anọgide na-abụ nwoke raara ndụ ya niile nye udo'
Chinmoy kụziri na enwere ike inwe ọganihu ime mmụọ ngwa ngwa site na ịgbaso ụzọ ịhụnanya, nraranye, na inyefe onwe ya
Ọ kọwara ịhụnanya Chineke dị ka ịchụ onwe onye na mgbasawanye onwe onye
A maara omume a nke ịhụnanya na nraranye n'ebe Chineke nọ dị ka Bhakti Yoga
Ụzọ ya abụghị nke ịhapụ ụwa ma ọ bụ ịta ahụhụ, kama ọ bụ ụzọ dị n'etiti ebe onye na-achọ ya nwere ohere ịhapụ, ma ọ bụ gbanwee, àgwà ọjọọ ndị na-eguzo n'ụzọ nke njikọ ya na Chineke
Chinmoy kụziri na ntụgharị uche n'obi na-eweta ìhè nke mkpụrụ obi n'ihu iji ruo eziokwu kachasị elu ozugbo o kwere mee
Chinmoy kwuru, sị 'Anyị niile bụ ndị na-achọ, ihe mgbaru ọsọ anyị bụ otu inweta udo dị n'ime, ìhè na ọṅụ, ịghọ otu na isi iyi anyị, na ibi ndụ jupụtara na ezi afọ ojuju
Otu akụkụ dị mkpa nke nkuzi Chinmoy bụ nghọta nke 'ịgafe onwe onye'
Ịgafe onwe onye bụ omume nke inwe ihe mgbaru ọsọ ọhụrụ ma gafee ikike na njedebe anyị gara aga nke na-enye anyị ọṅụ
Ịgafe onwe onye bụ ebumnuche nke inwe ọganihu na ndụ site n'ịghọ mmadụ ka mma karịa ịsọ mpi na ụwa ndị ọzọ
Chinmoy kwenyere na anyị niile enweghị njedebe n'ime mmụọ
Nkà ihe ọmụma Chinmoy ọ na-akọwa bụ ịnabata ndụ
Site n'ịkekọrịta ezi uche na mkpali nye ndị ọzọ ma jeere ihe a kpọrọ mmadụ ozi, enwere ike ịgbanwe ụwa ma nweta udo
Ọ gwara ndị na-eso ụzọ ya ka ha rie nri akwụkwọ nri, zere ọgwụ ntụrụndụ gụnyere mmanya na-aba n'anya, ma na-ebi ndụ dị ọcha na nke na-alụbeghị di
Ọ bụ ezie na okpukpe Hindu nwere mmetụta, ụzọ ya lekọtara ndị na-achọ ihe si mba ụwa si ebe dị iche iche
Chinmoy kụziiri ọtụtụ usoro maka ntụgharị uche, ọkachasị ndị maka ime ka obi dị jụụ ma mee ka uche gbachie nkịtị, ime ka echiche nke uche dị ọcha ma na-atụgharị uche n'obi ime mmụọ

Chinmoy na-akọwa na site n'ịnọ n'uche gị dị jụụ ma dị jụụ maka nkeji iri ma ọ bụ iri na ise, ahụmịhe ọhụrụ nwere ike ịmalite ịmalite n'ime gị na omume a nke ime ka uche dị jụụ bụ mgbọrọgwụ nke ọganihu ime mmụọ niile
Chinmoy tụrụ aro ịtụgharị uche n'oge ọnọdụ dị jụụ nke ụtụtụ, tupu ịmalite ọrụ kwa ụbọchị

Dị ka Oge ọdịnala nke Chineke, n'etiti elekere atọ na elekere anọ nke ụtụtụ, nke a maara dị ka Brahma Muhurta, nwere ike ọ gaghị adaba n'ụdị ndụ ọdịda anyanwụ nke idebe oge mgbede, Chinmoy tụrụ aro ka ndị ọhụrụ na-atụgharị uche tụgharịa uche tupu elekere asaa nke ụtụtụ
Chinmoy kụziri na ekpere na ntụgharị uche dị mkpa, mana enwere ọdịiche na nsonaazụ
Ekpere bụ usoro nke ibili n'ihu Chineke ma na-agwa Ya okwu, na ntụgharị uche bụ omume nke ime ka uche dị jụụ ka ọnụnọ Chineke wee nwee ike ikpuchi anyị ma soro anyị kwurịta okwu
Ọ kụzikwaara na ịgụ ihe odide ime mmụọ ma ọ bụ ịbụ abụ ndị nwere mkpụrụ obi bara uru iji kwadebe maka ntụgharị uche ma ọ bụ ịnọgide na-enwe ọnọdụ ntụgharị uche mgbe ị na-atụgharị uche
Chinmoy kwenyere na ịgba ọsọ na ahụike anụ ahụ bụ ihe enyemaka maka ndụ ime mmụọ dị n'ime yana ndụ ọrụ dị n'èzí, ma gbaa ndị na-eso ụzọ ya ume ịgba ọsọ kwa ụbọchị
Chinmoy weere uru nke ịgba ọsọ dị ka idebe ahụ dị mma ma kpochapụ uche; o chere na ọ nwekwara ike ịbụ ụdị ntụgharị uche n'èzí
N'afọ 1970, Chinmoy malitere inye ntụgharị uche udo na-abụghị nke okpukpe ugboro abụọ n'izu na United Nations maka ndị nnọchi anya UN, ndị ọrụ, na ndị nnọchianya NGO
N'afọ 1976, o kwuru, sị, 'Echiche nke United Nations bụ udo zuru ụwa ọnụ na nwanne nwanyị zuru ụwa ọnụ, na echiche nke United Nations dị n'otu ezinụlọ ụwa na otu obi'

Mgbe ọ duziri ntụgharị uche udo, nke ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ UN na ndị nnọchi anya mba ọzọ gara, ruo afọ 37, ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ UN 700, ndị nnọchianya, ndị otu US Congress, na ndị nnọchiteanya nke okpukpe dị iche iche, nyere Chinmoy otuto mgbe ọ nwụsịrị n'oge emume na isi ụlọ ọrụ UN na New York
N'oge emume ahụ na UN, Daw Aye Aye Thant, nwa nwanyị nke onye bụbu odeakwụkwọ ukwu UN U Thant, kwuru n'okwu ya
Akụkụ dị mkpa nke nkuzi Chinmoy bụ nkwanye ùgwù maka ụzọ na okpukpe ndị ọzọ
Chinmoy dere, sị
Mgbalị Chinmoy na-eme iji kwalite nkwekọrịta okpukpe mere ka a kpọọ ya ka ọ mepee Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Okpukpe Ụwa na Chicago (1993) na Barcelona (2004) site na ntụgharị uche
N'oge 2004 Opening Meditation, o kwuru, sị 'N'oge m na-emeghe ntụgharị uche, ana m ekpe ekpere maka ịdị n'otu nke okpukpe niile'
Chinmoy kwuru na ọ bụ ezie na a zụlitere ya n'omenala Hindu, o chere na naanị okpukpe ya bụ 'Ịhụnanya Chineke'
Chinmoy malitere ise ihe na 1974 n'oge ọ gara Ottawa, Canada
Ọ kpọrọ ihe osise ya 'Jharna Kala', nke pụtara 'Fountain Art' na Bengali
Ihe osise Chinmoy sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ịdị n'otu zuru ụwa ọnụ na udo zuru ụwa ọnụ
Ihe osise ya bụ ngwakọta nke acrylics na eserese pensụl
Chinmoy jiri ụdị sponges dịgasị iche iche, brushes na agba na-ese ihe n'ụdị ihe omimi pụrụ iche nke nwere ike, mmegharị siri ike na rhythm
Chinmoy ekwuola na mgbe ọ na-ese ihe ọ na-ahụ ihe okike na-enweghị isi site na ntụgharị uche ya nke na-enye ya ohere ịgbaso mmụọ nsọ dị n'ime ma ọ bụ 'ìhè ọkụ' iji soro
Na Disemba 1991 Chinmoy malitere usoro nka ọhụrụ akpọrọ 'Dream-Freedom-Peace-Birds' ma ọ bụ 'Soul Birds'
Ihe osise nnụnụ na-abụkarị zen dị mfe dị ka ihe osise nke nwere ma ọ bụ otu nnụnụ ma ọ bụ na ihe osise ụfọdụ ọtụtụ narị nnụnụ n'otu nnukwu ihe osise
Ihe osise nnụnụ mkpụrụ obi, Chinmoy kwuru, na-anọchi anya mkpu obi mmadụ maka nnwere onwe
E gosipụtara nka ya n'ọfịs UNESCO na Paris, Victoria na Albert Museum nke London, Mall Gallery na London, Museum of Modern Art na St
Petersburg, John F
Kennedy International Airport na New York, na United Nations Headquarters
Dị ka ndị na-eso ụzọ ya si kwuo, Chinmoy dere ọtụtụ puku egwu dị mkpirikpi, nke e dere na okwu ndị dị na Bengali na Bekee
E bipụtara ọtụtụ n'ime ndị a n'ịntanetị n'okpuru ikikere Creative Commons na Sri Chinmoy Songs (okwu na egwu egwu) na Radio Sri Chinmoay (audio)
O weputara abọm abụọ na Jamaica na ụlọ ọrụ Studio One Port-O-Jam
N'afọ 1976, Chinmoy wepụtara abọm ntụgharị uche na Folkways Records nke akpọrọ Music for Meditation
Chinmoy nyekwara ọtụtụ narị egwu udo, ọtụtụ n'ime ha n'efu

O nyere kọntaktị n'ebe ndị a ma ama gburugburu ụwa, gụnyere Royal Albert Hall nke London, Lincoln Center na Carnegie Hall nke New York, Nippon Budokan nke Tokyo, Eiffel Tower na Paris, na Sydney Opera House
Chinmoy na-akpọ ọtụtụ ngwá egwu dị iche iche na kọntaktị ya gụnyere ọjà, esraj, piano, cello na ngwá egwu ndị ọzọ nke Ọwụwa Anyanwụ na Ọdịda Anyanwụ
Dị ka Sri Chinmoy Centre si kwuo, Chinmoy bipụtara ihe karịrị akwụkwọ 1,300 gụnyere uri 120,000
Ọtụtụ n'ime uri ndị a bụ aphorisms bụ obere ma zuru oke nke ime mmụọ ma ọ bụ amaokwu, dị ka 'Anyị niile enweghị njedebe n'ezie, ma ọ bụrụ na anyị anwa ịnwale inwe okwukwe'
Chinmoy bipụtakwara mpịakọta ụfọdụ nke abụ ọdịnala dị ogologo
N'afọ 2001, Chinmoy kwughachiri uri ya na United Nations, dịka akụkụ nke ihe omume UN kwadoro iji kwalite 'Dialogue Among Civilizations Through Poetry'

Ọtụtụ ndị toro ihe odide Chinmoy na-akpali akpali, gụnyere Achịbishọp Desmond Tutu, onye dere, sị 'Ihe amamihe ndị a dị ụtọ nke enyi m Sri Chinmoy dere bụ eziokwu na-enweghị oge nke jupụtara na agbamume, ịhụnanya na ịdị mma
Isiakwụkwọ ndị a jupụtara anyị na olileanya na ịnụ ọkụ n'obi na ndụ'
N'afọ 1977, e guzobere Sri Chinmoy Marathon Team; ọ na-agba ọsọ, igwu mmiri, na ịgba ịnyịnya ígwè n'ụwa niile, site na ọsọ ntụrụndụ ruo ultramarathons

Onye bu ya ụzọ bụ 1976, Liberty Torch Run, relay nke ndị na-agba ọsọ 33 gosipụtara narị afọ abụọ nke America site na ikpuchi kilomita 8,800 n'ime izu asaa site na steeti iri ise A gbasaa echiche a na 1987 ka ọ bụrụ Sri Chinmoy Oneness-Home Peace Run
A na-emekarị Peace Run kwa afọ abụọ, a malitere nke mbụ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1987 na World Trade Center na New York City

N'afọ 1985, Chinmoy, ya na onye isi obodo Oxford n'oge ahụ, meghere 'Sri Chinmoy Peace Mile' mbụ, nke bụ kilomita a tụrụ na Cutteslowe Park, Oxford na-enye ndị na-agba ọsọ ihe ha ga-eji tụọ ọganihu ha
E nwere ọtụtụ 'Peace Miles' ugbu a gburugburu ụwa
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-eso ụzọ Chinmoy na-agba ọsọ kwa ụbọchị maka ahụike na ahụike
Chinmoy n'onwe ya gara n'ihu na-abanye n'asọmpi ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ 60 mgbe mmerụ ahụ n'ikpere gbochiri ikike ya ịgba ọsọ; mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ tụgharịrị uche ya na tennis na ibu arọ

Chinmoy guzobekwara Self-Transcendence 6- & 10-day Races, nke na-agba ọsọ n'otu oge na Queens n'ọnwa Eprel ọ bụla, na Self-Transcenence 3100 Mile Race, nke The New York Times kọwara dị ka 'Ugwu Everest nke ultramarathons'
Self-Transcendence Marathon bụ marathon gburugburu ụsọ mmiri nke Rockland Lake State Park, nke dị na Congers, New York, n'ebe ugwu nke New York City
Emere ya na 2002, ihe omume ahụ na-adọta ihe dị ka ndị na-agba ọsọ mba ụwa 900
Marathon na-ewere ọnọdụ n'izu ikpeazụ nke Ọgọst
Chinmoy malitere ibu arọ na 1985, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri ise na anọ Ibu ibu ya gụnyere ọtụtụ ihe na ígwè ọrụ e mere iji merie ike na ikike ya
Ozi ya nye ọha na eze na mbọ ọ na-agba ibu bụ na ihe ọ bụla ga-ekwe omume ma ọ bụrụ na mmadụ nwere ike ịhapụ njedebe nke uche
Bill Pearl, onye bụbu Mr
Universe, rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Master of Ceremonies n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi ike Chinmoy
N'ịkpọbata otu n'ime ihe ngosi Chinmoy na 1999, Bill Pearl dere, sị 'Taa ị ga-ahụ ụfọdụ ihe dị ịtụnanya nke ike nke mụ na mụ nọ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ruo afọ iri ise na ise
' Chinmoy kwuru na ebumnuche ya maka ibuli elu bụ ịkpali ndị ọzọ, ọkachasị ndị nke ọgbọ ndị okenye
N'afọ 2006, o kwuru, sị, 'Ọ bụrụ na m nwere ike ịkpali onye ọ bụla nọ n'ụwa a, mgbe ahụ enwere m mmetụta na ndụ m bara uru
Site n'ibuli ihe dị arọ m, ana m enye ike m iji kpalie ndị mmadụ
N'ime mmemme e mepụtara n'afọ 1998 nke a maara dị ka 'Lifting up the world with a Oneness Heart', Chinmoy welitere ndị mmadụ nke mkpali mgbe ha guzo n'elu ikpo okwu

Chinmoy kọwara ebumnuche ya 'M na-ebuli ha iji gosipụta ekele m maka ihe ha rụzuru,' N'etiti ụfọdụ n'ime mmadụ 7,000 ọ welitere gụnyere Nelson Mandela, Desmond Tutu, Muhammad Ali, Sting, Eddie Murphy, Susan Sarandon, Roberta Flack, Yoko Ono, Jeff Goldblum, Richard Gere, na Helen Hunt
E buliri ndị nrite Nobel iri abụọ na otu ndị na-agba mgba sumo
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011, e gosipụtara ihe nkiri banyere ibu Chinmoy nke akpọrọ Challenging Impossibility na Tribeca Film Festival
Terry Todd, prọfesọ nke kinesiology na Mahadum Texas, kwubiri na Chinmoy gosipụtara ụdị na ịdị arọ nke ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ndị ọ na-azọrọ na ọ rụzuru
Nchịkọta nke ihe nrite gụnyere
Àtụ Spirituality-related topics

Stéphane Gagba (Hebrew amụrụ na onwa Mee abali iri Na ato afo 1998), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Stéphane Legar ( «), bụ onye mba Togo nwere akwụkwọ obibi Isreal na-agụ egwu, na-agba egwu, na onye nlereanya
Aha ọgbọ ya bụ Legar ma ọ bụ Le Gar - na mkpirisi maka Le Garcon, 'nwa nwoke' na asusu French
A na-akpọkarị ya aha ya bụ Stéphane
A mụrụ Stéphane Gagba na Bat Yam, Israel, nne na nna ya bụ Ndị Kraịst si Togo
Nne na nna ya bụ ndị nnọchi anya mba ọzọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ nnọchiteanya Naịjirịa na Israel n'oge ahụ
O nwere nwanne nwanyị tọrọ ya
Mgbe ọ bụ nwata, ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ oge ezumike ya na-eleta ndị ikwu ha na Togo
Mgbe ọ bụ nwata, a họpụtara ya maka ịchụpụ ya n'Izrel - n'ihi enweghị akwụkwọ nwa amaala - ebe ọ bụ naanị ọnọdụ obibi ka onwere Ọ bụ ezie na, ọ bụ nwa amaala Togo (paspọtụ Togo)
Ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, nne na nna ya chebere ya pụọ na mmata a
N'ikpeazụ, ọ nwetakwara nwa amaala Israel - mana ọ bụ naanị mgbe ọ gụsịrị ọrụ agha Israel, na abali ato nke onwa Mee 2021
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, Legar na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Holon, Israel
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ obodo ndị ntorobịa Mikveh Israel, na mpaghara French ya
O debara aha ya n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2017 na Ndị agha nchekwa mba Israel, ma jee ozi na ngalaba na-ahụ maka ịkọwa usoro ntinye akwụkwọ na ụmụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Asụsụ ala ya bụ French, mana ọ na-asụkwa asụsụ Hibru, Ewe (Togolese), Bekee, na Spanish nke ọma

Nicholas aghọwo ụlọ ọrụ na-ebute ụzọ n'ịgbanwe akụkụ ahụ mmadụ na anaghị aruzi ọrụ na Naịjirịa, ma bụrụ ndị mere ọgwụgwọ mbụ nke na elekota ndị nwekari akụkụ ahụ ha , ma bụrụ ụlọ ọgwụ mbụ na Naịjarịa gbanwere akọrọ ma bụrụ ndị mbụ gbanwere akọro ụmụaka na West Africa
N'abali atọ nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2014, 9 00 nke ụtụtụ N'ihe dị ka elekere 5 55 nke ehihie na Sọnde, abali abụọ nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2014, ọkụ gbara n'okpukpu nke itoolu nke ụlọ ahụ
E mere ihe ngwa ngwa iji gbanyụọ ọkụ ahụ, nke e kwenyere na ihe kpatara ya bụ nsogbu eletrik
Gregory's College, Lagos, bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ozi ala ọzọ Katọlik maka ụmụ nwoke, nke nwere ụlọ obibi, nke dị kilomita 10 site na Tafawa Balewa Square na nso Ikoyi Obalende, Steeti Lagos, Naijiria
Kọleji ahụ, nke bụbu ụlọ akwụkwọ na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ tupu e mepụta ụlọ akwụkwọ nwanne ya nwanyị Holy Child College Obalende, dị na Ndịda-Odida Anyanwu Ikoyi
E guzobere ya site na ozi Katọlikna afọ 1928 ma gụọ ya aha Popu St
Gregory Onye Ukwu (54004)
Onye ọchụnta ego Michael Ibru na ụlọ ọrụ ya bụ Ace Jomona sonyere n'iwu ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Na ngwụcha afọ 1990, n'oge ndị na-emepụta ihe na ndị na-achịkwa na-agba ume iji ịntanetị eme ihe, otu klas nke 1997 alum na onye na-ahụ maka teknụzụ na mbụ A
Olufeko, wuru kọleji mbụ na nke a kacha mara n'ịntanetị site na iji mmemme HTML na CGI n'afọ 1998, dabere na mkpa ọ dị inyere ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ aka ijikọ ibe ha n'ụwa niile
N'ikpeazụ, ka obodo Lagos nabatara akụ na ụba dijitalụ, ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ site na usoro dị iche iche na-agụsị akwụkwọ, na nchịkwa ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ mechara guzobe ebe nrụọrụ webụ gọmentị na afọ 2018
Ndị otu egwuregwu a ma ama na Saint Gregory bụ ndị otu cricket na bọọlụ ya

Stacey Yvonne Abrams (/ˈeɪbrəmz/; amụrụ n'ọnwa Disemba 9, n'afọ 1973) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Amerịka, onye ọka iwu, onye na-akwado ikike ịtụ vootu, na onye edemede nke jere ozi na Georgia House of Representatives site n'afọ 2007 ruo afọ 2017, na-eje ozi dị ka onye ndu ndị nta site n'afọ 2011 ruo n'afọ 2017
Onye otu Democratic Party, Abrams hiwere Fair Fight Action, otu nzukọ iji dozie mmegbu ndị na-eme ntuli aka, n'afọ 2018

Onye na-akwado ikike ịtụ vootu, a na-eto mbọ ya n'ọtụtụ ebe maka ịkwalite ndị na-eme ntuli aka na Georgia, gụnyere na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke afọ 2020, mgbe Joe Biden meriri na steeti ahụ, na ntuli aka Georgia nke afọ 2020–2021 nke a na-eme mgbe niile na ntuli aka pụrụ iche nke Senetị nke United States, nke nyere ndị Democrats njikwa nke Senetị
Abrams bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Democratic na ntuli aka gọvanọ nke Georgia n'afọ 2018, na-aghọ nwanyị mbụ si n'Afrịka na Amerịka na-ahọpụta onye isi otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na United States
O meriri na ntuli aka n'aka onye Republican bụ Brian Kemp, mana ọ jụrụ ikweta, na-ebo Kemp ebubo na ọ na-etinye aka na mmegbu ndị na-eme ntuli aka dị ka odeakwụkwọ nke Georgia
Ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na ndị na-enyocha eziokwu achọpụtala na ebubo nke ntuli aka zuru ohi siri ike igosi
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2019, Abrams ghọrọ nwanyị Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ na-aza okwu State of the Union
N'ọnwa Disemba 1, afọ 2021, ọ mara ọkwa na ọ ga-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ ọzọ na ntuli aka gọvanọ Georgia nke afọ 2022 wee bụrụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Democratic mgbe ọ zọrọ n'enweghị mmegide
Abrams achọtala ihe ịga nke ọma dị ka onye edemede nke akụkọ ifo mere eme na akụkọ ifo na emeghị eme
Akwụkwọ ya ndị na-abụghị akụkọ ifo mere eme, Our Time Is Now na Lead from the Outside, bụ ndị kacha ere ahịa na
N'èzí ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Abrams ebipụtala akwụkwọ akụkọ ifo asatọ, na-eji aha edemede Selena Montgomery ruo afọ 2021
Mgbe a tọhapụrụ Justice Sleeps n'ọnwa Mee 11, afọ 2021, n'okpuru ezigbo aha ya
Abrams dekwara akwụkwọ ụmụaka, Stacey's Extraordinary Words, nke ewepụtara na Disemba 2021
Onye nke abụọ n'ime ụmụnne isii, a mụrụ Abrams nyere Robert na Carolyn Abrams na Madison, Wisconsin, ma zụlite ya na Gulfport, Mississippi
N'afọ 1989, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara Atlanta, Georgia, ebe nne na nna ya gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Emory
Ha ghọrọ ndị ozi Methodist ma mesịa laghachi Mississippi ha na ụmụ ha atọ kacha nta ebe Abrams na ụmụnne abụọ ndị ọzọ nọgidere na Atlanta
Ọ gara Avondale High School, gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị ka onye mmeri n'afọ 1991
N'afọ 1990, a họpụtara ya maka Telluride Association Summer Program
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, mgbe ọ ka nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, e goro ya ọrụ dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ maka mgbasa ozi ndị omeiwu wee bụrụ onye na-ede okwu dabere na mmezi o mere na okwu mgbasa ozi
Abrams guzobere Nourish, Inc
n'afọ 2010
E chepụtara ya na mbụ dị ka ụlọ ọrụ ihe ọṅụṅụ na-elekwasị anya na ụmụ ọhụrụ na ụmụaka, e mechara gbanwee ya dị ka Ugbu a ma gbanwee ụdị azụmahịa ya na ngwọta maka obere ụlọ ọrụ
Ugbu a zụlitere $ 95 nde Series A n'afọ 2021
N'afọ 2002, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na itoolu, a họpụtara Abrams ka ọ bụrụ osote onye ọka iwu obodo nke obodo Atlanta
Stacey Cash (a mụrụ Önwa ishií 9, 1980) bụ Amerikạ akpali agụụ mmekọahụ omee

Stacey Doubell (ka amụrụ na 23 Machị 1987) bụ onye South Africa lara ezumike nká badminton

N'afọ 2011, o ritere ihe nrite ọla edo n'ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị abụọ, ihe nrite ọla ọcha n'ihe omume ndị otu na ọla nchara n'ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị na ihe omume abụọ na African Games na Maputo, Mozambique
N'afọ 2015, ọ ghọrọ onye nke abụọ n'asọmpi South Africa International n'ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị abụọ

Yannique Barker (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 25, 1985), nkè a maara site na áhà egwu ya Stacks na YNIQ, bụ onye America na-eti egwu
Nna ya, Cecile D
Barker, na-elekọta Sly & the Family Stone na Peaches & Herb, Mgbè ya na ónyé mmekọ ya Tony Camillo na-emepụta 'Midnight Train to Georgia'
Cecile D, Barker bụzi ónyé isi ndekọ SoBe Entertainment
Barker lụrụ ónyé na-eme ihe nkírí telivishọn na ónyé na-agụ egwu Brooke Hogan na July 29, 2009, ha pụtara na The Howard Stern Show
Na 2015, na-agbanwe aha ogbo ya site na Stack$ gaa YNIQ, o wepụtara egwu gbasara egwuregwu Ronda Rousey on Soundcloudcom
Stacy Amoateng (Anastasia Manuela Amoateng) bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi telivishọn / onye na-emepụta ihe, onye ndụmọdụ mgbasa ozi, onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka na onye na-eme ihe nkiri si Ghana
O guzobere òtù ọrụ ebere iji kwado ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka nọ ná mkpa ma bụrụ onye a ma ama maka ọrụ ya site na Ghana Peace Award
Amoateng malitere ọrụ telivishọn ya n'afo 2000 n'eme ihe nkiri na usoro telivishọn bu Taxi Driver N'afọ 2002, ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi mkparita uka nke Talk Ghana na Tv3
Ya na Bola Ray kwadoro Music Music na TV3 Ghana n'afọ 2002 ma gbaa arụkwaghịm n'afọ 2012
Amoateng emeela ihe nkiri dịka I Sing of a Well, Incomplete, Consequences, na Cross my Heart
O mekwara In Touch Africa na In Vogue
Amoateng bụ onye isi oche nke Platinum Networks, nke na-emepụta usoro telivishọn ọ na-akwado, Restoration
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Emklan Media, onye njikwa ndinaya na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta multimedia

Ọ bụ onye guzobere Showbiz Honours, atụmatụ onyinye maka ndị ama ama na-enye ọha mmadụ, añùri na The Restoration With Stacy Foundation, nke na-elekwasị anya n'inye ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ ike na nchikota a na-akpọ The Luv Project Ọrụ Luv na-enye nkwado maka ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ agbọghọ na-agabiga ụdị mmetọ dị iche iche
Ọ zụlitere Ghc Puku iri ano maka ịwa ahụ plastik maka nwanyị onye ibe ya wụsara ya acid
Ọ na-akwado ụmụaka nọ ná mkpa n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, na-enye ndị nne naanị ha n'azu nwa ebe obibi ma na-enye ụmụ agbọghọ ndụmọdụ banyere otu esi enyere ha aka ime ka nro puta ihe n'ụzọ zuru oke
Ọ na-eme ihe ndị a site na ịgagharị ụlọ akwụkwọ na inwe nnọkọ ụmụ akwụkwọ
Stacy M
Hardy bụ onye ode akwụkwọ, odeakụkọ, onye na -ese ihe ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Venus Fly Trapeze Theater Company, nke rụpụtara ihe nrụpụta mbụ 8 kemgbe 1995

Ọ kụzirila ma kụziere ya ihe na Ngalaba Drama na Mahadum Rhodes (1996-98) ma nọgide na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'iji ihe nkiri dị ka ngwa nkuzi site na nkuzi na nhazi ogbako maka Grahamstown Foundation's National School Festival (1996-2003)
Ugbu a ọ na-edepụta egwuregwu ọhụrụ maka onye isi South Africa a ma ama Jaco Bouwer

O nwere ahụmahụ afọ isii dị ka onye nta akụkọ na-enweghị onwe ya, onye nchịkọta akụkọ na-enye ọrụ na onye na-ede akwụkwọ maka mbipụta gụnyere magazin SL, Ragecoza na Art South Africa, na ahụmahụ 5 afọ na mgbasa ozi
Ọrụ ya na Keyline Magazine nwetara Silver Loerie 2001
Na 2001, yana Peet Pienaar na Heidi Chisholm, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na imewe Daddy Buy Me A Pony
Egosiwo nka dijitalụ na mgbasa ozi ya na ihe ngosi dị iche iche nke mpaghara na nke mba ụwa na ọ bụ onye otu ndị nnọchi anya South Africa na Ars Electronica na Austria na 2002
Ọ nwetala ọtụtụ ihe nrite, gụnyere ihe nrite ihe owuwu 2003 na asọmpi nka nka ọwa ọhụrụ 2003
Ọrụ dijitalụ ya ugbu a gụnyere mmekorita ọhụrụ ya na Francois Naude na ọrụ na-enyocha ntụgharị asụsụ na ịgụ na South Africa
O sonyere na 2003 Crossing Border Festival na Den Hagen, Netherlands, ya na ndị edemede South Africa ibe Ivan Vladislavic, Lesego Rampolokeng, Phaswane Mpe, K
Sello Duiker, na Nadine Botha
O mechaala akụkọ ifo maka akwụkwọ foto nke Pieter Hugo, nke e bipụtara na 2007 ma jikọta ya na Miles Keylock, Adam Haupt na Julian Jonker na akwụkwọ egwu South Africa
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka onye edemede na onye nkuzi maka CAPE Africa Platform
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Bowling Club, ọrụ mmekọ ọnụ ọhụrụ nke onye omenkà na onye mmebe Peet Pienaar hiwere

Ọ na-enye aka mgbe niile na nnọkọ dị iche iche na nyiwe, gụnyere n'oge na-adịbeghị anya Underground Conference haziri Fred Devries na ụlọ akwụkwọ Wits maka nyocha gbasara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na VANSA (The Visual Arts Network of SA) na-eto eto curators ogbako mere na Robben Island
Stanley Ebuka Nzediegwu (amuru 16 Mee 1989) nke amara dika Stan Nze bu onye omere Naijiria amara maka oru ya na mmeghari 2020 nke Amaka Igwe's Rattlesnake
A mụrụ Stan Nze na 16 Mee 1989 na Lagos, Nigeria, nye nna onye ọchụnta ego na nne na-emepụta ejiji dị ka nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ ise
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na sayensị kọmputa na mahadum Nnamdị Azikiwe dị n'Awka
O nwekwara ọzụzụ ime ihe nkiri na Stella Damasus Arts Foundation

Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri, Blessing Jessica Obasi na Satọde iri na otu Septemba 2021 na Lagos

Standard Chartered Ghana (nke a na-akpọ Standard Chartered Bank Ghana Limited) bụ ụlọ akụ na ụlọ ọrụ ego na Ghana, yana enyemaka 80% nke Standard Chartered
Edepụtara ha na ndepụta ngwaahịa nke Ghana Stock Exchange, GSE All-Share Index

Stanford Derere bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
A mụrụ ya n'obodo Chapeyama
Derere tolitere na-egwuri egwu na ụrọ, ma mesịa gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ nka iji mụta eserese
Site na 1985 ruo 1986 ọ bụ onye otu BAT Workshop nke National Gallery of Zimbabwe
N'ebe ahụ, ọ mụtara eserese na ibipụta akwụkwọ; o ritere ihe nrite site na gallery na 1988
O mechara gbanwee gaa na ihe ọkpụkpụ, ma gosipụta ọrụ ya na mba ụwa; ihe ọkpụkpụ ya dị na nchịkọta nke Chapungu Sculpture Park

Stanley Ebai Enow (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1985) bụ onye Cameroon na-eti egwu, onye na-egosi redio na TV, na onye na-eme ihe nkiri olu
Ọ bụ onye nwe ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ, Motherland Empire A maara Enow nke ọma maka egwu ya nke afọ 2013 'Hein Père'
Ọ bụ onye Cameroon mbụ meriri na Best New Act category na 2014 MTV Africa Music Awards
A mụrụ Enow na Bamenda, isi obodo nke mpaghara ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke Cameroon
Ọ bụ Bayangi si na mpaghara ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ, na-eme ka aha njirimara ya bụ 'Bayangi Boy'
Enow tolitere na Bafoussam, isi obodo nke mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ, ebe ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Government Bilingual High School
N'afọ 2007, ọ kwagara Douala, isi obodo nke mpaghara Littoral, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere na akụkọ azụmahịa na Mahadum Douala
Enow malitere ide egwu rap na ịgba egwu mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
O mechara mee ihe nkiri na Groove na Cocktail Hit Parade, ihe ngosi abalị abụọ a ma ama na Cameroon
O mekwara ihe nkiri na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ redio nke onwe ya, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi
Enow kwadoro ihe ngosi egwu telivishọn Mboa, ma mee mgbasa ozi olu maka ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta Pan African MTN Group
Enow wepụtara egwu izizi ya 'Hein Père' na June 2013, nke mere ka Trace TV kpọọ ya 'African music Revelation of the Year'
Vidio egwu 'Hein Pere' meriri ihe nrite maka Best Video of the Year na 2013 Balafon Music Awards Egwu a nọ n'ọkwa 1 na ndepụta Reverbnation nke Cameroon, na Trace Africa
Remix nke egwu ahụ gosipụtara onye na-ese ihe na South Africa bụ FAB
Enow nke abụọ 'TumbuBoss' ('Toumbou Boss Deluxe') wepụtara n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2014
Na Cameroon Academy Awards nke mbụ n'afọ 2013, Enow weghaara ihe ngosi abụọ Onye na-ese ihe nke Afọ na Onye na-ese ihe nke Obodo nke Afọ
Enow bụ naanị onye Cameroon a họpụtara maka MTV Africa Music Awards, ebe o meriri ihe nrite Best New Act na 2014
O ritekwara Best New Act ma bụrụ onye a họpụtara maka Best Male Central Africa na 2014 African Muzik Magazine Awards
Enow wepụtara 'TumbuBoss' dị ka egwu nke abụọ site na abọm studio mbụ ya, Soldier Like My Papa
Shamack Allharamadji gbara ma duzie vidiyo egwu maka egwu ahụ
Na Machị 2014, Enow gwara Pulse Nigeria na ya na Nyanda rụkọrọ ọrụ na egwu 'In The Middle', nke onye na-emepụta ihe na Jamaica bụ Black Lion mepụtara
Na 5 Ọktoba 2014, o wepụtara vidiyo egwu maka 'Njama Njama Cow', nke Shamack Allharamadji duziri
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2015, Enow hapụrụ abọm izizi ya nke akpọrọ Soldier Like My Papa
E wepụtara 'Work Hard (Le Père Noël)' dị ka egwu nke ise sitere na abọm ahụ
E wepụtara vidiyo egwu ya na Septemba 11, 2015
Stanley Greene (Ọnwa Febụwarị 14, afọ 1949 - Ọnwa Mee 19, afọ 2017) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto
A mụrụ Greene n'ezinụlọ ndị nọ n'ọkwá dị n'etiti na Brooklyn
Nne na nna ya abụọ bụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
Nna ya, onye amụrụ na Harlem, bụ onye nhazi otu, otu n'ime ndị Africa America mbụ a họpụtara dị ka onye ọrụ na Screen Actors Guild, ma bụrụkwa onye otu Harlem Renaissance
E debara aha nna Greene dị ka onye Kọmunist n'afọ ndị 1950 ma manye ya iwere akụkụ ndị a na-akwadoghị na fim
Nne na nna Greene nyere ya igwefoto mbụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu
Greene malitere ọrụ nka ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe, mana ọ malitere ise foto dị ka ụzọ isi depụta ihe maka ihe osise ya
N'afọ 1971, mgbe Greene bụ onye otu ndị na-emegide Agha Vietnam na Black Panther Party, enyi ya onye na-ese foto W
Eugene Smith nyere ya ohere na ụlọ ọrụ ya ma gbaa ya ume ịmụ foto na School of Visual Arts na New York na San Francisco Art Institute
Greene rụrụ ọrụ dị iche iche dị ka onye na-ese foto, gụnyere ise foto nke ndị egwu rock na ịrụ ọrụ na Newsday
N'afọ 1986, o sere foto ejiji na Paris
Ọ kpọrọ onwe ya 'dilettante, na-anọdụ na kọfị, na-ese foto ụmụ agbọghọ ma na-eme heroin'
Mgbe enyi ya nwụrụ n'ọrịa AIDS, Greene hapụrụ ọgwụ ọjọọ ya wee malite ịchụso ọrụ foto
Ọ malitere ọrụ foto n'afọ 1989, mgbe onyinyo ya ('Kisses to All, Berlin Wall') nke nwa agbọghọ yi uwe tutu na karama champagne ghọrọ ihe nnọchianya nke ọdịda nke Berlin Wall

Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ foto nke Paris bụ Agence Vu n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1993, e jidere Greene ma chọọ igbu ya na White House dị na Moscow n'oge esemokwu dị n'etiti Onye isi ala Boris Yeltsin na ndị omeiwu
Ọ kpuchiri mba ndị agha mebiri Azerbaijan, Bosnia na Herzegovina, Georgia, Iraq, Somalia, Croatia, Kashmir, na Lebanon
O sere foto nke mgbukpọ agbụrụ na Rwanda n'afọ 1994 na US Gulf Coast mgbe ajọ ifufe Katrina gasịrị n'afọ 2005

Mgbe afọ 1994 gasịrị, a maara Greene nke ọma maka akwụkwọ ya banyere esemokwu dị na Chechnya, n'etiti ndị nnupụisi na ndị agha Russia, nke a chịkọtara n'akwụkwọ ya nke afọ 2004, Open Wound Foto ndị a dọtara uche na 'ahụhụ nke gosipụtara mmụba kachasị ọhụrụ na ọgụ Chechnya maka nnwere onwe site na Russia ruo ọtụtụ narị afọ'
N'afọ 2008, Greene kpughere na ya nwere ịba ọcha n'anya C, nke o kwenyere na ọ butere ya site na agụba na-emetọ mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na Chad n'afọ 2007
Mgbe o jiri ọgwụ chịkwaa ọrịa ahụ, ọ gara Afghanistan wee see foto akụkọ banyere 'nsogbu nke iji ọgwụ ọjọọ eme ihe na ọrịa na-efe efe'
Stanley Greene na Kadir van Lohuizen guzobere ụlọ ọrụ NOOR n'afọ 2007
Ha na ndị ọrụ ibe ha malitere ụlọ ọrụ ha na 7th nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 2007 na Visa Pour L'Image
Greene nwụrụ na Paris, mgbe ọ dị afọ 68
Ọ nọ na-agwọ ọrịa kansa imeju

Stanley Saitowitz bụ onye America na-ese ihe
A mụrụ ya na Johannesburg, South Africa, n'afọ 1949

nke dị na San Francisco, California
Saitowitz bụ onye a ma ama ma nwee mmetụta na ihe owuwu Bay
A maara ya maka 'monochromatic' na 'machine-like' architecture
Nhazi ya maka ụlọ nzukọ Beth Sholom (2008) na San Francisco nwetara otuto na onyinye mba ụwa, dị ka High Commendation Award, Religion & Contemplation na 2008 World Architecture Festival 2008
N'otu oge ahụ, ụlọ nzukọ ahụ nwetara nkatọ site n'aka ndị bi n'ógbè ahụ

Star Base Football Club bụ otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Naijiria nke dị na Ogudu, Lagos, nke Adeoye Segun Hakeem guzobere na Septemba 2014

E hiwere Star Base Football Club na 2014 mgbe onye guzobere ya na onye isi oche nke otu ahụ, Maazị Adeoye Segun Hakeem, kpebiri ịkpọkọta ụfọdụ n'ime ndị na-eto eto kacha mma na Ori-oke Mobile Police Barrack football pitch na Ogudu Lagos iji guzobe otu ndị ọkachamara
Adeoye na-agbakari bọọlụ na ngwụsị izu ya na otu Alapere Mopol FC na Ori-oke Mobile Police Barrack, Ogudu Lagos ma ụfọdụ n'ime ụmụ nwoke ndị ya na ya gbara bọọlụ n'otu kpakpando na mgbe ha gasịrị
N'ịbụ onye kwenyesiri ike na nkà ha, Adeoye gwara ndị na-eto eto okwu banyere ịgbanwe ịhụnanya ha maka egwuregwu ahụ ka ọ bụrụ ihe nwere ike ịkpata ha ndụ ọrụ
Ya mere, ọ kpọkọtara ha ma kpọọ ndị otu ahụ Star Base Football Club, Ogudu
Star Base sonyere na Fusion Football Championship, otu League nke Lagos State FA kwadoro

Ihe oyiyi nke Jan Hendrik Hofmeyr na Church Square, Cape Town, bụ ihe ọkpụkpụ nke onye nta akụkọ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mba South Africa bụ Jan Hendrik Hofmeyr, nke a matara dịka 'Onze Jan' (Our Jan)
Ọ bụ Anton van Wouw kpụrụ ihe oyiyi ahụ
E bibiri ihe oyiyi ahụ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2015 dị ka akụkụ nke mgbasa ozi sara mbara megide ihe oyiyi nke ndị oge ọchịchị na South Africa

Stears Business bụ akwụkwọ azụmahịa nke Naijiria dabere n'etiti Lagos na London na-elekwasị anya na akụkọ azụmahịa, akụ na ụba na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Á na-ebipụta Stears Business site na Stears, ndị nta akụkọ ya na-abụkarị ndị nọ na Lagos
Dịka nke Septemba 2017, onye nchịkọta akụkọ bụ Michael Famoroti
Mbipụta ahụ na-ewere ọnọdụ nchịkọta akụkọ na-anọpụ iche na nyocha ya nke gọọmentị, azụmahịa efu na ijikọ ụwa ọnụ dịka o kwenyere na 'uru nke ikwe ka echiche niile na-adịghị mma na-agwa arụmụka'
Ihe mejupụtara bọọdụ nchịkọta akụkọ bụ ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na London School of Economics ma lekwasịrị anya karịsịa na Africa

Christina 'Steenz' Stewart bụ onye America na-ese ihe osise na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke a maara maka igosi Archival Quality ma na-ede ma na-egosi ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị kwa ụbọchị a kpọrọ Heart of the City
A mụrụ ha na Septemba 29, 1990, na Detroit, Michigan, ma biri ugbu a na St
Louis, Missouri
Mgbe ha weghaara Heart of the City site n'aka Mark Tatulli na Mee 2020, ha ghọrọ onye nke abụọ na-ese ihe osise nke mba Black nonbinary, nke Bianca Xunise bu ụzọ na ọdịiche a naanị otu ọnwa tupu
N'ịbụ onye tolitere na St
Louis, Steenz bụ onye na-akwado ihe nkiri na katụụn ndị mechara metụta ọrụ ha, nke gụnyere Calvin na Hobbes, Cathy, Curtis, Recess, Hey Arnold!, na Doug
Ha gara Mahadum Maryville ma mụọ nka studio na-elekwasị anya na ihe atụ
Ha hapụrụ dị ka onye na-eto eto ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ọbá akwụkwọ na onye njikwa ụlọ ahịa akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị na Eisner-winning Star Clipper Comics na St
Louis ruo mgbe emechiri ya na 2015

Mgbe ha na-elekọta ụlọ ahịa akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị, ha kpebiri ime ihe ọchị, mana ha achụsoghị ha dị ka ọrụ ruo mgbe a kpughere ọrụ Brittany Williams na Samurai Jack comic 'Nke abụọ m hụrụ aha [Williams] na [ihe ọchị]
Ọ dị m ka, 'Chere nke abụọ; ọ bụ nwanyị ojii, ọ na-eme ihe ọchị - enwere m ike ime nke ahụ,’ na n'ikpeazụ ọ pịa m onwe m

N'ịgbaso mmechi Star Clipper na 2015, Steenz gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ na Lion Forge Comics, ebe ha rụrụ ọrụ na mbipụta iri na abụọ mbụ nke magazin egwuregwu na tebụl ịgba chaa Rolled and Told ruo 2019

Steenz soro wee mepụta obere ihe ọchị 'The Update' ya na onye na-ede akwụkwọ Melanie Ujimori nye onye nchịkọta akụkọ Taneka Stotts 'Eisner- na Ignatz-winning Elements Fire, ọ pụtakwara na anthologies Mine!, na Dead Beats
Mbipụta mbụ ha bụ Archival Quality, nke ha na onye edemede Ivy Noelle Weir mepụtara
Ọ bụ Oni Press bipụtara ya n'afọ 2018
Steenz weghaara ide ma gosipụta Obi nke Obodo maka Mark Tatulli

Na Mee 12, 2020, a mara ọkwa na Steenz ga-ese onyinyo ma na-emepụta akwụkwọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke RPGs tabletop n'akụkụ onye edemede Samuel Sattin; a na-eme atụmatụ akwụkwọ ahụ maka ụbọchị ntọhapụ 2023
Archival Quality (2018) - Cel Walden malitere ọrụ ọhụrụ dị ka onye na-edebe ihe ochie na Logan Museum
Ka ọ na-alụ ọgụ na ịda mbà n'obi na nchekasị, ọ na-arọ nrọ banyere nwanyị mmụọ
Ka ọ na-amụtakwu banyere mmụọ nke na-echegbu onwe ya, ọ na-amụtakwu banyere onwe ya na ndị ọrụ ndị ọzọ nke Logan Museum
Heart' of the City (2020–) Ihe ọchị a bụ banyere Obi Lamarr, nwa akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ etiti nke bi na Philadelphia
Steenz weghaara ihe nkiri ahụ mgbe onye okike mbụ bụ Mark Tatulli kwụsịrị ime ya
Elements Fire, A Comic Anthology by Creators of Color meriri 2018 Eisner Award for Best Anthology na 2017 Ignatz Award for Best Anthology
The anthology nwere ọrụ Steenz

Na Febụwarị 2019, a kpọrọ Steenz na Ivy Noelle Weir ndị mmeri nke 5th Annual Dwayne McDuffie Award for Diversity in Comics for Archival Quality A họpụtakwara akwụkwọ a dị ka mbipụta Junior Library Guild Gold Standard na 2018
Ọchịchị steeti mepere anya bụ obodo na -anọchite anya mpaghara n'abụghị naanị mpaghara akụkọ ihe mere eme, otu agbụrụ, ma ọ bụ otu ọchịchị, kama ọ bụ mmepeanya pụrụ iche n'onwe ya
Ọ dị iche na echiche nke steeti mba site n'ịkọwa ụdị mmekọrịta ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nke obodo dị ka nke mejupụtara otu nke karịrị otu mba
Mgbe ị na -eke steeti dị ka steeti nwere mmepeanya, a na atọ ntọala n'ịkwalite akụkọ ihe mere eme nke obodo na ịdị n'otu omenala n'ofe nnukwu mpaghara
Ewepụtara okwu a na mgbe mbụ n'afọ ndị dị n'agbata 1990 Dịka ụzọ esi akọwa China, mana ejirikwara ya kọwaa mba ndị dịka Russia, India na Turkey

Ndị ọkà mmụta ji okwu ahụ bụ mmepeanya-steeti' na mbụ n'afọ ndị di n'agbata 1990 iji kọwaa China dị ka obodo nwere akparamagwa mmekọrịta ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị dị iche, dịka a jụrụ ile ya anya dị ka steeti mba Dị n'ụdịdị Europe

Ojiji nke okwu ọhụrụ a na -egosi na China bụ ma ka bụrụkwa “alaeze ukwu” nke nwere ọdịnala ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị pụrụ iche na usoro ọchịchị gọọmenti, ndị na -akwado ya kwukwara na usoro steeti mba akọwaghị mmalite mgbanwe nke steeti China
Ndị na-akwado akara ahụ na -akọwa China dị ka mba nwere akụkọ ihe mere eme na ọdịbendị pụrụ iche, nke sitere na usoro na-aga n'ihu nke mmekọrịta mmekọrịta
E mere ka okwu a bụrụ okwu ama ama mgbe Martin Jacques jiri ya mee mgbe China na -achị ụwa

Dabere na Li Xing na Timothy Shaw, isi ihe dị na nyocha China dị ka obodo mepere anya bụ nhụta na steeti China na-enweta ikike ya kwụ ọtọ site na ịga n'ihu n'usoro ọchịchịr mmekọrịta ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị nke na -egosi na steeti ahụ nwere ikike ebumpụta ụwa karịa ndị ọ na -achị
' Ọ na-elekọta' ụmụ amaala ya na obodo ha, echiche steeti nke dị iche na ụdị steeti mba Westphalian

Ndị ọkà mmụta ndị ọzọ na-ekwu na isi ihe dị na mmepeanya-steeti bụ idobe ụkpụrụ ịdị n'otu nke ọdịbendị n'agbanyeghị na-egosipụta oke ọdịbendị dị iche iche, n'ime ọtụtụ narị afọ nke akụkọ ntolite na nnukwu oghere
Ụfọdụ na -adọrọ uche gaa ogologo oge nke usoro ide ihe nke China , ma ọ bụ kọwaa ọdịdị China dị ka Obodo nwere Njikọta akụkọ mere na Ndịn'azụ
Guang Xia na-agbagha azụ n'echiche nke ịdị iche nke mmepeanya steeti China
Xia na-ekwu na okwu mmepeanya-steeti n'ọmụmụ ihe China bụ mmepe dị mkpa ma dị mma, ebe ọ na-enye ohere ka e nyochaa njirimara steeti China ọgbara ọhụrụ na akụkọ nke akụkọ ha

Agbanyeghị, Xia kwubiri na n'ikpeazụ, mmepeanya niile ga-enwetaghachi onwe ha na akụkọ ha nke akụkọ ihe mere eme, na ọ bụ ihie ụzọ iwere China dị ka ihe kwụ akwụ ma ọ bụ gosipụta ya dị ka ejikọtara ya na ihe gara aga karịa ụwa ndị ọzọ

Ọ bụ ezie na echepụtara echiche nke India ọgbara ọhụrụ dị ka obodo nnwere onwe ya mgbe pụrụ na Ọchịchị Britain, a tụpụtala India ka ọ bụrụ atụ nke steeti mepere anya, ya na ndị na-akọwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na -arụ ụka na njirimara ndị India kesara tupu ọchịchị Britain na mwakpo ndị Alakụba
Nchịkwa ọchịchị Vladimir Putin anabatala okwu mkparị nke ịkọwa Russia dị ka obodo mepere emepe nke Eurasia

Onye odeakụkọ Gideon Rachman rụrụ ụka na 2019 na echiche steeti mepere anya adabaghi n'echiche ọgbara ọhụrụ nke ikike ụmụ mmadụ zuru ụwa ọnụ na ụkpụrụ ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, na ọ bụ naanị nke ndị otu pere mpe n'anaghị ekerịta atụmatụ ndị nke na-akọwapụta otu ọnọdụ mmepeanya
(dịka ọmụmaatụ, ha nwere ike nwee okpukpe ọzọ)

Nke a bụ ndepụta nke steeti na mpaghara njikọ nke India site na ihe omume nke ịzụ ahịa mmadụ na 2016, ma dabere na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ikpe a mara

Dị ka akụkọ ahụ si kwuo, steeti atọ kachasị elu nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị elu nke ihe omume ịzụ ahịa mmadụ dika ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ikpe a kọpụtara bụ West Bengal, Rajasthan na Gujarat na steeti atọ kachasị elu nke ihe omume ịzụ ahịa mmadụ dabere na ọnụego mpụ bụ West Bengal, Daman na Diu na Goa
Stefania Turkewich-Lukianovych (Eprel 25, 1898 - Eprel 8, 1977) bụ onye Ukraine na-ede egwu, onye na-akpọ piano, na onye na-agụ egwu, nke a maara dị ka nwanyị mbụ dèrè egwú na Ukraine
Ndị Soviet machibidoro ọrụ ya na Ukraine
A mụrụ Stefania na Lviv, Austria-Hungary
Nna nna ya (Lev Turkevich), na nna ya (Ivan Turkevich) bụ ndị ụkọchukwu
Nne ya Sofia Kormoshiv (Кормошів) bụ onye na-akpọ piano ma soro Karol Mikuli na Vilém Kurz mụọ ihe, ma soro ntorobịa Solomiya Krushelnytska
Ezinụlọ ahụ dum bụ ndị egwu ma onye ọ bụla na-akpọ ngwá egwu
Stefania na-akpọ piano, ụbọ akwara, na harmonium
Mgbe e mesịrị, onye na-ede egwu chetara oge ọ bụ nwata na ịhụnanya ya maka egwu
Stefania malitere ọmụmụ egwu ya na Vasyl Barvinsky
Site na 1914 ruo 1916, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Vienna dị ka onye na-akpọ piano na Vilém Kurz
Mgbe Agha Ụwa Mbụ gasịrị, ọ mụụrụ Adolf Chybiński na Mahadum Lviv, ma gaa nkuzi ya gbasara echiche egwu na Lviv Conservatory 10
N'afọ 1919, o dere ọrụ egwu mbụ ya bụ Liturgy (Літургію), nke a na-eme ọtụtụ ugboro na St
George's Cathedral na Lviv
Na 1925 ọ lụrụ Robert Lisovskyi ma soro ya gá njem na Berlin ébé ọ bìrì site 1927 rụọ 1930 yá nà Arnold Schoenberg nà
Franz Schrek gùrù akwụkwọer 14 N'ime oge ad,nàn 1927,ọrmụrụ nwa yá Zoya (Зояn

Mgbe ọ laghachiri Lviv, site na 1934 ruo mmalite nke Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi nke echiche egwu na piano na Lviv Conservatory, wee bụrụ onye otu Union nke Ukrainian Professional Musicians

N'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke 1939, mgbe Soviet weghaara Western Ukraine, Stefania rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na onye na-eduzi egwu na Lviv Opera House, ma site na 1940 ruo 1941 ọ bụ osote prọfesọ na Lviv Conservatory
Mgbe mmechi nke Conservatory, na ndị Germany, ọ gara n'ihu na-akụzi na State Musical School
N'oge opupu ihe ubi 1944 ọ hapụrụ Lviv gaa Vienna
N'ịgbapụ na ndị Soviet, na 1946, ọ kwagara n'ebe ndịda Austria, ma si ebe ahụ gaa Ịtali, ebe di ya nke abụọ, Nartsiz Lukyanovich, bụ dọkịta n'okpuru iwu Britain

N'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke afọ 1946, Stefania kwagara United Kingdom, ma biri na Brighton (1947–1951), London (1951–1952), Barrow Gurney (n'akụkụ Bristol) (1952–1962), Belfast (Northern Ireland) (1962–1973), na Cambridge (site na 1973, ebe ọ nwụrụ)
E mere ihe nkiri ya bụ Oksana's Heart na Winnipeg (Canada) na 1970 na Centennial Concert Hall, n'okpuru nduzi nka nke nwanne ya nwanyị Irena Turkevycz-Martynec

Ihe ndị o dere bụ nke oge a, mana cheta abụ ọdịnala Ukraine mgbe ha na-abụghị ngosipụta
Ọ gara n'ihu na-ede egwu n'ime afọ 1970
Stefania Turkevich nwụrụ na Eprel 8, 1977, na Cambridge, England
Stefanie Jackson bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke ihe osise ya na-ekwu màkà isiokwu nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Africa America na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị US nke ógè a
A mụrụ Jackson na Detroit ma nata BFA ya na Parsons School of Design na 1979 na MFA ya na Mahadum Cornell na 1988
Ọ bụ osote prọfesọ nkè eserese na eserese na Lamar Dodd School of Art na Mahadum Georgia ugbu a

E gosipụtara ọrụ Jackson n'ọtụtụ gallery gụnyere Stone Center for the Arts na Mahadum North Carolina na Chapel Hill, The African American Museum (Dallas), na Harriet Tubman Museum na Afro-American Historical and Cultural Society Museum na Philadelphia
Jackson enwetala ònyìnyé ọrụ pụrụ iche site na National Endowment of the Arts na ọtụtụ onyinye n'otu n'otu site na Georgia Council for the Arts
Adolph na Esther Gottlieb Foundation nyere Jackson onyinye na 2002
Ihe osise Jackson na-adabere na ahụmịhe ndụ ya yana okwu sara mbárá nke ikpe ziri ezi
Mmetụta ya na-emetụta ụdị dịgasị iche iche gụnyere surrealism na akwụkwọ ndị Africa America
Otu mmetụta dị mkpà na ọrụ Jackson bụ egwu na ọdịbendị Southern blues
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ Jackson na-ekwu maka ihe omume ndị dị mkpa na akụkọ ihe méré eme nke US na Africa America
Ihe osise ya azaghachila Atlanta Race Riots, mbibi nke New Orleans site na Hurricane Katrina, nsogbu nke ụlọ ọha na eze na Detroit na New Orleans, na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke French nke New Orleans
N'onwe ya, Jackson na-enweta mkpali site na ọdachi ezinụlọ, gụnyere ọnwụ nwa nwanne ya n'ime ihe ike na Detroit, nke a na-echeta na ihe osise Little Girl Blue
Stefanie Sycholt (amụrụ n'afọ 1963) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri si South Africa, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, na onye na-ede ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Sycholt na Pretoria n'afọ 1963
Ọ gụrụ Bekee n'okpuru J
Coetzee yana sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nakwa ihe nkiri na Mahadum Natal na Mahadum Cape Town
Sycholt na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'òtù ụmụ akwụkwọ na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ mgbasa ozi maka National Union of South African Students
Ọ chịkọtara ndị otu mmepụta AVA nke mere ihe nkiri Nelson Mandela's Welcome Home Rally na Durban na 1990
Sycholt mechara gaa Germany iji mụọ na Mahadum Television and Film Munich Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Ngalaba edemede nke Mahadum nke Film na Television Munich yana onye edemede na onye nduzi
N'afọ 2001, Sycholt mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na Malunde, nke kọrọ akụkọ banyere nwa nwoke a na-akpọ Wonderboy onye na-eme enyi na onye bụbu onye agha na ọchịchị ndị ọcha
Ọ natara onyinye Avanti isii nke gụnyere onye nduzi kachasị mma, akụkụ nke uru ahụ gara na ọrụ ebere Mandela maka ụmụaka nọ n'okporo ámá
Ọ duziri ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị maka TV Gwendolyn na 2007
N'afọ 2010, o dere, duzie, ma soro mepụta Themba
Nke dabere na akwụkwọ akụkọ aha ya nke Lutz van Dijk, ọ bụ ihe nkiri ezinụlọ nke na-akọ akụkọ banyere nwa okorobịa nwere mmasị na bọọlụ na nne ya nke butere ọrịa AIDS
Themba natara UNICEF Child Rights Award na 2010 Zanzibar International Film Festival
Sycholt duziri ọtụtụ ihe omume nke usoro Inga Lindström
Sycholt lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri onye mba Argentina ma nwee otu nwa nwoke
Ọ na-eke oge ya n'etiti Germany, Argentina, na South Africa
Stefka Koleva (amụrụ na 9 Jenụwarị 1954) bụ onye Bulgaria na-akwọ ụgbọ mmiri
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị asatọ na 1980 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Stefka Mikhaylova Madina (Bulgarian; amụrụ na 23 Jenụwarị 1963) bụ onye Bulgaria na akwọ ụgbọ mmiri
A mụrụ Madina na Plovdiv

Stelio Savante bụ onye South African American na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme fim na onye na-emepụta ihe nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dịka onye nta akụkọ South Africa na onye ọrụ Mossad zoro ezo n'ihu Jim Caviezel na Claudia Karvan na akụkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Infidel, onye isi obodo Portuguese n'ihu Matt Dillon na ihe nkiri Hawaiian Running for Grace, onye uwe ojii aghụghọ na ihe nkiri South African epic Colors of Heaven, ọrụ Hunter S
Kimbrough na Peter Greenaway's Golden Bear họpụtara Eisenstein na Guanajuato na ọrụ Ajax na egwuregwu vidio a ma ama nke Ops 4

N'afọ 2007 ọ ghọrọ nwoke mbụ a mụrụ na South Africa Screen Actors Guild award nominated (Best Ensemble in a Comedy) maka ọrụ ya na Ugly Betty sochiri ọrụ na ihe nkiri studio My Super Ex-Girlfriend na Starship Troopers 3 Marauder
Onye Capetonian nke ndị Gris, Italian, British, Ashkenazi, na ndị Anatolian, nna nna ya bụ onye ọkwọ ụgbọala na-agba ọsọ nke tinyere ma merie ihe nrite na 1955 Monte Carlo Rally

Ọ na-asụ asụsụ Afrikaans na Grik nke ọma, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Camps Bay High School, si South Africa kwaga United States mgbe Mahadum nke West Alabama nyere ya agụmakwụkwọ tennis mba ụwa wee kwaga New York City ọzọ n'afọ 992 iji chụsoo ọrụ ime ihe nkiri
Oge izizi ya bịara na Law & Order Special Victims Unit dị ka onye Bosnian Islamist fundamentalist
N'ịbụ nke onye mmeri nke Academy Award Juan Jose Campanella duziri ma bụrụkwa Bradley Cooper na Alfred Molina, a họpụtara ihe omume ahụ maka Emmy

Ihe ngosi telivishọn ndị ọzọ gụnyere Law & Order Criminal Intent n'ihu Chris Noth na Annabella Sciorra, The Sopranos, Guiding Light, All My Children, dị ka Dan 'Schaffy' Schaffner na onye na-anya ụgbọelu Jim Breuer maka Pulp Comics na Comedy Central na ugboro ugboro dị ka Antonio na Late Night na Conan O'Brien

Savante emepụtala ma rụọ ọrụ na ihe nkiri ndị dị ka Under the Stadium Lights nke Laurence Fishburne na Milo Gibson wepụtara na Saban Entertainment, Inc na Paramount Pictures, sci-fi indie Destination Marfa onye mmeri kachasị egwu Manhattan Film Festival nke SP wepụtara na Tony Todd wepụtara, egwu Summertime Dropouts nke Lions Gate Entertainment Corporation wepụtara, ihe nkiri ezinụlọ Bernie wepụtara Dolphin nke Lions Sorbo site na Lions Gate, Inc

Jackson, Melissa Leo, Cynthia Nixon, na Jeremy Piven
na Skirball Center for The Performing Arts na NYU
Ọ bụ Gregory Mosher duziri ya
Savante kọwara 110 Stories dịka ohere inye ndị mmadụ mmechi banyere mwakpo ahụ; ọ nọ na New York City n'oge mwakpo ahụ, ma kwuo nke ahụ dịka ihe kpatara ya ji mepụta egwuregwu ahụ
N'afọ 2010, o mepụtara ma mee ihe nkiri mbụ nke Los Angeles nke 110 Stories Celebrity Benefit Performances na Geffen Playhouse, ya na John Hawkes na Ed Asner nke Mark Freiburger duziri
E nyere Red Cross Los Angeles ego niile e nwetara dịka enyemaka nye Haiti mgbe ala ọma jijiji ha gasịrị
N'afọ 2013, o mepụtara ma mee 110 Stories na Ebony Rep na Los Angeles
E nyere ego ahụ na Operation Gratitude
Ọzọkwa, o mepụtara ma mee 110 Stories n'ihu Robert Forster na Mira Sorvino nke onye nkuzi ya na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Bill Alderson duziri n'afọ 2016
Dịka onye na-ede egwuregwu, otu ihe nkiri ya Venom bụ nke onwe ya mepụtara Off Broadway ma họpụta ya dị ka onye ikpeazụ maka emume Samuel French's Love Creek
A chọpụtara na Savante nwere ọrịa Celiac n'afọ 2010 ma ghọọ onye na-akwado ndị ọzọ na-arịa ọrịa
O kwuru na ọrịa ahụ wakporo akụkụ ahụ ya, gụnyere imeju ya
E mechara chọpụta na ọ na-arịa ọrịa thyroiditis nke Hashimoto
A mụrụ ya na mpaghara ugwu nke Uganda, n'akụkụ ugwu nke ọdọ mmiri Kyoga
Stella malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ ya na Kampala, isi obodo Uganda na obodo kachasị ukwuu
Ọ kwagara Kenya wee gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya n'ebe ahụ
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na United Kingdom
O nwere nzere bachelors na nzere masta na Fine Art
N'afọ 2007, ọ malitere akara nke ya, Atal Stella
N'ebe ahụ, ọ na-elekwasị anya n'iji ihe dị na mpaghara, gụnyere eco-friendly, natural and re-cycled material
E gosipụtara ihe ndị omeputara na Africa Fashion Week New York, na 2010 na Green Fashion Switzerland, na 2011
E gosipụtara ọrụ Stella na mbipụta abụọ nke magazin a ma ama nke Italian Vogue
N'afọ 2016, o si Kampala, Uganda kwaga Paris, France
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ natara ikikere nke na-enye ohere imepụta na ire uwe ya na ihe osise nwebisiinka na France na ndị ọzọ nke European Union
Ọ na-eme njem mba ụwa na Continental Europe, United Kingdom na United States
Stella Atal Meriri na ihe mmeri nke akporo African Designer of The Year site na Ethical Fashion Awards, nke emere na London n'afọ 2008
N'afọ 2010, omeriri na ihe mmeri ana akpo Afric Collection Fashion Award na Douala, Cameroon
Ọ na-akuziri ụmụ akwụkwọ nka na ụmụ akwụkwọ na-emepụta ejiji
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na ndị ntorobịa nwere nsogbu, ọkachasị ụmụ agbọghọ
Na mgbakwunye, ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ndị ọrịa nje HIV / AIDS ma na Kampala ma na mpaghara ugwu nke ógbè ahụ
Stella Chinyelu Okoli (MON, OON) (amụrụ c
1944) bụ onye ọkà mmụta ọgwụ na ọchụnta ego
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Emzor Pharmaceutical, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ọgwụ na Naijiria
A mụrụ Stella na Kano Steetị, n'ezinụlọ Felix Ebelechukwu na Margaret Modebelu, ndị sitere na Nnewi na steeti Anambra
Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na 1954 mgbe ọ debanyere aha dị ka nwa akwụkwọ na All Saint Primary School, Onitsha tupu ya agaa ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na 1964 na Ogidi Girls Secondary School, Ogidi
Na 1969, Stella gụrụ mmuta ahịa ọgwụ na Mahadum Bradford
O nwetara nzere mastas na Biopharmaceutical mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum London, Chelsea College na 1971
Tupu ọ guzobe Emzor Pharmaceutical, Stella rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ọgwụ gụnyere Middlesex Hospital, London,Boots the Chemists Limited na Pharma-Deko
Na Jenụwarị 1977, Stella guzobere Emzor Pharmaceutical nke nwere aha izizi 'Emzor Chemists Limited' dịka obere ụlọ ahịa ahịa ọgwụ na Somolu, Lagos Steeti
Kemgbe ahụ, Emzor Pharmaceutical abụrụla otu n'ime ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ ọgwụ na Naijiria nwere ihe karịrị ngwaahịa iri ise kemgbe a malitere ya na 1984

Onye otu so nọ na nzukọ Economic Summit Forum na Health Matters Advisory Board nke Naijiria, Stella na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye isi oche otu nke ndị na-emepụta ihe na Naijiria na nzuko ndị ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka azụmaahịa nke Nigeria ma ngalaba mmepụta, na ọrụ ugbo
O jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke ndị na-emepụta ọgwụ na ndị na-emepụta ọtụtụ ihe dị iche iche nke Nigeria
Mgbe nwa ya nwoke Chike Okoli nwụrụ na 2005, Stella bidoro Chike Okoli Foundation n’afọ 2006 dị ka nzukọ nke NGO na ebumnuche nke ịlụso ịda ogbenye na ọrịa ọgụ site na ime ka a mara banyere ọrịa obi
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi na Chike Okoli Centre maka Nnyocha Azụmaahịa
Na nkwanye ugwu maka ihe ọ rụzuru na mgbalị ya na ngalaba ahụike na Naịjirịa, enyere Stella onyinye nke Order of the Niger
Na 2012, a kwanyere ya ugwu na mmemme nke 17th ThisDay Annual Awards
O bụ onye nwetara ECOWAS International Gold Award
Stella Damasus (bu onye amuru na onwa April na ubochi 24, afo 1978) o bu Nigerian ma na obu onye na bu abu na onye na omee

A hoputara ya maka Best Actress in a Leading Role na Africa Movie Academy Awards na 2009 O meriri Onyinye maka Onye Nwunye Okike kacha mma na Nigeria Entertainment Awards na 2007 na 2012 O meriri ihe omuma maka Best Actress maka ihe nkiri ndi di ohuru abuo na otu nwa n'ikike akara ngosi di na Houston, Texas
A muru Stella Damasus na Benin City, Edo State na NigeriaO nwere umunne ndi nwanyi ano
o tolu na Benin City ebe o mecheraihe ka ukwuu n'ime akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ ya
Mgbe o di afo iri na ato, Stella moved to Asaba in Delta State with her family where she finished her secondary school education
Stella Fakiyesi (amụrụ n'afọ 1971) bụ onye Naijiria na-ese foto, onye na-ese ihe nkiri na onye na-ese ihe
E gosipụtara ọrụ Fakiyesi na foto na nka ọhụụ n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi mba ụwa
A mụrụ Fakiyesi na Naịjirịa
Ọ gụrụ maka ise foto na Ontario College of Art & Design University site na 1993 ruo 1997
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1997, Fakiyesi malitere ịrụ ọrụ naanị ya na Toronto, Canada
Ọ tọrọ ntọala ma rụọ ọrụ na SOF Art House, ụlọ ngosi na ebe ọrụ maka ndị na-ese foto na Toronto site na 1999 ruo 2005
Stella Ford Mugabo (Amụrụ n'afọ 1962) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Rwanda nke jere ozi dị ka Minista nke Mmekọrịta nke Cabinet kemgbe ọnwa Julaị afọ 2013
A mụrụ Mugabo n'afọ 1962 na Uganda na Francis Ford Gashumba na Stella Mukamutara
O nwere akara ugo mmụta na agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere na Master of Arts na Economics and Social Studies na Mahadim Manchester
Mugabo rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nyocha iwu ọha na eze maka ọfịs onye isi ala nke Uganda, wee bụrụ onye na-edeba aha agụmakwụkwọ na Kigali Institute of Science, Technology and Management
Ọ bụ onye isi odeakwụkwọ nke Public Sector Capacity Building Secretariat site n'ọnwa Machị 2010 ruo afọ 2014
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ Rwanda Institute of Administration and Management na onye otu ụlọ ọrụ nke Rwanda's Capacity Building Programme
Stella Ifeanyi Smith bụ onye sayensị dibịa bekee nke Naịjirịa nwere mmasi na bayoloji na teknụzụ soo ya
Smith sonyeere Nigeria Institute of Medical Research na afọ 1988, e mere ya onye isi nyocha na afọ 2013
Ka ọ dị na, na ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2018, o nwere goo amaokwu otu puku, narị asaa na iri atọ na itoolu na ọkà mmụta Google nke ahụ na-egosi na a'na ahụ ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ ya
Amụrụ na ọnwa Jenụwarị ụbọchị iri abụọ na asatọ, n'afọ 1965, Smith nwere akara ugo mmụta mbụ ya na microbiology na Mahadum Ilorin na afọ 1986
Mgbe nke a gasị, o nwetara nzere masters na Medical microbiology na Mahadum Lagos
Ọ gụsịrị akara ugo mmụta doctorate site n'otu ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na afọ 1996
N’afọ 2001, ọ mere nyocha banyere ndị mmadụ narị anọ na iri ise na itoolu na-arịa afọ ọsịsa na Lagos
A kọwara na ndị ọrịa ahụ bụ ndị dịpụrụ iche achọpụta nwere Shigella spp
na Escherichia coli
Site na ihe ọ chọpụtara, ọ tụrụ aro na ọrịa ihe ga agwọ ọrịa ahụ bụ ampicillin, tetracycline, co-trimoxazole
Ọ chọpụtakwara na ekwesịrị izere ọgwụ streptomycin na usoro izizi nke ịgwọ shigellosis n'ihi na achọpụtara na akụrụngwa ya na nguzogide ya nwere ike inwe mmetụta na usoro ọgwụgwọ ọrịa ahụ
O choputara na acid nke Nalidixic, ciprofloxacin na ofloxacin bụ ọgwụ ndị di nma enwere ike iji nọchie anya ndị ọzọ maka ọrịa ahụ

Ọrụ ya akachasị kpọtụrụ aha na ọkà mmụta Google bu nke ọrụrụ na afọ 2006, ebe ọ nyochara mmetụta nke ihe na egbu ma ọbụ gbochie nje nke a'na akpọ antibacterial na asụsụ bekee nke a'na ewepụta kwa na mkpụrụ osisi
Ọrụ ya nyochaa ka nke a si adi ire ebe escherichia coli 0157 H7 nọ

N'ime ọrụ ya, osisi anọ dị iche iche (Entada africana (akụkụ nke osisi ahụ), Terminalia avicennoides (akụkụ nke osisi ahụ), Mitragyna stipulosa (akụkụ nke osisi ahụ) Lannae acida (akụkụ nke osisi ahụ) ka etinyere ya na nke a'na akpọ ethanol na asụsụ bekee na mmiri na usoro mgbasa di iche maka ịchọpụta mmeghachi omume ha na ebe nke E coli 0157 H7 (EHEC)
Nsonaazụ dịgasị iche iche dabere na ngwakọta ejiri maka ime ule ahụ
Stella Ikupa Alex (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1979), bụ onye na-ahụ maka ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Tanzania, onye so n'òtù Chama Cha Mapinduzi (CCM)
Ọ bụ osote minista ugbu a n'ọfịs praịm minista nke Tanzania, nke na-ahụ maka ndị nwere nkwarụ
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka onye omeiwu, ebe a họpụtara ya n'oche pụrụ iche n'afọ 2015
A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1979
Ọ gara 'Minazi Mirefu Primary School', na Dar es Salaam, obodo kachasị ukwuu na Tanzania na ebe azụmahịa, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afọ 1994
Site na afọ 1995 ruo na afọ 1998, ọ gara Jangwani Girls Secondary School, kwa na Dar es Salaam maka ọmụmụ O-Level ya
Ọ nọrọ na Jangwani maka agụmakwụkwọ A-Level ya, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afọ 2001
N'afọ 2002, a nabatara ya na Tanzania Institute of Accountancy, na Dar es Salaam campus, iji nweta Advanced Diploma na Accountancy
Mgbe e mesịrị, site na afọ 2009 ruo na afọ 2011, ọ gara nke ọma na Master of Science degree na Accountancy na Finance, na Dar es Salaam campus nke Mahadum Mzumbe
N'afọ 2007, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Ministry of Energy and Minerals nke Tanzania dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ego, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo n'afọ 2014
N'afọ ahụ, a kpọfere ya na Ministry of Industry and Trade nke Tanzania, dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ego, na-eje ozi n'ebe ahụ ruo n'afọ 2015
Stella Alex abụwo onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-arụsi ọrụ ike na obodo ya, na pati ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Cama Cha Mapiduzi na-achị, malite na 2003
Site mgbe ahụ ruo n'afọ 2015, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ nke alaka pati ya
N'afọ 2013, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu CCM District Constitutional CouncilN'afọ 2015, ọ ghọrọ onye omeiwu n'okpuru ndokwa oche pụrụ iche
N'abalị asaa n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2017, onye isi ala John Magufuli họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote minista, n'ọfịs praịm minista, nke na-ahụ maka ndị nwere nkwarụ
Stella Isodo Apolot bụ onye omeiwu Ugandan onye na-erule n'ọnwa Machị 2021 bụ onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị a họpụtara maka Ngora District
Na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ nwere njikọ na Forum for Democratic Change party
Apolot Isodo nwere njikọ na otu Forum for Democratic Change (FDC) nke ọ gbara ọsọ na ntuli aka afọ 2016 ruo afọ 2021 nke Uganda
A mara ya dị ka onye na-ebu ọkọlọtọ pati n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2020 mgbe o meriri onye mmegide ya na ntuli aka nke pati
O bu ụzọ gbaa ọsọ maka oche ahụ n'afọ 2016 ma merie Jacqueline Amongin
Isodo Apolot lụrụ Samuel Isodo, onye ọka iwu
O nwere ụmụ atọ Apio Joanne, Isodo Arnold na Okiror AllanBill
Stella Peter Kingsley (amuru 13 Nọvemba n'afọ 2002) bu onye na- ebu ibu nke Naijiria
Ọ nọchiri anya Naịjirịa na asọmpi Afrịka nke afọ 2019 emere na Rabat, Morocco wee nweta nrite ọlaọcha n'asọmpi ụmụnwaanyị iri anọ na ise kg omume
Ọ meriri ihe nrite ọla edo n'afọ iri anọ na itoolu
ụmụ nwanyị emume n'asọmpi ibu arọ nke Africa nke 2021 emere na Nairobi, Kenya
Ọ zọkwara asọmpi n'afọ iri anọ na itoolu nke ụmụnwaanyị Ihe omume kg na asọmpi ibu arọ ụwa nke 2021 emere na Tashkent, Uzbekistan
Ọ meriri n'ọkwa ise n'asọmpi a
Emekwara asọmpi ịdị arọ nke Commonwealth nke afọ 2021 n'otu oge na nsonaazụ ya nyere ya ihe nrite ọla edo na mmemme a
N’ihi ya, ọ tozuru oke ịsọmpi n’egwuregwu Commonwealth 2022 na Birmingham, England
Stella Martin Manyanya (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1962) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị CCM nke Tanzania na onye omeiwu maka mpaghara Nyasa kemgbe afọ 2010
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2017, a họpụtara ya dị ka osote minista nke ụlọ ọrụ, azụmahịa na itinye ego
Ọ gara Nambingi Primary School, maka afọ mbụ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị, site na afọ 1969 ruo 1970
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Maguu, gụsịrị akwụkwọ elementrị n'ebe ahụ n'afọ 1975
Site na na afọ 1976 ruo na afọ 1979, ọ gara Songea Girls Secondary School, na Songea, maka ọmụmụ ya na Ordinary Level Secondary School
O nwere nzere mahadum na injinia eletrik, nke ọ nwetara na Mahadum Sayensị na Teknụzụ nke Norway na Mahadụ nke Dar es Salaam
Ọrụ mbụ ya bụ na Pugu Kaolin Mines Limited (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka STAMICO), ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka eletrik site na afọ 1983 ruo na afọ 1987

N'afọ 1992 ruo na afọ 2005, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye injinia eletrik, maka Tanzania Electric Supply Company Limited (TANESCO), ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ọkụ eletrik nke Tanzania, nke na-ahụ anya maka mmepụta ọkụ eletrik, nnyefe ọkụ eletrik na nkesa ọkụ eletrik
Na TENESCO, ọ na-ahụ maka atụmatụ, iwu akara na ọrụ
Ọ banyere na ndị omeiwu n'afọ 2005 na tiketi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị CCM
N'oge mbụ ya na ndị omeiwu, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na kọmitii ndị omeiwu na Investment, Energy na Minerals
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na National Executive Committee (NEC) n'oge ahụ
A họpụtara ya ọzọ n'afọ 2010
N'oge nke abụọ ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke kọmitii ndị omeiwu na ụlọ ọrụ na azụmahịa, site na afọ 2010 ruo nah afọ 2011
Ọzọkwa n'otu oge ahụ, ọ bụ onye otu kọmitii ndị omeiwu na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara iwu, ezi ọchịchị na gọọmentị ime obodo
Site na afọ 2011 ruo na afọ 2015, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'otu oge ahụ dị ka Kọmishọna Ógbè maka Ógbè Rukwa
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye otu Kansụl Mahadum nke Mahadum Dar es Salaam, yana dịka onye otu kọmitii ndị omeiwu na Nchebe na Nche
A họpụtara ya ọzọ ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke ugboro atọ n'usoro n'afọ 2015

N'afọ 2015, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote minista nke agụmakwụkwọ, teknụzụ na ọzụzụ ọrụ aka, na-eje ozi na ikike ahụ ruo n'ọnwa Ọktoba na afọ 2017 mgbe a họpụtara ọ dị ka osote minisita maka ụlọ ọrụ na azụmahịa
