Steve Bloom (a mụrụ n'afọ 1953) bụ onye South Africa na-ese foto na onye edemede

Nwa onye nta akụkọ, onye na-ede akwụkwọ, na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Harry Bloom, a maara ya nke ọma n'ihe banyere akwụkwọ foto ya na edemede ya yana nnukwu ihe ngosi ya n'èzí a na-akpọ Spirit of the Wild
A mụrụ Bloom na Johannesburg, South Africa
Mmasị izizi nke Bloom na foto sitere na foto ndị dị na magazin Life
N'afọ 1972, ọ zụrụ dị ka onye na-ebi akwụkwọ, ma were foto nke ndị bi n'okpuru usoro Apartheid
N'afọ 1977, ọ gara England ebe e bipụtara ọtụtụ foto ndị ahụ ma gosipụta ha na mba ụwa site n'aka The International Defence and Aid Fund

Ruo ọtụtụ afọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na eserese eserese, n'afọ 1999 ọ bụ onye na-ahụ n'ihe banyere mmejuputa atụmatụ Addison maka mpempe akwụkwọ gọọmentị gbasara egwuregwu Olympic n'oge okpomọkụ na Barcelona, 1992
Bloom bidoro ịse foto anụ ọhịa n'afọ1993 ógè ọ nọ ezumike na South Africa
N'afọ 1996, o tinyere oge ya niile na foto anụ ọhịa ma nọrọ afọ abụọ sochirinụ na-arụ ọrụ na akwụkwọ mbụ ya, In Praise of Primates, nke e bipụtara n'asụsụ iri

N'afọ 2004 Untamed, akwụkwọ buru ibu nke gosipụtara ụmụ anụmanụ sitere na kọntinent ụwa niile, e bipụtara ya na mbipụta asụsụ iri maka mbipụta mbụ ya, n'afọ 2006 o bipụtara akwụkwọ abụọ Elephant! na Spirit of the Wild
N'afọ 2006, ọ laghachiri na-ese foto ndị mmadụ

Living Africa, nke e bipụtara n'afọ 2008, bụ ọtụtụ foto na-ekpuchi ụfọdụ mba Afrịka, na-agwakọta foto nke anụ ọhịa, agbụrụ ndị dịpụrụ adịpụ na ndị nọ n'obodo ukwu, gụnyere ndị na-egwupụta ọlaedo 3 kilomita n'okpuru ala
Akwụkwọ nke abụọ nke Bloom n'ihe banyere Africa, Trading Places - The Merchants of Nairobi, gosipụtara ndị na-ere ahịa na mpaghara Nairobi, gụnyere Kibera
O bipụtala ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ụmụaka gụnyere My Big Cats Journal (Thames & Hudson), My Favourite Animal Families (Thames & Hudson) na Les animaux racontés aux enfants (Editions de la Martinière Jeunesse)
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2010, Bloom emepụtala ihe ngosi iri na otu n'èzí nke etiti obodo a na-akpọ Spirit of the Wild, nke ọ bụla nwere ihe ruru 100 nnukwu mbipụta ihu igwe
N'efu ma na-emeghekarị ọha na eze awa iri abụọ na anọ n'ụbọchị, isiokwu nke ihe ngosi ahụ bụ iji mee ka a mara màkà mmegide ebe obibi na ikpo ọkụ ụwa
Ihe ngosi mmeghe, na Birmingham, England, gbara ọnwa iri na otu na Centenary Square
Ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ sochiri na Copenhagen, Leeds, Amsterdam, Stockholm, Moscow, Dublin, Oslo, Stavanger, Barcelona, Edinburgh, Tokyo na Abbeville
Ihe ngosi Copenhagen mepere n'ubochí irí na isé n'ọnwa Mee n'afo 2006 ma mmadụ 1,019,028 letara ya n'ime ọnwa atọ mbụ
N'ọnwa June n'afọ 2012 London Festival of Photography gosipụtara ihe ngosi ya, Beneath the Surface South Africa n'ime afọ 1970s na The Guardian's gallery na London
Ihe ngosi ahụ gosipụtara ọrụ mbụ ya na apartheid South Africa, na-egosi oge dị egwu na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mba ahụ mgbe ngagharị iwe megide apartheid jidere
Steve Cannon (aprel,10, na afo 1935 Julaị 7, na afọ 2019) bụ onye edemede America na onye guzobere otu ọdịbendị A Gathering of the Tribes
A mụrụ Cannon na New Orleans, Louisiana wee kwaga New York City na 1962
A mụrụ Steve Cannon n'April 10, 1935 ma kpọọ ya Calvin Stanley Cannon

Mgbe ọ bịarutere n'etiti Great Depression, nwa nke asatọ nke Eugene Charles Cannon (September 1, 1900 -June ? 1992) na Lillie Victoria St Cyr Cannon (August 4,1905 - July 1, 1935), ọ taraghị ahụhụ ego dịka Eugene bụ onye na-ebu akwụkwọ ozi
Nke ahụ bụ ọrụ magburu onwe ya maka nwoke ojii n'oge ahụ
E mechara họpụta Eugene ka ọ bụrụ onye ozi Baptist
Lillie rụrụ ọrụ na James Lewis Elementary School tupu ọ lụọ di
N'oge ahụ, ụmụ nwanyị lụrụ di enweghị ike ịkụzi ụlọ akwụkwọ

Nne Calvin / Steve, Lillie, nwụrụ na July 1, 1935 site na nsogbu ọmụmụ1 Mgbe Lillie nwụsịrị, nne Eugene Patsy Payne Cannon na nwanne ya nwanyị, Rose Cannon kwagara n'ụlọ ezinụlọ na 3741 Willow Street iji nyere aka lekọta Calvin na ụmụnne ya asaa tọrọ ya Yvonne, Doris, Eugene, Jr, Naomi, Esther, Beverly, na Walter
Dị ka nwatakịrị, Calvin nwere nnukwu nsogbu ikwu okwu
Ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ ma ọ bụ itoolu, okwu ya enweghị nghọta, na-ada ka okwu mkparị
Ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe na-agaghị ekwe omume ịghọta ya na ụmụaka ndị agbata obi ga-achị ya ọchị iji wepụ abụba n'okpuru ire ya
N'ịbụ onye nwere nkụda mmụọ, ọ jụrụ ikwu okwu
Nwanne ya nwoke Walter, onye ji ọnwa iri na asatọ tọọ ya, ghọrọ onye nsụgharị ya

Mgbe Calvin / Steve dị afọ anọ, nna ya debara aha ya na Thomy Lafon Elementary School mana n'ihe na-erughị otu izu, e zigara ya n'ụlọ n'ihi na onye nkuzi ahụ kwuru na ya enweghị ike iso ya ma ọ bụ onye ọ bụla n'ime ụmụ klas ya kwurịta okwu
E doziri nsogbu ahụ mgbe nna ya mere ndokwa ka Walter soro ya nọrọ na klas
Ọbụna n'oge ahụ, Calvin / Steve bụ nwa akwụkwọ nwere ọgụgụ isi; nwere ike ịgụ ma dee ma mezue nsogbu mgbakọ na mwepụ ọ bụla
O ji ụzọ ụfọdụ gwọọ onwe ya wee malite ikwu okwu n'ụzọ doro anya dị ka onye ọ bụla ọzọ
Okwu ya sara mbara tụrụ ndị okenye ya n'anya
Walter chebere Calvin / Steve nke ukwuu
N'otu oge, Calvin / Steve jidere ụfọdụ kuki a machibidoro iwu na nne nne ya na-aga ịkụ ya ihe mana Walter, onye na-erubeghị anọ, jidere ogwe aka nne ya na'asị Ị nwere ike ịkụ ya ihe
Ọ bụ naanị obere nwa nwoke ma o nweghị ọbụna nne
A kụghị ya ihe n'ụbọchị ahụ ma ọ bụ n'ụbọchị ọ bụla ọzọ
Na June, 1941, Eugene lụrụ Theresa Elvira Boyd, onye bụkwa onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ
Nne na nwanne ya nwanyị siri ọnwụ na Lillie, nne Calvin, Calvin, Calvin nyere iwu ka ha zụlite Walter na Calvin / Steve
Eugene na Theresa kwetara
Walter na Calvin/Steve nọgidere na nne nne ha
Calvin nwetara ụmụnne ise ọzọ site na njikọ ọhụrụ ha bụ Robert, Edward, Evelyn, Harold Lloyd na Patsy
Calvin/Steve bụ onye na-eme njem
Otu ụbọchị n'oge ọkọchị, ya na ụmụ okorobịa ndị agbata obi gara, banye n'ụgbọ mmiri ochie, wee gbadaa na New Basin Canal
Ụmụ okorobịa ahụ amaghị na ụgbọ mmiri ahụ na-agbapụta ma malite imikpu
N'ụzọ ụfọdụ, ha rutere n'ala mana n'akụkụ nke ọzọ nke ọwa mmiri ahụ n'enweghị nghọta banyere otu esi ala
Otu onye uwe ojii kpọgara ha n'ụlọ
Eugene kwụrụ ụgwọ maka Calvin / Steve ịga Gilbert Academy, ụlọ akwụkwọ nkwadebe maka ụmụ akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ndị Africa America na New Orleans, Louisiana
Mgbe ọ mechiri na 1949, ọ gara n'ihu na McDonogh 35, ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ọha na eze maka ndị Africa America
Mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ na Air Force, Calvin / Steve họọrọ ịdebanye aha na ndị agha, ka o wee nwee ike ije ozi dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ
Ọ biri na London, England ruo afọ ole na ole wee laghachi New Orleans
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-enwe mmasị na nri na egwu n'obodo ya, ọ dị ya ka ọ na-egbu mgbu
Ọ chọrọ ịbụ onye edemede wee kpebie na New Orleans abụghị ebe ọ ga-arụ ọrụ
Mgbe ọ nọ n'usuu ndị agha, ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ malitere ịkpọ ya Steve, site na Steve Canyon, onye na-ese ihe nkiri
Calvin/Steve malitere iwebata onwe ya dị ka Steve mana ọ dịghị mgbe ọ gbanwere aha ya n'ụzọ iwu
Steve Canyon bụ ihe nkiri America na-atọ ọchị nke onye edemede na onye na-ese ihe Milton Caniff
Tupu ọ hapụ New Orleans, Steve zụrụ ụgbọ ala mbụ na naanị ya
N'ime njem ịkwọ ụgbọala si Baton Rouge lọta, ya na nwa nwanne nne mara mma, ọ gbara ụgbọala banye n'otu nnukwu osisi, na-ebibi ụgbọ ala ahụ kpamkpam
Ọ bụ ezie na Steve nwere obere mmerụ ahụ, nwa nwanne ya nwoke merụrụ ahụ nke ukwuu ma hapụ ya na nnukwu akara n'otu akụkụ ihu ya
Steve were iwe nke ukwuu n'onwe ya ma kpebie na ọ gaghị akwọ ụgbọala ọzọ
N'afọ 1962, Calvin / Steve kwagara New York City wee bụrụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke akwụkwọ edemede obodo ahụ
N'oge ikike obodo, ọ bụ onye otu Society of Umbra, otu ndị edemede ojii
Cannon kụziri ihe gbasara mmadụ na Medgar Evers College, na-enyere aka ijikọta usoro ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze na New York City

N'afọ 1969, Cannon dere akwụkwọ akụkọ Groove, Bang, and Jive Around, nke onye edemede Ishmael Reed kpọrọ onye na-ebute rap na onye edemede Darius James kpọrọ na New York Press 'onye na-eme ihe n'okpuru ala nke dị otú ahụ akụkọ ifo nke ndị ojii New York maara ihe mere eme gbanwere ọrụ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ akụkọ ifo obodo
Cannon, tinyere Joe Johnson na Ishmael Reed, malitere ụlọ obibi akwụkwọ onwe onye nke lekwasịrị anya na akwụkwọ ọdịbendị dị iche iche na 1970s nke a na-akpọ Reed, Cannon na Johnson
N'afọ 1973, ya na Reed rụkọkwara ọrụ ịgba onye edemede Black sci-fi mbụ, George S
Schuyler, ajụjụ ọnụ maka Yardbird II, mbipụta nke Reed
Cannon zutere enyi ya, onye na-ese ihe David Hammons n'elu oche ogige ntụrụndụ n'afọ ndị 1970
Ha abụọ jikọrọ aka n'ọrụ ụfọdụ, gụnyere Invisible Paintings, ebe Hammons jiri pensụl chọta ihe osise Cannon wee wepụ ọrụ anụ ahụ
Hammons tinyere abụ Cannon n'otu oge
Cannon dere uri banyere ọrụ Hammons ma mee ka ọ pụta n'ihu ọha
Cannon bụ onye nduzi nye ọtụtụ ndị edemede, gụnyere Eileen Myles, Norman Ohler, na Paul Beatty
N'afọ 2013, ya na onye nlekọta Lydia Y
Nichols gosipụtara na mkparịta ụka onye na-ese ihe banyere ahụ ndị isi ojii na mbata maka Curator's International

N'afọ 1990, Cannon na Hammons nọ na-eleta Nuyorican Poet's Cafe mgbe e nyere ya mmụọ nsọ ịmepụta A Gathering of the Tribes nke mbụ dị ka magazin edemede iji dekọọ ọdịbendị dị egwu na-eme na Lower East Side
E bipụtara mbipụta mbụ na ihe na-erughị 1000 na 1991 na igwe Xerox

Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 1993, Tribes toro ngwa ngwa n'ime ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na-enweghị uru nke ọtụtụ omenala na-ahụ maka nka na-arụ ọrụ site n'ụlọ ya na New York City nke mpaghara East Village nke Manhattan
Cannon chọrọ ka ọ bụrụ ebe ọdịbendị dị iche iche, ọtụtụ ọgbọ maka ndị na-ahụ maka nka na ndị na-eme njem

Ìgwè ahụ kwadokwara gallery na ebe ngosi ebe ọtụtụ ihe ngosi na kọntaktị mere, na-akwado ma na-akpali ọtụtụ ndị omenkà na ndị egwu ama ama dịka Sun Ra Arkestra (1995), David Henderson, Chavisa Woods, John Farris, Bob Holman, Ishmael Reed, Billy Bang, Diane Burns, Max Blagg, na David Hammons
Otu n'ime ihe ngosi Cannon na Tribes Gallery nke ọ kpọrọ Exquisite Poop sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke mmekọrịta ya na nka anya dị ka onye kpuru ìsì
Onye na-ese ihe gụnyere na ngosi ahụ ga-akọwa otu ihe nye ndị edemede na-ekere òkè, ndị ga-akọwara ihe osise ahụ maka onye na-ese ya dị iche nke ga-ese ya
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2014, a manyere ma nzukọ ahụ na Cannon ịkwaga ebe ọzọ ma mechie ụlọ ahụ kpamkpam mgbe nkwekọrịta obibi ha na nwanyị ahụ e rere ụlọ ahụ, Lorraine Zhang, kwụsịrị

N'otu oge ahụ, e wepụrụ mgbidi nke nwere ụfọdụ ihe osise nke David Hammons (nke a resịrị onye na-anakọta ihe osise na mbụ mgbe e mepụtara ya na ihe mbụ nke ihe ahụ ebufere) ma weghachite ya site na nzukọ ahụ ma jiri onye ọzọ dochie ya ma wepụ ihe ịchọ mma pedigree
Magazin Tribes malitere ibipụta n'ịntanetị ma Cannon bipụtara otu anthology na mpempe akwụkwọ na 2017
Cannon kpuru ìsì kpamkpam na afọ 1989 site na glaucoma
Cannon nwụrụ na Julaị 7, na afọ 2019, site na sepsis n'ụlọ ọrụ ndị nọọsụ na New York City mgbe ọ dị afọ 84
E chetaara Cannon na ihe omume atọ mgbe ọ nwụsịrị
Mbụ, e nwere agụmakwụkwọ ụtụ nke Bob Holman na Chavisa Woods haziri na Bowery Poetry Club n'izu mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, ebe ọtụtụ ndị ọgbọ ya, ndị ọrụ ibe ya, na ndị na-enwe mmasị nyere ihe ncheta

N'etiti ndị kwuru okwu ma ọ bụ mee ihe bụ; Katherine Arnoldi, Janine Cirincione, Patricia Spears Jones, Valery Oisteanu, Penny Arcade, Ron Kolm, Nina Kuo, William Parker, na Daniel Carter, nwanne nwanyị Cannon Evelyn Cannon, nwa ya nwanyị Melanie Best, Nancy Mercado, Steve Dalachinsky, Mike Tyler, na Urayoán Noel, yana Holman na Woods

Maka nnọkọ nke abụọ e mere na Septemba 6, 2019, na Flamboyan Theater na Clemente Arts for Art na A Gathering of the Tribes gbakọtara ọnụ iji nye mmemme ncheta nke gosipụtara uri na egwu gụnyere sendoffs sitere na Sun Ra Arkestra, Tracie Morris na Elliott Sharp na Graham Haynes, Anne Waldman, na Edwin Torres
Nke atọ, 'Celebration of Life' bụ nke Poetry Project mere na St

Mark's Church in-the-Bowery na Sunday November 3, 2019, nke emere emume olili ozu Jazz nke Rebirth Jazz Band duziri site n'obodo ya nke New Orleans malite n'ụlọ ya ogologo oge na 285 East 3rd street gaa n'ebe ememe
N'etiti ndị na-eto ma n'okwu ma n'egwú maka Cannon na ihe omume a bụ; Matthew Shipp, Paul Beatty, na Victor Hernandez Cruz
Steve Hofmeyr (a mụrụ na 29 Ọgọst 1964) bụ onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, onye edemede, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye bụbu onye na-eme ihe ngosi TV na South Africa
Ọ bụkwa onye egwu South Africa kacha baa ọgaranya
Hofmeyr lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Natasha Sutherland, onye ọ zutere na setịpụ Egoli Place of Gold n'afọ 1998
Ha mụrụ ụmụ nwoke abụọ
Hofmeyr nwekwara ụmụ nwoke abụọ na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ site na ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ
Di na nwunye ahụ gbara alụkwaghịm mgbe akụkọ banyere ọtụtụ ihe na-emetụta oge Hofmeyr n'ihe ngosi n'afọ 2008
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2008, Hofmeyr kwuru na ọ wakporo Esmaré Weideman, onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Huisgenoot, magazin Afrikaans a ma ama, site n'ịwụsa ya iko tii oyi na ngwụcha nke Miss South Africa
A sịrị na ọ boro ya na ndị nta akụkọ abụọ ndị ọzọ ụta maka ịgba alụkwaghịm ya na Sutherland
Miss Weideman mechara wepụ ebubo mwakpo ya
N'abalị 19 ọnwa Disemba afọ 2013, e jidere Hofmeyr na Bronkhorstspruit maka ịkwọ ụgbọala na 169 km / h na mpaghara 80 km / h ma hapụ ya na mgbapụta nke R500
E mechara kwụọ ya R10,000 n'ụlọ ikpe Bronkhorstspruit na 23 Jenụwarị 2014
Hofmeyr lụrụ Janine van der Vyver na 26 Jenụwarị 2014
N'afọ 2008, van der Vyver, onye nkuzi ahụike, kpughere na ha anọwo na-ahụ ibe ha kemgbe afọ iri
A mụrụ nwa ha nwanyị, Romy Lee, na 19 June afọ 2017
Nna nna Hofmeyr, Steve Hofmeyr Sr, bụ onye ndu na Ossewabrandwag
Hofmyer bụkwa Onye Kraịst kwusiri ike ma jee ozi afọ abụọ iwu kwadoro nke ọrụ agha achọrọ na South Africa n'oge ahụ
Steve Locke (amụrụ n'afọ 1963) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nké na-enyocha ihe oyiyi na nghọta nkè nwoke, na isiokwu nke nwoke na nwoke idina nwoke site na ise ihe
ihe osise, ihe ọkpụkpụ na nka ntinye
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Brooklyn, New York, ébé ọ na-akụzi na Pratt Institute
A mụrụ Locke na Cleveland, Ohio, ma zụlite ya na Detroit, Michigan
Ọ bụ ónyé Africa America
Ọ nọrọ n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2002 na Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculpture na Skow Hegan, Maine
Ọ natara MFA ya na Massachusetts College of Art and Design na 2001 ma nwee nzèrè bachelọ na Mahadum Boston na Massachusetts College nke Art and Design
Ihe osise Lockeʹs na-enyocha ihe a na-etinye na foto nwoke
Ọrụ ya nwèrè ọtụtụ foto nke ndị ikom - ruo ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri, ọ rụgharịrị otu mmegharị ahụ nke nwoke na ire ya na-anọdụ n'ọnụ ya
'Ọ na-esiri ike ime ihe osise nke nwoke ma ghara ime ka ọ dị mkpa
Ya mèrè, m bịara na mmegharị a dị egwu, 'Locke kọwara n'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Institute of Contemporary Art, Boston
'Ọ na-amasị m na ha abụghị ndị dike, na ha anaghị ejikọta ya na ahụ ọ bụla, 'ka o kwuru banyéré ihe ya, nke dị n'etiti ihe ọkpụkpụ na ihe osise
'Ha na-ese n'elu ikuku, na-echere inwe onye, ma ọ bụ banye n'ime isi gị ma gbanwee gị
' Ebumnuche ya bụ 'ime ihe osise nke ndị ikom na-adịghị ike, ma ọ bụ ndị a kpughere, n'ejighị ihe doro anya nke ịgba ọtọ'
Ọrụ ya na-akpali mkparịta ụka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, mmekọahụ na nka
Locke bụbu prọfesọ na Massachusetts College of Art and Design na Boston, ma na-akụzi ugbu a na Pratt Institute
E nyèrè Locke onyinye Art Matters, na-eleta Istanbul na 2007 iji hụ Blue Mosque na Hagia Sophia na mmasị pụrụ iche na ịchọpụta isiokwu ndị dị ka patterning, ịchọ mma, calligraphy, na eserese mgbidi
N'afọ 2008, ọ bụ prọfesọ nleta na ónyé na-ese ihe na Savannah College of Art and Design
Steve Randall Allen, amụrụ n'afọ 1954, bụ onye America na-ese ihe
A maara Maazị Allen màkà ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe nkè United States Olympic & Paralympic Committee, malite na 1996 Summer Olympics
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2021, Maazị Allen malitere atụmatụ ọtụtụ nde dollar iji nye onyinye nka ahọpụtara na kọleji na mahadum ndị Black Historically
Steve Stoute (amụrụ na June 26, 1970) bụ ónyé ọchụnta ego America na ónyé isi ndekọ
Stoute bụ ónyé guzobere na onye isi oche nke Translation, ụlọ ọrụ ahịa, na onye dere The Tanning of America How Hip-Hop Created a Culture That Rewrote the Rules of the New Economy
N'oge gara aga, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ egwu dị ka ónyé isi ndekọ America na onye njikwa ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2017, Stoute natara $ 70 nde site n'aka ndị na-etinye égo dịka Alphabet Inc
na Andreessen Horowitz iji malite UnitedMasters, ọrụ egwu
Site na 1990 ruo 1999, Stoute bụ ónyé isi na ọtụtụ akara na ụlọ ọrụ egwu
Na Interscope Geffen A&M Records, Stoute jere ozi dị ka ónyé isi oche nke ngalaba Urban Music na osote ónyé isi oche
Tupu ọ banye Interscope, Stoute bụ ónyé isi oche nke Urban Music maka Sony Music Entertainment, ébé ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ịmalite ọrụ egwu nke Will Smith
Stoute bụ ónyé njikwa mbụ nke Nas, Trackmasters na Mary J
Blige
Stoute wepụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ya The Tanning of America How Hip-Hop Created a Culture That Rewrote the Rules of the New Economy na 2011 site na Gotham Books

N'ime akwụkwọ ahụ, Stoute sitere na nzụlite ya dịgasị iche iche na ụlọ ọrụ egwu na ahịa ákàrà iji kọwaa otu ụdị nka na-amalite n'okporo ámá nke a na-ede iji kọwaa ọdịbendị ọbọdọ dị ka ngosipụta ọhụrụ nke ịdị mma
N'afọ 2008, Stoute na Mary J
Blige rụkọtara ọrụ iji guzobe Foundation for the Advancement of Women Now (FFAWN)
Ọkaikpe SB
Rhodes CBE
(1890–1951) bụ otu n'ime ndị nna guzobere ma ụlọ ikpe Naijiria yana ndị isi gọọmentị
N'abalị asatọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 1945, ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe nke abụọ a họpụtara na ụlọ ikpe Naịjirịa, ọnye nke mbụ bụ Justice Jibowu na onye nke atọ bụ Justice Adetokunbo Ademola
Dịka onye ọka ikpe ndi mbụ, O nyere aka nke ukwuu na mmepe nke iwu ikpe Naijiria, site n'ịgbanwe ụkpụrụ nke iwu Bekee, na ọdịnaya ha bara uru, na gburugburu ebe obibi Naịjirịa
N'afọ 1943, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na kansụl ndị isi nke Gọvanọ Sir Bernard H
Bourdillon; Tupu nke a, ọ dịghị onye Afrịka sonyere kpọmkwem na nhazi iwu na ọkwa ndị isi na Naịjirịa
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na kansụl omebe iwu na-anọchite anya ngalaba Rivers tupu a họpụta ya na kansụl ndị isi
Tupu ịbanye na kansụl omebe iwu, a kpọrọ SB Rhodes ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka iwu na-arụ ọrụ

N'abalị 21 ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1942, a họpụtara Rhodes dịka onye na-akwadoghị nke kansụl omebe iwu nke Naịjirịa, Ọ nọchitere anya ọdịmma dị iche iche na kansụl omebe iwu n'etiti afọ 1933 - 1943 na-anọchite anya ngalaba Rivers
Mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-akọwa ya dịka onye Nationalist
Na kansụl, ọ gbara mbọ ka ụlọ ọrụ Naịjirịa niile bụrụ mba
Ọ gbakwara mbọ ka ụlọ ikpe obodo nwekwuo nnwere onwe n'ihe gbasara njide siri ike nke ndị isi, site n'aka ndị ọrụ nchịkwa, iji chịkwaa ụlọ ikpe obodo
O kwusiri ike na ụlọ ikpe obodo bụ akụkụ na-enweghị afọ ojuju nke mgbanwe ikpe nke afọ 1933, ma kpọọ oku ka a tụleghachi Iwu Ụlọikpe Obodo na Nọvemba 1937
Na mbụ nke Jenụwarị, afọ 1943, Eze George nke Isii nyere Steven Bankole Rhodes, Esq nsọpụrụ nke ọchịagha nke Order -CBE
Maka ọrụ ọha na eze na Naịjirịa

Na 9 Ọktoba afọ 1945, Eze George nke Isii nyere ntụziaka maka nhọpụta nke Steven Bankole Rhodes CBE, ka a họpụta ya dịka onye ọka ikpe Puisne nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naịjirịa Ọ bụ onye ọka iwu Naijiria mbụ e buliri n'ọkwa Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu site na Bar, na-arụ ọrụ ya na 8th nke Nọvemba 1945
Ndị ọzọ nọ na Bench gụnyere, Puisne Judges - O
Jibowu ; AGb Manson ; Hms Brown ; CTAbbott ; W
Wells Palmer ; GG Robinson ; FW
Johnston ; EHallinan ; GR Gregg
Otu n'ime ikpe ndị a ma ama na esemokwu e wetara n'ihu ya bụ ikpe Heelas Ugokwe maka ịnwa igbu HM
Foot
Heelas Ugokwe, onye ọrụ nzipu ozi nke nọ n'etiti mmegide mba niile megide ndị na-emegide ọchịchị, mere mgbalị igbu onye isi odeakwụkwọ nke Colonial, Hugh Foot
O ji mma jack-knife maa ya n'azụ mana onye ozi napụtara Foot
N'ụlọ ikpe, Ugokwe kpughere na onye ọ na-achọ bụ Gọvanọ Britain, mana n'ihi na ọ pụghị iru ya, o kpebiri igbu Foot
O boro ndị Britain ebubo na ha na-egbu ndị Naijiria nakwa na ọ bụrụ na ndị isi Britain gburu ndị na-egwupụta coal na Naijiria nweere onwe ha, ọ hụghị ihe kpatara na a gaghị ahapụ ya
Nanị ihe ọ na-akwa ụta, ọ gwara Justice SB
Rhodes bụ na o nweghị ihe ịga nke ọma n'igbu Foot
Onye ọka ikpe nyere Ugowe ndụ kachasị
'N'ime akwụkwọ iwu nke Maazị S
Rhodes gụrụ na ụdị ebubo Ugokwe bụ nke ndụ tara ahụhụ' - Nnamdi Azikiwe
Ikpe ahụ kpasuru ndị Zikist iwe nke bịara were Helas dị ka onye mmeri maka nnwere onwe Naịjirịa
Ọkaikpe S
Rhodes bụ Chancelo nke Dayọsis na Niger, Anglican Communion
n'oge ahụ, dayọsis ahụ kpuchiri Eastern Nigeria, Mid-West, Kwara na Middle Belt
Louis Mbanefo nọchiri ya
Hon
Justice SBRhodes lụrụ Mabel Jones, ha nwere nwa nwoke SB Rhodes III na ụmụ nwanyị abụọ Gloria na Olga Rhodes
Ọ bụ nwanne nna nke Justice RWA Rhodes-Vivour na nwanne nna nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu Justice Bode Rhodes-Vivour
Otu onye ama ama na ngalaba na-ahụ maka mba Lagos, The Hon Justice SB
Rhodes gwara Tony Enahoro, na njedebe nke ọnwa Mee afọ 1947 na ya SB
Rhodes, na-atụ anya ọchịchị onwe ya n'oge ndụ ya
Ọ nwụrụ ka nkwadebe mba ahụ maka nnwere onwe na-aga n'ihu
Hon
Justice SB
Rhodes CBE nwụrụ na Nọvemba 1951 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii na otu
Steven Bosch (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị isii n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1978) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa (na-arụ ọrụ n'ụzọ bụ isi na foto, vidiyo na ceramik) na onye ndụmọdụ okike na Johannesburg
Ọ bụkwa onye nyocha na onye na-eme ihe ngosi na mmemme Afrikaans TV Sieners na ViaTV, ọwa ndụ South Africa
A mụrụ Steven Bosch na Johannesburg ma tolite na Florida na West Rand
Bosch mechara nzere B
Business Communication na Mahadum Potchefstroom n'afọ 2001 nakwa Masters na Development Communication na NWU n'afọ 2009
Site n'afọ 2004 ruo afọ 2014 ọ kụziri nkwukọrịta na NWU na Potchefstroom
Ọ bi na Johannesburg ugbu a
Dị ka onye na-ese ihe, Bosch sonyere n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu mba kemgbe afọ 2007
O nwere ihe osise na nchịkọta nka ọha na eze nke mba, dị ka NWU Art Collection yana nchịkọta onwe onye na gburugburu mba ofesi
O nwetara ihe nrite ụlọ ọrụ banyere okike nke ọma site na NWU n'afọ 2010 maka ihe ngosi ya, Stasis
Steven Chigorimbo (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 5 n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1951) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye nduzi
O nwere ihe nrite na ihe nkiri mba ụwa dịka Slavers, The Lost City of Gold, King Solomon's Mine, Jake Speed, Incident at Victoria Falls, Quartermaine na Cry Freedom
Na Zimbabwe, ọ bụ onye a ma ama maka ọrụ ya na soapie na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge, Studio 263, nke ọ bụkwa onye na-emepụta ya
Chigorimbo tolitere na Highfield Township, nke a na-ewere dịka ebe obibi nke ịhụ mba n'anya na Zimbabwe
A zụlitere nkà ya maka ime ihe nkiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na ihe nkiri ụka ruo mgbe ọ kwụsịrị mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ
Ọ lụrụ di ma gbaa alụkwaghịm ugboro atọ
O nwere ụmụ iri na anọ
N'ime ogologo ọrụ ya, nke malitere na mbido afọ 1970, a na-ewere Chigorimbo dịka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na Zimbabwe
O sonyere na ihe karịrị otu narị ọrụ ihe nkiri nke gụnyere ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na ihe ngosi, yana ihe nkiri soapie
N'afọ 2006, Zimbabwe International Film Festival Trust nyere Chigorimbo onyinye ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke mba ahụ
Site na ahụmịhe ya sara mbara, Chigorimbo anọwo na-alụ ọgụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri siri ike
Steven Charles Kanumba (8 Jenụwarị 1984 7 Eprel 2012) bụ onye Tanzania na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi nke ihe nketa Sukuma, a mụrụ na mpaghara Shinyanga

Kanumba nwụrụ n'afọ 2012 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na asatọ, nke a mara onye na-eme ihe nkiri Elizabeth Michael ikpe maka igbu ọchụ n'amaghị ama ma maa ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2017
E mere atụmatụ na ihe karịrị mmadụ 30,000 gara olili ozu ya
A kọwara ya dịka 'onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị ewu ewu na Tanzania', ma gosipụta na ihe nkiri Nollywood
A mụrụ Kanumba n'ezinụlọ Sukuma na mpaghara Shinyanga na Northern Tanzania
Nna ya bụ Charles Kanumba na nne ya bụ Flora Mutegoa
Kanumba nwere ụmụnne nwanyị atọ tọrọ ya
Ọ malitere ọmụmụ ya na Bugoyi Primary School wee gaa n'ihu na ọmụmụ nke abụọ ya na Mwadui Secondary School, mgbe e mesịrị ọ gafere na Voza Mission Secondary School
Ọ sonyeere Jitegemee High School maka agụmakwụkwọ dị elu
Ọ na-asụ asụsụ atọ nke ọma Swahili, Sukuma na Bekee
Kanumba malitere ime ihe nkiri n'afọ ndi 1990 na mmepụta ụka
N'afọ 2002, ọ sonyeere otu ihe nkiri Kaole Arts Group
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri telivishọn Jahazi na Dira ma mee ihe nkiri mbụ ya na Haviliki
N'afọ 2006, ọ zutere Nazz onye nyere ya ndụmọdụ na njikọ ndị ọzọ maka ọrụ ya
Ọ pụtara na Dar 2 Lagos (Nkebi nke 1) (Nkeji nke 2), ihe nkiri nke Mtitu Game nke jiri ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị ọrụ Tanzania na Naijiria mee ihe
Ọ pụtakwara na ihe nkiri She is My Sister, This Is It, na Love Gamble
N'afọ 2009, ọ bụ onye ọbịa pụrụ iche a ma ama na Big Brother Africa 4
N'afọ 2011, a kpọrọ Kanumba onye nnọchi anya Oxfam GROW
N'oge na-adịghị anya tupu ọnwụ ya, ọ nọ na-akwadebe maka ọrụ ihe nkiri Hollywood mbụ ya, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ 'onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị ewu ewu na Tanzania' ma pụta na ihe nkiri Nollywood
Kanumba nwụrụ mgbe ọ dara n'ime ụlọ ihi ụra ya n'abalị 7 ọnwa Eprel afọ 2012, o doro anya na ọ bụ mmerụ ahụ n'isi mgbe ọ dara ma kụọ isi ya na mgbidi
Elizabeth 'Lulu' Michael, enyi nwanyị dị afọ iri na asaa n'oge ahụ, e boro ya ebubo igbu ọchụ n'ihe metụtara ọnwụ ahụ
A kpọgara Kanumba n'amaghị onwe ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ Muhimbili National Referral Hospital ebe a kwupụtara na ọ nwụọla
E jidere Michael ma nọrọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ otu afọ maka nyocha
Ka e mesịrị, a gbanwere ebubo ndị ahụ ka ha bụrụ igbu ọchụ na-enweghị isi
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2013, e nyere Michael mgbapụta

N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2017 Ọ gbara akaebe n'ụlọ ikpe dị elu nke Tanzania na mgbe Kanumba zutere ya, o ji ike kpọga ya n'ọnụ ụlọ ya wee malite iji mma agha tie ya ihe mgbe ọ na-aṅụbiga mmanya ókè, o kwuru na Kanumba dara ma kụọ isi ya mgbe oji mma agha eti ya ihe
N'afọ 2017, a mara Lulu ikpe maka igbu ọchụ n'amaghị ama maka ọnwụ ya ma maa ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ abụọ
A gbanwere ikpe ya site na afọ abụọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ gaa na ọrụ obodo ma tọhapụ ya n'ụlọ ikpe na 12 Mee 2018, mgbe ọ nọsịrị ọ dịkarịa ala otu afọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
Ihe dịka mmadụ 30,000 bịara olili ozu ya gụnyere nwanyị mbụ nke Tanzania, Salma Kikwete, osote onye isi ala Dr
Mohamed Gharib Bilal, na minista omenala na egwuregwu, Emmanuel Nchimbi
E liri Kanumba na Kinondoni Cemetery
Stewart Edward 'Stew' Albert (December 4, 1939 ̊ 30 January 2006) bụ onye otu Yippies, onye na-emegide Agha Vietnam, na onye dị mkpa na New Left movement nke afọ 1960

Ọ bụ onye amụrụ na mpaghara Sheepshead Bay nke Brooklyn, New York, nye onye ọrụ New York City, ọ nwere ndụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị mma n'oge ọ bụ nwata, ọ bụ ezie na ọ so na ndị mere mkpesa maka ogbugbu Caryl Chessman
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Pace, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nkà ihe ọmụma, ma rụọ ọrụ nwa oge maka ngalaba ọdịmma nke ala New York
N'afọ 1965, ọ hapụrụ New York gaa San Francisco, ebe ọ zutere onye na-ede uri Allen Ginsberg na City Lights Bookstore
N'ime ụbọchị ole na ole, ọ na-arụ ọrụ afọ ofufo na Kọmitii Ụbọchị Vietnam na Berkeley, California
Ọ bụ n'ebe ahụ ka ọ zutere Jerry Rubin na Abbie Hoffman, ndị ya na ha guzobere Youth International Party ma ọ bụ Yippies
Ọ zutekwara Bobby Seale na ndị ọzọ Black Panther Party n'ebe ahụ wee ghọọ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị oge niile
Rubin kwuru n'otu oge na Albert bụ onye nkuzi ka mma karịa ọtụtụ ndị prọfesọ
N'etiti ọtụtụ ihe omume ya na ndị Yippies sonyere na ya bụ ịtụfu ego na veranda na New York Stock Exchange, Exorcism nke Pentagon, na mkpọsa onye isi ala nke 1968 nke ezì aha ya bụ Pigasus
Mgbe ejidere ya na afo 1968 Democratic National Convention ma kpọọ aha ya dị ka onye na-enweghị ebubo na-agba izu na ikpe Chicago Seven
Nwunye ya, Judy Gumbo Albert, kwuru, dị ka New York Times obituary ya si kwuo, nke a bụ n'ihi na ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya Berkeley Barb
Ka oge nke a gara , ọ ga-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ nzuzo nke Berkeley Tribe ma biri na obodo Tribe mgbe ọ na-agaghị maka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị

N'afọ 1970, ọ gbara ọsọ maka onye uwe ojii nke Alameda County, California, iji megwara maka 'ime ka a na-agbanye bọọlụ m na kemịkal na-ekpo ọkụ, na-egbu mgbu dị ka usoro ahụike a nabatara n'ụlọ mkpọrọ' mgbe e jidere ya n'afọ 1969

Ọ bụ ezie na onye nọ n'ọkwa, Frank Madigan, meriri ya, Albert nwetara vootu 65,000, n'ụzọ na-emegide onwe ya, n'asọmpi ya na onye uwe ojii nke lekọtara mkpọrọ mbụ ya n'oge ngagharị iwe nke Kọmitii Ụbọchị Vietnam na-emegiderịta iwu na etiti obodo Oakland
Mgbe Weather Underground nyeere Timothy Leary aka ịgbapụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ California, ebe a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ maka inwe LSD, Albert nyere aka ịhazi Leary ka ya na Eldridge Cleaver nọrọ na Algeria

N'afọ 1971, a kpọrọ ya n'ihu ọtụtụ nnukwu ndị ọka ikpe na-enyocha bọmbụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke US Capitol site na Weather Underground na Machị 1971, yana nkata aghụghọ nke Piggy Bank Six iji tụọ ọtụtụ alaka nke First National City Bank na Manhattan n'afọ gara aga
E boro ya ebubo ọ bụla
Na mbido afọ 1970, ya na nwunye ya gbara FBI akwụkwọ maka ịkụ wiretap iwu na-akwadoghị n'ụlọ ya
Ha meriri nkwekọrịta $ 20,000 ma, na 1978, a chụpụrụ ndị nlekọta FBI abụọ maka omume a
N'afọ 1984, ya na nwunye ya kwagara Portland, Oregon

Ha jikọrọ aka dezie otu akwụkwọ, The Sixties Papers Documents of a Rebellious Decade, nke chịkọtara ihe sitere na Civil Rights Movement, Students for a Democratic Society, ndị na-emegide agha, counterculture, na ndị inyom
Red Hen Press bipụtara akwụkwọ ncheta ya, Who the Hell is Stew Albert?, n'afọ 2005
Ọ na-elekọta Yippie Reading Room ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'ọrịa kansa imeju nke ọrịa ịba ọcha n'anya kpatara n'afọ 2006
Ụbọchị abụọ tupu ọnwụ ya, o dere na blọọgụ ya, 'Politiki m agbanwebeghị'
Na ihe nkiri 2000 Steal This Movie! Ọ bụ Donal Logue na-eme Albert
Steyn bụ aha nke nna Dutch
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
Steytler bụ aha nke nna a na-ahụkarị na mba South Africa
Ndị nwere aha a gụnyere ndia
Sthandiwe Kgoroge (amụrụ Sithandiwe Msomi ; 4 bụ onye omere South Africa pụtara na Generations, usoro 5 na 7 nke MTV Shuga, obere usoro MTV Shuga ALOnE Together na usoro Kgoroge mbụ nke Yizo Yizo
Kgoroge biri na Edmonton, Canada, malite n'afọ ise ruo iri
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Natal, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ihe nkiri
O kwuwo na ya gbasiri mbọ ike na ọdịdị onwe ya, mana emechara chọpụta oji ya ziri ezi
Ọ pụtara na usoro mbụ nke Yizo Yizo dị ka Zoe Cele na 1999
A matara ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-akwado kacha mma na usoro ihe nkiri maka ọrụ ma nweta Avanti Award
Ọ gbara ejima na Generation site na 1999 ruo 2005
Ọ pụtara na usoro 5 nke MTV Shuga dị ka nwanne nne Nomalenga wee laghachi na ọrụ maka obere usoro MTV Shuga Alone, nke gosipụtara nsogbu nke ọrịa COVID-19, na 20 Eprel 2020
N'oge usoro ihe odide ndị a na-akparịta ụka banyere ndụ n'oge mkpọchi
A na-ahazi obere usoro a maka abalị iri isii na ndị na-akwado ya gụnyere 'Every Woman Every Child'
Usoro a dabere na Nigeria, South Africa, Kenya na Cote D'Ivoire
Kgoroge lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Tony Kgoroge, ma ha nwere ụmụ
Mgbe chere mgbake ụgwọ n'afọ 2018, ọ kwụrụ ka ndị mmadụ leghara ibe Instagram ya na nwunye ya anya, na-ekwu na ha bụ naanị 'ụmụ amaala nkịtị'
Ọ na-eche na ọ ga-efunahụ ya n'ihi na ụfọdụ ndị mgbasa ozi anaghị akwụ ya ụgwọ ugboro ugboro
Sthandwa Nzuza (amụrụ 9 Febuwari 1984), bụ onye omere South Africa na onye na-ese redio DJ
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ na usoro ihe onyonyo dịka; Imbeleko, Uzalo and Ifalakhe
A mụrụ Nzuza na 9 February 1984 na obodo Inanda na KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị na 2002 na kọleji Cambridge
Ọ lụrụ Philani Gama, uko Chukwu Durban kemgbe 2017
N'afọ 2020, ọ gbara akwụkwọ ikpe nye di ya na ebu ya ebubo na ọ na-emegide ya
Na 2014, ọ pụtara dị ka onye ọbịa egosiputara na SABC1 music talk show Zaziwa
Na 2017 ọ gbara egwu na onyonyo nkiri na Mzansi Magic bu Imbeleko
N'afọ 2019, ọ pụtara na usoro ihe onyonyo abụọ Friendship na ihe nkiri Mzansi Magic usoro eHostela nwere ọrụ ugboro ugboro
Na 2017, o mere ọrụ ugboro ugboro nke 'Innocentia' na SABC1 ihe nkiri Uzalo
Ọrụ ahụ bịara bụrụ ihe egwuru ewu nke ukwuu wee gaa n'ihu na-aru ọrụ na oge nke atọ na nke anọ
Mgbe ihe ịga nke ọma ahụ gasịrị, Sthandwa rụrụ ọrụ onye ndu onyonyo mbụ ya dị ka 'Nomvula' na Mzansi Magic drama serial Ifalakhe na 2019
Ndị ọzọ na-abụghị ọrụ ndị a na-eduga, o mekwara ka onye ọbịa na-eme ihe nkiri n'usoro ihe onyonyo na sitcom dị ka; Mtunzinicom, My perfect family na Single Galz
Na 2020, o sonyeere na usoro Durban Gen na ọrụ 'Dr Zandile Mkhize'
Ewezuga ime ihe nkiri, ọ bụkwa DJ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ redio 'Ukhozi FM'

Victoria María Aragüés Gadea (amụrụ na 15 Eprel 1943), nke a makwaara dị ka Vicky Leyton na dị ka Sticky Vicky, bụ onye na-agba egwú na onye na-eme anwansi nke lara ezumike nká nke a maara maka ihe ngosi anwansi ya
Ihe ngosi ikpeazụ Vicky mere bụ n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke afọ 2015 mgbe o wepụtara nnukwu dildo site n'ihe ọ jị bụrụ nwanyị
A mụrụ ya na Santa Cruz de Tenerife na 15 Eprel 1943
Leyton na nne ya kwagara Barcelona mgbe nna ya hapụrụ ezinụlọ ahụ
Ọ gụrụ ballet oge ochie ruo afọ iri na ise, mgbe e mesịrị, ọ rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-agba egwú
Ya na nwanne ya nwanyị, onye contortionist, rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri egwu
Otu onye ọchụnta ego nyere ya aha egwuregwu nke Vicky Leyton, nke eji mara ya maka ndụ ya niile
Leyton mechara duzie El Molino, ụlọ ihe nkiri na Avinguda del Paral·lel na Barcelona

Mgbe ọnwụ Francisco Franco gasịrị, na mbelata nke nyocha mmekọahụ, Leyton nwere ihe isi ike; ọha na eze chọrọ ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ na-egosi mmekọahụ, ndị were mmadụ n'ọrụ malitekwara iwe ndị mba ọzọ dị njikere ịrụ ọrụ ịgba ọtọ
Otu onye majik tụrụ aro ka ọ rụọ ọrụ anwansi site n'iwepụ ihe ndị a na-adịghị ahụkebe n'ahụ ya
Mgbe o jiri ihe ndị dị mfe (dị ka akwa aka) na-eme ihe, Vicky gosipụtara ihe ngosi ya na cabarets nke Barcelona
Ihe ngosi ahụ gara nke ọma, ọ rụkwara ọrụ n'obodo ndị dị n'ebe ugwu Spain na ọtụtụ ụlọ ihe nkiri dị iche iche na mba ofesi
Na mbido afọ 1980, ọ na-agbaso ndụmọdụ nwanne ya nwanyị, Leyton kwagara Benidorm n'ụsọ oké osimiri Mediterenian
Ọ bụ ezie na o bu n'obi ịpụ ezumike mgbe ọrụ ya kwụsịrị, nwanne ya nwanyị mere ka o kwenye ịrụ ọrụ na họtel
Ihe ngosi Leyton gara nke ọma ma o kpebiri ịnọ na Benidorm, n'ihi mbata nke ndị njem nleta
Ihe ngosi Sticky Vicky malitere site na iwepụ uwe ya nke nta mgbe egwu na-agụ
O mechara wepụ ọtụtụ ihe site na akụkụ ahụ ya, nke gụnyere bọọlụ ping-pong, àkwá, akwa aka, sausages, agụba, na Machetes
Ìhè ndị ahụ gbara ọchịchịrị, Vicky wepụkwara bọlb ọkụ
O mechiri omume ya site na iji akụkụ ahụ ya nke nwanyị mepee karama biya, wụsa ya n'elu ikpo okwu
Leyton ekwughị na onwe ya ma ọ bụ ihe ngosi ahụ dị ka ihe na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ 'Iji mee ihe m na-eme ị ga-enwerịrị ihe dị ụtọ
Ọ dị mkpa inye ya aka nke ịma mma'
Vicky na-apụta ugboro isii n'abalị, abalị isii n'izu
N'afọ 2001, Vicky gbara onye na-eme ihe nkiri ibe ya, María Rosa Pereira (nke a maara dị ka 'Sexy Bárbara') akwụkwọ maka iji aha egwu Sticky Vicky
María Rosa, onye mere ihe ngosi yiri nke ahụ, debanyere aha Vicky jiri mee ihe ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Ọ bụ ezie na Vicky meriri n'ụlọ ikpe Benidorm, Audiencia Provincial nke Alicante kagburu mkpebi ahụ na mkpesa
Mana otú ọ dị, kpebiri na a ga-echebe aha ahụ n'ikpeazụ dị ka ọrụ egwu
Dị ka nnyocha nke afọ 2007 na akwụkwọ akụkọ mba Spain, El Pais, si kwuo, ihe karịrị nde mmadụ isii na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ ahụla ihe ngosi ya
N'afọ 2009, Audiencia Provincial nke Valencia kpebiri na María Rosa mere ihe n'ụzọ ọjọọ ma kpatara mgbagwoju anya site na ịdebanye aha ahụ, ma nye Vicky akara ahịa iwu maka aha ya
Vicky mere ihe ngosi ikpeazụ ya n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ 2015, ọtụtụ ụbọchị tupu ịwa ahụ n'úkwù
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2016, a chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa ọrịa kansa akpa nwa, ma kwupụta na ọ lara ezumike nká mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa na abụọ
Ọ lụbeghị di, o nwere otu nwa nwoke (Eduardo Romero Aragüés) na otu nwa nwanyị (María Gadea Aragüés)
María, onye hụrụ ihe ngosi ahụ na nke mbụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, mechara kpebie ịgbaso nzọụkwụ nne ya
N'ihi afọ ndụ ya na oge nke ihe ngosi ya, a na-ewere Vicky dị ka onye a ma ama nke Benidorm dị ndụ, ọkachasị site n'aka ndị njem nleta Britain
Leyton, nke ihe ịga nke ọma ya juru anya, dere na webụsaịtị ya, sị 'Echere m na m nwere ike ịnọ n'elu ikpo okwu n'oge m dị, ọ bụkwa ekele maka ndị Bekee'

Ọ bụ onye nkwado na nke mbụ na nke isii nke oge nke atọ nke British TV sitcom Benidorm A kpọbatara Vicky dị ka onye ọbịa nsọpụrụ iji mepee Mel's Mobility Shop na nke mbụ nke oge nke atọ na n'oge oge nke isii nke ihe ngosi ahụ, otu n'ime ihe odide ahụ, Jacqueline (nke Janine Duvitski na-eme), ga-agafe dị ka Sticky Vicky (onye nọ ezumike)
Na 'Jack The Lad', onye Irish na-ede uri Robert Fallon kọwara ihe ngosi Vicky
Gordon Matthew Thomas Sumner Àtụ Post-nominals (Amuru ya Na Onwa October 1951), ana kpokari Sting, bụ onye England na agụ egwu, onye Ọbụ abụ, onye edemede n'egwu na onye omee
Ọ bụ ya bụ onye n'ihu, onye edemede n'egwu na onye bassist ndi new wave rock band the Police site N'afọ 1977 rụo afọ 1986
Ọ malitere ọrụ naani ya N'afọ 1985 ma gụnyerekwa ụfỌdụ ihe gbasara rok, jazz, reggae, egwu oge gboo, afọ ohụrụ, egwu ụwa n'egwu ya

Dị ka onye na-agụ egwú solo na onye uwe ojii, Sting enwetala 17 Grammy Awards ọ meriri egwu nke afọ maka ' ume ọ bụla ị na-eku ', onyinye Briten atọ, gụnyere Best British Male Artist na 1994 na onyinye pụrụ iche na 2002, a Golden Globe, ihe Emmy na anọ nhọpụta maka Academy Award maka Best Original Song
N'afọ 2019, ọ nwetara ihe nrite BMI maka 'ume ọ bụla ị na-eku' bụrụ abụ kachasị egwu na akụkọ redio
Na 2002, Sting natara nrite nkè Ivor Novello màkà nweta ndụ sitere na mahadum Britain nke ndị na-agụ abụ ya na ndị na-ede edemede ma kpo atakwa ya na maara aha nke ndị na-agụ abụ
A kpọbatara ya na Rock and Roll Hall nke maara aha dịka onye otu ndị uwe ojii na 2003
N'afo 2000, ọ natara nrịte kpakpando na ije maara aha na Hollywood maka ndekọ
Na 2003, Sting nwetara CBE n'aka Elizabeth II na Buckingham Palace maka ọrụ egwu
Emere ya Kennedy Center Honoree na White House na 2014 wee nye ya ihe nrite egwu Polar na 2017
Stockholm, bụ isi oche Sweden
Na afọr 2016, Stockholm bụ obodo nke mmadụ 935,619 bi na ya
Livingstone Etse Satekla (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke ịse n'ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 1988), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ Stonebwoy, bụ onye Ghana Afropop, ụlọ ịgba egwu na onye egwu reggae
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Burniton Music Group
O meriri na Best International Act Africa category n'afọ 2015 BET Awards na Artist of the Year n'afọ 2015 Ghana Music Awards
Ọ bụkwa onye natara akara Billboard abụọ
A kọwara ya dị ka eze reggae na ụlọ ịgba egwu na Afrịka
Stonebwoy bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ebe ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Happy Death Day na aha m bụ Ramadan Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya zuru ụwa ọnụ maka ịdị ọcha
Na Septemba 2019, emere ya onye nnọchi anya nke Voltic Natural Mineral Water
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya Tecno mobile na Ghana
N'afọ 2022, ọ bịanyere aka na Universal Music Group's Def Jam Recordings, na ya bụ ọkọlọtọ Def Jam Recordings Africa
Ọ dị njikere ime abọm atọ n'okpuru akara ahụ
A mụrụ Stonebwoy 'stoneboy' na Ashaiman na mpaghara Greater Accra nke Ghana wee malite ịme egwu n'oge ọ malitere ịga akwụkwọ
Ọ ghọtara nkà ya na ikike ya dị ka onye na-ede abụ na onye na-ede edemede mgbe ọ dị obere, na-echeta edemede na ime ihe nkiri dị ka afọ nke anọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Methodist Day Secondary School n'otu afọ ahụ na rapper Sarkodie ebe ọ nwetara asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mahadum nke Professional Studies iji nweta nzere na ahịa na 2013
Satekla lụrụ Louisa Ansong Satekla, nwere ụmụ abụọ
Louisa bụ dọkịta ezé
Stonebwoy na-abụkarị ragga na Jamaican Patois (Patwa ma ọ bụ Patwah), a na-ewerekwa ya dị ka 'onye na-ese ihe dị iche iche' n'ihi ụdị egwu dị iche iche o nwere
N'afọ 2015, ọ natara ọtụtụ onyinye na nhọpụta sitere na 'Artist of the Year' ruo 'Album of the Year'
Abọm ya nke abụọ, Necessary Evil, bụ onye natara 3 Ghana Music Awards site na nhọpụta 6
Nana Appiah Mensah, onye isi ụlọ ọrụ na-ere ahịa ọla edo Menzgold, zigara Stonebwoy okwu agbamume na Instagram maka Stonebwoy ịkwado
Na 18 Eprel 2019, Nana Appiah Mensah biputere foto nke ụlọ ịgba egwu Stonebwoy na-ekwu na ọ dị mpako maka onye isi ala Bhim Nation maka ịgbachitere ya nakwa na Chineke gọzie ya
E depụtara ya dị ka akụkụ nke afọ 2019 (iri ise) ndị isi oche na-eto eto ịrị ise, site n'aka YCEO na Avance media
Ndepụta ahụ nke e bidoro na mbido afọ 2018, bụ nke e depụtara iji kwanyere ndị na-eto eto a ma ama ùgwù na-agbaso usoro nke inye ngwọta maka ụfọdụ nsogbu dị mkpa nke Ghana
Stonebwoy guzobere 'Ntọala Livingstone '
Na Jenụwarị 2017 ntọala ahụ kwupụtara ngwugwu nkwado maka ụmụ akwụkwọ ise nke Tema Methodist Day Senior High School, ụlọ akwụkwọ ya
Stonebwoy emepeela ụlọ ahịa ahịa BHIM na Ashaiman
A na-eji ego enwetara site na ụlọ ahịa ahụ iji kwado ihe omume nke Ntọala Livingstone
A kpọrọ Stonebwoy onye nnọchi anya Brand maka 'Big Boss' n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ihe ọṅụṅụ ike ọhụrụ
Na Septemba 2020, a kpọrọ Stonebwoy onye nnọchi anya Tecno Mobile ma kpughee Camon 16 Series na Ọktọba 2020
Stonebwoy malitere njem ụwa ya na mpaghara Euro n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2014
Ọ rụrụ na Germany, Italy, Spain na Austria
Njem Canada-America ya n'afọ 2016 hụrụ ya ka ọ na-eme ihe nkiri na New York City, Ohio, Philadelphia na Ontario
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ na-eme ka Perth, Melbourne, Brisbane na Sidney niile na Australia
Njem Euro nke abụọ ya hụrụ ya ka ọ na-aga Nordic iji mee ka ndị na-akwado ya nwee obi ụtọ na Denmark, Finland na Sweden na nkeji iri na ise ikpeazụ nke afọ 2017
Stonebwoy rụrụ na Reggae Sumfest, Afro nation festival na Portugal, Rotterdam reggae festival, Uppsala Reggae Festival
Rototom Sunsplash

N'abalị iri na asatọ nke ọnwa Mee afọ 2019, n'oge mbipụta nke iri abụọ nke Nrite Egwụ nke Vodafone Ghana, esemokwu bilitere n'etiti ndị na-eso ụzọ Stonebwoy na onye iro egwu ya bụ Shatta Wale na ndị na-akwado ya, nke mere ka Stonebwoy wepụta égbè n'elu ikpo okwu
E jidere ha abụọ ma jide ha n'echi ya
Ha abụọ pụtara n'ụlọ ikpe ebe ha kwuru na ha abụghị ikpe mara ha maka ebubo ha abụọ mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, e nyere ha mgbapụta nke GH ’50,000 nke ọ bụla
Ndị Charterhouse napụrụ ha ihe nrite ha nwetara n'abalị ahụ, ndị nhazi machibidoro ha iwu ruo mgbe ebighi ebi
Ha mere udo n'ụbọchị nke iri atọ n'otu ọnwa ahụ
E wepụrụ mmachibido iwu ya na ihe ngosi Awards na mbipụta nke afọ 2022 nke ihe ngosi ahụ
Satekla ewepụtala abọm studio anọ na ọtụtụ egwu ndị ọzọ kemgbe afọ 2012
N'okpuru 'Samini Music', Stonebwoy dekọrọ egwu mbụ ya 'Climax' nke gosipụtara Samini na 'Ghetto Love' nke gosipụtara Irene Logan
Egwu abụọ ahụ mere ka a họpụta ya na Ghana Music Awards
Mgbe ngosi a gasịrị, ọ wepụtara abọm izizi ya 'Grade 1 Album'
Abọm ahụ nwere egwu iri na asaa nke gosipụtara ndị ama ama na Ghana na
A tọhapụrụ ya na Nọvemba 23, 2014; ọ bụ abọm egwu iri abụọ na itoolu nke gosipụtara ụdị Sarkodie
Ọ gụnyere egwu dịka Baafira, Sneaky, Gbedegbede, Candy, mmekọrịta nke pull up, na Cant Cool
A tọhapụrụ ya na 12 Disemba 2017; Epistles of Mama raara nye nne Satekla nwụrụ anwụ aha ya bụ Oriakụ Catherine Lucy Aku Ametepe Satekla
Abọm egwu iri abụọ na anọ ahụ nwere Sean Paul, King Promise, Burna Boy
Abọm ahụ ruru ọnụ ọgụgụ iri na atọ (13) na chaatị Billboard n'elu abọm 200 n'ụwa niile
N'afọ 2018 'Epistles Of Mama (EOM)' bụ abọm nke abụọ kachasị mma n'ụwa dịka reggaeville si kwuo
YouTube kwanyeere Album ahụ ùgwù maka ịkụ ihe karịrị nde mmadụ iri

Stoyanka Kurbatova (née Gruycheva, Bulgarian Стоянка Курбатова, née Груйчева, a mụrụ na 18 Machị 1955) bụ onye Bulgaria na akwọ ụgbọ mmiri na onye mmeri Olimpik
A mụrụ ya na Plovdiv
Kurbatova, na asọmpi n'okpuru aha mbụ ya Gruycheva, ghọrọ onye mmeri Olimpik na 1976 na ihe omume coxless ụzọ abụọ ya na Siyka Kelbecheva
N'afọ 1980, o nwetara ọla nchara n'otu asọmpi ahụ
'Ihe ize ndụ ndị ọbịa' bụ echiche ma ọ bụ ịdọ aka ná ntị na ndị ọbịa niile nwere ike ịdị ize ndụ
Ọ bụ ihe atụ nke ụjọ omume nke ndị mmadụ na-enwe banyere onye ọ bụla ha na-amaghị na ọha mmadụ
Ebumnuche ahịrịokwu a bụ iji gosipụta ihe ize ndụ metụtara ndị okenye ụmụaka na-amaghị
Okwu a ejirila ọtụtụ ihe ma ọtụtụ ụmụaka ga-anụ ya n'oge ndụ nwata ha
E tinyela ọtụtụ akwụkwọ, ihe nkiri na ọkwa ọrụ ọha na eze iji nyere ụmụaka aka icheta ndụmọdụ a
A katọrọ echiche a maka ileghara anya na ọtụtụ ntọrọ ụmụaka na mmerụ ahụ na-esiteghị n'aka ndị bịara abịa, kama ọ bụ onye nwatakịrị ahụ maara
Ọ bụ ezie na e nwere ihe ize ndụ ndị ọzọ dị ka ịtọrọ mmadụ maka mgbapụta, isi iyi egwu nke mgbasa ozi ihe ize ndụ ndị ọbịa na-emetụta bụ mmetọ ụmụaka
Ihe ngosi na mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi na-eme ka egwu ọha na eze na-atụ ndị bịara abịa dị ka ndị nwere ike ịbụ ndị na-edina ụmụaka, n'agbanyeghị na mmetọ ụmụaka nwere ike ime n'ime ezinụlọ
N'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, [mgbe?] mmesi ike nke mkpọsa ndị dị otú ahụ agbanweela, iji gosipụta ihe ize ndụ nke mmetọ site n'aka ndị nwatakịrị maara
Ọ bụ ezie na e nwere ihe ize ndụ ndị ọzọ dị ka ịtọrọ mmadụ maka mgbapụta, isi iyi egwu nke mgbasa ozi ihe ize ndụ ndị ọbịa na-emetụta bụ mmetọ mmekọahụ
N'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, [mgbe?] mmesi ike nke mkpọsa ndị dị otú ahụ agbanweela, iji gosipụta ihe ize ndụ nke mmetọ nke ndị nwatakịrị ahụ maara
Okwu ụmụaka ga-anụkarị gụnyere

Ụfọdụ ndị na-akwado ihe ize ndụ nke onye bịara abịa na-atụ aro ịgwa ụmụaka na ọ dị mma ịgwa ndị bịara abịa okwu n'ọnọdụ ebe nwatakịrị nọ n'ihe ize ndụ, dịka ma ọ bụrụ na nwatakịrị ahụ furu efu ma ọ bụ merụọ ahụ
N'ọnọdụ ndị dị otú ahụ, izere ndị ọbịa nwere ike inye aka nwere ike, n'onwe ya, dị ize ndụ
N'aka nke ọzọ, ndị ọzọ na-akwado ịdọ aka ná ntị banyere ihe ize ndụ na-atụ aro ịkụziri ụmụaka ka ha ghara ịgakwute ndị ọzọ n'enweghị ikike nne na nna
Ndụmọdụ a na-agbatị na ịghara ịbanye n'ụgbọala, ọ bụrụgodị na nwatakịrị ahụ amata onye ọkwọ ụgbọala ahụ

Na mgbakwunye na ịdọ aka ná ntị dị ize ndụ nke ndị ọbịa, mmemme sitere na Federal Bureau of Investigation, ụlọ ọrụ ndị mmanye iwu obodo na òtù ndị ọzọ na-enye ọrụ mkpịsị aka n'efu nke a na-emekarị n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ebe nlekọta ụmụaka, ụlọ ahịa, ihe ngosi, na ememme
A na-enye ndị nne na nna / ndị nlekọta akwụkwọ njirimara ụmụaka iji mee ihe n'ọnọdụ ịtọrọ ụmụaka na ọnọdụ mberede ndị ọzọ
Mpempe akwụkwọ njirimara ụmụaka gụnyere mkpịsị aka nwa ahụ, foto na data nkeonwe ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụghị ndị nchekwa FBI ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ mmanye iwu ọ bụla ọzọ na-ejigide ozi a
A na-enyekwa ndị nne na nna DNA samples

N'oge ogbugbu Leiby Kletzky n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2011, onye isi obodo steeti New York bụ David Greenfield kwuru na ọ ga-atụ aro 'Leiby's Law', ụgwọ nke ụlọ ọrụ nwere ike iwepụta onwe ha ka a họpụta ha dị ka ebe nchekwa maka ụmụaka furu efu ma ọ bụ ndị ọzọ nọ na nsogbu
Ndị ọrụ ga-anwale nyocha ndabere na ndị nwe ụlọ ahịa ga-etinye mpempe akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na windo ụlọ ahịa ha ka ụmụaka wee mara na azụmahịa ahụ bụ ebe dị nchebe iji nweta enyemaka
N'abalị iri na isii (16) n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2011, ụlọ ọrụ onye ọka iwu mpaghara obodo Brooklyn kwupụtara mmemme yiri nke a kpọrọ 'Safe Stop'
Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2011, ụlọ ahịa 76 debanyere aha iji gosipụta mpempe akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ 'Safe Haven' na windo ha iji nyere ụmụaka furu efu aka
Karịsịa banyere mmetọ ụmụaka, ihe ize ndụ kasịnụ na-abịa site n'aka ndị ezinụlọ nwatakịrị ahụ
Ka o sina dị, 'ihe ize ndụ ndị ọbịa' yikarịrị ka ọ ga-abụ ihe a na-elekwasị anya n'isi akụkọ na mgbasa ozi agụmakwụkwọ

Dị ka Ngalaba Ikpe Ziri Ezi nke mba United States si kwuo, ọtụtụ ụmụaka na-efu efu bụ ndị na-agba ọsọ, na pasentị iri itoolu na itoolu (99%) nke ụmụaka a tọọrọ bụ ndị ikwu, na-abụkarị nna na-abụghị onye nlekọta
Na nzaghachi na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị a, National Center for Missing and Exploited Children agbanweela mkpọsa ha na-elekwasị anya na 'ihe ize ndụ ndị ọbịa'

A na-akatọkwa ụmụaka aka ná ntị mgbe niile banyere ihe ize ndụ nwere ike ime n'ụdị ndị bịara abịa maka ịgbasa enweghị ntụkwasị obi n'ụzọ na-enweghị isi, ọkachasị mgbe ị na-atụle na (dịka ọmụmaatụ) na mba US, a na-akọ na ihe dị ka ụmụaka 800,000 na-efu ma ọ dịkarịa ala nwa oge kwa afọ, mana ọ bụ naanị 115 'ghọrọ ihe a na-ele anya dị ka ntọ ndị ọbịa' Naanị pasentị iri (10%) nke ndị na-emegbu ụmụaka na mpụ ime ihe ike bụ ndị bịara abịa, na mpụ mmekọahụ bụ mpụ ndị na-enweghị ike ịgụnye ndị bịara abịa dị ka ndị na-eme ihe
Nnyocha e mere n'afọ 2002 lere anya n'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ụmụaka 800,000 ndị a kọrọ na ha furu efu n'ime otu afọ
Ọtụtụ bụ ndị gbapụrụ agbapụ

Ihe dị ka pasent iri abụọ na ise bụ ntọrọ ezinụlọ, ihe dị ka pasent asaa bụ ntọrọ na-abụghị nke ezinụlọ, na naanị 115 - ihe dị ka otu n'ime ụmụaka 10,000 nke ụmụaka niile a kọrọ na ha furu efu - bụ “‘ntọrọ mmadụ na-enweghị atụ,' akọwapụtara n'otu nnyocha dị ka 'ntọrọ na-abụghị nke ezinụlọ nke onye maara ya ma ọ bụ onye ọbịa mere nke a na-ejide nwatakịrị n'otu abalị, na-ebuga ya ma ọ dịkarịa ala kilomita iri ise, jide ya maka mgbapụta ma ọ bụ tọọrọ ya n'ebumnobi ime ka nwatakịrị ahụ na-adịgide adịgide, ma ọ bụ gbuo ya' Onye nta akụkọ bụ Stephen J
Dubner, onye so dee Freakonomics, zoro aka na ọnụ ọgụgụ a dị ka ihe atụ nke isi ihe ya na 'ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ dị egwu na nyocha ihe ize ndụ
Ha na-ekwukarị ihe ize ndụ nke ihe omume dị egwu na nke a na-atụghị anya ya na mmefu nke ihe omume ndị na-ahụkarị ma na-agwụ ike (ma ọ bụrụ na ọ na-emebi emebi)

N'ọnọdụ ebe nwatakịrị ahụ nọ n'ihe ize ndụ n'ihi ihe ndị ọzọ, izere ndị bịara abịa (ndị nwere ike inye aka) nwere ike ịdị ize ndụ n'onwe ya, dịka n'ihe banyere Boy Scout dị afọ iri na otu nke na-ezere ndị na-achọ nnapụta n'ihi na ọ na-atụ egwu na ha nwere ike ịchọ 'izuru' ya

Dị ka Mahadum nke New Hampshire's Crimes Against Children Research Center si kwuo, 'ihe ize ndụ nke onye ọbịa' na-eme ka egwu ndị bịara abịa na-arịwanye elu ma e jiri ya tụnyere egwu nke ndị na-emegbu ụmụaka ahụ maara
Nke a bụ n'ihi na ụmụ mmadụ ga-arụ ọrụ na ndabere nke ntụkwasị obi na mmeghachi omume na ndị enyi ma ọ na-esiri ike ile ndị enyi anya dị ka ndị na-eyi egwu ma ọ bụ ịtụ egwu ha egwu
A katọrọ echiche nke 'ihe ize ndụ nke onye ọbịa' maka itinye ụmụaka dị ka ihe ndị na-adịghị arụ ọrụ nke iyi egwu nke na-enye ndị okenye ohere ịkwado ụzọ ha si achịkwa ma ọ bụ kewapụ ụmụaka

Gill Valentine na-arụ ụka na ịmepụta ozi na-eduhie eduhie ma ọ bụ ikwubiga okwu ókè banyere 'ihe ize ndụ ndị ọbịa' na-akpata echiche na ebe ọha na eze bụ ebe ndị okenye ebe a ghaghị ichebe ụmụaka mgbe niile

Egwu dị oke egwu nke 'ihe ize ndụ nke ndị ọbịa' emeela ka ọtụtụ ndị nne na nna belata ikike ụmụaka inwe ike imega ahụ, dịka site n'inyocha agbata obi ha n'enweghị nlekọta; dịka ọmụmaatụ, ndị nne na nna ole na ole na-enye ụmụaka ohere ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ naanị ha karịa n'oge gara aga
Mmasị a na-arịwanye elu nke ime ka ụmụaka nọrọ n'ime ụlọ emeela ka ụmụaka nwee nsogbu a na-ekwu na ha
Na mba United Kingdom, ihe ize ndụ ndị ọbịa abụwo isi okwu na nchekwa ụmụaka

A hụla ihe ize ndụ nke nwatakịrị ịbụ onye bịara abịa na-emegbu ma ọ bụ gbuo ya dị ka isi ihe na-eme ka ụmụaka ghara inwe nnwere onwe site na etiti narị afọ nke iri abụọ gaa n'ihu, ọ bụ ezie na ihe ndị gụnyere mpụ ndị ọzọ yana mmụba okporo ụzọ (ịbawanye ihe ize ndụ nke ịbụ onye a na-agba ọsọ) ka ihe ndị na-eme ka ndị nne na nna na-echebe ụmụ ha n'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya

Ọtụtụ ndị hụrụ ikpe Ian Brady na Myra Hindley nke ogbugbu Moors n'afọ 1966 dị ka ihe omume nke mere ka ndị nne na nna kwe ka ụmụ ha ghara inwe nnwere onwe - yana ime ka ndị nne na nna na ụmụaka mara eziokwu ahụ bụ na e nwekwara ụmụnwanyị dị ize ndụ yana ụmụnwoke dị ize ndụ

Nwanne nwoke nke otu n'ime ndị Brady na Hindley metụtara chetara ọtụtụ afọ mgbe e mesịrị na a dọrọ nwanne ya nwoke e gburu egbu aka ná ntị mgbe niile ka ọ ghara ịnakwere swiiti ma ọ bụ ihe n'aka ndị ikom na-amaghị ama, mana ọ dịghị mgbe a gwara ya ka ọ ghara ịgwa nwanyị na nwanyị na-amaghị okwu ma ọ bụla, ebe ọ bụ na mmadụ ole na ole n'oge ahụ maara na nwanyị na-amaghị ama nwere ike ịdị ize ndụ dị ka nwoke na-amaghị ama

Ọ bụ ezie na a na-akọkarị igbu ụmụaka na Britain tupu Moors Murders apụta ìhè, eziokwu ahụ bụ na nwanyị tinyere aka bụ ihe doro anya na ikpe ahụ ji dị elu na mgbasa ozi na anya ọha na eze - ma nọgide na-adị otú ahụ n'afọ ndị na-abịa n'ihu, n'agbanyeghị ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke ikpe igbu ọchụ ndị ọzọ dị elu nke mere isi akụkọ
Onye mbụ n'ime mmadụ ise Brady na Hindley maara, Pauline Reade, bụ ọbụna onye agbata obi Myra Hindley
Otú ọ dị, Brady na Hindley amaghị mmadụ anọ ndị ọzọ ahụ

N'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, igbu ụmụaka 'ihe ize ndụ' gụnyere nke ọ dịkarịa ala ụmụ agbọghọ anọ site n'aka Robert Black n'oge afo 1980s, na nke Sarah Payne na obodo West Sussex n'ọnwa Jụlaị afọ 2000, nwere ike ime ka ndị nne na nna na-echebe ụmụ ha - yana ịkpali ndị nne na nna na ndị nkụzi ime ka ụmụaka mara ihe ize ndụ nke ndị bịara abịa

Black bụ onye ọbịa nke dọtara ndị o metụtara site n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke Britain mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọkwọ ụgbọ oloko, ebe onye gburu Sarah Payne bụ Roy Whiting amaghị onye ahụ ma ọ bụla n'ime ezinụlọ ya, onye kwadoro nke a nye ndị uwe ojii mgbe Sarah Payne ka na-efu ma bụrụ onye mbụ a chọpụtara Whiting dị ka onye a na-enyo enyo
Otú ọ dị, ọnụ ọgụgụ nke gọọmentị na ndị uwe ojii gosipụtara na igbu ụmụaka 'ihe ize ndụ ndị ọbịa' dị oke ụkọ, nakwa na ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke mmetọ ụmụaka na igbu ọchụ bụ onye nwatakịrị ahụ maara

Ogbugbu Soham na Cambridgeshire, ebe a hụrụ ụmụagbọghọ abụọ dị afọ iri nwụrụ izu abụọ ka ha nwụsịrị n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2002, bụ ihe atụ a ma ama - onye gburu ụmụ agbọghọ ahụ, Ian Huntley, bụ onye ndị ọ metụtara maara, ọrụ ya dị ka onye nlekọta ụlọ akwụkwọ obodo nwere ike igosi ya dị ka nwoke nwere ọnọdụ ntụkwasị obi, onye na-agaghị eyi ka ọ bụ ihe ize ndụ nye ụmụaka ma ha maara ya ma ọ bụ na ọ bụghị
Ndị uwe ojii kwudịrị ndị mgbasa ozi mgbe ụmụ agbọghọ ahụ ka na-efu na ọ ga-abụ na onye ha maara tọọrọ ha

E jidere Huntley ihe dị ka awa iri na abụọ tupu a hụ ozu ụmụ agbọghọ abụọ ahụ, ọ bụ ezie na ruo mgbe mmepe a, ọtụtụ ọha na eze na ndị mgbasa ozi nwere ike ikpe na ụmụagbọghọ ahụ na-apụ n'anya dị ka ịtọrọ 'ihe ize ndụ nke ndị ọbịa'

Ogbugbu ụmụaka ndị sochirinụ, gụnyere nke Tia Sharp na South London na April Jones (onye a hụbeghị ozu ya) na Mid Wales n'afọ 2012, gosikwara na ọ bụ ndị ikom maara onye ahụ mere ya - n'ihe banyere Tia Sharp, ogbu ọchụ ahụ bụ onye òtù ezinụlọ

Enwekwara ikpe igbu ọchụ ebe onye ahụ bụ nwatakịrị tọrọ ya ma ọ bụ onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma nke nnwere onwe ya dị ukwuu (ma e jiri ya tụnyere nkezi nwa na-eto eto) mere ka ọ ghara ikwe omume maka ndị uwe ojii ịchọpụta ma onye ahụ gburu ya maara onye ahụ
Otu ihe atụ a ma ama bụ Amanda Dowler, onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma nke Surrey nke furu efu n'ọnwa Machị afọ 2002 ma hụ ozu ya na Hampshire ọnwa isii ka e mesịrị

Levi Bellfield, onye nọworị n'ụlọ mkpọrọ ndụ maka igbu ọchụ abụọ ọzọ, a mara ya ikpe maka igbu ọchụ ya ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri ka e mesịrị, ndị uwe ojii kwuru na ọ nwere ike ịbụ na ọ maara Bellfield dịka ọ bụ nna nke otu n'ime ndị enyi ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ

N'afọ 2005, onye agbata obi ya dị anya bụ John McGrady gburu Rochelle Holness dị afọ iri na ise (15) ma mebie ya na ụlọ kansụl dị elu na obodo South London, mana dịka ọ dị n'ihe banyere Amanda Dowler, ndị uwe ojii enweghị ike ikwenye ma Rochelle Holness maara onye gburu ya

Nke a bụ ụkọ nke 'ihe ize ndụ ndị ọbịa' ịtọrọ na igbu ụmụaka na United Kingdom, na n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2015, ndị nkatọ katọrọ vidiyo n'ịntanetị nke na-egosi ihe ize ndụ nke ndị bịara abịa na ọnọdụ ndị nwere ike ịtọrọ mmadụ, n'ihi mpụ ndị a dị ụkọ
N'ezie, ogbugbu Sarah Payne afọ iri na ise tupu mgbe ahụ nwere ike ịbụ ogbugbu kachasị ọhụrụ nke nwatakịrị na-erubeghị afọ iri na ụma site n'aka onye bịara abịa na Britain

Strangers in Their Own Land Anger and Mourning on the American Right bụ akwụkwọ edere n’afo puku iri na isii nke onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya bù Arlie Russell Hochschild dere
Akwụkwọ ahụ malitere ịkọwa echiche ụwa nke ndị na-akwado Tea Party movement na obodo Louisiana
Torrance Esmond, onye amara aha ya bụ Street Symphony, bụ onye America record producer and music executive from Memphis, Tennessee
N'ịkewa ntorobịa ya n'etiti Memphis na Nashville, a manyere Street Symphony ịchụso ọrụ na egwu mgbè ọ kiriri egwu Outkast
Site na ndị bi n'ime ụlọ nwere ngwá ọrụ, ónyé ọchụnta ego Sean Combs malitere ịkụ ọkpọ site na iji turntables na drum machines na-akụ ọkpọ n'abalị n'ụlọ óbíbí ya na Middle Tennessee State University
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ, Street ji ọhụụ ya nke ịbụ ónyé ama ama na Injinia Eletrik mee ihe
N'ikpeazụ, ọ gbanwere ndị isi, guzobe otu Hip-Hop a ma ama Player Way na ezigbo ndị enyi Mike Sean na Lonnel Matthews wee banye
Site n'ịrụ ọrụ na nnọkọ kọleji, Street Symphony & Player Way nwetara nkwanye ùgwù na ndị na-akwado ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ, yana mpaghara ndị gbara ya gbụrụ-gbúrụ
Ndị mmadụ chọpụtara, site na onye nkuzi mbụ nke Street Carlos '6 July' Broady, ruo ónyé mmeri NBA Gary Payton, onye bịanyere aka na onye mmepụta ya na Rock Solid na 2005
Ọ bụ n'ebe ahụ ka Street Symphony matara onwe ya na nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ, na-eme ka ụda olu mbụ ya na ndị dị ka Yo Gotti na Starlito, ndị na-eme mfegharị na nkwekọrịta Cash Money Records
Oge abalị, njem, na ọsọ na-adịghị agwụ ike nyere Street Symphony oche onye nduzi n'ihe omume ahụ, ka ọ na-emezi ụdị egwu ya dị iche iche, nke pụrụ iche
N'ịkwado ọnụnọ ya na Tennessee, Street Symphony nwere mmasị na Houston hustle
Ka ndị na-ese ihe dị ka Paul Wall, Chamillionaire, na Mike Jones na-eru ọla edo na platinum, Street chetara na-eche, 'Ka m jide ebili mmiri a'
Ka ọ na-ehi ụra n'ala enyi ya H-Town, na-arụ ọrụ ụbọchị, ma na-etinye ógè ezumike n'ọrụ ya, ọ na-agbakọta iji zụta egwu ya na ndị omenkà ọ bụla ọ nwere ike iru
'N'uhuruchi, m ga-apụ ma na-agba ọsọ
Aga m aga Guitar Center, n'ime ụlọ DJ, ma kpọọ egwu m ka ónyé ọ bụla wee nụ
' Ndị na-ese ihe n'ógbè ahụ nwéré mmasị, yana kpakpando dị ka Lil 'Keke nke Screwed Up Click
Mgbè afọ abụọ nke ịrụ ọrụ na ndị ọrụ dị ka osote ónyé isi oche nke A&R, ọ hapụrụ Reach Records ma na Febụwarị 2014 malite ụlọ mbipụta nke ya, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta / akara, Track Or Die
Strijdom van der Merwe (amụrụ n'afọ 1961) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke na-eji ihe ọ chọtara na saịtị ahụ mepụta ọrụ nka ya
Ihe ndị o ji rụọ gụnyere ájá, mmiri, osisi, nkume na nkume
Site n'ịkpụzi ihe ndị a n'ụdị geometric, ọ na-ejikọta ọdịiche dị n'etiti ọrụ nka na gburugburu ebe obibi, uto na mbibi
Ọrụ Van Der Merwe na-enwekarị 'nwere onwe' n'echiche na ọ nwere ike imeghachi omume na okike, mana n'ime ihe gbasara 'okike nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu n'ebe ị nọ, karịa gị na okike'
Saịtị ahụ, na ihe ndị ọ na-enye, ga-ekpughere onwe ha nye gị dị ka onye na-ese ihe ka ị na-aga n'ime ọhịa, ma ọ bụ n'akụkụ osimiri, ma ọ bu na Karoo
Ọ bụ naanị mgbe ahụ ka echiche na usoro ọrụ ga-amalite
Ọ bụ usoro nke iji ihe okike ị na-ahụ na saịtị rụọ ọrụ
Ọ dịghị ihe a na-eme atụmatụ n'ihu ya niile na-eme n'oge na-adịghị anya ka ị na-aga
Van Der Merwe gụrụ nka na Mahadum Stellenbosch, na South Africa, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ gbasara obibi akwụkwọ na Utrecht na ihe ọkpụkpụ na Prague
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ese ihe oge niile na Kent Institute of Art and Design na Canterbury, England
A na-egosikarị ọrụ Van Der Merwe na gallery na South Africa
O meela ọrụ n'ụwa niile, nke gụnyere Turkey, France, Belgium, Sweden, Japan, Italy na Australia
E mere ihe ngosi na ọrụ na ịkpọ oku na South Korea, Turkey, Belgium, France, Sweden, Lithuania, Japan, Australia, Germany, England na Italy
O mere ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nke onwe ya na ụlọ ngosi nka dị iche iche n'afọ ndị gara aga ma ọtụtụ ndị na-anakọta ihe na ọha na eze zụtara ọrụ ya
O nyela ihe ọkpụkpụ maka ndị a Europo Parkos na Lithuania; Art Park na Art Sella, Borgu Falsugano na Ịtali; Floating Land, Brisbane, Australia
N'afọ 2002 ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka Spier Outdoor Sculpture Biennale mbụ ya na Jan Marais Nature Reserve na Stellenbosch
E mepụtara ihe ncheta ya nke afọ 2001 Reconciliation na United Nations Memorial Cemetery na Busan, South Korea dị ka akụkụ nke International Sculpture Symposium
Van Der Merwe bụ onye guzobere South African Land Art Biennale nke mbụ, nke akpọrọ Site_Specific, na-enye ndị na-ese ihe ikpo okwu na ohere itinye aka na nka na ala
Biennale mbụ bụ na Plettenberg Bay na 2011, na biennale nke abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọst 2013
Strive Masiyiwa (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 29 n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1961) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka na Zimbabwe bi na London
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke otu teknụzụ mba ụwa Econet Global
Masiyiwa enyewo ihe karịrị ndị Afrịka 250,000 na-eto eto agụmakwụkwọ n'ime afọ iri abụọ gara aga site na ntọala ezinụlọ ya
Ọ na-akwado ihe karịrị ụmụ mgbei 40,000 na atụmatụ agụmakwụkwọ ma na-akwado ụmụ akwụkwọ na mahadum dị na America, United Kingdom, na China
A mụrụ Strive Masiyiwa na Southern Rhodesia (nke bụzi Zimbabwe), na 29 Jenụwarị 1961
Mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa, ezinụlọ ya hapụrụ mba ahụ mgbe gọọmentị Prime Minista Ian Smith kwupụtara Nkwupụta Unilateral nke nnwere onwe site na United Kingdom
Ezinụlọ ahụ biri na Kitwe, obodo dị n'ebe ugwu etiti Zambia nke a maara maka ọla kọpa ya
Ọ bụ ebe a ka ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị, tupu ọ gụchaa akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Scotland
Nne Masiyiwa bụ onye ọchụnta ego
Ka ọ na-erule oge Masiyiwa dị afọ iri na abụọ, nne na nna ya nwere ike inye ya agụmakwụkwọ Europe
Ha zigara ya ụlọ akwụkwọ onwe ya na Edinburgh, Scotland
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1978, ọ laghachiri Rhodesia, na-ezube isonyere ndị agha Robert Mugabe na Joshua Nkomo na-emegide gọọmentị
Otú ọ dị, ọ laghachiri ụlọ akwụkwọ na Britain, wee nweta nzere na injinịa eletriki na Mahadum Wales na 1983

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ obere oge na ụlọ ọrụ kọmputa na Cambridge, England, mana ọ laghachiri Zimbabwe n'afọ 1984, na-enwe olileanya inyere mba ahụ aka iweghachite na njedebe nke Rhodesian Bush War na ntuli aka zuru ụwa ọnụ n'afọ 1980

Nhọpụta mba ụwa nke Masiyiwa na ndị otu bọọdụ n'ime afọ ndị a gụnyere Unilever (onye otu bọọdụ), Netflix (onye otu bọọdụ), Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation (onye a tụkwasịrị obi), National Geographic Society (onye ntụkwasị obi), Bank of America (onye otu bọọdụ zuru ụwa ọnụ), Prince of Wales Trust (onye ntụkwasị obi), UN Commission on Adaptation (Commissioner), Generation Africa (onye nchoputa), Pathways for Prosperity Commission on Technology and Inclusive Development (onye isi oche), The Rockefeller Foundation (onye bụbu onye otu bọọdụ mbụ), US Council on Foreign Relations (Global Advisory Board), Asia Society (onye otu bọọdụ), Stanford University (Global Advisory Board), Africa Progress Panel, Alliance for a Green Revolution in Africa (Onye isi oche, ugbu a Onye isi oche Emeritus), The Micronutrient Initiative of Canada (onye otu bọọdụ mbụ), Grow Africa, African Union's Ebola Fund (onye nchoputa), Morehouse College, African Academy of Sciences (Honorary Fellow) na Pan African Strategic Institute
Masiyiwa laghachiri obodo ya bụ Zimbabwe n'afọ 1984 mgbe ọ nọsịrị afọ iri na asaa
Mgbe ọ rụsịrị ọrụ obere oge dị ka injinia telecoms maka ụlọ ọrụ ekwentị nke steeti, ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ ya wee guzobe ụlọ ọrụ nke ya na ihe ruru US $ 75
O wuru nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ injinia eletriki

Ọpụpụ nke ekwe ntị na-eme ka ọ banye na telecoms, mana n'oge na-adịghị anya, ọ banyere n'ime nnukwu nsogbu mgbe gọọmentị Zimbabwe nke Robert Mugabe jụrụ inye ya ikikere iji rụọ ọrụ azụmahịa ya, nke a maara dị ka Econet Wireless

Econet Global (Econet) bụ otu teknụzụ mba ụwa nke nwere ọrụ azụmahịa na itinye ego na ihe karịrị mba iri abụọ na Africa, Latin America, United Kingdom, Europe, China, United Arab Emirates (UAE), na New Zealand
Ụlọ ọrụ abụọ edepụtara bụ ụlọ ọrụ enyemaka ya na Zimbabwe, Econet Wireless (1998) na Cassava Fintech (2018)
A na-echekarị azụmahịa Zimbabwe dị ka ụlọ ọrụ na-ejide ya, n'ihi na edepụtara ya
O jiriwo akụnụba ezinụlọ ya wuo otu n'ime mmemme nkwado kachasị maka ịkụziri ụmụ mgbei na Afrịka
N'oge ọ bụla, ntọala ezinụlọ ya na-akwado ma na-akụziri ihe karịrị ụmụaka 40,000
Masiyiwa bụkwa onye otu Bill Gates na Warren Buffett nke a maara dị ka Nnye nkwa

Ọ lụrụ Tsitsi, ha nwere ụmụ isii, ma biri na London, EnglandMasiyiwa nwere ụlọ abụọ dị n'akụkụ n'elu ụlọ elu Eldorado dị okpukpu iri abụọ na itoolu na 300 Central Park na New York City, zụrụ maka nde US $ 245 na 2016
N'afọ 2021, Masiyiwa ghọrọ onye isi ojii mbụ batara na Sunday Times Rich List na ọnụ ahịa ya ruru ijeri £ 1087
Studio One Eighty Nine bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze nke dị na Ghana na United States
Ebumnuche ha bụ ịkwalite ejiji ndị Afrịka nakwa emume ejije ha na emepụta
Ọ nwere akara nke ya ma na-akwado ụdị ndị ọzọ

Ndị guzobere Studio One Eighty Nine, onye na-eme ihe nkiri bu Hollywood Rosario Dawson na onye bụbu onye isi nkwukọrịta Bottega Veneta Abrima Erwiah, mepụtara Fashion Rising na 2013 iji sọpụrụ V-Day Movement's One Billion Rising campaign
Dawson na Erwiah malitere Studio 189 mgbe ha gachara ọtụtụ mba Afrịka na Febụwarị 2011, dịka akụkụ nke V-day
Ha kwenyere na ịbawanye òkè ahịa nke ụlọ ọrụ ejiji na ịgba ume usoro ọdịnala ga-eduga na mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Studio One Eighty Nine na-bu ndị na esonyere united nations international trade center na ethical fashion initiative
Studio One Eighty Nine na-emepụta uwe ụmụ nwanyị, uwe ụmụ nwoke na ihe ụlọ
Site na uwe, akpụkpọ ụkwụ, ngwa, akpa na ohiri isi
A na-ere akara ahụ n'ịntanetị na saịtị ecommerce ha, na mgbakwunye na ebe ndị ọzọ a na-ere ahịa
Studio One Eighty Nine esorola Vogue Italia na YOOX rụkọọ ọrụ ma wepụta nchịkọta pụrụ iche maka ikpo okwu a na ego na-abara ọrụ ebere Fashion 4 Development uru
A pụkwara ịchọta nchịkọta ahụ na Opening Ceremony, Smithsonian, Maison de Mode, Free People, Parisi, Surf Lodge, na Biffi Boutiques
Dawson na Erwiah natara Taormina Humanitarian Award na 61st Taormina Film Festival na June 2015
Na Jenụwarị 2015, e nyere Dawson na erwiah Martin Luther King Junior Award on Social Justice site na Mahadum Pennsylvania
ha anatalakwa ihe njurita ajuju site na magazin na ahu ma ka ejiji na nuuzpapars dika vogue Italia, wwD,grazia, vanity fair Italia e Pais the wall street journal bloom berg
Business ABC news and NY timeserwiah so na ọtụtụ n'ime Mmadu otu nari pụtara ìhè na true Africa maka onodu They're a na studio 189,,,
E gosipụtara nchịkọta oge opupu ihe ubi / oge okpomọkụ na Lower East Side Girls Club dị ka akụkụ nke New York Fashion Week
N'afọ 2014 na 2015, a họọrọ Studio One Eighty Nine ka egosiputa ya dị ka akụkụ nke Design Indabaʹs 意Africa is Nowʹs na Cape Town na Durban, South Africa
Su'ad al-Fatih Mohammed al-Badawi (amụrụ na 1 Jenụwarị 1932 - 23 Disemba 2022) bụ onye Sudanese agụmakwụkwọ, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na onye nta akụkọ
A maara ya maka nkwado ya maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị na nkwado ya maka Islamism
Al-Badawi nwere nzere na Mahadum nke Khartoum na School of Oriental and African Studies na London, wee ghọọ prọfesọ nke Arabic na Mahadim Omdurman Islamic na 1980
Mmekọrịta ya na Islamism malitere na 1950s, mgbe ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ so na Muslim Brotherhood
Al-Badawi mechara sonye na National Islamic Front, ma malite na 1980s nọchitere anya pati ahụ ọtụtụ oge na National Legislature
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu Pan-African
A mụrụ Al-Badawi na Al-Ubayyid, Kurdufan Province
Nna nna ya bụ onye ọkà mmụta Alakụba a ma ama na Omdurman, ebe nna ya bụ kọmishọna distrikti, n'ọchịchị n'oge Anglo-Egyptian condominium na mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị na 1956
N'ihi ọrụ nna ya, al-Badawi biri n'ọtụtụ obodo dị iche iche dị ka nwatakịrị, na-anọ oge na Al-Ubayyid, Berber, Atbara, Khartoum, na Omdurman
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na nkwado nke nna ya, onye nwere echiche dị mma maka agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị n'agbanyeghị àgwà ọha na eze dị n'oge ahụ
Al-Badawi gara n'ihu mezue Bachelor of Arts (BA) na Mahadum nke Khartoum na 1956, dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị anọ mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Faculty of Arts
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ruo oge ụfọdụ, wee gaa England maka ịmụtakwu
N'afọ 1961, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na School of Oriental and African Studies na Mahadum London na Master of Arts (MA) na Arabic
Mgbe o si England lọta, a họpụtara al-Badawi ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke ngalaba akụkọ ihe mere eme na kọleji ndị nkuzi
O mechara rụọ ọrụ na Khartoum dị ka onye nyocha maka Ministri nke Mmụta
N'afọ 1969, al-Badawi kwagara Saudi Arabia ịrụ ọrụ dịka onye ndụmọdụ maka UNESCO
O sonyere n'ịmepụta Girls' College of Education na Riyadh, ma jee ozi dị ka onye isi kọleji ruo oge ụfọdụ, yana idezi magazin kọleji
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Sudan, al-Badawi gụsịrị akwụkwọ doctorate na Arabic na Mahadum nke Khartoum na 1974, na 1980 e mere ya osote prọfesọ na Arabic na Omdurman Islamic University (OIU)
Mgbe obere oge dị ka osote onye isi oche na Mahadum United Arab Emirates, ọ laghachiri na OIU na 1983 iji bụrụ onye isi nke kọleji ụmụ nwanyị, na-aghọ nwanyị mbụ nwere ọnọdụ ahụ
Na mbido afọ 1990, al-Badawi nọrọ ezumike dị ka onye postdoctoral fellow na Mahadum Edinburgh, Scotland
Mmekọrịta mbụ Al-Badawi na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bịara dị ka onye ndú n'òtù ụmụ nwanyị dị iche iche nke afọ 1950 na 1960
Ọ nọchitere anya Sudan n'ọtụtụ nnọkọ mba ụwa, gụnyere Nzukọ Ụmụ nwanyị Arab nke 1952 na Nzukọ Ụmụnwaanyị Soviet nke 1957
Mmekọrịta mbụ Al-Badawi bụ na Sudanese Women's Union, mana ya na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ hapụrụ otu ahụ n'ihi esemokwu echiche
O mechara nyere aka guzobe otu ụmụ nwanyị Islamist, National Women's Front, ebe ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ so na Muslim Brotherhood
N'afọ 1981, al-Badawi ghọrọ onye otu National People's Council, ndị omeiwu nke Sudan n'okpuru Onye isi ala Gaafar Nimeiry
O mechara rụọ ọrụ na National Assembly site na 1996 ruo 2005, na 2004 a họpụtara ya na Pan-African Parliament
Ruo oge ụfọdụ n'etiti afọ 1980, al-Badawi bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na-eme iwu na Sudan
Ọ bụ onye otu National Islamic Front, otu òtù Islamist, otu isi iyi akpọkwara ya 'nwaanyị Islamist a na-ahụ anya' na Sudan n'oge ahụ
N'otu nnọkọ mba ụwa n'afọ 1996, al-Badawi kwuru banyere Islam na ụmụ nwanyị dị ka ndị na-emegiderịta onwe ha, ma jụ echiche nke 'ndị inyom Alakụba' dị ka ihe na-ekwekọghị na taqwa (ị nsọpụrụ)
N'afọ 1956, al-Badawi ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ mbụ nke Al-Manar ('The Beacon'), magazin a na-ebipụta kwa izu nke ụlọ ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị nke Muslim Brotherhood bipụtara
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ duuru ndị nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị Sudanese na France na United Kingdom
Oge mbụ nke Al-Manar were ihe na-erughị otu afọ, mana e guzobeghachiri magazin ahụ na 1964 ma kwuo na o nwere mmetụta ụfọdụ na ụmụ nwanyị na-atụ vootu na ntuli aka nke 1965
N'afọ ndị sochirinụ, al-Badawi mepụtara mmemme telivishọn na redio kwa izu, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Sudan dị iche iche
Àtụ Notelist
Suad Ibrahim Abdi bụ onye na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru ụmụ nwanyị si Somaliland
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya mba maka Progressio ma bụrụkwa onye na-eme mkpọsa iji meghee ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya maka ụmụ nwanyị na mba ahụ ihe karịrị afọ 25
Ọ na-azọ oche na ndị omeiwu site na Maroodi Jeex na ntuli aka afọ a, nke a ga-eme na Mee 31,2021
Suad Ibrahim Abdi bụ onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze na Somaliland kemgbe afọ 1996
Ọ bụ onye otu Somaliland National Women's Network (Nagaad) nke o nyere aka guzobe na 1997
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya mba Somaliland maka Progressio, otu mba ụwa na-abụghị nke gọọmentị na-eme mkpọsa maka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na mba ahụ
Progressio enyewo ndị ọkachamara iji kwado ọrụ nke òtù ndị dị n'ógbè ahụ na-arụ ọrụ n'ọhịa ma nye ndị na-ekiri maka ntuli aka onye isi ala Somaliland nke 2010 nke ọ kwupụtara n'efu na ikpe ziri ezi
Abdi na-eme mkpọsa maka mmejuputa 20% nke ndị omeiwu Somaliland ka ha bụrụ ụmụ nwanyị
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ bụ naanị otu onye omeiwu n'ime mmadụ 164 bụ nwanyị
Ụlọ ndị okenye (ụlọ elu) gbochiri iwu ndị omeiwu abụọ gara aga ma ọ bụ oge arụmụka gwụchaa
Abdi kwuru na ọ ga-azọ ọkwa na ntuli aka 2015 (nke e yigharịrị na 2017) mana ọ gaghị achọ ịghọ minista gọọmentị
Suad Nasr Abd El Aziz (26 Disemba 1953 na 5 Jenụwarị 2007) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ngosi telivishọn, na ihe nkiri
A mụrụ ya na Shubra, Cairo, Egypt
Aha ya mụbara maka ọrụ ya dị ka onye 'Maisa', onye ọ rụrụ na usoro TV Wanees's Diary, na akụkụ ise mbụ ya, nke malitere na 1994
A mụrụ ya na Disemba 26, 1953 na Shubra, Cairo, ọ na-achọsi ike ma na-agba mbọ ịbụ onye nta akụkọ
Otú ọ dị, a kara ya ka ọ sonye na Higher Institute for Dramatic Arts, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1975
O mere ihe dị egwu n'akụkọ 'Yaseen na Bahia' n'oge ọrụ ngụsị akwụkwọ ya, nke mara ọkwa ọmụmụ ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe nke nwere ike ịrụ ọrụ

Ọ pụtara nke mbụ ya n'egwuregwu 'The Dabbash Family' site n'aka onye mbụ iji nyere ya aka n'ụwa ahụ, dịka o kwuru n'ajụjụ ọnụ ndị nta akụkọ, Samir Al-Asfouri, na ngosipụta mbụ ya edere bụ na 1971 mgbe ọ sonyere n'oge ọmụmụ ya na egwuregwu 'Yassin Weldi', nke onye chọpụtara ya na-eme ihe ọchị Karam Mutawa duziri
Ọ chọtara n'ime ya onye na-eme ihe ọchị, nke na-abụghị ihe ọ chere, na ọ dị mma maka ọdachi

Na mbido ọrụ ya, o sonyere n'ọtụtụ ọrụ, nke gụnyere ihe nkiri 'An Apartment in Wist El-Balad', usoro TV 'Deserted Beach', na egwuregwu 'The Lesson Is Over, Stupid' na 1975, ya mere ọrụ ya dịgasị iche n'etiti sinima, telivishọn na ihe nkiri, ọ nwekwara akara n'ụzọ ọ bụla
N'afọ 1982, o nwetara ezigbo iga n'ihu ya site na itinye aka na ihe nkiri 'The Fatal Jealousy' na 'An Egyptian Story'

Mgbe ahụ, ọ tụgharịrị ọrụ ihe nkiri ya nke kachasị pụta ìhè bụ ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri 'Here Cairo', nke mere ka ọ nọrọ n'ọkwa ndị na-eme ihe ọchị n'Ijipt site na arụmọrụ ya dị mfe nke nwanyị Egypt nke ya na di ya na-aga ileta Cairo, onye na-ese ihe bụ Mohamed Sobhi
Ọ pụtara nke ọma n'ihe nkiri mgbe o sonyere n'egwuregwu The Barbaric n'afọ 1985, na egwuregwu The Family of Wanees na 1997

O sonyekwara ya na abụọ n'ime usoro ihe nkiri TV ndị Arab na-eme nke ọma, ya bụ 'Rehlat Al Million' na 1984, na 'Wanees's Diaries' na akụkụ ise mbụ ya nke malitere na 1994, na ọrụ nke onye 'Maysa', onye ọ na-eme nwetara ihe ịga nke ọma n'ihu ọha nke ọ kpọtụrụ aha na ụfọdụ ajụjụ ọnụ ndị nta akụkọ na ndị na-akwado ya na-akpọ ya 'Mama Maysa'
Ya na onye nduzi Youssef Chahine rụkọtara ọrụ ọzọ na ihe nkiri Alexandria-New York na 2004, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, o sonyere n'ọrụ ikpeazụ ya, 'Life is the maximum of delight' na 2005
E mere ya liposuction n'ụlọ ọgwụ Cairo, o wee banye n'ọnọdụ coma nke were otu afọ mgbe e nyere ya ọgwụ anesthetic na nkwadebe dị ka usoro liposuction
Okwu ikpeazụ o kwuru tupu ọnwụ ya bụ 'Onyenwe m, ọ bụrụ na ị ga-ezite mkpụrụ obi m n'ime m, zite ya n'ịdị ọcha, ma ọ bụrụ na m nwụọ, mee ka mụ na ndị ezi omume nwụọ'

N'okwu a na-ekwu na ọ bụ di ya nke abụọ, onye injinia mmanụ ala Muhammad Abdel Moneim, ka o kwuru, dị ka ụfọdụ akwụkwọ akụkọ si kwuo, na ọ gbakere site na coma ya ruo ihe dị ka nkeji ise, ọ tụkwara aro ka e lie ya ngwa ngwa ma ọ bụrụ na ọ nwụọ, nakwa na ezinụlọ ya ga-anọ ihe dị ka otu awa n'ili ya kpee ekpere maka ya
A na-ekwu na nwa ya nwanyị, Fayrouz, bụ onye akaebe nke ihe ọzọ merenụ, nke bụ ọhụ ya, nke a na-ekwu na o buru amụma ọnwụ ya
Mgbe ahụ ọ nwụrụ na Jenụwarị 5, 2007 na-ahapụ ihe nketa mara mma nke ọrụ na nnukwu ịhụnanya n'obi ndị hụrụ ya n'anya

Ihe ịma aka nke ọrịa ya nwere ọtụtụ ebubo sitere n'aka ndị nta akụkọ nye onye na-ahụ maka ịwa ahụ, a mara ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ atọ, wee jiri £ E5,000 gbapụta ya iji kwụsị ikpe ahụ, mana emechara wepụ ebubo ahụ
Suanne Braun (amụrụ na 29 Febụwarị na afo 1968) bụ onye South Afrika amụrụ na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bi na London, England
Braun mere ọkachamara mbụ ya na afo 1988 na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-egosi TV na obodo ya bụ South Afrika maka ọwa M-net
Ọ kwadoro usoro njem nke ya, Bon Voyage, nke nyere ya ohere ime njem n'ụwa niile
A họpụtara ya maka Star Tonight Award for Excellence in Television maka Bon Voyage
N'oge ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka telivishọn, Braun gosipụtara Miss South Africa na Miss World ruo ọtụtụ afọ na mmalite afọ 1990
N'oge a, Braun gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ya na-eme ihe nkiri na abụọ n'ime usoro ihe nkiri nke South Afrika, The Big Time (1 na 2) na ihe nkiri Afrikaans na-emeri ihe nrite, Konings SABC
O nwere ọrụ ndị isi na ha abụọ
Ọrụ ya gụnyere egwuregwu na ihe nkiri egwu
Mgbe obere nleta gara US, e nyere Braun kaadị akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ
Ọ nọrọ afọ iri sochirinụ na-ebi ma na-arụ ọrụ na LA

Ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi telivishọn Amerika na ihe nkiri gụnyere , Just Shoot Me, Prowler megide Scott Bakula ma duzie Peter Bogdanovich, F / X The Series na usoro sci fi a ma ama Stargate SG-1 nke Braun mere chi nwanyị Hathor
Braun laghachiri na mgbọrọgwụ ya n'oge a, na-akwado na Academy Awards maka telivishọn South Afrika M-net na Spirit Awards na-eme ememe Independent Film
Ọzọkwa Braun kwadoro ihe omume West Wing City Live maka NBC na Weingart Foundation
Braun bi na London kemgbe afọ 2002
Braun anọgidewo na-arụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri na telivishọn

Ebe ngosi West End gụnyere ọrụ Tanya na Mamma Mia na The Prince of Wales Theatre, na-alọghachi na afo 2019 maka Mamma Mia 20th Anniversary Show na Novello Theatre, Fraulein Kost na mmepụta Rufus Norris nke Cabaret na Onassis nke Robert Lindsay gosipụtara
Braun pụtara na mbido UK nke egwu Bernada Alba
Ọrụ ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ gụnyere Private Lives, The Cherry Orchard na mbido ụwa nke 'I Have Life' dabere na akwụkwọ banyere ndina n'ike na ịtọrọ Alison Botha na South Afrika
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya [mgbe?] Braun pụtara na otu nwanyị na-egosi 'Sailing Somewhere' nke Matthew Hurt ma gosipụta egwu mbụ nke Conor Mitchell

Ọrụ ihe nkiri na telivishọn na-adịbeghị anya gụnyere The Princess Switch Netflix, Stephen Poliakoff's Summer of Rockets, Red Dwarf XI, HBO, obere ihe nkiri SIGHT na nso nso a All The Things You Are scheduled for release na afo 2021
Braun na-achọ dị ka onye na-ese olu na nso nso a [mgbe?] kwupụtara mkpọsa maka Lipton Tea, Confusedcom na The New York Times
Dị ka onye na-agụ egwu, a pụrụ ịnụ Braun ka ọ na-abụ abụ na egwu egwu, 'All Night' maka ndị otu South Afrika Goldfish
Braun lụrụ Christopher Garner, nwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri South Africa, Rex Garner, n'afọ 2002

Subira Khamis Mgalu (amụrụ na 17 Mee 1973) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tanzania na onye otu Chama Cha Mapinduzi (CCM) na-achị achị nke na-eje ozi dị ka osote minista nke ike ugbu a
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị ya site na 1981 ruo 1987, gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mtwara Girls Secondary School site na 1988 ruo 1991 na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Ndanda site na 1992 ruo 1994

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Mzumbe site na 1996 ruo 1999, ebe ọ natara Bachelors of Accountancy, wee gaa n'ihu na-amụ ihe ọzọ n'ebe ahụ iji nweta nzere masta na Business Administration na Finance na Banking
Subira Khamis Mgalu tinyere aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ malite na 2006
MS Subira, mgbe ọ bụ onye otu Chama Cha Mapinduzi a họpụ tara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu Regional Executive Council UWT (Umoja wa Wanawake Tanzania) nke Chama cha Mapinduzi ruo afọ ole na ole
Onye isi ala nke United Republic of Tanzania bụ John Magufuli họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote minista na-ahụ maka ike n'afọ 2017 n'oge mgbanwe ndị o mere na 7 Ọktoba 2017
Ọ na-eje ozi n'okpuru Minista Dr
Medard Matogolo Kalemani Site na 2011 ruo 2015 ọ bụ onye otu kọmitii dị iche iche dị ka Kọmitii Akụba nke Ndị Ọchịchị Obodo, Kọmitii Ego na Akụnụba na Kọmitii Ọrụ Ugbo, Anụmanụ na Mmiri
Ọ bụ onye ome iwu na Tanzania, na-eje ozi nke abụọ ya
A họpụ tara ya na mbụ n'afọ 2010, wee họpụta ya maka oge nke abụọ n'afọ 2015 maka oche pụrụ iche echekwara maka ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ ghọrọ osote minista na-ahụ maka ike n'afọ 2017
Àtụ Chama Cha Mapinduzi
Okirikiri subparhelic bụ halo a na-adịghị ahụkebe, ihe ọhụụ, nké dị n'okpuru horizon
Ọ na-agafe ma subsun (n'okpuru anyanwụ) nà ebe antisolar (na-emegide anyanwụ)
Okirikiri subparhelic bụ ihe yiri nké subhorizon na okirikiri parhelic, nké dị n'elu horizon
N'ébé dị na okirikiri subparhelic bụ ọtụtụ ihe ọhụụ dị ụkọ subsun, subparhelia, 120 ° subparhelio, Liljequist subparhelie, diffuse arcs, nà Parry antisolar arcs
Na foto na-esote nke dị n'etiti ébé antisolar, okirikiri subparhelic na-apụta dị ka akara dị larịị nke na-agbagọ agbagọ nke arcs anthelic na ya
