Susan 'Sue' Wangui Wanjiru bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye ama ama maka ihe nkiri abụọ o mere n'afọ 2013 na 2017, nke akpọrọ 'Something Necessary' na ihe nrite '18 Hours', n'otu n'otu

Ọ bụkwa onye na-ahụ maka ego ọha na eze na onye guzobere na onye isi na ụlọ ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, Lokhem Kids Entertainment Ltd, nke na-eji mgbasa ozi dị iche iche akụziri ụmụaka otu esi aghọ ndị isi ka mma
E depụtara ihe nkiri mbụ nke Wanjiru, 'Something Necessary' nke ewepụtara n'afọ 2013 n'etiti ihe nkiri iri kachasị mma nke afọ iri na Kenya
Ọ bụ Judy Kibinge duziri ya ma họpụta ya maka onyinye nhọrọ ndị na-ege ntị Chicago International Film Festival nke afọ 2013
Wanjiru mere ihe dịka Anne na ihe nkiri ahụ
Na ihe nkiri nke abụọ ọ pụtara na, '18 Hours' (2017), e gosipụtara ya dịka Sabina
Njue Kevin duziri ihe nkiri a
N'afọ 2018, ọ ghọrọ ihe nkiri Kenya mbụ meriri n'ozuzu Best Movie na Africa Magic Viewers' Choice Awards (AMVCA)
A mụrụ Sue Williamson na Lichfield, England n'afọ 1941
N'afọ 1948, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Saụt Afrịka
N'agbata afọ 1963 na 1965 ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Art Students League of New York

N'afọ 1983, ọ nwetara diplọma ya na Fine Art na Michaelis School of Fine Art, Cape Town N'afọ 2007, ọ natara awọd nke Visual Arts Research site na Smithsonian Institution na Washington DC na 2011 Rockefeller Foundation Bellagio Creative Arts Fellowship
N'afọ 2013, ọ bụ onye nlekọta ọbịa nke ụlọ akwụkwọ summer na Zentrum Paul Klee na Bern
Ọrụ Williamson na-etinye aka na isiokwu ndị metụtara ncheta na nhazi njirimara
N'ịbụ onye a zụrụ azụ dị ka onye na-ebi akwụkwọ, Williamson arụla ọrụ n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi gụnyere nke nchekwa foto, vidiyo, ntinye mgbasa ozi agwakọta, na ihe ndị e wuru

Na Otu Narị na iri na itoolu Deeds of Sale (2018), aha ndị nna ukwu ohu nyere, afọ, nwoke na nwanyị, na ebe a mụrụ ha, tinyere aha ndị na-azụ ahịa na ndị na-ere ahịa, ọnụahịa a kwụrụ, na ụbọchị ịzụta ndị mmadụ site na ahia ohu na India edere na ink ojii na uwe ogho
A na-ebubata uwe ndị ahụ site na India, tinye ha n'ime mmiri apịtị nke sitere na Cape Coast Castle, ma kwụnye ha gburugburu ala ahụ ruo ụbọchị ihe nketa, Septemba 24, 2019
A na-ebudata ha ma laghachi India, ebe a na-asa ha ọcha ma na-agbanyeghachi ha dị ka ihe ntinye na Aspinwall House na Kochi
Ụlọ ọrụ Dutch East India buuru ndị a gaa rụọ ọrụ na Cape Town Castle na ogige ụlọ ọrụ ahụ

Otu narị na iri na itoolu Deeds of Sale Williamson na-agụnye akụkọ ihe mere eme na ncheta nke ahia ohu iji gbanwee akụkọ ihe mere eme na-asọ oyi n'ime akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nwere ike idozi ma lụso enweghị nhata zuru ụwa ọnụ ọgụ

Mgbe ọ meghere ihe ngosi ahụ, Williamson gụrụ ihe ndekọ akụkọ ihe mere eme mgbe otu nwanyị na-eburu uwe ọ bụla, gụọ ihe ọmụma dị na ya, wee were ya n'ime ka ọ gbanye ya n'apịtị ma kwụnye ya na eriri ịsa ahụ
Art na-eweta akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ahia ohu na ndụ Ntinye ahụ na-akọ akụkọ banyere ọnwụ ma na-anọchi anya isi nke onye na-ese n'elu ifufe, mana ihe niile fọdụrụ bụ ncheta ha
Williamson emepụtala ọtụtụ ụdị nka na-eguzogide nke na-enyocha akụkọ ihe mere eme nke South Africa
n'afọ 2009 o wesara echiche nka ya iji chọpụta gbasara njikọ ụwa ọnụ na ibe ya na-aga n'ihu, Other Voices, Other Cities, nke gụnyere na Push the Limits
Ihe ngosi, nke Febrụwarị 2021, na ItalyỌ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke “Artthrobcoza”

Ọrụ Williamson dị na nchịkọta nke ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie dị iche iche, gụnyere Museum of Modern Art na New York, National Museum of African Art - Smithsonian Institution na Washington DC, South African National Gallery na Cape Town, na Victoria na Albert Museum na London

Williamson sonyekwara na ihe ngosi nke otu nke gụnyere The Short Century (2001), Liberated Voices (1999), Johannesburg Art Biennale (na 1997 na 1995), Havana Biennale (1994), na Venice Biennale (1993)
N'afọ 1997 Williamson guzobere ArtThrob, akwụkwọ ntanetị nke gosipụtara ọrụ nke ndị na-ese ihe nke oge a na South Africa
Suetes, suêtes, les suêtes, bụ ifufe siri ike nké ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ n'ụsọ oké osimiri ọdịda anyanwụ nkè Cape Breton Island
Okwu 'suête' sitere na ndị Acadian French bi na mpaghara Chéticamp dị ka mkpirisi nkè 'sud est' (ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ)
Akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ nkè Cape Breton Highlands plateau na-agbadata na mberede ruo n'ókè oké osimiri site na ihe dịka mita narị anọ (otu puku na narị atọ ) ịdị elu
Ifufe ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ na-ebili n'akụkụ ọwụwa Anyanwụ nke agwaetiti ahụ ma na-agafe ala dị larịị, na-agbakarị ọsọ ọsọ na nnukwu ọsọ na ndagwurugwu na ọnọdụ ikuku kwụsiri ike
Ụlọ ọrụ ihu igwe dị na Grand Etang edekọla ọsọ ifufe nke ihe karịrị kilomita narị abụọ kwa elekere (otu narị na iri abụọ ) n'ọtụtụ oge
Ńnú odẹne bụ ótu nnu na tọ bọribọri, mkpụrụ ya dị ka ugègbè
Sugar Blues bụ akwụkwọ nke William Dufty bipụtara n'afo 1975 ma ghọọ ihe oriri
Dị ka ndị na-ebipụta akwụkwọ si kwuo, e bipụtara ihe karịrị Otu nde na narị isii
Dufty na-eji ụdị akụkọ a enyochaa ihe mere eme nke shuga na akụkọ ọgwụ
Ọ na-ekwu maka ndị fụfuru, dị ka Semmelweiss, iji chetara ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ nkwụsịtụ nke sayensị ọkọlọtọ
Ọ na-enyocha akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Cuba, akụkọ banyere ịgba ohu, akụkọ ifo gbasara ụtaba na ọgwụgwọ sịga iji gosipụta mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ọnọdụ shuga, dị ka ngwaahịa nke nnụcha, atụnyere ọgwụ
Ka oge na-aga, euphemism ahụ, 'nke sitere n'ihe ndị dị ndụ', ka a kpọtụrụ aha dịka nke metụtara heroin na shuga
(peeji 148)
Akwụkwọ ahụ nwere isi iri na anọ, ntụaka 78, peeji ise nke ihe edeturu, yana ndepụta dị ka akwụkwọ 10
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-enyocha akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ụwa site n'echiche nke shuga, na-ada ụda nke mmetụta ọjọọ ya na-emebi emebi
Isiakwụkwọ ndị a bụ
Nwunye Dufty, Gloria Swanson, gara United States iji kwalite akwụkwọ ahụ na 1975

Nwa akwụkwọ nke izere ịda mbà n'obi gụnyere Sugar Blues dị ka otu n'ime 'akwụkwọ ya nke na-ekwu maka ma ọ bụ isi maọbụ isiakwụkwọ ụfọdụ ọrụ nke ihe ndị na'ahụ maka nri na nri n-edozi ahụ na ịkwalite ọdịmma uche na mgbochi nke nsogbuna ọrụ nri karịsịa nsogbu
hypoglycemia (Duffy [sic] 1975)
Onye na-enyere John Lennon aka bu, Frederic Seaman kọwara nri Lennon n'akwụkwọ The Last Days of John Lennon (1991)
Mgbe Seaman malitere ọrụ ahụ, akwụkwọ Duftyz buru ibu
Otu onye nkuzi sayensị nri depụtara Sugar Blues dị ka ihe atụ iji kpalie echiche dị mkpa iji bụrụ onye sayensi nri

Onye nyocha nyocha Heather Hendershot na ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Mark Pendergrast akatọwo akwụkwọ ahụ maka iji shuga tụnyere ọgwụ ọjọọ ma na-atụ aro ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ọrịa gụnyere ọrịa bubonic

Sugra Visram (15 Julaị 1923 - 29 Ọktoba 2012), nke a makwaara dị ka Sugra Namubiru Visram, bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda, onye na-eme ihe ike na onye ọchụnta ego

Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ so na ndị omeiwu nke Kabaka Muteesa nke Abụọ sonyere na Buganda LukiikoN'ịbụ onye sonyere na Kabaka Yekka Party, ọ nọchitere anya Kibuga Constituency (Mengo ugbu a) na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Mbụ na nke Abụọ nke Uganda ruo mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka onye omeiwu na 1966
Ya na Florence Alice Lubega na Eseza Makumbi, ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị atọ mbụ jere ozi n'ọkwa a na Uganda mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị
A mụrụ ya Sugra Jamal na Ụlọ Ọgwụ Nsambya n'aka Mohamedali Jamal, onye Pakistan na Kawkab Aha Mirza nke ndị Iran
Ọ tolitere na Mengo na Old Kampala ma gụọ akwụkwọ na Old Kampa Senior Secondary School
Dị ka ya na di ya na-arụ ọrụ, Visram na-ejikwa ụlọ ahịa uwe ma malite ụlọ akwụkwọ ịkwọ ụgbọala maka ụmụ nwanyị
N'agbata afọ 1950 na 1951, ọ bụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ ọta akara, ụlọ akwụkwọ Ithnasheri, ụlọ akwụkwọ ọt akara
Visram sonyeere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na 1962 na ntuli aka Buganda tupu nnwere onwe nke afọ ahụ, a họpụtara Visram na Florence Alice Lubega na Eseza Makumbi na Lukiiko
Mgbe ntuli aka nke afọ 1962 gasịrị, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya Buganda ka ọ na-anọchite anya Florence Alice Lubega, na-eme ka ha bụrụ ụmụ nwanyị mbụ so n'òtù a
Ọ sonyeere otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Kabaka Yekka (KY) ma nọchite anya mpaghara a maara dị ka 'Kibuga' (Mengo taa)
Visram bụ otu n'ime ndị omeiwu ise nke Kabaka Yekka gbara arụkwaghịm n'oche ndị omeiwu ha mgbe ọ jụrụ ịdebanye aha na ndokwa nke iwu ọhụrụ nke e gosipụtara mgbe nnupụisi iwu nke 1966 na Uganda gasịrị
Ọ bụ onye isi nke Women's Wing nke Kabaka Yekka (KY) na mgbakwunye na ịbụ osote onye isi oche nke Kansụl Uganda maka ụmụ nwanyị nke ọ sonyeere na 1944
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Family Planning Association of Uganda (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Reproductive Health Uganda) n'afọ 1957
O nyekwara aka guzobe Young Women's Christian Association (YWCA) na Uganda ma bụrụkwa onye na-ahụ maka akụ ya
Mgbe a chụpụrụ ndị Eshia na Uganda na 1972, Visram rụrụ ọrụ na ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ nke Commonwealth Institute
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ na Commonwealth Parliamentary Association na Red Cross
Ọ laghachiri Uganda na 1993 wee rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka onye isi ala pụrụ iche na Inward Investment
Na 1941, Visram lụrụ Haider Visram, nwa nwa Allidina Visram
Ọ nwụrụ na afo otu puku narị itoolu, iri itoolu na asatọ 1998 ma ha nwere ụmụ atọ
A nabatara ya n'ezinụlọ Buganda Mamba ma nye ya aha Namubiru
Suguru Osako (大迫傑, Ōsako Suguru, amuru na ubochi iri atọ na ọnwa May na afọ 1991) is a Japanese long-distance runner
He won the 10,000 metres gold medal at the 2011 Summer Universiade in Shenzhen and holds the Asian junior record for the half marathon
He held the Japanese National Record for the marathon of 2 05 29 set at the 2020 Tokyo Marathon, where he finished fourth
A mụrụ ya na Machida, Tokyo, ọ gara Saku Chosei High School wee malite iguzobe onwe ya na mba n'afọ 2010
Ọ bụ onye kachasị ọsọ n'ọkwa ya na Japanese High School Ekiden Championship wee bụrụ onye nke abụọ na obere agbụrụ na Chiba Cross Country
Nke a mere ka o nweta ọnọdụ na ndị otu Japan maka 2010 IAAF World Cross Country Championships, ebe ọ gara n'ihu na-agwụ na 32nd ebe
N'okporo ụzọ n'afọ ahụ, o setịpụrụ ihe kacha mma nke 28 3575 nkeji na Tokyo wee bụrụ onye nke asatọ na 2010 World Junior Championships in Athletics
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ debara aha ya na Mahadum Waseda na ngwụcha afọ 2010
N'ọnwa Nọvemba, ọ gbara ọsọ na Ageo City Half Marathon ma setịpụ oge ndekọ nke ndị Japan na ndị Eshia nke 1 01 47 awa iji merie asọmupi ahụ
Ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na Charles Ndirangu na 2013 Fukuoka Cross Country
Ọ mechara nke atọ na 2018 Chicago Marathon na ndekọ mba n'oge 2 05 50 h, na-ewetara ya 100 nde Yen
Suki Lee bụ onye America na-emepụta egwuregwu vidio na onye na-eme mmemme kọmputa
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị ole na ole na-emepe emepe na Atari, Inc
na mbido afọ 1980 ebe o dere egwuregwu agụmakwụkwọ Math Gran Prix maka Atari 2600 (1982) na Obelix (1983) maka otu usoro ahụ
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa ọrụ na Apple Computer
Lee nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na Mahadum San Jose State na isi na injinia n'ozuzu
Atari were Lee n'ọrụ mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na kọleji n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1981
Ọ nọ ebe ahụ ruo 1984, mgbe ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka Cadtrak Corporation na-emepụta interface onye ọrụ ngwanrọ maka nhazi ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Apple site na 1986 ruo 1997, mgbe e mesịrị ọ gara rụọ ọrụ na Palm, eCircle na WebTV ruo 1997
Na ngwụcha afọ 2002, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm ma gaa n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na Apple
Ihe osise ahụ bụ Lee The Hidden Pastis nke Linda Lai, Yifan Lin na Amanda Zhu sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke egwuregwu Donald Duck's Speedboat
Àtụ Portal
Sukuma wiki bụ nri ndị dị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka nke e ji akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ mee, nke a mara dị ka sukuma, nke e ji yabasị na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ sie
A na-ejikarị ya na ugali (nke e ji ntụ ọka mee) eri ya ma rie ya
Na Tanzania, Kenya, Uganda na ọtụtụ akụkụ nke East Africa, a na akpọkarị colewort aha Swahili ha, sukuma, a na'akpọkarị ha collard greens
A na-ejikarị ya eme ihe na-ezighị ezi maka kale
Nsụgharị nkịtị nke ahịrịokwu 'sukuma wiki' bụ 'ịkpali izu' ma ọ bụ 'ịgbatị izu'
Ọ bụ akwụkwọ nri nke dị ọnụ ala ma dị n'afọ niile na mpaghara a
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke nri a na-eri na mpaghara a tinyere Ugali ma ọ bụ Sima
Aha otu cultivar aha Acephala ('na-enweghị isi' na Grik) na-ezo aka n'eziokwu ahụ bụ na ụdị B
oleracea a enweghị isi akwụkwọ (nke a na-ejikọta ọnụ 'isi') dị ka cabbage
Osisi a na-adịru afọ abụọ ebe oyi na-eme n'oge oyi, na-adịkwa afọ niile ọbụna n'ógbè ndị oyi na-atụ
Ọ na-enwekwa mmetụta dị mma na nnu
Ọ nwere ogwe kwụ ọtọ, na-etolite ruo mita abụọ n'ogologo
Osisi ahụ yiri nnọọ ma nwee njikọ chiri anya na kale
Nkwadebe ahụ dị iche na nkwadebe ọdịnala nke akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na United States
A na-akụ osisi ahụ maka azụmahịa maka akwụkwọ ya dị arọ, nke na-egbu egbu, nke a na-eri eri
Ha dị n'afọ niile, mana ha na-atọ ụtọ ma na-edozi ahụ n'ọnwa oyi, mgbe oyi mbụ gasịrị
Maka ọdịdị kachasị mma, a ga-ahọrọ akwụkwọ tupu ha eruo oke, ebe akwụkwọ ga-adị arọ ma sie ya n'ụzọ dị iche na akwụkwọ ọhụrụ
Afọ agaghị emetụta ụtọ
Nri na ọdịdị na-adabere na cultivar; couve-manteiga na couve tronchuda nwere ekele karịsịa na obodo Brazil na Portugal
A na-eri wiki Sukuma kemgbe ọ dịkarịa ala afọ 2,000, na ihe akaebe na-egosi na ndị Gris oge ochie zụlitere ụdị dị iche iche nke colewort na kale
Na Congo, Uganda, Tanzania na Kenya (East Africa), colewort a pịrị apị bụ isi ihe na-eso nri a ma ama a maara dị ka ugali (nke a na-akpọkwa sima, cal cal ma ọ bụ posho mgbe ụfọdụ), achịcha ọka

Sukuma wiki na-ejikarị mmanụ eme ihe ruo mgbe ọ dị nro, jiri yabasị mee ka ọ dị ụtọ ma jiri nnu mee ka ọ bụrụ ihe na-esote ma ọ bụ dị ka nri dị n'akụkụ na anụ kachasị amasị (azụ̀, ọkụkọ, anụ ehi, anụ ezì)
Enwere ike ịchịkwa akwụkwọ wiki sukuma ọhụrụ ruo ụbọchị 10 ma ọ bụrụ na etinye ya na friji karịa oyi (1 °C) na oke mmiri (> 95%)
N'ime friji ụlọ, enwere ike ịchekwa colewort ọhụrụ maka ihe dị ka ụbọchị atọ
Ozugbo esichara ha, enwere ike itinye ha na friji ma chekwa ha ogologo oge

Sulak Sivaraksa (Thai; RTGS ; a na-akpọ ya [sùlák sìwárák]; Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 27 Machị 1933 na Siam) bụ onye na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze na Thailand, prọfesọ, onye edemede na onye guzobere na onye nduzi nke NGO Thai 'Sathirakoses-Nagapradeepa Foundation', nke aha ya bụ ndị isi abụọ gbasara ọdịbendị Thai, Sathirakoses (Phya Anuman Rajadhon) na Nagapradeepa (Phra Saraprasoet)
Ọ malitere ọtụtụ òtù mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, nke ọrụ ebere, nke gburugburu ebe obibi na nke ime mmụọ na òtù na Thailand, dị ka College SEM (Mmụọ na Mmụta Movement)

A maara Sulak Sivaraksa na West dị ka otu n'ime ndị nna nke International Network of Engaged Buddhists (INEB), nke e guzobere n'afọ 1989 na ndị isi Buddha, gụnyere Dalai Lama nke iri na anọ, onye mọnk Vietnamese na onye na-eme udo Thich Nhat Hanh, na Theravada Bhikkhu Maha Ghosananda, dị ka ndị nkwado ya

Mgbe e nyere Sulak Sivaraksa ihe nrite Right Livelihood Award n'afọ 1995 maka 'ọhụụ ya, ọrụ ya na ntinye aka ime mmụọ na ịchọ usoro mmepe nke gbanyere mkpọrọgwụ na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, ikpe ziri ezi na iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe ọdịbendị', ọ ghọrọ onye ọha na eze maara na Europe na US
Sulak bụ onye isi oche nke Asian Cultural Forum on Development ma bụrụkwa prọfesọ nleta na UC Berkeley, Mahadum Toronto, na Cornell
A mụrụ Sule Lamido na (n'ụbọchi iri atọ n'ọnwa ọgọstụ afọ 1948) Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ozi okwu mba ofesi nke obodo Naịjirịa site na 1999 ruo 2003
A hoputara ya dịka onye ochichi nke Jigawa Steeti n’onwa Eprel afọ 2007
O so n’otu ndị ọchịchi ara aga bụ People's Democratic Party (PDP)
Ọ dọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ọma ị laghachi na nhọpụta ndị ọchịchị na-ụbọchị nke iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011
N’afọ 2015, ya na ụmụ ya nọ n'ikpe maka izu ego obodo site n’aka EFCC
A mụrụ Lamido na n'ụbọchị iri atọ n'onwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1948 na Bamaina, Birnin Kudu ọchịchị mpaghara nke Jigawa Steeti Naijiria
Lamido banyere na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dịka onye otu aka-ekpe-isi nke Redemption Party (PRP) na Naijiria nke abụọ

Ọ ghọrọ odeakwụkwọ mba nke Social Democratic Party n'oge Naijiria nke atọ, ebe ọ natara nkatọ maka etu o si mee ntuli aka onye isi ala nke n'ụbọchi iri na abụọ n'ọnwa juun afọ 1993 nke Moshood Abiola meriri, bụ onye e gbochiri ịbanye n'ọchịchị

Mgbe onye isi ochichi ndị agha bụ General Sani Abacha kwupụtara atụmatụ ya ịlaghachi na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, Lamido bụ onye otu mbido nke Social Progressive Party, ọ bụkwa onye odeakwụkwọ mba nke otu ọhụrụ ahụ
A tụrụ ya mkpọrọ na-afọ 1998 site n'aka Abacha maka ịkatọ atụmatụ Abacha ime ka ọ dịgide n'ọkwa

Mgbe Abacha nwụrụ na mberede na-ọnwa June afo 1998, General Abdulsalami Abubakar kwupụtara usoro atụmatụ mgbanwe wee mepụta otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ọhụrụ maka ịzọ ọkwa ntuli aka 1999 Lamido ghọrọ onye otu PDP
Ọ zọrọ ọkwa Gọvanọ nke Jigawa Steeti na ntuli aka 1999 na mmalite nke Naijiria nke anọ, ma onye otu nke All People's Party (APP) Ibrahim Saminu Turaki meriri ya

Onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo họpụtara Lamido dịka onye ozi nke mba ofesi na-ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1999, nke a kpatara esemokwu n'etiti Lamido na onye nlekọta ya bụ Abubakar Rimi bụ onye agbaturu dìka osote onye isi oche nke Obasanjo ma na-agbakwa mbọ i nweta ọrụ onye ozi nke mba ofesi
Esemokwu dị n'etiti Lamido na Rimi digidere

N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2003 ha abụọ ekwekọrịtaghị na nhọrọ onye isi oche otu kọmiti a họpụtara ga-enyocha onyeisiala mpaghara nke otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ahụ, nke a mere ka arụmụka a na-akawanye njọ n’ihe otu onye nnọchiteanya kọwara dịka “akparaghị ókè omume”
N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2006, Lamido kọwara Rimi dị ka 'mmegide nke ọchịchị ya n'oge gara aga'
Agbanyeghị, n'oge nleta nke ikike na nke Rimi n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2007 Lamido kọwara ya dị ka isi ihe na-enweghị ike ileghara anya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2001, Naịjirịa nyefere Iran ikike ịbụ Onyeisi otu nke 77
N'ikwu okwu na mmemme inyefe aka ahụ, Lamido nyere akụkọ ịnụ ọkụ n'obi banyere ọganihu G77 n'okpuru ọchịchị Nigeria
Ndị nnọchiteanya si mba ndị ọzọ kwetara na e mezuola ọtụtụ ihe
O kwuru na ọtụtụ narị ndị ahịa mgbere Naijiria nwụrụ ka ha na-achọ ịgafe Ọzara Sahara na Oke Osimiri Mediterenian iji ruo Europe

N'ikwu okwu na United Nations N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2001, Lamido kọwara ajọ mmetụta nrụrụ aka nke ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ọhụrụ dịka Naijiria, ma kpọọ oku maka 'ngwa ọrụ mba ụwa' megide ịnyefe ego ezuru n'ike na mba ọzọ

N'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2003, Komitii na-ahụ maka ndị isi nke nke ụlọ Ndị Nnọchiteanya gara leta Pakistan, na-egosi na ọ chọrọ ikpezi esemokwu ahụ banyere Kashmir, na-enweghị ike ịkpọtụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ozi mba ọzọ
Lamido degara Sadiq Yar'Adua, onye isi oche nke Kọmitii ahụ, na-akọwa ihe ize ndụ nke njem dị otú a na-enweghị ihe amara banyere njikọta siri ike nke njikọ aka
Yar'Adua ji were iwe, na-asị '
n'onweghi onye nọ ebe a dịka mgbakwunye nke ụlọ ozi Sule Lamido
Anyị abụghị ụmụ ya; usoro iwu mba ofesi ya adighi-ejide anyi
N'ọnwa Maachị afọ 2003, Lamido mere mkpesa maka ihe Gọvanọ Turaki nke Jigawa Steeti kwuru na gọọmentị etiti elegharala steeti ahụ anya, na-akpọ ya ka o kwuo maka etu o si mefuo ego gọọmenti etiti
N'onwa Mee afọ 2003, mgbe PDP furu efu na ntuli aka ozo na Jigawa Steeti, Lamido kwuputara na e meghariri ntuli aka ahụ na nkwado nke All Nigeria People's Party (ANPP)
N’ọnwa Ọgọst nke afọ 2006, a kọrọ na mpaghara ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke PDP ajụla Lamido dịka onye ga-azọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọkwa Gọvanọ 2007

N'agbanyeghị, n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2007, Lamido zọrọ wee merie ntuli aka okwa gọvanọ na Jigawa Steeti site n'enyemaka nke gọvanọ na-achị n'oge ahu, Saminu Turaki bụ onye pụrụ na otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị People's Democratic Party n'ọnwa ndị dị n'ihu ntuli aka ahụ
Ọ batara n'ụlọ ọrụ nn'ụbọchị ịri abụọ n'itoolu n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2007
Ka emechara ntuli aka ahụ, ọ kpụpụrụ onye bu ya ụzọ Saminu Turaki maka ebubo na-ojikwaghị ego obodo nkeoma
na mbù o siri ya ike inweta ndị ga-akwụ ụgwọ iji wee gbapụta ya
O boro Lamido ebubo na ọ na-eyi ndị ndu Jigawa ụjọ ka ha ghara iguzo dị ka ndị e tinyere ya aka iji mee ka agbapụta ya
Lamido gọrọ ebubo ndị a
N’ọnwa Juun afọ 2007, Lamido boro ụlọ akụ ndị ọhụụ ebubo na ha na-enyere ndị gọvanọ steeti aka ịkwakọrọ akụ ha, ma kpọọ oku ka iwu sie ike
N'onwa Julai afọ 2007, Lamido kwuputara atumatu itinye ego ijeri naira abuo n’ime onwa isii na-abia abia, were ego were wughari a ulo akwukwo ma nyekwa ha ihe ndi eji eme nkuzi
Steeti ahụ tinyekwara ego dị nde naịra narị anọ na iri anọ na ise (N450m) maka ọzụzụ ndị nkuzi na-akụzi isi ọmụmụ na kọleji
Ọ malitere mmemme ihe owuwu buru ibu, nke ikike mmepe isi obodo Dutse na Ikike ụlọ Jigawa Steeti duziri
N'ọnwa Septemba, afọ 2009, Lamido kwere nkwa ịnye ndị na-etinye ego na njem nleta na ile ọbịa na Jigawa Steeti ohere ibupụta ala na akụrụngwa bụ n'efu
N’ọnwa iri na abụọ n’afọ 2009, Lamido kwupụtara atụmatụ nke a ga-enye ndị arịrịọ ego kwa ọnwa iji kwụsi ịnọ n’okporo ụzọ
N’ọnwa Disemba afọ 2009, akọwara na Olusegun Obasanjo ebidola ịmanye Lamido ka ọ bụrụ osote onyeisiala PDP na ntuliaka nke afọ 2011
Lamido dọrọ ndọrọ nke ọma maka ntuli aka nke ụbọchị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011

O nwetara vootu dị n'ọnu ogụgụ Puku Narị isii na iri asaa na isii, nari atọ na asa, ya na onye so ya n'azụ Badaru Abubakar nke otu Action Congress of Nigeria (ACN) nwetara vootu puku narị atọ na iri anọ na atọ, otu nari na iri asa na asaa
N'afọ 2015 Lamido na ụmụ ya ndị nwoke abụọ ka ejidere na mkpọrọ nkenke oge ma nwaa ha maka ebubo ịhazi nkwekọrịta site n'ụlọ ọrụ ndị ha na-achịkwa
Lamido tara ndị iro ya ụta
N’ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2017, Lamido dere ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ya na ndị isi otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ya bụ (PDP) kwupụta na ya nwere mmasị ịzọ ọkwa onyeisiala na ntuli aka onyeisiala na-afọ 2019

N’ọnwa Febụwarị nke afọ 2018, Lamido kwuputara n’onwe ya ịzọ ọkwa n'iwepụta onye ga-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala nkePDP maka ntuliaka ọkwa onyeisiala nke afọ 2019 na ọgbakọ ọ chịkọbara na obodo ya na Gọọmenti mpaghara Birni Kudu na Jigawa Steeti
Lamido na nnọkọ ahụ kwupụtara na ọ ga-abụ onyeisiala Naịjirịa na 2019 ruo n'isi ndị na-akwado ya
N’ọnwa Juun afọ 2018, ndị nkwado Lamido haziri nnọkọ ikpe ekpere na Dutse maka ọganiihu nke mkpọsa onyeisiala ya mana ndị uwe ojii megidere ya n’ihi ihe nchekwa
Ụmụ akwụkwọ Jigawa Steeti ndi Lamido nyere agụmakwụkwọ efu mgbe ọ bụ gọvanọ na steeti ahụ haziri ekpere a
Lamido bụ otu n’ime mmadụ iri na abụọ na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala PDP n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2018
Ndị ọzọ zọrọ ọkwa a bụ onye bụ osote onye isi ala, Atiku Abubakar (Adamawa Steeti), Ibrahim Dankwabo (Yobe Steeti) otu mpaghara ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ dịka Lamido
Nke a bụ nnukwu nsogbu dịrị Lamido n'ihi na a ga-ekewa ndị vootu si mpaghara ahụ n'etiti ndị pụtara na mpaghara a
N’iru ntuli aka nke onye otu ahụ, Atiku Abubakar gwara Lamido ka ọ pụọ n’ọsọ ahụ ma kwado ya mana Lamido jụrụ na ya bụ okenye Atiku
Ndị ọzọ bụ Bukola Saraki, Aminu Tambuwal, Rabiu Kwankwaso, Jonah Jang, David Mark, Kabiru Turaki, Dati Baba-Ahmed, Attahiru Bafarawa na Ahmed Makarfi

Na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke PDP mere n'ụbọchi isii n'ọnwa ọktoba afọ 2018, Lamido nwetara votu iri itoolu na isii bụrụ onye nke isii dị anya na-esote Atiku Abubakar onye nwetara otu puku, narị ise na iri atọ na abụọ wee merie nhoputa otu a

Sulliman Johan Mazadou (ka amụrụ n'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1985 na Marignane, France) bụ onye Nigerien na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbara klọb French US Marignane na Championnat de France amateur
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger gbara na 2012 Africa Cup of Nations megide ndị otu Gabon na otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu nchekwa Niger na egwuregwu ọzọ Tunisia
Sullivan Iheanacho Chime (b
10 April 1959) bu governor ndi bi na Enugu State na Naigeria
Ha nwetara office ahu na 29 Mee 2007
Sulyman Durosylorun Kawu bụ onye ọka ikpe Naijiria nke na-eje ozi ugbu a dka onye ọka ikpe ukwu nke Kwara Steeti kemgbe afọ 2014
Gọvanọ Abdulfatah Ahmed họpụtara ya site na ndụmọdụ nke Kwara State Judicial Service Commission
N'oge iyi nke ndị ọka ikpe n'afọ 2017, Kawu dọrọ ndị ọrụ ikpe aka ná ntị na ndị ọka ikpe rụrụ arụ na-anara aka azụ iji nye ikpe na-ele mmadụ anya n'ihu ga-aga hel
N'ihi ọrịa COVID-19 n'afọ 2020, Kawu gbaghaara ndị mkpọrọ iri anọ na isii na-echere ikpe na Oke-Kura maximum na Mandala Medium prisons na Ilorin
Sumaya Dalmar, nke a makwaara nke ọma dị ka Sumaya YSL, bụ onye Somali-Canada transgender activist na ihe nlereanya
A mụrụ Dalmar na Somalia
Ọ hapụrụ n'oge agha obodo Somalia malitere mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ
Nne na nna Dalmar gọnahụrụ ya mgbe ọ pụtara dị ka trans n'ebe ha nọ na 2011
Onye Alakụba bi na Toronto nwụrụ n'ọnọdụ dị omimi na 22 Febụwarị 2015 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na isii

Ọ bụ ihe omume e jiri ya tụnyere omume ime ihe ike ndị ọzọ megide ụmụ nwanyị trans nke na-acha ọbara ọbara, ọkachasị n'oge ọnwa ndị mbụ nke afọ 2015 mgbe a kọrọ na ihe omume ndị dị otú ahụ na-eme n'ụzọ dị elu, mana ndị uwe ojii ewepụla igbu ọchụ

N'afọ 2013, ọ bụ onye isi na-eme ihe nkiri maka egwuregwu na ihe ngosi nke gbalịrị ime ka mmekọrịta dị n'etiti agbụrụ Somalia, okpukpe, na njikọ ya na nwoke n'oge ọrụ a na-akpọ 'An Intimate Portrait of Somalian Trans-Woman' nke Abdi Osman
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2014, ọ bụ isiokwu nke ihe ngosi nka ma bụrụ onye ruru eru dị ka onye na-agwọ okwu
Dalmar, onye nwere aha etiti Dasia, gosipụtakwara na ọrụ ndị ọzọ, dị ka ịhazi oge ịmalite ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ LGBT a na-akpọ The 519
Otu onye na-akọwa ihe toro ogo nke anya o nyere ndị trans
N'afọ 2018, ndị enyi na ndị obodo guzobere Sumaya Dalmar Award maka ụmụ akwụkwọ trans nke agba iji kwado ọrụ ndụ ya
Sumayela Ndebele, Northern Transvaal Ndebele ma ọ bụ siNdebele bụ asụsụ Bantu nke South Africa A na-asụ ya na ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Southern Ndebele
Sanele Tresure Sithole (amụrụ na 28 Machị 1989), nke a maara dị ka Sun-El Musician, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri diski na South Africa, onye na-emepụta egwu, na onye na-ede égwu
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Osimiri Mooi
Ọ gara Mahadum nke KwaZulu-Natal mana ọ kwụsịrị iji nweta ọrụ na egwu
Abọm studio mbụ ya Africa to the World (2018), nke ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ nke South Africa (RiSA) nyere onyinye ọla edo
Ọ bụ onye na-emepụta Demor Music tupu e guzobe akara ndekọ nke ya EL World Music
E wepụtara abọm ya kachasị ọhụrụ African Electronic Dance Music n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2021
A mụrụ Sanele Tresure Sithole na 28 Maachị 1989 n'obodo Mooi River, KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa, ma zụlite ya na ụmụnne anọ site n'aka nne na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ
Ọ gara Mahadum KwaZulu-Natal mana ọ kwụsịrị na 2007
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ, Sithole nọrọ afọ abụọ n'ụlọ wee malite ọrụ egwu ya na 2007 na-agwakọta egwu ma mmepụta egwu agwakọtara
Sithole zutere Demor Skhosana onye bịanyere aka na ya n'okpuru akara ndekọ ya Demor Music, rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta egwu ruo afọ ise
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na studio na Bucie na 2011 na 2014, ma n'oge a o mepụtara abọm atọ maka Demor
Sithole wee malite ịmepụta egwu nke ya n'okpuru aha Sun-El Musician
Otu egwu izizi ya 'Akanamali' ruru n'ọkwa nke mbụ na Shazam na 2016
Na mbido afọ 2017 o guzobere EL World Music
E wepụtara abọm izizi ya bụ Africa to the World na Eprel 20, 2018

Ndị egwu 'Sonini', 'Bamthathile', na 'Ntab'Ezikude' niile natara asambodo platinum site na Recording Industry of South Africa (RISA) Na June 2018, egwu ya 'Akanamali' mere ka o nweta onyinye atọ na 24th South African Music Awards, nke gụnyere Best Collaboration, Highest Airplay Song na Highest Airpla Composer
A họpụtakwara Africa to the World na 25th South African Music Awards na June 2019, RISA kwadoro ọla edo n'afọ sochirinụ
N'afọ 2019, Sithole malitere njem dị ukwuu na South Africa
Egwu 'Into Ingawe', nke gosipụtara Ami Faku, bụ platinum site na RISA
E wepụtara abọm studio nke abụọ ya bụ To the World & Beyond na Disemba 4, 2020
Otu 'Ubomi Abumanga' gosipụtara Msaki
N'ọnwa Eprel 2021, Sithole wepụtara egwu 'Uhuru' ya na onye na-agụ egwu South Africa bụ Azana
E wepụtara ihe ndekọ a kpọrọ Kunye Live Mix n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2021
E wepụtara abọm studio nke atọ ya bụ African Electronic Dance Music na 29 Ọktoba 2021 na South Africa
N'ụbọchị gara aga, Sithole bụ isi nke Basha Uhuru Creative Uprising Festival n'akụkụ Langa Mavuso
Na Disemba 2021, Gallo Records họọrọ Sithole ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na ngughari egwu ochie na Extended Play akpọrọ Music is Forever tinyere Nobuhle, Muzi, na ndị omenkà ndị ọzọ
N'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Mee, ọ bụ onye isi egwu na egwu Bassline I AM LIVE
Ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha Mee 2022, ọ bụ onye isi nke MTN Bushfire Festival, nke emere na Malkerns Valley, site na Mee 27-29
Sixth Form College bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ onwe onye dị na Lagos Naijiria, kọleji nke isii na Isolo, Lagos, Naijiria maka ụmụ akwụkwọ nwere ike agụmakwụkwọ

Ọ na-enye oge zuru ezu Cambridge AS na A-level ọmụmụ maka ihe dị ka ụmụ akwụkwọ otu narị (ọtụtụ n'ime ha dị n'agbata afọ nwanne iri na isii na iri abụọ na abụọ ) site na mpaghara gbara ya gburugburu na akụkụ ọ bụla nke mba ahụ
Aha ọma SunRise Academy maka ihe ịga nke ọma agụmakwụkwọ bịara n'afọ 2006 mgbe atọ n'ime asaá ya nwere AAA
Kemgbe ahụ, ụmụ akwụkwọ na-amụ na kọleji nke isii enwetala ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị elu
SunRise Sixth Form College, e guzobere iji nyere ụmụ akwụkwọ Naijiria aka dị njikere ịkwalite agụmakwụkwọ ha na Mahadum Naijiria ma ọ bụ ná mba ofesi
Kọleji ahụ nwere njikọ na ọtụtụ mahadum mba ọzọ, kọleji / kọleji nke isii, bụ kọleji agụmakwụkwọ A na-anabata ihe ruru otu narị ụmụ akwụkwọ kwa afọ
Kọleji ahụ dị na Lagos, Naịjirịa
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, e nwere ihe karịrị ụmụ akwụkwọ otu nari na mahadum dị iche iche na mba ofesi ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ a
Ọ bụ Soneye Philip guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
SunRise Sixth Form College na-anọchite anya ihe dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ iri atọ na isii na UK maka IUFP ugbu a
The International University Foundation Programme (IUFP) bụ otu afọ zuru oke nke na-eme otu afọ, nke na-enye ụmụ akwụkwọ ụzọ ịbanye na Mahadum ndị Britain dị elu maka ọmụmụ na United Kingdom

Ebumnuche mmemme a bụ maka ụmụ akwụkwọ mba ụwa gụnyere ndị bi na United Kingdom ma na-achọ ịbanye na Mahadum ndị na-eduga na Britain mgbe otu afọ nke ọmụmụ ihe gasịrị na-enweghị mkpa ịmalite afọ abụọ nke GCE

Ụmụ akwụkwọ na-emecha IUFP nke ọma ga-aga n'ihu na ọmụmụ ihe na Mahadum ndị Britain na-eduga nke bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọganihu na Middlesex College of Law ma ọ bụ kwado IUFP n'ụzọ na-abụghị nke iwu
Sun Come Up bụ ihe nkiri ihe nkiri nke afọ 2010 banyéré mmetụta nke okpomọkụ ụwa na Carteret Islands
A kpọrọ ya aha dị ka ónyé a họpụtara màkà Academy Award for Best Documentary (Short Subject) na 83rd Academy Awards n'ubochi irí abụọ na ise n'onwa Jenụwarị afọ 2011, mana Strangers No More meriri ya
Sunday Jack Akpan (amụrụ Ikot Ide Etukudo, 1940) bụ onye na-akpụ ihe na Naijiria nke a kọwara dị ka 'onye Afrịka nke oge a yiri onye ọrụ nka nke oge ochie'

Ọ bụ onye ama ama maka ọrụ ya ọ jị simenti wee rụọ nke ọ na-arụ ihe oyiyi ọdịnala nke ndị isi agbụrụ na ndị ọzọ, ọkachasị dị ka nka ili, nke ọ na-ese; o mekwara ụdị nka azụmahịa ndị ọzọ, nke gụnyere ndị okpukpe na akara azụmahịa
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Venice Biennale na Centre Pompidou na Paris, n'etiti ebe ndị ọzọ
Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta nke Horniman Museum na London
Sunday Mba (amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na asatọ nke ọnwa Nọvemba afọ1988) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa bụ onye ikpeazụ onye ọgba bọọlụ Yeni Malatyaspor na ndị otu mba Naijiria
Mba sonyeere otu egwuregwu Rangers na mgbazinye n'ọnwa Mee nke afọ 2013 site na Warri Wolves

Ọ nyere goolu na bọọlụ nke mbụ ya na otu egwuregwu Rangers na mmeri 3-1 Clube Recreativo Desportivo do Libolo meriri ha na 2013 CAF Champions League O binyere aka na otu egwuregwu Bastia n'ọnwa Disemba mgbe emechara nkparịta ụka nke nọrọ ihe nwere ike iru otu afọ
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2019, mgbe afọ abụọ gachara na-onweghị otu egwuregwu, o kwuru na ọ chọrọ ịlaghachi na'ịgba bọọlụ
Ọ bụ onye otu nke abụọ Nigeria nke meriri Iko mba Afrịka WAFU 2010
O mere mpụta nke mbụ ya n'egwuregwu Eagles na Angola nke gwụrụ na onye lawa onye lawa n'ọnwa Jenụwarị nke afọ 2012
Ọ nyere goal na egwuregwu bọọlụ megide Liberia n'egwuregwu ya ọzọ
A kpọrọ ya ka ọ bịa n'òtù ndị ikom iri abụọ na atọ nke Naijiria maka iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 2013 Mba nyere goolu mmeri na mmeri 2-1 nke Naịjirịa meriri Ivory Coast
N'abalị iri nke ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2013, n'egwuregwu ikpeazụ ya na Burkina Faso, ọ nyere goolu mbụ na naanị goolu nke egwuregwu ahụ, iji nye Naịjirịa iko mba Afrịka nke atọ
A họpụtara ya isonye ndị otu Naịjirịa na 2013 FIFA Confederations Cup

Sunday Ọgọchukwu Oliseh (amụrụ ya na 14 Septemba1974) bụ onye nlekọta anya ndị Naịjirịa na-agba bọọlụ na kwa onye na-agbabu bọọlụ
Mgbe ọ na-agba bọọlụ, ọ bụ n'etiti ka ọ na-agba
Ọ bụ onye kwudosiri ike ma nwekwa nka na-ịgba n'ọnọdụ nchekwa n'etiti
Oliseh na-agbala ndị klọb ama ama na ụwa dịka AFC Ajax, Borussia, Dortmund na Juventus FC
Oliseh gbara bọọlụ ozurumba ma nye ọkpụ atọ na Naịjirịa ma gbakwaa na iko mba ụwa na 1994 na 1998
Oliseh sonyere na egwuregwu Olimpiki nke ọlaedo ya na 1996
Ndị CAF tụnyere Sunday Oliseh dịka onye nke atọ kacha agba bọọlụ na Afrịka na 1998
A na-echetakarị ya maka ọkpụ mmeri ọ nyere na gurupu staji nke ọ nyere ndị spain na iko mba ụwa na 1998 nke Naịjirịa gbara 3-2
A tụpụtara bọọlụ na ọgbọ, Oliseh were ọsọ wee gbaa bọọlụ ahụ 25 yadị, nke ochee ọkpụ bụ Andoni Zubizarreta na-atụghị anya
N'agbanyeghị na ọ bụ onye isi ndị otu ya na iko mba Afrịka na 2002, e wepụrụ ya na-isonye ndị otu ya, gbaa asọmpi iko mba ụwa maka mgbazi enyere ya maka ihe ọjọọ, ọ mere
Oliseh gara ezumike nka na Juunu 2002 maka anaghị akwuzị ya ụgwọ ruru ya
Na Machị 2004, a chụpụrụ Oliseh na Borussia Dortmund maka isi ọ tara onye otu ya bụ Vahid Hashemian mgbe ọ nọ mbinyelụ na Vfl Bochum maka o kparịrị ndị ojii
Na jenuwarị 2006, afọ 31, Oliseh gara ezumike nka na fuutubọọlụ mgbe ọ gbachara ọkara sizen ndị KRC Genk na Belgian
Oliseh malitere ọrụ koochi ya na Belgium, ya na ndi otu Belgians nke atọ Verviers, ndị na-erughi afọ iri na iteghete
Ọ gụchara na tiim nke mbụ dịka onye isi koochi 2014-15
E mere ya onye isi koochi na onye nchekwa klọb na RCS VISE Belgium nke atọ

Na 2015-16, ' Naịjirịa Futubọọlụ Federechọn' (NFF) mere ya onye isi koochi nke otu Naịjirịa (Super Eagles of Nigeria) ebe ọ mere nke ọma; egwuregwu 14 sọọsọ abụọ ka ọ dara, ọkpụ 19 ka ọ nyere, enye sọọsọ 6

Ọ kpọrọ ndị Naịjirịa gaa ndọrọndọrọ CHAN na Rwanda, Mekwaa Naịjirịa ha etozue ị gaa asọmpi iko mba ụwa nke grupu na kwa egwuregwu mbụ ya dịka onye isi koochi ndị Naịjirịa na AFCON, ha na Tanzania gbara jiiji
Ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ onye isi koochi Naịjirịa na 26 Febuwarị 2016, nke otu ọnwa na-abia mgbe ha na Egypt ga-agba na AFCON
Ọ nọghi rue ọnwa asatọ, n'ihi akwadoghị nke ọma, akwụ ụgwọ na ihe nrite ndị ọzọ enyeghị ya na ya onwe ya
Na 27 disemba, emere Oliseh onye nchekwa Fortuna Sittard
A chụpụrụ ya 14 febuwarị 2008, nke o kwuru na ọ bụ maka osoghị ha mee ihe na-ekwesịghị na klọb
Ọ nọrọ afọ abụọ na-enweghị klọb
Na Machị 2020, Oliseh kwuru na ọ jụrụ ọrụ abụọ nke ndị Belgian klọb, na ọ na-eche ezigbo ọrụ

N'agbanyeghị na Oliseh na-agba n'etiti na ọrụ egwuregwu ya niile, Jonathan Wilson kwuru n'edemede ya na 'The Guardian' nke 2013, na ọ bụ onye mbụ na-akọwa ọrụ bọọlụ ya nke ọma, onye na-elebakarị anya ijide bọọlụ karịa ị na-achọ ọnwụnwe azụ
Ụmụ nwanne ya nwoke ndị obele bụ Azụbuike na Egutu, bụkwa ndị na-agba bọọlụ, nwanne ya ọzọ bụ Churchill Oliseh na nwa nwanne ya bụ Sekou Oliseh
Sunday Omobolanle aka Papi Luwe, MON (a mụrụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1, afọ 1954) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ede egwuregwu, onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
A mụrụ ya na Ọktoba 1, 1954 na Ilora, obodo dị na Oyo Steeti n'ebe ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ nna Sunkanmi Omobolanle, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi na Naijiria
Sunday Omobolanle dere, duzie, mepụta ma gosipụta na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa dịka Adun Ewuro, ihe nkiri Naịjirịa nke afọ 2011 nke gosipụtara Adebayo Salami
N'ịghọta onyinye ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naịjirịa, Olusegun Obasanjo, onye bụbu onye isi ala nke Federal Republic of Nigeria nyere ya onyinye mba, MON

Nri abalị a na-esi n'ọkụ na Sọnde ma ọ bụ nri abalị a na'ọkụ na Sunday bụ nri ọdịnala ndị Britain nke a na-ejikarị eme ihe na Sọndee, ọ bụ ezie na enwere ike iri ya n'izu niile, nke nwere anụ a na-esiri esi, poteto a na-akpọ poteto na ihe ndị na-eso ya dị ka Yorkshire pudding, stuffing, salse, na-atọ ụtọ, na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ dị ka apple sauce, ma ọ bụ redcurrant jelly

Enwere ike inye akwụkwọ nri dịgasị iche iche dị ka akụkụ nke nri abalị a na-esi esi, dị ka broccoli, Brussels sprouts, carrots, cauliflower, parsnips, ma ọ bụ peas, nke enwere ike isi, mee ka ọ sie, ma ọ bụrụ ihe a na-esiri n'akụkụ anụ na poteto
Poteto a na-eme ka ọ dị nro bụkwa ihe a na-ejikarị eme ihe
Ihe a ma ama na Sunday roast na omenala Britain bụ nke na na ntuli aka UK na 2012 ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ na ndepụta nke ihe ndị mmadụ hụrụ n'anya banyere Britain
Aha ndị ọzọ maka nri a gụnyere nri ehihie Sunday, nri ehihie Sọnde, nri abalị a siri esi, na nri a siri esi
A na-ejikarị nri ahụ tụnyere ụdị nri abalị Krismas dị ala

E wezụga na a na-enye ya n'ala nna ya, omenala nke nri ehihie ma ọ bụ nri abalị a na-esi n'ọkụ na Sọnde abụwo mmetụta dị ukwuu na ọdịbendị nri na ụwa na-asụsu Bekee, kachasị na mba Australia, Canada, South Africa, United States, na New Zealand

A na-esi anụ na Sọnde na obodo South Africa na-agụnyekarị anụ ezì, anụ ehi, nwa atụrụ ma ọ bụ ọkụkọ, poteto a na-esi esi, poteto mashed, pumpkin fritters, Yorkshire pudding, na akwụkwọ nri dị iche iche dị ka cheese cauliflower-broccoli, spinach a na-akpọ creme, mashed ma ọ bụ butternut squash a na-es, agwa, karọt, ọka ọhụrụ, beetroot, na poteto na-atọ
Ọ bụkwa ihe a na-ahụkarị iji nye osikapa na ofe na South Africa kama inye Yorkshire pudding
Nri a na-esi n'ọkụ na Sunday malitere na British Isles karịsịa Yorkshire dị ka nri a ga-eri mgbe chọọchị gasịrị na Sunday
Iri nri buru ibu na esochi ozi ụka bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị n'ọtụtụ Europe, mana ụdị a na-esi n'ọkụ na Sunday mepụtara pụrụ iche na British Isles
Na Sọnde, a na-ekwe ka a rie ụdị anụ na mmiri ara ehi niile; nke a dị iche na Fraịdee, ebe ọtụtụ ndị Roman Katọlik na ndị Anglịkan na-ezere iri anụ, yabụ na-eri azụ̀ kama
N'otu aka ahụ, ọ bụ omenala maka ndị Anglịkan na ndị Katọlik Bekee ibu ọnụ tupu ozi Sọnde, na nri buru ibu iji mebie ibu ọnụ mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị
Iwu okpukpe ndị a mepụtara ọtụtụ nri ọdịnala na United Kingdom
E nwere ihe abụọ mere n'akụkọ ihe mere eme banyere mmalite nke Sunday roast nke oge a
Na ngwụcha afọ 1700, n'oge mgbanwe ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na United Kingdom, ezinụlọ ga-etinye anụ n'ime ite ọkụ ka ha na nkwadebe maka ụka
Ha ga-agbakwunye akwụkwọ nri dịka poteto, turnips na parsnips tupu ha aga chọọchị n'ụtụtụ Sọnde
Mgbe ha si na chọọchị lọta, nri abalị adịla njikere
A na-eji mmiri sitere na anụ na akwụkwọ nri eme ihe iji mee ngwaahịa ma ọ bụ ofe iji wụnye n'elu nri abalị
Echiche nke abụọ na-ekwu na a na-esi nri na Sọnde n'oge etiti oge, mgbe ndị ohu obodo na-ejere squire ozi ụbọchị isii n'izu
Mgbe ahụ, na Sọnde, mgbe ozi ụtụtụ gasịrị, ndị ohu ga-ezukọta n'ọhịa ma na-eme usoro agha ha ma jiri oriri ehi a na-esi n'elu ọnụ na-akwụghachi ha ụgwọ

Anụ ndị a na-eji esi nri na Sunday bụ ọkụkọ, nwa atụrụ, anụ ezì, ma ọ bụ anụ ehi a siri esi, ọ bụ ezie na enwere ike iji ọbọgwụ, goose, gammon, turkey, ma ọ dị ka (na-adịghị adịkebe) nnụnụ egwuregwu ndị ọzọ
Enwere ike iji akwụkwọ nri a siri esi, nke a na-esi na / ma ọ bụ nke a na'ọkụ na Sunday sie

Akwụkwọ nri ndị a na-enye na-adị iche site n'oge ruo n'ógbè, mana ọ ga-agụnyekarị poteto a siri esi, nke a na-esi n'anụ ma ọ bụ mmanụ akwụkwọ nri, yana ofe e ji juices nke anụ a na-esiri esi, ma eleghị anya gbakwunyere otu ma ọ bụ karịa cubes, ofe browning / thiening, roux ma ọ bụ ntụ ọka
Enwere ike isi poteto gburugburu anụ ahụ n'onwe ya, na-amị mmiri na abụba ozugbo (dị ka ọ dị na omenala Cornish)
Otú ọ dị, ọtụtụ ndị na-esi nri na-ahọrọ isi poteto na Yorkshire pudding n'ọkụ ọkụ karịa nke a na-eji maka nkwonkwo ma wepụ anụ ahụ tupu oge eruo iji zuo ike ma 'na-ebi' n'ebe na-ekpo ọkụ

Nri akwụkwọ nri ndị ọzọ a na-eri na nri abalị a siri esi nwere ike ịgụnye mashed swede ma ọ bụ turnips, parsnips a siri esi, cabbage a siri esi ma ọ bụ steamed, broccoli, green beans, na carrot na peas a siri esi
Ọ bụghịkwa ihe a na-ahụkarị maka nri akwụkwọ nri ndị fọdụrụnụ dị ka cheese cauliflower na cabbage red stewed ka a na-enye ya n'akụkụ ụdị akwụkwọ nri ndị a na-esiri esi n'oge
Egwú ọdịnala ndị a na-ahụkarị gụnyere
Nri ndị fọdụrụnụ site na Sunday roast bụ ihe ndabere nke nri a na-enye n'ụbọchị ndị ọzọ n'izu

Dịka ọmụmatụ to, enwere ike iji anụ mee ihe dị ka ihe na-eme ka bred, enwere ike ịkpụpụta anụ ehi a siri esi na poteto a siri esi fọdụrụ na yabasị ụfọdụ ọzọ wee sie ya na pan na mmanụ na ihe ndị a chọrọ ruo mgbe ọ dịtụ mma iji mee anụ ehi a kwọrọ akwọ, enwere ike jiri ya mee ihe na-etinye achịcha onye ọzụzụ atụrụ, akwụkwọ nri nwere ike ịbụ ihe ndabere maka efere na squeak na Scotland maka stovies ọdịnala
Na mba UK, ọtụtụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na-enye nri nwere menu Sunday nke na-egosi nri Sunday, na-enwekarị anụ dịgasị iche iche
Sundowner bụ ifufe na-efe n'ébé ugwu na California n'akụkụ ndịda Pacific nkè Santa Ynez Mountains, na obodo ndị dị na Gaviota Coast na Santa Barbara ma ọ bụghị Ventura County
Ọ na-eme mgbè mpaghara dị elu dị kpọmkwem n'ébé ugwu nke mpaghara ahụ, ụsọ oké osimiri nké na-aga n'ébé ọwụwa anyanwụ
Nke a dị iche na mmiri na-asọba n'ụsọ oké osimiri
Ifufe na-efe n'ike kachasị ukwuu mgbè nrụgide gradient dị n'akụkụ axis nke Ugwu Santa Ynez, nke na-ebili kpọmkwem n'azụ Santa Barbara

Ifufe ndị a na-ebute ihe omume Santa Ana otu ụbọchị ma ọ bụ abụọ, kamakwa dị ka njedebe ọdụ nke Santa Anas mgbè ha na-ebelata, ọ bụ ihe dị mmá màkà ébé nrụgide dị elu ịkwaga n'ébé ọwụwa anyanwụ, na-eme ka nrụgide gradients gbanwee gaa n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa mmiri
Ndị a na-akpọ aha ọma na-abụkarị ihe omume abalị nke na-akwụsị mgbè anyanwụ pụtara, ha nwèrè ike imeghachi ọtụtụ ụbọchị, ébé Santa Anas bụ ihe omume ogologo ụbọchị
Mmetụta na-adịghị ike nke anyanwụ nwéré ike ime na-enweghị ihe omume Santa Ana metụtara ya, mgbe ụfọdụ n'ihi ihe omume ifufe Diablo (Northern California), nke yiri ifufe foehn
Ndị na-ada anyanwụ dị ize ndụ karịsịa n'ogè ọkụ ọhịa n'ihi na ikuku na-ekpo ọkụ ma kpọọ nkụ ka ọ na-esi n'ugwu gbadata n'oké osimiri
Ifufe na-ekpo ọkụ, ikuku kpọrọ nkụ nwèrè ike ime ka ọkụ ghara ikwe omume
Ónyé na-ada anyanwụ gbara ọkụ ngwa ngwa site n'ugwu site na ébé ndị mmadụ bi na ya gafee Highway 101 n'ime Hope Ranch n'ogè 1990 Painted Cave Fire
A na-ekwukwa na ógè kachasị ike nke mbibi ọkụ Jesusita bụ n'ihi ifufe na-ada
Ọkụ Sherpa toro ruo acres puku anọ (1,600 hectare) n'otu abalị n'ihi ifufe na-ada, na-ebibi usoro mmiri màkà El Capitán State Beach na mbido ógè ọkụ nke afọ 2016
Okwu a na-akpọ sundowner ejighị n'aka, mànà ọ nwèrè ike isite na okwu Spanish zonda, ma ọ bụ site na Arabic simoom, nke abụọ yiri nke ikuku

Ọ bụkwa ihe a na-ahụkarị na ifufe na-ada n'anyanwụ na-amalite n'uhuruchi n'akụkụ anyanwụ, mgbè ikuku mmiri na-efe n'ụsọ oké osimiri na-ebelata na mmiri na-asọ n'ụsara oké osimiri dị ka ndị na-ada anyanwụ na-eburu
Sunette Stella Viljoen (amụrụ n'abalị isii n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1983) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu na South Africa nke nọchitere anya mba ya na cricket na egwuregwu

N'egwuregwu, ọ na-asọ mpi dị ka onye na-atụba javelin ma merie ihe nrite ọlaọcha nke Olympic (na 2016) na ihe nrite abụọ nke Commonwealth Games (na 2006 na 2010), yana ihe nrite na asọmpi ndị ọzọ dị iche iche
Dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu cricket, ọ nọchitere anya ndị otu mba South Africa n'etiti afọ 2000 na 2002, gụnyere na 2000 World Cup na New Zealand
A mụrụ Viljoen na Rustenburg, Transvaal (nke bụ North West ugbu a)
Ọ gara Die Hoërskool Rustenburg na asụsụ mbụ ya bụ Afrikaans
Viljoen mere egwuregwu cricket nke mbụ ya na mba South Africa na June 2000, na egwuregwu One Day International (ODI) megide England
Ọ dị afọ iri na asaa na ụbọchị iri n'oge ahụ, na-aghọ nwanyị kachasị nta na-egwu ODI cricket maka South Africa (ihe ndekọ kemgbe ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ mebiri)
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, a họpụtara Viljoen na ndị otu South Africa maka 2000 Women's World Cup na New Zealand
Onye na-eji aka nri eme ihe niile, ọ pụtara na egwuregwu asatọ niile nke otu ya na asọmpi ahụ, na megide England gbara 54 na-abụghị, nke ga-abụ akara kachasị elu nke ọrụ ODI ya
Ya na Ireland n'egwuregwu ọzọ, o nwetara 3/27 site na iri, ọnụ ọgụgụ kacha mma nke ọrụ mba ụwa ya
Ọ gbara ODI anọ na naanị egwuregwu ule nke ọrụ ya, ebe ọ gbara ọsọ 17 na innings mbụ na 71 na nke abụọ (nke atọ kachasị elu nke egwuregwu ahụ)
Na Disemba 2021, Viljoen laghachiri na cricket, sonye na Northerns na ebumnuche nke igwu egwu maka mba ya ọzọ
Viljoen ritere ọla edo na 2009 Summer Universiade na Belgrade, na-atụfu mita 6252
N'agba nke iru eru, o setịpụrụ ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ nke Afrịka 6546 mita, na-eme ka onye obodo ya Justine Robbeson nwee ihe ndekọ 6349m na Potchefstroom na Febụwarị 2008
Mgba Viljoen tụbara ihe karịrị mita atọ karịa PB mbụ ya nke 6224 m nwetara na nzukọ February 2008 na Potchefstroom
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2010, o ji mita 6638 mebie ihe ndekọ nke ya na Josef Odložil Memorial na Prague
Viljoen ritere ọlaọcha na IAAF World Championships na Daegu, Korea na 2 Septemba 2011
Site na ịtụfu 6838m, o setịpụkwara ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ nke Afrịka

[citation needed] Ọ meziwanyere ndekọ Afrịka ya ruo 6935m na Adidas Grand Prix na New York City na June 2012 N'ịbụ onye na-erughị na ngwụcha na 2004 na 2008 Summer Olympics, ọ mechara nke anọ na 2012 Summer Olympics, naanị 038 cm site na akara mmeri ọla nchara
Na 2013 World Championships in Athletics, nke e mere na Moscow, Viljoen were naanị ọnọdụ nke isii na akara nke mita 6358
N'afọ 2014, ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na Commonwealth Games
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, ọ meriri African Championships site na 6532m
Viljoen meriri nrite ọlaọcha, na-abịa na nke abụọ na Israel's Marharyta Dorozhon, na IAAF Diamond League Bislett Games na Oslo, Norway, na 11 June 2015
Viljoen ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha na javelin ụmụ nwanyị na 2016 Summer Olympics na Rio

Sung-Yoon Lee ( Korean) bụ ọkà mmụta na Korea ya na ihe ọmụmụ na East Asia, na ọkachamara na North Korea
Ọ bụ onye Prọfesọ na Kim Koo - Korea Foundation na Korea na onye enyemaka Prọfesọ na Fletcher School of Law and Diplomacy, Tufts University
Ọ bụ onye mmekọ ihe na nyocha na Korea Institute, Mahadum Harvard

Sungor (Assangori) bụ asụsụ nkè ọwụwa anyanwụ Chad ná ọdịda anyanwụ Sudan
Á na-asụ yá n'ógbè dị n'ebe ndịda Biltine ná n'ebe ùgwù Adré ná Chad
Ọ bụ ónyé ọtú ezinụlọ asụsụ Taman
Ìhè kà ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-asụ asụsụ àlà bụ ndị Alakụba ná ọtụtụ na-eji Chadian Arabic dị kà asụsụ nke abụọ

Suniti Solomon (1938 ma ọ bụ 1939 - 28 Julaị 2015) bụ dibịa India na microbiologist bụ onye malitere nyocha na mgbochi ọrịa AIDS na India mgbe ọ chọpụtara ọrịa AIDS mbụ nke India n'etiti ndị ọrụ mmekọahụ Chennai na 1986 ya na nwa akwụkwọ ya Sellappan Nirmala Ọ tọrọ ntọala Y R Gaitonde Centre for AIDS Research and Education na Chennai
Gọọmentị India nyere ya ihe nrite National Women Bio-scientist Award
Na 25 Jenụwarị 2017, Gọọmentị India nyere ya ihe nrite Padma Shri maka ọgwụ maka onyinye ya maka nchọpụta na ịgwọ nje HIV
A mụrụ Suniti Solomon (née Gaitonde), na ezinụlọ Maharashtrian Hindu nke ndị ahịa akpụkpọ anụ na Chennai
Ọ bụ nwa nke asaa n'ime ezinụlọ mmadụ asatọ ma bụrụ naanị nwa nwanyị
N'ajụjụ ọnụ a gbara ya n'afọ 2009, o kwuru na ọ malitere inwe mmasị n'ọgwụ site na nleta ndị ọrụ ahụike kwa afọ n'ụlọ ha maka ịgba ọgwụ mgbochi
Ọ gụrụ maka ọgwụ na Madras Medical College e wee zụọ ya na pathology na UK, US
na Australia ruo n'afọ 1973 mgbe ya na di ya, Victor Solomon, laghachiri Chennai, n'ihi na 'ọ chere na ọrụ ya dị mkpa karịa na India
' O mere nzere doctorate ya na microbiology ma sonye na ngalaba nke Institute of Microbiology na Madras Medical College mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị
Na ndụ ọrụ mbụ ya na mba ofesi, Solomon rụrụ ọrụ dị ka dibịa na-eto eto na King's College Hospital, London
Mgbe ọ laghachiri India, Solomon rụrụ ọrụ dị ka microbiologist na Madras Medical College wee ruo ọkwa prọfesọ

Ọ gbasoro akwụkwọ banyere nkọwa ahụike nke ọrịa AIDS na 1981, nchọpụta nke nje HIV na 1983 na site na 1986 kpebiri ịnwale otu narị ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ mmekọahụ, ebe India enweghị obodo na-edina ụdị onwe ya n'ihu ọha
Ọbara mmadụ isii n'ime otu narị ahụ gosipụtara na ha bu nje HIV
Solomon mechara ziga ihe ngosi ndị ahụ na Mahadum Johns Hopkins dị na Baltimore maka nyocha ọzọ nke kwadoro nsonaazụ ya
Nchọpụta a ghọrọ akwụkwọ HIV mbụ na India
Kemgbe ahụ, Solomon kpebiri ịrara ndụ ya nye ịrụ ọrụ na nyocha HIV / AIDS, ọgwụgwọ, na mmata

Ọ kọwara otú ndị mmadụ si ezere ndị bu nje HIV; ọbụnadị di ya achọghị ka ya 'na-arụ ọrụ ya na ndị ọrịa bu nje HIV,' ọtụtụ n'ime ha n'oge ahụ bụ ndị na-edina ụdị onwe ha, ndị na-agbanye onwe ha ọgwụ ọjọọ na ndị ọrụ mmekọahụ

Solomọn zara site na 'ị ghaghị ige ntị n'akụkọ ha ma ị gaghị ekwu otu ihe ahụ' Solomon bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ kwuru okwu n'ezoghị ọnụ banyere nje HIV na ihere dị na ya, o kwuru n'otu oge 'ihe na-egbu ndị nwere ọrịa AIDS karịa bụ ihere na ịkpa ókè'
Site na 1988 ruo 1993, Solomon guzobere AIDS Resource Group mbụ na India nke e hiwere na MMC ma rụọ ọtụtụ nyocha AIDS na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ndị otu a bụkwa ụlọ ọrụ HIV / AIDS mbụ zuru oke na India tupu ngalaba ọ bụla nke onwe na nke ọha
N'afọ 1993, Solomon guzobere 'Y R Gaitonde Centre for AIDS Research and Education' (YRG CARE) n'aha nna ya
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ebe mbụ India maka ndụmọdụ na nyocha nke afọ ofufo banyere nje HIV
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2015, a na-ahụ ndị ọrịa otu narị n'ebe ahụ kwa ụbọchị na ndị ọrịa pụkụ ịrị na ise nọ na-eje ebe ahụ mgbe niile
A kọwara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na ọrụ ya n'ebe ahụ dị ka 'ihe ndị dị mkpa n'ibelata ọrịa [HIV]'
Ọ na-enyekwa ndị dọkịta na ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ agụmakwụkwọ banyere nje HIV na ọgwụgwọ ya
O nwetara aha 'dọkịta AIDS nke Chennai' ma jee ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke AIDS Society of India

Solomon rụkọkwara ọrụ na nyocha nyocha mba ụwa, nke gụnyere ọtụtụ mba HIV / STD Prevention Trial na US National Institute of Mental Health, HIV Prevention Trials Network nke US National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases na-eduzi, nyocha NIH nke ihere HIV na ọnọdụ nlekọta ahụike na Southern India, na nyocha nke atọ nke 6% CS GEL, onye na-achọ microbicide nke CONRAD (òtù)
Solomon zutere di ya, Victor Solomon, onye na-awa obi, mgbe ọ na-agụ ọgwụ na Madras College
Ọ gbasoro njem ya na UK, US na Australia
Ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2006
Nwa ha nwoke bụ Sunil Solomon bụ onye na-ahụ maka ọrịa na Mahadum Johns Hopkins dị na Baltimore
A chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa ọrịa kansa pancreatic ọnwa abụọ tupu ọnwụ ya na Julaị 28, 2015, n'ụlọ ya na Chennai, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asaa na isii

Sunsum bụ ihe jikọtara ahụ na mkpụrụ obi (Kra)
Enwere ike ibute Sunsum n'ụzọ dịgasị iche iche, gụnyere site na nna gaa na nwa nwoke n'oge a tụụrụ ime
A na-eji ike a echebe ndị na-ebu mmụọ a
Mgbe nwoke nwụrụ, Sunsum na-alaghachi n'ụlọ atụ nke nna na-echere ka a mụọ ya ọzọ n'ime nwa nwoke ọzọ nke ndị ikom nke ezinụlọ ahụ mụrụ
[citation needed]
Ụdị ọzọ nke Sunsum bụ ike ime mmụọ nke ndị Akan kwenyere na-enye ndị nwere ya ohere ime amoosu
A na-akpọ nke a Sunsum fee, ma ọ bụ 'mmụọ ruru unyi'

N'adịghị ka mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa Sunsum nke a tụlere na mbụ, nke a bụ ike nke a na-eji obi ụtọ nyefee, mgbe mgbe site n'aka nne na nna ochie na ụmụ ụmụ ha chere na ha kwesịrị ike iji anwansi dị otú ahụ
N'ụzọ dị otú a, Sunsum nwere ike ịnọgide na-adị ndụ ma dị mma site na usoro ọmụmụ
Dị ka ụmụ nwoke nwere Sunsum sitere n'okike, ọ bụrụ na ha enweta ego Sunsum ha nwere ike ime mmụọ okpukpu abụọ karịa nwanyị nwere naanị amoosu
N'agbanyeghị nke a, ọ bụ nkwenye a na-ahụkarị na ọtụtụ ndị amoosu bụ ụmụ nwanyị n'etiti ndị Ashanti na ndị Akan, a kwenyere na ha dị ike nke na ha nwere ike igbu ụmụ ọhụrụ naanị site n'ịanụ ha mkpu
[citation needed]
Sunsum bụ onye ọrụ nke Kra, na mgbe Nyame na-enye Kra mgbe amuru, ọ bụ Sunsum na-edu Kra
Ya mere, Kra na Sunsum bụ ndị nwere nzube ogbo nke ibe
Sunsum, n'echiche, bụ nke ma ọ bụ dị n'ụwa a na-ahụ anya na ọ na-aghọ akụkụ na-arụ ọrụ nke mmadụ naanị mgbe mmadụ ghọrọ mkpụrụ obi dị ndụ
Ya mere Sunsum bụ onye nwere uche nke mkpụrụ obi nke Akan
KRA na-efe ofufe; a na-enye onyinye
N'ime ụfọdụ ebo Akan onye ọ bụla nwere ebe ịchụàjà maka KRA ya
Sunsum no rennyaw wo
Sunsum bụ akụkụ nke Akan nke na-alụ ọgụ ọjọọ ndị na-agbalị imerụ KRA
Sunsum na-agba mbọ imeri adịghị ike nke Akan kpugheere ya

Super Bowl XXX bụ egwuregwu bọọlụ America n'etiti onye mmeri National Football Conference (NFC) Dallas Cowboys na onye mmeri American Football Conference (AFC) Pittsburgh Steelers iji kpebie onye mmeri nke National Football League (NFL) maka oge 1995
Cowboys meriri Steelers site na akara nke 271017, na-emeri Super Bowl nke ise ha n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke otu
Nke a bụ Super Bowl mbụ ebe ndị otu abụọ ahụ meriri kemgbe Super Bowl XIX
Ndị otu abụọ ahụ banyere egwuregwu ahụ na-agbalị ijikọ San Francisco 49ers maka ndekọ maka ọtụtụ mmeri Super Bowl site na franchise (5)
Ndị Cowboys, ndị biputere ndekọ 12–4 oge niile, na-eme ngosipụta Super Bowl nke asatọ, ebe ndị S
Superjet Lines Arab Union for Land Transport Company) ma ọ bụ buru ibu na-ebu ndị njem ụgbọ ala na Egypt na ọtụtụ mba Arab
Ebe ọdụ ụgbọ elu dị na Cairo dị na Almaza, Heliopolis, dị nso na ọdụ ụgbọ elu Cairo

Asụsụ Suppire–Mamara bụ ngalaba ugwu nke ezinụlọ asụsụ Senufo ma a na-asụkarị na Mali Ha nwere asụsụ ise dị iche iche, na-agbakọta ihe dị ka ndị na-asụ 750,000 (Olson 1996) Asụsụ Northern Senufo bụ ndị otu obere ndị na-asụ Mande (Duun) kewapụrụ na Central Senufo asụsụ
N'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ na n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ, asụsụ Mande dị ka Bambara na Dioula na-ejikọkwa ha, asụsụ ndị ahụ enweela mmetụta dị ukwuu na okwu na ụtọ asụsụ (Carlson 1994)
Yam pepper Soup bụ nri ndị Naijiria nke e ji puna Ji Puna na-acha ọcha mee
Ọ dị mkpa ka ji dị nro
A na-ahụkarị Ndị n'eri ofe ahụ n'etiti ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa na ụfọdụ n'ime Ngwanri eji esi ya bụ ehuru, ose ndụ , ụdị anụ dị iche iche, nnu na akwụkwọ na-esi ísì ụtọ
A na-agbakwunye Ngwanri ndị a mgbe ji dịịrị nro nke mere na ọ malitere ịmepụta porridge
A na-ebipụta ya na abịrika na osikapa na Ji ofe ose

Supyire, ma ọ bụ Suppire, bụ asụsụ Senufo a na-asụ na mpaghara Sikasso nke dị na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Mali yana mpaghara ndị dị n'akụkụ Ivory Coast na Burkina Faso, bụ ebe a maara ya dị ka Shempire (Syenpire) N'asụsụ ala ha, aha sùpyìré pụtara ma 'ndị mmadụ' na 'asụsụ ndị mmadụ na-asụ'

Suraj Alao Abdurrahman (9 Septemba 1954 – 28 Jenụarị 2015), bụ onye ọchịagha Naịjirịa bụrụ onye jere ozi dịka onye isi ndị agha na-ahụ maka ndị agha Liberia, ya na onye isi ala Liberia mbụ Ellen Johnson Sirleaf dị ka onye isi ọchịagha

Dị ka onye isi ala Sirleaf Johnson n'oge ahụ si kwuo, General Abdurrahman 'bụ onye ọrụ ama ama ama ama nke ukwuu nke onyinye ya buliri ndị agha agha nke Liberia n'ọkwa ọkachamara ma tinye ndị agha anyị n'etiti ndị na-eche udo nke UN'
A mụrụ Abdurrahman na Kaduna ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na LEA Primary School, tupu ọ gawa na Keffi Government College maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nkewa 1 na nyocha asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke West Africa na 1972
Ọ gakwara n'ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Basic Studies nke Mahadum Ahmadu Bello dị na Zaria ruo Julaị 1973 mgbe etinyere ya na Nigeria Defence Academy dị na Kaduna dị ka onye so na usoro ọgụ nke iri na anọ
N'afọ 1975, e nyere ya ọrụ ka ọ bụrụ Lieutenant nke abụọ n'ime Nigerian Army Corps of Engineers
Abdurrahman nwere ọtụtụ iwu, onye nkuzi na ndị ọrụ nhọpụta n'oge ọrụ ya na mpaghara na mba ụwa
N'ọnwa Jenụwarị 2007, ọ ghọrọ onye isi nke amụma na atụmatụ maka ndị agha Naijiria
Ọ bụ n'ọkwa ahụ ka a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi ndị agha nke Liberia
Ọ nyere AFL iwu nke ọma site n'ubochi 6 Juun n'ọnwa 2007 ruo 11 February 2014, mgbe o nyefere onye ọrụ Liberia
N'ime oge ọrụ ya, General Abdurrahman gara ọmụmụ ihe agha na obodo dị iche iche
Ọ bụ nwata akwụkwọ nke Nigerian Army School of Military Engineers (NASME)
Nigerian Armed Forces Command and Staff College (AFCSC) nakwa National War College ebe ọ gụchara n'iche
General laghachiri na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello maka nzere bachelọ sayensị ya na 1979 wee nweta akara ugo mmụta Master na 1981, wee were PhD na Mahadum Heriot-Watt dị na Edinburgh depụta ya na 1985
Ọ nwụrụ na 28 Jenụwarị 2015 na New York
Onye isi ala Ellen Johnson Sirleaf zigaara gọọmentị Naijiria ozi nkasi obi
Nwunye ya, Fatima Wali-Abdurrahman na ụmụ ya nwoke anọ, Surajudeen, Abduljabbar, Abdulaziz na Abdulmalik bụ ndị na-anọchi ya
Onye isi ala natara ọchịagha nke Order nke Niger (CON) nke onye isi ala Naijiria nyere ya na 2014

Ọ bụkwa onye nnata nke National Honor Award nke 'Knight Commander' na Humane Order of African Redemption site n'aka President Liberia na 2014, Officer of the Order of the Niger (OON) sitere na Nigeria na 2007 na ugwu kachasị elu nke Liberia, Iwu Ọrụ Distinguish (DSO) sitere na onye isi ala Liberia na 2009
Surbakhal bụ asụsụ Maban nkè Chad

Suretrack Contracts Services bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ nke nwere onwe nke na-enye ọrụ ọkachamara gụnyere Engineering, Design, Planning, Project Management, Construction Management, Real Estate and Consulting Services maka akụkụ nile nke ụlọ, akụrụngwa na gburugburu ebe obibi na Ghana
E hiwere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 2007 ọ dabere na Eastern Region Nkawkaw
Na mbụ na-arụ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ na Accra, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na mba na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ akụkụ niile nke injinịa na ihe owuwu maka gburugburu ebe obibi
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ọfịs na mpaghara anọ, Greater Accra Region, Eastern Region, Ashanti Region na Northern Region, yana isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na Greater Accira Region

Suretrack mezuru ọnụ ụlọ abụọ nke ụlọ ndị nkuzi maka Mgbakọ mpaghara Abirem (ọrụ nkwado JICA)
Onye isi na-arụ ọrụ na nkwekọrịta maka owuwu nke klaasị na Mgbakọ Obodo New Juaben
Suretrack na JICS na-enwe nkwekọrịta ugbu a maka iwu ụlọ nke nọmba atọ na Assin Manso na Central Region
Ọrụ nkeonwe ↵ Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ Suretrack bụ ihe owuwu nke mmepe ụlọ obibi dị elu, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na ụlọ ọrụ maka ndị ahịa esenidụt
Ọrụ na-aga n'ihu ugbu a maka akụrụngwa ebe obibi na Greater Accra na Ashanti Region

Asụsụ Surmic bụ alaka nke ezinụlọ asụsụ mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Sudan

Taa, ndị dị iche iche na-asụ asụsụ Surmic na-ebi ndụ ha n'ụzọ dịgasị iche iche, gụnyere ndị na-azụ atụrụ na-akwagharị akwagharị, ndị ọrụ ugbo bi ebi, na ndị ọrụ ugbo n' eji nsụchasi na igba ọkụ akwado ala maka ọkụkọ ya
Ha bi n'ebe dịgasị iche iche, site na ala ndị dị ala nke South Sudan na ekpere mmiri nkè osimiri Omo ruo n'ugwu ndi karịrị mita 2,300
Asụsụ Surmic bụ
A na-ahụ asụsụ Surmic na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Etiopia na akụkụ ndị dị nso na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ South Sudan
N'oge gara aga, a maara Surmic dị ka 'Didinga-Murle' na 'SURMA'
Aha mbụ ahụ dị oke mkpụmkpụ site n'itụ aka naanị n'asụsụ abụọ nwere njikọ chiri anya na nke ikpeazụ bụ akara a na-ejikwa akọwa otu asụsụ (Unseth 1997b), ya mere ugbua eji akara 'Surmic' mara asụsụ a
Mmekọrịta dị na chaatị nke dị n'elu gbanyere ụkwụ na ọrụ Fleming (1983)
Harold C
Fleming na M
Bender rụrụ ọtụtụ ọrụ ntọnanị nyé nchọputa na nyocha nke asụsụ Surmic
Nkọwa nke kacha zuoke banyere asụsụ mgbochiumeSurmic nke ndi Etiopia bụ nke Murle (Arensen 1982) na Tirma (Bryant 1999)
A na-eche na asụsụ Surmic niile bụ ụda olu, ma nwe mgbchiume nke n' ada n' olu ike, ma nwee ogologo ụdaume pụrụ iche
Ụfọdụ nwere ihe ruru àgwà ụdaume itoolu, na nyocha zuru ezu nwere ike ịkwado nke a n'asụsụ Surmic ndị ọzọ, kwa
Me'en na Kwegu (nke a na-akpọkwa Koegu) nwere usoro ụdaume na-agbapụ agbapụ
Asụsụ ndị a nwere usoro nke ịde akara ọnụ ọgụgụ nke nnọchiaha enwekwa na nke nwenu (Unseth 1991)
A na-emekarị akara ọnụ ọgụgụ nke aha na ọtụtụ morphemes, na t / k na-egosi ákàrà otu ihe na ọtụtụ (Bryan 1959)
A na-emepụta nkọwaaha site na ahịrịokwu ndị ikwu na-adịghị agbanwe agbanwe

Majangir (nke a na-akpọkwa Majang) na asụsụ Surmic na mpaghara ndida ọdịda anyanwụ (Fleming 1983) nwere ọtụtụ àgwà, ya mere ha nwere ike ịmegharị na Proto-Surmic ahịrịokwu ndị metụtara (nke gụnyere nkọwaaha), ngosipụta, adverbs, ọnụọgụ, genitives, na nnọchiaha ndị nwere onwe ha na-eso isi ha, aha aha aha na akara isiokwu na ngwaa na-egosi, VSO (verb-subject-object) na-achịkwa ahịrịokwu isi
Arensen, et al
(1997) tụlere ụfọdụ ihe ndị pụrụ iche
Otú ọ dị, nkọwa mmeghe Dimmendaal na-atụ alo nyocha dị iche (1998)
Edepụtara asụsụ Surmic niile dị ka ndị na enwe nsonaazụ (Unseth 1989)
Ọ dịghị nke ọ bụla n'ime ha nwere akara ebubo, mana ọ dịkarịa ala Majang na Murle na-egosi aha mgbe ụfọdụ, akụkụ nke usoro mpaghara sara mbara (König 2006)

A na-eche na ebe obibi mbụ nke ndị Surmic dị na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Ethiopia, n'ebe dị nso na Maji, na ìgwè dị iche iche na-agbasa site n'ebe ahụ dịka ọmụmaatụ, Majangir kwagara n'ebe ugwu, Murle soro aka nri ha gaba gburugburu n' akụkụ Ọdọ Mmiri Turkana (Arensen 1983 56-61, Tornay 1981), na Mursi soro ụzọ ndagwurugwu Osimiri Omo

Njirimara agbụrụ na asụsụ n'ime otu Surmic abụghị ihe kwụdosiri ike, na ihe akaebe zuru oke nke njirimara ndị mmadụ na-agbanwe site n'otu ìgwè agbụrụ na-asụ asụsụ gaa na nke ọzọ (Tornay 1981, Turton 1979, Unseth na Abbink 1998)
Abbink ebipụtala ọrụ ọsụ ụzọ na-atụnyere okwu na usoro nke ikwu n'etiti asụsụ Surmic, ọkachasị site na mpaghara ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Surmic (Abbink 2006)
Isi mmalite maka nyocha asụsụ na nkà mmụta ihe ọmụmụ n'ime ọmụmụ Surmic bụ akwụkwọ nke Dimmendaal dezigharịrị (1998), ọkachasị edemede bibliography (Abbink and Unseth 1998)
Yigezu (2001) wughachiri usoro ụda nke Proto-Southwest Surmic na Proto-Southeast Surmic
Unseth atụwo aro ka e mezigharịa nsonaazụ maka Proto-Surmic
Unseth ewughachiri usoro akara maka Proto-Surmic
Unseth enwetaghachikwara prefix na-akpata Proto-Surmic

Surulere bụ Gọọmentị ime obodo dị na Oyo Steeti, Naịjirịa
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Iresa-Adu
O nwere mpaghara nke 23 km2 na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 142,070 na ngụkọta 2006
Ụfọdụ n'ime obodo ndị dị na gọọmentị ime obodo bụ Oko-Irese, Iresa-Adu, Igbon na Iresa-Apa
Nke ọ bụla n'ime obodo ndị a nwere onye ndú ọdịnala nwere aha eze nyere
Aha eze maka ụfọdụ n'ime obodo gọọmentị ime obodo ndị a kpọtụrụ aha n'elu bụ
Ọrụ akụ na ụba nke ndị bi n'obodo ndị mejupụtara gọọmentị ime obodo Surulere bụ ọrụ ugbo
Ihe ndị a na-emepụta n'ebe ahụ bụ
Koodu ozi nke mpaghara ahụ bụ 210
Àtụ LGAs and communities of Oyo State
Surulere bụ ebe obibi na azụmahịa ndi Gọọmentị Obodo nke dị na mpaghara Lagos na Lagos Steeti, Naijiria, nke nwere mpaghara 23 km2 (89 )
Na ọnụ ọgụgụ ikpeazụ n'afọ 2006, e nwere ndị bi na 503,975, na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 21,864 kwa square kilomita
Obodo gọọmentị dị n'ókè Yaba, Mushin na Ebute-Metta
N'oge mmepe obodo nke Lagos, obodo ahụ gbasara n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ nke ọdọ mmiri ya, nke gụnyere Surulere nke oge a
Ezinaụlọ si n'ógbè dị iche iche nke mba ahụ ebiela na Surulere n'akụkọ ihe mere eme
Na mgbakwunye na ndị bi na Lagos, n'ime narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, ndị Brazil na ndị Cuba dị iche iche nwere onwe ha, ndị a na-akpọ Aguda ma ọ bụ , biri na Surulere
Ndị Naijiria si n'ógbè ugwu na mbụ kwụsịrị na Idi-Araba, ebe ọtụtụ ndị si n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nọ n'ọ́ dị iche iche mana ọ bụ n'óù Obele, Ikate, na Aguda
Ndị bi na Lagos Island bụ ndị zụrụ ma ọ bụ gbazite ala n'aka gọọmentị na Aworis biri na New Lagos
N'ụzọ dị iche, ndị ọzọ biri na mpaghara Itire, Lawanson, Ojuelegba, Animashaun, na Shitta
Mpaghara New Lagos, nke a makwaara dị ka Surulere Re-Housing Estate, so n'ime ọrụ ụlọ ọha na eze mbụ na Naịjirịa
Itire, otu n'ime ebe obibi dị na Surulere nwere ikike ọdịnala a ma ama na Onitire nke Itire
Festac '77, nke a makwaara dị ka Ememme Black na Afrikan nke Abụọ nke nka na ọdịbendị bụ emume omenala nke emere na Surulere Lagos, Nigeria, site na 15 Jenụwarị 1977 ruo 12 Febụwarị 1977
Ọ bụ ebe obibi nke Lagos National Stadium (nke nwere ike 60,000) nke e wuru na 1972 maka egwuregwu All-Africa
A hapụrụ ámá egwuregwu ahụ ka ọ na-emebiwanye kemgbe afọ 2002
Otú ọ dị, na nkwadebe maka 2009 Under 17 FIFA World Cup, e meziwanyere ihe owuwu ahụ, ihe omume ahụ malitekwara n'ụzọ gara nke ọma n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2009
Surulere nwekwara ụlọ Teslim Balogun Stadium, a multi-service Stadium na-ejikarị eme egwuregwu bọọlụ nwere ihe karịrị iri abụọ na anọ oche ikike
Okporo ámá azụmahịa dị na Surulere bụ Western Avenue, Adeniran Ogunsanya, Adelabu, Ogunalana drive na Aguda, ahịa dị iche iche na-emeghe na-agbasa n'ógbè dị iche iche
Ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe dị na Iponri, Coker na Iganmu
Otu n'ime ebe kachasị ewu ewu na Surulere bụ Ojuelegba
A maara ya maka ebe jupụtara na mmadụ ma were ya dị ka otu n'ime ebe ndị mmadụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na LagosỌ bụ otu n'ime isi ụgbọ njem nke Lagos, na-ejikọ obodo ahụ na Lagos Island na Victoria Island
Ọ bụkwa ebe, onye egwu Naijiria a ma ama, Wizkid bụrụ abụ banyere ya n'otu n'ime egwu ya a ma ama 'Ojuelegba'
Ụlọ mmepụta nkiri malitere na Surulere n'oge ngwụcha afọ 1980 ruo n'ime afọ 1990
Ọ bụ ebe obibi nke magazin Newbreed na President kwa ọnwa, nke Chief Chris Okolie guzobere, ruo mgbe mbipụta kwụsịrị na mbido afọ 1990
N'afọ 2018, akara egwuregwu mba ụwa Nike Inc jikọrọ aka na Wizkid iji wepụta uwe egwuregwu dị mkpirikpi, na-eweta aha ọjọọ na ọnụnọ ọdịbendị nke Surulere na obodo Lagos n'ụwa niile
Vidio Beyoncé 'Key to the Kingdom' site na Black is King gosipụtara Surulere National Arts Theater n'ụzọ pụtara ìhè na foto mmeghe ya
Achola Suzan Engola bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda
N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu maka Apac District A họpụtara ya ọzọ na ntuli aka nke afo 2021 nke Uganda, nke e mere na 14 Jenụwarị na afo 2021
Susan Amero (amụrụ n'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1976) bụ nwanyị Ugandan so na ndị omeiwu maka mpaghara Amuria Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement na-achị
Amero gụsịrị ule Primary Leaving na Rock View Primary School na 1989 na mpaghara Tororo
N'afọ 1993, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Uganda Certificate of Education na St
Francis School for the Blind na Madera
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Uganda Advanced Certificate na Mbale Secondary School na 1996
N'etiti 1996 na 1997, Amero dechara asambodo na Tour and Travel Operator na IATA / UFTAA na Airway Tours and Travel, Switzerland
N'afọ 2007, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of International Relations and Diplomacy na Mahadum Nkumba, mahadum onwe onye dị na Entebbe, Uganda
Ọ gụchara Master of Arts na International Relations na Mahadum Nkumba
N'afọ 1998, Amero rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ere ahịa na onye na-anabata ndị ọbịa
N'agbata afọ 1999 na afọ 2009, ọ bụ onye enyemaka VIP na Ugandan Civil Aviation Authority
Site na 2011 ruo taa, ọ bụ onye omeiwu
Amero na-eje ozi na kọmitii ndị a na ndị omeiwu Uganda
Susan Hefuna bụ onye Germany na-ese ihe nkiri
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi dịgasị iche iche, nke gụnyere eserese, foto, ihe ọkpụkpụ, ntinye, vidiyo na arụmọrụ
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ n'etiti Cairo, Egypt na Germany
A mụrụ Hefuna na Berlin, Germany na 1962 nye nna onye Ijipt na nne onye Germany
Hefuna nọrọ afọ asatọ mbụ nke ndụ ya n'Ijipt, ma mesịa kwaga Graz, Austria, iji nọrọ ezinụlọ nne ya nso
N'afọ 1992, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na Institute for New Media na Städelschule na Frankfurt, Germany n'okpuru Peter Weibel
Hefuna jikọtara mgbọrọgwụ Ijipt na German ya n'ọrụ ya, na-eji ihe oyiyi obodo, usoro odide na omenala nke abụọ iji wuo àkwà mmiri n'etiti ọdịbendị abụọ ahụ
Ihe osise Hefuna na-ejikarị ink India maka ọrụ nwere ihe karịrị otu akwa; maka ọrụ nke otu akwa ọ na-ejikwa agba mmiri
Isiokwu a na-ahụkarị n'ọrụ ya bụ ihuenyo mashrabiya, ihuenyo osisi ma ọ bụ nkume nke na-arụ ọrụ nke na-egosi na ụlọ ọdịnala ndị Ijipt
Ihe ngosi ndị a pụtara na mbụ na eserese Hefuna na 1990 na foto ya nke ejiri igwefoto pinhole wee see
N'afọ 2008, Hefuna nwere ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya, nke akpọrọ On the Edgware Road, na Serpentine Galleries, nke sitere na nnupụisi Arab Spring na-adịbeghị anya
N'afọ 2009, e gosipụtara ihe dị ka narị atọ nke ink na pensụl ya na akwụkwọ nyocha na Giardini na Arsenale na Fare Mondi, na 53rd Venice Biennale
A na-edepụta ọrụ ya na Trilogy Pars Pro Toto site n'aka onye nchịkọta akụkọ Hans Ulrich Obrist nke Kehrer bipụtara
E gosipụtara ọrụ Hefuna n'ọtụtụ oge na UK malite na Bluecoat Gallery na Liverpool (2004), yana Rose Issa Projects (2008-2014) na 2014 na ngosi 'Here and Elsewhere' na New Museum na New York
E gosikwara ọrụ ya na Sharjah Biennale, na Townhouse Gallery na Cairo, na ebe ndị dị na London, Brussels, Vienna, Beirut, Dubai na Istanbul

N'ime nyocha nke ihe ngosi Hefuna, 'Navigation X Cultural,' na South African National Gallery na Cape Town, Tracy Murinik kwuru, 'Hefuna na-akọwa ihe njikọ dị mgbagwoju anya nke ntụaka anụ ahụ n'ime ụlọ ya nke nnukwu osisi nkwụ a dị ịtụnanya,' ma too ya 'ihe osise dị omimi' na 'ihe osisa dijitalụ na foto'
N'afọ 1998, e nyere Hefuna onyinye mba ụwa na Cairo Biennial N'afọ 2013, Daniel na Florence Guerlain Foundation nyere ya ihe nrite Contemporary Drawing Prize na Paris
Pi Artworks na-anọchite anya Hefuna ugbu a na London na Istanbul na Rhona Hoffman Gallery na Chicago
Susan Funaya Ideh (amụrụ 5 May 1987) bụ onye egwuregwu nke badminton si Naijiria
Ọ zọrọ asọmpi egwuregwu obodo niile nke 2010 na New Delhi, India

HiSusan Jolly Abeja bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye otu ndị omeiwu
A họpụtara ya n'ọfịs dị ka nwanyị Member iji nọchite anya mpaghara Otuke n'oge ntuli aka nke afo 2021 Uganda
Ọ bụ onye omeiwu nwere onwe ya
Susan so na ndị omeiwu 132 a ṅụrụ iyi maka afọ ise dị ka ndị nnọchiteanya maka mpaghara dị iche iche gafee mba ahụ, na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke iri na otu na Mee 17, na afo 2021
Susan Juby (amuru March 30, 1969) bu onye Canada odee nke akwukwo ndi okenye
Ọ na-ebi ugbu a na Nanaimo, British Columbia, ebe ọ bụ ọkachamara nke ide ihe na Mahadum Vancouver Island
Juby kacha mara amara maka usoro mbụ ya malitere na Alice, Echere m (2000), nke a na emegharị na usoro igwe onyonyo Alice, Echere m site na netwọk Comedy
A mụrụ Juby na Ponoka, Alberta, ma mesịa kwaga Smithers, British Columbia mgbe ọ dị afọ isii
Juby gara ụlọ akwụkwọ imewe ejiji na mbụ, mana ọ kwụsịrị mgbe ọtụtụ ọnwa gachara
O mechara malite nzere na akwụkwọ Bekee na Mahadum Toronto, na ebufu na Mahadum British Columbia ka afọ abụọ gachara
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ n'otu ụlọ ọrụ na ebipụta akwụkwọ a na-akpọ Hartley na Marks
Juby malitere akwụkwọ mbụ ya dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ nke o dere na ụgbọ ala na ụzọ ọrụ na n'ụlọ ahịa kọfị dị n'ógbè ahụ
Thistledown bipụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ya Alice, Echere m na 2000
Akpọrọ aha akwụkwọ ahụ otu n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ntorobịa 40 dị mkpa nke Rolling Stone Magazine
Juby nwetara akara ugo mmụta nna ukwu na mbipụta (MPub) na Mahadum Simon Fraser na 2002
Mgbe o bipụtara Alice, Echere m (2000), HarperCollins nyere ya nkwekọrịta maka akwụkwọ atọ
E bipụtara akwụkwọ ya nke abụọ Miss Smithers na 2004
Iji mezue trilogy nke Alice, echere m na ihe niile n'okpuru otu onye mbipụta, HarperCollins zụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ahụ
Akwụkwọ nke atọ ya n'okpuru mmetụta a bụ Alice McLeod Realist at Last, nke e bipụtara na 2005
The Comedy Network mepụtara Alice, echere m, sitcom telivishọn dabeere na akwụkwọ akụkọ nke otu aha ahụ
Ihe omume mbụ wepụtara na 2006
Juby gara n'ihu dee Ụdị Cowboy ọzọ (2007) na akwụkwọ ọgụgụ onye na-eto eto na-achọpụta ihe, Getting the Girl (2008)
Na 2010, Viking Canada bipụtara Nice Recovery, ihe ncheta Juby na-achọpụta oge n'etiti ahụmahụ ya na ịñụbiga mmanya ókè ruo afọ iri na ụma ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ 20
HarperCollins bipụtara akwụkwọ Juby na-esote na 2011, Home to Woefield (nke a makwara dị ka The Woefield Poultry Collective na Canada)
Nke a bụ akwụkwọ mbụ ya gbadoro anya maka ndị toro eto
Ọ ga emecha dee usoro nke Republic of Dirt (2015)
Na 2016, Republic of Dirt meriri Stephen Leacock Award

Akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ nke Juby gụnyere akwụkwọ akụkọ na-eto eto dystopian Bright's Light (2012), yana The Truth Commission (2015) na Kọmitii Ejiji (2017), akwụkwọ akụkọ na-eto eto nke edobere na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nka
A kpọbatara Juby na Royal Society of Canada's College of New Scholars, Artists, and Scientists na 2014
Na Febụwarị 22, 2020, Juby gụrụ akụkụ akwụkwọ sitere na ọrụ abụọ a na ebipụtabeghị na alaka ụlọ ọrụ Nanaimo Harbourfront Library nke Vancouver Island
N'ọrụ gị bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ mpụ mbụ nke Juby maka ndị okenye
Mụ 3 bụ akwụkwọ ọgụgụ etiti na-ekwu maka mmegharị #MeToo site n'echiche nwata
Juby bụ onye na-akwado ikike gburugburu ebe obibi na obodo ya
Ọ bụ prọfesọ na-ede ihe okike na Mahadum Vancouver Island, na Nanaimo, British Columbia
Susan Kolimba (amụrụ na ọnwa 8 Disemba na afọ 1964) bụ onye nkuzi na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tanzanian nke so na Chama Cha Mapinduzi (CCM) na-achị
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi na imekọ ihe ọnụ n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka ruo na ọnwa Septemba 26, na afọ 2018
Ọ bụ onye omeiwu otu oge ebe a họpụtara ya na oche pụrụ iche echekwara maka ụmụ nwanyị
A mụrụ Susan Kolimba na ọnwa 8 Disemba na afọ 1964
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Kibosho Girls Secondary School n'afọ 1982
Degree mbụ ya bụ diplọma na nkuzi, nke ọ natara na afọ nke 1988 site na Marangu Teachers Training College
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na onye nkuzi sekọndrị ruo afọ atọ
Ọ malitere ọrụ iwu
Ọ natara LL ya[Ihe e dere n'ala ala peeji]M na PhD na iwu na afọ 1996, 1998 na kwa 2002 n'otu n'otu, niile sitere na Mahadum Enyi nke Ndị Mmadụ nke Russia
Ọ kụziri iwu dị ka onye nkuzi na Open University of Tanzania n'etiti afọ 2005 na 2016
Ọ ghọrọ Dean nke Faculty of Law na 2010
Kolimba sonyere na CCM na 2007 ma rụọ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ọrụ otu gụnyere na ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị nke otu ahụ
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ oche na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Tanzania n'afọ 2015 maka oche e debere maka ụmụ nwanyị
A họpụtara Kolimba ka ọ bụrụ osote minista na Ministry for Foreign Affairs and East African Cooperation na gọọmentị onye isi ala a họpụtara ọhụrụ bụ John Magufuli mgbe ntuli aka na afọ 2015 gasịrị
Ọ na-eje ozi n'okpuru Minista Dr
Augustine Mahiga Dị ka minista na-ahụ maka imekọ ihe ọnụ n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka, Dr
Kolimba ṅụrụ iyi dị ka onye otu ex-officio nke Nzukọ Ndị Ome Iwu nke Ọwụwa Ọwụwa Afrịka
Ọ malitekwara ọrụ nke Onye isi oche nke East African Community Council of Ministers
Àtụ Chama Cha MapinduziÀtụ Cabinet of Tanzania
Susan Matheson bụ onye na-emepụta ejiji nke mepụtara ejiji etiti n'ihe nkiri The Kingdom, Friday Night Lights, Blue Crush, Crazy/Beautiful, Honey, Panic na Best Laid Plans

O mepụtara ihe ehiri mee ihe nkiri atọ nke Will Ferrell - Step Brothers, Semi-Pro, na Talladega The Ballad of Ricky Bobby O meputakwara ihe ehiri mee ihe nkiri Couples Retreat nke Vince Vaughn na Jon Favreau gosipụtara nke mbụ ya n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke afọ 2009
Susan Matheson tolitere na Cape Town, South Africa
Susan nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na Vassar College na BFA ya na Parsons School of Design ebe ọ natara onyinye ',onye mmepụta ihe oyiyi nke afọ' yana onyinye maka mmepụta ihe oyiyi site na Nike, Inc
na Bob Mackie
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ gara rụọ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ Mattel Toys na-emepụtara Barbie na Disney
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ gara n'ihu na-emepụta ejiji maka ihe nkiri na ejiji
Susan esorowo ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Ron Athey, Juliana Snapper na Nicole Blackman rụkọọ ọrụ

N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ya na Juliana Snapper na onye na-ede egwu Andrew bụ Infanti rụkọtara ọrụ na ọnwa Mee afọ 2009 na omume opera mbụ n'okpuru mmiri 'You will emerge from the flood' na Victoria Baths na Manchester, UK
Susan Mugabi Nakaziba bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda sitere na NUP nke na-anọchite anya Gọọmenti Buvuma na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda
N'afọ 2021, o mere ngagharị iwe megide iyi egwu nke obodo ndị na-egbu azụ
Susan Eve Oguya Kutalek, nke a na-akpọkarị Susan Oguya, bụ nwanyị na-azu ahịa, onye nrụpụta na onye ọchụnta ego na Kenya

Ọ bụ onye so wee tọọ ntọala na onye bụbu onye isi ọrụ nke MFarm Kenya Limited, ụlọ ọrụ ịntanetị na-enyere ndị ọrụ ugbo aka ịchọta ngwa ọrụ ugbo kacha mma, mkpụrụ osisi na ịnweta akụkọ ihu igwe na ozi ahịa
Ebe ọ bụ na August 2015, Susan Oguya na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe na Dalberg Global Development Advisors, nke isi ụlọọrụ ya di na New York City
A mụrụ ya na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ mba Kenya na 1987
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị Kenya maka ọmụmụ ihe tupu mahadum ya
Ekpugheere ya n'ihe gbasara kọmputa mgbe otu n'ime nwanne nna ya, onye na-agụ akwụkwọ na isi obodo Nairobi, ji desktọpụ ya lọta n'oge ezumike ahụ
Ka e mesịrị, nwanne nna ya zụtara ya desktọpụ nke ya
O kpebiri ịmụ IT na mahadum
Na 2010, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ afọ anọ na mahadum, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Strathmore University, ma nweta nzere Bachelor of Science, na Business Information Technology
Na 2013 a nabatara ya na Università Cattolica del Sacro Cuore (Mahadum Katọlik nke obi dị nsọ), na Milan, Italy
Mgbe otu afọ gachara, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ebe ahụ wee nweta nzere Master of Business Administration
Site n'ebe ahụ, ọ sonyeere Domus Academy, nakwa na Milan, bụ ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ nkà, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2015 na-enweta Master of Design degree na Human Computer Interaction
N'ime afọ ikpeazụ nke akwụkwọ mmụta mahadum, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye Mmekọ Mmụta Microsoft
N'otu oge ahụ, ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'otu oge na Student Enterprise Program, ebe ya na ndị na-eme ihe na-arụkọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe mmụta, ịzụ ahịa na nkwalite, n'ikike ya dị ka onye njikwa mgbasa ozi

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ obere oge dị ka onye nrụpụta ngwanrọ maka Safaricom, wee bụrụ onye na-enyere aka nyocha na iHub Nairobi, ụlọ ọrụ mmepe ngwanrọ, tupu ya anoduzie na Akirachix, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ otu afọ na ọkara dị ka onye njikwa ọzụzụ
N'ebe ahụ ọ zụrụ ụmụ agbọghọ nọ n'agbata afọ iri na asatọ ruo afọ iri abụọ na ise na nkà ndụ na ikike kọmputa bụ isi na nke etiti, gụnyere mmewe kọmputa

Na 2010, site na kpali na iwe nke sitere n'akwụkwọ akụkọ na-akọ na ndị etiti na-erigbu ndị ọrụ ugbo ime obodo, ya na ndị mmekọ abụọ ọzọ mebere MFarm Kenya Limited, ya na Oguya na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi teknụzụ, onye na-ahụ maka itinye koodu, nyocha na nchọpụta nsogbu ngwa mkpanaka, site na Ọktoba 2010 ruo Julaị 2012

Ọ nọrọ afọ abụọ sochirinụ ịzụlite ma na-ewusi ngwa azụmahịa nke ngwa ahụ ike, site na mmekọrịta ya na ndị ahịa, ndị na-enye ego, ndị mmekọ azụmahịa na ndị na-ede akwụkwọ, n'ikike ya dị ka onye isi ọrụ nke MFarm Kenya Limited
Dị ka nke December 2012, ụlọ ọrụ nwere ndi ọrụ mmadụ iri na asatọ na-arụ ọrụ oge niile na ihe karịrị ndị ahịa pụkụ asaabna mpaghara
Na 2015 mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Ịtali, ọ kwagara United States, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye mmepụta ihe na Dalberg Global Development Advisors, nke nwere a New York, New York kemgbe August 2015
Na 2014, Forbes Magazine depụtara Susan Oguya n'etiti '10 Female Tech Founders to Watch in Africa'
Susan Peters (amụrụ na 30 Mee 1980) bụ onye n'eme ihe nkiri Naijiria n'enweta ọtụtụ ihe nrite na ihe karịrị 50 na ihe nkiri Nollywood (Nijiria)
Ọ bụ onye ama ama na onyonyo ndị Naijiria, ihe nlereanya na-aga nke ọma, onye n'emepụta ime ime ụlọ nakwa onye nwe ụlọ ịchọ mma

N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, o meriri na 2011 Afro Hollywood Best Actress (English) Award maka ọrụ ya na Bursting Out, NAFCA Awards (Nollywood and African Film Critics Awards) North Carolina Nigerian Oscars Best Actress in Supporting Role 2011 BON (Best Of Nollywood) Best Supporting Actress Award 2011, na Actress of the Year 2010 nakwa Most Stylish Actress 2012 Awards site na City People Magazine
N'afọ 2011, o mere mkpuchi nke Disemba magazin nka na ọdịbendị, Zen
A mụrụ Peters n'ezinụlọ ndị agha nke Idoma na 30 Mee 1980 na Ado Local Government Area, Benue Steeti na etiti Nigeria
Ezinụlọ ya kwagara gburugburu Naijiria nke ukwuu, n'ihi ya, ọ na-asụ ọtụtụ asụsụ Naijiria
E zigara Peters n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Airforce na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na FGG College na Wuse, Abuja
Ọ gara n'ihu n'amụ Computer Science na Asman English School, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1998
O mechara gụọ TV na Film na Video Waves na Camera Film School ma ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2002
N'ebe ahụ, dị ka akụkọ ndụ ya si kwuo, ọ gụchara dị ka Onye Mekarịchara Nke Ọma Na Nwanyị na klas ya
Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri Nollywood n'afọ 2002, n'otu afọ ahụ ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ

N'afọ sochiri ya, ọ malitere ime ihe ngosi ma pụta na bọọdụ mgbasa ozi, mgbasa ozi TV, mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi nakwa akwụkwọ aka maka ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị ka British American Tobacco (BAT), Fidelity Bank, Bank PHB, Golden Penny Pasta, UHF, Long-life milk, Haemeron Blood Tonic nakwa FinBank Nigeria

N'agbanyeghị nrụgide na-arịwanye elu maka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood ka ha mee ihe nkiri ịhụnanya n'adịghị mma ma jiri obere ma ọ bụ enweghị uwe ọ bụla pụta, Peters ekwuola, ihe karịrị otu ugboro, na o nwegh atụmatụ ịgbaso ya
Ọ bụ ezie na Susan Peters n'ekwu okwu mgbe niile banyere ezinụlọ ya n'ajụjụ ọnụ
Ọ na-ekwu nke ọma banyere ịhụnanya ma n'ejikọta ya na ndị ikom ọ bụla na mgbasa ozi a ma ama
