TY Bello pụtara n’ihe ịkụ egwu na mba Naịgria dịka onye so n’otu nkụmegwu gbasagoro agbasa akpọrọ KUSH n'ịchafụ nke putara 'Kinetically Ushering Salvation into Heart and Homes'
Ndi ọzọ so n'otu nkụmegwu a bụ , a na-akpọ Kinetically Ushering Salvation into Hearts na eslọ
Ndị ọzọ so n’otu ahụ gụnyere Lara George, Dapo Torimiro na onye akụkọ n'egwu bụ Emem Ema
Otu Nkụmegwu KUSH nwetara aha ọma pụtara ihe na mmalite afọ, 2000 ste n'ahịrị egwu ha nke a kpọrọ ' Lets Live Together'; ndi otua jisiri ike wepụta efere egwu tupu ha agbasaa
TY Bello bụ onye na-ese foto onye onye isi ala n'oge gara aga bụ Goodluck Jonathan n'oge ọ nọ n'ọchịchị; ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ n'akwụkwọ akuko ejiji Thisday
N’afọ 2008, TY Bello weputara efere egwu izizi ya nke akpọrọ Greenland
Onye kwadoro ngụpụta ya bụ egwu bụ Mosa Adegboye were jiri afọ abụọ rụpụta ya
Efere egwu a nyere ya ihe nrite nke Ngerian Music Award na Sun City Award
TY Bello kọwara na ya bụ efere egwu dịka njem nke ndụ ya, kwa ụbọchị
Egwu ahụ gosipụtara isiokwu nke ịhụnanya, ezinụlọ na mba
Udiri aha ya bu egwu nkpalite obi nke edere iji kpalie ndi Naijiria ka ha wezịga onwe ha site n’ebe obi nkọrọpụ ma nwee olile anya
TY Bello buru ụzọ kpughee atụmatụ maka Alụbọm abụọ ya nke akpọrọ 'The Future', mgbe ọ na-ekwusịrị Ariya Today okwu
Ebu ụzọ mee album ahụ maka ntọhapụ n'afọ, 2011, ma bụrụ nke iri na abụọ na Nigerian Entertainment Today' ahịrị ụnọ ọgụ nke iri na abụọ a zụtara na afọ 2011
Nw'ada Onye abụ a kwuru na ya na onye nrụpụta egwu aha ya bụ Mosa rụkọrọ ọrụ ma rụpụta alụbọm ahụ n'ọnwa ole na olerụ Mosa rụkọtara ma dekọọ album ahụ na ọnwa ole na ole
Na abalị iri na itoli nke onwa February, na afọ 2011, TY Bello wepụtara 'The Future' dị ka okachasị ibe ya n'ahiri egwu ya ndi ọzọ dị n'alụbọm ahụ
Egwú ahụ gwara ndị ntorobịa mba Nigeria ka ha bụrụ mgbanwe ha na-achọ
Kemi Adetiba - -mepụtara ihe onyo-onyoo egwu maka 'The Future' n'ụbọchi atọ n'ọnwa anọ, nke afọ 2011

Ọ gbakwịnyere nkwado ndi egwu Tara Fela-Durotoye, Sound Sultan, Chude Jideonwo na Banky W Ore Fakorede nyere abụ a akara nke kpakpando asaa n'ime iri, kwuokwa na 'ebede-ala, synths na piano na-enye ihe ngosi doro anya maka TY iji gosipụta ọdịiche dị ukwuu nke olu ya na-enweghị mgbanwoju anya, na nke a ka ọ na-eme n'ụzọ magburu onwe ya, na-eweta ihe obi ụtọ n' egwu ahụ
N'ọnwa Ọktọba 2011, TY Bello bụ otu n'ime ndị ama ama gosipụtara na ihe onyo-nyoo emere na nkeji asatọ nke mmegide nkwamiko-n'ike Maka Ntorobịa nke Nigeria chịkọtara
ịhe onyo-nyoo a tụrụ elo ọfụma n'ihe gbasara ndi agbọọbia a kwasịrị iko n'ike na mahadum bụ Abia State University n'afọ 2011
Na onwa iri na-abụọ n'afo 2013, TY Bello weputara egwu ya, “Yahweh” nke Wale Adenugaso na ya
Ndi na-agu egwu ndi ama ọfụma dịka Nwando Okeke na Mosa so kwado ya bụ egwu
Edere ahiri mbụ nke abụ ahụ n'afọ 2004 mgbe a na-ese foto
N'abalị iri, n'ọnwa iri, nke afọ 2014, TY Bello wepụtara alụbọm ụlọ egwu nke atọ ya bụ Morning Songbook maka mweta nke nkanụzụ ịntanet na SoundCloud
E wepụtara ya na-enweghị nkwalite ọbụla ma tinyekwa ya ahịrị egwu iri, gụnyere 'Yahweh', 'Thirsty' na 'Jesu Jesu'
Album ahụ nwere mmekorita ya na M Sugh na Fela Durotoye
Udochukwu Ikwuagwu nke Breaking Times nyere album a akara nke asaa n'ime iri, na-ekwupụta nke ọma, 'TY Bello na Mosa kwesịrị otito maka oke edemede egwu na nnrụpụta ha gosịpụtara na nke a
N'oge ụfọdụ, mmetụta uche mere ka olu ha dị elu karịa ka ọ dị n'eziokwu mana mbutu olu mfe nke ndị na-abụ abụ na-akwado n'azụ mere ka ọ banye n'anya ya
Ihe ọrụ ngo a bụ ruru onu ahia obula ma ọbụ ezie na enyere ya n’efu; ọrụ ngo a bụ nke ga adịgịde ogologo oge
Bello na-arụ ọrụ na Lagos ebe ọ na -esepụta ihe nkiri foto maka onye egwu Britain bụ Tinie Tempah
O mechara chọpụta na e nwere ọmarịcha nwanyị mara mma nọ n’azụ nwoke a
Iji chọta Olajumoke Orisaguna, o mere ka foto Orisaguna pụta n'ihu mkpuchi nke akwụkwọ akụkọ akpọrọ Style magazine
TY Bello na-ahazi ihe ngosi foto nke ana=eme n'afo n'afọ iji wepụta ego maka ụmụaka enweghi nne na nna na mba Naịjirịa
Ọ bụkwa onye ntụzi ọrụ nke Link-a-child, otu NGO nke raara nye ịgbasa ozi banyere ụmụ ogbenye na Naịjirịa na ịchọ nkwado n'aha ha
N'ọnwa asaa nke afọ 2011, TY Bello ritere ihe nkwanye ugwu nke ndi otu Non Profit Communication for Change Organization nyere ya nihe nkiri nke nwere akuku ise nke akpọrọ RedHot
TY Bello lụrụ Kashetu Bello n'afọ 2009
Di na nwunye a mụrụ ụmụ nwoke ejima aha ha bụ Christian na Christopher n'abalị iri nke afọ October 2014, bụ nke dakọtara na nrụpụta nke The Morning Songbook
Ta’if (الطائف aṭ-Ṭā’if) bu ama ukwu nor na ama Mecca ime obodo Saudi Arabia na élú úgwu di ka 1,879 m (6, 160 ft) di na ákụkụ ebe Ugwu Ukwu Sarawat (Al-Sarawat Mountains), dàrà
O nwèrè madu rúrú 521,273 (shi nke ogùgù madu 2004)
Ogẹ anwu mgbe owulà ochíchí Saudi na puzí okpo fufu nke Riyadh, lá Ta'if
Ama ukwu'á bu etítí íkú úbi na ama níle ngạ ó nọr maka grape na mmanu añu o né wefụtá
Taba (Arabic) bụ obodo Ijipt dị nso n'ebe ugwu nke Ọwara Aqaba
Taba bụ ebe a na-agafe ókèala Ijipt na Eilat, Israel

Ndị Israel mepụtara Taba na mbụ dị ka ebe ndị njem nleta na họtel mbụ meghere n'ebe ahụ n'afọ ndị 1960, taa ọ bụ ebe ezumike maka ndị Ijipt na ndị njem nlegharị anya ndị ọzọ, ọkachasị ndị si Israel na-aga ebe ndị ọzọ na Ijipt ma ọ bụ dị ka ezumike ngwụsị izu
Ọ bụ ebe ezumike kachasị n'ebe ugwu nke Red Sea Riviera nke Ijipt
Nsogbu Taba nke 1906 malitere mgbe Sultan Abdul Hamid nke Abụọ nke Alaeze Ukwu Ottoman kpebiri iwu post na Taba
Ndị Britain zigara ụgbọ mmiri ndị na-eche nche n'ụsọ oké osimiri Ijipt iji weghachite Naqb el Aqaba na Taba
Mgbe onye ọrụ Turkey zutere ha nke jụrụ ikike ịdakwasị, ndị agha Ijipt rutere n'àgwàetiti Fero dị nso
Ndị agha mmiri Britain zigara ụgbọ agha n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Mediterenian ma yie egwu ijide agwaetiti ụfọdụ n'okpuru Alaeze Ukwu Ottoman
Sultan kwetara ịpụ na Taba na 13 Mee 1906
Ma Britain ma Alaeze Ukwu Ottoman kwetara ịdepụta ókèala ga-esi na Rafah gaa n'ebe ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ ruo n'otu ebe na Gulf of Aqaba, ọ bụghị ihe na-erughị kilomita 5 (3 mi) site na Aqaba
Na mbụ, e ji ogwe telegraph mee akara n'ókè ahụ ma mesịa jiri ogidi ókè dochie ha
Taba dị n'akụkụ Ijipt nke akara agha e kwekọrịtara na 1949
N'oge ọgba aghara Suez na 1956, Israel weghaara ya nwa oge mana ọ laghachiri Ijipt mgbe mba ahụ hapụrụ na 1957
Israel weghachiri Sinai Peninsula mgbe Agha Ụbọchị Isii gasịrị na 1967, ma mesịa, e wuru họtel nwere ọnụ ụlọ 400 na Taba

N'ịgbaso nkwekọrịta udo nke Israel na Egypt na 1979, Egypt na Israel na-ekwurịta kpọmkwem ọnọdụ nke ókèala, Israel kwuru na Taba nọ n'akụkụ Ottoman nke ókèala e kwekọrịtara n'etiti ndị Ottoman na British Egypt na 1906 ma, ya mere, mehiere na nkwekọrịta abụọ gara aga
Mgbe ogologo esemokwu gasịrị, e zigara okwu ahụ na kọmitii mba ụwa nke otu onye Israel, otu onye Ijipt, na ndị mpụga atọ mejupụtara

Ndị otu abụọ ahụ kwekọrịtara na map niile kemgbe 1915, ma e wezụga otu map Turkish-German nke 1916, na-egosi Taba n'akụkụ Ijipt nakwa na ọ nweghị esemokwu e welitere n'okwu ahụ n'afọ ndị sochirinụAgbanyeghị, Isreal kwusiri ike na e mejọrọ mgbe okporo ụzọ telegraph nke anyị ji ogidi oke dochie anya na 1906-1907 yana njiri ogidi oke bụ oke iwu
K toọmitii ahụ anabataghị na ogidi ókèala ahụ mehiere ma n'ọnọdụ ọ bụla kwenyere na ókèala a kapịrị ọnụ nke ndị otu niile nabatara ogologo oge dị otú ahụ enwetala ọnọdụ iwu
Nchegbu pụrụ iche bụ ogidi ikpeazụ dị nso na Ọwara Oké Osimiri Aqaba, nke na-apụ n'anya
E nwere foto mbụ nke ogidi dị n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Taba, mana Israel kwuru na e mehiere ya
Kọmitii ahụ anabataghị ikpe Israel ma debe ogidi ahụ n'akụkụ ebe akụkọ ihe mere eme ya
Ya mere, Israel na Egypt maliteghachiri mkparịta ụka nke kwụsịrị na Febụwarị 1989 ma n'ihi ya, e weghachiri Taba n'Ijipt, Hosni Mubarak welitere ọkọlọtọ Ijipt n'obodo ahụ na 19 nke Machị 1989

Dị ka akụkụ nke nkwekọrịta a na-esote, a na-ekwe ka ndị njem si Israel gafee na Eilat-Taba border checkpoint, ma gaa na 'Aqaba Coast Area of Sinai', visa-free ruo ụbọchị 14, na-eme ka Taba bụrụ ebe ndị njem nleta na-ewu ewu
Obodo ezumike Taba Heights dị ihe dị ka 20 (12 mi) n'ebe ndịda Taba
Ọ nwere ọtụtụ nnukwu họtel, gụnyere Hyatt Regency, Marriott, Sofitel, na Intercontinental
Ọ bụkwa ebe dị mkpa a na-egwu mmiri ebe ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na-abịa ma ọ bụ n'efu, scuba diving, ma ọ bụ mụta ịnya mmiri site na ọtụtụ ọmụmụ diving dịnụ
Ebe ntụrụndụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere oghere golf ọhụrụ dị n'ọzara
Na 24 Septemba 1995 Israel na PLO bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta Taba na Taba
N'October 7,2004, ogbunigwe kụrụ Hilton Taba nke gburu mmadụ 34 gụnyere ọtụtụ ndị isreall

Ụbọchị iri abụọ na anọ ka e mesịrị, nyocha nke Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Ihe Ndị Dị n'Ime Ijipt banyere bọmbụ ahụ kwubiri na ndị na-eme ya enwetaghị enyemaka mpụga kama ndị Bedouin nyere ha aka na peninsula

N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2014, onye nkuzi na-akpọ ndị njem nlegharị anya na ebe obibi ndị mọnk Saint Catherine dị na Saịnaị gbawara na Taba obere oge tupu ọ gafere oke ala IsrealDịkarịa ala, ndị South Korea abụọ nwụrụ na mmadụ iri na anọ merụrụ ahụ E boro mgbawa a bụ ndị na-eyi ọha egwu
N'agbanyeghị ịdọ aka ná ntị, onye njem si Israel gaa Taba bilitere na 2016 na ọtụtụ ndị na-eme njem iji nwee obi ụtọ n'ebe ugwu nke Oké Osimiri Uhie
Usoro nhazi ihu igwe Köppen-Geiger na-ekewa ihu igwe ya dị ka ọzara na-ekpo ọkụ (BWh), dị ka ndị ọzọ nke Ijipt
Okpomọkụ nke ịdị elu nke Taba dịtụ jụụ ma nwee ụbọchị mmiri ozuzo
Ọ na-enweta obere ìhè anyanwụ
Ebe dị na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Taba bụ ebe echedoro 3,590 km2 (1,386 mi), gụnyere ọdịdị ala dị ka ọgba, ndagwurugwu, na ụzọ ugwu
E nwekwara isi iyi ụfọdụ n'ógbè ahụ
Ebe ọ bụ na Taba dị naanị dị ka obere obodo Bedouin, ọ dịghị mgbe ọ bụla ezigbo akụrụngwa njem

N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọdụ ụgbọ elu Al Nakb, nke dị na mbara ala Sinai ihe dị ka kilomita 35 (22 kilomita) site na Taba, emelitere ma nye ya aha ọzọ Taba International Airport (IATA TCP, ICAO HETB), ma ugbu a na-ejikwa ọkara ụgbọ elu iri na abụọ kwa izu site na UK yana ụgbọ elu kwa izu site kwa Belgium, Russia, Denmark, na Netherlands
Tabbara bụ aha nna Arabic
Ndị nwere aha nna gụnyere ndia
Tabil Ahammed (Arabic تابل) bụ ngwakọta na-esi ísì ụtọ nke Tunisia nke na-ejikarị mkpụrụ coriander, mkpụrụ caraway, ntụ galik, na ntụ chili
Enwere ike itinye ihe ndị ọzọ, dị ka rose flower powder, cumin, mint, laurel, cloves ma ọ bụ turmeric
Ókwú a nwekwara ike izo aka na coriander n'onwe ya
Àtụ Cuisine of Algeria
Tabitha Mukami Muigai Karanja bụ nwanyị Kenya na-azụ ahịa, onye ọchụnta ego na onye na-emepụta ihe
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi nchịkwa nke Keroche Breweries ugbu a, nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ mmanya mbụ na Kenya nke ụlọ ọrụ na-abụghị nke mba dị iche iche nwere
Keroche na-akpata 20% nke biya Kenya, ka ọ dị na Ọktọba 2012
A mụrụ Tabitha na nso Kijabe, na etiti Kenya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ndị Kenya, ọ malitere ọrụ na Ministry of Tourism dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ndekọ ego
Ọ zutere ma lụọ di ya, onye nwere ụlọ ahịa na-aga nke ọma na obodo Naivasha
N'afọ 1997, di na nwunye ahụ mechiri ụlọ ahịa ngwongwo ma banye n'ahịa mmanya
Malite n'afọ 1997, Tabitha Karanja na di ya, malitere ime mmanya siri ike, na-elekwasị anya na njedebe ala nke ahịa
N'afọ 2007, mgbe gọọmentị mere ka ụtụ isi dị ukwuu na mmanya ndị a na-eme na mpaghara, a na-akwụ ngwaahịa ya n'ahịa
Ọ gbanwere n'ichepụta gin na vodka dị njikere ịṅụ, nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe ya ka na-eme taa
N'afọ 2008, ọ gbakwunyere biya na ihe ọṅụṅụ na-aba n'anya ya, malite na akara a na-akpọ 'Summit'
N'afọ 2013, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe malitere atụmatụ mmụba iji mụbaa mmepụta biya site na karama 60,000 kwa ụbọchị ruo karama 600,000 kwa ụbọchị
Ụlọ ọrụ a rụzigharịrị, nke na-efu KSh5 ijeri (US $ 555 nde), bụ Adan Mohammed, onye odeakwụkwọ Cabinet maka ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, nyere ya ọrụ na 31 Machị 2015
Tabitha lụrụ Joseph Karanja ma ha bụ nne na nna nke ụmụ anọ; James Karanja, Anerlisa Muigai, Edward Muigai na Tecra Muigai nwụrụ anwụ
Joseph Muigai Karanja na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Keroche Breweries Limited
Pascal-Emmanuel Sinamoyi Tabu (13 Nọvemba 1940), nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Tabu Ley Rochereau, bụ onye isi na-agụ egwú rumba na onye na-ede egwú si Democratic Republic of the Congo
Ọ bụ onye ndú nke Orchestre Afrisa International, ya n' otu n'ime ndị na-agụ egwú na ndị na-ede egwu kachasị n' Afrịka

Ya na onye na-akpọ ụbọ Dr Nico Kasanda, Tabu Ley bụ ndị ọsụ ụzọ soukous (African rumba) ma mee ka egwu ya bụrụ nke mba ụwa site na ijikọta ihe ndị dị na egwu egwu Congolese na Cuban, Caribbean na Latin American rumba
A kọwara ya dị ka 'onye Congo nke, ya na Mobutu, gosipụtara akụkọ ihe mere eme nke narị afọ nke 20 nke Africa'
Akwụkwọ akụkọ Los Angeles Times kpọrọ ya 'Elvis nke Afrịka'
Mgbe ọdịda nke ọchịchị Mobutu gasịrị, Tabu Ley gbakwara mbọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọrụ egwu ya na onye ọzọ na-eduzi ndị otu r
umba nke Congo na onye na-asọmpi Franco Luambo Makiadi bụ onye na-agba ọsọ otu TPOK Jazz n'ime afọ 1960, 1970 na '80s
N'oge ọrụ ya, Tabu Ley dere ihe ruru egwu 3,000 ma mepụta abọm 250
A mụrụ Pascal-Emmanuel Sinamoyi Tabu na Bagata, na Belgian Congo n'oge ahụ
Ọrụ egwu ya malitere na 1956 mgbe ya na Joseph 'Le Grand Kallé' Kabasele, na otu egwu ya L'African Jazz bụrụ abụ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ sonyeere òtù ahụ dị ka onye na-agụ egwú oge niile
Tabu Ley bụrụ abụ na pan-African hit Indépendance Cha Cha nke Grand Kallé dere maka nnwere onwe Congolese site na Belgium na 1960, na-akpali Tabu Ley ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama ozugbo
Ọ nọgidere na African Jazz ruo 1963 mgbe ya na Dr Nico Kasanda guzobere otu nke ha, African Fiesta Afọ abụọ ka e mesịrị, Tabu Ley na Dr
Nico kewara ma Tabu Ley guzobere African Fiesta National, nke a makwaara dị ka African Fiesta Flash
Ìgwè ahụ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị kasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Afrịka, na-edekọ ndị Africa oge ochie dị ka Afrika Mokili Mobimba, ma na-agafe ahịa ndekọ nke otu nde site na 1970
Papa Wemba na Sam Mangwana so n'ọtụtụ ndị egwu nwere mmetụta bụ akụkụ nke otu ahụ
Ọ nakwuru aha egwu 'Rochereau' site na General French Pierre Denfert-Rochereaux, onye aha ya masịrị ya na onye ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
N'afọ 1970, Tabu Ley guzobere Orchestre Afrika
a International, Afrika bụ ngwakọta nke Afrika na Éditions Isa, akara ndekọ ya
Tinyere Franco Luambo's TPOK Jazz, Afkisa bụzi otu n'ime ndị egwu kachasị ukuu n'Africa
Haa dekọrọ egwu dịka 'Sorozo', 'Kaful Mayay', 'Aon Aon', na 'Mose Konzo'
Ha mekwara na Zaire 74 ya mere ha nọ na ihe nkiri Soul Power
N'etiti afọ 1980 Tabu Ley chọpụtara onye na-eto eto nwere nkà na-agụ egwú na onye na-agba egwú, M'bilia Bel, onye nyere aka mee ka òtù ya bụrụ ihe a ma ama
M'bilia Bel ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ na-agụ egwú soukous iji nweta otuto n'Africa niile
Tabu Ley na M'bilia Bel mechara lụọ ma nwee nwa nwanyị aha ya bụ Melody Tabu
N'afọ 1988, Tabu Ley wepụtara nwanyị ọzọ na-agụ egwú nke a maara dị ka Faya Tess, M'bilia Bel hapụrụ ma gaa n'ihu na-enwe ihe ịga nke ọma n'onwe ya
Mgbe M'bilia Bel hapụrụ, mmetụta Afrisa na nke ndị na-asọmpi ha TPOK Jazz nọgidere na-ebelata ka ndị na-akwado ya na-adọrọ mmasị na ụdị ngwa ngwa nke soukous
Mgbe e guzobesịrị ọchịchị Mobutu Sese Seko na Congo, ọ nabatara aha 'Tabu Ley' dị ka akụkụ nke 'Zairization' nke Mobutu nke mba ahụ, mana o mechara gaa mba ọzọ na France na 1988
N'afọ 1985, Gọọmentị nke DRC machibidoro egwu mba ọzọ niile site na ọrụ Redio Mba
Mgbe Tabu Ley dere abụ 'Twende Nairobi' ('Ka anyị gaa Nairobi'), nke M'bilia Bel bụrụ, iji too onye isi ala Kenya Daniel arap Moi, e wepụrụ mmachibido iwu ahụ ozugbo
Na mbido afọ 1990 ọ biri obere oge na Southern California
Ọ malitere ịhazi egwu ya maka ndị na-ege ntị mba ụwa site na itinye ọtụtụ okwu Bekee na site n'ịbawanye ụdị ịgba egwu mba ụwa dịka Samba
Ọ chọtara ihe ịga nke ọma site na ntọhapụ nke abọm dịka Muzina, Exil Ley, Africa n'ụwa niile na Babeti soukous
Ọchịchị Mobutu machibidoro abọm ya nke 1990 'Trop, C'est Trop' dị ka onye na-emebi iwu
N'afọ 1996, Tabu Ley sonyere na abọm Gombo Salsa site na ọrụ egwu salsa Africando
Egwú 'Paquita' sitere na abọm ahụ bụ ihe ngosi nke egwu o dekọrọ na ngwụocha afọ 1960 na African Fiesta
Mgbe a chụpụrụ Mobutu n'ọchịchị n'afọ 1997, Tabu Ley laghachiri Kinshasa wee were ọnọdụ dị ka minista na gọọmentị nke onye isi ala ọhụrụ Laurent Kabila
Mgbe ọnwụ Kabila gasịrị, Tabu Ley sonyeere ndị omeiwu a họpụtara site na Joseph Kabila, ruo mgbe a gbasara ya mgbe e guzobere ụlọ ọrụ mgbanwe
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2005, a họpụtara Tabu Ley ka ọ bụrụ osote Gọvanọ nke Kinshasa, ọkwá e nyere pati ya, Congolese Rally for Democracy (RCD) site na nkwekọrịta udo nke afọ 2002
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka minista ọdịbendị nke mpaghara
N'afọ 2008, a sịrị na ọ mụrụ ụmụ 102, gụnyere onye France na-eti egwu Youssoupha na onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu Pegguy Tabu na ụmụ nwanyị dị iche iche
Tabu Ley Rochereau nwụrụ na 30 Nọvemba 2013, mgbe ọ dị afọ 73, n'ụlọ ọgwụ Saint-Luc dị na Brussels, Belgium ebe ọ nọ na-agwọ ọrịa strok ọ nwuru na 2008
E liri ya na 9 Disemba 2013 na Cimetiri Acropolic de la N'sele na Kinshasa, mgbe ọ natasịrị emume iru uju na Palais du Peuple

Tadaksahak (nakwa Daoussahak, Dausahaq na mkpoputa ndị ọzọ, mgbe aha Tuareg maka ndị na-asụ ya, Dăwsăhak) bụ asụsụ Songhay nke Idaksahak na-azụ atụrụ na mpaghara Ménaka nke Mali na-asụ Asụsụ ndị agbata obi Tuareg, Tamasheq na Tamajaq emetụtala ụda olu ya, ngwaa ngwaa na okwu ya

Tadatoshi Akiba (秋葉 忠利, Akiba Tadatoshi, bụ onye amụrụ na November 3, 1942 na Arakawa, Tokyo) bụ onye Japanese guru mgbakọ na mwepụ na onye ￼dọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma bụrụkwa onye rụrụ dị ka mayor of the city of Hiroshima, Japan site na afọ 1999 to 2011
Ọ gụrụ mgbakọ na mwepụ na Mahadum Tokyo, nweta BS
na 1966 na MS na 1968
Ọ gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya n'okpuru John Milnor na Massachusetts Institute of Technology, nweta PhD ya na mgbakọ na mwepụ na 1970
Ọ malitere ọrụ nkuzi na ọtụtụ mahadum Mahadum Steeti nke New York na Stony Brook (1970), Mahadum Tufts (1972-1986), na Mahadum Hiroshima Shudo (1986-1997)
Nnyocha ya bụ na topology, na mmasị na ìgwè homotopy

Mgbe ọ nọ na Tufts, Akiba guzobere mmemme Hibakusha Travel Grant, nke wetara ọtụtụ ndị nta akụkọ America na-ebipụta ma na-agbasa ozi kwa afọ na Hiroshima n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, iji mepụta akụkọ banyere obodo ahụ (na-ahụkarị banyere ahụmịhe nke ndị kpughere bọmbụ atọm na 1945)
Dị ka onye otu Social Democratic Party, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ụlọ omebe iwu, ma jee ozi site na 1990 ruo 1999
Ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka onye isi obodo Hiroshima na Febụwarị, 1999, a họpụtakwara ya ọzọ n'ọkwa a na 2003 na n'ọnwa Eprel 2007
Dị ka onye isi obodo, ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka udo
Ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na nzukọ Mayors for Peace, na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke World Conference ha

2020 Vision Campaign malitere na 2003, nke na-ezube iwepụ ngwá agha nuklia, enwetala ndị isi obodo maka udo 'World Citizenship Award' site na Nuclear Age Peace Foundation na 2004, 'Sean McBride' Award site na International Peace Bureau na 2006, na Nuclear-Free Future Award site na Franz-Moll Foundation na 2007
Ọ bụkwa onye na-akwado iwepụ ngwá agha nuklia, na onye na-akatọ George W
Bush
Kemgbe Mee 2007 ọ bụkwa onye ndụmọdụ na World Future Council
N'afọ 2007, ọ natara onyinye Nuclear-Free Future Award na ngalaba ngwọta
E depụtara ya maka onyinye 2008 World Mayor, mana o meriri, ebe onyinye ahụ gara Mayor Helen Zille nke Cape Town, Republic of South Africa

Na Jenụwarị 21, 2010, ọ gara nzukọ nke 78 nke oge oyi nke US Conference of Mayors dị ka ọkà okwu ọbịa pụrụ iche, ma n'ọnọdụ ahụ ọ gara oriri e mere na White House wee zute Onye isi ala US Barack Obama
Ọ bụ naanị onye na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi obodo Hiroshima nke zutere onye isi ala US na-eje ije ozi

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2010, ọ natara onyinye Ramon Magsaysay maka nkwado ya maka iwepụ ngwá agha nuklia, n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2013, e nyere ya Otto Hahn Peace Medal site na United Nations Association of Germany (DGVN) na onye isi obodo Berlin
Akiba nọ na Board of Advisors nke Global Security Institute
Hiroshima bụ otu ebe na-abụghị United States ebe a na-eme emume ụbọchị Martin Luther King Jr
dịka ọ dị na United States
Tadatoshi Akiba na-eme oriri pụrụ iche n'ọfịs onye isi obodo dị ka omume nke ijikọ oku obodo ya maka udo na ozi Eze nke ikike mmadụ
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2022, e nyere ya Ahmadiyya Muslim Prize for the Advancement of Peace
N'okwu afọ ọhụrụ na Jenụwarị 4, 2011, Akiba kwupụtara na ọ gaghị agba ọsọ maka nhọpụta ọzọ n'oge ntuli aka onye isi obodo nke e mere atụmatụ maka Eprel 10, 2011
Enweghị ihe kpatara ya
Na mbido Eprel a kọrọ na Mahadum Hiroshima ahọpụtara Akiba dị ka prọfesọ pụrụ iche, site na ezumike nká ya dị ka onye isi obodo
N'April 10, a họpụtara Kazumi Matsui ka ọ bụrụ onye isi obodo ọhụrụ
N'abalị atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2012, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi oche nke Middle Powers Initiative (MPI), netwọk mba ụwa nke òtù ndị na-abụghị gọọmentị na-arụ ọrụ maka iwepụ ngwá agha nuklia

Tafawa Balewa bụ ọchịchị ime obodo dị na ndịda steeti Bauchi na ugwu Naijiria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Tafawa Balewa
'Obodo Tafawa Balewa wepụrụ aha ya n'okwu abụọ nke Fulani rụrụ arụ 'Tafari' (nkume) na Baleri (oji)'
Amara mpaghara ahụ maka ime ihe nke otu nzuzu na ogbaghara agbụrụ kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ
Ndị isi agbụrụ a bụ Sayawa na Hausa/Fulani
Otu akụkọ Associated Press na-ekwu, sị, 'Ndị Sayawa kacha n'ime obodo na obodo nta ya, mana ndị eze ọdịnala ha bụ ndị agbụrụ Fulani na-abụkarị ndị Alakụba
Ndị Sayawa achọọla onye ọchịchị ọdịnala dị iche, nke butere mwakpo na ọgụ n'ime afọ iri abụọ gara aga'
Obodo Tafawa Balewa bi na Jarawa, Fulani, Hausa, Sayawa, Kanuri, Tapshinawa (angas) na ebo ndị ọzọ

Obodo a abụwo nnukwu nsogbu n'etiti ọha mmadụ nke na-adịte aka kemgbe ihe karịrị afọ iri ise, dị ka a hụrụ n'afọ 1948, 1959, 1977, 1991, 1995, 2001, 2005, 2010, 2011 na 2012, ebe ọtụtụ narị ndụ furu na ihe onwunwe ruru nde naira
Okwu sekpụ ntị na ya bụ esemokwu na-enwekarị ọgụ na mpaghara ahụ metụtara ịzọ ndị isi na ndi nwe obodo Tafawa Balewa
N'afọ 2011, mmadụ iri atọ na asatọ nwụrụ n'ime ihe ike malitere mgbe a na arúrịta ụka n'otu ọnụ ụlọ snooker gbasara obodo Kutaru, Malanchi, Gongo, Gumel na Gital gbara ọkụ n'ime mwakpo mmegwara

N' afọ 2011, Bauchi Steeti, Gọvanọ Isa Yuguda 'na-eyi egwu ịkwatu obodo Tafawa Balewa ma e wezụga ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị dị ka ụlọ ọgwụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ,' na-agwa ndị bi na 'Unu kwesịrị ị nabata ịdị n'otu udo ma ọ bụ ụnụ a nọrọ n'ihe ize ndụ nke mkpochapụ kpamkpam na Tafawa Balewa

M ga-eme ka a kwatuo obodo ahụ kpamkpam ka udo wee bụrụ eze” “Enwere ọgbakọ ihe mberede nke ndị otu jikọrọ ndị ụka na ndị Alakụba na-anọchite anya ọchịchị ime obodo Tafawa Balewa na Bogoro ”, ma ha kwekọrịtara
N'afọ 2012, 'gọọmentị steeti sitere n'ụlọ omebeiwu ukwu kpebiri ibugharị isi ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị ime obodo n'obodo Bununu' E bugara isi ụlọ ọrụ ime obodo Tafawa Balewa na mpaghara Bununu
A kpọgara onye isi mpaghara ahụ na ime obodo Zwal
Ndị otu Sayawa Council of Elders and Traditional Council of Tafawa Balewa na Bogoro nke Bauchi steeti katọrọ ịkwaga ebe ahụ
Hon
Rifkatu Samson Danna, na-anọchite anya Bogoro Constituency na nanị nwanyị bụ onye òtù ụlọ ogbakọ omebe iwu Bauchi Steeti, a kwụsịtụrụ n'ọkwa ya maka n' ọ megidere mkpebi ahụ

N'ihe dị ka mkpụrụ Ụbọchị asatọ nke ọnwa Mee n'afo 2012, Bununu enweghị 'ọtụtụ ihe eji enyere ndụ aka dịka mmiri, ọkụ eletrik, ebe obibi ụlọ ọrụ, ihe eji arụ ọrụ, ebe obibi ndị ọrụ na ụzọ dị mma iji banye na odeakwụkwọ gọọmenti ime obodo nwa oge' N'afọ 2013, Hon

Yakubu Dogara (PDP/Bauchi) Onyeisi oche, kọmitii na-ahụ maka ụlọ omebe iwu na-ahụ maka ọrụ ụlọ, kwuru na 'mgbalị isite isi obodo Tafawa Balewa kwaga Bunu abụghị naanị ihe megidere iwu kama ọ bụ ihe e mere iji kpalie ya
enweghị mmasị n'etiti ndị steeti'

A mụrụ Abubakar Tafawa Balewa na ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1912 na obodo Tafawa Balewa
Tafawa Balewa Square, (TBS) bụ 145-hectare (358-acre) ebe ememe (nke a na-akpọ 'Race Course') na Lagos Island, Lagos
Lagos Race Course ugbu a TBS, bụ ogige egwuregwu nke kwadoro ịgba ịnyịnya, mana gụnyere ngalaba ogige ebe emere maka ịgba bọọlụ na ala iji kpọọ cricket
Oba Dosunmu bu onye nyere ndị ọchịchị na afọ 1859, onye mechara nwuọ mpaghara ndị gbara ya gburugburu
Gọọmentị Yakubu Gowon mechara kwatuo usoro ahụ iji mee ka Tafawa Balewa Square nwee ohere
N'oge ya, usoro ahụ kwadoro ngagharị nke ụbọchị alaeze ukwu
Ụzọ ọsọ ịnyịnya ahụ dị ihe dị ka asaa ruo asatọ furlongs ma ọ bụ otu kilomita
N'afọ 1960, a rụgharịrị usoro ahụ iji mee emume nnwere onwe Naịjirịa na mbelata nke union jack
E wuru TBS na afọ 1972 n'elu ebe a na-anọghị n'ọrụ maka ịgba ịnyịnya
Okporo ụzọ nkè Awolowo, Cable Street, Force road, Catholic Mission street na ụlọ nnwere onwe dị okpukpu iri abụọ na isii gbara ya gburugburu

Na ebe Ọnụ ụzọ mbata nke ogige ahụ nwere nnukwu ihe a tụrụ atụ nke ịnyịnya anọ na-acha ọcha na-efe n'elu ọnụ ụzọ ámá na ugo asaa na-acha ọbara ọbara, nke bụ akara sitere na ihe nnọchianya mba nke na-egosi Ike na Nkwanye ùgwù

Ihe ncheta nke ndị ọzọ dị na square ahụ gụnyere Remembrance Arcade (nke nwere ihe ncheta maka Agha Ụwa nke Mbụ, Agha Ụwa Nke Abụọ na ndị agha obodo Naijiria nwụrụ) na ụlọ Independence House dị okpukpu iri abụọ na isii, nke e wuru na 1963 nke bụ ogologo oge, ụlọ kachasị elu na Naijiria
Ebe Ogige ahụ nwere ike ibata mmadụ opekanpe 50,000
Ihe owuwu dị na square ahụ gụnyere ụlọ ahịa, Airline's Travel Agencies, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ na ebe a na-adọba ụgbọala na ọdụ bọs
Ebe Ogige cricket, Tafawa Balewa Square Cricket Oval, dị ka 'ụlọ ọdịnala nke cricket' na Naijiria
Ọ kwadoro egwuregwu na mpaghara North-Western nke 2018 ICC19 T20 World Cup Africa Qualifier tournament
E mechiri ala ahụ ruo ọnwa 18 iji mezue nrụzigharị site na elu simenti ruo 10 ahịhịa iji mezuo ụkpụrụ ICC
E mechara mezigharịa ya na Jenụwarị 2022, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Naịjirịa kwadoro egwuregwu mbụ ha nke Women's Twenty20 International na 2022 Nigeria Invitational Women's Tournament T20I
Otu na Ihe omume mbụ dị ka sị mkpa na TBS gụnyere emume nnwere onwe Naịjirịa nke mere na 1 Ọktoba 1960 na Praịm Minista, Tafawa Balewa, na-ekwu okwu ya
Ụbọchị Ọchịchị Onye kwuo uche ya, yana ihe omume ndị ọzọ dịgasị iche iche dị ka jamborees egwu na nnọkọ okpukpe

Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ n'oge ọ bụ nwata na chọọchị nke ndị ikwu ya
O mechara gaa ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ndị isi ojii
Ọ lụrụ nwunye mbụ ya mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu, o mechara kewaa

Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na abụọ, Taft malitere ịnakọta Ọkpụkpụ na Okpokoro nke anụ ụlọ dị iche iche dị ka ọkụkọ, Ọkpụkpụ ehi na ọkpụkpụ nwa atụrụ na dị ka ihe nnọchianya ha n'ụdị na ihe oyiyi nke ọ na-arọ nrọ na ọhụụ ma na-agbakọta ha ọnụ ma mee ihe osise nka
Ọ malitere igosi nne ya ọrụ ya ma ọ nwèrè obi ụtọ na ònyìnyé ya
Ọ na-egosipụtakwa ọrụ nka ahụ nye enyi ya na ndị ikwu ya ndị ọzọ kwadoro ya
Na ngwụcha afọ 1960, Taft chọrọ igosi ụwa nka ya wee hapụ Tampa Florida wee kwaga Washington DC iji chụsoo ọrụ nka ya
Na DC ọ nwetara ọrụ mbụ ya na-arụ ọrụ na General Hospital
O mechara nweta ọkwa na Howard University Medical Hospital site n'enyemaka nke otu n'ime ezigbo ndị enyi Walter Lattimore (nna nke ónyé na-agụ R&B Kenny Lattimore)
Na Mahadum Howard ọ rụrụ ọrụ ma mụọ ọgwụ nuklia
Taft, mgbè ahụ nwa okorobịa dị afọ iri abụọ, jiri oge ezumike ya na-arụ ọrụ nka ya ma gosipụta ọrụ nka ya na ọrụ ngosi ọrụ na ogige ntụrụndụ na ebe ndị ntorobịa gbụrụ-gbúrụ ọbọdọ ahụ
N'oge gara aga, ya na ndị na-ese ihe, ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na ndị ama ama na-eleta obodo
Washington DC bụ obodo ndị Africa America bi na ya ma ọ bụ ebe a ka ndị isi ojii na-eto eto gosipụtara egwu, ime ihe nkiri na mmetụta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Taft gosipụtara mmasị dị ukwuu na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ikike mmadụ
Na America na ngwụcha afọ 1960 na 1970 Black American na-achọ ma na-alụ ọgụ màkà ịha nhata bi na United States
Taft nwèrè mmasị na Civil rights Icons dị ka Martin Luther King na Malcolm X
na Black activist Groups dị ka The Black Panthers na Black militants bụ ndị kwupụtara echiche ha banyéré mmeso ọjọọ na igbu ndị isi ojii gbụrụ-gbúrụ mba ahụ
N'okporo ámá DC
Taft na-eto eto n'oge ahụ kwadoro ma nwee mmasị n'echiche na echiche nke otu ndị a mana ọ dịghị mgbè ọ bụ ónyé otu nke mmalite ndị a
N'ihi ya, ihe niile a kpọtụrụ aha nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na mmetụta na ọdịnihu nke ọrụ Taft Art
Taft kpebiri na ọ chọrọ ikwupụta echiche na echiche ya site na ọrụ nka ya n'ụwa site na iji ọkpụkpụ na okpokoro isi
Taft malitere igosi ọha na eze ọrụ nka ya, n'akụkụ okporo ámá na-ekwo ekwo na ogige ntụrụndụ dị n'ógbè na ihe ngosi ọha na eze nke ụlọ ọrụ nka

O meghere gallery mbụ ya na Kennedy St NW DC na ngwụcha afọ irí asaá ya na ndị omenkà abụọ Leroy na Elbert, nke ha kpọrọ gallery TEL, mgbè ọ laghachiri Tampa ọ ga-amalite ụlọ ngosi nka abụọ ọzọ Mary's House of Israel, na ngwụchụ afọ 1980 The Moses House art gallery
Na mbido afọ 1970, Taft weere ihe osise ya na njem
Ọ gàrà gbụrụ-gbúrụ US site n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ gaa n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ na-eme ihe ngosi nka na ihe ngosi, site na New York City ruo steeti California
Ọ pụtara mgbè niile na ihe ngosi telivishọn ma edeela banyéré ya n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ gburugburu ụwa
N'akwụkwọ akụkọ Tampa Tribune, a raara ngalaba LifeStyle dum nye ya
Taft Na 2007 Taft dara ọrịa
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na nka ikpeazụ ya ruo mgbè ọ nwụrụ na Nọvemba 2008
Ọ bụ nna Sharon Moultry, Anthony Richardson, Hebert na Herbert Richardson, Taft Richardson 3rd, Dexter Myers, Pamela (Richardson) Hackley, Travis Richardson, Cheryl Richardson

Tafunga Bonjisi (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1982) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
Amụrụ ya dịka ejima na Ruwa, Bonjisi bụ nwanne ndị na-akpụ ihe Witness na Lameck Bonjisi; ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Ruwa na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Tafara
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ihe ọkpụkpụ na Lameck tupu ọ malite ọrụ naanị ya n'afọ 2000
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na cobalt na springstone, n'etiti mgbasa ozi ndị ọzọ
Taghreed Elsanhouri (Àtụ Lang-ar) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Britain na Sudan, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na onye edemede, nke bi na London
A maara ya nke ọma maka All about Darfur (2005), ihe nkiri banyere agha na Darfur

Maka ihe ngosi ya nke afọ 2012 a kpọrọ, Our Beloved Sudan, ọ gbara ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Sudan na nwa amaala Sudan ajụjụ ọnụ na ndị nne na nna si n'ebe ugwu na ndịda Sudan, na-egosi akụkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nke onwe tupu nnwere onwe nke South Sudan na 2011
Elsanhouri malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka akụkọ TV na mmemme ntụrụndụ, dị ka MBC na Al Jazeera
Mgbe nke a gasịrị, ọ gara n'ihu n'ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri n'efu na onye ndụmọdụ ihe nkiri maka ọrụ mmepe mba ụwa
Ọzọkwa, o mepụtara ihe nkiri vidio obodo maka mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na iwu udo, nke a na-akpọ 'Cultural Healing'
Ọrụ ahụ nyere ọzụzụ maka ndị mmadụ si ebe dị iche iche 'iji mee ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke na-egosipụta ọdịbendị na ọdịnala ha'
Ọ bụ European Union kwadoro ya ma tinye ya n'ọrụ na Sudan site na 2011 ruo 2013
E gosipụtakwara ya na mmemme ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ, dị ka Toronto International Film Festival 2005

All About Darfur bu n'uche igosi 'olu na-ekwu okwu, mgbe ụfọdụ na-emegiderịta onwe ya, olu sitere n'ime Sudan', dịka Elsanhouri gbara 'ndị Sudan nkịtị ajụjụ ọnụ na ụlọ ahịa tii, ahịa, ogige ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ na ụlọ obibi
' Ajụjụ ọnụ ndị a na-anwa ịkọwa etu ajọ mbunobi na-adịgide adịgide nke ndị metụtara nwere ike 'na mberede gbawaa n'ime ọkụ nke ime ihe ike agbụrụ'
N'afọ 2007, a họọrọ ihe nkiri ya maka akụkọ akụkọ Khartoum Story maka Berlinale Talents nke Berlin International Film Festival
Mother Unknown, ihe nkiri nke abụọ nke Elsanhouri meriri ihe nrite UNICEF Child Rights na 2009
N'otu afọ ahụ, o mere ihe nkiri maka Al Jazeera International maka usoro ihe nkiri ha 'Witness' na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri gbasara egwuregwu ụmụaka ọdịnala na mpaghara Gulf maka Disney Channel Dubai
Our Beloved Sudan, ihe ngosi nke atọ ya, gosipụtara na Dubai Film Festival na Disemba 2011
E nyere ya ihe nrite pụrụ iche nke Jury Silver na Luxor African Film Festival na Febụwarị 2012 ma gosikwa ya na Herbert F
Johnson Museum, New York, dị ka akụkụ nke ngosi ha 'Lines of Control' n'otu afọ ahụ
Ọ na-egosi akụkọ ndụ nke Amira Alteraify, nwanyị Sudan, onye nne si n'ebe ndịda na nna si n'akụkụ ugwu Sudan mụrụ tupu nkewa na 2011
Ọzọkwa, o nwere ike ịgba ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Sudan dịka Sadiq al-Mahdi na Hassan al-Turabi ajụjụ ọnụ

Onye na-enyocha ihe nkiri nke magazin Variety Jay Weissberg dere banyere ihe nkiri a 'Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-arụ ọrụ na mmefu ego dị ala (na ọ na-egosi), Elsanhouri nwetara ohere ịnweta ndị isi egwuregwu na esemokwu dị n'etiti mba ahụ, ọ nọkwa maka nnwere onwe South Sudan na nso nso a'
N'ikwu okwu banyere ọha mmadụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Sudan, o dere edemede banyere mgbanwe Sudan maka magazin akụkọ Middle East Eye
Tagoe Sisters bụ aha nke otu egwu abụọ nke ụmụ ejima Lydia Dedei Yawson Nee Tagoe na Elizabeth Korkoi Tagoe
Ha anọwo na-abụ abụ na ụlọ ọrụ egwu gospel kemgbe afọ 1983
Na Machị 2021, ndị na-ahazi 3Music Awards kwanyeere otu ahụ ùgwù na ihe omume a na-akpọ 3Music Women's Brunch
Lydia Dedei Yawson (née Tagoe) na Elizabeth Korkoi Tagoe, ndị bụ ejima, mụrụ onye nwụrụ anwụ Hammond Ayikwei Tagoe na Madam Theresa Aidoo na 27 Julaị 1965
Nna ha, Hammond Ayikwei Tagoe, sitere na Korle-Wokon, nke dị na Accra
na nne ha, Theresa Aidoo, bụ onye Dunkwa-on-Offin na Central Region
Ha gụrụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na nke etiti Alogboshie, dịdebere Achimota na Accra
Mgbe e mesịrị, ha gara YMCA ka ha mụta otú e si eji ejiji, bụ́ nke ha gbahapụrụ malite ịmalite ịbụ abụ
N'ụbọchị ndị mbụ nke ọrụ ha, ha abụọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ìgwè atọ, na Hannah Tsia Mensah, nke a na-akpọ 'Abụ m ụmụnne atọ'

Ha bụrụ abụ nkwado maka ndị egwu dị ka Felix Bell na G Man ma gosipụta na ihe ngosi Maazị Picus Laryea na 1970sN'afọ 1983, ha sonyeere Open Bible Church International ebe ha zutere otu ndị na-abụ abụ nwoke Advent Heralds
Ha kwadoro ndị Heralds na mmemme ihu ọha ha
N'afọ 1985, ha zutere Rev
Francis Akwasi Amoako onye ghọrọ onye nkuzi ha
N'okpuru nduzi ya, ha gara ebe dị anya ma n'ime ma n'èzí Ghana ma nweta aha ọma
Abọm mbụ ha 'Nyame ye Kese' nke Advent Heralds dere, ka ewepụtara na 1987
Orekyekye na Stay in my Heart sochiri na 1988
N'afọ 1990, ha tụfuru onye nduzi ha n'ihe mberede na-egbu egbu ka ha na-alaghachi Accra mgbe ha rụchara ọrụ na agha ntụli aka na Takoradi
Rev
Dr Thomas Harry Yawson batara na ndụ ha wee ghọọ onye na-ede egwu na onye nduzi ha
Taguella bụ achịcha dị larịị, nri ndị Tuareg bi na Sahara
Ọ bụ achịcha dị ka diski nke e ji ntụ ọka wit mee ma sie ya n'okpuru ájá na-ekpo ọkụ na icheku ọkụ nke obere ọkụ
A na-ekewa achịcha ahụ ka ọ bụrụ obere iberibe ma rie ya na ofe anụ
A na-enye ya n'otu nnukwu ụlọ, dị ka otu nri ma ọ bụ na-enye anụ atụrụ, tinyere mmiri ara ewu, kamel ma ọ bụ mmiri ara atụrụ, na tii
Taguella bụ nri ndị Tuareg na nri ha kachasị uru
Taguella bụ galette siri ike, nke na-enweghị ihe na-eko achịcha
A na-eji semolina, ọka wit ma ọ bụ ọka, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-agwakọta ya na ntụ ọka

Mgbe a gbasịrị ya (ruo nkeji iri abụọ) wee sie ya n'ọkụ ọkụ na ntụ na ájá; site n'aka nri, ndị Tuareg na-eri ya na tomato na akwụkwọ nri, ma ọ bụ anụ dị iche iche, ma ọ dị chili ma ọ bụ ofe ma mgbe ụfọdụ na-atọ ụtọ na fennel ọhịa
Taguma Mukomberanwa (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1978) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
Nwa Nicholas Mukomberanwa, ọ bụ nwanne ndị na-akpụ ihe Anderson, Lawrence, Ennica, na Netsai Mukomberanwa, na nwa nwanne nne Nesbert Mukomberanwa
E tinyere ọrụ Taguma na ihe ngosi nke afọ 2017 na-enyocha nka ọgbara ọhụrụ na Africa na Kunsthalle ConARTz na Markt Indersdorf, Germany
Àtụ The Mukomberanwa Family
Tahar Cheriaa (January 5, 1927 - November 4, 2010) bụ onye Tunisia na-enyocha ihe
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Carthage Film Festival na 1966, mmemme ihe nkiri mbụ nke Panafrican na Panarab
A mụrụ Cheriaa na Sayada na Tunisia
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Carthage Film Festival na 1966 ma duzie ihe omume ise mbụ a na-eme kwa afọ
Cheria tinyere aka na ntụgharị nke uri Arabic
Ọ bụ onye edemede na ọnụ na-ekwuchitere omenala ihe nkiri Arab-African
E nyere ya Grand Cordon of National Merit
Cheriaa nwụrụ na Ezzahra n'afọ 2010
E liri ya n'obodo ya Sayada

Taher (Arabic الطاهير, Al-Tahir; Algerian Arabic أطًهير), bụ obodo Algeria, ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke Jijel Province, yana mpaghara mmepụta ya nke Ouled Salah, ọdụ ụgbọ elu nke Achouat-Ferhat Abbas na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Djen Djen
Tahia Mohammed Halim (Arabic, September 9, 1919 May 24, 2003) bụ onye Ijipt na-ese ihe
Tahia Halim bụ otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke Modern Expressive Movement na nka Ijipt n'afọ ndị 1960, ebe ọ pụtara ìhè n'ịkọwa ọdịdị ndị Ijipt n'ọrụ ya
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya metụtara ọdịbendị Nubian, Naịl, ụgbọ mmiri, na isiokwu ndị a ma ama na nke mba nke nyere ya ọtụtụ onyinye nsọpụrụ na Ijipt na mba ofesi
A mụrụ Tahia Halim na Sudan, nke bu ebe ezinụlọ ya bi
Agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya dị n'ime Royal Palace nke Cairo, ebe a zụlitere ya, ebe nna ya bụ laureate nke Eze Fuad nke Mbụ nke Ijipt

Tahia Halim gụrụ nka n'okpuru ndị nkuzi dị mkpa dị ka onye na-ese ihe na Lebanọn Yussef Trabelsi na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Gris Gerom; mgbe ahụ n'okpuru onye na-ede ihe na Egypt Hamed Abdallah na ụlọ ọrụ ya na 1943, mgbe ha lụsịrị di na 1945, ha gara Paris iji sonye na Julian Academy (1949-1951)
Ha laghachiri Ijipt, ha kụziri ihe osise n'ụlọ ọrụ ha, na Down Town (n'akụkụ Tahrir Square) na Cairo
Tahia Halim natara agụmakwụkwọ abụọ nke Art Production na 1960 na 1975
Na Septemba 9, 2015, Google raara Doodle nye onye na-ese ihe maka ncheta afọ iri itoolu na isii nke ọmụmụ ya
Doodle ruru mba niile nke ụwa Arab
Tahia Kazem (Arabic; 1 March 1920 - 25 March 1992) nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Tahia Abdel Nasser bụ nwanyị mbụ nke Ijipt site na 23 June 1956 ruo 28 September 1970
Ọ lụrụ onye isi ala Gamal Abdel Nasser n'ọdịnihu n'afọ 1944
Di na nwunye ahụ nwere ụmụ ise, ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na ụmụ nwoke atọ
A mụrụ Kazem n'Ijipt n'aka nna Iran na nne Ijipt
Nasser nwetara nkwado nke nna ya tupu alụmdi na nwunye ha n'afọ 1944
A na-eji Tahini eme ihe na nri nke Levant na ọwụwa anyanwụ Mediterranean, Ndịda Caucasus, yana akụkụ nke mpaghara Ùgwù Afrika
A na-ejikwa ihe a na-etinye n'ime sesame (ọ bụ ezie na a naghị akpọ ya tahini) mee ihe na nri ụfọdụ n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Eshia
Tahini sitere na Arabic ma si na Levantine Arabic pronunciation nke ṭaḥīna (طحينة), ma ọ bụ karịa kpọmkwem ṭaḥīniyya (طحينية), ebe Bekee tahina na Hibru t'china טחינה
O sitere na mgbọrọgwụ ط ح ن Ṭ-Ḥ-N, nke dị ka ngwaa طحن ṭaḥana pụtara 'ịkụ', ma na-emepụta okwu طحين ṭaḥīn, 'mjupụta' n'asụsụ ụfọdụ
Okwu tahini pụtara na Bekee site na ngwụcha afọ 1930
Tahini bụ okwu mgbazinye site na tachíni nke oge a (ταχίνι) nke e si na 'tahin' nke Ottoman Turkish nweta
Na Turkish nakwa na Italian, a ka na-eji mgbọrọgwụ mbụ tahin mee ihe kama mgbanwe Grik a nabatara n'ụwa niile na okwu ahụ
Ihe kacha ochie a kpọtụrụ aha sesame bụ n'akwụkwọ cuneiform e dere afọ 4000 gara aga nke na-akọwa omenala nke inye chi mmanya sesame
Onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Herodotus dere banyere ịkọ ugbo sesame 3500 afọ gara aga na mpaghara Tigris na Yufretis na Mesopotemia
A na-ejikarị ya eme ihe dị ka isi iyi mmanụ
A kpọtụrụ Tahini aha dị ka ihe mejupụtara hummus kasa, usoro nri e depụtara n'akwụkwọ nri Arabic na-amaghị aha na narị afọ nke iri na atọ, Kitab Wasf al-Atima al-Mutada
Sesame paste bụ ihe a na-etinye na nri ụfọdụ nke ndị China na ndị Japan; nri Sichuan na-eji ya na ntụziaka ụfọdụ maka dandan noodles
A na-ejikwa ihe a na-etinye n'ime nri ndị India
Na North America, sesame tahini, tinyere ihe ndị ọzọ na-enweghị isi, dị na 1940 na ụlọ ahịa nri ahụike
A na-eme Tahini site na mkpụrụ sesame nke a na-etinye na mmiri wee kụrisịa ya iji kewa bran na kernels
A na-etinye mkpụrụ ndị a kụrisịrị akụrisị na mmiri nnu, na-eme ka bran ahụ mikpuo
A na-ewepụ mkpụrụ osisi ndị na-ese n'elu mmiri, sie ha, ma gwọọ ha iji mepụta mmanụ
A pụkwara iji mkpụrụ a na-etinyeghị n'ọkụ kwadebe ya ma kpọọ ya 'raw tahini', nke a na-ere mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka ihe oriri sitere n'okike]
N'ihi nnukwu mmanụ dị na tahini, ụfọdụ ndị na-emepụta ihe na-atụ aro friji iji gbochie mmebi
Ndị ọzọ anaghị atụ aro friji, n'ihi na ọ na-eme ka ngwaahịa ahụ dịkwuo ike ma sie ike ije ozi

A na-ahụkarị ofe ndị dabere na Tahini na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ndị dị n'Etiti Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Ụwa dị ka nri dị n'akụkụ ma ọ bụ dị ka ihe ịchọ mma, na-agụnyekarị mmiri lemon, nnu, na galik, ma jiri mmiri mee ka ọ dị nro
A na-eme Hummus site na chickpeas siri esi, nke a na-agwakọta ya na tahini, mmiri lemon na nnu
Tahini sauce bụkwa ihe a ma ama maka anụ na akwụkwọ nri na nri Middle East
A sweet spread, halawa taḥīniyya (حلاوة طحينية 'sweet tahini'), bụ ụdị halva sweet
Mgbe ụfọdụ, ọ na-enwe ma ọ bụ bepụ iberibe pistachio a na-awụsa n'ime ma ọ bụ n'elu
A na-agbasokarị ya na achịcha ma rie ya dị ka nri dị mfe
Na Armenia, enwere ike iji tahini mee ihe dị ka ofe iji tinye lahmajoun
Na Gris, a na-eji tahini (Grik ταχίνι) eme ihe dị ka ihe a na-agbasa n'elu achịcha ma ọ bụ naanị ya ma jiri mmanụ aṅụ ma ọ bụ jam kpuchie ya
A na-enweta ite tahini a gwakọtara ya na mmanụ aṅụ ma ọ bụ koko n'ụlọ nri ụtụtụ nke nnukwu ụlọ ahịa ndị Gris

Na Saịprọs, a na-eji tahini, nke a na-akpọ tashi, eme ihe dị ka mmiri maka achịcha na mgbe ụfọdụ na pitta souvlaki karịa tzatziki, nke bụ omenala na Gris; a na-ejikwa ya eme 'tahinopitta' (tahini pie)
A na-akpọ Tahini ardeh (ارده) na Persian
Na Iran, a na-eji ya eme halvardeh (حلواارده), ụdị halva nke e ji tahini, shuga, ọcha àkwá, na ihe ndị ọzọ mee
A na-eri ya n'oge nri ụtụtụ, na-ejikarị ihe na-atọ ụtọ, dị ka syrup mkpụrụ vaịn, syrup date, mmanụ aṅụ, ma ọ bụ jam
Ardeh na halvardeh so n'ihe ncheta nke obodo Iran nke Yazd na Ardakan
Na Turkey, a na-agwakọta (Turkish tahin) na pekmez iji mee tahin-pekmez, nke a na-ejikarị eme ihe dị ka ihe nri ụtụtụ ma ọ bụ mgbe nri gasịrị dị ka ihe na-atọ ụtọ maka achịcha
Iraq, a maara tahini dị ka rashi, a na-agwakọta ya na ọgwụ (rub) iji mee nri na-atọ ụtọ nke a na-ejikarị achịcha eri
Na Israel, tahini (Hibru טחינה t'hina) bụ nri a na-eri eri
A na-enye ya dị ka mmiri na achịcha dị larịị ma ọ bụ pita, ihe na-eme ka ọtụtụ nri dị ka falafel, sabich, Jerusalem mixed grill na shawarma, yana dị ka ihe na-agwakọta na mgbasa dị iche iche
A na-eji ya dị ka ofe maka anụ na azụ, yana nri na-atọ ụtọ dị ka halva, halva ice cream na kuki tahini
A na-eji kufta e ji nwa atụrụ ma ọ bụ anụ ehi mee na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ na ahịhịa, ma ọ bụ na azụ dum n'akụkụ osimiri na Oké Osimiri Galili
Na Levant, tahini (Levantine Arabic t'hine) bụ ihe oriri a na-eri na nnu, mmiri lemon, na galik a na-agbakọta
A na-enye ya dị ka dip na pita, ma ọ bụ ihe dị n'elu maka falafel na shawarma, yana dị ka ihe na-agwakọta ya na mgbasa dị iche iche
A na ahụ ya dị ka ofe maka anụ na azụ
Ọ bụ isi ihe na-eme na nri mmiri a na-akpọ siyadiyeh
A na-eji Tahini eme na nri na-atọ ụtọ dị ka halva na halva na pistachios
Na Gaza Strip, a na-enye ụdị nchara na-acha nchara nchara a maara dị ka 'red tahina' na mgbakwunye na tahina nkịtị
A na-enweta ya site na usoro dị iche ma dị ogologo nke isi mkpụrụ sesame, ma nwee ụtọ siri ike
A na-eji tahina uhie eme ihe na sumagiyya (lamb na chard na sumac) na salad ndị falaheen si n'obodo ndị gbara ya gburugburu, yana ndịda Gaza
N'obodo Nablus nke West Bank, a na-agwakọ tahina na qizha paste iji mee ' tahina ojii', nke a na-eji eme achịcha
N'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Eshia, sesame paste (Chinese) bụ isi ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ nke a na-eji eme ihe na noodles kpọrọ nkụ (ọkụ ma ọ bụ oyi)
A pụkwara iri nri sesame paste dị ka ihe oriri, nke a maara dị ka ofe sesame ojii
Na 100-gram reference amount, tahini na-enye 592 calories site na ihe mejupụtara ya dị ka 53% abụba, 22% carbohydrates, 17% protein, na 3% mmiri (tebụl)
Ọ bụ isi iyi bara ọgaranya nke thiamine (138% nke uru kwa ụbọchị, DV), phosphorus (113% DV), zinc (49% DV), niacin (38% DV), iron (34% DV), magnesium (27% DV), na folate (25% DV) (tebụl)
Tahini bụ isi iyi nke calcium, vitamin B ndị ọzọ, na potassium (tebụl)
Tahir Hemphill (amụrụ n'ubochí irí na anọ n'ọnwa, 1972) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nkírí multimedia, ethnolinguist, na ónyé na-eme nchọpụta
Ọ mepụtara nchekwa data Hip Hop Word Count
Hemphill tolitere na New York City, na mpaghara Lower East Side
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Brooklyn Technical High School na Regents diploma concentration na Electrical Engineering
Ọ bụ ónyé Africa America
Hemphill gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Morehouse College na BA
na Spanish
O nwere asambodo na Strategic Planning site na Miami Ad School
O nwéré nzèrè masta na Communications Design nkè ọ natara na Pratt Institute
Hemphill mepụtara nchekwa data ethnographic nke abụ hip-hop na-ekpuchi ógè site na 1979 ruo ugbu a
N'ime nchekwa data, a na-etinye ihe onwunwe na ụbọchị dịka ụbọchị ntọhapụ album si dị
Hemphill na-akpọ data a geography nke asụsụ na mbara igwe nke hip-hop
Hemphill kọwapụtara ozi ahụ site na nyocha nke ọnụ ọgụgụ okwu, ọnụ ọgụgụ nke mkpụrụ édémédé kwà okwu, ọnụego mkpụrụedemede ọ bụla, okwu polysyllabic, yana agụmakwụkwọ na ọkwa ọgụgụ ndị na-ege ntị
Hemphill jiri Simplified Measure of Gobbledygook ('SMOG') na FleschãoKincaid readability tests (nke ónyé na-akwado Bekee Rudolf Flesch mepụtara) iji nyochaa ọkwa ọgụgụ
N'ime nyocha ya banyéré Hip-Hop site na oghere sayensị, ọ na-ezube ịchọpụta mmalite nke okwu ụfọdụ, otu ha si aga n'ọbọdọ dị íchè íchè, na nkọwa ha na-agbanwe agbanwe n'ọnọdụ dị íchè íchè
Taisha Paggett (nke a maara dịka taisha paggett) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ese ihe na Los Angeles
paggett bụ ónyé otu ngalaba na Mahadum California, Riverside na Ngalaba Dance O nwèrè ahụmịhe na-arụ ọrụ ma n'elu ikpo okwu ma na ntọala gallery
A gụnyere paggett na 2014 Whitney Biennial na Made in LA, Hammer Museums biennial na 2018
A mụrụ ya na Fresno, California, paggett nwetara BA ya na 2002 na Art History site na UC Santa Cruz na MFA ya na 2008 na Choreography site na UCLA

Ihe ngosi nke Paggett na 2013 bụ ihe ngosi nke e nyèrè iwu na The Studio Museum na Harlem màkà perFOREmance, usoro ihe ngosi màkà ihe ngosi nke 2012-2013, Fore, nke gosipụtara ọrụ nke ndị na-ese ihe nke ndị Afrịka
Ndị na-agụ egwú na-eji ma na-emebi Zumba; Paggett dọtara na 'usoro nkuzi' nke zumba na omenala pop iji mepụta 'echiche nkè ihe ọmụma a na-ekerịta'
Taiwo Olubunmi Abioye bụ prọfesọ Asụsụ Bekee nke Naijiria na ọkachamara na Stylistics na applied linguistics
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ ịbụ osote onye isi ọchịchị na Mahadum Covenant University
Amụrụ ya na Jenụwarị 17, 1958 na Kaduna
Nne na nna ya si steeti Ogun, Abioye nwetara nzere mbụ ya na Language Arts site na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ngalaba nke abụọ dị elu na 1987
Ọ nwetara nzere mastas na PhD site na otu Mahadum ahụ n'afọ 1992 na 2004
Na 1982, Abioye onye akwukwo kachasị mma na ngalaba mmuta English
Abioye bidoro ọrụ nkuzi ya dịka onye enyemaka gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello na 1988, n'ime afọ iri na-abịanụ ọ gbagoro n'ọkwa wee bụrụ onye nkuzi na ABU
Na 2005, ọ banyere na Mahadum Covenant wee bụrụ onye osote prọfesọ na 2010, mana kita, ọ bụ prọfesọ zuru ezu
N’ọnwa Eprel afọ 2016, ọ dụrụ ndị otu na-achị ụmụ akwụkwọ ọdụ ka ha kwekọọ n’atụmatụ ọrụ ha
Na 2011, o bipụtara akwụkwọ nke Language and Ideology in George Ehusani's Writings, George Ehusani na ndị nyocha onwe ha nabatara akwụkwọ ahụ nke ọma
Ọ bụbu onye DVC (maka ọrụ nchịkwa) maka afọ abụọ, tupu ọ bụrụ osote onye isi ọchịchị ụlọ akwụkwọ na 2014

Google Scholar index tinyere na-ọkwa nke mbụ edemede isiokwu e depụtara na 2009 nke akpọrọ 'Typology of rhetorical questions as a stylistic device in writing' Nchọpụta a lebara anya etu ndị Naịjirịa siri were asụsụ dị iche na asụsụ nne ha, tụmadụ etu ndị asụsụ ọzọ si asụ asụsụ ndị a, na etu usoro a siri metụta onye na-asụ ya
N'elu nke ahụ, ọmụmụ ihe ahụ mere nyocha nke isiokwu nke rhetorical questions, ebe ọ na-atụle uru na ọghọm banyere ndị Naijiria
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ dị na International Journal of Language Society and Culture
Taiwo Ajai-Lycett, OON (amụrụ na 3 Febụwarị 1941) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nta akụkọ, onye na-eme telivishọn, na onye na-ahụ maka ihe ntecha
Lycett bụ onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị ma bụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ mbụ nke magazin Africa Woman na 1970s
A mụrụ Lycett dị ka nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ ejima na 3 Febụwarị 1941 na Lagos, Western Region of Colonial Nigeria, nna ya bụ onye Awori
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mt Ụlọ akwụkwọ Convent nke Carmel, Lagos, tupu ọ gaa Ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Methodist Ụmụ agbọghọ, Lagos
Iji gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya, ọ gara London iji mụọ azụmahịa na nchịkwa
Na London, ọ gara ọmụmụ ihe na Christine Shaw Ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Sayensị Mma na London, ebe ọ natara asambodo na ihe ntecha
Ọ gakwara Hendon College of Technology, ebe ọ nwetara Akwụkwọ nke Sayensị Mma na 1969
Mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ere nri na Lyons Tea Shop, wee kwaga na Ụlọ ọrụ nzipu ozi ma mesịa kpọsaa
Na Ụlọ ọrụ nzipu ozi, ọ malitere dị ka odeakwụkwọ onwe onye na 1962 ma mesịa rụọ ọrụ dị ka ode akwụkwọ ukwu n'ọfịs Lord Hall
Ọ kwagara na mgbasa ozi ma nọrọ na ngalaba ndị ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi, Na-eto eto na Rubicam
Mgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-enyere onye isi nke Gresham Broad and Co, ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ ego aka
Ọ ghọrọ nne mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise; nke a mere ka ndị mụrụ ya na ezinụlọ ya leghara ya anya, mana o debara aha ya maka klas mgbede
N'afọ 1959, o nwere ohere ịga United Kingdom, saịtị n'aka enyi ya David Ak авиа, onye o mechara lụọ
Otú ọ dị, alụmdi na nwunye ahụ mechara mebie n'ihi ime ihe ike n'ụlọ
Mgbe ya na Ak авиа gbara alụkwaghịm, ọ lụrụ Thomas Lycett ma alụmdi na nwunye ha bụ nke na-adịte aka
Otú ọ dị, n'afọ 2006, a zuuru ya ohi ma dinaa ya n'ike n'ụlọ ya dị na Egbe mgbe ọ dị afọ 65
Na 3 Febụwarị 2021, ọ gbara afọ iri asatọ ebe ọ natara ekele saịtị n'aka ndị ezinụlọ na ndị enyi si ebe ndị a ma ama
Oge izizi ya na-eme ihe nkiri bụ na Disemba 1966 na Wole Soyinka's Ọdụm na ọla, ihe nkiri abụọ nke William Gaskill duziri na Ụlọ ihe nkiri Royal Court na London
Emeghị atụmatụ ime ihe nkiri mbụ ya, ọ nọ n'ụlọ ezumezu nke egwuregwu ahụ mgbe Gaskill gwara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye sonyere
Mgbe agbamume ọ natara na-esote arụmọrụ ya na akwụkwọ ịkpọ òkù sitere n'aka ndị na-emepụta ihe na-eso ya, o kpebiri iwere ọrụ na ime ihe nkiri n'ụzọ siri ike
Ọ debanyere aha na Guildhall School of Music and Drama
N'afọ 1972, ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ ya wee sonye na Traverse Theatre Group maka Edinburgh Festival
O mechara nọrọ na telivishọn na ihe ngosi ihe nkiri
N'afọ 1973, ọ nọ na egwuregwu Amadu Maddy bụ Life Everlasting na Africa Centre, London, ma mesịa n'afọ ahụ, ọ nọ na Peter Nichols 'The National Health n'oge Festival of British Theatre
N'afọ 1976, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na Yemi Ajibade's Parcel Post na Royal Court Theatre
Ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Louis Mahoney na onye edemede Mike Phillips, ọ bụ onye nduzi na Black Theatre Workshop na London
Ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa n'afọ 1971
O gosipụtara na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Naijiria ama ama, gụnyere Tinsel, ihe nkiri ncha Naijiria nke nwetara ihe nrite
Ajai-Lycett gosipụtakwara na ọrụ ndị ọzọ a ma ama dịka ihe nkiri Naijiria Oloibiri
Onye mepụtara Rogers Ofime
Onye duziri ya bụ Curtis Graham
N'afọ 1975, a kpọrọ Ajai-Lycett ka ọ sonye na ndị ọrụ Africa Magazine nke Raph Uwechue bipụtara
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Africa Woman magazine, magazin ụmụ nwanyị maka ndị Afrịka nọ na diaspora
Dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ, ọ bụ onye sonyere na United Nations International Women's Year
N'abalị mbụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2006, ọ natara onyinye mba nke onye isi nke Order of the Niger, nke Chief Olusegun Obasanjo, onye isi ala nke Federal Republic of Nigeria, chọrọ mma

N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2008, na All-Star Gala nke emere na Theatre Royal Stratford East na ncheta afọ 10 nke Tiata Fahodzi, a kwanyeere ya ùgwù dị ka onye ndu nke ihe nkiri Britain na Africa, n'akụkụ Dotun Adebayo na Yemi Ajibade
Ọ bụ onye otu Society of Nigerian Theatre Artists (SONTA)
A na-asọpụrụ ya na The Industry Merit Award na 2022 Africa Magic Viewerīs Choice Awards (AMVCA) na 14th nke Mee 2022
Ihe omume onyinye ahụ e mere na Eko Hotel na Lagos
Taiwo Aladefa (amụrụ na !9 disemba 1971) bụ onye ọsọ egwuregwu Naijiria lara ezumike nká
Ọ gara Mahadum Alabama A&M site na 1989 ruo 1993
Ọ ka bụ onye na-ejide ihe ndekọ ụlọ akwụkwọ ya na ọsọ 100Mita (1319sec) ma bụrụ NCAA All American athlete ugboro iri na isii
Taiwo Aladefa so na otu ụmụ akwụkwọ kọleji ndị ojii mbụ merịrị asọmpi egwuregwu nke NCAA haziri (1992)
Ọ zọrọ mpị na asọmpi olympik nke ụmụ nwaanyị emere na 1996
Taiwo bụ otu n'ime ndi ọsọ egwuregwu iri kachasị ọsọ nke 100mita na Afrika
E jiri onyinye nke Africa Legend in Athletics were kwanyeere Taiwo Aladefa ugo na-afọ 2011 ma tinye aha ya na Alabama A&M University Hall of Fame na August 2012
Nwanne ya nwoke bụ Kehinde Aladefa sonyere na-asọmpi 400mita na 1996 Olympik ma nweta ọla ọcha na ọla nchara na egwuregwu nke mba Afrika niile na 1995 ma na 1999
Taiwo Micheal Awoniyi (bu onye a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 12 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1997) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa nke na-agbara otu Bundesliga Union Berlin nakwa ndị otu mba Naịjirịa bọọlụ
N'afọ 2010, a họpụtara Awoniyi ka ọ bụrụ onye egwuregwu kacha baa uru na asọmpi bọọlụ Coca-Cola na London
Seyi Olofinjana hụrụ arụmọrụ ya na asọmpi ahụ bụ onye kpọrọ ya ka ọ sonye na Imperial Soccer Academy
N'abalị iri atọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2015, Awoniyi bịanyere aka na klọb Liverpool nke England maka ego ruru £ 400,000 mana a gbazinyere ya ozugbo na ndị otu FSV Frankfurt nke Germany
Awoniyi mere nke mbụ ya na Frankfurt dị ka onye nnọchi anya na egwuregwu iko German megide Hertha Berlin
Mgbe a kpọchara ya aha dị ka onye nnọchi anya maka egwuregwu isii, o mere nke mbụ ya na 19 Febụwarị 2016, na-egwu nkeji 89 megide FC St
Pauli Awoniyi dara na Frankfurt, ọ laghachikwara Liverpool na njedebe nke oge ahụ

N'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2016, ndị otu NEC nke Dutch kwadoro na Awoniyi esonyela ha na mbinye ebinyere ha ogologo oge ma a na-atụ anya na ọ ga-esonyere ndị otu ahụ n'izu na-esonụ mgbe emechara akwụkwọ ikike ọrụ ya

N'abalị iri n'ọnwa Septemba, o mere Eredivisie mbụ ya na mmeri 4-0 nke NEC na PSV Eindhoven, Michael Heinloth nọchiri ya na nkeji iri asaa na abụọNa NEC, onye Naijiria ahụ nwetara ọkwa nke abụọ ya n'usoro, ebe a chụpụrụ ya na Eredivisie n'afọ 2017

N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2017, Awoniyi hapụrụ NEC wee sonye na klọb Belgium Royal Excel Mouscron na mgbazinye ego ogologo oge, wee mee nke mbụ ya na 12 Ọgọstụ mgbe ọ malitere egwuregwu ahụ megide KSC Lokeren, na-enye goolu n'ime nkeji iri abụọ na atọ

Na 17 Julaị 2018, Awoniyi bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ ogologo oge na Liverpool, na 23 Julaị mechie mgbazinye ego ogologo oge na klọb Belgium ọzọ, Gent N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2019, a mara ọkwa na ego mgbazinye ya na Gent dị mkpụmkpụ, a gbazinyere Awoniyi na Mouscron ọzọ
N'ọnwa Eprel, o kwuru na mgba ya iji nweta akwụkwọ ikike ọrụ UK nwere ike ịkwụsị ọrụ Liverpool ya
N'ụbọchị nke isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2019, Liverpool kwadoro na Awoniyi esonyela ndị otu Bundesliga Mainz 05 na mgbazinye ego ogologo oge
Ọ nọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ na June 2020, mgbe ọ nwesịrị nnukwu ọgba aghara n'oge mmeri 1–0 nke FC Augsburg na league
Na 19 Septemba 2020, Awoniyi hapụrụ maka mgbazinye ego nke asaa ya, na nke ugbu a, ọ sonyeere otu Bundesliga n'akụkụ Union Berlin maka otu afọ
Na 20 ọnwa Julaị 2021, Awoniyi sonyeere Union Berlin, na nke ugbu a na-adịgide adịgide
A kọrọ na klọb German ahụ kwụrụ nde £ 65 maka onye na-aga n'ihu
Liverpool ekwuputala okwu maka pasent iri nke ire ere na nkwekọrịta a
Awoniyi nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na 2013 FIFA U-17 World Cup wee gaa n'ihu merie asọmpi ahụ, na-enye goolu anọ n'oge asọmpi ahụ
Ọ nọchikwara anya Naịjirịa na 2015 FIFA U-20 World Cup na New Zealand mgbe o meriri 2015 African U-20 Championship na Senegal
N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2015, o nyere goolu na nke mbụ ya maka ndị otu Nigeria U-23 na egwuregwu ha na Zambia, ka ndị otu ya gara n'ihu iru eru maka 2015 All African Games
Naịjirịa họpụtara ya maka ndị otu ha dị mmadụ iri atọ na ise maka 2016 Summer Olympics

Gernot Rohr họpụtara ya na ngwụsị afọ 2021 ka ọ nọchite anya Naịjirịa na 2022 FIFA World Cup qualifiers, na-eme nke mbụ ya na mmeri 1–0 ha meriri Central African Republic A họpụtara Awoniyi ka ọ nọchite anya Naịjirịa na AFCON 2021 ebe o duuru ndị Naịjirịa n'asọmpi ahụ niile

Taiwo Hassan (amụrụ na 31 Ọktoba 1959) nke a makwaara dị ka Ogogo bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye nduzi
A mụrụ Taiwo Hassan na 31 Ọktoba 1959 na Ilaro, obodo nke dị na steeti Ogun
O nwere ejima nwoke, ezinụlọ ya nwere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ejima, nna ya na nna nna ya bụ ejima
Ogogo gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị na Christ Church School na Ilaro
Ọ gara kọleji Gazikia na Lagos maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, mana o nweghị ike ịgụcha n'ihi nsogbu ego
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gara kọleji teknụzụ ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-arụzi ụgbọala na ụlọ ọrụ mmiri ruo ihe afọ irí na atọ
Ogogo malitere ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya n'afọ 1981, obere oge ka ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-arụ ọrụ
N'afọ 1994, ọ hapụrụ ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ mmiri iji lekwasị anya n'ime ihe nkiri

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2022, o ritere ọlaọcha na 2022 Commonwealth Games
O setịpụkwara ndekọ ọhụrụ maka ụdị ndị obere nke Commonwealth na Clean & Jerk
Taiwo Odubiyi (amuru 29 Mee na afo 1965) bu onye Naijiria odee, onye na-ekwu okwu mba ofesi, onye ndụmọdụ alụmdi na nwunye na mmekọrịta
Ọ bụ nnukwu pastọ na-akpakọrịta, ya na di ya, Reverend Sola Odubiyi, nke The Still Waters Church International nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ dị na Ikorodu, Lagos, Naijiria
Taiwo edeela akwụkwọ akụkọ ịhụnanya karịrị iri abụọ na-emeri; na akwụkwọ enyemaka onwe onye na ndina n'ike na mmekọrịta, na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ / akwụkwọ ọhụrụ kwa afọ
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke TenderHearts Family Support Initiative na onye nchoputa nke pastọ Taiwo Odubiyi Ministries

Ọ bụkwa onye ozi televishọn ; onye na- ede akwụkwọ akụkọ na Nigerian Canadian News, The National Mirror, na akwụkwọ akụkọ mbata na ọpụpụ US ; na onye na-elekọta ihe omume redio na telivishọn Nigeria Ọ bụ Ihe Nile Banyere Gị
A mụrụ Taiwo Odubiyi na ezinụlọ Jonathan Olufemi Soyombo na Victoria Olubamwo Soyombo
Ya na ejima ya bụ nke ọdụdụ n'ezinụlọ nwere ụmụ asaa
Amuru ya na Abeokuta, ma zụlite ya na Lagos
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Reagan Memorial Baptist wee gụchaa na mahadum Polytechnic, jiri HND na Akaụntụ
O nwekwara nna ukwu ya na Business Administration si FUTA, Akure

Taiwo Odubiyi bụ Senior Associate Pastor nke The Still Waters Church International, nke dị na Obodo Ikorodu, Nigeria

Ụkọchukwu Taiwo Odubiyi Ministries na-ahụ maka ibipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ na-akpali akpali nke na-enweta ihe nrite; inye ndị mmadụ ndụmọdụ gbasara mmekọrịta na otu esi ebi ndụ ka mma; na-agbasa Okwu na ịhụnanya Chineke n'ebe nile site na TV na redio ihe niile gbasara gị! ; na ijide mmemme (mmemme) na nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe maka ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma, ndị na-alụbeghị di, ụmụ nwanyị na ndị di na nwunye
Blọọgụ nke Taiwo Odubiyi Ministries nwere akwụkwọ edemede na-akpali akpali na amaokwu Akwụkwọ Nsọ iji nyere ndị mmadụ aka n'akụkụ ọ bụla nke ndụ

TenderHearts Family Support Initiative bụ ọgbakọ na-abụghị gọọmentị na-ahụ maka nkwado, ndụmọdụ na ịgba ume ndị e dinara n'ike; na-agakwuru ndị na-enweghị ihe ùgwù; ịhazi (ịhazi) mmemme ekeresimesi (mmemme) maka ụmụaka ndị nwere nkwarụ; na inye nkwado mmetụta uche & ego nye ụmụ mgbei
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị a na-enweta ihe nrite na-agba ume, na-adụ ọdụ ma na-eduzi ndị nọ na mmekọrịta (ndị na-alụbeghị di na nwunye na ndị lụrụ di na nwunye)
N'ịbụ ndị ewu ewu na Naijiria, a na-agụ ha na obodo niile na mba ụwa
Taiwo kwenyere na ọ dịbeghị anya ịkụziri ụmụaka na ịkụziri ụmụaka ihe ize ndụ dị n'inwe mmekọahụ tupu ha alụọ di ma ọ bụ nwunye, na ịmara banyere ndị na-emetọ ụmụaka
ndi a bu peeji nwere hcards

Chief Daniel Conrad Taiwo (1781 February 20, 1901), onye a na-akpọ Taiwo Olowo (nke a sụgharịrị dị ka 'Taiwo ọgaranya Nwoke'), bụ onye ahịa, onye na-ere ngwá agha, onye nwe ohu, onye mmegide ike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye ọrụ ebere na onye isi obodo na Colonial Lagos
A mụrụ Taiwo Olowo na c
1781 na Isheri, obodo obibi na Lagos
Nna ya, Oluwole, bụ onye isi (Olofin) nke obodo ya, ọ nwụkwara n'afọ 1809
Olowo rutere Lagos n'afo 1848 ma jee ozi dị ka ohu nke otu Ogunmade site na Oba Osinlokun
Aha ya na-egosi na ọ bụ okenye n'ime ejima
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1840, Taiwo aghọwo onye nchebe nke Kosoko, nwa Oba Osinlokun
Kosoko chịrị dị ka Oba nke Lagos site n'afọ 1845 ruo 1851 ma, dịka a pụrụ ịtụ anya ya, Taiwo jiri ịdị nso ya na Kosoko mee ihe maka uru ahịa, na-eguzobe mmekọrịta ya na ndị ahịa Europe na Brazil

Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị ihe doro anya ma Taiwo na Kosoko gbagara Epe mgbe Mbelata Britian nke Lagos na ọnwa Disemba, afọ 1851, na ntinye nke Oba Akitoye, ihe a maara bụ na Gọvanọ Freeman kpọrọ Kosoko laghachi Lagos na 1862
Taiwo wuru mmekọrịta bara uru na nchịkwa Freeman na ndị sochirinụ
N'afọ 1863, Kosoko mere ka Gọvanọ Glover mara Taiwo onye nwere mmasị na Taiwo ma gbaa ya ume ịchụso azụmahịa
Gọvanọ Glover guzobere mmekọrịta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke mere ka Taiwo bụrụ otu n'ime ndị kasị baa ọgaranya na ndị kasị ike na Lagos
Glover webatara Taiwo na ụlọ ọrụ nke Messrs GL
Gaiser, onye ghọrọ ndị isi ahịa Taiwo na onye nyeere ya aka ịnakọta ụgwọ ndị ahịa Egba ji Taiwo
Gọvanọ Glover nyekwara Taiwo ike dị ka Baba Isale nke Isheri
Na ikike ya dị ka Baba Isale, Taiwo bụ onye nkwado na onye nnọchi anya ndị Isheri
Na nzaghachi, Taiwo nwere ihe ùgwù karịa ndị ọzọ niile na ịnweta ụzọ na ahịa na azumahịa Isheri

N'akwụkwọ ozi e degaara Colonel Ord, onye ọrụ Britain, Taiwo na ndị ahịa Lagosian ndị ọzọ dere na ha bụ 'a mụrụ ndị ohu' ma 'site na ike [ha] wee bụrụ ndị nwe ohu, ndị ọrụ ugbo, ndị nwe ụgbọ mmiri, na ndị ahịa
Onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme bụ Kristin Mann kwuru na a maghị kpọmkwem ụbọchị Taiwo Olowo kọwara ya dị ka onye ahịa na nnwere onwe ya n'ohu
E mere Taiwo baptizim na ngwụcha afọ 1870 na Holy Trinity Church na Ebute Ero, na-ewere aha Daniel Conrad Taiwo
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya gọọmentị Britain na Lagos, ọ bụkwa onye nnọchianya n'ụlọ ikpe nke Eze Porto Novo
Mgbe Oshodi Tapa, onye isi agha mbụ na onye isi azụmaahịa ugbu a, nwụrụ na 1868, Taiwo Olowo ghọrọ onye isi azụmahịa Kosoko
Mgbe Kosoko nwụrụ n'afọ 1878, Taiwo ghọrọ onye ndú nke ngalaba akụ na ụba Kosoko (ma e jiri ya tụnyere obere akụkụ Dosunmu nke Oloye Apena Ajasa duziri) nke ọ dịkarịa ala ndị na-eso ụzọ puku iri abụọ
Taiwo na onye ọzọ dị ike Baba Isale - Chief Ajasa - sere okwu n'ụzọ azụmahịa na n'egwuregwu ndị ọzọ dị mgbagwoju anya nke Lagos
Ajasa bụ onye ya na Oba Dosunmu jikọrọ aka na mbụ, mana ha abụọ dara mgbe Ajasa ghọrọ onye dị ike maka Dosunmu ijikwa
N'ime mgbalị iji gbochie ike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ajasa, Oba Dosunmu kwadoro Taiwo, na-enye aka na ọdịda ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Ajasa
Taiwo na ndị ọzọ bụbu ndị ohu nyere aka n'ụzọ mmesapụ aka n'ịmepụta ụlọ ụka pastọ mbụ na Lagos, Holy Trinity Church
Ọ bụkwa onye rutere uru site n'aka ya nye ndi CMS Grammar School , Lagos, na-enye akpa ego yuro iri ise na CMS Building Fund n'afọ 1867
Taiwo Olowo nwụrụ na Lagos n'abalị iri abụọ nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1901, mgbe ọ dị afọ otu narị na iri abụo
James Johnson (Bishọp abụọ nke Western Equatorial Africa) mere ememe olili ozu ya
Ọ bụ ezie na a na-ekwu na a mụrụ Olowo na 1781, ebe ọ bụ na enweghị akwụkwọ n'oge a mụrụ ya, ọ nweghị ụzọ isi chọpụta ụbọchị a mụrụ ya na afọ ya
Onye Brazil-Lagosian master bu Senhor Jorge DaCosta wuru Taiwo Olowo cenotaph n'elu ili ya n'afọ 1905
A na-ekwu na e mepụtara mpempe akwụkwọ ya site na ịgbaze ọtụtụ narị mkpụrụ ego ọla kọpa
Ụlọ ezinụlọ ya ka dị n'ofe okporo ámá site na ihe ncheta ahụ, ọ ka bụkwa nke ụmụ ya
Aha ya, Iga Taiwo Olowo, na-asụgharị n'ụzọ nkịtị ka ọ bụrụ 'Obí nke Taiwo nwoke bara ọgaranya'
Ụmụ ya ama ama gụnyere Kofoworola Abeni Pratt na Remi Vaughan-Richards
Taiwo Owatemi (amụrụ na 22 Julaị 1992) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Britain bụ onye omeiwu (MP) maka Coventry North West kemgbe 2019
Onye otu Labour Party, ọ bụ Minista Nchịkọta maka Ụmụ nwanyị na Ịha nhata site na Septemba 2021 ruo Septemba 2022
Owatemi tolitere na Plumstead, na njikọ chiri anya na ezinụlọ ya site na nwanne nne ya na ụmụ nwanne nne ya nọ na Coventry
Nna ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ isii
Ọ bụ nne ya, onye nọọsụ, zụlitere ya na ejima ya na nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye
Owatemi nwere nzere masta na Mahadum Kent ma ruo eruo dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ọgwụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ọgwụ na ngalaba ọrịa kansa na Dartford na Gravesham NHS Trust tupu ọ banye na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu
A họpụtara Owatemi maka ọrụ nkuzi nke ndị omeiwu site na Social Mobility Foundation ma nweta ahụmịhe na-arụ ọrụ n'ọfịs Westminster nke onye omeiwu Conservative Oliver Letwin
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ọrụ na Young Fabians ma bipụta akwụkwọ gbasara iwu ahụike
Ọ bụ gọvanọ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị dị n'ógbè ahụ site na 2016
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye ọrụ maka Coventry North West na ntuli aka 2019 mgbe onye omeiwu Labour nọ n'ọkwa, Geoffrey Robinson, kwupụtara ebumnuche ya ịkwụsị
Owatemi nwere oche maka Labour na ọnụ ọgụgụ ka ukwuu nke vootu 208
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị atọ a họpụtara site na Coventry na 2019, ndị ọzọ bụ Zarah Sultana na Colleen Fletcher
Na ntuli aka ndị isi Labour Party nke afọ 2020, Owatemi họpụtara Lisa Nandy
Owatemi jere ozi dị ka odeakwụkwọ onwe onye nke ndị omeiwu (PPS) nye odeakwụkwọ ụlọ onyinyo, Nick Thomas-Symonds, site na Eprel 2020 ruo Septemba 2021
A họpụtara ya dị ka Minista Nchịkọta maka Ụmụ nwanyị na Ịha nhata na Septemba 2021
Ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọkwa a na 7 Septemba 2022
Taiwo Rafiu (onye amụrụ na 18 June 1972 na Lagos Steetị bụ nwaanyị n'agba basketbọọlụ Nwaanyị n'agba basketbọọlụ
Ọ gara Mahadum Oklahoma City na mba Amerika ma sonye na otu egwuregwu bọl ụmụ nwaanyi Naijiria nọchitere na asọmpi olympik mere na afọ 2004
Taiye Selasi (onye nke amụrụ n' ụbọchị nke abụọ nke ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1979) bụ onye odee na onye na-ese foto, ma bụrụ kwa onye Britain-Amerika
Mgbọrọgwụ ya sitere na Naijiria na Ghana, ọ kọwara onwe ya dị ka onye 'obodo' Accra, Berlin, New York na Rome
A mụrụ Taiye Selasi na London, ma zụlite ya na Brookline, Massachusetts
Ọ bụ onye nke mbụ nke ụmụ ejima nke Dr
Lade Wosornu, onye nke sitere na agbụrụ Ghana na ọkachamara onye dọkịta bekee na-ịwa ahụ na Saudi Arabia ma bụrụ kwa onye dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ uri, na nne ya onye nke bụ Dr
Juliette Tuakli, onye Naijiria, na arụ ọrụ dịka onye dibia bekee na Ghana, bụrụkwa onye amara maka nkwado maka ikike ụmụaka, gụnyere ịbụ onye nwere ọnọdụ na bọọdụ United Way
Ndị mụrụ Selasi kewara mgbe ọ bụ nwa ọhụrụ
Ọ zutere nna mụrụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abuọ
Aha ya pụtara ejima mbụ n'asụsụ Yoruba nke bụ asụsụ nne ya
Ọ gbanwewo aha nna ya ugboro ugboro
Mgbe amuru ya, aha nna nne ya ka ọ zara
Ọ zakwara aha onye nke lụrụ nne ya (Williams)
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abuọ, ọ gbanwere zaa aha nna ya (Wosornu)
Mgbe emesia, o kpebiri ịzaa aha nna ya bụ Tuakli-Wosornu
N'ikpeazụ ọ mesịrị gbanwee aha nna ya ka ọ bụrụ Selasi, okwu sitere n’asụsụ Ewe, nke ọ sụgharịrị dị ka “ekpere zara aza” ma ọ bụ “Chineke anụwo”
Selasi gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere nnukwu nsọpụrụ na BA maka ọmụmụ ihe gbasara America na mahadum nke Yale
Ọnwetakwara MPhil ya na mmekọrịta mba ụwa na Nuffield College, nke mahadum Oxford
Ejima ya, Yetsa Kehinde Tuakli, bụ onye physiatrist na mba US
Ọ bụ onye Afrịka mbụ so na International Paralympic Committee, ọ na-asọmpi n'ịwụli elu maka ndị otu mba Ghana
Na 2005 The LIP Magazine bipụtara 'Bye-Bye, Babar (Ma ọ bụ Gịnị bụ Afropolitan?),' Selasi's seminal text on Afropolitans

Na 'Bye Bye Babar', Selasi na-akọwa mba Afrịka ọhụrụ; ngwakọta sara mbara nke na-anabata ọdịiche ya 'Ma eleghị anya, ihe kachasị gosipụta nghọta Afropolitan bụ ịjụ ime ka ọ dị mfe; mgbalị ịghọta ihe na-arịa ọrịa na Afrịka tinyere ọchịchọ ịsọpụrụ ihe magburu onwe ya, pụrụ iche
' Selasi anaghị achọ ka a mara ya dị ka onye malitere Afropolitanism, 'Ọ na-ekwu na ọ ghara ikwu na ọ bụ ya chepụtara ya, ọ na-eleda ọrụ nke ya anya na ihe niile sochiri ya
' Mkparịta ụka nke Afropolitanism mụbara maka edemede ahụ, nke a mekwara ka ndị ọkà mmụta dị ka Simon Gikandi na Achille Mbembe 'meezi' okwu ahụ, Afropolitan, n'ime echiche a maara nke ọma
N'otu afọ ahụ o dere edemede ahụ, o dere egwuregwu nke Avery Willis, nwa nwanne Toni Morrison mepụtara na obere ụlọ ihe nkiri
N'afọ 2006, Morrison nyere Selasi otu afọ maka ide edemede; o dere 'The Sex Lives of African Girls' iji mezue ya
N'afọ 2010 Ann Godoff nke ụlọ ọrụ Penguin Press zụrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ Selasi nke ọka na ede ede
E bipụtara akwụkwọ Ghana Must Go n'afọ 2013
Diana Evans nke The Guardian, Margaret Busby nke The Independent, site na The Economist, na The Wall Street Journal toro akwụkwọ ahụ nke ọma
A họpụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime akwụkwọ iri kacha mma nke afọ 2013 site na aka ndị Wall Street Journal na ndị The Economist
N' afọ 2014, a chọpụtara ya na-ere akwụkwọ ahụ na mba iri abụọ na abụọ
N'afọ 2013, a họpụtara Selasi dị ka otu n'ime ndị edemede iri abụọ na Britain ndị kacha mma nke
N'afọ 2014 akpọrọ ya aha na ndepụta Africa39 Hay Festival maka ndị edemede Africa iri atọ na itoolu na-erubeghị afọ iri anọ 'nke nwere ikike na nkà ịkọwa ihe na-eme ndepụta 'akwụkwọ maka Afrịka
Selasi na ndị omenkà ibe ya na-arụkọ ọrụ ugboro ugboro
N'afọ 2012, ya na onye na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ David Adjaye jikọrọ aka mepụta Gwangju River Reading Room, ọbá akwụkwọ nke ahụ ghe oghe na afọ 2013 dị ka akụkụ nke Gwangju Biennale's Folly II
Ya na onye nduzi Teddy Goitom, onye guzobere Stocktown, rụkọrọ ọrụ dị ka onye isi mmepụta nke Afripedia, nke bụ usoro ihe omume banyere ndị na-emepụta ihe n'obodo ukwu dị iche iche na Africa

Ya na ndị na-emepụta ihe Fernando Meirelles na Hank Levine (Obodo Chineke), na arụ ọrụ make iwepụta Ọpụpụ, ihe ngosi gbasara ka ndị mmadu si akwaga site na obodo ha ma gaa mba ụwa ndị ọzọ dị iche iche
N'afọ 2013 Selasi bụ onye ọka ikpe na ihe ngosi TV nke Ịtali nke akpọrọ Masterpiece na Rai 3
Andrea De Carlo so kwa ya na ọrụ ahụ
N'afọ 2015, Selasi pụtara dị ka onye edemede, na-edu nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe ederede, na nzukọ ndị edemede nke obodo Iceland nke ha n'eme kwa afọ na Reykjavik, Iceland
Ọ bụkwa onye nyere aka na nchịkọ akụkọ nke akpọrọ New Daughters of Africa (nke Margaret Busby dezigharịrị, 2019)
Taj Mahal bụ ulo ukwu onye eze India ana-kpo Emperor Shah Jahan, rụrụ ta o lie nwunye ya mgbe ha wuru
A tajine ma ọ bụ tagine bụ nri ndị dị n'Ebe Ugwu Afrịka, nke akpọrọ aha ite e ji esi ya
A na-akpọkwa ya jikwa ma ọ bụ marqa
Arabic ط zaman (ṭažin) sitere na Berber ṭajin ' ite ụrọ na-adịghị omimi', site na Greek ochie τάγηνον (tágēnon) 'ọkụ-ite, saucepan'
Na Mgbidi Antonine nke gọvanọ Numidian nke Rom Britain, Quintus Lollius Urbicus, wuru, a chọpụtala ụdị ite dị iche iche, otu bụ efere casserole nke nwere ike ịbụ onye bu ụzọ na Tajine nke oge a
A chọpụtakwala iberibe tajines n'etiti ite Numidian na Algeria nke oge a
Ihe ndekọ mbụ e dere banyere echiche nke isi nri na tajine pụtara na otu puku abalị na otu abalị a ma ama, nchịkọta akụkọ asụsụ Arabic site na narị afọ nke 9
Taa, a na-akwadebe ite nri na broth ọdịnala ya na Middle East na North Africa
E nwere ụzọ dị iche iche isi kwadebe tajine
N'ụdị qidra mbụ, a na-eji saman (mmanụ a na-egbuke egbuke) eme ihe iji mee ka elu ya dị ọcha ma tinye yabasị a pịrị apị maka ụtọ na ísì
Maka ụdị nri muqawlli, a na-etinye ihe ndị ahụ na mmanụ oliv iji mee ka ụtọ ya dịkwuo mma
E nwere ọtụtụ nkọwa banyere otu esi akwadebe tajine site n'aka ndị ọkà mmụta Arab
Nkọwa a ma ama bụ nke sitere n'aka ibn al-Adim (1192[[1262)

Ọkpụkpụ ọdịnala tajine, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-ese ma ọ bụ na-egbuke egbuke, nwere akụkụ abụọ otu okirikiri nke dị larịị na akụkụ dị ala na nnukwu mkpuchi dị ka cone ma ọ bụ dome nke na-anọdụ n'ala mgbe a na-esi nri
A na-emepụta mkpuchi ahụ iji weghachite condensation niile na ala
Enwere ike imeziwanye usoro ahụ site na itinye mmiri oyi n'ime olulu mmiri a haziri n'ụzọ pụrụ iche n'elu mkpuchi ahụ
A na-esi Tajine n'elu icheku ọkụ na-ahapụ ohere zuru oke n'etiti icheku ọkụ ma ọ bụ ite tajine iji zere ka okpomọkụ rịa elu ngwa ngwa
A na-eji nnukwu brik nke icheku ọkụ eme ihe, ọkachasị maka ikike ha nwere ịnọ na-ekpo ọkụ ruo ọtụtụ awa
Ụzọ ndị ọzọ bụ iji tajine mee ihe n'ọkụ na-adịghị ngwa ngwa ma ọ bụ na gas ma ọ bụ n'elu igwe eji esi nri eletrik, na okpomọkụ kachasị ala dị mkpa iji mee ka stew na-esi n'ụzọ dị nro
A na-eji igwe-mmenyu arịa dị gburugburu nke a na-etinye n'etiti tajine na ire ọkụ, iji kesaa okpomọkụ nke stove
Ndị na-emepụta ihe na Europe emepụtala tajines nwere ala ígwè dị arọ nke enwere ike ime ka ọ dị ọkụ na stovu nri ruo n'okpomọkụ dị elu, nke na-enye ohere ịcha anụ na akwụkwọ nri tupu esi nri
Enwere ike imegharị nri Tajine site na iji ihe na-esi nri ma ọ bụ ihe yiri ya, mana nsonaazụ ya ga-adịtụ iche
[Ọnodu choro] Ọtụtụ tajines ceramic bụ ịchọ mma yana arịa nri na-arụ ọrụ
Otú ọ dị, a na-ezube ụfọdụ tajines naanị iji mee ihe dị ka efere na-achọ mma
Nri tajine nke Algeria na Morocco bụ nri na-atọ ụtọ nke a na-esi ngwa ngwa, nke a na'ejikarị anụ, ọkụkọ ma ọ bụ azụ na akwụkwọ nri ma ọ bụ mkpụrụ osisi eme
A na-ejikwa ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ, mkpụrụ osisi, na mkpụrụ osisi a mịrị amị
Ihe ndị a na-ahụkarị na-esi ísì ụtọ gụnyere ginger, cumin, turmeric, cinnamon, na saffron
A na-eji paprika na chili eme ihe na tajines akwụkwọ nri
Njikọ na-atọ ụtọ na nke na-esi ísì ụtọ bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị na nri tajine dị ka nwa atụrụ na prunes na ihe na-esi ụtọ
A na-ejikarị achịcha enye Tajines
N'ihi na mkpuchi ma ọ bụ mkpuchi dị ka cone nke ite tajine na-ejide anwụrụ ọkụ ma weghachite mmiri ahụ na ite ahụ, a chọrọ obere mmiri iji sie anụ na akwụkwọ nri
Usoro isi nri a dị mkpa n'ebe mmiri dị obere ma ọ bụ ebe mmiri ọha na eze na-enwetabeghị
Ihe ndị Tunisia na-akpọ 'tajine' dị nnọọ iche na ụdị nri ndị ọzọ
tajine Tunisian dị ka frittata Italian ma ọ bụ eggah

Nke mbụ, a na-akwadebe ragout dị mfe, nke anụ a bepụrụ n'ime obere iberibe, jiri yabasị na ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ sie, dị ka ngwakọta nke rosebuds kpọrọ nkụ na sinamọn a gwakọtara agwakọta nke a maara dị ka baharat ma ọ bụ ngwakọta siri ike nke coriander na mkpụrụ caraway; a na-akpọ nke a tabil
Mgbe ahụ, a na-agbakwunye ihe na-atọ ụtọ iji mee ka mmiri ahụ sie ike
Ihe ndị a na-ahụkarị na-agụnye àgwà cannellini, chickpeas, breadcrumbs ma ọ bụ poteto
Mgbe anụ ahụ dị nro, a na-ejikọta ya na ihe ndị a họọrọ ka ha bụrụ ihe na-atọ ụtọ
Ihe atụ gụnyere parsley ọhụrụ, mint a mịrị amị, saffron, tomato a mịrị n'anyanwụ, akwụkwọ nri e siri esi na ụbụrụ nwa ehi a siri esi
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a na-etinye cheese na àkwá n'ime nri ahụ
N'ikpeazụ, a na-eme àkwá na stew a n'ime efere dị omimi, ma ọ bụ na stove ma ọ bụ n'ime oven ruo mgbe a na-esi n'elu na n'ala ma na-etinye àkwá ahụ
Mgbe tajine dị njikere, a na-atụgharị ya n'elu efere ma belata ya n'ime square, ya na wedges nke lemon
A pụkwara iji nri mmiri mee tajines Tunisian ma ọ bụ dị ka nri akwụkwọ nri kpamkpam
[Ọnọdụ choro]
JN'ime ime obodo nke Tunisia, ndị na-esi nri n'ụlọ na-etinye efere ụrọ na-adịghị omimi n'elu coal osisi oliv, jupụta ya, kpuchie ya na pan ụrọ dị larịị, wee kpokọta coal ọkụ n'elu
tajine a na-emepụta na-adị nro n'elu na n'ala, na-ede mmiri n'ime ma na-etinye ya na ísì anwụrụ ọkụ
