Ndị Juu Maghrebi na-eri ma na-akwadebe tagine, n'ihi ọnụnọ ha n'akụkọ ihe mere eme na North Africa

Tagine bụ nri dị ezigbo mkpa na nri Sephardi, ndị Juu Moroccan, ndị Juu Algeria, ndị Juu Tunisian, ndị Juu Libya, ndị Juu Djerban, yana ndị Juu French, ndị Juu America, na ndị Israel na-eri ma na-akwadebe ya, n'ihi ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke ndị Sephardim na mba ndị ahụ
Tagine bụ isi nri Sephardic nke a na-akwadebe maka nri abalị Shabbat na obodo Sephardi, ma na-enye ya na couscous

Ndị Sephardim si n'ógbè dị iche iche na-akwadebe ụdị Tagine dị iche iche, dịka ọmụmaatụ, ndị Juu Moroccan na-ejikarị mkpụrụ osisi kpọrọ nkụ akwadebe tagine, ebe ndị Juu Tunisian na-akwukarị akwụkwọ nri tagine nwere poteto, karọt, na zucchini a na-egbutu n'ime nnukwu dice
A na-akwadebe Tagine maka ezumike ndị Juu dịka Rosh Hashanah na Yom Kippur break fast
Ihe oyiyi Tajine na Safi, Morocco
Onye na-akpụ ite Tajine
Isi nri Tajine
Tagine eletrik
Tajine a na-eji n'èzí
Isi nri n'èzí site na iji tajine
Tajine na nwa atụrụ, prunes na almonds
mkpịsị aka ukwu nke Algeria tajine na ọkụkọ, anụ na oliv
Lham hlou (Arabic لحم لحلو)
nke a makwaara dịka lham lahlou na tajine lahlou

nke pụtara 'anụ na-atọ ụtọ' maọbụ 'tajne na-atọ ọchị', bụ nri ndi obodo Algeria na-atọ ezigbo ụtọ nke e ji anụ mee na ọkachasị prunes, ikekwe na apricots ma jiri mkpụrụ vaịn na almọnd chọọ ya mma na mmiri shuga na oroma
A na-ebu ụzọ jiri yabasị na smen (mmanụ eji odinaala echekwa na North Afrika) mee anụ na akwụkwọ nri
A na-enye nri a dịka ihe mbido maọbụ dịka ihe oriri n'oge Ramadan na n'oge ememe agbamakwụkwọ
Ụfọdụ ntụziaka, dịka La cuisine Algerienne's (1970), na-akpọ maka ịwụsa prunes na almond e siri esi
na ịsa prunes tupu ịtinye ha na ofe na-atọ ụtọ
Enwere ike ijikọta mkpụrụ osisi prune a na-esikwazi ísì ụtọ ya na almond (otu almond maka mkpụrụ osisi ọ bụla)

Tajine Mtewem, nke a na-emekarị ka ọ bụrụ Mtewem (Arabic) bụ nri ọdịnaala nke ndi Obodo Algeria, ya na kpọmkwem Algerine (site n'obodo Algiers), a na-eji anụ ọkụkọ maọbụ anụ nwa atụrụ, galik, chickpeas ya na almonds eme nri ahụ
A na-eji yabasị na galik buru ibu, dịka aha ya na-egosi na okwu mtewem pụtara 'na galik', a na-esikarị ya n'ime ite Tajine
Dịka ọtụtụ nri nke ndi Obodo Algeria, enwere ike iji ya na ofe ọcha, maọbụ ofe na-acha ọbara ọbara
Tajine Zitoun ma ọ bụ Tajine El Zitoune (Arabic) ma ọ bụ Tagine Zitoune ma ọ bụ Olive Tajine bụ stew ọdịnala Algeria sitere n'obodo Algiers
A na-akpọ ya aha site na ite ite ite nke a na-esi ya, ite tajine

Tajine Zitoun na-agụnyekarị nwa atụrụ ma ọ bụ ọkụkọ na oliv, mgbe mgbe na ngwakọta ụfọdụ nke yabasị, karọt, mushrooms ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ nri ndị ọzọ, a na-ejikarị thyme, akwụkwọ bay, mmiri lemon, na saffron ma ọ bụ turmeric eme ya
Na Constantine, no na Algeria, nri na-atọ ụtọ nwere ike ịbụ anụ ọkụkọ ma ọ bụ ire ehi nke e ji naanị oliv na mushroom sie, ma ọ bụ anụ a gbajiri agbaji, wee jiri ero na olive sie ya na ofe
Nkwadobe ụfọdụ na-akpọ ka a na-eme ka mkpụrụ oliv na mmiri na-esi ísì ụtọ, wee kpochapụ ya, tupu etinye ha na ntụziaka, iji wepụ ụfọdụ nnu
Nri ahụ nwere ọdịiche dabere na mpaghara Algeria, mana ha niile gụnyere oliv
Dị ka ọtụtụ nri Algeria, ụfọdụ ọdịiche gụnyere ofe ọcha ma ọ bụ ọbara ọbara, ụfọdụ na-akọwa ọkụkọ ma ọ bụ nwa atụrụ ma ọ bụ anụ e gburu egbu
Ụfọdụ gụnyere akwụkwọ nri ndị ọzọ

Na mpaghara Oran nke ọdịda anyanwụ Algeria, nke a maara maka ubi oliv na ugbo mushroom, a na-agụnye mushroom n'ozuzu ya 123 Xia 124 Saffron na-ahọrọ, mana a na-ejikarị turmeric dochie anya maka akụ na ụba

Tajudeen Abdul-Raheem (ụbọchị isii n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 1961 - 25 Mee 2009) bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Pan-African Movement, onye nduzi nke Justice Africa, osote onye isi nke United Nations Millennium Campaign for Africa, yana onye edemede maka akwụkwọ akụkọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ n'ofe Africa

A mụrụ ya na Funtua, Nigeria na Jenụwarị, ma nwụọ n'ihe mberede okporo ụzọ n'ubochí irí abụọ na isé n'ọnwa Mee 2009 na Nairobi, Kenya, mgbe ọ na-aga n'ọdụ ụgbọ elu iji nweta ụgbọ elu na Rwanda ebe ọ ga-ezute onye isi ala Rwanda
Enwetara nzere bachelọ na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mahadum Bayero, onye ọkà mmụta Rhodes na Oxford na PhD na Mahadum Buffalo
Hacène Zermani (amụrụ n'afọ 1958 na Algiers, Algeria), nke a maara site na aha egwu ya Takfarinas, bụ onye egwu Kabyle Yal nke Algeria
Takfarinas were aha nna ya site n'aka onye agha oge ochie nke North Africa Tacfarinas onye lụrụ ọgụ megide ọnụnọ nke ndị Rom na Algeria
Kemgbe afọ 1979, Takfarinas ebiela na France
Otú ọ dị, abụ ya na-akwalite ma na-eme emume omenala Kabyle nke a mụrụ ya
A maara Takfarinas nke ọma maka olu ya nke na-eru ebe dịgasị iche iche na 'takfa' nke dabeere na ụbọ akwara ọdịnala nke ọ gbanwere site na itinye olu nke abụọ
Olu ọ bụla na-enye ụda dị iche, otu olu bụ nke nwanyị na nke ọzọ bụ nke nwoke
N'oge ndị a, a na-eji ọkara drum eletrik dochie takfa
Dị ka takfa nke a nwere mkpịsị aka abụọ
Uru nke ngwá ọrụ ọhụrụ a bụ na ọ nwere ike ịmepụta nnukwu ụda egwu nke ọ chọrọ ugbu a

Takfarinas ma ọ bụ Tak dị ka ndị na-akwado ya na-akpọkarị ya na-esite n'ọtụtụ usoro ndị na-agụ egwú ma gosipụta nkà ọhụrụ ya n'ọdịnihu na ngwá egwú mgbe ọ dị naanị afọ isii o mere ụbọ akwara site na iji cylinder mmanụ na eriri brek
Dị ka onye na-eto eto, Takfarinas nwere mmasị na egwu nke ndị na-ese ihe dịka Chaâbi, M'Hamed El Anka, Cheikh El Hasnaoui na Slimane Azem
N'afọ 1976, o dekọrọ egwu mbụ ya na cassettes na Algiers, mana ọnọdụ ya dị ka onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-eti egwu siri ike mgbe o dekọrọ abọm mbụ ya na France n'afọ 1979
N'afọ 1981, ya na Boujema Semaouni guzobere otu Agraw nke dịgidere ruo ọtụtụ afọ
O wepụtara Wa i telha na Arrach ma na 1986, nkr rere otu nde
N'afọ 1989, ọ wepụtara Irgazen na Mi d ih, CD abụọ, nke a mere ka ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama n'ụwa niile
N'afọ 1994, o wepụtara abọm ọzọ Yebbā rremman nke mere nke ọma na chaatị Europe
Mana ọ bụ na abọm ya Zaâma Zaâma na otu egwu sitere na abọm ahụ ka o nwetara nnukwu mmata ya
Ọ na-anọgide na-abụ egwu kachasị amasị ụwa na klọb na ebe ezumike ndị njem nleta ebe egwu egwu na-ewu ewu na-eso agba egwu
Takfarinas gbanwere ntụziaka egwu ya na abọm ya Paix et salut nke bụ iji kwanyere ndị Algeria na-agu egwu bụ ndị mmegide ahụ metụtara
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2004, o wepụtara abọm ọhụrụ ya bụ Honneur aux dames
N'afọ 1999, Takfarinas meriri KORA All African Music Award na ngalaba Best North African Artist
Takyiwaa Manuh (amụrụ na Mee 1952) bụ onye nkuzi na onye edemede nke Ghana

Ọ bụ Prọfesọ Emerita nke Mahadum Ghana, ma ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká na Mee 2017, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nke ngalaba Social Development Policy Division, nke United Nations Economic Commission for Africa (ECA), nke dị na Addis Ababa, Ethiopia
Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi nke Institute of African Studies, Mahadum Ghana site na 2002 ruo 2009
Ọ bụ onye otu Ghana Academy of Arts and Sciences

A mụrụ Manuh na May 1952 na Kumasi nke dị na mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana nye James Kwesi Manuh, bụ́ onye na-arụ ọrụ nri, na Madam Akosua Akyaa, onye na-ere ahịa mgbe ahụ na Ankaase, obodo dị nso na Kumasi
Ọzụzụ nwata ya malitere n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Methodist Ankaase mgbe ya na nne nne ya bi
Mgbe ọ nọ na klas nke mbụ, a kpọgara ya n'Adum Presby School, bụ ebe ọ malitekwara klas ọzọ
Ọ malitere klas nke mbụ nke ugboro atọ mgbe e mesịrị ziga ya na Penworth Kindergarten

Manuh gara n'ihu gụọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Kwame Nkrumah nke Sayensị na Nkà na ụzụ (KNUST) dị na Kumasi, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ banyere Wesley Girls' High School, Cape Coast, maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ gara n'ihu n'agụmakwụkwọ ya na mahadum Ghana, ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke iwu (LLB) na 1974
N'afọ 1978, e nyere ya nzere masters na iwu na mahadum Dar es Salaam
O mechara gawa nzere doctorate na Anthropology na Mahadum Indiana Bloomington, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2000
Talaat Moustafa Group Holding SAE (TMGH), bụ otu n'ime nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ mmepe ala na Egypt
E guzobere ya na 2007 dị ka ụlọ ọrụ na-ejide ụlọ ọrụ ndị dịbu adị, ụfọdụ n'ime ha bụ ndị Talaat Moustafa nwụrụ anwụ guzobere na 1970s, ma depụta ya n'ihu ọha na Egyptian Exchange na 2007

A maara otu a maka mmepe nke nnukwu obodo gated, yana ọtụtụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, ebe ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-emepụta ụlọ iri kacha elu edepụtara na Egypt n'ihe gbasara uru, yana ala, na-ejide ihe karịrị 16,000 acres na Greater
Cairo, kacha nke onye nrụpụta ọ bụla

Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Disemba 2021, onye kacha nwee òkè na Talaat Moustafa Group na 43% bụ TMG maka Real Estate na Touristic Investments SAE, ụlọ ọrụ nke ezinụlọ Talaat Moustfa (Tarek, Hani na Hisham Talaat Mo Gustafa, 60%) na ezinụlọ Saudi Bin Laden (40%)
Site na stakes site na ụlọ ọrụ ọzọ (Alexandria Construction Company SAE) ụmụnna Tarek, Hisham na Hany nwere 34% nke ngwaahịa TMGH
Hisham Talaat Moustafa bụ onye isi otu kemgbe 2017 ruo ugbu a, ma nweebu ọnọdụ ahụ ruo 2008
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka onye otu Shura Council (Upper House)
Nwanna Tarek Talaat Moustafa bụ onye isi otu kemgbe 2008 na onye bụbu onye omeiwu
Onye nke abụọ kacha nwe oke bụ ezinụlọ Saudi Bin Laden, nke a ma ama maka nnukwu ihe owuwu ụlọ ha na obodo ha site na Saudi Binladen Group
N'Ijipt, ụmụnna Yehia na Omar Bin Laden nwere ego ntinye ego dị iche iche, na-enwe 17% nke TMGH site na 40% ha na TMG maka Real Estate na Touristic Investments SAE
Onye nwe oke nke atọ bụ ezinụlọ Saudi ọzọ, nke Abdelmoniem Alrashed, nwere 7% nke otu ahụ site na ụlọ ọrụ UAE, Rimco EGT Investment LLC
Ndị nwe ụlọ ndị fọdụrụnụ bụ ego itinye ego, nke Norges Bank duziri bụ ndị nwere 33% nke òkè TMGH na 2021
TMG na-akwado ụfọdụ mmepe obodo Egypt kachasị ukwuu, gụnyere obodo New Cairo nke Madinaty, El Rehab, Celia, na nke ewepụtara nso nso a, Noor
Mmepe ndị ọzọ gụnyere May Fair na El Sherouq City, El Rabwa na Sheikh Zayed City, Virginia Beach na North Coast nke Alexandria, na El Radwa El Khadraa na El Agamy
Na mkpokọta, TMG na-etu ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ karịrị nde mmadụ 1 n'ofe ọrụ ya, na-enye ya ọkwa kachasị elu n'ụwa maka onye nrụpụta onwe
Mgbalị ile ọbịa nke TMG gụnyere Four Seasons Nile Plaza, Four Seasons Sharm El Sheikh, Four Seasans San Stefano, na Kempinski Nile Hotel
A na-ahụta Four Seasons Nile Plaza dị ka ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ kachasị mma na nke kachasị nchebe na Cairo, na-enye nchebe ọkwa onye isi ala na ebe obibi nye ndị isi obodo na ndị isi gọọmentị na-eleta
N'ịgbaso ọkwa na 2017 maka mmụba nke Four Seasons Sharm El Sheikh, mgbe emechara, họtel ahụ ga-abụ nnukwu Four Seasons Resort n'ụwa
N'afọ 2016, TMG kwupụtara atụmatụ iwu ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Four Seasons na New Cairo onwunwe Madinaty, akụkụ nke mmepe na mgbasa 8,000 acres (3,200 ha) na New Cairo
E mere atụmatụ iji wuo ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Four Seasons na Luxor na 2008 mana etinyere ya n'ihi mgbanwe mgbanwe nke Egypt
N'afọ 2020, TMG kwupụtara atụmatụ ịga n'ihu na ọrụ a na Luxor, na-enye ego nke ijeri LE 15 iji wuchaa oge anọ nwere ọnụ ụlọ 200 n'ime obodo akụkọ ihe mere eme
Talaat Zakaria (Arabic; a mụrụ 18 Disemba 1960, nwụọ 8 Ọktoba 2019) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe ọchị
N'afọ 1984, Zakaria gụsịrị akwụkwọ na The Higher Institute of Dramatic Art of Egypt wee malite ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya site n'ịrụ obere ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, egwuregwu, na ihe ngosi telivishọn
N'afọ 2005, Zakaria nwetara nnukwu ohere ya mgbe ọ rụrụ ọrụ mbụ ya na ihe nkiri Haha w Tofaha na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Egypt a ma ama Yasmin Abdulaziz
Zakaria nwụrụ n'ụbọchị asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2019 site na ọzịza ụbụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ 58

Talatu Yohanna (amụrụ na Nọvemba 11, n'afọ 1973) bụ onye nchịkwa na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye otu Ụlọ ndị Nnọchiteanya Naijiria ebe ọ na- anọchite anya Demss/Numan/Lamurde nke Mpaghara Etiti Adamawa State

Yohanna malitere ịrụ ọrụ dịka onye nchịkwa nke azụmahịa ọha, ma mesịa banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye isi ụmụ nwanyị, onye ndú na nlekọta, onye enyemaka pụrụ iche na onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche nke Gọvanọ Adamawa State
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dịka Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka azụmaahịa na nkwado na steeti Adamawa
Ugbu a, ọ bụ onye otu Ụlọ Nnọchiteanya ebe ọ na-anọchite anya Demsa/Numan/Lamurde nke Mpaghara Etiti Adamawa Steeti n'okpuru Nzuko Ọganihu ndị Niile
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi na ụlọ kọmitii nke Nzukọ Omeiwu Ụmụ nwanyị
Onye kwesiri nsọpụrụ nke Yohanna lụrụ dị ma nweekwa ụmụ
Ọ bụ nwa afọ obodo Ngodogoron dị na Lamurde nke Gọọmenti Ime obodo Adamawa steeti
Talhouni bụ aha nna achọtara na Jọdan
Ndị ama ama nwere aha nna gụnyere
Talib Zanna (amụrụ ya n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1990) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke ikpeazụ ọ gbara bọọlụ maka Oklahoma City Blue nke NBA G League
Zanna gbara bọọlụ basketball n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Bishop McNamara High School ma soro bọọlụ ụmụ nwoke nke Pittsburgh Panthers sọọ mpi

A họpụtara ya n'etiti ndị isi ụlọ akwụkwọ Panthers na pasentị goolu ma nweta nsọpụrụ dị iche iche dị ka All-ACC Honorable Mention, ACC All-Tournament first team, na NIT Season Tip-Off All-Tourament team
Zanna na-egwuri egwu n'etiti
A mụrụ Zanna na Kaduna, Nigeria nye Zanna Awami na Maimuna Zanna
O nwere ụmụnne atọ na ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ tolitere
Ọ malitere ịkụ basketball mgbe ọ dị afọ 10 n'ihi mmụba na agbamume sitere n'aka nwanne ya nwoke
Zanna gbara ugwu iji meziwanye ọsọ ya, ahụike ya na ọwụli elu ya
Ndị nkuzi America mechara chọta ya n'ogige nke onye bụbu onye egwuregwu Georgetown, Godwin Owinje, na Lagos
N'afọ 2006, ọ kwagara na United States wee soro ezinụlọ na-anabata ya biri
Mgbe o rutere, o kwuru na izu ole na ole mbụ bụ ọdachi, ebe ọ na-agbasi mbọ ike ikwurịta okwu, aghọtaghị ọdịbendị, ọ masịghịkwa ụtọ nri ahụ
Zanna kpọrọ nna ya na ọchịchọ ịlaghachi Naịjirịa

Nwanne Zanna, bụ dọkịta Naijiria, kpọtụụrụ Bishọp McNamara onye isi nkuzi basketball Marty Keithline ma rịọ ka e nye Zanna ohere ka ọ nweta agụmakwụkwọ America na ka ọ nwee ohere ịgba bọọlụ basketball
O mechara gaa South Africa maka 'Basketball Without Borders,' ya na ọtụtụ ndị egwuregwu ndị ọzọ, gụnyere Serge Ibaka, Dikembe Mutombo, Dirk Nowitzki na Luol Deng
Zanna kwuru na ịhụ onye egwuregwu NBA n'onwe ya bụ nnukwu ahụmịhe
O kwukwara na ọ mere ka ọ chọọ ịnọ n'ọnọdụ ha
N’oge na-adịghị anya ka ọ bịarutere United States, Zanna gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Bishop McNamara na Forestville, Maryland
Dị ka onye sophomore na 2006–07, ọ gbajiri ụkwụ gbajiri agbaji furu efu egwuregwu iri na asaa mana ọ ka na-enweta isi 10 na nkwụghachi 11 n'otu egwuregwu

Ọ gụchara oge sophomore ya site na biputere isi iri na asaa na nkwụghachi 15 megide Paul VI Catholic High School na WCAC Tournament quarter-finalsDị ka onye na-eto eto na 2007 na 2010, ọ na-enweta akara 150, 135 rebounds, 34 blocks, 15 assists na 14 steals kwa egwuregwu ka ọ na-enwetakwu All-Washington Catholic Athletic Conference
E mekwara ya ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị kachasị mma maka nsọpụrụ All-MET
Na 19 Nọvemba 2008, Zanna bịnyere aka na Akwụkwọ ozi ebumnuche iji gbaa bọọlụ kọleji maka Mahadum Pittsburgh
Boston College, Connecticut, Oklahoma, Providence, South Florida, Saint Joseph's, Villanova, na West Virginia kpọkwara ya n'ọrụ
Dị ka onye okenye n'afọ 2008 na 1909, Zanna nwetara akara 146 na 118 rebounds n'egwuregwu ọ bụla ka Washington Post kpọrọ ya All-MET nke mbụ kachasị ma nweta nkwanye ùgwù niile nke ụlọ akwụkwọ onwe
Dị ka onye ọhụrụ na Pittsburgh na 2009-10, Zanna jisiri naanị nkeji atọ nke ọrụ n'egwuregwu mbụ tupu mmerụ ahụ n'ubu amanye ya ịhapụ oge niile ka ọ na-etinye akwụkwọ maka ịhapụ nsogbu ahụike
Dị ka onye ọhụrụ na-acha ọbara ọbara na 2010-11, Zanna pụtara na egwuregwu Iri abụọ na asaa na ọrụ mmalite Iri na ato
N'agbanyeghị na ọ hapụrụ egwuregwu asaa ikpeazụ nke oge ahụ n'ihi mkpịsị aka aka nri gbajiri agbaji, Zanna ka na-enweta ihe nrite kachasị mma na njedebe nke oriri ndị otu oge
N'oge ahụ, ọ na-enweta akara 37 na 34 rebounds kwa egwuregwu
Dị ka nwa akwụkwọ nke abụọ n'afọ 2011 ruo afọ 2012, Zanna pụtara na egwuregwu Iri atọ na itoolu niile na ọrụ mmalite nke Iri na anọ
O debanyere aha atọ okpukpu abụọ, egwuregwu itoolu na-agba bọọlụ abụọ na egwuregwu anọ na-agba ọsọ okpukpu abụọ
Na ngwụcha oriri oriri na ọṅụṅụ nke oge, ọ nwetara ihe nrite Best Defensive Player
N'oge ahụ, ọ na-enweta nkezi 63 na 55 rebounds kwa egwuregwu
Dị ka onye na-eto eto n'afọ 2012 na 1913, Zanna malitere egwuregwu nke Iri atọ na atọ niile na ike forward ka nkeji ya n'egwuregwu ọ bụla ruru 239
O mere egwuregwu iri abụọ atọ, egwuregwu iri na anọ na-agba bọọlụ abụọ na egwuregwu anọ na-agbanye bọọlụ okpukpu abụọ, na ngwụcha oriri oriri nke oge, ọ nwetara onyinye ndị nkuzi
N'oge ahụ, ọ na-enweta akara 96 na 61 rebounds kwa egwuregwu ọbula
Dị ka onye okenye na 2013-14, Zanna nwetara All-ACC honours honours mgbe ọ nwetasịrị akara 130 kacha mma na 86 rebounds na egwuregwu 35 (mgbe niile ọ bịdọrọ)
Mgbe emechara ya na usoro 2014 NBA, Zanna sonyeere Oklahoma City Thunder maka 2014 NBA Summer League
Na 29 Septemba 2014, ọ bịanyere aka na Thunder ka ọ sonyere onye otu egwuregwu Pitt mbụ, Steven Adams, maka ogige ọzụzụ otu ahụ
Zanna pụtara na asọmpi asaa niile nke Oklahoma City, na-enweta akara 44 na 50 rebounds na nkeji 174 kwa egwuregwu tupu ndị otu ahụ ahapụ ya na October 24, 2014
O kwuru banyere oge ya na Thunder, na-ekwu, 'nhazi a dị ka ezinụlọ
Onye ọ bụla nọ ebe ahụ maka ibe ya

' Na 4 Nọvemba 2014, Oklahoma City Blue nwetara ya dị ka onye egwuregwu mmekọ
O gbara na egwuregwu nke mbụ ya na Nọvemba 14 megide Maine Red Claws, na-enye aka na 17 na 15 rebounds
Zanna dekọrọ okpukpu abụọ asatọ na egwuregwu 13 mbụ ya, gụnyere anọ na-aga n'ihu iji malite oge ahụ
Na 12 Febụwarị 2015, a kpọrọ aha ya na Futures All-Star team maka afọ 2015 NBA D-League All-Star Game dị ka onye nọchiri JaMychal Green
Na July 2015, Zanna sonyeere Oklahoma City Thunder maka Orlando Summer League na Cleveland Cavaliers maka Njikọ Summer Las Vegas
Na 25 Septemba 2015, ọ bịanyere aka na Thunder, na-alaghachi n'ogige ọzụzụ nke otu maka afọ nke abụọ n'usoro
Otú ọ dị, na 22 Ọktoba, Thunder hapụrụ ya ọzọ mgbe ọ pụtara na egwuregwu anọ tupu oge ezumike

N'August 2, 2016, ọ bịnyere aka na Nanterre 92 nke French League
N'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2017, Zanna na Nanterre kewara otu ụbọchị mgbe ha nwetasịrị ihe nrite FIBA Europe Cup
N'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2017, Zanna bịanyere aka na ndị otu Israel bụ Ironi Nes Ziona maka oge 2017 na afọ 1918
N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2018, Zanna dekọrọ akara iri abụọ na asaa dị elu, tinyere rebounds iri na abụọ na ohi atọ na mmeri 95 na Maccabi Tel Aviv
N'ime egwuregwu Iri atọ na asaa emere n'oge oge 2017 – 18, o nwetara isi 139, nkwụghachi 94 na izu ohi 13 n'otu egwuregwu
Zanna nyeere Nes Ziona aka iru 2018 Israel League Playoffs, ebe Maccabi Tel Aviv mechara kpochapụ ha

Na Jenụwarị 8, 2019, Zanna laghachiri Ironi Nes Ziona maka oge nke abụọ, na-anọchi Gerald Lee

Zanna bụ onye otu egwuregwu basketball nke mba Naijiria
Ọ pụtara nke mbụ ya maka otu ahụ na 2019 FIBA World Cup iru eru na Mali
Nna Zanna nwụrụ n'oge na-adịghị anya ka ọ banye na Pittsburgh
Ọ na-emetụ foto nna ya nwụrụ anwụ aka n'ime mkpuchi ya, na-ekpegara ya ekpere tupu egwuregwu ọ bụla
Ọ nwere ike ịsụ Bekee tupu ọ kwaga United States ma mara asụsụ anọ nke ọma
Zanna bụ onye Alakụba ji okpukpe kpọrọ ihe

Talle Bamazi bụ Omenkà na Columbus, Ohio, onye, site na ọrụ nke ya, afọ ya dị ka onye nlekọta na onye nwe ụlọ ihe nkiri, na dịka onye ndụmọdụ nke ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe, enweela mmetụta dị ukwuu n'ịkwalite ọhụụ nke ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka na Afrịka na Amerịka
A mụrụ ya n'ebe ugwu Togo (West Africa), n'ime agbụrụ Kabiye, Bamazi malitere ọrụ nka ya dị ka onye na-amụrụ nwanne nna ya ihe, onye na-ese ihe ọdịnala Togo
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ gụrụ ihe owuwu na Lomé, ọ laghachiri ngwa ngwa na eserese, ma mepụta ụdị ya dị iche iche nke jikọtara ọdịnala Afrịka na nka ọgbara ọhụrụ
Mgbe ọ kwagara United States, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Art Students League of New York ma nweta MFA na New York Academy of Art

Ugbu a, ọ bụ onye isi na-ese ihe na King Arts Complex, ebe usoro ihe osise ya dị egwu nke ndị oji na-ese ihe na mpaghara Columbus, nke e gosipụtara na Columbus Museum of Art, ugbu a kwụ n'ụlọ ihe nkiri Pythian

Site n'afọ 2004 ruo n'afọ 2011, Bamazi na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ngosi a na-akpọ KIACA (Kabiye Impact Contemporary African Art), nke bụ naanị ụlọ ngosi nke ndị isi ojii nwere na mpaghara Columbus, Short North, na otu n'ime ụlọ ngosi ole na ole ndị isi ojii nwere n'obodo ahụ
KIACA jere ozi dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe na mpaghara Columbus na Afrịka na Afrịka-Amerika, gụnyere onye na-ese ihe na psycheñwelic April Sunami

E gosipụtara ọrụ Bamazi na Columbus Museum of Art, ebe o nwere ihe ngosi naanị ya n'afọ 2008 na ihe ngosi naanị ya na-abịanụ ('The Flying Calabash Man') na 2020, yana na National Afro-American Museum and Cultural Center na Wilberforce, Ohio
Ihe ngosi ya ndị ọzọ gụnyere Columbus City Hall, Welancora, Karma na Brecht Forum gallery na New York na Goethe Institut na Lomé
Ọrụ ya apụtawokwa na ihe ngosi otu na Museum of Science and Industry na Chicago, African American Museum na Hempstead, NY, na Museum of Contemporary African Diasporan Arts na Brooklyn, NY
A nabatara Bamazi, ya na MacArthur 'Genius' onye natara onyinye Aminah Robinson, na 27th Annual King Arts Center Gala na 2014
Bamazi apụtawo ugboro ugboro na 'Good News,' Time Warner Cable Channel 23, ma mee ihe ngosi telivishọn nke ya gburugburu nka n'oge ntorobịa ya na Lomé
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Art in America, Monarch Magazine, C-BUS Magazine, Valentine New York Art Magazine, na Diva Magazine, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Tallinn, bụ isi oche Estoniya
Na afọr 2021, Tallinn bụ obodo nke mmadụ 437,817 bi na ya
Tam Fiofori (a mụrụ n'afọ 1942), nke a makwaara dị ka 'Uncle Tam', bụ onye Naijiria na-ese foto
A ma ama maka abọm ya na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Naịjirịa, Fiofori bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye odee, onye nkatọ na onye ndụmọdụ mgbasa ozi
Isiokwu nke ihe nkiri ya gụnyere ndị Omenkà Naijiria bụ Biodun Olaku, J
'Okhai Ojeikere na Olu Amoda
Ọtụtụ njem, Fiofori biri na Harlem, New York, na 1960s, na-aghọ onye njikwa Sun Ra, ma na-emepụta edemede nke a na-ewere dị ka 'njikọ ntọala n'etiti Ra na mmegharị nke a ga-akpọ Afrofuturism'
A mụrụ ya na Okrika na Rivers Steeti, Fiofori tolitere na Benin City, ebe nna ya, Emmanuel Fiofori, kụziri na Edo College
Na-eme njem dị ukwuu kemgbe afọ 1960, Fiofori ghọrọ onye mmekọ na US nke Sun Ra
Dị ka Pan African Space Station si kwuo, 'Uncle Tam mechara kpọọ Sun Ra ka ọ gaa Lagos maka FESTAC 77, kpọọrọ ya gaa Kalakuta Republic
ma dee banyere ya niile na akwụkwọ akụkọ Naijiria Glendora Review

Fiofori bụ onye mbụ New Music / Electronic Music Editor maka Down Beat, ma dee maka ọtụtụ akwụkwọ nka na edemede ndị ọzọ na US na Europe - n'etiti ha bụ International Times na Change magazin- ma bụrụ onye a na-akwanyere ùgwù na ọ bụ 'onye na-ahụ maka iweta ihe okike ojii n'okpuru ala na nghọta mba Amerika n'oge ndị ahụ dị egwu nke afọ 1970s'
A na-ebipụta edemede ya mgbe niile kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ Naijiria, gụnyere akwụkwọ akụkọ NEXT, na blọọgụ Shèkèrè
Fiofori bụ onye ndụmọdụ ihe nkiri na Rivers State Council for Arts and Culture, onye nduzi nke Rivers State Documentary Series, na onye ndụmọdụ / onye edemede na NTA Network on Documentaries
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere ndị isi nke Photographers 'Association of Nigeria (PAN)

E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Afrịka, Europe na US, gụnyere Odum na Water Masquerades (1974), nke e gosiri na FESTAC '77, Tampere Film Festival, 10th FESPACO, Ouagadougou, 1987, Pan African Writers 'Association, Accra, Ghana, na 1979 A Peep into History and Culture
Mbipụta ya gụnyere 'print documentary' A Benin Coronation Oba Erediauwa (2011)

Dị ka onye edemede ahụ kọwara 'Ụdị akwụkwọ akụkọ nke akwụkwọ ahụ enyewo peeji iri asatọ na anọ nke foto nke gosipụtara ihe dị ka foto mbụ 150, ya na peeji iri asaa na abụọ nke ederede; ihe niile gbasara emume Benin City Coronation nke Oba Erediauwa dị ka Oba nke iri atọ na asatọ nke Alaeze Benin, site na Maachị 23 ruo 30, 1979

Akwụkwọ akụkọ Guardian nke Naịjirịa kpebiri na Fiofori 'na-ese ihe osise na-adọrọ adọrọ,' ma kwuo, sị 'Onye edemede ahụ na-eme nkọwa dị ukwuu banyere usoro ndị eze nke alaeze Benin ma na-enye nkọwa zuru oke banyere ọchịchị afọ iri anọ na ise nke Oba Akenzua II nke malitere na Eprel 5, 1933
Tam Fiofori site n'akwụkwọ ya, A Benin Coronation Oba Erediauwa, nyere Naịjirịa na ụwa niile ọmụmụ ihe na-enweghị oge na ihe nketa dị elu
Ọ bụ onye na-enye aka n'akwụkwọ 2018 African Photographer J
Green Re-imagining the Indigenous and the Colonial (nke Martha G
Anderson na Lisa Aronson dere), na nyocha nke Lindsay Barrett zoro aka na Fiofori dị ka 'Nigeria's iconic photograph genius'
Otu n'ime nsọpụrụ Fiofori natara bụ onyinye sitere na Pan African Writers 'Association (PAWA), iRepresent International Documentary Film Festival, na Music in Africa
A kọwara Fiofori dị ka 'otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke ọrụ lens
ụdị onye na-ese ihe / onye nta akụkọ na-adọrọ mmasị, onye ochie, onye dere banyere nka, egwu na ọdịbendị fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ọtụtụ ihe dị ka o sere ha foto
Tama, mà ọ bụ Damut, bụ asụsụ bụ ịsị nkè ndị Tama ná Ouaddai, n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Chad ná Darfur, n'akụkụ ọdịda anyanwụ Sudan
Ọ bụ ónyé ọtú ezinụlọ asụsụ Taman
Á na-elekarị Miisiirii ányá dị kà olumba, ọ bụ ezie ná ọ bụghị ìhè dị nso
Mmadụ 63,000 na-asụ Tama ná Dar Tama, ébé á á na-agba mmírí nkè ọma ná nsó Guéréda nkè sitere n'obodo Kebkebiya rụọ Sudan dị nsó
E nwèrè asụsụ abụọ fọrọ nke ntà kà há bụrụ otú, otú á na-asụ n'ébé ùgwù ná etiti, ná nkè ọzọ á na-akpọ n'ebe ndịda
Àtụ Infobox American Indian chief
Tamanend (nke a makwaara n'akụkọ ihe mere eme dịka Taminent, Tammany, Saint Tammany ma ọ bụ Eze Tammany
A maara Tamanend nke ọma dịka onye hụrụ udo na ọbụbụenyi n'anya
A na-akpọkwa ya 'Tammany', ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama na narị afọ nke iri na asatọ na America, ọkachasị na Philadelphia
A na-akpọkwa ya 'Onye Nsọ nke America', Tamenend nọchitere anya udo na ọbụbụenyi
Otu ụlọ ọrụ Tammany nke e guzobere na Philadelphia na-eme emume Tammany kwa afọ
E guzobere òtù Tammany gafee United States mgbe American Revolutionary War gasịrị, Tammany wee were ọnọdụ akụkọ ifo dịka ihe ngosi maka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị udo nke mkparịta ụka
A na-ekwu na Tamanend sonyere na nzukọ dị n'etiti ndị isi nke mba Lenni-Lenape, na ndị isi nke Pennsylvania colony nke e mere n'okpuru nnukwu osisi elm na Shakamaxon na mmalite afọ 1680
William Penn na Tamanend gara n'ihu na-abịanye aka na akwụkwọ asaa ọzọ na-emesi ibe ha obi ike, na ndị ha, maka nghọta udo mgbe nke mbụ gasịrị n'afọ 1683
E dekọrọ Tamanend dịka onye kwuru na ndị Lenni-Lenape na ndị England na-achị ala ga-ebi n'udo ma ọ bụrụhaala na mmiri na-aga n'osimiri na iyi na ma ọ bụrụla kpakpando na ọnwa na-atachi obi
E chetaala okwu ndị a na ihe oyiyi nke Tamanend nke ka guzo na Philadelphia
E kwenyere na Tamanend nwụrụ na 1701

N'ime narị afọ sochirinụ, ọtụtụ akụkọ ọdịnala gbara Tamanend gburugburu, a makwaara aha ya dị ka akụkọ ifo n'etiti ndị Philadelphia, bụ ndị malitere ịkpọ ya 'King Tammany,' 'Saint Tammany', na 'Patron Saint of America'
Ndị Philadelphia haziri otu Tammany na emume Tammany kwa afọ
Omenala ndị a gbasara n'oge na-adịghị anya na America
Ọnọdụ a ma ama nke Tammany bụ n'otu akụkụ n'ihi ọchịchọ nke ndị na-achị ala iji gosipụta njirimara 'American' dị iche, n'ọnọdụ mba Europe ha
Tammany nyere ihe nnọchianya kwesịrị ekwesị maka ụdị ịhụ mba n'anya a
N'ihi ọganihu Philadelphia n'oge American Revolution na iri afọ ndị sochirinụ, Tammany ghọrọ ihe nnọchianya mba n'ọtụtụ mba ọhụrụ ahụ
Tamara's Natalie Madden (16 Ọgọstụ 1975 na 4 Nọvemba 2017) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na Jamaica na onye na-eme ihe nkírí na mgbasa ozi na-arụ ọrụ ma na-ebi na United States
Ihe osise Madden bụ ihe atụ nke isiokwu ya bụ ndị bi n'Afrịka
A mụrụ Madden na St
Andrew, Jamaica
Ọ kwagara America site na Jamaica na-adịgide adịgide mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na ụma
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ọtụtụ mahadum gụnyere Mahadum nke Wisconsin Sinilovukee
N'afọ 1997, Madden dara ọrịa IgA nephropathy
Mgbè ọ na-arịa ọrịa, Madden chọtara nka ọzọ
Art nyeere ya aka ịgwọ ọrịa mmetụta uche, ya mere o kpebiri na ọ dị mkpa ịchụso ya
Ọ natara nkwonkwo akụrụ site n'aka nwanne ya nwoke n'afọ 2001, wee sonye na ngosi nka mbụ ya n'otu afọ ahụ
Ihe ngosi mbụ ya n'onwe ya bụ na 2004, ọ mekwara ka ya na James Auer nke Milwaukee Journal Sentinel gbaa ajụjụ ọnụ
Mgbè ngosi nke onwé ya gasịrị na 2004, Madden kwagara nso Atlanta, Georgia
Ọ zutere ndị nkuzi ya Charly 'Carlos' Palmer na WAK (Kevin A Williams) Mgbè ọ bi na Atlanta
N'afọ 2007, Madden wepụtara usoro akpọrọ, 'Kings & Queens', nke lekwasịrị ányá n'ịkwalite onye kwa ụbọchị
Ọrụ ya nọgidere na-elekwasị anya n'ịmata ịdị elu, nsọpụrụ, na nkwanye ùgwù n'ime ndị ọha mmadụ na-elegharakarị anya
Enwere ike ile ndị ọ na-achị ányà dị ka ndị bara ọgaranya na ndị dị ike, mana màkà ónyé na-ese ihe, ihe oyiyi ahụ na-anọchite anya ike nke na-apụta n'ime
'Dị ka ọrụ Gustav Klimt, Madden yi uwe chi nwanyị ahụ na uwe ejiji siri ike nke nwéré njikọ doro ányá na nka na ọrụ aka na ntọala ya nke ịkwado nka nke ndị mmadụ mere màkà ndị mmadụ
Akpụkpọ uwe pụrụ iche nke uwe ahụ na-eme ka ónyé na-eyi ya dị iche mgbè ọ na-emetụta mmetụta nke ụlọ na nke ọrụ nkịtị
Tụkwasị na nke a, ojiji Madden na-eji agba na ọla edo eme ihe na-enye ndị ọ na-achị ndụ nke ha na-enwetụbeghị
Madden biri ma rụọ ọrụ na mpaghara Atlanta ma bụrụ prọfesọ nka márá mma na Spelman College
Izu abụọ mgbe a chọpụtara na ọ na-arịa ọrịa kansa nke anọ, Madden nwụrụ
O nwèrè otu nwa nwanyị
Nwanne ya nwoke nke obérè, Woolie Madden Jr

Tamashek ma ọ bụ Tamasheq bụ ụdị Tuareg dị iche iche, asụsụ Berber nke ebo ndị na-akwagharị na North Africa na-asụ nke ọma na Algeria, Mali, Niger na Burkina Faso Tamasheq bụ otu n'ime ụdị atọ dị na Tuareg, ndị ọzọ bụ Tamajaq na Tamahaq
Tameka Jameson (amuru na ọnwa 11 August na afọ 1989) bu onye oso oso Naijiria
Ọ gbara ọsọ na mgbagharị mita 4 × 400 na asọmpi ime ụlọ nke 2016 IAAF
O tolitere na United States tupu ya amalite ịsọ mpi Naijiria
Tameka Norris, nke a makwaara dị ka
Dedeaux-Norris na Meka Jean bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Norris na-eji ihe osise, ihe ọkpụkpụ, na nka arụmọrụ iji mepụta ọrụ gbasara njirimara agbụrụ na ọhụụ na enweghị ike ịhụ ihe ojii n'otu ógè site na omenala ọdịbendị na ọha mmadụ nke oge a
Ọrụ ya na-akatọ ọnụnọ nke ahụ ojii na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke eserese na nka márá mma
Norris gụrụ akwụkwọ na Santa Monica College na Santa Monica, California, wee kwaga UCLA School of the Arts and Architecture na 2007
Norris gàrà n'ihu nweta nzèrè Master of Fine Arts na Yale School of Art na 2012
Norris bụ ónyé enyemaka prọfesọ na Mahadum Iowa

Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Skowhegan School of Painting and Sculpture (2009) ma sonye n'ọtụtụ ébé óbíbí ndị na-ese ihe gụnyere MacDowell Colony (2016) na The Fountainhead Residency Ọ bụ Fellow na Grant Wood Art Colony site na 2016 Ō 2017
E depụtara Norris dị ka otu n'ime '24 Artists to Watch na 2013' site na magazin Modern Painters

Tamer Hosny Sherif Abbas Farghaly (Arabic; a mụrụ n'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1977), nke a maara site na aha nka ya bụ Tamer Hosni (Arabic), bụ onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na'ede egwu, onye nduzi na onye na-ede egwu
Ọ bịara n'ihu ọha mgbe ọ pụtara na teepu ngwakọta ya na ndị ọzọ na-agụ egwu n'Egypt
Hosny malitere ọrụ ya n'onwe ya na abọm ya nke afọ 2004 bụ Hob, na-aghọ onye na-agụ egwú ịhụnanya na-aga nke ọma ma ndị na-akwado ya nyere ya aha 'King of the Generation'
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2019, Hosny mebiri Guinness World Record maka ọtụtụ onyinye nye bọọdụ mgbasa ozi
A mụrụ Tamer Hosny na Cairo n'aka nna onye Egypt na nne onye Siria
N'adịghị ka nna ya, Hosny Sherif Abbas, Tamer Hosny tolitere na mmasị na bọọlụ ma gbaa egwuregwu ahụ afọ ise
Tamer Hosny nwere ahụmịhe nduzi mbụ ya n'afọ 2010 mgbe ọ na-eduzi vidiyo egwu ya Se7eet 3la Sotha (Woke up to her voice)
Hosny nwere ọchịchọ ogologo oge ịghọ onye nduzi na ime vidiyo egwu nke ya
O gosipụtara na ihe nkiri Egypt nke afọ 2003 Halet Hob (A State of Love)
N'afọ 2006, e jidere ya maka ịghọ aghụghọ akwụkwọ agha iji zere itinye ndị agha
A mara ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ otu afọ, mana ọ nọrọ naanị ọnwa isii n'ụlọ mkpọrọ
Hosny lụrụ onye na-asọmpi Star Academy na onye na-agụ egwu Moroccan bụ Bassma Boussel n'afọ 2012
Ha nwere ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na otu nwa nwoke Talyia, Amaya na Adam
Ọ bụ onye na-akwado ihe ọṅụṅụ Pepsi
Ọ bụkwa onye ama ama Arab mbụ na-akpọsa ụdị ugogbe anya ndị uwe ojii
N'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2017, Hosny mere emume nzọụkwụ nwa oge na TCL Chinese Theatre na Hollywood, California, ebe ọ bụ onye Egypt / Arab mbụ na-ese ihe mere ya
Tamika Tremaglio bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke National Basketball Players Association (NBPA) ugbu a
Ndị egwuregwu ahụ họọrọ Tremaglio iji dochie Michele Roberts na Septemba 22, 2021, wee banye n'ọrụ ahụ mgbe Roberts lara ezumike nká na mbido Jenụwarị 2022
Tupu ọ banye na NBPA dị ka onye isi nchịkwa, Tremaglio, onye lara ezumike nká na Deloitte LLP, jere ozi dị ka onye nchịkwa maka ụlọ ọrụ Deloitte Greater Washington
A mụrụ Tremaglio na St
Mary's County, Maryland
Tremaglio nwetara akara ugo mmụta Bachelor of Arts na Mahadum Mount St
Mary na Business & Finance na 1992
Ọ natara JD na Mahadum Maryland School of Law na MBA na Mahadụ Baltimore
Nne Tremaglio, Pamela Langley, gara Mahadum Morgan State
Tremaglio sonyeere Deloitte na Nọvemba 2010 ma họpụta ya dịka onye isi nchịkwa maka mpaghara Greater Washington na 2017
O mechara sonye na NBPA dị ka onye isi nchịkwa

A kpọrọ Tremaglio onye isi onye mmekọ nke afọ na 2019 site na Washington Business Journal ma họrọ ya dị ka otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị 150 kachasị ike na Washington na 2019 na 2021 site na Washingtonian Magazine
N'afọ 2020, Tremaglio natara onyinye Triple-Impact Executive Award site na Positive Coaching Alliance
Tremaglio lụrụ Gregory A
Tremaglia ma nwee ụmụ nwoke abụọ, Rocque na Reece
Ọ bụ onye Katọlik ma bụrụ onye otu St
Peter Claver Church na St
Inigoes, Maryland
Àtụ NBPA executive directors

Tamil bụ asụsụ Dravidian nke ndị Tamil nke mpaghara India na-asụpronunciation (help·info) Tamil bụ asụsụ gọọmentị nke steeti India nke Tamil Nadu, mba ndị nwe onwe ha nke Sri Lanka na Singapore, na mpaghara India nke Puducherry
Ndị ka nta na steeti anọ ndị ọzọ dị na South India nke Kerala, Karnataka, Andhra Pradesh na Telangana na-asụkwa Tamil, na mpaghara njikọ nke Andaman na Nicobar Islands
Ọ bụkwa ndị Tamil diaspora na-asụ ya na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Eshia, Africa, Western Europe, Northern North America, Middle East, na Oceania
Ndị Sri Lankan Moors na-asụkwa Tamil
Otu n'ime asụsụ iri abụọ na abụọ a haziri na Iwu India, Tamil bụ nke mbụ a ga-ahazi dị ka asụsụ oge ochie nke India
Tamil bụ otu n'ime asụsụ oge ochie kachasị ogologo n'ụwa
Ramanujan kọwara ya dị ka 'naanị asụsụ nke India nke oge a nke a na-ahụ anya na-aga n'ihu na oge ochie'
Ụdị dị iche iche na ogo nke akwụkwọ Tamil oge ochie emeela ka a kọwaa ya dị ka 'otu n'ime nnukwu ọdịnala na akwụkwọ ọdịnala nke ụwa'
E dekọrọ akwụkwọ Tamil edere ihe karịrị afọ 2000
Oge mbụ nke akwụkwọ Tamil, akwụkwọ Sangam, sitere na c
300 BC ruo AD 300
O nwere akwụkwọ kachasị ochie dị n'etiti asụsụ Dravidian
Ihe ndekọ epigraphic mbụ a hụrụ na iwu nkume na 'nkume dike' sitere na narị afọ nke atọ BC
Ihe dị ka 60,000 n'ime 100,000 ihe odide dị iche iche nke Archaeological Survey of India chọtara na India dị na Tamil Nadu
N'ime ha, ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ na Tamil, naanị ihe dị ka pasent 5 n'asụsụ ndị ọzọ
A chọpụtakwala ihe odide asụsụ Tamil e dere na Brahmi na Sri Lanka na ngwaahịa azụmahịa na Thailand na Egypt
Ihe odide abụọ mbụ sitere na India, nke UNESCO Memory of the World debanyere aha na 1997 na 2005, edere na Tamil
Onye ikwu Tamil bụ Malayalam; ha abụọ malitere ịpụ iche na narị afọ nke itoolu AD
Ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ n'ime ọ

ndịiche dị n'etiti Tamil na Malayalam na-egosipụta nkewa tupu akwụkwọ ihe mere eme ke ọdịda anyanwụ, usoro nkewa n'ime asụsụ dị iche, Malayalam, emechabeghị ruo mgbe ụfọdụ na narị afọ nke 13 ma ọ bụ nke 14
Banū Tamīm (Arabic بَنُو تَمِيم) bụ ebo Arab malitere na Najd nke dị na ala Araba
Ọ bụ ọkachasị na Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Kuwait, Jordan, Iraq, ọnụnọ siri ike na Algeria, Tunisia, Morocco, na Libya
Ọ dịkwa n'ọtụtụ akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke mba Arab dịka Egypt na Palestine, yana Khuzestan na Iran
Okwu Tamim n'asụsụ Arabic pụtara ike na nke siri ike
Ọ pụkwara ịpụta izu okè

Dakouli, Padeu, Antje Maass, na David Toomey

Tamlin Blake (amụrụ n'afọ 1974) bụ onye na-ese ihe na mgbasa ozi na South Africa na-ebi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Riebeeck West
Isi okwu nke ọrụ Blake na-agba gburugburu ihe nnọchianya ọdịbendị South Africa nke akụ na ụba na ọnọdụ na, n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ihe mejupụtara ma na-akwado mmetụta nke onye ọ bụla
Ihe osise ya na-agafe ókè dị n'etiti ihe osise, ọrụ aka, na nka, na-eji ịkpa ákwà, beading, na eserese, n'etiti mgbasa ozi ndị ọzọ
Akụkụ bụ isi nke ọrụ nka Blake na-ewere ụdị stampụ South Africa nke a na-akpa nke ọma site na iji beads mkpụrụ glass
Site na iṅomi stampụ ndị a n'asụsụ ọrụ aka ọdịnala nke nwere njikọ siri ike na ọdịbendị ndị Afrịka, Blake na-enye ihe dị mma ma na-ekwu okwu siri ike banyere [South Africa] nwere nsogbu gara aga
(Innes 2012 pg20)
Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na nka bead nke ya, Blake nyeere Jeanetta Blignaut aka, iji guzobe ụlọ ọrụ bead nke dị taa dị ka Qubeka Bead Studio, njikọ aka nke ndị na-ese bead n'onwe ha

Mgbe nke a gasịrị, Tamlin jiri usoro mgbasa ozi dịgasị iche iche nke gụnyere akụkụ atọ na felt na beads iji nyochaa ojiji anụ ụlọ dị ka ngwaahịa bara uru na akara nke akụ na ụba na ọnọdụ gafee ókèala nke agbụrụ na ọdịbendị
Ọrụ Blake na mgbe na-adịbeghị anya na-agụnye tapestries wuru site na akwụkwọ akụkọ a rụgharịrị arụgharị na nke a na-eji aka arụpụta ihe nchịkọta nke Spier Holdings Contemporary Art Collection zụrụ
Blake nwetara nzere masta na Fine Art na Mahadum Stellenbosch n'afọ 2001

Tampa Bay bụ nnukwu ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri sitere n'okike na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri na-emighị emi nke jikọtara na Ọwara Mexico nke dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri ọdịda anyanwụ-etiti
Florida, nke gụnyere Hillsborough Bay, McKay Bay, Old Tampa Bay, Middle Tampa Bay na Lower Tampa Bay
Mmiri kachasị mma na-abanye n'ime ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ bụ Osimiri Hillsborough, nke na-asọba na Hillsborough Bay na etiti obodo Tampa
Ọtụtụ obere osimiri na iyi ndị ọzọ na-asọbakwa na Tampa Bay, na-ebute nnukwu mpaghara mmiri
Ụsọ mmiri nke Tampa Bay bụ ebe obibi nke Weedon Island Culture na mgbe ahụ omenala nke Safety Harbor ruo ọtụtụ puku afọ
Ọdịbendị ndị a dabere na Tampa Bay maka nri, mmiri ahụ bara ọgaranya nke na ha bụ otu n'ime ọdịbendị ụmụ amaala America ole na ole na-enweghị ọrụ ugbo

O yikarịrị ka Tocobaga bụ isi ọchịchị kachasị n'ógbè ahụ mgbe ndị nchọpụta Spanish rutere na mmalite afọ Otu puku na narị ise , mana o yikarịrị na e nwere obere isi ọchịchị n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nke edeghị nke ọma
Ọrịa na agha egbuola ndị obodo ahụ na ngwụcha afọ Otu puku na narị isii, ọ nweghịkwa ebe obibi mmadụ na-adịgide adịgide n'ógbè ahụ ruo ihe karịrị otu narị afọ
United States weghaara Florida n'afọ 1821 wee guzobe Fort Brooke n'ọnụ Osimiri Hillsborough n'afọ 1824
Obodo ndị gbara Tampa Bay gburugburu toro nke ukwuu n'ime narị afọ nke 20

Taa, mpaghara ahụ bụ ebe obibi ihe dị ka nde mmadụ 4, na-eme Tampa Bay ka ọ bụrụ ụzọ azụmahịa na nke ntụrụndụ a na-ejikarị eme ihe ma na-edobe ya na-abawanye ụba nke mmetọ sitere na ụlọ ọrụ, ọrụ ugbo, nsị mmiri na mmiri na-asọpụta n'elu
Na mmalite afọ nke 1980s ewedara ogo mmiri dị n'ọnụ mmiri ahụ nke ukwuu, na-akpata mbelata dị egwu na ndụ oké osimiri ma belata nnweta maka ntụrụndụ

E meela nlekọta ka ukwuu n'ime iri afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya iji belata mmetụta nke ebe obibi mmadụ na Tampa Bay, ọkachasị ụlọ ọrụ nhicha nsị na ọtụtụ ọrụ mweghachi ahịhịa mmiri, na-akpata mma mmiri ka oge na-aga
Otú ọ dị, mgbe ụfọdụ, red tide na algae ndị ọzọ na-acha uhie uhie emeela ka nchegbu banyere ahụike na-aga n'ihu nke estuary
A na-ejikarị okwu ahụ bụ 'Tampa Bay' eme ihe dị ka mkpirisi na-ezo aka na mpaghara niile ma ọ bụ akụkụ nke Tampa Bay, nke nwere ọtụtụ obodo na obodo dị iche iche nke gbara nnukwu mmiri gburugburu

Mgbalị ịre ahịa na ịre ahịa mpaghara (gụnyere ọtụtụ ndị otu egwuregwu ndị ọkachamara, bọọdụ ndị njem nlegharị anya, na ụlọ azụmaahịa) na-ejikarị moniker 'Tampa Bay',', na-akwalite echiche na-ezighi ezi na ọ bụ aha otu obodo mgbe nke a abụghị ikpe
Tampa Bay hiwere ihe dị ka afọ puku isii gara aga dị ka ebe mmiri na-asọ oyi nke nwere nnukwu ọnụ na-ejikọta ya na nnukwu osimiri
Gulf of Mexico
Tupu oge ahụ, ọ bụ nnukwu ọdọ mmiri dị ọcha, nke nwere ike ịbụ site na Floridan Aquifer site na isi iyi okike

Ọ bụ ezie na a ghọtachaghị usoro nke mgbanwe site n'ọdọ mmiri gaa n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri, echiche na-eduga bụ na ịrị elu nke oke osimiri na-esote oge ice ikpeazụ tinyere ịmepụta nnukwu oghere dị nso n'ọnụ mmiri ahụ ugbu a mepụtara njikọ n'etiti ọdọ mmiri na ọwara mmiri ahụ
Tampa Bay bụ nnukwu mmiri na-emeghe na Florida, na-agbasa ihe karịrị square narị anọ miles (1,000 km2) ma na-emepụta ụsọ oké osimiri nke Hillsborough, Manatee na Pinellas counties
A na-ekesa isi iyi mmiri dị ọcha nke ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ n'etiti ihe karịrị otu narị obere mmiri, kama otu osimiri
Osimiri Hillsborough bụ isi iyi mmiri dị ọcha kachasị ukwuu, na osimiri Alafia, Manatee, na Little Manatee bụ isi iyi kachasị ukwuu
N'ihi ọtụtụ mmiri ndị a na-abanye n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ, nnukwu mmiri ya na-ekpuchi akụkụ nke mpaghara Florida ise na ihe dịka square Puku abụọ na narị abụọ (5,700 km2)
Ala nke Tampa Bay bụ ájá na ájá, na nkezi omimi mmiri nke naanị ihe dị ka mita 127
Mmiri na-adịghị omimi na apịtị apịtị na-enye ohere maka nnukwu ahịhịa mmiri, yana ala mmiri mangrove gbara ya gburugburu, ọnụ mmiri ahụ na-enye ebe obibi maka anụ ọhịa dịgasị iche iche

A na-ahụ ihe karịrị ụdị azụ 200 na mmiri nke ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ, tinyere bottlenose dolphins na manatees, tinyere ọtụtụ ụdị anụmanụ na-enweghị azụ nke mmiri gụnyere oysters, scallops, clams, shrimp na crab

Ihe karịrị ụdị nnụnụ iri na abụọ, gụnyere pelicans na-acha aja aja, ụdị dị iche iche nke heron na egret, Roseate spoonbills, cormorants na gulls na-achị ọchị na-eme ka ụlọ ha kwa afọ n'akụkụ osimiri ya na obere agwaetiti ya, yana ọtụtụ ụdị ndị ọzọ na-akwaga na-esonyere ha n'oge oyi

Ọnwa ndị na-ajụ oyi bụkwa mgbe mmiri na-ekpo ọkụ na-esi na ụlọ ọrụ ọkụ eletrik ndị dị n'akụkụ ọnụ mmiri ahụ na-adọta otu n'ime manatees isii ọ bụla nke West Indian, ụdị dị n'ihe ize ndụ, na mpaghara ahụ
A họpụtara Tampa Bay dị ka 'estuary nke mba pụtara' site na United States Environmental Protection Agency na 1990
Abụọ National Wildlife Refuges dị na Tampa Bay Pinellas National Wildlife Refuge na ebe mgbaba na Egmont Key

Ọtụtụ n'ime agwaetiti (gụnyere ọtụtụ agwaetiti ndị mmadụ rụrụ site na nkwakọrọ) na sandbars bụ ihe ọha na eze machibidoro, n'ihi gburugburu ebe obibi ha na-adịghị ike na ojiji ha dị ka ebe obibi nke ọtụtụ ụdị nnụnụ
Tampa Bay Estuary Program na-eleba anya na ahụike nkeBay
Tampa Bay nwere azụ̀ na anụ ọhịa juru
Ndị bi na Safety Harbor na-ebi ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ kpamkpam site na mullet, shellfish, turtles, manatees, crabs, na ihe nrite ndị ọzọ ewetere n'oké osimiri
N'ihe dị ka mmalite narị afọ nke iri abuo, na ihe ndị ọzọ a na-ewepụta n'oké osimiri
Ka ọ na-erule mmalite narị afọ nke 20, ndị nleta ka na-akọ nnukwu ụlọ akwụkwọ nke mullet na-egwu mmiri gafee ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke na ha 'egbochi ụgbọ mmiri'
Ntọala na uto ngwa ngwa nke obodo ndị gbara ya gburugburu n'oge narị afọ nke 20 kpatara nnukwu mmebi na gburugburu ebe obibi nke ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ
Nnukwu owuwe ihe ubi nke azụ na ihe ndị ọzọ dị n'oké osimiri, ịdọrọ ọwa ụgbọ mmiri mgbe niile, na iwepụ mangroves maka mmepe n'ụsọ oké osimiri bụ ihe dị mkpa
Ihe kachasị emebi bụ nsị mmiri na mmetọ ndị ọzọ n'ime ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ, nke mebiri ogo mmiri
Ahụike nke ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ ruru ala na 1970s

Mmiri ahụ gbara ọchịchịrị nke na ìhè anyanwụ enweghị ike iru ala na-adịghị omimi, na-ebelata ahịhịa mmiri site na ihe karịrị 80% ma e jiri ya tụnyere na mbido narị afọ ahụ ma na-emetụta usoro okike mmiri nke ukwuu
Ọtụtụ ụdị a na-ahụkarị na mbụ bịara ụkọ, a na-emechikwa ụsọ mmiri dị n'akụkụ mmiri mgbe niile n'ihi oke nje na mmetọ adịghị mma

Malite na mbido afọ 1980 mgbe iwu gọọmentị etiti na nke steeti iji melite ogo mmiri, ndị ọchịchị wụnyere ụlọ ọrụ nhicha mmiri ka mma ma mee ka iwu siri ike nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, na-eduga n'iji nwayọ ma na-aga n'ihu na mma mmiri na ahụike gburugburu ebe obibi n'ozuzu
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2010, ọnụọgụ nke ahịhịa mmiri, mmiri doro anya, na ụdị dị iche iche emeela ka ọ dịkwuo mma ruo n'ókè ikpeazụ a hụrụ na nke afọ 1950s

Otú ọ dị, mmiri ozuzo nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na nke ọrụ ugbo tinyere mmiri na-asọpụta site na mpaghara ndị mepere emepe na-anọgide na-eyi ihe egwu na-aga n'ihu na gburugburu ebe obibi mmiri dị n'ọnụ mmiri, karịsịa site n'itinye mmiri ahụ na sedimenti na algae blooms, na mkpuchi mmiri na-adaba ntakịrị na njedebe 2010
Mmetọ mmiri mkpofu sitere na ụlọ ọrụ phosphate ochie dị nso n'ikperé mmiri abụwo nsogbu pụrụ iche
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, n'afọ 2004, mmiri ruru nde galọn iri isii na ise nke mmiri acid site na ụlọ ọrụ Cargill phosphate dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri ahụ metụtara ala mmiri dị nso na mmiri ahụ
N'ọnwa Eprel 2021, mmebi nke ebe nchekwa mmiri na ụlọ ọrụ phosphate Piney Point mechiri emechi mere ka ihe karịrị nde galọn narị abụọ nke ihe na-edozi ahụ na-asọba n'ime ala Tampa Bay
Uto nke red tide algae mere ka ecocide ma gbuo ihe karịrị Otu puku tọn azụ n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri na n'akụkụ ụsọ oké osimiri dị nso ma nwee ike ibute mmebi ọzọ na ala ahịhịa mmiri
Tampa Bay, dị ka akụkụ ndị ọzọ nke Florida, nwere oke nsogbu maka ịrị elu nke oke osimiri nke mgbanwe ihu igwe kpatara
iri nke oké osimiri arịwo elu sentimita asatọ (200 mm) kemgbe afọ 1946
Tampa Bay bụkwa otu n'ime ebe ndị dị na US kacha nọrọ n'ihe ize ndụ mgbe ajọ ifufe na-abata n'ihi ọnọdụ ya, ọnụ ọgụgụ na-arịwanye elu, na ọdịdị ala nke ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahu
Tampa Bay Regional Resiliency Coalition na-ahazi nzaghachi mpaghara ahụ maka mgbanwe ihu igwe
Ogbe nile na Bay, gụnyere St
Petersburg na Tampa na-emegharị akụrụngwa na ụlọ iji chee mgbanwe ihu na ọkwa oke osimiri
Ụmụ mmadụ ebiela na Florida ruo ọtụtụ puku afọ, ọ dịkarịa ala afọ puku iri na anọ
N'ihi ice zuru ụwa ọnụ, oke osimiri dị ala n'oge ahụ, na mpaghara Florida gbatịrị ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ kilomitiri isii 60 n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ nke ụsọ oké osimiri taa
A chọtawo ebe Paleo-Indian n'akụkụ osimiri na ọdọ mmiri dị n'ebe ugwu Florida, na-eduga na ịkọ nkọ na ndị Floridians mbụ a bikwa na Tampa Bay mgbe ọ ka bụ ọdọ mmiri mmiri dị ọcha
Achọtawo ihe akaebe nke ebe obibi mmadụ site n'oge mbụ a na saịtị Harney Flats, nke dị ihe dịka kilomita iri n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke ebe dị ugbu a n'akụkụ mmiri Tampa

Ihe akaebe mbụ nke ebe obibi mmadụ kpọmkwem n'ikperé mmiri nke Tampa Bay sitere na ọdịbendị Manasota, ọdịiche nke ọdịbendị Weeden Island, bụ ndị biri n'ógbè ahụ malite n'ihe dị ka afọ puku afọ ise ruo puku isii gara aga, mgbe oke osimiri rịrị elu ruo nso ọkwa ọgbara ọhụrụ ma jikọta ọdụ ahụ na Gulf of Mexico
Omenala a, nke na-adabere ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ naanị na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri maka nri na ihe ndị ọzọ, ejiri omenala Safety Harbor yiri ya dochie ya site na ihe dịka 800 AD
Mba ndị na-emetụta Tampa Bay bụ mba Tocobaga nke akụkọ ihe mere eme, ndị a maara na ha so n'etiti ndị nna nna nke agbụrụ Seminole na Miccosukee nke Florida
Omenala Safety Harbor bụ ihe na-achịkwa n'ógbè ahụ n'oge mbụ ya na ndị Europe zutere n'etiti afọ gara aga otu puku afọ na narị ise

Tocobaga, ndị wuru obodo ha dị nso na Safety Harbor nke taa n'akụkụ ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke Old Tampa Bay, bụ ndị otu kachasị edepụtara edepụtara site n'oge ahụ n'ihi na ha na ndị nchọpụta Spanish nwere mmekọrịta kachasị
Otú ọ dị, e nwere ọtụtụ obodo ndị ọzọ dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri nke a haziri n'ime obere ọchịchị dị iche iche gburugburu ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ
N'ịchọtaghị ọla edo ma ọ bụ ọlaọcha n'ebe dị nso na enweghị ike ime ka ndị obodo ahụ ghọọ Iso Ụzọ Kraịst, ndị Spen anọghị na Tampa Bay ruo ogologo oge
Otú ọ dị, ọrịa ha webatara gburu ndị obodo ahụ n'ime iri afọ ndị sochirinụ, na-eduga n'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ọdịda zuru oke nke ọdịbendị ọ bụla e guzobere gafee Florida
N'etiti mbelata a na enweghị mmasị nke ndị nwe ya, mpaghara Tampa Bay ga-abụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na ọ dịghị ebe obibi ruo ihe fọrọ nke ọ bụrụ afọ narị abụọ
Ndị na-eme map n'oge mbụ nyere Tampa Bay aha dị iche iche
Map ndị Spain sitere n'afọ1584 na-akọwa Tampa Bay dị ka Baya de Spirito Santo ('Bay of the Holy Spirit')
Map e dere n'afọ 1695 gosipụtara ebe ahụ dị ka Bahia Tampa

Map ndị e mechara dee n'afọ 1794 na 1800 na-egosi ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ kewara aha atọ dị iche iche, Tampa Bay n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ nke ala Interbay na Hillsboro Bay n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ na aha zuru oke nke Bay of Spiritu Santo
N'oge ndị ọzọ, a maara ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ dum dị ka Ọwara nke Tocobaga
United States nwetara Florida n'aka Spain n'afọ 1821

Aha Spirito Santo yiri ka ọ lara n'iyi na map nke mpaghara ahụ maka 'Tampa Bay' (mgbe ụfọdụ kewara na Tampa na Hillsboro Bays) n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe US guzobere Fort Brooke n'ọnụ Osimiri Hillsborough n'afọ 1824
N'ime iri afọ ole na ole sochirinụ, n'oge Agha Seminole, Tampa Bay ga-abụ isi ihe esemokwu, njide, na ịchụpụ ndị Seminole & Miccosukee nke Florida
Fort Brooke, Fort Dade, na ụlọ ọrụ ndị agha Amerika dị iche iche Egmont Key bụ ebe ndị isi metụtara iwepụ Seminole na akụkụ Floridian nke Trail of Tears
N'ime afọ narị sochirinụ, e guzobere ọtụtụ obodo ọhụrụ gburugburu ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ

Fort Brooke mụrụ Tampa n'ụsọ oké osimiri n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ, Fort Harrison (obere ogige ndị agha n'ụsoro oké osimiri ọdịda anyanwụ Florida) mụrụ Clearwater, ebe azụmahịa nke 'Braden's Town' ghọrọ Bradenton n'ebe ndịda, St
Petersburg toro ngwa ngwa mgbe e guzobesịrị ya na ngwụcha narị afọ nke 19, n'ụsoropo ọdịda anyanwụ nke Tampa
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2010, okirikiri Tampa Bay bụ ebe obibi nke ihe karịrị nde mmadụ anọ bi

Ka Tampa malitere itolite n'etiti afọ 1800, okporo ụzọ gafere etiti Florida ka bụ naanị ụzọ siri ike na ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè agbataghị na mpaghara Florida, yabụ ụzọ kachasị mfe maka ịga na ịpụ n'ógbè ahụ bụ site n'oké osimiri

Ka ọ na-erule ngwụcha narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, Otú ọ dị, ọdịdị na-adịghị omimi nke Tampa Bay mere ka ọ ghara ikwe omume maka nnukwu ụgbọ mmiri nke oge a nwere mmiri miri emi iru obodo Tampa na Hillsboro Bay
Ọtụtụ ụgbọ mmiri ga-esi n'ikpere mmiri gbado nke ọma ma bufee ibu na ndị njem n'ime obere ụgbọ mmiri na-ebuga na isi obodoi
Ụgbọ okporo ígwè Henry B
Plant rutere ebe ahụ n'afọ 1884 wee gafee Interbay Peninsula gaa Old Tampa Bay, ebe o wuru obodo na ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri nke Port Tampa na njedebe ya

N'afọ 1898, Plant jiri njikọ ya na gọọmentị etiti mee ka Port Tampa bụrụ isi ebe mbata maka ndị agha US n'oge Agha Spanish na America, nke dugara na US Congress na-ewepụta ego maka ndị agha United States Army Corps of Engineers iji malite nnukwu ọrụ mbu na Tampa Bay
E mepụtara ụzọ ụgbọ mmiri miri emi nke jikọtara Port Tampa na ọnụ ọnụ mmiri ahụ, na-enyere Plant aka ịgbasawanye ụgbọ mmiri ya nke ukwuu
N'afọ 1917, Corps of Engineers wepụrụ ọwa ọzọ site n'ọnụ Tampa Bay ruo n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Tampa, na-eme ka obodo ahụ bụrụ ebe mbupu dị mkpa ozugbo
Corps of Engineers ugbu a na-elekọta ihe karịrị kilomita iri asatọ nke ọwa mmiri miri emi na Tampa Bay ruo omimi nke mita Iri anọ na asaa
A ga-anọgide na-agbanye ma na-eme ka ha dị omimi n'ihi ọdịdị ájá nke ala ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri
Ọ bụ ezie na draedging emeela ka azụmahịa n'oké osimiri bụrụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke akụ na ụba mpaghara Tampa Bay, ọ mebiri ogo mmiri na gburugburu ebe obibi
E nlezianya ka ukwuu n'ime iri afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya iji belata mmetụta gburugburu ebe obibi nke draging
A na-ejikwa ihe ndị e wepụrụ n'ala mepụta ọtụtụ agwaetiti na-apụnara mmadụ ihe n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Hillsboro Bay

Agwaetiti ndị a aghọwo ebe dị mkpa maka ọtụtụ nnụnụ mmiri, gụnyere ụdị ndị na-eyi egwu dị ka oystercatchers, a họpụtakwara ha dị ka 'àgwàetiti dị nsọ' nke ndị na-enweghị ike ịhapụ ndị na-agba ụgbọ mmiri
Na mbido narị afọ nke Iri abụọ , ịgagharị n'ala n'etiti obodo ndị na-eto eto gburugburu Tampa Bay bụ usoro siri ike
Njem ahụ n'etiti Tampa na St

Petersburg fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ kilomita Iri ise (kilomita 80) gburugburu njedebe ugwu nke Old Tampa Bay ma were ihe ruru awa iri na abuo site na ụgbọ okporo ígwè na ihe karịrị otu ụbọchị zuru ezu n'okporo ụzọ ndị a na-ejighị n'aka site na ụgbọ ala
Njem ahụ dị n'etiti St
Petersburg na Bradenton dị ọbụna karịa kilomita iri asaa(kilomita otu narị na iri ) gburugburu Tampa Bay, njem nke ka were ihe dị ka awa abụọ n'ime afọ 1950
N'afọ 1924, Gandy Bridge n'elu Old Tampa Bay belatara anya ịkwọ ụgbọala n'etiti Tampa na St
Petersburg ruo kilomita iri na itoolu (31)
Afọ iri ka e mesịrị, e wuru Davis Causeway (nke e mechara kpọwa Courtney Campbell Causeway) n'etiti Clearwater na Tampa
Àkwà mmiri ndị ọzọ gafere Tampa Bay n'ime iri afọ ndị sochirinụ, na-eme njem n'etiti obodo ndị gbara ya gburugburu ngwa ngwa ma na-akwalite mmepe akụ na ụba nke mpaghara Tampa Bay
Ihe isi ike nke njem n'etiti Tampa na St
Petersburg na mmalite narị afọ nke iri abuo kpaliri ọrụ ụgbọ elu mbụ a haziri ahazi n'ụwa, St
Petersburg-Tampa Airboat Line, nke rụrụ ọrụ n'oge oge njem nleta nke 1914
Ọ bụ ezie na iwu àkwà mmiri mere ka njem ụgbọelu gafee Tampa Bay bụrụ ihe na-adịghị mkpa, e wuru ọtụtụ ọdụ ụgbọ elu n'akụkụ osimiri
E guzobere ọdụ ụgbọ elu Albert Whitted na St
Petersburg waterfront na ọdụ ụgbọ elu Peter O
Knight na Davis Island dị nso n'etiti obodo Tampa n'afọ 1930s
, Tampa International Airport na St
Pete–Clearwater International ọdụ ụgbọ elu e hiwere n'akụkụ nke ọzọ nke Old Tampa Bay, na MacDill Air Force Base meghere na ndịda n'ọnụ ọnụ Tampa's Interbay Peninsula
Àtụ Tampa Bay AreaÀtụ Coastal Waters of Florida

Thamsanqa 'Tamy' Moyo (amụrụ na 5 Jenụwarị 1998) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-eti egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onye ama ama maka egwu Ndibereke nke afọ 2016 yana ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Gonarezhou nke afọ 2020
A mụrụ ya na ụbọchị 5 n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 1998 na Harare, Zimbabwe
Nna ya bụ Richard Kohola bụ onye ngosi na Star FM Zimbabwe nke a maara dị ka RK
Nne ya bụ Doris Moyo na nna ya ukwu bụ Makwara zụlitere ya
Mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa, ọ malitere ịbụ abụ karịsịa na ndị ukwe ndị okenye
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị na Lusitania Praịmarị Skool ma mesịa gaa Westridge High School maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ mgbe ọ nọ na Form One, ọ sonyeere ndị na-ese ihe a ma ama bụ Joe Thomas, Oliver Mtukudzi, Stunner, Ba Shupi, na Alexio Kawara
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya ụmụaka maka Childline Zimbabwe, na-aghọ onye Zimbabwe kacha nta ịbụ onye nnọchi anya
N'afọ 2008, Tamy guzobere Uganda African Choir, ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya atọ ndị ọzọ na ọrụ ebere na Madison Square Garden na New York
O dere ma bụo abụ, Cry For Help nke na-agba ụmụaka ibe ya ume ịkpọ freephone 116 maka enyemaka
N'afọ 2012, Tamy wepụtara abọm egwu mbụ ya Celebrate Yo Lyf Mgbe ahụ, ọ nwetara ohere ime ihe nkiri na nnukwu ememme Zimbabwe dịka Harare International Festival of the Arts na Shoko Festival
O gosikwara na National Arts Merit Awards na Miss Tourism Zimbabwe ebe ọ rụrụ na Nọvemba 2016
N'afọ 2017, a kpọrọ Tamy ka ọ kpọọ ihe nkiri Gonarezhou site n'aka onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri ahụ, Sydney Taivavashe
A na-emepụta ihe nkiri a na njikọ nke Zimbabwe Parks and Wildlife Management Authority
Na ihe nkiri Tamy rụrụ ọrụ 'Chipo' dị ka mpụta sinima mbụ ya
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ nwetara nhọpụta mbụ ya na National Arts Merit Awards (NAMA awards) maka ịdị mma na ọrụ ya
N'afọ 2019, a họpụtara Tamy maka nwanyị kachasị mma si Southern Afrịka na mmemme All Africa Music Award (AFRIMA) na Ghana
N'etiti afọ 2021, ZIMOCO họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya akara site n'aka onye nkesa Mercedes Benz
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2021, o wepụtara abọm egwu iri na atọ a na-akpọ Bvudzijena na nnọkọ ndụ ZIMOCO ma mee ihe omume ya tụnyere ọkwa onyinye nke Black Entertainment Television (BET)
A họpụtara ya maka nwanyị kachasị mma na Southern Afrịka n'okpuru All Africa Music Awards 2021 (AFRIMA)
Ọ gbara agha ahụ n'akụkụ, Makhadzi (onye nwetara ihe nrite), Sha Sha n'etiti ndị ọzọ

Ọ meriri otu onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma nke CITY People's Movie Awards 2017, wee bụrụ onye mmeri 2011 nke mmadụ ikuku nke afọ (TV) na Future Awards na onye mmeri 2005 Grind Awards

Ọ gara Treasure Land Nursery na Primary school, Surulere maka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya na St

n'ime atụmatụ ime obodo na mpaghara

Tandy & Foster bụ ụlọ ọrụ Amerịka na-ahụ maka ihe owuwu na-arụ ọrụ site na 1908 ruo 1914 na New York na New Jersey, nke dị na New York City
Vertner Woodson Tandy (1885 ruo 1910), George Washington Foster (1866 ruo 1923) guzobere ya na 1908

Tandy bụ onye Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ na-ewu ụlọ nke steeti New York nyere ikike na Foster so na ndị Africa-America na-ewu ihe owuwu nke steeti nke New Jersey nyere ikike na 1908, na mgbe e mesịrị New York (1916)
Tandy na Foster gbasara mmekọrịta ha na 1914 ma mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ha abụọ na-arụ ọrụ na nzuzo, Foster nwetara ikike ya na New York site na 1915
Tanea Richardson bụ onye America na-ese ihe nke a maara màkà nchịkọta ya na ihe ọkpụkpụ ya
Richardson egosila ọrụ ya na Studio Museum na Harlem, EFA Project Space nké Elizabeth Foundation for the Arts, na Museum of Contemporary African Diasporan Arts (MoCADA), na Brooklyn, New York
Richardson na-eji ihe ndị a na-ahụ kwà ụbọchị dị ka wires na eriri nkwukọrịta iji kee ákwà, ọrụ ahụ bụ nkọwa banyéré ọrụ ọdịnala ụmụ nwanyị na nghọta ọha mmadụ banyéré ahụ ụfọdụ site na ákwà na asụsụ
Roberta Smith nke New York Times kọwara akụkụ mgbidi ya na Studio Museum na Harlem na 2008, 'Na mbụ, ha yiri ka ha maara nke ọma, mana ha ji nwayọọ nwayọọ ghọọ ihe pụrụ iche na ihe jọgburu onwé ya
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mmemme Ryman Arts na Los Angeles na Mahadum Stanford, ọ gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ nka nke Mahadum Yale site na 2005

Tangale (Tangle) bụ asụsụ West Chadic a na-asụ na mpaghara Northern nke Naịjịrịa
A na-ahụ ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-asụ asụsụ ala ahụ gafee Akko, Billiri, Kaltungo na Shongom mpaghara Ọchịchị nke Gombe Steeti Niajịrịa
E nwere ụdaume Tangale itoolu
Nke ọ bụla na-apụta n'ụdị dị ogologo na nke dị mkpirikpi 22
E nwere ihe ruru ụdaume iri atọ na anọ n'asụsụ ahụ, gụnyere nkwụsị implosive, nkwụsị prenasalized, na ụdaume labialized 20 Asụsụ ahụ na-eji ọkwa abụọ nke ụda dị iche iche 27
Akụkụ dị ịrịba ama nke Tangale bụ nkwekọrịta ụdaume
Suffixes na-achịkwa ma ụdaume niile dị n'okwu na-emeghe ma ọ bụ mechie
Aha nwere nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị, mana nke a anaghị egosi na aha 28 A na-ahụ ọdịiche dị na okike naanị na usoro nkwekọrịta (okike zoro ezo)
A naghị akara aha maka ọtụtụ, ma e wezụga okwu 'nwatakịrị' nke nwere ụdị ọtụtụ na-adịghị mma
A suffix -i na-egosi aha doro anya 31 Aha nwekwara ike iwere suffix possessive, nke na-edepụta onye nwe aha ahụ (nkwekọrịta onye nwe ya)

A na-ejikọta ngwaa na mgbọrọgwụ nke ụdị nkewa ndị a CVC-, CVːC-, CV(m)CC-, na CVCː- A na-etinye mgbọrọgwụ 39 maka ọtụtụ okwu n'ụzọ itoolu dị iche iche gụnyere reduplication, suffixation, infixation na devoicing
Otu subclass nke ihe dị ka ngwaa 30 nwere mgbọrọgwụ dị mkpirikpi na naanị otu ụdaume 43

A na-eji otu n'ime nsonaazụ itoolu na-emetụta ọnọdụ (TAM) akara ngwaa 39 Imperative-Subjunctive, Aorist-Intentional, Aorista-Subjunsive, Progressive I, Future, Perfect I, Perfect II (Dependent or Repetitive Perfect), Progressive II, ma ọ bụ Habitual
Na mgbakwunye, ngwaa na ụfọdụ TAM nwere ike iwere Altrilocal-Ventive ma ọ bụ Distance suffix 46
Ideophones bụ klas okwu 'na-egosipụta mmetụta uche'
N'ụzọ ọdịdị, ideophones na-abụkarị disyllabic ma nwee okwu ikpeazụ
Ha nwekwara ụdị ọzọ sitere na reduplication zuru oke
Ideophones na-ebu naanị ụda dị ala
Usoro nnọchiaha na-ekewa ụdị asatọ mmadụ atọ, otu na ọtụtụ, na ọdịiche nwoke na nwanyị na ụdị nke abụọ na nke atọ 32ff E nwere ụdị nnọchiaha atọ nwere onwe (ma ọ bụ zuru oke)
Ndị nnọchiaha nwere ụdị atọ nke a na-amata site na ojiji ha na TAM dị iche iche
A na-agbakọta nnọchiaha ihe na ihe na-apụtaghị ìhè na ngwaa
Ihe na-esote (ma ọ bụ ihe na-esochi nkwekọrịta onye nwe) na-ejikọta na aha na ndepụta nke onye nwe ya na-agbaso otu ụdị ahụ dị ka nnọchiaha ndị ọzọ
A na-eji okwu kɪɪ na nsonaazụ possessive emepụta nnọchiaha na-emegharị

Ndị Tangale na-asụkarị Tangale nwetara aha ha site na, onye isi nke Billiri, na steeti Gombe nke Naịjirịa ugbu a

Ekwenyere na Tangal nyere aka n'ịhazi agbụrụ dị n'okpuru nduzi ya ma n'ihi nke a, a na-akpọ ndị nọ n'okpuru ya Tangale (dị ka ọ bụ omenala n'ọtụtụ obodo Afrịka ịkpọ ala ma ọ bụ agbụrụ aha onye ndú ha)
Ndị Tangale bụ ndị si Yemen gafee Ijipt wee gaa na steeti Borno ugbu a
Otú ọ dị, n'ihi esemokwu agbụrụ na-adịgide adịgide, ha ga-anọgide na-esi n'otu ebe na-aga n'ebe ọzọ
N'ikpeazụ, ha biri na ọ dịkarịa ala ebe asaa dị iche iche tupu ha abịa n'ebe obibi ha a maara ugbu a, Kaltungo
Ndepụta nke ụfọdụ n'ime ebe ndị ha biri na gụnyere; SanumKude (nke a makwaara dị ka Big San) nso Ngazargamu na Kupto
Kupto dị ka nke Akwụkwọ Nsọ; ebe agbụrụ na ìgwè dị iche iche gbakọtara ọnụ iji biri ma biri
Na Kupto, ndị Tangaleʹs na ndị Lunguda, Kare-Kare, Tera, Waja, Bolewa, Songom na agbụrụ ndị ọzọ gbara agbata obi biri
Ọ bụ site na Kupto ka ha gara n'ihu na-akwaga ịchọta ebe mgbaba ọhụrụ; ọtụtụ n'ime ebe ugwu ndị ọtụtụ chere na ha dị nchebe karịa mwakpo na mwakpo ha zutere site n'aka ndị ohi
Ụmụ nwoke toro eto kwesịrị igosi ịbụ nwoke ha site na ịlụ ọgụ, dịka ihe akaebe nke obi ike ha, a chọrọ ka ha weta isi ndị iro ha gburu na ha mgbe ha si n'ọgbọ agha lọta
E nyere onye ụkọchukwu ihe nrite agha ndị a, onye debere ha n'okpuru osisi nsọ nke ezinụlọ ahụ
Mai Tangale nke ugbu a bụ Malam Danladi Sanusi-Maiyamba
Asụsụ ala nke agbụrụ Tangale bụ Tangale mana n'ihi oke asụsụ Hausa na mpaghara Ùgwù na ala Naijiria, ọtụtụ n'ime ha nwekwara ike ịsụ asụsụ Hausa nke ọma
Ihe oriri ndị Tangale bụ ar bayo', nke e ji ụdị daddawa pụrụ iche (beanscake); 'ed mammu'; 'kwaksak' na 'Shinga' kwadebe

Tania Tinoco (August 2, 1963 - May 21, 2022) bụ onye nta akụkọ Ecuadorian, onye edemede, onye na-emepụta ihe onyonyo, onye nduzi, onye na-egosi TV na redio, onye nta akụkọ, onye na-agba ajụjụ ọnụ, na onye ndu echiche
Ruo ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ, a maara ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi abalị Ecuavisa, Televistazo
A mụrụ Tania Tinoco na Machala na August 2, 1963
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu, ya na nna ya Colón Tinoco, gara biri na Guayaquil, ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Unidad Educativa Bilingüe [es] de La Inmaculada
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ọ bụ onye otu Journalism Club nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ
Nke a mere ka mkpebi ya ịchụso ọrụ nta akụkọ dị ka ọrụ
Tinoco gụrụ akwụkwọ oru nta akuko na Universidad Laica Vicente Rocafuerte [es]
Na Disemba 1983, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ, site n'enyemaka nke onye nduzi nke kọleji ya nke tụrụ aro ya na onye njikwa Human Resources nke Ecuavisa, ọwa ahụ kpọbatara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na ntinye akwụkwọ
N'afọ 1986, Nila Velásquez, onye nduzi nke akụkọ Sunday na onye nchịkọta akụkọ echiche nke akwụkwọ akụkọ El Universo ugbu a, tụrụ aro ka Alberto Borges [es] họrọ Tania ka ọ gụọ akụkọ ahụ
N'ụzọ dị otú a, ọ ghọrọ akụkụ nke ihe ngosi akụkọ mgbede Telemundo, ya na Borges
Na Mee 30, 1992, Tinoco lụrụ Bruce Hardeman, onye ọchụnta ego Switzerland nke ya na ya nwere ụmụ abụọ
N'afọ 1994, nna ya nwụrụ, mgbe ọnwa isii gasịrị, Alberto Borges sochiri ya, onye bụ onye ibe ya na akụkọ ruo afọ asatọ
Tania Tinoco bụ onye nduzi na onye na-eweta usoro akụkọ Telemundo na usoro nyocha Visión 360 [es], ha abụọ na Ecuavisa

Na Jenụwarị 29, 2015, e nyere Tinoco Eugenio Espejo National Journalism Prize site na National Union of Ecuadorian Journalists (Spanish ; UNP) na ngalaba telivishọn, maka ihe nkiri akpọrọ Los niños de Génova
Tanimowo Ogunlesi (1908-2002) bụ onye na-agba mbọ maka women ikike ụmụ nwanyị na Naịjirịa na onye isi otu njikọ nke Women's Improvement League
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ụmụ nwanyị na-eme mkpọsa nke oge ya ma guzọbere otu nke National Council of Women Societies, otu na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwaanyị na Naijiria
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi ala nke mbụ kansụl ahụ na 1959
O lebara anya na ikike ụmụ nwanyị ịtụ vootu na ịnweta ohere agụmakwụkwọ dị ka ọtụtụ ụmụ nwanyị ndị nationalists
Ọ dịghị mgbe ọ bụla ọ jụrụ ajụjụ banyere ka nwoke ndị naijiria si akpa dike na ụlọ
Ọ sonye na mmegharị chọọrọ ka sayensị nke ọzụzụ ezinụlọ na Nigeria di ezigbo mkpa mgbe ọ mepere ụlọ akwụkwọ ọzụzụ n'ụlọ
Tanja Ćirov (Serbian Cyrillic Тања Ћиров; Bulgarian Таня Чиров, Chirov; amụrụ na 26 Febụwarị 1981) bụ nwanyị Bulgarian Serbian na eme egwuregwu basketball

Tank Man (nke a makwaara dịka onye na-eme ngagharị iwe a na-amaghị ama ma ọ bụ onye nnupụisi a na-akpọghị aha) bụ aha njirimara nke nwoke China a na-akọwaghị aha ya nke guzo n'ihu kọlụm nke tankị Type 59 na-ahapụ Tiananmen Square na Beijing na June 5, 1989, ụbọchị mgbe mmegide ike nke gọọmentị China na-eme na ngagharị iwe Tiananmen
Ka tankị na-eduzi na-agafe nwoke ahụ, ọ gbanwere ọnọdụ ya ugboro ugboro iji gbochie ụzọ tankị ahụ gbara ya gburugburu
E mere ihe nkiri nke ihe omume ahụ ma kọọrọ ndị na-ege ntị n'ụwa niile
Na mba ụwa, a na-ewere ya dịka otu n'ime ihe oyiyi kachasị mma n'oge niile
N'ime China, onyinyo ahụ na ihe omume ndị na-eso ya bụ ndị a na-enyocha
Enweghị ozi a pụrụ ịdabere na ya banyere njirimara ma ọ bụ ọdịnihu nke nwoke ahụ; akụkọ banyere ihe mere ndị ọrụ tankị amaghị
Ọ dịkarịa ala otu onye akaebe ekwuola na Tank Man abụghị naanị onye gbochiri tankị ahụ n'oge ngagharị iwe ahụ, mana Tank Man pụrụ iche n'ihi na ọ bụ naanị ya ka e sere foto ma dekọọ na vidiyo
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1998, Time gụnyere 'Onye nnupụisi a na-amaghị ama' n'ihe akpọrọ 'Time 100 The Most Important People of the Century'
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2016, Time gụnyere foto Jeff Widener na 'Time 100 The Most Influential Images of All Time'
Òtù Electro-industrial Skinny Puppy dekọrọ ma wepụta egwu 'Tin Omen' dịka ihe na-ezo aka na ngagharị iwe ahụ
Na ngwụcha afọ 1989, a tọhapụrụ ya na abọm ha bụ Rabies na okwu ndị na-ekwu 'nnupụisi na-enweghị ime ihe ike', 'ụgbọ agha na-abịa', 'gwara ụwa ihe na-eme' na 'na-eme ka igwefoto dị ndụ'
Vidio egwu afọ 1994 maka 'Refuse/Resist' site na egwu thrash / death metal Sepultura gosipụtara ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi nke Tank Man
Vidio egwu maka Michael Jackson's 'They Don't Care About Us (Prison Version) ' gosipụtara obere ihe nkiri nke Tank Man
Tano Jōdai (上代公) (July 3, 1886 April 8, 1982) bụ prọfesọ nke akwụkwọ Bekee, onye na-ahụ maka udo, na onye isi oche nke isii nke Mahadum ụmụ nwanyị Japan
A mụrụ Jōdai na ụbọchị atọ n'ọnwa July , n'afọ 1886
Nna ya bụ onye isi obodo Harue na Shimane Prefecture, Japan

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Shimane Prefectural Matsue Kita High School, ọ laghachiri n'obodo ya wee kụzie n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị n'ógbè ahụ ruo oge ụfọdụ, mana ọ gara n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya na Mahadum ụmụ nwanyị Japan
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere na akwụkwọ Bekee
Jōdai chọrọ ịga n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Imperial nke Tokyo, mana ha anabataghị ụmụ akwụkwọ nwanyị n'oge ahụ
Kama nke ahụ, prọfesọ nọ ebe ahụ aha ya bụ Nitobe Inazo nyere ya ọnọdụ na Wells College na United States, mgbe o degaara ya akwụkwọ banyere ọchịchọ ya ịmụ akwụkwọ na mba ọzọ
Mgbe Jōdai laghachiri Japan n'afọ 1917, ọ ghọrọ prọfesọ na Mahadum ụmụ nwanyị nke Japan, ọ bụkwa onye mbụ kụziri ihe ọmụmụ gbasara akwụkwọ America na akụkọ ihe mere eme na Japan
Mmetụta Nitobe mere ka o guzobe Òtù Udo Ụmụ nwanyị Japan

Nke a mesịrị ghọọ isi Japan nke 'Women's International League for Peace and Freedom' Na ndụmọdụ Nitobe, n'afọ 1924 Jōdai gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Michigan na Newnham College, Cambridge, wee nọrọ n'ụlọ ya na Geneva ruo n'afọ 1927
Mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị, Jōdai maliteghachiri izi ihe na Mahadum Ụmụ nwanyị nke Japan
N'afọ 1955, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere Kọmitii nke asaa na-arịọ maka udo ụwa
Site na 1956 ruo na Machị 1965, Jōdai jere ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke Mahadum ụmụ nwanyị Japan
N'oge ọ bụ onye isi oche, o mere ka ihe niile dị n'ọbá akwụkwọ ahụ mepee ma malite ndị enyi nke otu ọbá akwụkwọ ahụ
Jōdai nwụrụ n'April 8, 1982
Tantalizers bụ ndị na-eduga yinye ụlọ nri ngwa ngwa Naijiria
Ọ mepere ebe izizi ya na 1997 na Festac Town, Lagos
Ebe mbụ a bụ obere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ agbata obi na-enye hamburgers
ihe ịga nke ọma n'ebe mbụ a butere mgbasawanye nke hụla ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na ndị na-akwado ya mepere ebe ndị ọzọ n'obodo ndị dị ka Lagos, Ibadan, Abuja, na Port Harcourt
N'ime afọ 2015, ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ahụ nwere ụlọ ahịa 50 n'ofe Nigeria
Ndị na-emepụta ihe na-enye ndị na-ahụ maka nri ngwa ngwa Naijiria dị ka anụ ezi, àkwá scotch, ọkụkọ, osikapa jollof, osikapa e ghere eghe, achịcha, na hamburgers
Tanya van Graan (amụrụ n'abalị iri na atọ nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 1983) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-agụ egwu na onye n'eme ejiji nlereanya
A maara ya maka ọrụ ya na Zulu na Starship Troopers 3 Marauder, nakwa maka ịbụ FHM's Sexiest Woman na 2007 FHM 100 Sexiest Women in the World bash nke emere na Johannesburg
Na mgbakwunye na mpụta ya n'ihe nkiri South Africa, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri akụkọ sayensị Starship Troopers 3 Marauder, nke Edward Neumeier, dị ka Sgt
Sunday, n'akụkụ Jolene Blalock na Casper Van Dien
N'afọ 2010, ọ pụtara na ihe omume ntọchị nke egwu bu Lost Boys The Thirst dị ka Lily, ya na Tanit Phoenix na Corey Feldman
N'otu afọ ahụ, o gosiputara dị ka Holly na ihe nkiri Death Race 2 ma soro Tanit Phoenix rụọ ọrụ ọzọ n'ihu yana nke ya, Death Race Inferno, ewepụtara n'afọ 2013
Na ihe nkiri ahụ, Graan mere Amber ma guzoro dị ka ọ dị na mbụ, na mgbakwunye na Luke Goss, Danny Trejo na Ving Rhames n'ihu igwefoto
E wepụtara ihe nkiri atọ niile nke usoro Death Race dị ka Direct-to-DVD
N'afọ 2013, Van Graan pụtara dị ka Tara na ihe nkiri Zulu nke Jérôme Salle, ya na Orlando Bloom na Forest Whitaker
N'afọ 2014, Van Graan lụrụ Kasper Kristofferson na La Residence na Franschhoek
Tanzania (/ˌtænzəˈniːə/;[lower-alpha 2] Swahili [tanzaˈnia]), nke a na-akpọ United Republic of Tanzania, bụ mba dị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka n'ime mpaghara Great Lakes nke Afrịka

Ọ na-ejikọ Uganda n'ebe ugwu; Kenya n'ebeebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ; Oké Osimiri India n'ebe ọwụwa Anyanwụ; Mozambique na Malawi n'ebe ndịda; Zambia n'ebe Ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ; na Rwanda, Burundi, na Democratic Republic of the Congo n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ
Ugwu Kilimanjaro,Ugwu kachasị elu nke Africa, dị na ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ Tanzania
Dabere na ọnụ ọgụgụ mba 2022, Tanzania nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ nde 62, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nke ise kachasị na Africa
E mepụtara aha 'Tanzania' dị ka ihe jikọtara aha steeti abụọ jikọtara ọnụ iji mepụta mba ahụ Tanganyika na Zanzibar
O nwere mkpụrụedemede atọ mbụ nke aha steeti abụọ ahụ ('Tan' na 'Zan') na nsonaazụ, 'ia' iji mepụta ya ka ọ bụrụ Tanzania ma ka aha ya buru Tanzania
Ngwá ọrụ ịkpụ nkume dị nde afọ 18 nke a chọtara na Olduvai Gorge ma gosipụta ya na British Museum
Obodo Tanzania bụ otu n'ime ebe ndị mmadụ kacha biri n'ụwa
Ihe nchoputa nke fossil nke ụmụ mmadụ na hominids malitere n'oge Quaternary

Olduvai Gorge, nke dị na Ngorongoro Conservation Area, UNESCO World Heritage Site, gosipụtara nchịkọta nwere ihe ndị fọdụrụ na ngwaọrụ ndị na-edekọ mmepe na ojiji nke mgbanwe n'esite na teknụzụ dị iche iche
A na-eche na ụmụ amaala nke ọwụwa anyanwụ Afrịka bụ ndị na-achụ nta na ndị Sandawe nke obodo Tanzania
Ndị njem na ndị ahịa si obodo abụo bụ Persian Gulf na India eletawo ụsọ oké osimiri ọwụwa anyanwụ Afrịka kemgbe mmalite puku afọ mbụ AD
Ụfọdụ ndị Alakụba no na Swahili Coast na-eme ya na narị afọ nke asatọ ma ọ bụ nke itoolu AD
Ọchịchị Britain bịara ná njedebe na ụbochi itoolu nke onwa Disemba n'afọ 1961

Elizabeth nke Abụọ, onye batara n'ocheeze Britain na 1952, gara n'ihu na-achị ruo n'afọ mbụ nke nnwere onwe Tanganyika, mana ugbu a dị ka Queen of Tanganyika, nke gọvanọ na-anọchite anya ya peeji nke 6 Tanganyika sonyeere British Commonwealth na 1961
Na 9 n'onwa Disemba 1962, Tanganyika ghọrọ mba ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya n'okpuru onye isi ala peeji nke 6
Na ubochi 17 n'onwa Machị nke afọ 2021, Onye isi ala John Magufuli nwụrụ site na nsogbu obi mgbe ọ nọ n'ọchịchị
Onye osote onye isi ala Magufuli, Samia Suluhu Hassan, ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi ala Tanzania

Kalambo Falls nke dị na mpaghara ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Rukwa bụ nke abụọ kachasị elu na-enweghị nkwụsịtụ n'Africa, ọ dịkwa nso n'ụsọ oké osimiri ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ọdọ Mmiri Tanganyika n'ókè ya na obodo Zambia
Map Tanzania nke nhazi ihu igwe Köppen
Ọnọdụ ihu igwe dịgasị iche iche n'ime obodo Tanzania ka akowara n'edemede a
N'ugwu, okpomọkụ dị n'etiti 10 na 20 °C (50 na 68 ) n'oge oyi na oge okpomọkụ
Ndị ọzọ nọ na mba ahụ nwere okpomọkụ na-adịghị adaba karịa 20 °C (68 )
Oge kachasị ọkụ na-adị n'agbata Nọvemba na Febụwarị (25318 °F) ebe oge kachasị jụụ na-adị na n'agbanye Mee na Ọgọst (1520 °C ma ma ọ bụ 5968 )

Giraffe Masai bụ anụmanụ mba Tanzania
Tanzania nwere ihe dị ka pasent 20 nke ụdị nnukwu anụmanụ nwere ọbara na-ekpo ọkụ n'Africa, nke a chọtara n'elu ogige ntụrụndụ mba 21, ebe nchekwa, 1 ebe nchekwa, na ogige ntụ mmiri 3
Na-agbasa n'elu mpaghara nke karịrị square kilomita 42,000 (16,000 sq
mi) ma na-akpụzi ihe dị ka 38% nke mpaghara mba ahụ

Tanzania nwere ogige ntụrụndụ mba 21, tinyere ọtụtụ egwuregwu na ebe nchekwa ọhịa, gụnyere Ngorongoro Conservation Area, agbanyeghị, enwere ọtụtụ ndị bi na Ngorongoro ma na-anwa imetụta gburugburu ebe obibi
FIB ndị agha pụrụ iche nke Tanzania n'oge ọzụzụ
Tanzania People's Defence Force (TPDF) bụ ndị agha nke Tanzania, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ndị agha nọ n'okpuru nchịkwa ndị nkịtị
O nwere alaka ma ọ bụ iwu ise Land Force (ndị agha), Air Force, Naval Command, National Service, Headquarter (MMJ)
Ụmụ amaala Tanzania nwere ike inye onwe ha maka ozi agha site na afọ 15, na afọ 18 maka ozi agha iwu nke mba mgbe ha gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị elu
Ọrụ ndị ọrụ agha bụ afọ 2 site na 2004

Njem na njem nleta nyere pasent 175 nke ngụkọta ego nke obodo Tanzania n'afọ 2016 ma were pasent 110 nke ndị ọrụ mba ahụ (1,189,300 ọrụ) n'ọrụ na 2013
Nchịkọta ego sitere na ijeri US $ 174 na 2004 ruo ijeri US US $ 448 na 2013, na ego sitere n'aka ndị njem nleta mba ụwa si na ijeri $ 1255 na 2010 ruo ijeri $ 2 n'afọ 2016
N'afọ 2016, ndị njem nleta 1,284,279 rutere n'ókè Tanzania ma e jiri ya tụnyere 590,000 n'afọ 2005
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị njem nleta na-eleta Zanzibar ma ọ bụ 'ebe ugwu' nke Serengeti National Park, Ngorongoro Conservation Area, Tarangire National Park, Lake Manyara National Park, na Mount Kilimanjaro
N'afọ 2013, ogige ntụrụndụ kachasị eleta bụ Serengeti (452,485 ndị njem nlegharị anya), Manyara (187,773) na Tarangire (165,949)
N'afọ 2013, ngalaba nkwukọrịta bụ nke na-eto ngwa ngwa na obodo Tanzania, na-agbasawanye pasent 228; Otú ọ dị, ngalaba ahụ nwere naanị pasent 24 nke ngụkọta ngwaahịa ụlọ n'afọ ahụ
N'oge ntọala United Republic of Tanzania na 1964, ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụaka na-anwụ bụ ọnwụ 335 n'ime 1,000 ọmụmụ dị ndụ
Kemgbe nnwere onwe, ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ọnwụ ụmụaka agbadala ruo 62 n'ime 1000 ọmụmụ

A na-asụ ihe karịrị 100 asụsụ na obodo Tanzania, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ mba kachasị asụsụ dị iche iche n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Afrịka
N'etiti asụsụ ndị a na-asụ bụ anọ n'ime ezinụlọ asụsụ Africa ndị bụ Bantu, Cushitic, Nilotic, na Khoisan

Ụdị egwu ise dị na obodo Tanzania, dị ka BASATA si kọwaa bụ, ngoma, dansi, kwaya, na taarab, na bongo flava na-agbakwunye na 2001
Singeli abụwoegwu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị nke uswahilini kemgbe etiti afọ 2000, obodo ndị a na-ahazighị ahazi na Dar es Salaam, ọ bụkwa ụdị kachasị ọhụrụ kemgbe afọ 2020
Ụdị nka abụọ nke Tanzania enwetawo nkwado mba ụwa
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe osise Tingatinga, nke Edward Said Tingatinga guzobere, nwere ihe osise enamel na-egbuke egbuke na ákwà, na-egosipụtakarị ndị mmadụ, anụmanụ, ma ọ bụ ndụ kwa ụbọchị
Mgbe Tingatinga nwụsịrị na 1972, ndị na-ese ihe ndị ọzọ nabatara ma mepụta ụdị ya, na ụdị ahụ bụ ụdị ndị njem nleta kachasị mkpa n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Africa
