Ụtụ isi n'osisi bụ ụtụ isi nyere ndị nwe osisi mkpụrụ osisi na USSR site n'aka ọchịchị Joseph Stalin na 1944
Ụtụ isi ahụ mere ka ọ dị ọnụ ahịa inwe osisi n'ugbo, ma nwee ihe a na-atụghị anya ya nke kpatara ndị ọrụ ugbo Soviet na-egbutusị osisi
Nke a mechara bute ụkọ mkpụrụ
Ọ bụ Minista Arseny Zverev chepụtara echiche ahụ, Stalin wee ghara ịhụ nsogbu ọ ga-eweta
Georgy Malenkov wepụrụ ụtụ isi ahụ na 1954, mgbe e belatara ụtụ isi site na pasent 60 maka ndị ọrụ ugbo
Hargeisa Taxi bụ ụlọ ọrụ tagzi nke dị na Hargeisa, isi obodo Somaliland
E guzobere ya n'afọ 2012, ọ nwere ìgwè nke obere ụgbọala anọ na obere ụgbọala asaa, na mgbakwunye na ihe dị ka ụgbọala 19 ndị ọzọ
Ngwa GPS nke ụlọ ọrụ Sahal Technology arụnyere na-enye ohere ka ụlọ ọrụ izipu ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri nyochaa tagzi ya iji hụ na ha na-aga n'ime oke ọsọ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwekwara ike gbanyụọ ụgbọala ndị ahụ n'ịntanetị ma ọ bụrụ na a na-ezu ohi

The tilde (/ ˈtɪldeɪ, -di, -də, ˈtɪld/) ˜ ma ọ bụ ~, bụ grapheme nwere ọtụtụ ojiji Aha agwa ahụ sitere na Spanish na Portuguese bata na bekee, nke n'aka nke ya sitere na Latin titulus, nke pụtara 'aha' ma ọ bụ 'edemede' na Nchikota na a isi leta; mana maka ebumnuche akụkọ ihe mere eme, a na-ejikwa ya n'ụdị kwụ ọtọ n'ime ọnọdụ dị iche iche
Brytavious Lakeith Chambers (amụrụ na Septemba 20, 1996), nke a maara dịka Tay Keith, bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na onye na-ede egwu

A maara ya nke ọma màkà iso mepụta egwu Travis Scott nke 2018 'Sicko Mode', na-arị elu na nọmba otu na Hot 100, BlocBoy JB's 'Look Alive', na-eru na nọmba 5 na Hot 100, na Drake's 'Nonstop', na-erute na nọmba abụọ
Ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta mbipụta na Warner Chappell Music ma bụrụ ónyé otu BMI
A mụrụ Brytavious Lakeith Chambers na Septemba 20, 1996, na South Memphis, Tennessee, ébé a zụlitere ya
Ya na nne ya na nna ya tolitere ebe ọ maara na egwu ga-abụ isi ihe siri ike ya
Keith bụ ónyé kasị nta n'ezinụlọ n'ime ụmụnne ya nwoke abụọ na ụmụnne ya nwanyị abụọ
Taye bụ aha ụlọ dị elu nke aha mbubata Flemish
Taye bụ aha nwoke sitere na Naijiria na Etiopia nke nwere ike izo aka na
Maka ebe akpọrọ 'Tayeb' ma ọ bụ nke ọ bụla n'ime ọdịiche ya, lee Taybeh (mgbanwe)
Tayfur Havutçu (amụrụ 23 Eprel 1970) bụ onye njikwa bọọlụ Turkey na onye bụbu onye ọkpụkpọ ọkachamara bụ onye na nso nso a onye njikwa Süper Lig club Kasımpaşa
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke ndị otu mba Turkey nke ruru ebe nke atọ na 2002 FIFA World Cup
Taylor McFerrin (amụrụ na June 28, 1981 na San Francisco, California) bụ ónyé American DJ, ónyé na-emepụta égwu, onye na'egwú keyboard & beatboxer nke bi na Brooklyn, New York City, United States
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ nke ónyé na-agụ egwú na onye na-eduzi egwú Bobby McFerrin
McFerrin wepụtara abọm mbụ ya Early Riser (2014) na Flying Lotus 'Brainfeeder Records
Abọm ahụ gosipụtara ndị ọbịa si Nai Palm (Hiatus Kaiyote), Thundercat, Robert Glasper, Cesar Mariano, Marcus Gilmore na Bobby McFerrin
Ọrụ egwu ọhụrụ nkè Taylor na-ahụ ya dị ka akụkụ nke Robert Glasper's new jazz fusion supergroup, 'R + R = Ugbu a', n'akụkụ Christian Scott, Terrace Martin, Derrick Hodge na Justin Tyson
Ndị otu ahụ wepụtara otu abọm, Collagically Speaking site na Blue Note Records na June 2018
A mụrụ Tayo Adenaike n'afọ 1954
O bi na Naịjirịa ugbu a, ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe na Naịjirịa
Adenaike bụ onye Idanre, Adenaike bụ onye Yoruba
N'afọ 1967, e bu ụzọ webata ya na nkuzi nke nka na Federal Government College, nke dị na Warri, na Delta Steeti ugbu a
O ritere ihe nrite nke abụọ na All Nigeria Secondary School National Art Workshop nke emere na Ahmadu Bello
Mahadum, Zaria
Ihe a rụzuru n'etiti ihe ndị ọzọ gbara Adenaike ume ka ọ gaa n'ihu na-amụ nka na Mahadum nke Nigeria, Nsukka, ya na Obiora Udechukwu
N'ebe a, ọ natara nzere bachelọ ya na Fine Arts 1979 nakwa nzere nke Masters na Fine Arts na 1982
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ na-arụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi ma bụrụ onye nhazi nka nke Dawn Functions, Ltd, nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ Naịjirịa na Enugu
Ọ na-ese ihe n'abalị na ngwụsị izu n'ihi ọrụ oge niile ya dị ka onye isi nka, ma na-eme njem kwa afọ na United States

Adenaike na-arụ ọrụ mgbe ụfọdụ na mmanụ na acrylics mana ihe kachasị amasị ya bụ agba mmiri, nke ọ na-etinye ọtụtụ atụmatụ uli na akika; n'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ malitela itinye nsibidi motifs na eserese ya
Atụmatụ ya dị mgbagwoju anya, ma na-adabere na isiokwu onwe onye; ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya bụ isiokwu na nke onwe ya
Ihu mmadụ, gbagọrọ agbagọ ma ọ bụ nọrọ n'ahụhụ, na-apụtakarị n'ọrụ ya
Ọtụtụ n'ime ihe osise ya na-enwetekwa isiokwu site na nwata Yoruba ya
Ọ na-emepụta ọrụ ndị na-enyocha ụdị Igbo na Nsukka na nghọta na-enweghị atụ

Dị ka onye na-ese ihe, Adenaike ekwuola na ọ na-ele onwe ya anya dị ka ọgbọ nke atọ na-ese ihe, onye nọchiri ndị Nsukka ibe ya bụ Uche Okeke na Chike Aniakor na ọgbọ mbụ na onye nkụzi ya Obiora Udechukwu na ọgbọ nke abụọ
Garba, Kabir Alabi
'Medley of Watercolour, Sculptural Offerings At Wheatbaker' The Guardian

Tchidi Chikere (amụrụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 10, n'afọ 1975), bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Naijiria onye bụkwa onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, onye edemede, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi vidio egwu na onye na-agụ egwu
O nwere ihe karịrị otu narị ihe nkiri na abọm egwu abụọ maka otuto ya
Chikere si Amuzi Ahiazu Mbaise na Imo Steeti
Ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ nke nne na nna ya
Ọ gụrụ asụsụ Bekee na Mahadum Calabar
Mgbe ọ nọ na Mahadum, ọ malitere ide ihe nkiri ma bụrụkwa akụkụ nke otu egwu mmadụ atọ
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị National Youth Service, ọ gara UK, ma bipụta akwụkwọ mbụ ya mgbe ọ nọ ebe ahụ
Chikere banyere n'ụzọ zuru ezu na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum
Chikere nwere ụmụ nwoke atọ ya na nwunye mbụ ya, onye na-eme ihe nkiri Sophia Tchidi Chikere
Alụmdi na nwunye ahụ kwụsịrị n'afọ 2012
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nuella Njubigbo ugbu a
Emume agbamakwụkwọ ọdịnala ahụ mere na Machị 29, 2014 n'obodo nwunye ya na Anambra Steeti na agbamakwụkwọ ọcha na Chọọchị Katọlik nke Transfiguration, VGC, Lagos Steeti na June 9, 2018
Ọ na-eduzi mkparịta ụka The Pink Room
N'afọ 2007, Chikere wepụtara abọm egwu mbụ ya, nke akpọrọ Slaps n Kisses
Ọ bụ OJB Jezreel na Marvelous Benji mepụtara abọm ahụ ma nwee atụmatụ sitere na Rita Dominic, Pat Attah, Marvelous Benji, Jimmy B na OJB Jezreel
E wepụtara abọm nke abụọ ya na UK
Ọ duziri vidiyo ahụ na egwu Kcee 'Agbomma'
Chikere enwetala ihe nrite maka nduzi ya gụnyere Africa Magic Viewers' Choice Awards
Na Africa Movie Academy Awards n'afọ 2008, o meriri Best Comedy maka Stronger Than Pain, a họpụtakwara ihe nkiri ya Beautiful Soul maka Best Screenplay
A họpụtara ya ugboro abụọ na 2012 Golden Icons Academy Movie Awards, maka Best Actor - Diaspora maka ọrụ ya na When Heaven Smiles na maka Best Male Act - Diaspora (Viewer's Choice)
A họpụtakwara ya maka Best Original Screenplay na 2013 Nollywood Movies Awards maka iduzi / imepụta Dumebi
Tea na pine nut, ma ọ bụ aha ya French bụ Thé aux pignons bụ nri ọdịnala nke Tunisia
A na-ejikarị ụdị tii maghrebi mint (ma ọ bụ tii geranium mgbe ụfọdụ n'oge oyi) eme mmemme agbamakwụkwọ, nzukọ ezinụlọ ma ọ bụ nzukọ n'etiti ndị enyi
Enwere ike iji almond ma ọ bụ ahụekere e siri esi dochie mkpụrụ osisi pine nke so ya ma mee ka ọ bụrụ ihe pụrụ iche
Enwere ike iji akwụkwọ tii na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ ( tii na-enweghị ihe na-eme ka ọ dị mma) ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ tii ojii (nke a na-akpọkwa tii ọbara ọbara na Tunisia)
A na-esi mmiri n'ime ite tii ka a na-asacha akwụkwọ tii ole na ole na mmiri ana-esi esì tupu e sie n'elu okpomọkụ dị ala na ite tii nke jupụtara na mmiri; a na-agbakwunye shuga na ya dịka achọrọ
A na ebupute tii mgbe ụtọ ịlụ ya pụtara ,mgbe ọ na-enweghị ụtọ ya
Ị nwere ike itinye akwụkwọ mint ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ geranium ma ọ bụ essence ma ọ bụrụ na ị na-eji tii ojii ma hapụ ha ka ha bara ná mmiri tupu ruo oge ụfọdụ tupu ị na-enye tii ahụ
A na-esi mkpụrụ osisi pine n'ụzọ kachasị mma n'ogo okpomọkụ ọkụ dị ala, mana enwere ike ibupute ya ejighi ihe gwa ya
A na-etinye ite tii ole na ole nke mkpụrụ osisi pine n'ime iko ọ bụla tupu a gbanye mmiri tii ọkụ
Mkpụrụ osisi pine na-ese n'elu mmiri ma ọ bụrụ na tii ahụ dị ezigbo ụtọ, ma ọ bụghị ya, ha na-anọgide na ala nke iko ahụ
E nwekwara ike inye tii na-enweghị mkpụrụ osisi pine ma a hapụ ndị ọbịa ka ha tinye mkpụrụ osisi pine ha chọrọ n'ime iko ha
Enwere ike ịṅụ tii nke mkpụrụ osisi pine dị ka n'ụtụtụ, n'ehihie ma ọ bụ n'anyasị
Tebogo Anna Mashego bụ onye ọchụnta ego South Africa na onye nrụpụta ihe, ọ bụ kwa onye so wee tọọ ntọala ma bụrụ kwa onye isi ọrụ nke Projects Proprietary Limited, ihe nrụpụta ọla na ụlọ ọrụ nrụpụta
A mụrụ Mashego na South Africa na 1982
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Sekete IV na Rustenburg, North West Province, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1998
O mechara lụọ di ma malite ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ọrụ mmadụ n'otu obodo
Na 2004, Tebogo na di ya guzobere Diep K Steel & Aluminum Proprietary Limited
Tebogo lèkọtàrà azụmaahịa ahụ nwa oge, ebe ọ ka na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ọrụ mmadụ maka ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị ime obodo
Na 2008, ọ gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọrụ ya na ime obodo iji jikwaa azụmahịa ya oge niile
N'otu afọ ahụ, di ya hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Na 2014, e megharịrị ụlọọrụ ahụ ka ọ bụrụzie Ditsogo Projects Proprietary Limited ma kwaga ụlọọrụ ahụ na mpaghara mmepụta ihe nke Rustenburg
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ nke ụmụ nwanyị nwe nakwa nke ha na-ejikwa kpam kpam
Ndị ọrụ agbakwunyere na ụdị azụmaahịa pụrụ iche a malitere mere ka e nwe mbelata pasent iri abụọ n'ego e ji ahazi ụlọọrụ ahụ

Mashego na-akwalite mmepụta ihe na-ejikọta ya na nke na-adịgide adịgide, na-ewu ụlọ mmepụta ihe nakwa nkwalite mmepụta ihe ọhụrụ ( United Nations Millennium Development Goal 9 ), na-emepụta mmepụta na oriri na-edozi ahụ ( Sustainable Development Goal 12 )
Na 2014, Forbes kpọrọ Tebogo Mashego aha n'etiti 'Ụmụ nwanyị iri abụọ kacha nta na-enwe ike n'Africa 2014'
Tebu bụ obere ezinụlọ nkè asụsụ Sahara abụọ, nkè Daza ná Teda mejupụtara
Ọ bụ ìgwè abụọ nkè ndị Toubou, Daza na Teda na-asụ yá
Á na-asụkarị Tebu ná Chad ná ndịda Libya site ná ihe dị kà mmadụ 580,000
Daza ná Teda nwèrè atụmatụ 537,000 na 42,500 ọkà okwu, n'otu n'otu

Asụsụ Tebul, nke a makwaara dị ka Tebul Ure, bụ asụsụ Dogon nke ndị Tebul U (ndị Tebul) na-asụ na Mali Roger Blench kọrọ ya nke mbụ n'okpuru aha a n'ịntanetị, onye kọrọ n'ụzọ ezighi ezi na ọ dị ka otu asụsụ a na-akpọ Oru Yille n'akwụkwọ Aha a hiere ụzọ pụtara 'okwu abụọ' n'asụsụ Tebul
Nka na
Nka na ụzụ bụ otu n'ime aka ọrụ e ji mara ndị Igbo
Eji ịhe nka na ụzụ ụfọdụ ebi obi ezi na ụlọ, ebe ụfọdụ bụ ihe achọ mma
Ịhe ndị a bụ ihe nka na ụzụ ; ikwe, okway, eku, egbe, ipi eze, ipi egbe, ọgụ , mma, ịkpụ ite ụlọ
Eji ipi egbe na ịkpụ ụzụ mara ndị Ọka na ndi Nkwere, nwere ipi eze mara ndị Umudioka
E jikwazi ịkpụ ite ụlọ marakwa ndi Igboukwu na ndị Anam
Nka na ụzụ bu okwu nke ógè ótù nké gbásárá ihe oganiru
Màkà nke á, ọ na ekwu maka ihe nílé nnọọ na okpúrù ǹkà, ihe orü, obiạ, na ihe ihe ǹkà ozor
Na nke ozor o nwèriki kwu ihe jikotari Í gi nye nzù uzor, ómúmú ihe obụla gbasárá nzù, ma ihe ȯbulà fútárá màkà nzù
Teco Benson bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Naijiria
A họpụtara ya maka onye nduzi kacha mma na Africa Movie Academy Awards n'afọ 2006 na 2008, wee merie onye nduzi nke afọ na 2011 Best of Nollywood Awards

N'afọ 2012, Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan nke Naịjirịa nyere ya onyinye dị ka onye otu Order of the Federal Republic Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na 1994 tupu ọ gbanwee mmepụta na iduzi
N'afọ 2003, o mere ihe nkiri mbụ Sierra Leone mere nke akpọrọ Blood Diamonds

Theodore Joans (4 Julaị, 1928 - 25 Eprel, 2003) bụ onye Amerịka na-ede abụ jazz, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-akpọ opi, na onye na-ese ihe, onye site na 1960s nọrọ oge na-eme njem na mba Europe na Africa
Ọrụ ya na-eguzo n'etiti ọtụtụ iyi na-aga n'ihu ma ụfọdụ ahụla n'ime ya ihe na-ebute okwu ọnụ nke mmegharị okwu
Otú ọ dị, ọ katọrọ akụkụ asọmpi nke uri 'slam'

A maara Joans maka ụkpụrụ nduzi ya 'Jazz bụ okpukpere chi m, na Surrealism bụ echiche m' Ọ bụ onye dere ihe karịrị akwụkwọ iri atọ nke abụ, prose, na collage, n'etiti ha Black Pow-Wow, Beat Funky Jazz Poems, Afrodisia, Jazz is Our Religion, Double Trouble, WOW na Teducation
A mụrụ Joans na Cairo, Illinois, dị ka Theodore Jones
Nne na nna ya na-arụ ọrụ n'ụgbọ mmiri ndị na-agafe osimiri Ohio na Mississippi
Ọ na-akpọ opi ma bụrụ onye na-anụ ọkụ n'obi jazz aficionado, na-eso Bop ka ọ na-etolite, ma nọgide na-akwado jazz nke ụdị na oge niile n'oge ndụ ya niile
O tolitere na Fort Wayne, Indiana, na Louisville, Kentucky, ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta na nka na Mahadum Indiana, tupu ọ kwaga n'afọ 1951 na obodo New York
Na ọbọdọ New York, o sere n'ụdị ọ kpọrọ Jazz Action ma gụọ uri ya, na-emepe ụdị okwu ọnụ nke a na-akpọ abụ Jazz
Ọ bụ onye sonyere na Beat Generation na Greenwich Village
Ọ bụ onye dịkọrọ ndụ na enyi Jack Kerouac na Allen Ginsberg, Leroi Jones (nke e mechara mara dị ka Amiri Baraka), Gregory Corso, Diane Di Prima, Bob Kaufman, Lawrence Ferlinghetti na ndị ọzọ
Joans na nnukwu onye egwu jazz bụ Charlie Parker nwere ọnụ ụlọ ruo oge ụfọdụ
Fred McDarrah na Weegee sere bọọlụ ejiji bohemian nke Joans na nnọkọ mgbazinye
Joans tinyekwara aka nke ukwuu na Surrealism, na-ezute Joseph Cornell, ma na mbụ ya na dike nwata ya bụ Salvador Dalí nso, mgbe ahụ n'oge na-adịghị anya ya na ya gbawara
Na Paris, a nabatara Joans na otu André Breton
Joans bụ onye Afrịka maara ihe ma na-eme njem dị ukwuu na kọntinent ahụ, na-ejikarị ụkwụ, n'ime ọtụtụ iri afọ n'etiti oge na Europe na North America, na-ahọrọ ibi ndụ na-arịwanye elu

Dị ka onye nkwusa John Calder kwuru, 'Joans gbanwere onwe ya na ụdị ndụ nke ndị na-ese ihe na Harlem na Greenwich Village, London nke afọ 1950s na 60s, Paris nke afọ mgbe60s ruo 90s, yana nke obodo ndị ọzọ dị na Europe na Timbuktu, na Mali, ebe ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ oge oyi
' Site n'afọ 1960 gaa n'ihu, Joans nwere ụlọ na Tangier, Morocco, wee na Timbuktu
Mgbe ọ kwụsịrị ịkpọ opi, ọ nọgidere na-enwe mmetụta jazz n'ịgụ uri ya ma soro ndị egwu na-arụkọ ọrụ ugboro ugboro

Ọ gara n'ihu na-eme njem ma na-enwe akwụkwọ ozi na ọtụtụ ndị na-emepụta ihe, n'etiti ha bụ Langston Hughes, Michel Leiris, Aimé Césaire, Robert Creeley, Jayne Cortez, Stokely Carmichael, Ishmael Reed na Paul Bowles, Franklin na Penelope Rosemont; ọtụtụ n'ime akwụkwọ ozi ndị a na-anakọta na ọbá akwụkwọ nke Bancroft nke Mahadum California Berkeley
Mahadum Delaware nwere akwụkwọ ozi ya na Charles Henri Ford
Joans bụkwa onye na-ede akwụkwọ / onye sonyere na Chicago Surrealist Group
Ihe osise Joans bụ Bird Lives kwụ na De Young Museum na San Francisco
Ọ bụkwa onye malitere akụkọ 'Bird Lives' na graffiti na New York City mgbe Charlie Parker nwụsịrị na Machị 1955
Joans visual art work spans collages, assemblage objects, paintings and drawings including many resulting from the collaborative surrealist game Cadavre Exquis
Rhinoceros bụ isiokwu a na-ahụkarị na ọrụ ya na mgbasa ozi niile
O mekwara obere ihe nkiri Super 8
N'oge mmalite afọ 1980 Joans bụ onye edemede bi na Berlin, Germany, n'okpuru nkwado nke usoro DAAD (Deutsche Akademische Austauschdienst)
Ọ bụ onye na-enye aka na edemede jazz na nyocha na magazin dịka Coda na Jazz Magazine
Ihe odide akụkọ ndụ ya 'Je Me Vois' pụtara na Contemporary Authors Autobiographical Series, Mpịakọta nke iri abuo na ise, nke Gale Research bipụtara

E tinyela ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ anthologies, gụnyere The Poetry of the Negro, 1746–1970 (1970), nke Langston Hughes na Arna Bontemps (1970), A Broadside Treasury, nke Gwendolyn Brooks (1971), na For Malcolm, nke Dudley Randall na Margaret Taylor Goss Burroughs (1973)
Na ngwụsị afọ 1990 Joans kwagara Seattle ma biri n'ebe ahụ na Vancouver, n'etiti njem, ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Ọ bụ onye natara Ihe nrite Akwụkwọ nke Amerika Ihe nrite Mmeri Ndụ n'afọ 2001, site n'aka ntọala tụpụ Columbus
Ted Joans nwụrụ na Vancouver, British Columbia, n'ihi nsogbu ọrịa shuga
O nwere ụmụ iri ma gụọ otu n'ime ụmụ ya nwanyị Daline, n'aha Salvador Dalí

Thaddeus Shearer (1 Nọvemba, 1919 - 26 Disemba, 1992) bụ onye nduzi mgbasa ozi mgbasa ozi nke Afrịka na Amerịka na onye na-ese as ihe osise nke 1970–1986 Quincy bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ na-atọ ọchị na-eme ka onye Afrịka na-edu ndú
A mụrụ Shearer na May Pen, Jamaica, nne na nna ya bụ Samuel na Sophie (née Parnell), ma a zụlitere ya site na nwata na mpaghara Harlem nke Manhattan, New York City
Site na nwata, ọchịchọ ya bụ imepụta ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị
Mgbe ọ na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ DeWitt Clinton High School, ọ zutere onye na-ese ihe osise nke Africa na America bụ E
Simms Campbell, onye ghọrọ onye ndụmọdụ ya
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, Shearer rere eserese mbụ ya, nye akwụkwọ akụkọ New York Amsterdam News
Site na 1938 ruo 1940, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'abalị na Art Students League, na agụmakwụkwọ

N'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, Shearer jere ozi na ngalaba 92nd Infantry nke ndị agha United States, ruo ọkwa nke sajenti, ma nweta Bronze Star maka ọnọdụ ya dị ka onye nduzi nka maka magazin ngalaba ahụ, The Buffalo O nyere ihe atụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị agha a kpọrọ 'Stars and Stripes' ma nye aka na-akụkọ ọchị banyere ndụ ndị agha na ọrụ nchịkọta akwụkwọ akụkọ Continental Features Mgbe agha ahụ gasịrị, ọ malitere ime ihe osise maka magazin nke gụnyere The Ladies 'Home Journal na The Saturday Evening Post, yana Our World na Collier's, na akwụkwọ akụkọ gụnyere New York Herald Tribune Site na 1946 ruo 1947, ọ gụrụ nka na Pratt Institute

Site na Continental Features, Shearer jikọtara ihe nkiri mkpa ọchị abụọ, Around Harlem, banyere ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma na ndị na-eto eto na agbata obi Manhattan ahụ, na ihe nkiri gbasara ezinụlọ a kpọrọ Next Door
Mgbe a kwụsịrị ihe nkiri ndị ahụ n'afọ ndị 1950, Shearer sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke New York City BBDO, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nka ruo afọ iri na ise, na-emeri ihe nrite ise
N'oge a, ọ rere otu katụụn na King Features Syndicate's Laff-a-Day feature

Mgbe ya na onye na-ese ihe na King Features bụ Bill Gilmartin, onye Shearer gosipụtara ụfọdụ ọrụ ya ma chọpụta na e bipụtara katụụn ya na nnukwu magazin, Gilmartin nwere ezi mmasị nke mere ka ọrụ Shearer pụta ìhè na syndicate
Site na King Features, Shearer malitere ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị Quincy, nke gosipụtara nwa nwoke ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị nke Africa na America nke nne nne ya zụlitere na Harlem
Ọ malitere na June 13 ma ọ bụ June 17, 1970 (akụkọ dị iche)
Mgbe ọ malitere ihe nkiri ahụ, Shearer hapụrụ BBDO
Onye ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme nke katọn bụ Bill Crouch, Jr

dere na Shearerna-eji Quincy mee ka ọ bụrụ onye na-enwe nchekwube na nke na-ewuli elu, na-enwe echiche anwụ na-acha na enyi kacha mma na-acha ọcha [bụ onye] bụ parody nke cliche, 'Ụfọdụ ezigbo ndị enyi m bụ ndị ojii'
A gọziri Quincy site na ihe osise siri ike na iji ziptone mee ihe
N'anya, ọ mapụrụ na ibe na onye na-agụ ya
N'ime afọ iri na isii ya na syndication, Quincy, yana Morrie Turner's Wee Pals na Brumsic Brandon Jr's Luther, meghere ụzọ maka ọgbọ dị ugbu a nke ndị na-ese foto nke Africa-American nke ọma
Onye ọzọ na-akọ akụkọ mkpa ọchị, Don Markstein, kwuru na ihe nkiri ahụ 'ọ bụghị nkwusa, ụzọ ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke ụdị a na-eyikarị omume ọma ha na aka ha
Ihe odide Shearer bụ ndị na-ahụ anya na-adịghị ahụkebe na ndụ yana ụdị akpụkpọ ahụ, ma na-esitekarị n'eziokwu ahụ, mana ha abụghị ndị na-akwado mgbanwe
Ọtụtụ mgbe, ha bụ naanị ụyọkọ ụmụaka na-emekọ ihe ọnụ ma ghara ichebara agbụrụ ha echiche

Ya na nwa ya nwoke na-ese foto bụ John Shearer dị ka onye edemede, Ted Shearer gosipụtara usoro akwụkwọ Billy Jo Jive, nke ghọrọ ntọala maka akụkụ ndị na-akpali akpali na mmemme agụmakwụkwọ ụmụaka PBS Sesame Street, na maka ihe nkiri, Billy Jo Jive Super Private Eye, nke Shearer Visuals mepụtara na 1979
N'oge ndụ ya, Shearer gosipụtara dị ka onye na-ese ihe n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi
N'afọ 1945, Shearer lụrụ Phyllis Wildman, onye ọka iwu na, onye mechara bụrụ osote kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Westchester County, New York
Di na nwunye a nwere nwa nwoke, John Shearer (onye ga-agakwa n'ihu ịghọ onye na-ese foto), na nwa nwanyị, Kathleen
Shearer bụ onye guzobere otu ndị ọkachamara nke Africa na America bụ Westchester Clubmen, ma bụrụ onye otu National Cartoonists Society na Society of Professional Journalists
Shearer, onye bi na Pound Ridge, New York, nwụrụ n'ihi oria nkụchi obi na Northern Westchester Hospital na Mount Kisco, New York
Dị ka onye na-ese onyinyo; akwụkwọ isi ụmụaka nke John Shearer dere
Theodore Richard White (March 25, 1931 October 26, 2020) bụ ónyé ọchụnta ego America, ónyé na-ede egwu, ónyé na'emepụta egwu na ónyé si Detroit, Michigan
White bụ onye njikwa na di mbụ nke ónyé na-agụ egwu mkpụrụ obi Aretha Franklin
Dị ka ónyé na-ede egwu, White dere ma ọ bụ soro dee egwu màkà Franklin, gụnyere 'I Wonder (Where You Are Tonight)', 'Lee Cross', 'Dr
Feelgood', na 'Think'
A mụrụ White na Detroit, Michigan, na Machị 25, 1931
A kọwara ya na 1968 dị ka onye na-ere ahịa na ụlọ Detroit na onye na-azụ ahịa
O nwèrè ọtụtụ jukeboxes
White kọwara onwe ya dị ka ónyé na-akwalite sandlot tupu ọ weghara ọrụ nke ónyé na-agụ egwu Aretha Franklin na 1961
Ónyé na-agụ egwu Della Reese mere ka Franklin márá White na Twenty Grand Club na Detroit
Mgbe izu ole na ole nke mkpakọrịta nwoke na nwanyị gasịrị, ónyé ikpe nke udo lụrụ ha mgbè ha na-eme njem Ohio na 1961, mgbe Franklin dị afọ 18 na White dị afọ 30
Nna Franklin, CL
Franklin, megidere njikọ ahụ
Onye na-emepụta Motown bụ Harvey Fuqua kọwara White dị ka ónyé na-ere ahịa
White nwụrụ na October 26, 2020 na Detroit, Michigan, afọ 89
Malcolm Barrett gosipụtara White na ógè nke atọ nkè usoro anthology, Genius, na Marlon Wayans na 2021 Aretha Franklin biopic, Respect
Asụsụ Teda, nkè á makwaara dị kà Tedaga, bụ asụsụ Nilo-Sahara nkè Teda, otú ndị Toubou bị n'ebe ùgwù nkè ndị bị ná ndịda Libya, n'ebe ndịda Chad ná n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Niger na-asụ
Tinyere asụsụ ndịda Daza, asụsụ Teda nkè ùgwù mejupụtara otú n'ime ụdị abụọ nkè Tebu
Otú ọ dị, á na-ejikwa Teda mee ìhè mgbè ụfọdụ màkà Tebu n'ozuzu
Àtụ Languages of LibyaÀtụ Languages of Chad
Teddy Nambooze bụ onye na-ahụ maka ego na Uganda na onye omeiwu
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka nwanyị a họpụtara dị ka onye omeiwu maka mpaghara Mpigi na omeiwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda
Na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ nwere njikọ na National Unity Platform (NUP) n'okpuru tiketi ya ọ gbara ọsọ ma merie na ntuli aka nke 2021
A mụrụ Nambooze na Ggoli, obodo dị na mpaghara Kammengo n'okporo ụzọ Kampala-Masaka na mpaghara Mpigi
Ọ gara St
Bruno Secondary School Ggoli na mpaghara Kammengo maka agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Nambooze gụrụ nzere bachelọ na Business Administration na Mahadum Nkumba, Entebbe, na Uganda n'afọ 2002

Nambooze rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ntinye data na Ministry of Education tupu ọ banye na ọrụ agụụ na mpaghara Kalamba na mpaghara Butamabala, e bu n'uche ịkụziri ụmụ nwanyị nọ n'ógbè ahụ nkà ego iji belata ịda ogbenye
Ọrụ ahụ guzobere SACCO ma n'ihi ọrụ ike ya, a họpụtara Nambooze dịka onye njikwa SACCO
N'afọ 2011, Nambooze malitere ụlọ akụ na aha Trust Development Initiative (TRUDI) ebe ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka onye nduzi
N'afọ 2016, ọ sonyeere n'ọkwa nwanyị MP nke Mpigi mana ọ dị mwute ikwu na nsonaazụ ya adịghị ya mma
N'afọ 2021, Nambooze laghachiri ịsọ mpi n'otu ọnọdụ ahụ ma n'oge a ọ bụ onye mmeri
Ọ bụ onye omeiwu ugbu a na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda na-eje ozi dị ka nwanyị so na Nzukọ ndị Omeiwu a họpụtara maka mpaghara Mpigi
Mtendere Mandowa, ónyé a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu bụ Teebs, bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na onye na-ese ihe nkiri si Los Angeles, California
Ọ bụ ónyé otu My Hollow Drum
Ọ bụkwa otu ọkara nke duo Sons of the Morning
A mụrụ ya na Bronx, nné na nnà si Malawi na Barbados zụlitere Mandowa
Teebs wepụtara abọm mbụ ya, Ardour, na Brainfeeder na 2010
LA Weekly kpọrọ ya 'otu n'ime abọm kachasị mma na nke kachasị mmá n'afọ'
Ọ sochiri album nchịkọta, Collections 01, wepụtara na Brainfeeder na 2011
N'afọ 2013, Sons of the Morning, ọrụ ya na Prefuse irí asaá na atọ, wepụtara EP mbụ, Speak Soon Volume One, na Yellow Year Records
N'afọ 2014, Teebs wepụtara abọm studio nké abụọ ya, Estara, na Brainfeeder
A na-akpọ ụdị Teebs 'egwú na-akụ', ụdị nké na-agụnye ndekọ, ịhazi, ịgbanwe na ịhazi ọtụtụ ụda gụnyere ụbọ akwara, ndị na-eme mkpọtụ, ịgbà na ọbụna ịkpụ teepu
Tega Tosin Richard (amụrụ na 13 Novemba 1992) bụ nwaanyị na-eme egwuregwu igba-mgba
O sonyere n'egwuregwu Commonwealth na 2010 ma nweta ọla nchara na mmemme nke nwanyi nke 59kg freestyle
O nwetakwara ihe nrite ọla ọcha na mmemme nke ụmụ nwanyị 63kg freestyle na egwuregwu mgba nke asọmpi Afrika na 2010
Tegla Chepkite Loroupe bụ onye (amụrụ na ụbọchị itoolu n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1973) bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge na ụzọ
Ọ bụkwa ọnụ na-ekwuchitere ụwa maka udo, ikike ụmụ nwanyị na agụmakwụkwọ
Loroupe nwere ihe ndekọ ụwa maka kilomita iri abụọ na ise na iri atọ ma nwee ihe ndekọ marathon ụwa n'oge gara aga
Ọ bụ nwanyị Afrịka mbụ nwere Marathon World Record, nke o mere site na ụbọchị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1998 ruo ụbọchị iri atọ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2001
Ọ bụ onye mmeri World Half-Marathon ugboro atọ
Loroupe bụkwa nwanyị mbụ si Africa meriri na New York City Marathon, nke ọ meriri ugboro abụọ
O meriri marathons na London, Rotterdam, Hong Kong, Berlin na Rome
N'afọ 2016, ọ bụ onye na-ahazi ndị otu ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ maka 2016 Summer Olympics na Rio
A mụrụ Tegla Loroupe n'obodo Kapsait na mpaghara Lelan nke West Pokot District
Ọ dị na Rift Valley, ihe dịka kilomita 600 n'ebe ugwu Nairobi
Nna ya na nne ya sitere n'ebo Pokot, agbụrụ Nilotic bi n'akụkụ ugwu Kenya, ọwụwa anyanwụ Uganda na ndịda Etiopia
Nna Loroupe gwara ya na ọ baghị uru na ọrụ ya nwere ike ịbụ ilekọta ụmụaka
Ọ tolitere na ụmụnne iri abụọ na anọ
Ebe ọ bụ na ndị Pokots bụ omenala ịlụ karịa otu nwanyị, nna ya nwere ndị nwunye anọ
Ọ nọrọ n'ọhịa na-arụ ọrụ n'oge ọ bụ nwata, na-elekọta ehi ma na-elekọta ụmụnne nwoke na ụmụnne nwanyị ndị obere
Mgbe ọ dị afọ isii, Loroupe malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ Kapsait Elementary; ọ ga-agba ọsọ kilomita iri na-aga ma na-esi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ kwa ụtụtụ
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ matara ikike ya dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu mgbe ọ meriri agbụrụ ndị e mere ihe karịrị mita 800 ma ọ bụ 1500 megide ụmụ akwụkwọ ndị okenye
O kpebiri ịchụso ọrụ dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ
Otú ọ dị, ma e wezụga nne ya, ọ dịghị onye kwadoro ya
Òtù egwuregwu Kenya, Athletics Kenya, akwadoghị ya na mbụ, na-eche na Loroupe pere mpe ma dị gịrịgịrị
Otú ọ dị, mgbe ọ meriri asọmpi ịgba ụkwụ na-enweghị ụkwụ na 1988, nke a gbanwere
Ọ malitere ọzụzụ iji sọọ mpi mba ụwa n'afọ sochirinụ, nweta akpụkpọ ụkwụ mbụ ya na 1989, nke ọ na-eyi naanị maka agbụrụ siri ike
A họpụtara ya maka asọmpi nke 1989 IAAF World Cross Country Championships na-emecha nke iri abụọ na asatọ
O sonyere ọzọ na 1990 IAAF World Cross Country Championships, na-emecha nke iri na isii na asọmpi ndị na-eto eto
N'afọ 1994 na 1998, Loroupe meriri Goodwill Games n'elu mita 10,000, ụkwụ ọtọ
N'otu oge ahụ, o ritere ọla nchara na World Athletics Championships na 1995 na 1999
N'afọ 1994, Loroupe gbara ọsọ marathon mbụ ya na New York
N'ịgba ọsọ megide asọmpi kachasị ike n'ụwa, ọ meriri
N'ihi ya, ọtụtụ ndị na-eto eto nọ n'Afrịka na-efe ya ofufe n'ikpeazụ, nwanyị mmeri iji gbakwunye ọtụtụ ndị na'asọmpi nwoke na-aga nke ọma
Ọ meriri na New York City Marathon ọzọ na 1995 wee bụrụ onye nke atọ na 1998
N'agbata afọ 1997 na afọ 1999, ọ meriri n'asọmpi ụwa atọ n'usoro n'ime ọkara marathon
O meriri Rotterdam Marathon ugboro atọ n'agbata afọ 1997 na 1999
O meriri Berlin Marathon na 1999 wee bụrụ onye nke abụọ n'afọ 2001
Ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na 1999 Osaka International Ladies Marathon
Loroupe meriri asọmpi Zevenheuvelenloop 15K na Netherlands ugboro atọ (1992, 1993 na 1998)
Ọ bụ onye mmeri Egmond Half Marathon ugboro asaa (1993[[1998, 2000)
O meriri na Lisbon Half Marathon ugboro isii 1994 na 1997, 1999 na 2000
O meriri n'ọsọ ụzọ Tilburg, ugboro ise (1993, 1994, 1996, 1998, 1999), bụkwa nọmba ndekọ
O meriri Paris Half Marathon na 1994 na 1998, City-Pier-City Loop half marathon na Hague na 1998, na Parelloop 10K na asọmpi na Netherlands na 1999
N'oge 2000 Summer Olympics na Sydney, ọ kwadoro iji merie ma marathon na mita 10,000, ọ tara ahụhụ site na nsị nri n'abalị tupu asọmpi ahụ

Ka o sina dị, ọ lụrụ ọgụ n'ọsọ marathon, mechie nke iri na atọ, mgbe ahụ, n'echi ya, ọ gbara mita 10,000, mechie ya nke ise, na-agba ọsọ ụkwụ ọtọ na agbụrụ abụọ ahụ, ihe ọ mechara kwuo na ọ nwetara site na mmetụta nke ọrụ nye ndị niile na-ewere ya dị ka onye na-ebu olileanya na mba ya
Ruo na ngwụcha afọ 2001, ọ nọgidere na-arịa nsogbu ahụike dị iche iche
N'afọ 2000, ọ meriri London Marathon na Rome City Marathon
O nwetakwara mmeri na Lausanne Marathon na 2002, Cologne Marathon na 2003 na Leipzig Marathon na 2004
Loroupe sonyere na asọmpi marathon nke 2005 World Championships na Helsinki, Finland, mana ọ bụ naanị nke iri anọ
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2006, ọ meriri Hong Kong Half-Marathon
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ mechara nke ise na Rotterdam Marathon na nke abụọ na Venice Marathon
N'afọ 2007, ọ sonyere ọzọ na New York City Marathon, na-emecha nke asatọ
Nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma Loroupe gụnyere ihe ndekọ ụwa karịa kilomita 20, 25 na 30 yana ihe ndekọ gara aga n'elu ọsọ marathon
Ọ na-ejikarị otu awa na-agba ọsọ World record nke 18,340 m setịpụrụ na Borgholzhausen, Germany, mana Dire Tune nke Ethiopia mebiri ndekọ ahụ afọ iri ka e mesịrị, na 2008 (ihe ndekọ ọhụrụ 18,517 m)

N'afọ 2006, odeakwụkwọ ukwu Kofi Annan kpọrọ ya onye nnọchi anya egwuregwu nke United Nations, ya na Roger Federer, onye mmeri tennis si Switzerland, Elias Figueroa, onye ama ama na bọọlụ Latin America si Chile, na Katrina Webb onye nwetara ọla edo na Paralympics si Australia
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya egwuregwu mba ụwa maka IAAF, International Association of Athletics Federations, na UNICEF
N'afọ 2003, Loroupe mepụtara usoro Peace Marathons kwa afọ nke Tegla Loroupe Peace Foundation 'Peace Through Sports' kwadoro

Ndị isi ala, ndị praịm minista, ndị nnọchi anya na ndị ọrụ gọọmentị na-agba ọsọ na ndị agha na ndị na-akwagharị akwagharị na Kenya, na Uganda na Sudan, iji weta udo n'ógbè a na-emetụta site na ịwakpo ndị agha site n'agbụrụ ndị na-alụ ọgụ
N'afọ 2010, Gọọmentị Kenya toro ihe ọ rụzuru dịka ọtụtụ narị ndị agha debere ngwá agha ha
O guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ (Tegla Loroupe Peace Academy) na ogige ụmụ mgbei maka ụmụaka si n'ógbè Kapenguria, obodo dị elu n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Kenya
E mere 2006 Peace Marathon na 18 Nọvemba 2006, na Kapenguria, Kenya
Puku ndị agha abụọ sitere n'ebo isii na-asọ mpi
Peace Marathon ọzọ bụ na ụbọchị iri na ise n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2008 na Kapenguria, Kenya
A na-atụ anya ọtụtụ ndị nnọchi anya na Kenya, tinyere Praịm Minista, na ọtụtụ ndị Minista Kenya, Tanzania, na Uganda
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2007, a kpọrọ ya onye nnọchi anya Oxfam nke egwuregwu na udo na Darfur
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2006, ya na George Clooney, Joey Cheek, na Don Cheadle gara Beijing, Cairo, na New York na ọrụ nnọchiteanya iji kwụsị ime ihe ike na Darfur
O meriri na 'Community Hero' category na 2007 Kenyan Sports Personality of the Year awards
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2009, Tegla nọchitere anya ndị otu Shoe4Africa
na-agba ọsọ New York Marathon n'akụkụ onye guzobere Toby Tanser na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Sarah Jones na-agwụ na 3 54 02
Loroupe bụ onye otu 'Champions for Peace' club, otu ndị egwuregwu 54 a ma ama na-agba mbọ ije ozi udo n'ụwa site na egwuregwu, nke Peace and Sport, otu mba ụwa dị na Monaco, mepụtara

Dị ka ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Olympic Around the Rings kọrọ, IOC kwetara ụmụ nwanyị isii, ise sitere na kọntinent ọ bụla na otu na-anọchite anya ụwa, maka ihe ha rụzuru na ọrụ ha iji kwalite egwuregwu ụmụ nwanyị
E nyere Loroupe ihe nrite ụwa
N'afọ 2016, ọ bụ Chef de Mission na-ahazi ndị otu ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ maka 2016 Summer Olympics
N'egwuregwu ndị ahụ, a kpọbatara Loroupe n'ime ndị Olympians maka ọrụ ndụ maka ọrụ ya n'ịkwalite udo
N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2016, e nyere Loroupe onyinye United Nations Person of the Year
Ụlọ Teita Sisal bụ otu n'ime ala sisal kasị ukwuu n'ụwa, yana nke kachasị na East Africa
Ọ dị na Taita-Taveta County nke Kenya, na ógbè Coast mbụ, na nso obodo Mwate
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na-eto eto sisal na n'ichepụta ngwaahịa sisal dị ka eriri, akpa na baling twine, n'ụlọ ọrụ ya na Nairobi
Tejumade Alakija (17 Mee 1925 Ọgọstụ, 2013) bụ onye ọrụ gọọmentị Naịjịrịa nke ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ bụ onyeisi ọrụ gọọmentị nke steeti Oyo
A mụrụ Princess Alakija Tejumade na 17, Mee 1925 na Ile-Ife, Oyo State, South-westhern akụkụ nke Nigeria
Alakija Tejumade chọrọ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na etiti Aiyetoro, Ile-Ife
Nna ya bụ Sir Adesoji Aderemi, onye bụ Ooni nke Ife
Ọ zụrụ ịbụ onye nkuzi ma gafee PGCE ya na Mahadum Oxford na 1950 ruọ1951
Ọ sonyeere ndị ọrụ gọọmentị Naijiria ebe a gwara ya ka ọ kụzie
Dị ka onye nkuzi Ọ malitere ọrụ nkuzi ya na Queen's School, Ede, Osun State, ma mesịa kwaga na Government Girls' Secondary Grammar School site na 1951 ruo 1953
N'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi, o guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ akpọrọ Girls' Secondary Grammar School na 1953
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Ministry of Works na Ministry of Trade and Industries dị ka osote odeakwụkwọ má họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ọzụzụ nke mpaghara ahụ na odeakwụkwọ nke ụfọdụ ọrụ dị mkpa
Site na 1960 ruo 1964, ma mesịa, ọ ghọrọ Chief Investment Officer na Ministry of Trade and Industries na-ahụ maka mmepụta site na 1969 ruọ1972

Alakija Tejumade rụkwara ọrụ na ụfọdụ ozi dị mkpa, dị ka Ministry of Health dị ka Deputịị Permanent Secretary na 1978, nakwa na Ministry of Education dị ka Permanent Secretary in 1979, tupu ọ bụrụ onye isi ọrụ gọọmentị na Oyo State
Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi ọrụ gọọmentị nke Oyo State
Site na 1993 ruo 1997, ọ bụ Pro-Chancellor nke Mahadụm Abuja
Princess Alakija nwụru na University College Hospital, Ibadan na 2013
Tejumola Olaniyan (Eprel 3, 1959 - Nọvemba 30, 2019) bụ onye ejiri agụmakwụkwọ ndị ọkachamara wee mara n'obodo Naijiria
Ọ bụ Louise Durham Mead Prọfesọ nke English na African Cultural Studies, na Wole Soyinka Prọfesọ nke Humanities na Mahadum Wisconsin – Madison
Olaniyan nwere ihe dị ka ọrụ 35 n'ime akwụkwọ 100, na ha niile n'otu asụsụ
Ọ nwụrụ na Nọvemba 30, 2019
Olaniyan nwetara nzere bachelọ na mahadum Ife dị na Naịjirịa n'afọ 1982
Afọ atọ ka e mesịrị, ọ nwetara nzere Master of Arts n'ebe ahụ
Olaniyan gara Mahadum Cornell ebe ọ nwetara MA (1989) na PhD (1991)
Sandra Smith Isidore, onye bụbu onye òtù Black Panther Party, ghọrọ onye ndụmọdụ Olaniyan ma mee ka ọ mara akụkọ ihe mere eme, echiche, na àgwà nke Civil Rights Movement

Ihe kacha amasị Olaniyan bụ Africa na ndị ọbịa ya ; African-American, Caribbean, na African akwụkwọ ; nkatọ, ọmụmụ ihe gbasara omenala, akụkọ ihe mere eme, tiori na sociology nke ihe nkiri ; na omenala pop (nkà, egwu, na ije)

Ọrụ ya gụnyere ijide egwu ! Fela na Art Rebel Art and Politics (2004, 2009; họpụtara maka nyocha kacha mma na egwu ụwa site na Association for Recorded Sound Collections na 2005) na Scars of Conquest/ Masks of Resistance The Invention of Cultural Ihe ngosi dị na ihe nkiri Africa, African American na Caribbean (1995)

Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke African Literature Anthology of Criticism and Theory (2007, na Ato Quayson), African Drama and Performance (2004, ya na John Conteh-Morgan), na African Diaspora na Disciplines (2010, na James H
Ụtọ)
Olaniyan mere ụzọ dị iche iche, nke na-enye ohere ka ndị ọzọ nweta echiche ọhụrụ

O kwuru, sị, 'Mmasị miri emi bụ nkuzi transdisciplinary na nyocha; ihe mgbaru ọsọ m bụ ịzụlite echiche onwe onye dị oke egwu banyere okwu anyị na ọtụtụ ọnọdụ ha' [ <span title='The text near this tag needs a citation
(January 2017)'>Nke a chọrọ nkọwapụta ]
Olaniyan lekwasịrị anya na steeti Africa mgbe ọchịchị mechara
N'ime nchọpụta a, Olaniyan nyochara omenala pop ka ọ na-agbalị igosi akụkụ omenala 'ọkachamara' steeti
Nnyocha ya gụnyere egwu, ụkpụrụ ụlọ, akwụkwọ na eserese ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ịghọta ka Steeti siri metụta omume ndị a na-enyere aka n'ịdepụta akụkọ ndụ omenala nke Steeti Afrịka mgbe ọchịchị gachara
Ihe mgbaru ọsọ ya ka ukwuu bụ iji dozie nsogbu mmekọrịta ọha na eze site n'ịghọtawanye nghọta
'Ulift the Race' bụ nlele miri emi na fim ndị dị ka ịbịa America ma mee ihe ziri ezi
Isiokwu a na-atụle echiche a nke 'ịkwalite agbụrụ ahụ elu' na otú e si egosipụta nke a na fim
Olaniyan kwuziri okwu sitere na Michael Foucault nke na-akọwa ọnọdụ Murphy na-ekwu maka ya n'okwu ya
Olaniyan hotara Paul Rabinow site na 'Nnochite anya bụ Eziokwu Ọha Modernity and Post modernity in Anthropology' na ike nke nnọchite anya
Olaniyan na-ekwu na Rabinow na-ekwu 'Iji na-achịkwa (ụzọ nke) nnọchiteanya bụ ya mere, ịnọ n'ọnọdụ ike ya bụ, na-achịkwa mmepụta, nkwalite na mgbasa ozi nke isiokwu'
Olaniyan hụrụ na ọ masịrị ya na n'echiche ndị mmadụ, ihe nkiri abụọ ahụ dara nke ahụ
Ọ na-eche n' obi ya ka esi bịa America 'ndị ọzọ' ndị Africa
Nke mbụ, ọ na-atụle otú oke ọhịa na ihe nkiri ụlọ si akwado echiche a dị egwu nke Africa
Ọ na-atụ aro na ihe nkiri a na-egosi echiche Hollywood banyere omenala 'mmepeanya' nke Africa
Ọ na-atụta aro gbasara ọrụ nke ụmụnwanyị nwere isi ojii, na-ekwu na ha bụ 'ihe ngosi'
Ọ tụlekwara ka ịbịaru America si eme ka omenaala Africa kwụsị n'otu akụkụ 'otu akụkụ' ebe Do the Right Thing na-enye ndị na-ege ya ntị echiche na-atụghị anya ya na enweghị ngọpụ
Lee na-egosiputa mkpụrụedemede akụkụ atọ
N'ikpeazụ, Lee daa n'ihi na ọ tụfuru ebumnuche nke 'ebuli agbụrụ ahụ elu'
Olanyian kwuru na ha abụọ dara n'ihi na ha nọchiri anya ụmụnwaanyị
O chere na ha abụọ ahụghị njikọ dị n'etiti okike na agbụrụ, ya mere ọ bụghị ịkwalite agbụrụ ahụ
Ahịa Tejuosho bụ ahịa ọgbara ọhụrụ nke dị n'okporo ụzọ Ojuelegba-Itire na Yaba, Lagos, Lagos State, Nigeria

Ahịa nke kewara n'ime akụkụ abụọ (Nkebi nke Mbụ na Nkebi nke Abụọ) nwere ihe dị ka ụlọ ahịa 2,383 na-ekpochi n'ime ụlọ nwere okpukpu anọ na ihe dị ka 1,251 K-clamps, oghere ụlọ akụ, oghere nri 14, ọkụ latrik asatọ, ihe abụọ na-ebuli elu na-ejikọta okpukpu anọ, ebe 600 na-adọ ụgbọala na ihe ndị dị mkpa dị ka ọkụ na-akwụsi ike, ụlọ ọkụ, ebule abụọ iji nyere ndị nwere nsogbu ahụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ

Afọ ole na ole mgbe ọkụ gbara nke bibiri ọtụtụ akụkụ nke ahịa ahụ, Gọọmentị Lagos State, Stormberg Engineering Limited, na First Bank of Nigeria na mmekọrịta ọha na eze na nke onwe wughachiri ahịa ahụ ka ọ bụrụ nnukwu ụlọ ahịa dị ka akụkụ nke atụmatụ iji gbanwee Lagos ka ọ bụrụ 'Mega City'
Ahịa Tejuosho bụ ahịa dị n'etiti ebe a na-ere ngwaahịa na ọnụahịa dị ala
Ịrị elu na ọnụahịa nke ụlọ ahịa mgbe e wughachiri ahịa ahụ ahapụla ndị ọrụ na-enweta ego dị ala na-akatọ gọọmentị steeti maka itinye aka na ngalaba onwe ya n'ime iwughachi ahịa ahụ
Tekiath Ben Yessouf (amụrụ ya na 13 Septemba 1991) bụ onye Niger na-asọmpi taekwondo
Ọ nọchitere anya Niger na Summer Olympics nke afọ 2020 nke emere na Tokyo, Japan
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na 2017 World Taekwondo Championships nke emere na Muju, South Korea
E wepụrụ ya na egwuregwu nke abụọ ya
Na 2018 African Taekwondo Championships nke emere na Agadir, Morocco, ọ meriri ọlaọcha na ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị 57 kilogram
N'afọ 2019, o sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na 2019 World Taekwondo Championships n'enwetaghị ihe nrite obula
N'ọnwa Febụwarị 2020, ọ ruru ma zuo ezu na 2020 African Taekwondo Olympic Qualification Tournament iji sọọ mpi na Summer Olympics nke afọ 2020 na Tokyo, Japan
Na 2021 African Taekwondo Championships nke emere na Dakar, Senegal, ọ meriri nrite ọla edo na ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị kilogram iri ise na asaa
Mgbe ọnwa ole na ole gachara, ọ meriri ọla nchara ya na ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị 57 kilogram na Summer Olympics nke afọ nke emere na Tokyo, Japan
Teknụzụ Ịse ihe - akwụkwọ nwere ihe oyiyi eserese ma mee ya, dịka iwu, site n'enyemaka nke ngwá ọrụ, obere oge - site na aka
Ịse ihe osise, yana eserese nka, bụ otu n'ime ụdị eserese nka, metụtara eserese ụkpụrụ ụlọ
Enwere ike iji eserese, eserese maka eserese data, gụnyere iji eserese kọmputa
A na-ewepụta data maka nghọta na ngwa ngwa n'ụdị onyonyo geometric eserese, eserese, okirikiri, ma ọ bụ ngwakọta nke ha
A na-eji ihe owuwu na-eji ihe osise eme ihe maka ngwọta eserese nke nsogbu geometric
Nhazi nhazi
Site na ụlọ ọrụ eserese teknụzụ, eserese ihe owuwu
N'aka nke ya, enwere ike kewaa ihe osise teknụzụ na ihe owuwu site na ebumnuche
Nka na ụzụ eserese mgbakọ, eserese akụkụ, eserese nrụnye, eserese nkwakọ ngwaahịa, wdg dị ka GOST 2102-68 si dị
Ihe owuwu ihe ngwọta ụlọ, atụmatụ ukwu, refrigeration, ime ụlọ, wdg
Dị ka imewe usoro mbụ 3D ewu mgbe ahụ eserese na vice versa

A mụrụ ya na steeti Bauchi n'ime ezinụlọ ụmụ nwoke isii na otu nwanyị
A zụlitere ya n'ọtụtụ akụkụ nke mpaghara ahụ gụnyere Nassarawa, Kaduna na Abuja n'ihi eziokwu bụ na nna ya bụ onye otu ndị agha Naịjirịa

Ọ bụ nwanne nwoke ótù onye àmà àmá na imepụta ihe nkiri egwu Naịjirịa aha ya bụ Spotless
E bu ụzọ debanye aha Tekno Miles n'òtù egwu K-Money Entertainment
E wepụtara egwu mbụ ya akpọrọ 'Holiday', n'okpuru òtù egwu a
Site na njikọ aka ya na Onye egwu ọzọ aha ya bụ Davido imepụta egwu a, a nabatara 'Holiday' nke ọma, mere o jiri gbasaa nke ọma

N'afọ 2012, onye ama ama na Naijiria na-eme ihe ọchị bụ Julius Agwu hụrụ Tekno Miles na ihe omume na Abuja, mgbe Tekno Miles natara nkwanye ugwu na-esote egwu akpọrọ 'Onye Ne Kwu', remix ya nke Ice Prince's 'Oleku'
Ọ bụ n'otu ihe omume ahụ ka ọ zutere Iyanya na Ubi Franklyn, onye njikwa nke òtù egwu Made Men Music ha wee ghọrọ ndị enyi
Ubi na Iyanya mechara gbaa Tekno Miles ume ka ọ kwaga Lagos iji kwalite ọrụ egwu ya
N'abali ise nke ọnwa Ọktoba afo 2013, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta isoro òtù égwu Made Men Music (MMMG)
Best African Male Video Best West African Video Best Afro Pop Video
Na ọnwa Mee afọ 2018, Tekno nabatara nwa nwanyị na enyi nwanyị Lola Rae
N'afọ 2020, Tekno kwupụtara na ọ kwagara United States ruo mgbe ọ gara n'ihu

Nke a bụ mmeghachi omume na akụkọ banyere atụmatụ ahụ e gosipụtara na Mgbakọ Mba Naịjirịa maka ịgbanwe aha mba ahụ ka ọ bụrụ UAR, nke bụ aha maka United African Republic ma ọ bụ United Alkebulan Republic na June 2
Telcom bụ ndị ụlọ ọrụ netwọk ozi na Somalia
Ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ mbụ nwere onwe ya na-enye ọrụ nkwukọrịta n'obodo ukwu na mba niile
Telcom nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na Bakaara Market, Mogadishu
O nwere ụlọ ọrụ nnọchiteanya na Dubai, UAE na London, UK, ebe a na-ahụ maka ndekọ ego, mmekọrịta mba ụwa na ọrụ ndị na-ebugharị
Onye isi oche ya bụ Mohamed Sheikh, yana Hassan Ibrahim Mursal na-eje ozi dị ka CTO na Omar Hussein Adan dị ka onye isi mgbasa ozi
Enwere ndị ọrụ Narị asaa na iri ise
Televista TV bụ netwọk telivishọn na Naịjịrịa nke na-agbasa ozi n'asụsụ Bekee nke Consolidated Media Associates nwere

Netwọk ahụ na-agbasa mmemme, gụnyere ọtụtụ nke netwọk ahụ n'onwe ya mepụtara, maka ndị Naijiria na ndị na-asụ Bekee na Naijiria nakwa gburugburu ụwa na-egosi ngwakọta nke mmemme akụkọ, ihe nkiri mpaghara, usoro telivishọn na telenovelas (ma nsụgharị Bekee nke Colombian, Filipino, Brazilian, Latin America na telenovela ndị ọzọ a na-ebubata na mba ndị na-ekwu Spanish)

Televista Digital Media, nke na-ekesa ọdịnaya mmemme gafee igwe dijitalụ na nke mkpanaka gụnyere iROKOtv mgbe ọ na-enweta ọdịnaya kachasị mma site na gburugburu ụwa na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ nke gụnyere Housewives na ụmụ akwụkwọ na ndị na-adịchaghị anya (nchịkwa etiti na ndị isi nchịkwa)
Magazin Tell bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ a na-ebipụta kwa izu na Naịjirịa
Magazin Tell bipụtara mbipụta mbụ ya na 15 Eprel 1991
Ndị editọ ntọala ise niile na-arụ ọrụ na Newswatch, ebe ha mụtara ịmepụta akụkọ dị omimi, nyocha akụkọ
Ha hapụrụ magazin ahụ n’ihi obere ego a na-akwụ ha na nghọtahie ha na ndị isi ọchịchị na-enwe, na-atụ anya na magazin ọhụrụ ahụ ga-eju afọ karịa
Ọ bụ ezie na ndị malitere magazin ahụ nwere oké ọchịchọ, ha adịghị emegide gọọmenti ná mmalite
Otú ọ dị, ha kpebisiri ike na ha agaghị enwe mmetụta nke ọchịchị ma ọ bụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Na 1993, kọmitii na-echebe ndị nta akụkọ nyere Igiebor onyinye nnwere onwe nke mba ụwa, 'nkwado kwa afọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ nwere obi ike', maka ọrụ ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ
Na 1998, Nosa Igiebor na ndị ọrụ n'ozuzu ka e nyere onyinye pụrụ iche maka Human Rights Journalism Under Threat na Amnesty International UK Media Awards

Nkwupụta ihe nrite ahụ kwuru; 'Tell na-aga n'ihu na-ebipụta oge niile nke ọchịchị aka ike Naijiria n'agbanyeghị egwu, mmekpa ahụ na njide na-enweghị ebubo ma ọ bụ ikpe nke Mr Igiebor na ndị isi ndị ọzọ na ndị ọrụ Tell'
Temiloluwa Elizabeth Otedola (Amụrụ na 20 Machị 1996) bụ onye Naijiria n' eme ihe nkiri ma bụrụkwa onye na-ede blọgụ
A maara ya maka ịrụ ọrụ 'Moremi Oluwa' na nkiri 2020 Citation
Otedola (Amụrụ na 20 Machị 1996)
Ọ gụrụ akụkọ na Mahadum College London, Mahadum London
Otedola malitere blọọgụ ejiji a na-akpọ 'JTO Fashion' na Disemba 2014
Ọ na-edekọ ejiji, ịma mma, nka, na ahụmịhe njem
O mere Nollywood mbụ ya na 2020 na Citation nke Kunle Afolayan
Ọrụ ya na Citation, mere ka o nweta ihe nrite na 'Ghana Movie Awards 'maka' Best Actress', ma họpụta ya maka Mkpughe nke Afọ na 'Best of Nollywood Awards 2020'

Ọ laghachiri na nnukwu ihuenyo maka ihe ngosi nke abụọ ya ebe ọ bụ na ọ pụtara na 'Kunle Afolayan's' 'Citation' na Anthill studios' newest project 'The Man For The Job', ihe nkiri nke Niyi Akinmolayan dere ma duzie
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị ikpeazụ nke onye Naijiria nwere ọtụtụ ijeri, Femi Otedola na nwanne nwanyị nke DJ Cuppy na Tolani
Ya na onye na-agụ egwu Naijiria, Maazị Eazi nwere mmekọrịta ya na ya nwere podcast aha ya bụ How Far na Maazị Eezi na Temi
N'abalị iri n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2022, ọ kwere Maazị Eazi nkwa ọlụlụ
Temilayo Abodunrin (amụrụ na 19 Nọvemba 2009) bụ onye Naijirịa na-akpọ saxophon
A maara ya nke ọma maka nsụgharị Duduke na Jowo
Temilayo Abodunrin si Offa na Kwara Steetị, etiti Naijirịa
O nwere ụmụnne nwoke abụọ na-akpọkwa ngwá egwu
Ọ gara Parara Music School mgbe ndị mụrụ ya chọpụtara banyere mmasị ya na egwu
Temilayo Abodunrin malitere ịkpọ saxophone mgbe ọ dị afọ isii
Ọ na-eme ọtụtụ kọntaktị na ndị na-ese ihe na Naijirịa a ma ama dị ka Johnny Drille, Tope Alabi, Makayla Malaka, Wole Oni na ụfọdụ ndị ọzọ
Temilayo, kpakpando nwere ọtụtụ nkà emeela nke mbụ ya na ihe nkiri akpọrọ 'The Weight' nke Tope Alabi dere
A maara Temilayo nke ọma maka mbipụta ya nke Duduke nke Simi na Jowo nke Davido nke nwetara nnabata zuru oke
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Nigeria Tribune, Temilayo nyochara na ọ malitere dị ka onye na-akpọ keyboard tupu ọ ghọọ onye na-akụ saxophon
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ahụ, o kwuru na ọ gara kọntaktị ebe a kpọrọ ya ka ọ kpọọ keyboard ma zute ụmụaka ndị ọzọ dị ka ya na-akpọ saxophone
O kwuru, ịnụ ụda mara mma mere ka ọ mụta saxophone
Ọ wepụtara egwu izizi ya akpọrọ AYO n'afọ 2020
Ọ sonyeere onye a họpụtara na Grammy Award Bankulli na onye na-emepụta egwu RotimiKeys
Ooni nke Ife cameo-ed na vidiyo egwu ahụ
N'afọ 2019, a kpọrọ Temilayo Abodunrin ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na oge 11 nke Channels International Kids Cup
Na 3 Jenụwarị 2021, ọ bụ akụkụ nke Ogo Yoruba Awards (OYA) 2020
Temitayo Ogunbiyi (amụrụ n'afọ 1984) bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye nlekọta nke oge a na Naijiria

A maara ya maka ihe ngosi ya n'ọtụtụ ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie, nke kachasị ewu ewu bụ ebe egwuregwu ewubere na Museo d'Arte Contemporanea Donnaregina nke Italy na 2020, nke a maara dị ka You Can Play in the Everyday, Running
A mụrụ Ogunbiyi na 1984 na Rochester, New York
O tolitere na Gwynedd ma gaa Wissahickon High School na Montgomery County
O nwetara BA na Mahadum Princeton, New Jersey, n'afọ 2006
Emesịa, o nwetara nzere masta ya na akụkọ ihe mere eme na Mahadum Columbia, New York, n'afọ 2011
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Lagos, Nigeria, ma biri ebe ahụ afọ itoolu gara aga
N'afọ 2012, e gosipụtara nka ya na Pulitzer Foundation for the Arts, St Louis na Centre for Contemporary Art, Lagos

O gosipụtakwara nka ya na Museum of Contemporary Diasporan Art na Lagos n'afọ 2013, sochiri ihe ngosi na Tiwani Contemporary, London n'afọ 2016 na Lagos Biennial of Contemporary Art nke abụọ n'afọ 2019

Ihe osise ya pụtakwara na Museum of Contemporary African Diasporan Arts na Brooklyn, New York, Perm Art Museum na Russia, Dom Umenia Bratislava na Slovakia, na Berlin Art Projects nakwa Fries Museum na Berlin
Ogunbiyi arụwo ebe egwuregwu atọ nke na-arụ ọrụ ruo ugbu a
O wuru nke mbụ ya, na-eji ihe owuwu na ihe eji eme ụlọ, n'afọ 2018
N'afọ ahụ, e gosipụtara ọrụ egwuregwu ya na mbipụta nlekọta nke e nyere maka ọgbakọ Berlin Biennale nke ịrị
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2019, ọ rụrụ ebe egwuregwu akpọrọ You Will Find Playgrounds Among the Palm Trees maka afọ abụọ nke Lagos
E wuru ebe egwuregwu ahụ iji gosipụta njem nke ndị Africa na-agba ohu na Colombia
O mere ka Kathryn Weir, onye nduzi nka ugbu a nke Museo Madre, Naples, nye ọrụ ngosi ya n'afọ 2020 na Italy

A kpọrọ ebe egwuregwu 2020 You Will Play in the Everyday, Running (Italian Giocherai nel Quotidiano, Correndo?) ma guzobe ya na Museo d'Arte Contemporanea Donnaregina (Italian Contemporary Art Museum) na Naples
Ọ na-egosipụta akara na-enweghị atụ na ígwè nke na-arutu aka n'ụzọ anya na ngwá ọrụ ụlọ a rụrụ n'ụlọ nke ụmụ nwoke na Lagos na-emepụta
A na-eji ntụaka na nka nke Louise Bourgeois na Tim Burton na-anọchite anya njikọ ụgbọ njem n'etiti Lagos na Naples
Ebe egwuregwu ahụ na-echekwa ọdịnala esi nri nke mpaghara Campania ebe ihe ngosi nka dị
Ogunbiyi bụ onye natara ọtụtụ onyinye, nke gụnyere Smithsonian Artist in Research Fellowship na Ford Foundation Fellowship
Temmie Ovwasa (amuru na Nọvemba 29, 1996) bụ onye ọbụ abụ Naịjirịa, onye na -ede abụ, na onye na -ese ihe a na -akpọ YBNL Princess
Ọ bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ nkwekọrịta na YBNL Nation na Ọgọst 2015, mana ọ hapụrụ akara ahụ na 2020 n'ihi enweghị nkwekọrịta ya na onye nwe akara Olamide
Ovwasa bụ nwanyị na -edina nwanyị n'ihu ọha, ọ ga -ewepụta album nwoke mbụ nwere mmasị nwoke na Nigeria na 2020
A mụrụ Ovwasa na Ilorin na Nọvemba 29, 1996, nye nna Delta steeti na nne steeti Osun
Ọ gara Grace Christian Schools maka ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na Dalex Royal College maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, ma na Ilorin, Kwara steeti
Ọ gara mahadum teknụzụ Ladoke Akintola wee bụrụ ọkaibe na ngalaba ahụike
Ọ malitere ịgụ egwu mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, mgbe o dere abụ mbụ ya wee sonye na ukwe ụka ya, nne ya nyere ya ụbọ akwara mbụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ 12 n'ihi nka egwu ya
O bilitere wee bụrụ onye ama ama na 2015 mgbe Olamide kpọtụrụ ya site na Instagram
Edebanyere ya na akara ndekọ YBNL, wee nweta ya moniker 'YBNL Princess' Ọ hapụrụ YBNL mgbe enweghị nkwekọrịta na onye isi akara
Ụlọ nke Eluigwe nke ndị China bụ nnukwu ụlọ nke ụlọ okpukpe dị na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke etiti nnukwu obodo Beijing
Ndị eze ukwu nke usoro eze Ming na Qing letara ma na ga n'ogige ahụ maka emume ekpere kwa afọ
Ha na -ekpere eluigwe maka ezigbo owuwe ihe ubi
Edere ụlọ nsọ nke eluigwe nke a dị ka saịtị nke uwa kwere na ọ bụ nke ekwesịrị idobe nke ọma a na akpọ UNESCO World Heritage Site na asụsụ bekee
Nke a mere n'afọ 1998

Akọwara ya dị ka 'ọmarịcha ihe owuwu ụlọ nke na -egosi n'ụzọ doro anya ihe ngosipụta dị oke mkpa maka mmalite nke otu nnukwu mmepeanya ụwa' dị ka 'usoro ihe atụ na nhazi ụlọ nsọ nke eluigwe nwere mmetụta miri emi na nrụpụta ụlọ na ime atụmatụ nke Far East n'ime ọtụtụ narị afọ'

E wuru ogige ụlọ nsọ ahụ site na afọ 1406 ruo n'afọ1420 n'oge ọchịchị nke Yongle Emperor nke Ming Dynasty, onye bụkwa onye hụrụ maka iwu obodo mmachibido nke na a na akpọ Forbidden City na asụsụ bekee na Beijing
Ọ dị na Dongcheng Beijing, China ugbu a
A gbatịpụrụ ogige ahụ wee nyegharịa ya aha dị ka ụlọ nsọ nke eluigwe n'oge ọchịchị nke Jiajing Emperor na narị afọ nke iri na isii
JiaJing rụkwara ụlọ arụsị atọ ndị ọzọ ama ama na Beijing dị ka ụlọ nsọ nke Anyanwụ (日 壇) n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ, ụlọ nsọ nke ụwa (地 壇) nke dị n'ebe ugwu, na ụlọ nsọ Ọnwa (月 壇) na ọdịda anyanwụ
Emezigharị ụlọ nsọ nke eluigwe na narị afọ nke iri na asaọt n'okpuru Emperor Qianlong
Mgbe ahụ, ego mmefu nke steeti ezughị, yabụ na nke a bụ mmezigharị ikpeazụ nke nnukwu ụlọ nsọ n'oge ọchịchị ndị eze

Ndị Anglo-French nke jikọrọ aka biri na ụlọ nsọa n'oge Agha megide Opium nke abụọ Na afọ 1900, n'oge nnupụisi ọkpọ, ndị otu obodo asatọ jikọrọ aka ọnụ na agha biri n'ụlọ nsọ nke a wee tụgharịa ya ka ọ bụrụ isi ụlọ ọrụ iwu n'nwa oge na Peking, nke were otu afọ Site na ọdịda nke eze Qing, enweghị zikwa ike ijikwa ụlọ nsọ ahụ
Nleghara anya nke ụlọ nsọ ahụ butere ọdịda nke ọtụtụ ụlọ nzukọ n'afọ ndị sochirinụ
N'afọ 1914, Yuan Shikai, onye isi ala Republic of China n'oge ahụ, mere emume usoro ekpere Ming n'ụlọ nsọ a, dị ka akụkụ nke mbọ ime onwe ya ka ọ kwupụta na ọ bụ eze ukwu China
N'afọ 1918, ụlọ nsọ ahụ ghọrọ ogige ntụrụndụ ma bụrụ oge mbụ emere ya maka ọha
Ala nke ụlọ nsọ a kpuchiri 273 kilomita nke ala ahịhịa juputara
Enwere nnukwu ụlọ atọ, arụchara ha niile dịka iwu, echiche mmụọ na echiche nghọta siri dị
Na China n'oge ochie, a n'ahụ Eze Ukwu nke China ka Ọkpara nke Eluigwe, onye n'ahụ maka ihe gbasara ụwa n'aha ndị mmadụ, na -anọchite anya, ikike nke eluigwe
Ịhụ ka a na -akwanyere isi ike ya ugwu, n'ụdị ịchụ aja n'eluigwe, dị oke mkpa
E wuru ụlọ nsọ ahụ maka emume ndị a, ọkachasị nke gụnyere ekpere maka owuwe ihe ubi dị mma
Ugboro abụọ n'afọ, Eze Ukwu na ndị agha ya niile ga -esi na Obodo A machibidoro gafere na Beijing wee banye n'ime ogige ụlọ nsọ ahụ, ma yiri uwe mwụda pụrụ iche ma zere iri anụ
Enweghị onye China nkịtị ka nwere ike lelee ngagharị a ma ọ bụ emume n'esote
N'ime ogige ụlọ nsọ, Eze Ukwu ga -ekpe ekpere n'onwe ya maka Eluigwe
Ebe kachasị elu nke emume a n'oge nke nnukwu oyi a na akpọ Winter solstice na asụsụ bekee bụ nke Eze Ukwu n'eme n'Ugwu Ụwa
A na -emecha mmemme ahụ nke ọma; a na -ekwukarị na obere mmejọ ga -abụ akara ọjọọ nye mba ahụ niile n'afọ na -abịa

Anọchiri anya Ụwa site n'otu ihe dị akụkụ anọ, nọchie Eluigwe site na oto ihe okirikiri; na eiokwu, ọtụtụ atụmatụ nke ụlọ nsọ na -anọchite anya njikọ nke Eluigwe na ụwa, nke okirikiri na nke ihe akụkụ anọ
Mgbidi abụọ gbara ụlọ nsọ ahụ gburugburu; Mgbidi dị ná mpụta nwere ogologo ugwu, nke nwere ọkara okirikiri, na-anọchite anya Eluigwe, yana njedebe ndịda dị mkpụmkpụ, akụkụ anọ, na-anọchite anya ụwa
Ma Ụlọ ekpere maka ezi owuwe ihe ubi na okirikiri ebe ịchụàjà dị okirikiri, nke ọ bụla na -eguzo na mbara ụlọ, ọzọkwa ha na -anọchite anya eluigwe na ụwa

Nọmba itoolu na -anọchite anya Eze Ukwu ma pụta ìhè na nhazi nke okirikiriịchụàjà otu ihe dị ka efere gbara ya gburugburu ma nwee mgbaaka nke efere itoolu, nke ahụ nwekwa mgbanaka nke efere iri na asatọ, na ndị ọzọ maka ngụkọta nke mgbaaka itoolu gbara ya gburugburu

Ụlọ Nzukọ Ekpere maka ezigbo owuwe ihe ubi nwere ngalaba ogidi anọ ji ya n'ime, iri na abua ji ya n'etiti nke na-anọchite anya oge anọ akara aka, ọnwa iri na abua na elekere iri na abua nke omenala China
Ụlọ niile dị n'ime ụlọ nsọ nwere taịlị elu ụlọ na -acha anụnụ anụnụ, na -anọchite anya eluigwe
Nkume asaa-kpakpando, n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke ụlọ ekpere maka ezi owuwe ihe ubi, na-anọchite anya ọnụ ugwu asaa nke ugwu Taishan, ebe ofufe nke eluigwe na China oge gboo
Enwere isi ihe anọ, ogigi nke akwado n'ụdị anụmanụ nke a n'akpọ dragọn na asụsụ bekee nke na -anọchite anya oge anọ akara aka na China
Ihe owuwu a, nke dragọn ndị a jigidere, na -eghomi ụdị ụlọ eze China oge ochie
Ogidi iri na abụọ dị n'ime na-anọchite anya ọnwa, a na-echekwa na ogidi iri na abụọ ahụ dị n'elu bụ aka elekere iri na abụọ nke oge abụọ n'adị n'ụbọchị
Ogige gbara ya gburugburu sara mbara nke ukwuu, yana mkpokọta ya niile nwere 267 hectares (660 acres)
Ụfọdụ n'ime ya nwere ebe egwuregwu, na ebe ana eme ihe mmehari ahụ ndị ọzọ
Ndị okenye n'eji akụrụngwa ndị a nke ọma, yana nne na nna na nne na nna ochie ndị nke na -ebute ụmụaka igwu egwu
A na -ejikarị ụfọdụ oghere na ụlọ dị n'akụkụ, ọkachasị n'ụtụtụ, maka ihe ngosi egwu, ịgba egwu agbụrụ, na ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ
Ụlọ Ekpere Eluigwe dị na ndịda Dongcheng District, nke ruo n'afọ 2010 bụ akụkụ nke mpaghara Chongwen
Ogige ntụrụndụ ahụ n'onwe ya na -emeghe kwa ụbọchị niile site na elekere isii nke ụtụtụ ruo nke iri na mgbede

Ebe a na -edebe ihe ochie n'ime ogige ahụ na -emepe na elekere asatọ wee mechie na eleke ise na ọkara nke mgbede17 site na ọnwa Eprel 1 ruo n'Ọktọba 31, wee mechie na elekere ise nke mgbede site na ọwa Nọvemba 1 ruo n'ọnwa Mach 31
Enwere ụgwọ mbata nke ọnụ yae n'agbanwe dabere ma ọ bụ oge kacha elu ma ọ bụ oge ezumike
Ire tiketi na -akwụsị otu awa na ọkara tupu emechie ọnụ ụzọ
Ụgbọ njem ọha nwerike ịnweta ụzọ anọ nke ogige ahụ
Coordinated Universal Time na bekee, (UTC), bu otu adi-iji amata ihe oge bu n'elu uwa nile
O bu taa ndi mmadu no n'uwa nwe ọtu ha nwere-ike ima oge ma mgbe ha gara ogbozo
Ndi International Atomic Time bu ndi n'eleekotawa machine nke n'emee oge uwa di mma
Ha na guta ihe oge bu mgbe ha n'eleewa ọtu uwa di-igba anyawu buru-buru, ma otu onwa na gba anyi buru-buru
Ikwesiri ma time zone i-no la, gi tinye m'obu mee nwefu oke ikwesiri
Ndi no la New York kwesiri nwefu ise na oge no n'elu
Ndi no na Naigeria kwesiri tinye otu
Tempur Sealy mba ụwa, Inc
bụ onye America na-emepụta matarasị na ihe ndina
E guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mgbe Tempur-Pedic International, onye na-emepụta matarasị ụfụfụ ebe nchekwa nwetara nnukwu asọmpi ya Sealy Corporation na 2012
Ọ dị na Lexington, Kentucky
Àtụ Mattresses
Temilade Openiyi (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 11 n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1995), nke a maara dịka Tems, bụ onye Naijiria na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ

Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama mgbe abụọ n'ime egwu ya ruru n'elu iri anọ na Billboard Hot 100 na 2021, mmekorita ya na Drake na egwu 'Fountains' site na abọm ya Certified Lover Boy, na egwu Wizkid 'Essence'; nke ikpeazụ ruru n'elu iri na-esote remix ya na Justin Bieber, ma mee ka ọ nweta nhọpụta Grammy Award
N'otu afọ ahụ, Tems nọ n'ọkwa nke mbụ na chaatị Billboard Next Big Sound na nke ise na chaatị Billboard Emerging Artists
Na Septemba 2021, Tems bịanyere aka na ndekọ RCA, ma wepụta EP ya nke abụọ If Orange Was a Place, nke ruru n'elu iri na chaatị World Albums
Na Mee 2022, egwu Tems, 'Higher', site na egwu izizi ya, For Broken Ears (2020) gosipụtara na otu 'Wait For U' nke Future tinyere Drake, na-eduga ya ka e nye ya otuto dị ka onye na-ese ihe
Egwu a malitere n'ọkwa nke mbụ na Billboard Hot 100, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye mbụ na-ese ihe n'Afrịka nke bidoro n'ọkwa nke mbụ, na onye na-ese ihe n'Afrịka nke abụọ kachasị na chaatị ahụ
N'ime ọrụ ya niile, ọ natara ọtụtụ nhọpụta onyinye, ebe ọ na-emeri NAACP Image Awards abụọ, na Soul Train Music Awards
A mụrụ Temilade Openiyi na 11 June 1995 na Lagos, Nigeria A mụrụ ya na nne ya bụ onye Naijiria na nna ya bụ onye Britain na Naijiria, ezinụlọ ya kwagara United Kingdom obere oge a mụsịrị ya
Nne na nna ya gbara alụkwaghịm mgbe ọ dị afọ ise
Tems na nne ya na nwanne ya nwoke kwagara Naịjirịa, ha biri na Ilupeju tupu ha akwaga Lekki mgbe ahụ Ajah
Tems gara Dowen College tupu ọ gaa n'ihu na-amụ Economics na Monash South Africa, South Africa maka agụmakwụkwọ ya
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ, onye nkuzi egwu ya hụrụ ya ma mụta ịkpọ piano
Ya na nwanne ya nwoke na-abụ abụ ma na-ejikarị ụbọ akwara ya
N'afọ 2018, Tems kwụsịrị ọrụ ya iji rụọ ọrụ egwu
Ọ malitere ịmụta nkà mmepụta onwe ya na YouTube na 18 Julaị 2018, ọ wepụtara egwu izizi ya, 'Mr Rebel', egwu nke ọ mepụtara n'onwe ya
N'ụbọchị nke asaa n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2019, o wepụtara egwu 'Try Me'
N'afọ 2020, DJ Edu họọrọ ya dị ka otu n'ime 'ndị egwu iri ga-ekiri' n'afọ ahụ

N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2020, e gosipụtara Tems n'akụkụ onye egwu Naịjirịa ibe ya bụ Davido na nsụgharị nke onye na-agụ egwú na-agụ egwú America bụ Khalid na otu egwu eletrik nke Bekee bụ Disclosure, 'Know Your Worth'
Nne Tems na-ege egwu Ndị Kraịst ntị naanị mgbe Tems bụ nwata
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma, ọ malitere inwe mmasị na egwu R&B na hip hop
O gere ntị na Destiny's Child, Beyonce, Lil Wayne, na Aaliyah, ma kpuchie egwu Alicia Keys nke afọ 2004, 'If I Ain't Got You', na arụmọrụ dị egwu
Mgbe ọ na-etolite, ọ nwekwara mmasị na ndị na-ese ihe dịka Burna Boy, Lauryn Hill, Adele, Coldplay, Paramore, na Asa
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, ọ kwụsịrị ige ndị egwu ndị ọzọ ntị na-achọ njirimara ya, n'ihi na 'Achọrọ m ịmụta otu esi awakpo egwu site na mmetụta m, ọ bụghị ihe Beyonce ga-eme ma ọ bụ onye ọ bụla ọzọ'
A kọwara olu ya dị ka miri emi, velvety, na androgynous
N'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2020, e jidere Tems na onye egwu Naịjirịa ibe ya bụ Omah Lay na Uganda maka ịme ihe nkiri n'oge ndị ọchịchị kwụsịrị maka ibute ọrịa COVID-19 na mba ahụ
A tọhapụrụ ndị ọbụ abụ ahụ mgbe ndị uwe ojii jidere ha ụbọchị abụọ

Tenidade Aofiyebi bụ onye omere na nwanyị ọchụnta ego Naijiria
Aofiyebi bụ onye Yoruba
Ọ gara St Anne's School Ibadan maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, tupu ọ nweta ọkwa 'A' na ụlọ akwụkwọ Farringtons, ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị nọọrọ onwe ha na Kent, United Kingdom
Ọ nwetara agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na kọleji nke mejupụtara Mahadum London
Ọ gbara na ihe nkiri usoro onyonyo Mirror in the Sun ya na Clarion Chukwuma n'etiti 1984 na 1986
Aofiyebi gbara n'usoro ihe onyonyo For Better, For Worse na 2003
Na 2005, ọ gosiputara na ihe nkiri ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Prince of the Savannah, nke Bayo Awala duziri
Na 2013, Aofiyebi gosiputara na ihe nkiri ịhụnanya na-ato ochi Flower Girl, nke Michelle Bello duziri
Aofiyebi nwere ọrụ na 2015 ihe nkiri usoro onyonyo Royal Castle, na isiokwu ndị metụtara nrara nye , aghụghọ, nrụrụ aka, na ịhụnanya
Aofiyebi bidoro azụmaahịa mgbazinye TKM Essentials na Mee 2014
Ndị ahịa mbụ gụnyere ndị na-eme atụmatụ mmemme na ndị na-eme ihe ndozi ime

Echiche maka azụmahịa ahụ bịara mgbe ọ na-eme atụmatụ ụbọchị ọmụmụ iri isii ya wee nata nnukwu ụgwọ site n'aka onye nhazi ihe omume, ma kpebie na ọ ga-abụ ihe dị mma ịzụta ihe ndị ahụ kama ịgbazite ha
Ọtụtụ n'ime akụrụngwa ya sitere China na India, o kwuru na ha dị oke ọnụ mana ọ ga-adịrị ndị nwere ego ọnụ
Ụlọ ahịa ahụ dị na Raufu Williams Crescent, na Lagos, na nnukwu mmeghe ahụ bụ nwunye onye na chi Lagos Abimbola Fashola
Na Julaị 2014, Aofiyebi jere ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ azụmaahịa nye ndị ọchụnta ego na-eto eto bu akụkụ nke atụmatụ Mara Mentor Initiative
N'afọ 2019, ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe na asọmpi ịma mma maka ụmụ agbọghọ ntị chiri
Ọ bụ nwanne nne ma ọ bu nna nwanyị omee Funlola Aofiyebi-Raimi
Aofiyebi nwere ejima Taiwo na Kehinde
Ọ bụ nne ochie
Loladeville
Tendai Mukomberanwa (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1974) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
Nwa Grace Mukomberanwa na Nicholas Mukomberanwa, Tendai so nna ya rụọ ọrụ site na afọ iri n'oge ọ bụ nwata
E rere ihe osise ya ma gosipụta ya n'ụwa niile
Ọ na-aga n'ihu na-akpụ ihe na ụlọ ọrụ ezinụlọ dị na Ruwa
Tendai malitere ịkpụ ihe site na nwata n'okpuru ọzụzụ nke nna ya, onye na-ese ihe a ma ama n'ụwa, Nicholas Mukomberanwa
Mgbe ahụ, ọ natara ọzụzụ agụmakwụkwọ site n'inweta nzere bachelọ nke Fine Arts na Sonoma State University na California
Ọ kwagara South Africa ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi kọmputa
Ọ na-aga n'ihu na-akpụ ihe na studio ezinụlọ ha
Ọ bụ onye otu ezinụlọ Mukomberanwa nke ndị na-akpụ ihe
Mukomberanwa bụ nwanne Anderson, Tendai, Taguma, Netsai, na Ennica Mukomberanwa, na nwa nwanne nne Nesbert Mukomberanwa, ha niile bụ ndị na-akpụ ihe
Àtụ The Mukomberanwa Family
Tendaiishe Chitima (a mụrụ n'afọ 1989/1990) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-eme ihe nkiri
Chitima kọwara onwe ya dịka onye ihere na-etolite na Zimbabwe, ọ tụghịkwa echiche ime ihe nkiri dịka ọrụ
Ọ gara Mahadum nke Cape Town, na-amụ mgbasa ozi na akwụkwọ akụkọ
Chitima gara ihe nkiri ma hụ ya n'anya, na-ekpebi ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ gwaghị ndị mụrụ ya atụmatụ ya ruo mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ
Chitima mechara nweta nzere masta na azụmaahịa
N'oge na mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na fim dị mkpirikpi, gụnyere Jayson's Hope (2013), nke bụ onye ikpeazụ Top 10 maka asọmpi Afrinolly Short Film
Na mbido ọrụ ya, ọrụ Chitima dị na telivishọn South Africa ebe ọ na-eme ka ndị na-arụ ọrụ na ndị a na-ere ahịa mmadụ, na-ekpughe nsogbu nke ụfọdụ ụmụ nwanyị na-akwaga mba ọzọ
N'afọ 2016, ọ rụrụ Blessing na oge nke abụọ nke usoro TV Mutual Friends
O gosipụtara Adelaide, nwa mgbei na-azụ ahịa mmadụ, na usoro TV Isidingo n'afọ 2016
N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara Chitima dịka Anesu, nne naanị ya nke na-agaghị mahadum, na ihe nkiri ịhụnanya Cook Off
Omume ya nwere mmasị maka isi nri, nke a na-ahụ mgbe nwa ya nwoke na nne nne ya debanyere aha ya maka asọmpi isi nri telivishọn
Emere ihe nkiri ahụ maka mmefu ego nke ihe dịka $ 8000, ọ họọrọ ọrụ ahụ n'ihi na ọ masịrị ya mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya nke edemede ahụ
Ọ bụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya ma bụrụ ihe na-ewu ewu na Netflix, na Chitima na-akọwa ya dịka akwụkwọ ozi ịhụnanya nye Zimbabwe
Ọ natara ihe nrite Best Actress na Zimbabwe International Film Festival, a kpọkwara Cook Off ihe nkiri kacha mma
N'afọ 2018, ọ pụtara na egwuregwu Bloom Flame Bloom
Teniola Apata, onye amara dị ka Teni, bụ nwaafọ Nigeria na-eti na ede egwu
Ọ na-emekwa ndị mmadụ obi ụtọ
Teni bụ nwanne Niniola onye Nigeria na- agụ egwú
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n' Apata Memorial High School O nwetara nzere digiri na business adminstration na American InterContinental University
Teni wepụtara egwu izizi ya 'Amen' mgbe ọ bịanyere aka na Shizzi 's Magic Fingers Records
Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ ọrụ Shizzi wee banye na Dr
Dolor Entertainment n'afọ 2017
Teni malitere iwu ewu mgbe ọ wepụtara egwu ya akpọrọ Fargin' n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2017
O wusiwere ike mgbe o wepụtara egwu ya bụ 'Askamaya', ' Case' na 'Uyo Meyo'
'Askamaya' nwetara ọnọdụ onye nke iri na ise na MTV Base nhọpụta mmadụ iri abụọ egwu ha kacha mma n'afọ 2018
Teni nwere meri dika Rookie of the Year n'afọ 2018 Headies Awards, ma nwetekwa ihe nrite dika onye ntolite a na-ele anya n'afọ 2018 na mmemme Nigeria Entertainment Awards
O merikwara dika onye kacha eme egwu nka n'afọ 2018 na mmemme Soundcity MVP Awards Festival
NotJustOk họpụtara ya ya dika onye nke asatọ n'ime mmadụ iri ndị egwu ha kacha ekpo ọkụ na Naijiria
Aha ya pụtara na Premium Timesdika otu n'ime mmadụ na-akpa ike n'egwu na ewu ewu n'ebe niile n'afọ 2018
N'ụbọchị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Febuarị n'afọ 2019, Egosiri Teni YouTube Music' dika oti egwu na ewu ewu ma na ede ude n'uto
Ka ọnwa Mee dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị atọ,n'afọ 2019, O wepụtara vidio egwu ya akpọrọ 'Sugar Mummy'
Ka ọnwa Juun dị na mkpụrụ ụbọchị iri na anọ n’afọ 2019, ọ wepụtara egwu ọhụụ akpọrọ “Power Rangers”
N'ọnwa Machị, n'afọ 2019, Teni bịanyere aka na nkwado Tom Tom, ihe nracha nke ụlọ ọrụ Cadbury Naijiria mepụtara

Ọtụtụ n'ime akụrụngwa ya sitere China na India, o kwuru na ha dị oke ọnụ mana ọ ga-adịrị ndị nwere ego ọnụ
