Tephigram bụ otu n'ime eserese thermodynamic anọ a na-ejikarị eme ihe na nyocha ihu igwe na amụma
Aha ahụ sitere na aha mbụ 'T--gram' iji kọwaa axes nke okpomọkụ (T) na entropy () eji mepụta atụmatụ ahụ
Dị ka ọ na-adịkarị, a na-edepụta data okpomọkụ na igirigi site na radiosondes na eserese ndị a iji nyé ohere ngụkọta nkè nkwụsi ike convective ma ọ bụ convective available potential energy (CAPE)
A na-ejikarị ụdọ ifufe eme ihe n'akụkụ tephigram iji gosipụta ifufe na ịdị elu dị íchè íchè
Ọ bụ Napier Shaw mepụtara tephigram n'afọ 1915 ma jiri ya mee ihe na United Kingdom na Canada
Mba ndị ọzọ na-eji ihe osise thermodynamic yiri ya màkà otu ebumnuche mànà nkọwa nke owuwu ha dịgasị iche
Na tephigram, isotherms kwụ ọtọ ma nwee degree iri anọ na ise inclination n'aka nri ébé isobars dị larịị ma nwee obere curve
Adiabats ndị kpọrọ nkụ na-adịkwa n'ụzọ kwụ ọtọ ma nwee ogo irí anọ na ise n'aka ekpe ébé adiabats ndị na-ekpo ọkụ na-agbagọ

Isi ihe méré British Met Office, Meteorological Service of Canada, na Met Éireann (Irish Meteorological Services) ji tephigrams mee ihe bụ ihe onwunwe na mpaghara ndị dị na curves nwèrè ike hà nhata màkà mpaghara hà nhata, na-eduga na ntụnyere ka mma nke CAPE na ya mèrè usoro convective
Teresa Klimek (1929-2013) bụ onye nkuzi na onye na-eme ngagharị iwe na Poland
A gụrụ ya iji kụzie mgbakọ na mwepụ, ọ kụziri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị iche iche na Gorzów Wielkopolski site na 1953 ruo 1984 ma sọpụrụ ya maka nkà ya dị ka onye nkuzi
O nyere aka chọta alaka Gorzów Wielkopolski nke Catholic Intellectuals Club yana alaka mpaghara nke Solidarity
A nabatara ọrụ ya n'oge ọgụ Poland na-alụ maka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya n'ọtụtụ ebe na mpaghara na nke mba ma jiri ọtụtụ ihe nrite na onyinye sọpụrụ ya
A mụrụ Teresa Maria Tomaszewska-Bończa na 11 Ọktoba 1929 na Hrubieszów, Poland n'ezinụlọ Stanisław Bończa-Tomaszewski na Marii Skrzetuskiej
Mgbe ndị mụrụ ya gbara alụkwaghịm, ndị nne na nna ya bụ Kazimierza Skrzetuskiego na Maria (née Dobrowolska) Skrzetuska zụlitere Tomaszewska-Bończa
Ọ bụ nwa nwa Antoni Skrzetuski, onye a na-asọpụrụ maka ozi agha ya na January Uprising
Ezinụlọ ahụ na-akwagharị mgbe niile n'oge agha ahụ, na-ebi na Wrzesnia, Zwierzyniec, Przeworsk na Mogilno, tupu ọ banye ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na 1944

N'afọ 1949, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bolesława Chrobrego High School [pl] na Gniezno wee gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na Mahadum Adam Mickiewicz na Poznań (UAM), na-amụ mgbakọ na mwepụ site na 1949 ruo 1952
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Tomaszewska-Bończa gụrụ akwụkwọ nkenke na Polish Naval Academy wee n'etiti 1952 na 1953 ọ kuziri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ọrụ aka na Gdynia
Na 1953, Tomaszewska-Bończa lụrụ Władysław Klimek [pl], kwagara Gorzów Wielkopolski wee kuziere ya na Gastronomic Technical College (Polish Technikum Gastronomicznym) afọ abụọ
N'afọ 1957, ọ malitere nkuzi na ụlọ akwụkwọ nkà na ụzụ kemịkalụ (Polish Technikum Chemicznym), ebe ọ nọrọ ruo 1972
Ọ gụchara nzere master's UAM na 1966 ma na 1976 ọ gụchara akwụkwọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na sayensị kọmputa na Mahadum Warsaw
N'agbata 1972 na 1984 ọ kuziri mgbakọ na mwepụ na Maria Sklodowska-Curie High School [pl] na Gorzów Wielkopolski
N'ime oge a, ọ rụkwara ọrụ nnwale n'etiti 1976 na 1980 nke Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Sayensị malitere n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Klimek lara ezumike nká na nkuzi na 1984
N'afọ ndị 1970, Kliimek nyere aka hazie ọgbakọ ọgụgụ isi Katọlik (Polish Klub Inteligencji Katolickiej (KIK)), nke ya na di ya Władysław tọrọ ntọala
Ebumnobi KIK bụ ịkpali echiche nke onwe ya wee weta ndị Katọlik n'ime Poland ozi gbasara nkà ihe ọmụma Katọlik site na mba ndị na-abụghị Socialist Bloc
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ ga-arụ ọrụ n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị na enweghị ike idebanye aha ya ruo 1981, otu ahụ mara ndị ọchịchị aka ma kwalite nzukọ ahụ n'ihu ọha
Malite na 1980, Kliimek na-etinyekwa aka na azụmahịa nke Polish Trade Union, 'Ịdị n'otu' (Polish Niezależny Samorządny Związek Zawodowy (NSZZ))
Ebumnuche nke ịdị n'otu bụ iweta mgbanwe mmekọrịta ọha na eze site n'ịgbanwe usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Klimek kwalitere nzukọ a n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, na-agba ụmụ akwụkwọ ume ka ha chọta otu ụmụ akwụkwọ nọọrọ onwe ha
Ọ jere ozi na bọọdụ mpaghara wee bụrụ onye nnọchi anya ọgbakọ ọgbakọ dị ka onye nnọchi anya Solidarity
Site na 1980 ruo 1981 Klimek jere ozi na kọmitii enyemaka maka ndị mkpọrọ nke akọ na uche ma na-elekọta ndị otu a tụrụ mkpọrọ
Akpọrọ ya n'etiti 15 Disemba 1981 na 27 June 1982 n'ogige dị na Poznan na Gołdap, n'oge mmejuputa iwu agha na Poland
E tinyere iwu ndị agha iji tụọ ndị mmadụ ụjọ ma mee ka ha chee na ọchịchị Kọmunist Polish siri ike na enweghị ike ịkwatu ya
Mgbe a tọhapụrụ ya, Klimek rụrụ ọrụ na Catholic Underground na nkwado nke ịdị n'otu
Ihe dị mkpa maka ịga nke ọma n'okpuru ala bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ n'okpuru ala na na Gorzów Wielkopolski, di Klimek Władysław deziri ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ma dee akụkọ maka ịdị n'otu
N'okpuru pseudonym 'Simeon na Agnik', na 1983 Kliimek dere egwu onye mmegide 'Feniksa' (Phoenix)
Na 1986, Kliimek so na mweghachi nke ịdị n'otu wee bụrụ onye otu Kọmitii Executive Mpaghara maka otu
Kliimek bidoro kọmitii Gorzów maka ebe nchekwa nke ndị Katyn mere ma bụrụ onye otu nsọpụrụ nke ezinụlọ Gorzów Katyn
Klimek nwụrụ na 29 Disemba 2013 na Gorzów Wielkopolski
Ha abụọ n'oge ndụ ya, na mgbe ọ nwụsịrị, a chọrọ Kliimek mma maka mkpali ya na ịdị mma ya dị ka onye nkuzi

Ọ bụ onye natara ihe nrite Merit maka mpaghara Gorzowski (1998); Akara ọla edo nke ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ mba NSZZ 'S' (2005); Ihe nrite Pro Memoria (2005); Cross Knight nke Order nke Polonia Restituta (2009); Uru maka mpaghara Lubuskie (2009); Ihe nrite nrite maka Obodo Gorzow (2010), Ihe nrite ọla ọcha nke Nrite nke Ebe nchekwa nke National Ncheta [pl] (2010), Award nke Mpaghara Gorzowski NSZZ “S” (2010), Nwa amaala nsọpụrụ nke Gorzów Wielkopolski [pl] (2013); na Cross of Freedom and Solidarity (2015)

Teresa Ekwutosi Agbomma Meniru (onye nke amuru na ụbọchị asaa nke ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1931 – ma la nmụọ n’ụbọchị nke iri abụọ na anọ nke ọnwa Ọgọst n'afọ 1994) bụ onye Naijiria na-ede akwụkwọ maka ndị ntorobia na akụkọ ụmụaka
A mụrụ Teresa Ekwutosi Agbomma n'Ozubulu na steeti Anambra
Meniru dere akwụkwọ maka ndị na-eto eto na-agụ akwụkwọ
Ọrụ ya na-ekwu maka ihe ndị siri ike dịka mmetọ ụmụaka, ịtọrọ mmadụ, ọnọdụ ụmụ nwanyị na Naijiria na ibu omenala
Meniru edewokwa banyere mmetụta nke agha na ebe ụmụ nwanyị nọ, dị ka n'akwụkwọ ya, Last Card ma ọ bụ Kaadị Ikpeazụ ma ọ bụrụ na asụgharị ya n'asụsụ Igbo
Edemede Meniru bụ akụkụ nke ihe na-emekarị na ederede Naijiria nke 'mere ka akụkụ nke akwụkwọ ụmụaka na ndị ntorobịa Africa gbasaa site n'iwebata isiokwu na ụzọ dị mkpa maka oge ọchịchị'
Teresa Ekwutosi Agbomma lụrụ engineer Godwin Udegbunam Meniru, onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum Howard
Ha mụrụ ụmụ nwoke anọ na ụmụ nwaanyị atọ
Ọ nwụrụ na afọ 1994, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii na atọ
Teresa Okure (afọ iri asatọ) bụ onye nọn Katọlik nke Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye Afrịka mbụ ghọọrọ onye otu Society of the Holy Child Jesus
Ọ bụ Prọfesọ na Ngalaba Bible Theology, dị na Catholic Institute of West Africa, Port Harcourt, Nigeria
Okure n'akụzi Agba Ọhụrụ na Gender Hermeneutics, ma kuzikwa nkuzi na Institute kemgbe afọ 1999
Ọ nwetara nzere dokita ya na Mahadum Fordham
N'afọ 2013, Popu Francis kwuru na ọ nwere ike ịbụ onye a ga-ahọpụta dịka nwanyị kadinal

Terhemba Shija bụ onye agụmakwụkwọ Naijiria, onye na-ede uri, onye na'ede akwụkwọ akụkọ ifo, onye nkatọ na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ka ọ na-erule afọ 2014, o kwuru okwu na Mahadum Nasarawa State, Keffi
Shija jere ozi dị ka onye otu House of Representatives nke obodo Naijiria na 1992 Benue steeti

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka Kọmishọna nke Gọọmentị Obodo na Chieftaincy Affairs Benue State, n'oge ọchịchị Gọvanọ George Akume, na-agba ụkwaghịm na Disemba n'afo 2002; Ọ bụ onye dere ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ifo, akụkọ ndụ, akwụkwọ nkato na uri
Aha akwụkwọ ya a kacha mara bụ 'Whispers of Distant Drums' 'The Siege, The Saga' na 'Cantos for the Benue'

Ebe ahụ bụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, na-enye nri Naijiria, ụlọ ahịa akwụkwọ na ebe ọdịnala, na-anabata ihe ngosi nke nka NaijiriaTerra Kulture bụ ebe nka na ọdịbendị dị na obodo Lagos nke nwere ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ dị na ya
Onye ọka iwu Naijiria bụ Bolanle Austen-Peters guzobere Terra Kulture na afọ 2003

Ebe etiti ahụ bụ ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, na-enye nri Naijiria, ụlọ ahịa akwụkwọ na ebe omenala, ebe ngosi ihe ngosi nka, ihe nkiri, na ịgụ akwụkwọ yana ọmụmụ asụsụ n'asụsụ atọ bụ isi Naijiria, Hausa, Ibo na Yoruba
Ihe omume kwa afọ na Terra Kulture na-agụnye ire ere nka na emume Taruwa nke nka
Terrace Jamahl Martin (amụrụ na Disemba 28, 1978) bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu, ónyé na-eti rap, ónyé na na-agụ egwu, na ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ

A maara ya nke ọma màkà ịmepụta ndekọ màkà ọtụtụ ndị omenkà ama na ụlọ ọrụ egwu, gụnyere Kendrick Lamar, Snoop Dogg, Game, Busta Rhymes, Stevie Wonder, Charlie Wilson, Raphael Saadiq na YG, n'etiti ndị ọzọ
Martin bụ onye na-egwu ọtụtụ ngwá egwu nke mmepụta egwu ya gosipụtara funk, jazz, classic na mkpụrụ obi
Martin wepụtara abọm studio nke isii ya, Velvet Portraits, na akara ya, Sounds of Crenshaw Records, site na Ropeadope Records
Nna Martin, Ernest 'Curly' Martin, bụ onye na-akụ egwu jazz na ónyé otu Omaha Black Music Hall of Fame, nné ya bụkwa ónyé na-agụ egwu
Ọ tolitere na-ege egwu dịgasị iche iche, gụnyere John Coltrane na Parliament ma malite ịkpọ piano Mgbè ọ dị afọ isii

Mgbè ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, na-emepụta egwu mbụ ya na Casio CZ-101 Keyboard ya na E-mu SP-1200, a gbara Martin ume ka ọ were saxophone ma mụta ịkpọ ya n'onwe ya tupu ọ banye na Santa Monica High School, iji mee ka nkà egwu ya dị nkọ
Ọ gara Locke High School, iji mụọ n'okpuru Reggie Andrews, ébé ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche mbụ nke All-State Jazz Band
Dị ka nwatakịrị mara mma, Martin nwetara mmasị nke onye na-eme ihe ngosi okwu Jay Leno, onye nyere ya agụmakwụkwọ ma mesịa zụta mpi ọkachamara mbụ ya
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị, Martin gara CalArts mana o kpebiri na ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ abụghị màkà ya, wee malite ịgagharị na Puff Daddy na ndị ukwe ozioma God's Property
Ndị isi Hollywood na ụlọ ọrụ egwu matara Martin ma nweta ihu ọma n'ụwa jazz, ébé ọ na-egwuri egwu dị ka onye otu Billy Higgins' World Stage All-Stars
Nnukwu ohere Martin bịara mgbè ya na Snoop Dogg mepụtara redio Power 106
O nwetara obéré ihe na 213's 'Joystick' wee gaa n'ihu bụrụ otu n'ime ndị Snoop Dogg na-achọ ndị na-emepụta, na-etinye ego na R&G (Rhythm & Gangsta) The Masterpiece na Ego Trippin albums
N'afọ 2007, ọ bịanyere ákà na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Warner Bros
Ihe ndekọ
The Demo, abọm izizi nké Martin na 2010, gosipụtara ya dị ka onye na-eti egwu na ónyé na-emepụta ihe
Abọm ahụ gụnyere ịkụ na amaokwu ndị ọbịa sitere n'aka ndị na-ese ihe gụnyere Snoop Dogg, Wiz Khalifa, Pete Rock, DJ Quik na Kurupt
Na Septemba 28, 2010, Terrace Martin na ónyé ọrụ redio Devi Dev wepụtara egwuregwu gbasaa (EP) Here, My Dear
Otu mbụ sitere na EP bụ 'Roll Up Another One', nke Wiz Khalifa na Overdoz gosipụtara
EP gosipụtara ndị ọbịa si Snoop Dogg, Charlie Wilson, Kurupt, Kendrick Lamar, U-n-i, James Fauntleroy II na onye pianist Kenneth Croutch
EP sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke Marvin Gaye's 1978 album nkè otu aha ahụ
Na Disemba 21, 2010, Terrace Martin na Devi Dev malitere usoro egwu ha n'ịntanetị #DeviTerraceTuesday
Na Febụwarị 22, 2011, ha wepụtara ọrụ nke abụọ ha, The SEX EP
Terracom bụ ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta nke Rwanda, nke na-enye ọrụ ịntanetị na ọrụ ekwentị
Ụlọ ọrụ a bụ isi na Kigali na onye isi asọmpi ya na Rwandatel bụ Rwandatel
Terragon Group Ltd bụ ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ Naijiria nke na-eji data na nnyocha enyere ụlọ ọrụ aka ịre ngwaahịa ha n'Africa
Elo Umeh na Ayodeji Balogun guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 2009 ma nwee isi ụlọ ọrụ na Lagos, Nigeria na ọrụ na Kenya, Ghana, South Africa na India
N'afọ 2015, Terragon Group wepụtara ngwa mkpanaka mgbasa ozi mbụ n'Africa nke a na-akpọ 'Adrenaline' nke na-enye ndị mgbasa ozi ohere ịzụta ngwongwo na ịmepụta ọwa na ndị ahịa nwere ike
N'ọnwa Eprel 2018, Terragon nwetara nde dọla ise site na TLcom Capital
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2018, otu Terragon nwetara Bizense
N'afọ 2021, Terragon ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ Afrịka mbụ banyere na ndepụta nke ụlọ ọrụ data ndị ahịa (CDP)
Terri Lynn Jewell (Ọktoba 4, 1954 - Nọvemba 26, 1995) bụ onye America na-ede akwụkwọ, onye na-ede uri na onye na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị ojii
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke The Black Woman's Gumbo Ya-Ya, nke natara Akwụkwọ nrite Ọgụgụ Ndị Na-eto Eto nke obodo New York n'afọ 1994
A mụrụ Jewell naanị nwa nwanyị na October 4, 1954, na Louisville, Kentucky nye Mildred (Midge) na Miller LaRue Jewell, Jr
O nwere nwanne nwoke, Marcus Tandy

N'afọ 1968, Jewell ritere ihe nrite mbụ, dollars iri abuo na ise nkekọ ego, maka ide edemede maka asọmpi nke atọ kwa afọ nke Asọmpi akụkọ ihe mere eme gbasara ndị ojii nke Louisville, Kentucky isi nke Links, Inc
kwadoro
Jewell nọrọ afọ abụọ na-amụ banyere bayoloji na Mahadum Louisville tupu ọ gafee na kọleji ọzọ
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n8
1979 na Montclair State College na New Jersey nnzere bachelọ nke Sayensị e na agụmakwụkwọ ahụike
Jewell ghọrọ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mmegharị ụmụ nwanyị na New York mgbe ọ na-aga Montclair State College
O sonyere na ngagharị na ọgụgụ na-ekwu maka nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị
N'oge ọ nọ na kọleji, Jewell kwetara na ọ bụ nwanyị na-edina nwanyị
O dere banyere ịbịakwute nne ya n'isiokwu ya n'afọ 1990 'A Short Account of My Behavior'
N'afọ 1985, Jewell kọwara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, klas na ihe ịma aka ndị ọzọ nke nwanyị ojii na-edina nwanyị na mmekọrịta ya na nwanyị ọcha na “An Alliance of Differences'
Abụ Jewell na edemede dị egwu pụtara n'ihe karịrị narị akwụkwọ atọ na United States na mba ụwa

Mbipụta gụnyere The African-American Review, The Black Scholar, Black Maria, Body Politic, Calyx, Common Lives / Lesbian Lives, Kalliope, The Lavender Letter, Obsidian II, OutWeek, Poetry Detroit, Sing Heavenly Muse, Sisterlode, Spare Rib, Sinister Wisdom, Violent Virgins, na ụmụ nwanyị ike
N'afọ 1993, Jewell bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ bipụtara akụkọ ndụ na edemede dị egwu banyere onye edemede Sapphire

N'ihe dị ka afọ 1989/1990, Jewell gbara Ruth Ellis ajụjụ ọnụ, nwanyị Afrịka na Amerịka nke a maara nke ọma dị ka nwanyị kachasị ochie na-edina nwanyị, maka mbipụta Piece of My Heart A Lesbian of Colour Anthology
E bipụtakwara abụ na edemede Jewell na akwụkwọ akụkọ na anthologies gụnyere
Jewell bụ onye natara ọtụtụ onyinye na nsọpụrụ gụnyere
A chọpụtara na Jewell nwere nkụda mmụọ na mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-elekọta ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ iji 'mee ka ọ dị ọhụrụ' onwe ya
O dere banyere ịbụ onye lanarịrị mmekọ nwoke na nwanyị ma nwee ahụmahụ banyere ime ihe ike metụtara ndị òtù ezinụlọ
Na Nọvemba 26, 1995, a hụrụ ozu Jewell na ogige Michigan dị na Ionia County
Onye nyocha ahụike depụtara ihe kpatara ọnwụ dị ka ọnyá égbè nke onwe ya
N'afọ ntọala nka nke ndi Michigan nyere Jewell onyinye otu puku dollar na narị na iri ise iji kwado uri ọhụrụ banyere onye Africa America na-ede uri, onye edemede na onye na-eme ihe ike James Baldwin
'Ọ nọ n'akụkụ nnukwu ọganihu na abụ James Baldwin ọ na-edeỌ ga-agụ m akụkụ
Ọ bụ ọrụ dị ịtụnanya, 'dị ka onye ọrụ ibe ya na onye edemede na Mahadum Michigan State bụ Lev Raphael si kwuo
N'oge Jewell nwụrụ, e bipụtaghị ihe odide ya nke abụ banyere Baldwin
N'oge ọ gafere, Jewell nọkwa na-edezi Dreadsisters, Lock-Sisters; nchịkọta edemede site na banyere ụmụ nwanyị na-atụ egwu
Ọzọkwa, ọ bụ onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndị nchịkọta akụkọ nke The Lesbian Review of Books kemgbe ọ malitere
Akwụkwọ Terri L
Jewell (1968–1996) dị na Mahadum Michigan State

Nchịkọta ahụ, ihe dị ka ụkwụ isi iri na ise nke ihe, nwere ihe odide nke uri, ihe odide nke ọrụ anthology, akwụkwọ edemede, nyocha, ajụjụ ọnụ, ihe nyocha, foto, akwụkwọ ozi, obituary, na mmemme ncheta
Lee Michael Sayles nyere onyinye nchịkọta ahụ n'afọ 1996, ya na onyinye nchịkọta ahụ n'afọ 2018
Amber L

Katherine, onye dere edemede ya banyere mmetụta nke akwụkwọ ozi nwanyị Audre Lorde degaara Mary Daly banyere Daly's Gyn / Ecology The Metaethics of Radical Feminism, kwuru na ya na Jewell kesara isiokwu nke edemede ya, onye na-agba ume ma na-ekwusi ike mkpa ọrụ ahụ
Katherine kwuru na nkwenye Jewell 'dị oke mkpa' n'ihi na Katherine hụrụ ọrụ [Jewell] n'anya nakwa n'ihi mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ọrụ [Jewell] na Audre Lorde
Katherine kwuru na ọ chọrọ ịghọta ihe mere Jewell ji chee na edemede Katherine ga-adị mkpa, mana ọ na-ala azụ ịjụ ya
Mgbe Jewell nwụsịrị, Katerine chere na ọ chọtara azịza ya na uri Jewell 'Show You Here'
Valerie Jean, onye Africa America na-ede abụ, na-ede banyere akwụkwọ ozi ya na Jewell nke afọ ise, mmasị ha nwere maka Audre Lorde na mmetụta onwe onye ọnwụ Jewell nwere na edemede na ndụ Jean
Lisa C
Moore, onye guzobere na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke RedBone Press, raara onwe ya nye Does Your Mama Know? An Anthology of Black Lesbian Coming Out Stories
O dere, sị “Na ncheta Terri Jewell, onye mụnyere ọkụ n’obi m na n’okpuru azụ m ma mee ka m na-aga”

N'afọ 2018, Voices of the Revolution, otu okwu ọnụ, nke Susan Harris, Laurie Hollinger na TariMuñiz guzobere, mere ememe ọrụ Pat Parker, Terri Jewell, June Jordan na ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ dị ike, ndị na-eme mgbanwe na Mgbako Ụmụ nwanyị na-eme mmemme kwa afọ nke ịrị atọ na atọ nke emere na Edgewood United Church na East Lansing, Michigan
N'afọ 2019, Su Penn duziri mkparịta ụka banyere ndụ Jewell na Mgbako Ụmụ nwanyị na-eme mmemme kwa afọ nke ịrị anọ nke emere na Edgewood United Church na East Lansing, Michigan
Terri Stander bụ onye kansụl ngalaba nke ngalaba 5 na Nelson Mandela Bay
Ọ bụbu onye omeiwu (MP) maka Democratic Alliance (DA), ndị na-emegide South Africa
Stander gụrụ akwụkwọ na Port Alfred High School n'afọ 2000
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Norufin Housing (Pty) Ltd (Housing Finance Provider) site na 2001 ruo 2005
O nwere nzere BA na Applied Psychology for Professional Contexts site na Mahadum nke South Africa
Stander rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ Human Resources na Central District Municipality na North West n'etiti Ọktoba 2005 ruo Ọgọst 2006
N'afọ 2007, Stander malitere ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ nke ya, HR Solutions
O dere kọlụm maka AVUSA, na-atụle ihe gbasara HR na IR
Ọ bụbu onye otu African National Congress
Ọ sonyeere òtù ahụ mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na CDM
O mechara hapụ òtù ahụ
N'afọ 2009, Stander sonyere na mmemme ndị ntorobịa nke Democratic Alliance
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị usoro ihe omume ahụ, ọ ghọrọ onye otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ma họpụta ya dị ka onye isi oche alaka na Port Alfred
A họpụtara Stander dị ka onye nnọchi anya (PR) maka DA na Ndlambe Local Municipality na 2011
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na anọ , Stander nọ n'ọnọdụ nke anọ na ndepụta DA nke ndị na-azọ ọkwa n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Cape na nke 37 na ndepụta mba DA maka National Assembly
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu mba site na ndepụta mba nke DA
Onye isi ndị omeiwu Mmusi Maimane họpụtara Stander ka ọ bụrụ osote minista na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi
N'abalị atọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2015, onye isi DA bụ Mmusi Maimane họpụtara Stander dị ka osote minista na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ ọha na eze
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote minista na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na 24 Nọvemba 2016
Nhọpụta ya malitere na 1 Jenụwarị 2017

N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2018, Stander meghere ikpe aghụghọ na nrụrụ aka megide onye isi obodo Enoch Mgijima bụ Sisisi Tolashe, onye bu ya ụzọ bụ Lindiwe Gunuza-Nkwentsha na ndị ọrụ obodo ndị ọzọ
Stander kwuru na ọ họpụtara ha n'ihi na obodo ahụ enyeghị ọrụ nakwa na nrụrụ aka amụbaala n'okpuru nlekọta ha
N'afọ 2019, Stander guzoro maka nhọpụta ọzọ na 123rd na ndepụta mba DA na nke 11th na ndepụta ndị DA nke Eastern Cape
A họpụtaghachighị ya na ndị omeiwu ka nkwado ntuli aka nke DA belatara

N'ọnwa Septemba 2021, a mara ọkwa Stander dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye kansụl mpaghara nke DA maka ngalaba 5 na Nelson Mandela Bay Metropolitan Municipality maka ntuli aka gọọmentị ime obodo na 1 Nọvemba 2021
A họpụtara ya na ntuli aka
Terry 'Buzzy' Johnson (amụrụ Isaiah Johnson, November 12, 1938), bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu, ónyé na-ede egwu na ónyé na-emepụta egwu
A mụrụ Johnson na Baltimore, Maryland, ma too dị ka ónyé agbata obi nke Sonny Til nke The Orioles na Earl Hurley nké The Swallows
N'afọ 1954, Johnson guzobere The Whispers (enweghị njikọ na otu a ma ama na Los Angeles) ya na ndị enyi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị anọ, ma dekọọ maka Gotham Records (nke dị na Philadelphia, Pennsylvania)
O dere, hazie ma bụrụ abụ na 'Fool Heart' na 'Are You Sorry?', nkè e wepụtara na 1955
N'afọ 2017, Johnson wepụtara egwu abụọ No
1 na European Indie Music Chart na-emebi ndekọ màkà ịbụ No
1 màkà izu anọ ma gosipụta ya na ọtụtụ playlist na Spotify
Magazin Pollstar na-akpọ ya 'Musical Chameleon'

Boyz II Men kpọtara ya na ónyé ya na ya na-emepụta Theresa Trigg maka mbipụta CD ha nke afọ 2017 n'okpuru The Streetlight, ebe ha mepụtara usoro ya a ma ama nke 'I Only Have Eyes For You', nke Johnson haziri, bụrụ ma kpọọ ụbọ maka The Flamingos
Terry Roger Adkins (n'ubochí itoolu n'ọnwa Mée, 1953 rụo ụbọchị asatọ n'ọnwa Febụwarị, 2014) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
Ọ bụ Prọfesọ nke Fine Arts na School of Design na Mahadum Pennsylvania
A mụrụ Adkins na Washington, DC
na úbọchị itoolu n'ọnwa Mee, 1953, n'ime ezinụlọ na-agụ egwú
Nnà ya, Robert H
Adkins, ónyé nkuzi kemịkal na sayensị na ónyé agha Korea, bụrụ abụ ma kpọọ ụbọ akwara; nné ya, Doris Jackson, ónyé nọọsụ, bụ ónyé na-egwu clarinet na ónyé na-akpọ piano
Nná nná Adkins bụ Rev
Andrew Adkins, pastọ nke Albert Street Baptist Church nke akụkọ ihe mere eme na Alexandria, Virginia
Nwanne nne ya Alexandra Alexander bụ onye mgbakọ na mwepụ na onye na-emebi koodu NSA
Nwanne nna ya Dr
Rutherford Adkins, onye bụbu Tuskegee Airman na 100th Fighter Squadron nke 332nd Fighter Group, gbara ụgbọ elu agha irí na anọ ma mesịa ghọọ onye isi oche nke iri na otu nke Mahadum Fisk
Dị ka nwa okorobịa, Adkins mere atụmatụ ịbụ ónyé na-agụ egwú, mana na kọleji ọ hụrụ onwé ya ka ọ na-adọrọ mmasị na nka anya
N'ịbụ ónyé Aaron Douglas na Martin Puryear duziri, ọ nwetara BS
na obibi akwụkwọ na Mahadum Fisk dị na Nashville, MS
sochiri n'ọhịa na Mahadim Illinois State na MFA
na ihe ọkpụkpụ na Mahadam Kentucky
Adkins bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na-agụnye ihe ọkpụkpụ, arụmọrụ, vidiyo, na foto
Ihe osise ya na-abụkarị nke sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ, raara onwé ya nye, ma ọ bụ na-ezo aka na ndị na-agụ egwú ma ọ bụ ngwá egwú; a na-akpọ ihe ntinye na ihe ngosi ụfọdụ mgbé ụfọdụ 'recitals'
Mgbé ụfọdụ, a na-eme ka nhazi ihe ndị a a kpụrụ akpụ rụọ ọrụ na arụmọrụ site n'aka otu ndị otu Adkins, Lone Wolf Recital Corps
Ọ duziri Lone Wolf Recital Corps nke na-arụ ọrụ na ICA London, Rote Fabrik, Zurich, New World Symphony, Miami, PS1 MOMA, na ICA Philadelphia
Adkins rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ
Na mbido, nka Adkins gàrà mba ụwa na ọrụ gosipụtara na Project Binz 39 na Zurich na 1986, na Salama-Caro Gallery na London na 1987

Na 1995 Adkins gosipụtara ọrụ na Whitney Museum of American Art na Philip Morris na New York, na 1997 na International Gallery na Smithsonian Institution na Washington, DC Adkins nwekwara ihe ngosi na 1999 na Institute of Contemporary Art na Mahadum Pennsylvania
N'afọ 2006, e gosipụtara ọrụ ya 'Darkwater', ememe nke WEB Dubois, na Gallery 51 na Massachusetts College of Liberal Arts (MCLA) na Berkshires

N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbè e mesịrị, a gụnyere Adkins na 2008 NeoHooDoo Art for a Forgotten Faith exhibition na MoMA PS1 na New York, nke nyochara ememe na ime mmụọ na nka ma hazie ya na njikọ aka na Houston's Menil Collection
Adkins gàrà mba ụwa ọzọ na 2009, na-egosi ọrụ na Gallery nke American Academy na American Academy na Rome, Ịtali

N'afọ 2012, The Frances Young Tang Teaching Museum and Art Gallery (tang) na Skidmore College na New York kwadoro ihe ngosi nke ọrụ Adkins na ihe ngosi a na-akpọ 'Recital', gụnyere ihe ọkpụkpụ, vidiyo, na foto nke na-asọpụrụ ọtụtụ ndị akụkọ ihe mere eme na akụkụ ndị a na-amaghị nke akụkọ ihe mere ha
N'afọ sochirinụ, e gosipụtara Adkins na ngosi 2013 Radical Presence Black Performance in Contemporary Art na Contemporary Arts Museum Houston
E tinyekwara nka ya na 2014 Whitney Biennial na Whitney Museum na New York City, n'otu afọ ahụ ihe ngosi onwe ya 'Nenuphar' meghere na Salon irí itoolu na anọ gallery

Na-esote, na 2015 Venice Biennale, a gụnyere ihe ọkpụkpụ o mepụtara site na ngwá egwú a chọtara na All The World's Futures, ihe ngosi nke Okwui Enwezor haziri nke na-elekwasị anya na omume mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na nka
Adkins nwụrụ site na nkụchi obi na Brooklyn, New York, na Febụwarị 2014; ọ dị afọ iri isii
Ọ lụrụ Merele Williams (Adkins) ma nwee nwa nwoke, Titus Hamilton Adkins, na nwá nwanyị, Turiya Hamlet Adkins
Na Mahadum Pennsylvania, Adkins bụ onye nkuzi na ónyé nduzi nke ọtụtụ ndị na-ese ihe nkiri nke oge a gụnyere Sandford Biggers, Demetrius Oliver, Nsenga Knight, Jamal Cyrus, na Jacolby Satterwhite
George Lewis chetara ọrụ ya n'ọrụ ya A Recital for Terry Adkins na 2016, nke Ensemble Pamplemousse rụrụ
Terry Dixon (b
Washington, DC, 1969) bụ onye America na-ese ihe nkírí
E nyèrè ya nzèrè Bachelor of Fine Arts na Atlanta College of Art na 1992 na nzèrè Master of Fine Arts site na School of the Art Institute of Chicago na 1995
Usoro nka ya gụnyere eserese, foto, nka kọmputa, vidiyo, na egwu elektrọnik
Ọ bụ ịhụnanya ya màkà jazz na egwu elektrọnik na-akwalite ihe oyiyi Dixon
Ọ na-enyocha njikọ kinetic na ụdị abstract ya ma gosipụta mmetụta siri ike nké nka Africa na ngosipụta abstract
Dixon malitere igosi na 1991 mgbè ọ bi na Atlanta, Georgia, wee daa na ihe nkírí nka na Chicago na BAREWALLS 2000, ihe ngosi nka dị ndụ nkè ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Art Institute of Chicago haziri
Ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na ọha na eze enwetala ọrụ ya, dị ka Sandor Collection na Chicago, The School of The Art Institute of Chicago, na David C
Driskell Center na Mahadum Maryland na College Park
Terry G
Aha Gabriel Oche Amanyi
Amaara ya dịka Akpako Master, Ginjah Master, Hitman
Amụrụ ya 17 Machị 1986 (afọ 34)
Benue Steeti
Nkenụụdị Chante-chante, afuro pọpụ dancehall
Aka ọrụ Otii egwu, Odee egwu, ndekọ egwu, mmepụta egwu, ọgbaa egwu
Ngwa egwu Olu, Kiibọdụ jita piyano ịgba
Years active 2006–present
Lebeelụ TGP Entertainment, Black Wall Street
Ndị egwu D'Money, Jay Pizzle, Indomix, 9ice
Gabriel Oche Amanyi, nke amaara aha ya dịka Terry G, bụ onye egwu na onye na-emepụta egwu na Naịjirịa
A maara ya nke ọma maka ejiji ndị ara ya, egwu ọgbaghara na njirimara sekeseke
'The Punch' akọwaala ya dịka 'otu onye kachasị dị njọ anya n'ụwa,' ndị Vanguard dịka 'onye egwu dị njọ anya', ndị Channels TV dịka 'onye egwu na-apụkarịsị ara na Naịjirịa'
N’afọ 2012, o wepụtara abọm nke anọ ya akpọrọ 'Book of Ginger'
Amụrụ Amanyi na Benue Steeti na 17 Maachị 1986, bụkwa ụbọchị ncheta ọmụmụ nke nne ya
Ọ malitere ịbụ abụ ukwe nke ụka dị n’obodo ya
'Akpako master', ka esi eji obi uto na-akpọ ya, natara otuto dị egwu maka ụdị egwu ya pụrụ iche
Site na abụ ya, o kwetara iji ọgwụ ọjọọ na mmanya
Na Septemba 2014, ọ gwara Jane Augoye nke The Punch na ya akwụsịla ọgwụ ike
O kwuola na 2face Idibia dịka onye nkuzi kachasị akpali ya
A zụlitere ya na Soweto ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ 20, onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Moonyeenn Lee hụrụ Pheto n'otu ìgwè ihe nkiri na Soweto n'oge usoro ihe nkiri maka Tsotsi na Presley Chweneyagae
Mgbe mbụ ya na Tsotsi gasịrị, Pheto pụtara na ihe nkiri ndị ọzọ dịka Catch a Fire (2006), Goodbye Bafana (2007) na How to Steal 2 Million (2012)
Usoro telivishọn ọ rụrụ gụnyere usoro ihe nkiri SABC1 Justice for All (dịka Lerato), Zone 14 (dịka Pinky Khumba) na Jacob's Cross, dịka Mbali
Pheto rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa nke Fikile na SABC2 mini-series Hopeville, site n'ọnwa Machị ruo Eprel 2009
E mechara mee usoro ahụ ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri na-enweta ihe nrite
N'afọ 2011, mgbe ọ hapụsịrị South Africa iji nwalee ihu ọma ya na Hollywood, ọ nwetara ọrụ ugboro ugboro nke dọkịta na-awa obi, Dr
Malaika Maponya, na ihe nkiri ncha America The Bold and the Beautiful
Ọ bụ isiokwu nke otu ihe omume nke usoro ihe omume Nicky Greenwall kwadoro The Close Up, nke gosipụtara na etv na eNews Channel n'afọ 2012
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ bụ isiokwu a kpọtụrụ aha na nke mbụ nke oge nke abụọ nke usoro ihe omume SABC1 Play Your Part, nke emere na 9 Julaị 2012
N'afọ 2010 ọ bụ onye ọka ikpe ọbịa na asọmpi SABC1 nke Class Act, na 'Film Noir'
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na ihe nkiri The Toilet (nke Bongani Linda duziri) na The Devil's Protest, nke Thulani Didi duziri
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2008, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi na mkpọsa maka L'Oréal
E gosipụtakwara ya n'ọtụtụ magazin, gụnyere Destiny, Vanity Fair, Drum, You/Huisgenoot, Y-Magazine, Bona, Heat, Elle, Cosmopolitan, Marie Claire na True Love
Tesfamariam (Tigrinya ተስፋማርያም, Amharic ተስፋማriam; site na ተስፋ (t Sit) 'olileanya' na ማርያም (mariyami) 'Mary') bụ aha nna na aha enyere nke Eritrean na Ethiopian Ndị ama ama nwere aha a gụnyere
Tesfaye (Amharic ተስፋዬ), nke atụgharịkwara dị ka Tesfay na Tesfai, bụ aha nwoke sitere na Etiopia nke nwere ike na-ezo aka
Tesfaye Geleta Urgessa (a mụrụ n'afọ 1983) bụ onye Ethiopia na-ese ihe si Addis Ababa, nke bi na Germany
Tesfaye Urgessa gụrụ akwụkwọ n'okpuru Tadesse Mesfin na Ethiopia
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Ale School of Fine Arts and Design, Addis Ababa na 2006, nakwa State Academy of Fine Arts Stuttgart na 2014
Ndị prọfesọ gụrụ maka nka na Russia na 1970s na 1980s kụziiri Urgessa, mgbe mmegharị nka kachasị bụ eziokwu mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ihe ha lekwasịrị anya bụ ọmụmụ anatomy, nke metụtara ụdị Urgessa
N'oge a, site na nyocha ịntanetị, omume Urgessa sitere na mkpali sitere n'aka ndị na-ese ihe a ma ama na Europe nke gụnyere Picasso, Lucian Freud na Francis Bacon
Ihe oyiyi Tesfaye Urgessa nwere isiokwu nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, klas, obi ọjọọ ndị uweojii, ikpe na-ezighị ezi na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ike
Ọ na-ejikọta ihe atụ ọdịnala na ihe osise ndị Etiopia, Cubism, na 1980s German Neo-expressionism
Urgessa gosipụtara na 'Oltre / Beyond' na The Uffizi Gallerie na Florence na 2018, na ọzọ na 2021
Uffizi na-akwadokwa ọrụ ya na nchịkọta ya na-adịgide adịgide, na 'Von Denen Die Auszogen' na State Galerie Villa Streccius, na Landau Germany na 2019
Teshome H
Gabriel (September 24, 1939 , June 14, 2010) bụ onye ọkà mmụta ihe nkiri America a mụrụ n'Etiopia na prọfesọ na UCLA School of Theater, Film and Television na Los Angeles
A na-ewere Gabriel dị ka ọkachamara na ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri nke Africa na mba ndị na-emepe emepe
Onye ọrụ ibe ya na UCLA, Vinay Lal, kwuru na Gabriel bụ 'otu n'ime ndị ọkà mmụta mbụ na-ekwu okwu n'ụzọ dị oke egwu banyere ihe nkiri nke ụwa nke atọ'
A mụrụ Gabriel na Ticho, Etiopia, na Septemba 24, 1939
Ọ kwagara United States na 1962
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta bachelor na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na 1967 wee nweta akara ugo mmụta masters na Education media na 1969, ha abụọ sitere na Mahadum Utah
Ọ gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na UCLA, ebe ọ nwetara nzere masta na nka ihe nkiri na 1976 yana doctorate na ihe nkiri na ihe onyonyo na 1979
Gabriel malitere ịkụzi ihe na UCLA na 1974 wee bụrụ osote prọfesọ na UCLA School of Theater, Film and Television na 1981
Akwụkwọ Gabriel gụnyere Cinema nke atọ na ụwa nke atọ The Aesthetics of Liberation in 1982 na Third Cinema Exploration of Nomadic Aesthetics & Narrative Communities
O deziri Otherness na Media The Ethnography of the Imagined and the Imaged, nke e bipụtara na 1993
Ọ jere ozi dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ Mberede Journal for Study of Media and Composite Cultures
Na mgbakwunye, Gebriel hibere Tuwaf (Ìhè), akwụkwọ akụkọ Etiopia na nka nke e bipụtara n'asụsụ Amharic
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na bọọdụ nchịkọta akụkọ Tuwaf site na 1987 ruo 1991
Teslim Balogun Stadium bụ otu na ámá egwuregwu a na-eji eme ọtụtụ ihe na Surulere, Lagos, Nigeria
A na-ejikarị ya eme ihe dika egwuregwu bọọlụ ma na-eje ozi dị ka ebe obibi nke ụlọ akụ First Bank FC
Ndị otu egwuregwu rugby nke mba Naịjirịa na-ejikwa ebe ahụ
Ámá egwuregwu ahụ nwere ike inabata opekanpe mmadụ dika 24,325, a na-ejikwa ya eme ihe mgbe ụfọdụ maka egwuregwu bọọlụ mba ụwa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ebe a na-eme asọmpi ikpeazụ nke Naịjirịa FA Cup, obere oge tupu ọ kwado egwuregwu ụfọdụ na asọmpi ndị ntorobịa FIFA U-17 World Cup nke 2009 nke e mere na Naịjirị
Ọ dị n'akụkụ Lagos National Stadium
A na-akpọ ya aha onye bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ Teslim Balogun
ọ malite na afọ 1984 n'okpuru nchịkwa nke gọvanọ ndị agha Gbolahan Mudasiru, owuwu ahụ nọgidere na-akwụsị n'okpuru ọchịchị ndị agha ma ámá egwuregwu ahụ ghọrọ enyí ọcha
Ka ọ na-erule mgbe e wuchara ámá egwuregwu ahụ na 2007, o were afọ iri abụọ na atọ iji wuo ya ma kwụọ ihe karịrị ijeri N13
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya dị ka afọ 2006, ndị na-enweghị ebe obibi na ụmụ nwoke nọ na ya
Ihe omume mbụ e mere n'ámá egwuregwu ahụ bụ 18th Mobil Track and Field Athletics Championship na 17 Mee
Ámá egwuregwu ahụ mekwara egwuregwu Super Four nke Nigeria Premier League n'oge ahụ na nke ikpeazụ nke Nigeria FA Cup na 2007
E mere asọmpi ikpeazụ nke 2009 Federation Cup n'etiti Enyimba na Sharks n'ámá egwuregwu ahụ
Ogige egwuregwu Teslim Balogun bụkwa ebe a na-eme emume egwuregwu mba nke iri na asatọ na Disemba 2012
N'afọ 2018, n'oge ụbọchị nnwere onwe Naịjirịa (1 Ọktoba 2018); E mere asọmpi Crawford Age na ọdọ mmiri Olympic Standard nke ámá egwuregwu ahụ
Ọ bụ onye Naijiria Architect OC
Majoroh nke Majoroh Partnership haziri ámá egwuregwu ahụ
Àtụ Lagos
Tessa Peake-Jones (amuru 9 Mee 1957) bu onye omekorita bekee
Peake-Jones gụrụ akwụkwọ na Kenmore Park Junior School, Harrow na Downer Grammar School, nke a maara ugbu a dị ka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Canons, tupu ọzụzụ na Central School of Speech and Drama
A kacha mara Peake-Jones maka ịkpọ Raquel Turner, onye ogologo oge nke onye isi agwa Derek 'Del Boy' Trotter, na ihe nkiri naanị nzuzu na ịnyịnya
O nwere ọrụ mmekọ ọnụ na usoro ihe nkiri TV na 1999 olulu dị na Nwunye na Ọnwụ
Ihe ngosi onyonyo ya ndị ọzọ gụnyere The Demon Headmaster, Midsomer Murders, Casualty, Holby City, The Bill, Up the Garden Path and So Haunt Me
N'afọ 2013, ọ pụtara na ihe omume ekeresimesi Dọkịta bụ ' Oge Dọkịta ', na-egwu agwa akpọrọ Marta
Na ọnwa nke atọ na afọ 2008 ọ pụtara dị ka onye ọrụ na Channel 4 ejije Poppy Shakespeare
Nịm n'ụlọ ọgwụ psychiatric, mmepụta ahụ nwekwara kpakpando Naomie Harris na Anna Maxwell Martin
Kemgbe 2014 ọ pụtara na Grantchester dị ka Oriakụ Sylvia Maguire, onye na-elekọta ụlọ okpukpe na onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ
Na 2019, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri ITV All Star Musicals, na-abụ ' Mamma Mia ' site na Mamma Mia! egwu; ọ natara ngụkọta nke 17 n'ime kpakpando 20
Onye mmekọ Peake-Jones bụ Douglas Hodge, bụ onye nọchiri ọnọdụ nwa ya nwoke Damien Trotter dị ka onye toro eto na naanị ndị nzuzu na ịnyịnya na- eme ihe nkiri ' Ndị dike na ndị obodo '
Ha mara ọkwa na ha gawara onwe ha na onwa nke abụọ na afọ 2013 mgbe afọ 27 gachara
Ha nwere ụmụ abụọ otu nwa nwanyị, a mụrụ na 1991; na nwa nwoke, a mụrụ c

Theresa Ọbụmneme Okoli bụ onye nke anọ bụrụgoro onye isi na Federal College of Education (Teknụzụ), Ụmụnze
Na 17 Mee 2018, Onyeisiala Naịjirịa, Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara ya ka ọ nọchie onye nnọchiri anya onye isi kọleji ahụ, bụ Dọkịta Cicilia Nonye Ibekwe
A mụrụ Tessy n’ezinaụlọ Aniagbọsọ n’obodo Okpuifite, Agulu, nke dị okpuru ọchịchị Anaọcha, Anambara Steeti
Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na St
Augustine's Praịmarị Sukulu, Ogun Steeti
O were gaa n'ihu gụọ na Girls Sekọndịrị Sukulu, Awgbu, Anambra Steeti, site na 1971–1984, ebe ọ nwetara asambodo nke West Afrịkan Senior School (WASSCE)

Ọ gawara mahadum Anambra Steeti Koleji of Education (ugbu a, Nwafọr Orizu College of Education, Nsugbe, Anambra Steeti), ebe ọ gwụchara dịka nwata akwụkwọ kacha mma na Ngalaba nke Mmụta Agịrịki na 1988
O nwetara asambodo Bsc na Mmụta Agịriki na 1990 na Mahadum nke Naịjirịa, Nsụka ya na kwa nzere nke Masịta na 1995 na otu mahadum
N’afọ 2011, o nwetara akara ugo mmụta Doctorate na Mahadum Sayensị na Nkà nke Enugwu Steeti

Na 3 Machị 1992, Tessy bidoro ọrụ ya na Federal Kolejil of Education (Teknụzụ), Umunze dịka osote onye nkuzi na ngalaba Mmụta AgịrikiỌ bụ onye nkuzi na 2007, emesịa bụrụ onye isi nkuzi na 1 Oktoba 2011wee bụrụ onye isi nkuzi na 1 October 2011
O jere ozi dị ka Diinụ, Ụlọakwụkọ nke Ugbo na Mmụta Nlekọta Ụlọ, Diinụ, Mmụta Affairs, Nchịkọba, Sanwichi Mmemme, Onye Nchịkọba, Na-aga n'ihu Mmụta Mmemme (CEP), Isi nke Ngalaba, Mmụta Ọrụ Ugbo

Ọ bụ onye otu ọtụtụ ndị ọkachamara, dịka Science Teachers Association of Naịjirịa (STAN), Naịjirịa Association of Teacher of Technology (NATT), Teacher Registration Council of Nigeria (TRCN), Women in Colleges of Education (WICE) na Naijirịa Institute of Management (NIM)
Ọ bụ onye odeakwụkwọ nke Association nke Women in Colleges of Education (WICE)
Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche, Forum for African Women Educationalist of Nigeria (FAWEN), FCET nke Ụmụnze

Na 17 Mee 2018, Onye isi ala nke Naịjirịa, Muhammadu Buhari, họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi nke anọ nke Federal College of Education (Teknụzụ), Umunze iji nnọchie onye isi kọleji ahụ, bụ DrCicilia Nonye Ibekwe, otú a, mere ya onye mbụ
ndị ụlọ ọrụ kọleji ha rigoro dịka Provostu
Na 2019, ndị ụlọ akwụkwọ kọleji nke Education Academic Staff Union, (COEASU) nyere ya nkwanye ugwu dịka onye nwere ugwu gụrụ na Mahadum nke Naịjirịa, Nsụka
Ndị otu Orumba Traditional Rulers Council, Anambra Steeti chiri ya echichi nke aha o ritere bụ Mma Chinyereugo na Orumba
Eveline Tete Chelangat (amụrụ n'abalị isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1960) sabiny site n'otu agbụrụ bụ onye omeiwu Ugandan ruo afọ iri
Ọ na-anọchite anya Bukwo Kongasis Constituency dị ka nwanyị MP
Ọ bụ onye NRM (National Resistance Movement) Party na National Assembly
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị nke Bukwo ebe ọ nọdụrụ maka PLE ya
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara ụmụ agbọghọ Kidetok, Serere maka ọkwa O ya tupu ọ banye na kọleji Sebei, Tegeres
O nwere diplọma na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya site na Nsamizi Institute (Mpigi)
Ọ bụ onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya site na ọrụ na Pentacostal site na okpukpe

Eveline Tete Chelangat sonyeere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị wee malite site na District Councilor LC5, na afo 2006 e nyere Bukwo District otu distrikti ma ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya nwanyị na Parliament nke Uganda n'okpuru National Resistance Movement ruo na afo 2016
Tethersonde bụ ụdị radiosonde eji eme ihe na sayensị ikuku màkà ụda ikuku
A na-ejikọta Tethersondes na balloons kwụ ọtọ ma ọ bụ tethered site na eriri dị íchè ma enwèrè ike ịkwaga n'elu na ala eriri iji nweta ọtụtụ ọgụgụ ikuku
Tetrachaete bụ ụdị osisi dị n'ezinụlọ ahịhịa
Mmalite nke aha ụdị ahụ bụ Grik, saịtị na tetra maka 'anọ' na chaite, maka 'bristle'
Enwere naanị otu ụdị a maara, Tetrachaete elionuroides, nke sitere na Eritrea, Ethiopia, Somalia, Kenya, Tanzania, Yemen, na Oman
Tetraodontidae bụ ezinụlọ nke azụ mmiri na nke estuarine nke usoro Tetraodontiformes

Ezinụlọ ahụ gụnyere ọtụtụ ụdị a ma ama nke a na-akpọ pufferfish, puffers, balloonfish, blowfish, blowies, bubblefish, globefish, swellfish, toadfish, toadies, toadle, honey toads, sugar toads, na sea squab
Tetteh Adzedu bụ onye na-emepụta ejiji na Ghana
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1949 na Odumase Krobo
Adzedu mụtara na mbụ ịbụ onye na-akwa ákwà, wee gaa n'ihu na ọmụmụ ihe na imewe ejiji
N'afọ 1978, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Ardis School of Fashion Design na Washington, DC
Ọ na-elekwasị anya n'ụzọ pụrụ iche n'ichekwa na ime ka uwe Afrịka dịghachi ndụ maka ụmụ nwoke
Dabere na mmụta nke ya, ọ bụ onye isi ike na-agbaso ọdịnala
Ọtụtụ ndị isi ala Afrịka na-eyi uwe elu sitere na akara ya
Maka ndị ahịa a dị elu, ọ naghị agbanwe atụmatụ ndị bụ isi
N'ozuzu ya, ọ na-anwale akwa ngwa
Ọ bụ ezie na ọ na-arapara na usoro sitere na haute couture, a maara ya maka ịghara ịhapụ akụkụ mmekọrịta nke uwe
N'akụkụ akara ejiji ya Adzedu of Shapes, ọ na-agba mbọ ịkwalite ejiji Africa n'ozuzu ya, dị ka ọzụzụ na ụlọ akwụkwọ ejiji nke ya na dịka onye bụbu onyeisi oche nke Ghana Fashion Designers Association
N'afọ 1990, Adzedu meriri Ihe nrite Ghana National Award for Export Achievement
N'afọ 1998 ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-emepụta ejiji atọ n'Afrịka meriri Ihe nrite Principal Prince Claus Award; abụọ ndị ọzọ bụ Oumou Sy si Senegal na Alphadi si Mali
Tewfik Saleh bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye edemede nke Ijipt
A na-edekwaaha ya dị ka Tawfik Saleh na Tewfiq Salah
A mụrụ Saleh na 27 Ọktoba 1926, na Alexandria
Ọ bụ ezie na nna ya megidere mmasị ya n'ime ihe nkiri, ọ ka na-ewere ihe nkiri dị ka nnukwu mmasị ya
N'afọ 1949, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Victoria College of Alexandria Ọ nwụrụ na 18 Ọgọst 2013 na Cairo
Texas bu state no n'ime ala ndi United States of Amerika
A mụrụ Jamwa na mpaghara Tororo
O nwere nzere bachelọ na Social Works and Social Administration (SWASA)
O nwetakwara diplọma post-graduate na Masters na Public Administration na Mahadum Arkansas
N'afọ 1994, Jamwa nwere ihe ịga nke ọma na ntuli aka nke Constituent Assembly iji nọchite anya ụmụ nwanyị nke Tororo dị ka onye nnọchi anya Constituent Assembly (CAD)

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọkwa a n'agbata na afọ 1994 na afọ 1995 mgbe obere oge gachara, ọ gbara ọsọ maka onye omeiwu maka West Budama ọ meriri Minista na-ahụ maka ọrụ n'oge ahụ, Henry Obbo na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2001
N'afọ 1994, Jamwa na Winnie Byanyima, Esther Dhugira Opoti, Benigna Mukiibi, Solome Mukisa na Betty Akech Okullo guzobere Forum for Women in Democracy (FOWODE), otu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi obodo (RDC) maka mpaghara Kaberamaido, ọkwá ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na afọ 2005 iji ruo eru maka ntuli aka nke Uganda n'afọ 2006
Otú ọ dị, na afọ 2012, a kọrọ na ọ nwere oge na-agba ọsọ na Tororo District Service Commission
Ọ ka nọ n'otu ọkwa ahụ na afọ 2015 mgbe ọ na-azọ ' osote onye isi oche nke National Resistance Movement (NRM) Women's League na-anọchite anya mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ
Thérèse King (15 Julaị 1934 na Ziguinchor 16 Eprel 2015 na Dakar) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Senegal
Ọ bụ Minista nke Ahụike Ọha site n'ọnwa Eprel 5th, 1988 ruo n'ọnwa Machị 27th, 1990 n'okpuru onye isi ala Abdou Diouf
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị mbụ bụ ndị minista gọọmentị na Senegal, na nwanyị nke abụọ bụ Minista nke Ahụike Ọha mgbe Marie Sarr Mbodj gasịrị
N'afọ 2010, e mere ya Grand Cross nke National Order of the Lion
Thérèse Sita-Bella (1933 na 27 Febụwarị 2006), a mụrụ Thérèse Bella Mbida, bụ ónyé nduzi ihe nkírí Cameroon nke ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ na-eme ihe nkírí n'Africa na Cameroon
A mụrụ ya n'ebo Beti dị na ndịda Cameroon, ọ natakwara ndị ozi ala ọzọ Katọlik agụmakwụkwọ ya
N'afọ 1950, mgbè ọ nwetasịrị nzèrè bachelọ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na isi ọbọdọ Cameroon nke Yaoundé, ọ gàrà Paris iji gaa n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya
Ọ bụ na France ka mmasị ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ na ihe nkírí malitere
N'afọ 1955, Sita-Bella malitere ọrụ ya dị ka ónyé nta akụkọ
Ka e mesịrị, na 1963, Sita-Bella ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ na-eme ihe nkírí na Cameroon na Africa niile
Site na 1964 ruo 1965, Sita-Bella rụrụ ọrụ na France na akwụkwọ akụkọ French La Vie Africane, nke ya na ya mepụtara
Mgbè ọ laghachiri Cameroon na 1967, ọ sonyeere Ministry of Information wee bụrụ Deputy Chief of Information
Na 27 Febụwarị 2006, Sita-Bella nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị na Yaoundé site na ọrịa kansa eriri afọ
E liri Sita-Bella na ili ozu Mvolye na Yaoundé
A gụrụ ụlọ ihe nkírí Sita Bella na Cameroon Cultural Centre aha ya

Thích Nhất Hạnh (/ˈtɪk ˈnjʌt ˈhʌn/; Vietnamese [thǐk 1910 ɲə̌t hâjŋ́́́́] (nụrụ); a mụrụ Nguyễn Xuân Bảo; 11 Ọktoba 1926 ̆ 22 Jenụwarị 2022) bụ onye mọnk Buddha nke Vietnamese Thiền, onye na-eme udo, onye edemede na-emepụta ihe, onye na onye na-ede uri na onye nkuzi, onye guzobere Plum Village Tradition, nke a maara n'akụkọ ihe mere eme dị ka isi ihe maka okpukpe Buddha
A maara ya dịka 'nna nke uche', Nhất Hạnh nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na omume ọdịda anyanwụ nke okpukpe Buddha
N'etiti afọ 1960, Nhất Hạnh guzobere School of Youth for Social Services ma mepụta Order of Interbeing
A chụpụrụ ya na South Vietnam n'afọ 1966 mgbe o kwupụtara mmegide megide agha ahụ ma jụ ịzọ akụkụ
N'afọ 1967, Martin Luther King Jr
họpụtara ya maka Nobel Peace Prize

Nhất Hạnh guzobere ọtụtụ ebe obibi ndị mọnk na ebe mmega ahụ ma nọrọ ọtụtụ afọ na-ebi na Plum Village Monastery, nke o guzobere n'afọ 1982 na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ France nso Thénac, na-aga mba ụwa iji nye ezumike na okwu
Nhất Hạnh kwalitere ige ntị miri emi dịka ihe ngwọta na-enweghị ime ihe ike maka esemokwu ma chọọ ịkwalite mmata banyere njikọ nke ihe niile dị na okike
O chepụtara okwu ahụ bụ 'Buddha na-etinye aka' n'akwụkwọ ya Vietnam Lotus in a Sea of Fire
Mgbe afọ 39 nke ịgba ọsọ ndụ gasịrị, e nyere Nhất Hạnh ohere ileta Vietnam n'afọ 2005
N'afọ 2018, ọ laghachiri Vietnam na 'ụlọ nsọ mgbọrọgwụ' ya, Tso Hiếu Temple, nso Huế, ebe o biri ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2022, mgbe ọ dị afọ 95
A mụrụ Nhất Hạnh Nguyễn Xuân Bảo na 11 Ọktoba 1926, n'isi obodo oge ochie nke Huế na etiti Vietnam
Ọ bụ ọgbọ nke iri na ise Nguyễn Đình; onye na-ede uri Nguyễn Djình Chi Hugh, onye dere Lục Vân Tiên, bụ nna nna ya
Nna ya, Nguyễn Đình Phúc, si n'obodo Thành Trung na Thừa Thiên, Huế, bụ onye ọrụ na nchịkwa French
Nne ya, Trần Thị Dĩ, bụ onye na-elekọta ụlọ na Gio Linh district
Nhất Hạnh bụ nwa nke ise n'ime ụmụ isii ha
Ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ ise, ya na nnukwu ezinụlọ ya biri n'ụlọ nne nne ya
Ọ chetara inwe ọṅụ mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa ma ọ bụ asatọ mgbe ọ hụrụ ihe osise nke Buddha dị n'udo, na-anọdụ ala n'elu ahịhịa
N'oge njem ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ gara n'ugwu ebe onye na-anọ naanị ya bi nke a sịrị na ọ na-anọdụ ala ehihie na abalị iji mee udo dị ka Buddha
Ha nyochara ebe ahụ, ọ chọtara olulu mmiri sitere n'okike, nke ọ ṅụrụ ma nwee afọ ojuju zuru oke
Ọ bụ ahụmahụ a mere ka ọ chọọ ịghọ onye mọnk Buddha
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na abụọ, o gosipụtara mmasị n'ịzụ ndị mọnk, nke nne na nna ya, jiri nlezianya na mbụ, mechara hapụ ya ka ọ gaa n'ihu mgbe ọ dị afọ 16
Àtụ Notelist-ua
Thabang Kamogelo Molaba (a mụrụ na 18 Disemba 1994) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nlereanya
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dịka KB Molapo na usoro Netflix Blood & Water
O bu ụzọ bụrụ onye a ma ama mgbe ọ pụtara na Mzansi Magic telenovela The Queen
A mụrụ Molaba ma zụlite ya na Harrismith, Free State na nne na nna ya bụ Lisbeth na Richard, ha abụọ bụ ndị nkuzi
Ọ bụ onye Zulu na onye Sotho
O sonyere na ihe nkiri na Tshiame Youth Club ma soro Patricia Boyer mụọ ihe nkiri tupu ọ kwaga Johannesburg
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere na Logistics na Mahadum Nkà na Ụzụ nke Tshwane
N'ọnwa Julaị 2021, Molaba kwupụtara ahụmahụ ya na ọgwụgwọ
Thabiso Maretlwaneng bụ onye Botswana na-emepụta ihe nkiri na telivishọn na ihe nkiri
O nwetara onyinye African Achievers Award n'afọ 2015
Thabiso Maretlwaneng bụ onye mmeri karate, ma nweta agụmakwụkwọ egwuregwu iji mụọ na Swinburne University of Technology na Australia
Dị ka nwa akwụkwọ, o mepụtara ihe ngosi ogologo oge, Head Up, na-eso njem nke ndị na-eto eto ojii gbara ọsọ ndụ na Australia na-anwa ịbanye na ụlọ ọrụ hip hop nke mba ahụ
Akara ụda maka Head Up meriri ihe nrite na 2009 New York International Independent Film and Video Festival
Ụlọ ọrụ Botswana nke Maretlwaneng bụ Dee-Zone Productions natara ego ndị ntorobịa site na Gọọmentị Botswana
O mepụtara Ntwagolo, ihe nkiri ịrị ise na abụọ na-ele anya na mmetụta nke ọrịa AIDS na Botswana
Pelokgale, usoro nke malitere na 2014, nyochara ime ihe ike dabere na nwoke na nwanyị
Ihe ngosi ntụrụndụ, Pula Power, malitekwara igosi na 2014
N'afọ 2016, e boro Dee-Zone Productions akwụkwọ maka ụgwọ a na-akwụghị ụgwọ

Thabo Makhetha-Kwinana (21 Septemba 1987) bụ onye na-emepụta ejiji nke a maara nke ọma akụkọ Atụmatụ ndị mmadụ maka atụmatụ ya nke na-ejikọta ụdị Africa na ọdịda anyanwụ, na-elekwasị anya na ọdịbendị Basotho
A mụrụ Thabo Makhetha-Kwinana na Lesotho mana ọ si Lesotho kwaga South Africa mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ ma ndi mádu ziri ihe nọr ka ébé ihe mmefu zaa ndị siri ike ịbelata biri ebe ahụ kemgbe ahụ
Ọ biri na Mahikeng, Johannesburg, Pietermaritzburg, Port Elizabeth ma bi ugbu a na Cape Town, Western Cape province nke South Africa
Thabo Makhetha gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Nelson Mandela Metropolitan dị na Port Elizabeth ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na National Diploma in Fashion
N'afọ 2009, o guzobere akara aha ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na otu, nke nne nne ya bụ onye na-akwa akwa kpaliri
Ọ bụ nne ya hụrụ nkà ya mgbe ọ dị obere wee gaa n'ihu ịzụta ya, igwe ịkwa akwa mbụ ya
Ihe osise ya sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ihe nketa Basotho ya, na-elekwasị anya na blanket ọdịnala Basotho, nke ọ na-etinye n'ime uwe ya
A makwaara ya maka ojiji ọ na-eji na ụkpụrụ ndị Afrịka
Thabo Makhetha mere nke mbụ ya na 2014 na Vancouver izu ejiji na Canada, ebe a jara ya mma maka ịdị mma na ihe okike nke ọrụ ya maka nchịkọta Kobo ea Bohali 'Blanketị ndị Prestige'
N'afọ 2014, e nyere Makhetha-Kwinana onyinye mmetụ nke afọ 2014
N'afọ 2015 ọ gosipụtara na South Africa Fashion Week ma gosipụta ya na Lesotho, United Kingdom na Milan, Johannesburg na United States of America
N'afọ 2016 mgbe ahụ, onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Elle Magazine họpụtara uwe kpakpando Thabo maka Ihe Kasị Mma na South Africa
The Nelson Mandela Chambers sọpụrụ ya dị ka otu n'ime Top 40 Under 40 Achievers nke 2014 ma tinye ya na Mail & Guardian Top 200 Young South Africans ndepụta maka 2017
N'afọ 2020, e gosipụtara ya na Black Parade, Platform nke US Superstar Beyonce iji gosipụta ndị na-emepụta ihe kachasị elu n'Africa
E gosipụtara ya n'akwụkwọ dị iche iche, gụnyere Vogue, Elle, na Marie Claire
N'afọ 2017, Louis Vuitton mere ka isi akụkọ site n'ịmepụta nchịkọta ụmụ nwoke site na iji mbipụta yiri nke ahụ dị ka blanket Basotho, ihe na-ese okwu nke kpatara ebubo nke iji ọdịbendị mee ihe

The Thailand Greenhouse Gas Management Organisation (TGO) (Thai) (Thailand Greenhouse Gas management Organisation (TG)); ma ọ bụ, RTGS ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị na-achị onwé ya n'okpuru Ministry of Natural Resources and Environment (MNRE) nké e guzobere site na iwu eze, Establishment of Thailand Greenhouse gas Management Organisation (Public) BE 25507)
Ọ bụ ọrụ ya màkà ibelata gas na-ekpo ọkụ (GHG) na Thailand
Iwu eze ahụ bịdoro n'ubochi asaá n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2007
Dị ka nke 2020 ónyé isi nchịkwa nke Thailand Greenhouse Gas Management Organisation bụ MrKiatchai Maitriwong
Ego mmefu TGO màkà FY2019 bụ 1581 million baht
Thailand bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta Paris màkà mgbanwe ihu igwe n'ubochi irí abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel 2016
O tinyere 'Intended Nationally Determined Contribution' (INDC) màkà mbelata gas na-ekpo ọkụ (GHG) n'etiti 720 nke 'azụmahịa dị ka ọ na-emebu' (BAU) site na 2020
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2030, Thailand ekwewo nkwa belata ikuku GHG site na Pasent iri abụọ ruo iri abụọ na ise site na ntọala BAU 35
Akụkụ nke asaa nke iwu na-eguzobe TGO nyere ebumnuche TGO
Dị ka Bangkok Post si kwuo, na 2006, n'afọ tupu e guzobe TGO, Thailand wepụtara nde tọn 232 (Mt) nke carbon dioxide (CO2), nde tọn irí anọ na anọ nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ site na ọkụ coal
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2016, ikuku CO2 nke Thailand arịgoola ruo nde tọn narị nde atọ na iri anọ na abụọ, nde tọn irí isii na ise nke ya site na ọkụ coal
Ọnụ ọgụgụ nke International Energy Agency (IEA) dị iche ọ na-akọ ọnụ ọgụgụ ngụkọta nke 202 Mt na 2006 na 245 Mt na 2016
As of 2018[update] 2018[update], ikuku na-ekpo ọkụ na Thailand na-aga n'ihu na-abawanye
Obere mbelata na uto GHG kwa afọ nke 33% na 2014 na-adabere na usoro mbelata gas na nchedo site na ọhịa 15

Thamsanqa (Thami) Mnyele (10 Disemba 1948 14 June 1985) bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke a na-ejikọta ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nke African National Congress na Black Consciousness Movement
Ọrụ nka ya malitere n'afọ ndị 1970 mgbe o mepụtara ọrụ na-ekwu maka mmetụta uche na mmetụta mmadụ nke mmegbu
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1980, ọrụ ya gbasoro usoro nke òtù na-eguzogide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, na-eme emume ike na ịdị n'otu nke Afrịka megide ndị mmegbu
A mụrụ Mnyele na Alexandra, na Johannesburg
Nna ya bụ onye ụkọchukwu na African Methodist Episcopal Church, nne ya bụ onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ
E zipuru ya pụọ n'obodo ahụ jupụtara na mpụ gaa n'ụlọ akwụkwọ obibi dị n'ime obodo dị n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Pretoria mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ
Mgbe ọ dị afọ asatọ, nne ya kpọọrọ ya ka ya na nna ya nọrọ, onye lụrụ Lemakatso Dorothy Mnyele ọzọ
nkà nke ọ nọgidere na-enwe n'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ma mee ka ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi J
Walter Thompson were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe osise
N'afọ 1973, ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ ọnwa na-amụ ihe na Swedish Lutheran art center, Rorke's Drift na Natal
Ọ zutere ọtụtụ ụmụ okorobịa ndị ọzọ bụ ndị echiche nke Black Consciousness Movement kpaliri, ọgụ ha na-alụ maka ịha nhata na mpako agbụrụ kpaliri ya
N'afọ 1979, ọ kwagara Gaborone, isi obodo Botswana, ebe ọ sonyeere ndị na-ese ihe, Medu Art Ensemble, ya na enyi ya, onye na-ede uri Wally Serote
E wezụga nka, ndị otu ahụ bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ma nwee nzukọ a ma ama na 1982 nke akpọrọ 'Culture and Resistance'
Mgbe ọ nọ na Botswana, ọ sonyeere ANC ma mụọ usoro ndị agha okpuru n'ogige ANC dị na Caxito Angola
Na June 1985, ndị a dọọrọ n’agha matara na ndị agha South Africa na-abịaru nso, ma Mnyele ahapụbeghị n’oge
N'ụtụtụ nke 14 June, ndị agha south Africa gburu ya
Thandi Modise (Amụrụ na 25 Disemba 1959) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na onye bụbu onye na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Ọ na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka nchekwa na ndị agha
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye isi oche nke National Council of Provinces site n'afọ 2014 ruo afọ 2019 na dị ka Onye Ọkà okwu nke National Assembly of South Africa site n'afọ 2019 ruo afọ 2021
Ọ hapụrụ South Africa n'afọ 1976 iji sonye na African National Congress ma nweta ọzụzụ na Angola
Ọ laghachiri South Africa n'afọ 1978 dị ka onye ọrụ Umkhonto weSizwe
E jidere ya ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ na 1979, na-aghọ nwanyị mbụ na South Africa a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ maka ọrụ MK
NSPCA na AfriForum meghere ikpe nke obi ọjọọ anụmanụ megide Modise
N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Eprel 2021, Ụlọikpe Ógbè Potchefstroom jụrụ ikpe obi ọjọọ anụmanụ megide ya
Ụlọ ikpe ahụ chọpụtara na enweghị ike ịta Modise ụta maka ihe mere n'ugbo ya nakwa na nwoke ọ goro ka ọ lekọta ugbo ya, kwesịrị ịta ụta maka mpụ ndị e mere
Thandi Ndlovu (1953/1954 - Ọgọst 24, 2019) bụ dọkịta South Africa na nwanyị ọchụnta ego nke amara nke ọma dị ka onye tọrọ ntọala nke Motheo Construction Group
A mụrụ Ndlovu na Soweto, South Africa ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Orlando
Na 1976, mgbe ọ ka bu nwa akwụkwọ na Mahadum Fort Hare, Ndlovu banyere n'agha iji gbanarị nlebara anya nke ọrụ nchekwa nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ

N'agbata 1977 na 1984, Ndlovu sonyeere African National Congress dị ka onye otu Umkhonto we Sizwe nke na-arụ ọrụ na mpụga South Africa, si Mozambique gaa Zambia, wee banye n'ebe ndịda Angola, ebe ọ nwetara ọzụzụ; Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ maka Òtù Ndị Kọmunist Na-eto Eto na Moscow, USSR
Na 1984 ọ debanyere aha na Mahadum Zambia ka ọ mụọ ihe gbasara ọgwụ bekee, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ laghachiri South Africa wee banye n'ụlọ ọgwụ Baragwanath na Soweto

Ka ọ na-eme ihe gbasara ọgwụ bekee na South Africa, Ndlovu chọpụtara na ọtụtụ n'ime ọrịa ndị dị n'etiti ndị ọrịa a kpotara ya sitere na Orange Farm metụtara ọnọdụ ibi ndụ dara ogbenye n'ihi enweghị ụlọ zuru oke, nke mere ka ọ tọọ ntọala Motheo Construction na 1997
Achọpụtara ya maka ikike ya ịbanye n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ihe owuwu South Africa nke ụmụ nwoke na-achị, yana maka ịzụlite Motheo ka ọ bụrụ nnukwu ụlọọrụ na-ewu ụlọ gọọmentị, na-arụ ụlọ karịrị pụkụ iri asatọ
Ndlovu nwụrụ n'ihe mberede nke okporoụzọ na 24 Ọgọst 2019 ka ọ na-aga olili ozu na Rustenburg, North West Province
Thandiwe Rose Marry Zungu (amụrụ n'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1960) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na onye omeiwu (MP) maka African National Congress si KwaZulu-Natal
A mụrụ Zungu n'ụbọchị nke itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1960
O nwere asambodo na njikwa na asambodo na idu ndú site na Mahadum Teknụzụ nke Durban
Onye otu African National Congress, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ nke mpaghara Moses Mabhida nke pati ahụ na 1989
N'afọ 2008, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu kọmitii ntụziaka mpaghara nke ANC na kọmitii ọrụ mpaghara
Zungu ghọrọ onye otu kọmitii na-ahụ maka mpaghara nke African National Congress Women's League na 2017
Zungu guzoro dị ka onye omeiwu ANC si KwaZulu-Natal na ntuli aka mba 2019 ma họpụta ya na National Assembly ma ṅụọ iyi na 22 Mee 2019
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2019, Zungu ghọrọ onye otu National Assembly's Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation
A kpọrọ ya aha na Joint Standing Committee on Defence na 5 Septemba 2019
Àtụ Current MPs of South Africa
Thando bụ aha unisex nyere, nke a na-ahụkarị na ndịda Africa, nke pụtara 'ịhụnanya'
Ọ nwere ike na-ezo aka
Masimphuthando ntini (amụrụ n'abalị asaa nke ọnwa Julaị 2000) bụ onye n'eme egwuregwu Kricket South Africa
N'ọnwa Ogustu 2018, Cricket South Africa nyere ya nnukwu ọrụ nkwekọrịta tupu oge egwuregwu 2018-19
Ọ bụ nwa onye otu egwuregwu kricket mbụ bụ Makhaya ntini
Ọ mere mpụta iri abụo mbụ bụ Twenty20 ya maka Western Province na 2018 Africa T20 Cup n'abalị iri na ise nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 2018
Tupu mmalite T20 ya, ọ bụ onye nsonye nke ndị otu South Africa maka 2018 Under-19 Cricket World Cup
O mere ndepụta mpụta mbụ maka Western Province na 2018–19 CSA Provincial One-Day Challenge n'abali iri nke ọnwa Febrụwarị afọ 2019
O mere mpụta izizi klas ya maka Western Province na 2018–19 CSA 3-Day Provincial Cup n'abalị́ iri na anọ nke ọnwa Febrụwarị 2019
N'onwa Septemba 2019, akpọrọ aha ya na ndị otu Western Province maka 2019–20 CSA Provincial T20 Cup
N'ọnwa April 2021, a kpọrọ Ntini aha na South Africa Emerging Men's squad maka njem egwuregwu isii ha gara na Namibia
Ka emechara otu ọnwa ahụ, akpọrọ ya aha na ndị otu KwaZulu-Natal, tupu oge egwuregwu kricket afọ 2021–22 na South Africa

Thando Thabethe (amụrụ 18 June 1990) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri South Africa, àgwà TV na Radio DJ bụ onye na-eweta ihe ngosi ihe nkiri telivishọn Thando Bares All na channel TLC na oge mbanye ugbu a na 947
Ọ bụ onye nnọchianya mbụ nke Nivea na Africa
Na 2019, a kpọrọ Thando otu n'ime Forbes Africa 30 Under 30
Ọ bụkwa onye ọbịa nke 947 Drive With Thando

Thanh Hoa bu no na ala kpo kpo no bu ala no kpo kpu 'achicha'

Thaw bụ ógè snow na ice na-agbaze, na ngwụcha ógè oyi, na ihu igwe oyi
Jenụwarị mbuze bụ ókwú a na-eji eme ihe màkà mbuze ma ọ bụ ịrị elu nke okpomọkụ n'etiti ógè oyi nké dị n'etiti latitude North America

Nkọwa Sinusoidal nké okpomọkụ a tụrụ anya ya, màkà mpaghara ugwu, na-etinye okpomọkụ kachasị ala n'ubochi irí abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị na nke kachasị elu n'ubochi irí abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Julaị, ma nye atụmatụ ziri ezi nke atụmanya okpomọkụ
Okpomọkụ nkezi na North America na-adịkarị iche ugboro abụọ n'ime afọ
N'oge a 'thaw', nke na-adịkarị ihe dị ka otu izu, okpomọkụ na-adị n'ozuzu ihe dị ka Celsius isii (10 °F) karịa ka ọ dị

Nké a na-adịgasị iche site n'afọ ruo n'afọ, na okpomọkụ na-agbanwe agbanwe nke ukwuu nke na ịrị elu dị otú ahụ na ngwụcha Jenụwarị agaghị abụ ihe dị ịrịba ama; ihe dị ịrị elu (na nkè a na-akọwaghị) bụ omume nke ịrị elu dị íchè na-emekarị na ngwụchi Jenụwarị karịa n'etiti Jenụwaray ma ọ bụ mbido Febụwarị, nke atụmatụ sinusoidal ga-adịtụ ọkụ
Ufọdụ ógè (dị ka ugwu Canada) ihe omume a agaghị apụta ìhè dị ka 'ụda' n'echiche teknụzụ, ébé ọ bụ na okpomọkụ ga-anọgide na-adị n'okpuru oyi
A na-ekwere na mbuze nke ọnwa Jenụwarị bụ ihe pụrụ ichè na ihu igwe

Bowen nyèrè usoro anụ ahụ nwéré ike ime màkà ihe ndị dị otú ahụ n'afọ ndị 1950 ọ tụrụ aro na ụfọdụ 'kalenda' (dị ka ọ na-akpọ ha) nwéré ike ịkọwa n'ihe gbásárá ụmụ irighiri meteoric site na orbitary na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ice nuclei na igwe ojii ụwa; echiche ya nwetara nkwado ụfọdụ site n'ọtụtụ isi mmalite
Otú ọ dị, echiche Bowen mechara kwụsị ihu ọma na mmepe nke usoro nhazi ikuku, ọ bụ ezie na otu n'ime mmiri ozuzo ya yiri ka ọ kwekọrọ na ụbọchị nke ọnwa Jenụwarị
Nnyocha data achọtaghị nkwado dị ịrịba ama màkà ihe a na-eche na ọ bụ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị
Ndị dere nyocha a na-ekwu na 'mmetụta nke nnwale na ndekọ ihu igwe zuru oke iji kọwaa ịdị adị nke 'ihe ndị' na-agbaze n'ọnwa Jenụwarị na data okpomọkụ nke ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ US'
Terius Youngdell Nash (amụrụ na Septemba 20, 1977), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ The-Dream, bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu, onye na-ede egwu, na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ

Ihe odide ya gụnyere egwu ya na 'Me Against the Music' (2003) màkà Britney Spears, 'Ride' (2010) màkà Ciara, 'Umbrella' (2007) màkà Rihanna, 'Single Ladies (Put a Ring on It) (2008) na 'Partition' (2013) màkà Beyonce, 'Touch My Body' (2008) màkà Mariah Carey, '16 @ War' maka Karina Pasian (2008), 'Baby' (2010) maka Justin Bieber, 'All of the Lights'(2010) maka Kanye West, na 'No Church in the Wild' (2013) maka Jay-Z na Kanye West
Dị ka onye na-edekọ egwu, ọ wepụtara abọm studio ise n'etiti 2007 na 2013 Love / Hate (2007), Love vs
Ntọhapụ abọm ya kachasị ọhụrụ bụ abọm atọ nke 2018 Ménage à Trois Sextape Vol
1, 2, 3 na abọm 2020 Sextape 4
A mụrụ Terius Nash na Rockingham, North Carolina
Ya na nne ya kwagara Atlanta, Georgia mgbè ọ dị afọ abụọ
Mgbè mbụ ọ mụtara ịkpọ opi n'ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị, Nash mụtara otú e si akpọ ụbọ na ụbọ
Nne ya nwụrụ n'afọ 1992 mgbe Nash dị afọ iri na ise, ihe omume nke ga-akpali ya ide egwu
Ọ na-ekwu na ọnwụ nne ya nyèrè ya 'ebe dị nro' maka ụmụ nwanyị, nke ọ na-ekwu na ọ chọrọ ide egwu banyéré ike ụmụ nwanyị dịka 'Umbrella' nke Rihanna
Ọ kwagara na nna nna ya, onye na-arụ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ nke na-etinye ụkpụrụ ọrụ siri ike na Nash na-eto eto
N'ihe banyéré nna nna ya, Nash na-echeta 'Ọ si n'oge ọjọọ maka ndị isi ojii na ndịda, mana ọ bụ ezie na anyị bi na hood, anyị nwere ụgbọ mmiri, ụfọdụ ụgbọala na ụlọ a kwụrụ ụgwọ
Ya mere enwere m echiche dị iche na ndụ
Ọ dịghị ihe m na-enweghị ike ime
Nash zutere ónyé na-emepụta R&B Laney Stewart na 2001 na Stewart nyeere ya aka inweta nkwekọrịta mbipụta mgbè Nash dere 'Ihe niile' maka abọm B2K Pandemonium!
N'okpuru aha edemede 'The-Dream', Nash malitere ide egwu màkà ndị na-ese ihe na-ewu ewu
O so dee egwu Britney Spears 'Me Against the Music' site na abọm ya In the Zone

Ọ nọrọ afọ abụọ na-arụ ọrụ na abọm nke abụọ nke Nivea bụ Complicated, nke ónyé isi ya mepụtara, ma gaa n'ihu na-ede ma na-emepụta ya na Christopher 'Tricky' Stewart, nwanne Laney, nke dugara Rihanna na 2007 kụrụ 'Umbrella'
A họpụtara 'Umbrella' maka Abụ nke Afọ na 2008 Grammy Awards

N'afọ 2007, Nash bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Def Jam Recordings wee malite ịrụ ọrụ na abọm studio mbụ ya Love / Hate Ọ bụ The-Dream, onye ọrụ ibe ya Tricky Stewart, na Los Da Mystro mepụtara abọm ahụ, ma gosipụta Fabolous na Rihanna
Edere ma dekọọ abọm ahụ n'ime ụbọchị asatọ na egwu iri na abụọ na-eme nke ikpeazụ

N'ịbụ onye a tọhapụrụ na Disemba 11, 2007, na The-Dream's Def Jam imprint Radio Killa Records, abọm ahụ gosipụtara egwu 'Shawty Is a 10', 'Falsetto' na 'I Luv Your Girl' ma nata nyocha dị mmá site n'aka ndị nkatọ, dị ka Rolling Stone kpọrọ ya 'otu n'ime ihe ndekọ R&B kachasị mmá n'afọ' na UrbanMusicReviewscom kwùrù na ónyé na-agụ egwú ahụ 'hit a home run'
Na June 2008, a kpọrọ The-Dream Best New Artist na BET Awards
Na egwu Love King 'Sex Intelligent (Remix),' The-Dream bụrụ abụ na ọ ga-ewepụta abọm na-esote nke akpọrọ Love Affair na June 7, 2011
Na ụbọchị ntọhapụ ahụ, The-Dream wepụtara egwu ọhụrụ abụọ akpọrọ 'Body Work / Fuck My Brains Out' dị ka nbudata n'efu sochiri abọm akpọrọ 1977 na August 31, 2011, dịkwa ka nbudata n'efu
Def Jam Recordings wepụtara 1977 n'ahịa na Disemba 18, 2012, na ndepụta egwu gbanwere
Love Affair na-egbu ógè ugboro ugboro ma gbanwee aha ahụ na The Love, IV, Love IV Diary of a Madman, Love IV MMXII, na n'ikpeazụ IV Play
N'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ atọ n'etiti Love King na IV Play, The-Dream wepụtara egwu 'Roc' na 'Dope Bitch', nkè etinyeghị na ndepụta egwu ikpeazụ màkà IV Play
The-Dream wepụtara abọm akpọrọ Ménage à Trois Sextape Vol
1, 2, 3 na Disemba 2018, na abọm ọzọ akpọrọ Sextape 4 na Eprel 2020
Na mgbakwunye na ọrụ ya na Nivea na Rihanna, Nash edeela ma mepụta egwu màkà ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ ama ama R&B, hip hop, na ndị egwu pop, gụnyere J
Holiday, Usher, Yung Joc, Jesse McCartney, Mariah Carey, Karina Pasian, Ciara, Brandy, Diddy, Mary J
Blige, B2K, Beyoncé na Tulisa Contostavlos
N'afọ 2009, The-Dream na Tricky Stewart dere ma mepụta abọm How to Be a Lady Volume 1 nkè otu ụmụ agbọghọ R&B Electrik Red
The-Dream abụrụla ónyé na-ese ihe na egwú ndị na-ese ihe dịka Plies, LL Cool J, Dear Jayne, Gym Class Heroes, Sterling Simms, Rick Ross, Fabolous, Jamie Foxx, na Snoop Dogg
John Calvert nke The Quietus na-ede na 'stadium-R&B' nke The-Dream gbanwere ụdị ahụ dị ka akụkọ ifo,' na-ezo aka na ya dị ka mmetụta na egwu Frank Ocean nke afọ 2012 'Pyramids'

Ónyé nchịkọta akụkọ Allmusic Andy Kellman na-ede na, ya na Carlos McKinney na Tricky Stewart, The-Dream 'jidere belt màkà ngalaba electronic pop-R&B, nke ndị na-emepụta ihe ọhụrụ Leon Sylvers III, Kashif na Morrie Brown, Prince, Jam & Lewis, Teddy Riley, Timbaland na Missy Elliott, na Neptunes nwere
The-Dream nwere ụmụ itoolu
Mgbe ha na-akpa ọnwa isii, Nash lụrụ enyi ya nwanyị, Nivea n'afọ 2004
Ha nwèrè ụmụ atọ
Nivea gbàrà akwụkwọ maka nkewa iwu na Disemba 10, 2007
Nash kwuru na ọ bụ ezie na ya na Nivea hụrụ n'anya, enweghị ahụmịhe ya n'ezinụlọ na-etolite pụtara na 'a naghị akụziri ya ihe karịrị ịhụnanya [ọ na-ewe] iji nwee mmekọrịta
Dị ka, 'n'ihi na ịhụnanya abụghị naanị ebe ọ ga-agwụ
Ọ pụghị ịmalite ma kwụsị na ịhụnanya
A ghaghị inwe ụfọdụ ihe ọmụma na ndidi nke a na-enweta iji mee ka ọ na-aga n'ihu ma mee ka ọ kwụ ọtọ, achọpụtara m ụzọ siri ike
' E mechiri ịgba alụkwaghịm ha na June 15, 2008
E jidere Nash na June 2013 na Newport Beach, California màkà ebubo ime ihe ike n'ụlọ, mana enyi ya nwanyị Lydia Nam jụrụ ebubo

E jidere Nash na Mee 7, 2014, na ebubo nke mwakpo na ịnyagbu, itinye ụmụaka n'ihe ize ndụ n'ihe ize ndụ megide enyi ya nwanyị dị ime Lydia Nam maka omume ya na Eprel 4, 2013, mgbè ha nọ na Plaza Hotel na New York
A kpochapụrụ Nash ebubo, gụnyere mwakpo mpụ na ịnyagbu, na mpụta dị mkpirikpi na Manhattan Criminal Court
A họpụtara The-Dream ugboro iri na ise maka Grammy Awards, na-emeri ise n'ime nhọpụta ndị a
The 10% Solution for a Healthy Life bụ akwụkwọ ahụike nke onye sayensị kọmputa Ray Kurzweil dere ma bipụta ya na 1993
N'akwụkwọ ahụ, ọ na-akọwara ndị na ya 'Olee otu esi belata abụba na nri gị ma wepụ ihe ize ndụ niile nke ọrịa obi na ọrịa kansa'
E melitela ụfọdụ n'ime aro ya ma degharịa ya n'afọ ndị sochirinụ, ọkachasị n 'Fantastic Voyage Live Long Enough to Live Forever and Transcend Nine Steps to Living Well Forever'
Atherosclerosis bụ ọrịa nke a na-akọwa site na mkpokọta ihe siri ike n'ime mgbidi akwara na ọwa
N'ikpeazụ, ha na-aghọ ihe mgbochi nke na a na'akwụsị ọbara na onye ahụ nwere nkụchi obi
Ọrịa a na-esite na cholesterol karịrị akarị n'ọbara ma na'ahụ ihe dịka pasent iri itoolu nke ndị America, ọ bụ ezie na ọ na - usoro na a naghị achọpụta ya ruo mgbe ndụ ga-adị
Kurzweil kwuru na ọmụmụ ihe dị iche iche na-egosi na mmụba nke atherosclerosis na US na mba ndị ọzọ dị n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ nwere njikọ na oke abụba calorie
N'ọtụtụ ebe n'Eshia, abụba na-eri bụ ihe dị ka pasent iri nke ike nri niile a na'eri, ọrịa obi fọrọ nke nta ka ọ ghara ịdị
Kurzweil gara n'ihu na-egosi na na America, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ pasent iri anọ nke calorie na'anya sitere na abụba
Ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ dị ka American Dietetic Association, American Heart Association na US Surgeon General na-akwado pasent iri atọ nke oriri caloric sitere na abụba
Agbanyeghị, Kurzweil na-ekwu na nke a na-ebute mbelata ntakịrị nke ọkwa atherosclerosis
Ọ na-ekwu na ya na-eche na ụlọ ọrụ ndị a na-eji ọnụ ọgụgụ dị elu arụ ọrụ n'ihi na ha na-eche na ọ dịghị onye ga-anwa ọbụna ịgbalị iru ọkwa dị ala ma ọ bụrụ na a kwadoro ya
Ndị na-akwado Kurzweil, dabere na nchoputa ya, ọ bụ naanị pasent iri nke kalori oriri sitere na abụba
N'ihi ya, ọ kpọrọ ya '10% Solution' Ọ na-ekwu na ọkwa ndị a abụghị nanị na-egbochi Atherosclerosis kama na-eme ka ọ gbanwee n'ọnọdụ ndị dị adị
Nke a na-ebelata ohere nke ọrịa ndị ọzọ gụnyere ọrịa kansa, ọrịa strok, ọbara mgbali elu na ụdị ọrịa shuga 2
O kwenyere na iri nri nke nwere oke abụba na-ebelata ihe ize ndụ nke ọtụtụ ọrịa cancer bụ pasent 90 ma ọ bụ karịa
Kurzweil na-ekwukwa na ọ na-abawanye ume ma na-eduga ná ndụ obi ụtọ n'ozuzu ya
Ọzọkwa ọ na-enye ndụmọdụ maka mmega ahụ, na-atụ aro ịga ije, n'ihi na ọ dị obere mmetụta, ọ dịkwa mfe onye ọ bụla ime
Chọọchị Afrịka bụ òtù Ndị Kraịst nke e guzobere n'ógbè ndị Britain na-achị nke ga-emesị ghọọ Naịjirịa na 1901
E guzobere ya mgbe nnukwu esemokwu bilitere n'etiti ndị ndu Europe nke Chọọchị Anglican na ndị ndu Afrịka

Mgbe etinyere Bishop Samuel Ajayi Crowther (otu n'ime ndị isi ojii Africa kachasị na Chọọchị Anglican na onye nsụgharị Bible n'asụsụ Yoruba) dị ka onye isi Chọọchị Naịjirịa, ọtụtụ ndị ụkọchukwu Afrịka nwetara agụmakwụkwọ na-aga n'ihu nke na-apụghị ịsụgharị ọganihu na idu ndú nke Chọọchị
Nke a dugara na nkewa nke mesịrị duga n'ịmepụta Chọọchị Africa
Akwụkwọ ukwe chọọchị Africa Yoruba mpaghara E bipụtara ya
A na-echeta Chọọchị Afrịka mgbe niile maka iduzi mgbanwe

N'afọ 1901, otu okenye bụ Jacob Kehinde Coker onye a na-akpọ mgbe ahụ People's Warden, duuru ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ pụọ na ụka Anglican iji mee mkpesa maka mmeso ọjọọ a na-emeso ndị Afrịka na chọọchị ndị ọcha
Ndị nnupụisi a mere mkpesa banyere ụzọ ofufe, nke na-enweghị nchebara echiche banyere ngwá egwú ndị Afrịka na eziokwu ahụ bụ na ndị mmadụ ga-eyi uwe Europe ma na-abụ naanị ukwe ọdịda anyanwụ

Chọọchị ahụ mere ozi mbụ ya n'abalị iri na asaa nke onwa Ọktoba afọ 1901 site n'aka JK Coker na otu ndị ụkọchukwu na-ekwenyeghị na ndị isi Chọọchị Anglican Europe nke Bishop Turgwell duziri mgbe ahụ nke St
Paul's Church
Chọọchị ahụ zutere na Rose Cottage, Marina maka ozi mbụ ya (nke a bụ ebe Leventis Stores dị ugbu a, Marina)
N'ịkọwa ahụmahụ ofufe mbụ na ụka a na-eto eto na afọ 1901, Pa Coker na akụkọ ndụ ya a na-ebipụtaghị ebipụta dere, sị
Na Sọnde, n'ụbọchị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba, n'afọ 1901, e mere ozi nsọ mbụ na Rose Cottage n'okpuru okpokoro
E mere atụmatụ na n'etiti ndị ofufe narị isii na narị asatọ na gbakọtara na Rose Cottage maka ozi a a na-agaghị echefu echefu
Ụfọdụ n'ime ndị guzobere ụka ahụ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka ndị ukwe na ndị nguputa ozi ọma D

Oguntolu kwusara ozizi mbụ ya dị ike na-ewere ederede ya site na Song of Solomon isi mbụ amaokwu nke isii 'Elegharala m anya n'ihi na anwụ na-acha m, - ụmụnne m were iwe ma mee ka m rụọ ọrụ n'ubi vaịn
Enweghị m oge ilekọta onwe m'
(RSV) Maazị Oguntolu kwusiri ike na ndị Afrịka anọwo na-efe Kraịst ofufe dị ka ndị Europe na-ele, na-eche ma na-eduzi omenala ha, nkwenkwe na ụzọ ofufe mgbe ha leghaara nke ha anya
O mesiri ike na Kraịst nye ndị Europe bụ onye Europe na ndị Afrịka ọ kwesịrị ịbụ onye Afrịka
O kwusiri ike na a kụziiri ha nke ọma iji mara na Iso Ụzọ Kraịst kwesịrị ịghọ okpukpe Afrịka ugbu a[Tinye edensibịa]
Chọọchị ahụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme mbụ ya chere mkpagbu ihu n'aka gọọmentị na-achị ala na Lagos n'okpuru mmetụta nke CMS Church (Anglican) nke ọ hapụrụ
N'ihi enweghị ike inweta ala, ọ malitere ịgbazite ala site n'aka ndị otu nwere mmetụta ruo afọ ise ma site na usoro a e wuru ụlọ ụka mbụ ya na Lagos, Chọọchị Betel nke B
Roberts, A
Coates na D
Oguntolu gbazitere n'okporo ámá Balogun
E wuru ụlọ ụka ahụ na ụbọchị iri abụọ na asatọ na pound narị atọ na iri ise iji nwee ike ịnabata ndị otu narị isii a
A mehere ya na n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 1901 site n'aka Rev
Williams, vicar nke St
Jude's Church, Ebute-Metta (onye mechara bụrụ Primate)
Chọọchị nke abụọ a maara dị ka Chọọchị Africa, e mechara tinye Salem iche ma duzie mbọ mgbasawanye iche iche
Njikọ nke akụkụ Salem na Betel nke Chọọchị ahụ mechara mee ka o kwe omume n'okpuru aha, African Church Incorporated

Otú ọ dị, ọganihu iji tinye Chọọchị Africa ndị yiri ya (karịsịa, United Native African Church (UNA) na United African Methodist Church (U'A) ) fọrọ nke nta ka ọ banye Chọọchị Afrịka na nsogbu dị n'ime n'etiti afọ 1927 na 1937
Ọ bụ JK Coker duziri mgbalị a, nwoke bara ọgaranya nke a na-elekarị anya dị ka nna nke Ụlọ ụka nke African Independent
Isi ihe kpatara esemokwu ahụ bụ ịlụ karịa otu nwanyị, nke Chọọchị Afrịka machibidoro ndị ụkọchukwu mana chọọchị ndị ọzọ a kwere ka ọ bụrụ
Njikọ ahụ kwụsịrị ma chọọchị ndị a lanarịrị n'ụzọ dị iche na Chọọchị Afrịka
Chọọchị Africa n'adịghị ka Chọọchị Anglican (nke ụbọchị ndị ahụ) mere ụmụ nke ndị na-alụ karịa otu nwanyị baptizim ma kwe ka ndị otu ya were utu aha ọdịnala
Onye isi Chọọchị Afrịka bụ onye isi ya, Dr

Emmanuel Udofia na-eduzi ugbu a ọ bụ ezie na Achịbishọp Julius Olayinka Osayande Abbe n'ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị na n'ụzọ na-enweghị isi na-anọkwasị n'ocheeze dị ka onye isi nke Chọọchị Africa kpọmkwem na Sọnde, abalị iri abụọ na abụọ nke ọnwa Machị afọ 2020 site n'aka onye isi nke Church, Onye isi ya, Abraham Onadotun Olumuyiwa Onanuga na The African, Arch Cathedral, na nọmba iri ise na itoolu nke ogbe Broad na Lagos, National Headquarters nke Chọọchi a katọrọ nke a site na iwu ndị òtù uka na iwu na-eduza usoro ahụ

Ọdịdị Chọọchị Afrịka nwere Primate nke na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi ime mmụọ ma bụrụkwa onye isi nke ndị ụkọchukwu, na Onye isi ala Lay nke bụ onye isi nke otu nguputa ozi ọmaMkpebi ndị dị mkpa na-emetụta Chọọchị bụ ndị ụkọchukwu na ndị nkịtị na-eme

Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị otu ụka dị ihe dị ka nde abụọ na iri asatọ
O nwere ndị ụkọchukwu narị ise na iri asatọ na dioceses iri anọ na asaa, karịsịa na Naịjirịa
Parishes ya n'otu n'otu nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ narị asaa na iri abụọ

Eclipse Afro-Eurasian (nke a na-akpọ A Suite na akụkụ asatọ ) bụ album studio sike n'aka onye pianist America, onye na-ede egwú na bandleader Duke Ellington nke e dekọrọ na 1971 wee wepụta ya na akara Fantasy na 1975
Dị kwasi egwu ụwa ndị ọzọ - mmetụta suites nke mejupụtara n'ime afọ iri ikpeazụ nke ndụ ya, Afro-Eurasian Eclipse na-ewere n'etiti Ellington's 'n'ikpeazụ-oge masterpieces'
The album na emeghe na nkenke okwu okwu mmeghe nke Ellington na-akọwa na aha ụlọ ahụ sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ Marshall McLuhan 's ọhụụ banyere mmalite nke zuru ụwa ọnụ odinala
njirimara
Allmusic enyela album 4 kpakpando, na-akọwa ya dị ka 'na-akpali akpali, cosmopolitan, and organic
