[[Òtù ozi ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke ahụ]
'The Traffic in Women' bụ edemede nke onye edemede ndị nkwenye na enweghị ịkpa oké n'etiti mmadụ na ibe ya bụ Emma Goldman dere n'afọ 1910

E bipụtala ya n'ụzọ dị iche iche, gụnyere n'ime Emma Goldman's Anarchism and Other Essays (1910), nke ndị mbipụta akwụkwọ bụ Mother Earth bipụtara, na dị ka aha, edemede na-eduga nke nchịkọta edemede Emma Goldman The Traffic in Women, and Other Essays on Feminism (1970, Times Change Press, 1971 paperback)
Mother Earth bụ akwụkwọ magazin nke ndi kwenyere na mmadụ niile ha otu kwa ọnwa nke Goldman, Max Baginski, na ndị ọzọ hiwere n'afọ 1906
Edemede a bụ otu n'ime ihe karịrị isiokwu iri abụọ(29) Goldman dere n'oge 1906 ruo n'afọ 1940

Edere edemede a iji meghachi omume nke ndị na-eme mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya n'oge a na-eme mkpọsa megide ịgba ohu ndị ọcha, ndị mkpọsa iwu Goldman kwuru na ọ ga-arụ ọrụ naanị iji mepụta 'ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị buru ibu' maka 'parasites'
N'ime edemede ahụ, ọ na-arụ ụka na isi ihe kpatara ịgba ohu ndị ọcha, nke ndị mgbanwe a leghaara anya, bụ mmegbu ndị isi ala
Goldman na-akatọ ọrụ nke ụka Ndị Kraịst rụrụ na akụkọ ihe mere eme na-agba ume na ịnọgide na-agba akwụna

Goldman na-egosi alụmdi na nwunye dị ka otu usoro dị ka ịgba akwụna, na-arụ ụka na n'ọnọdụ abụọ ahụ, a na-ere ma na-ekesa ụmụnwanyị, ma na-akatọ 'ndị na-ahụ maka omume' ndị na-akatọ ịgba akwụna, mana ọ bụghị alụmdi na nwunye maka ego

Goldman na-ekwu na ụkpụrụ abụọ gbasara mmekọahụ nwoke na nwanyị na-amanye ụmụnwanyị na-enwe mmekọahụ n'èzí alụmdi na nwunye n'ime ndụ ịgba akwụna, si otú a 'ọha na-emepụta ndị ọ na-emegbu na-emesị gbalịa iwepụ n'efu
Onye edemede nwanyị na-ahụ maka ụmụnwanyị nke America bụ Alix Kates Shulman kwadoro edemede ahụ n'ụzọ siri ike, na-agụ ya n'ozuzu ya n'ime ndekọ nke ikpe omebe iwu banyere ịgba akwụna na New York
Ọ na-arụ ụka na ọmịiko Goldman nwere maka ndị akwụna bụ n'ihi njirimara ha, 'n'ihi ogo ha nakwa n'ihi na ha megidere ihu abụọ mmekọahụ nke Puritanism
Edemede a bụ ihe mkpali maka edemede Gayle Rubin nke afọ 1975 'The Traffic in Women Notes on the 'Political Economy' of Sex

Ọ bụ ezie na Rubin na-eso Goldman na-arụ ụka na ịgba akwụna bụ akụkụ nke otu akụkụ dị ka alụmdi na nwunye, ọ na-ewulikwa echiche nke Claude Levi-Strauss na Sigmund Freud, iji kọwaa 'usoro mmekọahụ / nwoke na nwanyị' nke azụmahịa ndị dị otú ahụ nwere ike ime
Miriam Schneir tinyekwara ederede a na anthology Feminism The Essential Historical Writings, na-akpọ ya otu n'ime ọrụ dị mkpa nke feminism
The Triumph of Doubt Dark Money and the Science of Deception
The Triumph of Doubt Dark Money and the Science of Deception bụ akwụkwọ David Michaels bipụtara n'afo 2020
E bipụtara ihe sitere na ya bu akwụkwọ ahụ na Jenụwarị 2020 na Boston Review
Mmeri nke Obi abụọ na-amalite sitere n'isi mmalite mbụ na isiokwu nchịkọta akpọrọ 'The Science of Deception'

Ọtụtụ isiakwụkwọ ndị sochirinụ na-elekwasị anya n'ụzọ ụlọ ọrụ ndị nwere nnukwu ma ọ bụ obere ihe ịga nke ọma jisiri ike kpuchie nghọta ọha na eze banyere nchọpụta sayensị gbasara ụdị ngwaahịa maọbụ nchegbu

Dịka ọmụmaatụ, isi nke ọ bụla na-elekwasị anya na kemịkal ('The Forever Chemicals,' Isi nke 3), mgbagwoju anya nke ndị egwuregwu bọọlụ nwere ('NFL's Head Doctors, 'Isi nke 4), opioids ('On Opioids, Isi 7), mgbanwe ihu igwe (' The Climate Denial Machine, 'Isi 11), na shuga ('Sickeningly Sweet, Isiokwu 12) xi xixii
E nyochala mmeri nke obi abụọ na Science Magazine
E bipụtara ajụjụ ọnụ ya na Michaels banyere akwụkwọ ahụ na Salon

Anthony Christopher Khan (ónyé a mụrụ Craig; amụrụ na Julaị 13, 1971), nke a maara site na aha egwu ya The Twilite Tone, bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, ónyé na-edekọ egwu, onye na'ede egwu, DJ, na onye na-elekọta redio
N'etiti ndị ọzọ, ya na Gorillaz, Kanye West, Common, Big Sean, John Legend, My Brightest Diamond na U-God rụkọrọ ọrụ n'etiti ndị mosusu
A mụrụ Tone na Chicago, Illinois, United States, nné na nnà Indria Khan na Anthony Christopher Craig
A mụrụ Tone na aha nna Craig (aha nna ya), nke e mesịrị gbanwee ka ọ bụrụ Khan, aha nna ezinụlọ ya
Ọ bụ nwanne nna ya, Hassan Khan, ónyé lụrụ Chaka Khan na 1970, nwere mmetụta n'ahụ ya
Tone bụ nwa nwanne nne nke ónyé na-akụ egwu jazz bụ Richard Davis
Ọ mụtara ịkpọ opi na klas nke atọ, n'oge na-adịghịkwa anya mgbè nke ahụ gasịrị ọ mụtara ịkpọ ụbọ akwara
Ọ bụ ónyé ndú ngalaba drum n'òtù ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, na DJ'd maka oge mbụ dị ka ónyé nọ n'afọ nke abụọ na ihe omume Kenwood Academy
A na-ebu ụzọ kọwaara NO ID
na ónyé na-eti egwu Chicago bụ Common na 1987, n'oge na-adịghị anya ọ ghọrọ DJ màkà ha abụọ n'òtù ha 'CDR'
Ndị otu ahụ dekọrọ otu LP ọnụ ma wepụta ya na 1989, n'okpuru aha 1015 ma ọ bụ 326 mgbè e mesịrị kpọọ Dion & Tony
N'afọ 1989, Tone zutere ndị na-agba egwú abụọ, Reggie na Clay, ha wee mepụta Dem Dare, aka Darians, iji kwalite ihe omume ụlọ na hip-hop
Tone DJ'd na ihe ngosi mbụ Dem Dare kwalitere, nke méré na Club Alcatraz na Chicago
N'oge a, Tone mepụtara okwu Go-ill na Chic-Chic, dị ka ihe atụ màkà Chicago
N'afọ 1990, Tone malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Common demos
N'afọ 2020, The Twilite Tone wepụtara abọm mbụ ya The Clearing on Stones Throw

The Clearing na-egosi ụda nke The Twilite Tone kọwara dị ka 'trans-genre' nke bụ ngwakọta nke ụlọ, electronic funk, na ngwá ọrụ hip-hop nke na-aga n'ihu na ihe nketa nke Stones Throw nke akụkọ egwu na mmụọ nke obodo ya
Ummah bụ otu mmepụta egwu, nke ndị otu Q-Tip na Ali Shaheed Muhammad nke A Tribe Called Quest, na Jay Dee (nke a makwaara dị ka J Dilla) nke otu Slum Village nke dị na Detroit
Ndị otu ógè ụfọdụ gụnyere Raphael Saadiq, na D'Angelo

Na mgbakwunye na ịmepụta ihe fọrọ nkè nta ka ọ bụrụ abọm nke anọ na nke ise nke A Tribe Called Quest, Ummah nyèrè egwu nkwado na remixes màkà ọtụtụ ndị hip hop na ndị R & B na-ese ihe n'oge a, gụnyere Busta Rhymes, Whitney Houston, Keith Murray, Brand New Heavies, Michael Jackson, Janet Jackson, na Jon B
A kpọrọ otu ahụ aha a n'ihi na abụọ n'ime ndị otu ya (Tip na Ali) bụ ndị Alakụba na-anụ ọkụ n'obi
Okwu 'ummah' bụ Arabic màkà 'ọbọdọ', 'mba', ma ọ bụ 'nne'
N'ozuzu, okwu ahụ na-ezo aka na ndị Alakụba zuru ụwa ọnụ
Ìgwè ahụ malitere n'ihe dị ka afọ 1995; onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara bụ Amp Fiddler gosipụtara Jay Dee (ónyé n'oge ahụ na-azụ ahịa màkà nkwekọrịta maka otu ya) na Q-Tip n'oge Lollapalooza nke afọ 1994
Ihe Jay Dee na-emepụta obi ụtọ masịrị Tip nke ukwuu ịkpọ ya ka ọ bụrụ mgbakwunye na ndị otu na-emepụta egwu nke Tribe, nke ruo mgbè ahụ nwèrè Tip na mgbé ụfọdụ Ali Shaheed
Vermont Ghost Guide bụ akwụkwọ zuru oke nke nduzi njem e bipụtara na arọ 2000 nke depuụtara ihe egwu na kwa ebe mmụọ nile di na Vermont, site na mkpali ọtụtụ anụ ọhịa vermont na nduzi uzo
Ọ bu ọkachamara n'akụkọ ọdịnala nke Vermont bụ Joe Citro nyochara ma dee akwụkwọ ahụ, onye na-ese egwu na enyi ya dị ka Steve Bissette sere ihe osise
E kewara akwụkwọ ahụ n'akụkụ dị iche iche, a raara nke ọ bụla nye otu mpaghara Vermont na ndị bi ebe a sị na ha anwụghị
Dị ka akwụkwọ ya ndị ọzọ na-abụghị akụkọ ifo, Citro anaghị ekwu ma ihe omume na adirọ ile ọ kọwara bụ eziokwu n'ezie, kama hapụ ọrụ ahụ kpamkpam nye onye edemede
Manadịka ihe ọchị, Citro tinyere otu akụkọ nke bụ echiche zuru oke, n'agbanyeghị na o gosighi onye nwere ike ịbụ
The Watcher by the Threshold, and other tales bụ nchịkọta akụkọ na akụkọ oge ochie, ọtụtụ n'ime ha nwere ihe karịrị nke mmadụ, ọ bu onye edemede Scotland aha ya bụ John Buchan dere ya
Mgbe e bipụtara ya izizi na UK na 1902 akwụkwọ ahụ gụnyere akụkọ ise, nke a na-emekarị na Scottish Borders
E bipụtara nchịkọta ahụ maka ahịa US na 1918 n'okpuru aha The Watcher by the Threshold, na anọ n'ime akụkọ mbụ na ndị ọhụrụ anọ
Ihe odide akwụkwọ ahụ bụ nghota e kwuru na ọ si na 'ihe e wepụrụ n'ihe odide Donisarius nke Padua, n'ihe dị ka 1310
Ọ na-eme ka ndị njem na'ọrụ dị iche iche 'na-aga n'ụlọ ikpe ndị dị n'èzí, na na ndị na - ịgba egwu na abụ na ọṅụ na ụbọchị na nke ndị nọ nso n 'n'ebe dị nso' nʼabalị na ehihie, 'mgbe ọ na a na
The Wedding party bụ ihe nkiri ejije ịhụnanya na ịkpa ọchị nke afọ 2016 nke Kemi Adetiba duziri
Ọ malitere n'abali asatọ nke ọnwa Septemba, 2016 na Toronto International Film Festival na Canada ma n'abalị iri na abụọ nke ọnwa Novemba 2016 emekwa ya na Eko Hotel and suites na Lagos

E wepụtara ihe nkiri a n'ụwa nile n'abalị iri na isii nke ọnwa Disemba 2016, wee bụrụ ihe nkiri Nigeria kacha enweta ego ; ndekọ nke ogo dị elu ekwupụ̀tara na 2017 site na usoro ya The Wedding Party 2
Tinuade Coker, na onye ọchụnta ego IT Dozie Onwuka ( Banky Wellington ), bụ onye sitere na ezinụlọ bara ọgaranya
Nne ya, Lady Obianuju Onwuka, chere na nwa ya nwoke na-alụ nwanyị n'eteghị ogo onwe ya
N'ụtụtụ tupu agbamakwụkwọ ahụ, a na-akwado oriri agbamakwụkwọ na onye nhazi agbamakwụkwọ Wonu na-agbalị ime ka ihe niile dị mma maka ndị ahịa ya bara ọgaranya

Ka ọ dị, ndị nne na nna nke nwanyị a na-alụ ọhụrụ na ndị ikwu nwanyị na-ewe iwe maka mwepu aha Tinuade Coker na ọkwa dị n'akwụkwọ ahụ, nne na nna nwoke ahụ na-alụ nwanyị na-eri nri ụtụtụ n'enweghị Obi ụtọ mma ebe nne na-agwa ndị enyi ya okwu nlelị banyere ezinụlọ Coker ma na-eleda di bụ Chief Felix Onwuka anya nke ukwu
N'aka nke ọzọ,Ndị enyi nwanyị na-akwa Dunni emo maka enweghị ngwọta gbasara mmekọahụ ma olịị, ndị enyi Dozie na-akwa ya emo maka oriri nwoke ikpeazụ mgbe olubeghi nwanyị n'abalị gara aga
Onye kacha mma ị̀bụ̀rụ̀ ya onye nsonazụ agbamakwụkwọ enwela ihe mberede nke okporo ụzọ mgbe nnọkọ nke bachelọ ha gasịrị, ma ahọọrọ Sola na-enweghị nchịkọta onwe dị ka onye nnọchiteanya ya
N'oge mmemme agbamakwụkwọ ahụ, ndị ọbịa na ezinụlọ na-enwe ọñụ, ma e wezụga Obianuju Onwuka bụ onye jụrụ ịṅa ntị n'ụzọ ọ bụla, ma n'ebutere ihere nye Felix
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ka ụgbọ ala na-esi n'ememe ahụ na-aga oriri na ọṅụṅụ, Dunni chọtara otu uwe ime ụmụ nwanyị n'akpa uwe akwa Dozie, nke Kasiri ya iwe
O mere ka o doo ya anya na ọ bụ otu n’ime ndị enyi ya kpara nkata a, nke mere ha eruteghi ebe oriri agbamakwukwo ahụ n'oge
Esemokwu malitere n'etiti nne na nna abụọ ụmụ ha na-agba akwụkwọ banyere ndị kwesịrị ibu ụzọ banye n'ime ụlọ oriri ahụ; n'ikpeazụ, ndị naaza Onwuka, bụ ezinụlọ bara ọgaranya,nụ ndị mbụ banyere nụ̀
Nri abalị ahụ nwere oke ihe ihere merenụ, gụnyere Tinuade Coker kpọrọ onye na-esi nri Yoruba n'obodo ka ọ sie nri ọzọ n'ụdị dị iche mara mma karịa nke Obianuju Onwuka hiwere

Mgbe Sola chọrọ ikwu okwu ka nwoke nnọchiteanya kacha mma, ọ gosiri ihe mere na ihe onyonyo sitere n'oriri abalị ahụ nke n'abụghị vidiyo Dozie kwadebere maka mmemme ahụ, Dunni hapụrụ ụlọ ahụ n;'iwe ka ọ hụchatara ihe dị ka Dozie abụghị onye ntụkwasị obi nye ya
Otu enyi nwanyị ochie Dozie bụ Rosie zutere ya, onye kwuru na ya na Dozie nwere mmekọahụ n'isi ụtụtụ ụbọchị ahụ - n'eziokwu, Rosie nwara ịrata ya mana ọ dabaghị̀ n'onya ya bụ Rosie
Dunni hapụrụ ya n'ebe ahụ baa ụgbọ tagzi
Dozie, nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye Nonso, na nne na nna abụọ ahụ malitere ịchọ Dunni mana onye ohi jisiri ike baa n'ime ụlọ were onyinye agbamakwụkwọ ahụ jidere ha ya

Ọnọdụ ahụ dị egwu mere ka ndị di na nwunye kwupụta eziokwu banyere Onwe ha, nne Dozie kwupụtara gwa di na obi adịghị ya ụtọ maka ihe ya na ụmụ agbọghọ na-eto eto n'emetọgharị, nna Dunni kwetara na ụlọ ọrụ ya etufula ọtụtụ ego ya niile
Ndị di na nwunye ahụ mere ka ha dịghachi ná mma, Nonso wee jisie ike imeri onye ohi ahụ wee buru égbè ya
Dozie wee banye ụgbọ ala ya na Sola chọta Dunni, wee mee ka o doo ya anya na n'ezie na ya emebibeghị nkwa ịdị ọcha ha nwere
Ha nlaghachikwara ụlọ oriri agbamakwụkwọ ahụ ka ha gbaa egwú n'abalị ahụ
Ọ bụ ELFIKE Film Collective mere ihe nkiri a
Ma onye mmepụta bụKemi Adetiba
Nchịkọta ihe nkiri ELFIKE bụ mmekorita nke nnukwu ụlọ nrụpụta anọ na Nigeria EbonyLife Films, FilmOne Distribution, Inkblot Productions na Koga Studios, n'otu n'otu
Emere ihe nkiri a na Toronto n'abalị asatọ nke ọnwa Septemba , n'afọ 2016 na Toronto International Film Festival (TIFF)
N'August 2017, emere ihe nkiri ahụ na Netflix
The Wedding party anatala nlebanya dị mma site na nkena anya
Dị ka Chidumga Izuzu nke Pulse Nigeria si kwuo, 'Ọ bụ ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke na-eme ka onye ntụrụndụ
Ọ naghị anwa ịbụ ihe omume, ihe na-akpali akpali, mpụ, ihe nkiri nchọ ihe, ma ọ bụ ihe niile n'otu oge
Ọ naghị eme ka ọ dị omimi ma mee ka ị nwee mmetụta 'oke'
Ọ ghotara Ndịnaya ma mee ka ọ pụta otua
Nollywood kwadoro ihe nkiri ahụ ruo percenti iri ise na anọ wee kwuo, 'Dịka onye hụrụ ihe nkiri n'anya, m ga-ekiri nke a ọzọ n'ime ụbọchị asaa na-abịa
Dị ka onye nkatọ
ozugbo anyị gafere oriri na ọṅụṅụ, ọ bụ oriri cheese'
Cinema Axis' Courtney Small kwuru, sị, ' The Wedding Party nwere ike ọ gaghị enye ọtụtụ ihe ịtụnanya site na usoro akụkọ, mana ọ dịghị agọnarị na ihe nkiri ahụ bụ ihe na-atọ mmadụ ụtọ
N'ịmepụta ọtụtụ ịkpa ọchị nke ọma, Ọbụghị ezie na ihe nkiri a agaghị ikpa nnukwu ọnụ ọchị n'ihu mmadụ'
Isabella Akinseye toro ma katọọkwa ihe nkiri ahụ
O toro ihe nkiri ahụ maka ntụrụndụ, ejiji, ngosipụta ndị ama ama, Sola Sobowale na mmekorita ya ebe ọ katọrọ edemede, gbasara ndị nsonye

Wilfred Okiche nke ynaija nwere nke a ikwu maka Kemi Adetiba na ọrụ ya dịka onye nduzi; 'Ewezuga ụfọdụ ngosi, dị ka okwu agbamakwụkwọ nke nna onye na-alụ nwanyị ọhụrụ, dịka ọmụmaatụ, ndị atụmatụ na ndị nsonye na atụmatụ metụtara Sambassa Nzeribe, na odida agwa ngosipụta nke Hafiz Oyetoro, Adetiba na-eme ka ihe na-aga n'ihu'
Temitope Adeiye nke thenetng kwuru na The Wedding Party bụ ihe nkiri kacha mma ọ hụ̀rụ̀ na 2016

The Widows' Adventure bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ifo nke e bipụtara n'afọ 1989, nke Charles Dickinson dere, na-elekwasị anya n'ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ di ha nwụrụ ndị malitere njem eleghị anya omume site na Chicago ruo Los Angeles, malite ezinụlọ mkpa ọchị odyssey maka mkpughe na ime udo
Ndị nwunye di ha nwụrụ Ina na Helene, ụmụnne nwanyị si Chicago, gawara Los Angeles
Otu nsogbu dị na ya Ọ bụ naanị Helene nwere ike ịnys ụgbọala, ma na ọ bụkwa onye kpuru ìsì
Mmanya na aba n'anya Ina n̄ụrụ na akwaghari ya ọ na-eme dị ka anya ya
N'okporo ụzọ azụ n'abalị, ha gafere America ndị a maghị
The Widows' Adventures nwetara nyocha dị mma site n'aka ndị nkatọ
Barbara Kingsolver nke Los Angeles Times kwuru na ụdị akwụkwọ akụkọ kachasị mma ma dịwanye ụkọ bụ ihe onye edemede hụrụ ndị ya n'anya karịa ka ọ ga-eru
Hilma Wolitzer nke The New York Times dere na akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ nwere 'ịdị ọhụrụ', ma kpọọ Dickinson onye edemede mmasi adịghị ahụkarị'

Library Journal toro edemede Dickinson site n'ikwu 'Nkọwa ahụ na-etolite kpamkpam ozugbo iji mee ka onye na-agụ ya nwee ike ịchọta akwụkwọ akụkọ a dị mgbanwe ọhụrụ, ebe ọ bụ na ọ nyochara ndụ anụ ụlọ, mmetụta uche, na nke ime mmụọ nke agadi nwanyị abụọ nwara anwa ma ha ezughị oke
N'afọ 2008, Variety kọrọ na Diane Keaton na Jane Fonda bịanyere aka n'akwụkwọ ka ha soro na mmeghari ihe nkiri nke akwụkwọ edemede e bipụtara, dabere na edemede nke Jason Pomerance dere
Paul Brooks nke Gold Circle Films ga-emepụta ihe nkiri ahụ
THE WILL bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ Naijiria
Ọ bụ Austyn Ogannah guzobere ya n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2009
E bipụtara ya na San Francisco, California tupu ọ gbasaa ọrụ na Naịjirịa
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ, akwụkwọ akụkọ Naijiria lekwasịrị anya, na-ekpuchi akụkọ n'ozuzu, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, azụmahịa, nka, egwuregwu, ajụjụ ọnụ na ihe ndị na-eme ugbu a
The Will bụ nke The Will News Media bipụtara
Ebumnache nke Willʹs bụ imeziwanye ezi ọchịchị, ịkwado ikpe ziri ezi, ikpe ziri ezi na ikike nwoke na nwanyị
Ọnọdụ nchịkọta akụkọ nke The Will bụ n'etiti aka ekpe Akụkụ nchịkọta akụkọ ya na akụkọ mkpuchi ya a na-ebipụta kwa izu na-elekwasị anya n'okwu ndị dị oke egwu gbasara ọchịchị na ịza ajụjụ

Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ gosipụtara ọtụtụ akụkọ, ma na-ebu ihe gbasara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọha na eze na ntụrụndụ, egwuregwu, ụtụ, azụmahịa, echiche, mbipụta pụrụ iche (ọchịchị steeti), atụmatụ na nchịkọta akụkọ
A na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ n'ụdị abụọ; a na-ebipụ ya dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ kwa izu na nke dị n'ịntanetị nke a na-emelite mgbe niile
E guzobere TheWill Downtown Magazine na afọ 2021 ma bụrụ mbipụta nwanne nwanyị nke TheWill Newspaper
Downtown bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ na-etinye ihe na-eme kwa izu nke na-eme emume kachasị mma nke omenala na ụdị ndị isi ojii
Ọ na-egosipụta ajụjụ ọnụ gbasara mmadụ, ejiji na ụdị ndụ, ịma mma na ahụike na ogidi ndụ kwa izu
Magazin Downtown nwere ụlọ ọrụ na Lagos, Nigeria na Beverly Hills, California
Wings Office Complex bụ ụlọọrụ abụọ dị ụlọ elu iri na ise na Victoria Island, Lagos, Nigeria
Ụlọ elu nke nwere ohere ọfịs dị 27000 m² a-ekwukwa na ọ dị Greek certified

The Women of the Cousins' War The Duchess, the Queen and the King's Mother bụ akwụkwọ afọ 2011 nke onye edemede akụkọ ihe mere eme aha ya bụ Philippa Gregory na ndị ọkọ akụkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme David Baldwin na Michael K
Jones
Ọ bụ ọrụ na-abụghị akụkọ ifo nke na'enyocha ndụ ụmụ nwanyị atọ a ma ama nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Agha nke Roses, ndị Gregory gosipụtara na usoro akwụkwọ akụkọ Cousins' War ya

Akwụkwọ ahụ nwere mbido nke Gregory na edemede akụkọ ndụ atọ nke mbụ bụ banyere Jacquetta nke Luxembourg, nke Gregory dere; nke abụọ bụ maka nwa nwanyị Jacqueetta Elizabeth Woodville, eze nwanyị Edward nke anọ nke England, onye Baldwin dere, na nke atọ bụ gbasara Margaret Beaufort, nne Henry nke asaa nke Ingland, bụ nke Jones dere
Ndị a kwekọrọ na atọ n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ Gregory's Cousins' War, The Lady of the Rivers (2011), The White Queen (2009) na The Red Queen (2010), n'otu nʼotu
Akwụkwọ ahụ nwekwara ihe osise, osisi ezinụlọ, map na usoro iheomume
Nwanyị ọ bụla nwere njikọ n'ụlọ na-ese okwu Jacquetta na Lancasters, Elizabeth na Yorks na Margaret na Tudors

Publishers Weekly kpọrọ The Women of the Cousins' War 'mbido na-adọrọ mmasị maka ndị isi nwanyị atọ meziri akụkọ ihe mere eme nke England,' mana o kwukwara na ọ 'na-ekwughachi ugboro ugboro ma ghara inwe olu na nkọwa zuru oke banyere mmalite nke War of Roses'

Magazin AudioFile, na-enyocha ndekọ akwụkwọ a na ege ege nke akwụkwọ ahụ, a na akpọ edemede Gregory na Jacquetta nke Luxembourg 'na-adọrọ mmasị' na edemedo Baldwin na Elizabeth Woodville 'nke na'otu ụzọ ahụ na - ihe ọmụma, mana ọ naghị agba mma'

Nnyocha ahụ toro onye na-akọ akụkọ ahụ, na'ikwu na 'ụda dị mma nke Biacha Amatoz tụgharịa akwụkwọ atọ ya ka nke kachasị n'abughi akwụkwọ ifo a na ege ege, na adoro mmasị, n'enye ozi ma n'enye kwa obi ụtọ

Il merito delle donne, nke a na-asụgharịkarị The Worth of Women Wherein is Clearly Revealed Their Nobility and Their Superiority to Men, bụ mkparịta ụka Moderata Fonte bipụtara na mbụ mgbe ọ gasịrị n'afọ 1600
Ọrụ ahụ bụ mkparịta ụka n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị Venetia asaa na-atụle uru ha bara ụmụ nwanyị na ndịiche dị n'etiti nwoke na nwanyị karịa n'ozuzu Atụgharịwokwa aha a The Merits of Women
The Worth of Women na-egosi mkparịta ụka dị n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị nwanyị Venetia asaa n'ime ụbọchị abụọ
N'ụbọchị mbụ, ụmụ nwanyị na-arụrịta ụka ma nwoke ọ dị mma ka ọ dị njọ ma na-atụlekwa ùgwù ụmụ nwanyị
N'ụbọchị nke abụọ, ha na-atụle nkọwa nke ihe ọmụma zuru oke nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke okike na omenala ma laghachikwa na mkparịta ụka ha banyere mmekọahụ
Ụbọchị abụọ ahụ nwekwara nkatọ na mkparịta ụka gbasara alụmdi na nwunye na ego
Adriana - agadi nwanyị di ya nwụrụ
Virginia - nwa agbọghọ na-alụbeghị di, ada Adriana
Leonora - nwa agbọghọ di ya nwụrụ
Lucretia - nwanyị lụrụ di ma ọ bụ nwunye
Cornelia - nwa agbọghọ lụrụ di
Corinna - nwagbọghọ 'dimmessa'
Helena - nwa agbọghọ, lụrụ di na nso a
Dị ka onye na-ede akụkọ ndụ Fonte si kwuo, Fonte dechara The Worth of Women obere oge tupu ọnwụ ya n'afọ 1592
Otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị Fonte kwuru na Fonte dechara The Worth of Women 'otu ụbọchị tupu ọnwụ ya mgbe ọ mụrụ nwa'
The Worth of Women nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu site na Decameron, ọrụ Fonte ruturu aka ya mgbe niile n'ihe odide ahụ
Ọrụ Fonte kwukwara kpọmkwem na n'ụzọ pụtara ìhè site na 'Sonnet 263' nke Petrarch na Orlando Furioso
Ụdị mkparịta ụka nke ọrụ Fonte sitere na Baldassare Castiglione na Pietro Bembo
Virginia Cox na-ekwu na ọrụ ahụ bụ mgbanwe akụ na ụba nke Italy na njedebe narị afọ nke iri na isii
Ihe e ji mara oge a bụ mbelata atụmanya alụm di na nwunye maka ụmụ nwanyị mara mma nke Venetia na-eduga n'ịbawanye ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụ nwanyị na-abanye n'ebe obibi ndị nọn
Otú ọ dị, mmụba a n'ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị inyom nọ n'ebe obibi ndị nọn pụtara na ọ na-adịwanye ọnụ ahịa maka ụmụ nwanyị ịghọ ndị nọn

Ọtụtụ ezinụlọ enwekwaghị ike iziga ụmụ ha ndị nwanyị na-alụbeghị di na ebe obibi ndị nọn nke mere ka ihe Cox kọwara dị ka mmalite nke 'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe a na-enwetụbeghị ụdị ya nke spinster ụwa

Cox na-ekwu na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị a na-enweghị atụ nke spinsters na nọn manyere ụmụ nwanyị na ngwụcha narị afọ nke iri na isii Venice ka ha mara banyere adịghị ike ya ma si otú ahụ metụta arụmụka Fonte gbasara onyinye ego isi ụmụnwaanyị na The Worth of Women
E bipụtara The Worth of Women nke mbụ ya na 1600
Mbipụta mbụ ahụ bu ụzọ site na akụkọ ndụ Fonte nke Giovanni Nicolò Doglioni dere
Ọ bụghị ihe doro anya ihe, ma ọ bụrụ na ọ dị, gbanwere Doglioni mere na ederede tupu mbipụta ya
Ihe odide ahụ so nraranye sitere n'aka nwa nwanyị Fonte, Cecilia Zorzi, nye Livia della Rovera onye dị afọ iri na anọ n'oge mbipụta ya
E bipụtara akwụkwọ ahụ nke ugboro abụọ n'afọ 1603
Virginia Cox sụgharịrị n'asụsụ Bekee nke Il merito della donne, The Worth of Women, bụ nke Mahadum Chicago Press bipụtara na 1997 dị ka akụkụ nke Other Voice in Early Modern Europe series
N'afọ 2018, Mahadum nke Chicago Press bipụtara nsụgharị Cox n'okpuru aha The Merits of Women
Mbipụta nke 2018 wepụrụ ọtụtụ n'ime ihe odide ala na ihe mgbakwunye ndị ọkà mmụta bipụtara na mbipụta mbụ na mgbalị ịgba ndị na-ege ntị ume ịgụ ederede ahụ
The Merits of Women gosipụtakwara mmeghe ọhụrụ a sụgharịrị site na Dacia Mariani
Adriana Chemello, Paola Malpezzi Prize, na Margaret King ekwuola na Corinna, n'ime ụmụ nwanyị niile nọ na mkparịta ụka ahụ, na-abịaru nso na-anọchite anya echiche na agwa Fonte nke onwe ya
Amanda W

Benckhuysen kọwara Fonte dị ka onye na-egosi 'agụ akwụkwọ na-akwado nwanyị nke Iv' na The Worth of Women Fonte kwetara na e kere nwoke (Adam) n'ihu nwanyị na Iso Ụzọ Kraịst, mana ọ na-ekwu na nke a na-akwado ịdị elu nke ụmụ nwanyị
E kere Iv dị ka onye enyemaka Adam, nke Fonte na-ekwu na ọ na-egosi ezughị ezu na ịdị ala nke ụmụ mmadụ
Fonte na-ahụkwa mmehie Adam dị ka nke ka njọ karịa nke Iv
Benckhuysen si otú a na-ekwu na usoro ndị isi nke na-etinye ụmụ nwoke n'elu ụmụ nwanyị enweghị ihe ndabere na Bible
Carolyn James na-ekwu na ngosipụta Fonte nke ezigbo ọbụbụenyi na The Worth of Women bụ Ciceronian
Agbanyeghị, James chọpụtara na Fonte na-apụ na Cicero n'ihi na ọ na-ekwu na ụmụ nwoke, karịa ụmụ nwanyị, enweghị “amicitia”, omume dị mkpa nke ọbụbụenyi
N'adịghị ka ndị ọgbọ ya, Fonte gosipụtara ọbụbụenyi dị ka ihe omume nwanyị
A na-ahụ uru nke ụmụ nwanyị dị ka akụkụ nke Renaissance 'querelle des femmes'
Ntinye nke Kairos Italy Theater of The Worth of Women mere ka ọ bụrụ ihe ngosi mbụ ya na United States n'oge opupu ihe ubi 2017 dị ka akụkụ nke emume 'La Serenissima' Carnegie Hall
Virginia Cox sụgharịrị ederede ahụ ma Jay Stern duziri mmepụta ya na Laura Caparrotti
Ihe ngosi ahụ gosipụtara egwu nke onye na-ede egwú Erato Kremmyda na onye edemede Maggie-Kate Coleman
Ndị na-eme ihe nkiri bụ Carlotta Brentan, Laura Caparrotti, Tali Custer, Aileen Lanni, Marta Mondelli, Irene Turri, na Annie Watkins
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2019, KIT-Kairos Italy Theater mere ihe ngosi ha
Thelma Awori bụ prọfesọ Ugandan, onye bụbu osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke United Nations, na onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị
A mụrụ ya na ọnwa Machị 25, Na afọ 1943 na Monrovia, Liberia wee bịa Uganda na afọ 1965
Ọ bụ onye bụbu onye Uganda People's Congress, onye gbagara na Movement
Ọ bụ onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị n'Afrịka nke kwenyere na ikpe ziri ezi maka ụmụ nwanyị na ịdị irè nke echiche ụmụ nwanyị
O ji mwute hụ oke mmegbu n'ime n'ihi okpukpe na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Harvard mgbe ọ na-enweta Bachelor of Arts cum laude Social Relations & Cultural Anthropology
Na Mahadum California na Berkeley, ọ nwetara Master of Arts Adult Education & Humanistic Psychology
O nwetara PhD na afọ 2006 na Mahadum Columbia dị na mba New York City
Ọ bi na Uganda ma na-arụ ọrụ na kọntinent Afrịka
Ọ bụ onye nkuzi toro eto nke na-azụlite ndị mmadụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị gbasara okike na ikpe na-ezighị ezi nke akụ na ụba
Thelma bụ onye nhazi a zụrụ azụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye nduzi na UNIFEM kemgbe na afọ 1990
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka Chief na Africa Section, UNIFEM, New York
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ na UNIFEM, ILCO nke Netherlands, United Nations Children's Fund, na United States Agency for International Development, kemgbe 1981
Thelma rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye isi odeakwụkwọ, Commission for Communication Education, World Association for Christian Communication, London, na afọ 1977 na Afọ 1981
Site na na afọ 1973 ruo na afọ 1977, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na College of Adult and Distance Education na Mahadum Nairobi, Kenya
N'etiti afọ 1965, ọ bụ onye isi nkuzi na Centre for Continuing Education, Mahadum Makerere, Uganda na-akụzi Sociology
Ọ rụchara ọrụ afọ abụọ dị ka osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke United Nations
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Institute for Social Transformation (IST), ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ukwu maka Gọọmentị Liberia na Uganda
Ọ na-emetụta iwu na omume gafee kọntinent ahụ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ UNDP Africa nke dị na New York
Thelma Awori bụ onye isi oche nke Africa Leadership Institute
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya nsọpụrụ nke Liberia na Uganda
Ọ bụbu osote odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke United Nations ma bụrụkwa onye nduzi nke Regional Bureau for Africa nke UN Development Programme (UNDP)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na United Nations ruo afọ iri na abụọ, dị ka osote onye nduzi maka UNIFEM na dị ka onye nhazi nke UN System na Zimbabwe

Site na afọ 1965, Ọ bụ onye na-ekere òkè na ọgụ ziri ezi nke ụmụ nwanyị nke Uganda maka ịha nhata nwoke na nwanyị na nke ahụ bụ ihe mere na ọnwa Machị 8 na afọ 2018, ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị 10 a nabatara ma sọpụrụ maka ime ka Uganda nwee obi ụtọ n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke mbọ mmadụ na mba ahụ
Ọ bụ onye isi oche na onye isi oche, Sustainable Market Women's Fund, Liberia n'oge gara aga (Sirleaf Market Women'S Fund) nke nyere ike karịa ụmụ nwanyị ahịa Ogugu 15,000 na Liberia
Ọ bụ onye otu African Association for Literacy and Adult Education, Nairobi, na American Society for Training and Development
Ọ bụ onye so na Kọmitii Na-eduzi nke African Women's Leadership Network ebe ọ na-ahazi mmemme ndị na-enyere ụmụ nwanyị aka n'ọrụ ugbo ma na-akwado ndị na-ere ahịa ụmụ nwanyị gafee kọntinent ahụ
Ọ lụrụ Aggrey Awori onye bụ Minista na-ahụ maka ozi na teknụzụ nkwukọrịta na Cabinet nke Uganda site na onwa 16 Febụwarị nke afọ 2009 ruo onwa Mee 27 nke afọ 2011
Aggrey Awori na Thelma Awori zutere na Mahadum Harvard, USA n'afọ 1960 mgbe ha bụ ụmụ akwụkwọ na Mahadim Harvard
Thelma Beatrice Johnson Streat (1912), bụ ónyé Africa-America na-ese ihe, na-agba egwu, na ónyé nkụzi
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama n'afọ 1940 màkà nka ya, arụmọrụ ya na ọrụ ya iji kwalite nghọta na ekele ọdịbendị
A mụrụ Thelma Johnson n'August 29, 1912 na Yakima, obéré ọbọdọ ọrụ ugbo na Washington State, nyé ónyé na-ese ihe James Johnson, na nwunye ya Gertrude
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke ihe nketa Cherokee
Ezinụlọ ya kwagara Portland, Oregon mgbè ọ bụ nwata
N'afọ 1932, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Washington High School
Ọ malitere ise ihe mgbè ọ dị afọ asaa ma mụọ nka na Museum Art School (nke bụzi Pacific Northwest College of Art) na Portland site na 1934 ruo 1935
Ọ gàrà nkụzi nka ndị ọzọ na Mahadum Oregon site na 1935 ruo 1936
Ihe osise ya a ma ama, Rabbit Man, bụ nke Alfred Barr zụrụ màkà MoMA na 1942
Streat bụ nwanyị Africa America mbụ nwèrè ihe osise gụnyere na nchịkọta MoMA na-adịgide adịgide

A gbakwunyere ọrụ Streat na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke Smithsonian mgbe ha zụrụ mural Medicine and Transportation na 2016, nkè bi na National Museum of African American History & Culture na Washington, DC Streat sere Medicine and Transportations n'etiti 1942 na 1944, nke gosipụtara onyinye nke ndị Africa-Amerịka na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ nyocha na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe
Mills College Art Museum dị na Oakland, California nwekwara ihe osise akwụkwọ ụmụaka nke Streat kpọrọ Robot

Ndị nwéré ọrụ Streat gụnyere ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri Vincent Price, onye na-agụ egwu Roland Hayes, ónyé na'ese ihe Diego Rivera, ónyé na na-eme egwuregwu Fanny Brice, ónyé na -agba egwu Katherine Dunham, na ónyé na-ese ihe nkírí Paulette Goddard
Ihe osise ya apụtala n'ihe ngosi na ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie na gallery gụnyere

Dị ka ónyé ya na ya dịkọrọ ndụ na ónyé ya na Katherine Dunham maara, Streat gara Haiti n'etiti 1946 na 1951 iji mụọ ịgba egwú, nke ọ hụrụ dị ka ihe dị mkpà na-akpali mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ihe na-akwalite ịma ụkpụrụ ọha na eze aka
Ọ gakwara Mexico na Canada

Streat gosipụtara ihe nkírí ọhụrụ ya, nke sitere na njem ya, na arụmọrụ na San Francisco Museum of Art na 1946, nke jikọtara African, Haitian, Hawaiian, Native American, Portuguese na ụdị ịgba egwu ndị ọzọ
Ọ lụrụ Romaine Virgil Streat na 1935, ha gbara alụkwaghịm na 1948
Streat nọgidere na-eji aha alụmdi na nwunye ya maka ebumnuche ọkachamara
Ka e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, ọ lụrụ John Edgar Kline, onye njikwa ya na ónyé na-ede egwuregwu na ónyé na'emepụta ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri
Streat nwụrụ n'ihi nkụchi obi na 1959
Thelma Okoduwa Ojiji (amuru na abali itolu na onwa nke atuo, ) bu nwaafọ Nigerian
A hoputara ya dika onyinye nturu ugo nke ihe nkiri Africa Movie for Best Actress in a Nkwado Oru na 2012
N'ajụjụ ọnụ Encomium Magazine, Thelma kpughere na ọ gafere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri site n'aka Chico Ejiro
Na afo 2017, ya na Norbert Young mere ihe na The Aggregator
O gosiputara otutu usoro ihe onyonyo ama ama tinyere Tinsel, Ndi Ugha Mara Mma, Akụ, Spider na Ezinụlọ
Na 2012, ọ gbara “Linda” na ihe nkiri ịhụnanya, Mr na Mrs
Mgbe ọ lụsịrị di ya, o kpughere na di ya na-enyochakarị ọrụ ọ ga-arụ na fim, ọ bụrụ na ọ kwadoghị, ọ ga-ajụ ya
N'ajụjụ ọnụ a gwara The Punch, ọ kpọtụrụ aha Joke Silva na Richard Mofe-Damijo bụ ndị mere ochie na-akpali ya na Nollywood
Ọrụ ya dị ka 'Arinola Cardoso' na Africa Magic 's Hush ka a matara ka ọ bụrụ ọrụ ya kacha sie ike na ọrụ ya n'ihi ọdị iche dị na ụdị ndụ ya
Thelma bu onye Uromi na Edo State
Ọ mụrụ komputer Science na Mahadum Port Harcourt
O nwekwara diplọma na Theater Arts site na otu mahadum
N’ọnwa nke anọ na afọ 2009, ọ lụrụ Onya Ojiji
Thelma van Rensburg (amụrụ n'ubochí irí na isé n'ọnwa Eprel 1969) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa
Ọrụ ya na-enyocha mmekọahụ ụmụ nwanyị na otu esi egosipụta ụmụ nwanyị na mgbasa ozi gbasara ịma mma ma ọ bụ ihe ọjọọ, okwu nke ịdị iche na Gaze
Usoro ime ihe osise ya bụ ihe egwu - site na mgbasa ozi ngwakọta, eserese na eserese na ọrụ dijitalụ

Ọ sonyere na asọmpi dịka asọmpi Sasol New Signatures 2007 na Pretoria, asọmpi Ekurhuleni na 2009 na asọmpi Vuleka na 2009 na Cape Town na asọmpi Art Lovers na Pretoria na 2014 na 2015 ma bụrụ ónyé ikpeazụ na asọmpi ndị a niile
A mụrụ Thelma van Rensburg na Pretoria, South Africa na 1969
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ, gaa ọtụtụ ébè ma gaa Hoerskool Tegnies Witbank ébé ọ sonyeere ndị otu Drama
N'afọ 2000 ọ nwetara nzere BA ya na Psychology na Mahadum nke South Africa na 2007, ọ nwetara nzere B-Tech Honours Degree na Fine Art na Mahadim nke Teknụzụ nke Tshwane
Ọ gụsịrị nzere masta na Fine Arts na Mahadum Pretoria na 2016
Ọ debanyere áhà ya ugbu a dị ka nwá akwụkwọ PhD na Practice Based Research na Mahadum Plymouth na United Kingdom
N'ime ọrụ ya niile, van Rensburg na-achọ igosi ihe nkpuchi nke ụmụ nwanyị na-eji iji bụrụ ndị ọha mmadụ nkè ógè a nabatara
Ihe mkpuchi ndị a na-aghọ ihe ọzọ 'skin, na-agbagọ njirimara mmadụ'
N'afọ 2013 ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ na ụdị nwanyị dị ka ihe na-adịghị mma na ihe na-enweghị isi iji mebie ihe nnọchianya nke ụmụ nwanyị na foto ejiji

Mmasị a gàrà n'ihu na nyocha Masters ya mgbè ọ hụrụ mmụba nke mgbasa ejiji nke gosipụtara ụmụ nwanyị na steeti ndị na-adịghị agafe agafe, dị ka ndị nwụrụ anwụ ma ọ bụ ndị na-anwụ anwụ dị ka ónyé na-ese foto ejiji nke France, Guy Bourdin
Akwụkwọ edemede ya na-enye nkatọ ụmụ nwanyị banyéré nnọchite ányá ụmụ nwanyị na mgbasa ozi na akụkụ ụfọdụ nke ụmụ nwanyị
A na-elekwasị ányà na nnọchite anya ụmụ nwanyị na foto ejiji nke ógè a na ederede anya, na kpọmkwem ụzọ e si ewu njikọ n'etiti ụmụ nwanyị na ọnwụ

Kemgbe afọ 2008, van Rensburg esonyewo n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi otu, gụnyere na Fried Contemporary Gallery na Pretoria; Maggie gallery na Centurion; Gallery na Duncan Yard Pretoria; na MAP Gallery na Graskop

N'afọ 2009, o sonyere n'ihe ngosi otu na Deluxeville Gallery na Woodstock; Rusten-Vrede Gallery Durbanville na Cape Town; na Affordable Art Fair na Fried Contemporary Gallery na Pretoria; St Lorient Fashion and Art Gallery na Pretora; Aardklop Arts Festival na Potchefstroom
O nwekwara ihe ngosi onwe ya na Kunsthaus na Cape Town na Septemba 2009, ọ bụkwa onye ikpeazụ na Ekurhuleni Fine Arts Awards nakwa na asọmpi Vuleka Sanlam na Cape Town n'otu afọ ahụ

N'afọ 2010, e gosipụtara ọrụ ya na The Gallery na Duncan Yard n'ọtụtụ oge; Articles and Frames na Pretoria; na Artcafe@thehub na Centurion; Gallery 18th Avenue na Pretoria na Artspace Warehouse na Johannesburg
Ọrụ a na-akatọ anya ónyé na-ese ihe 'n'ahụkarị' n'ụdị nwanyị
A na-eji okwu 'nna ukwu' mee ihe n'akụkọ ihe méré eme nke eserese màkà otu ndị a na-eche na ha bụ ndị nwoke genii
Collages ndị a na-eji ihe oyiyi sitere na ihe osise 'onye ukwu' ndị a iji mepụta ahụ nwanyị na-enweghị isi nke akụkụ ahụ
Ojiji nke grotesque na-egosi mmebi nke ókèala, nke mmebi a bụ akụkụ dị oke Mkpà nke mmekọrịta ʿgrotesques na ma màrà mma ma dị elu
N'okwu mara mma, ókè doro anya na nke dị nro bụ ihe dị mkpa màkà egwu nke ịma mma
Grotesque bụ 'ahụ na-aghọ
ọ dịghị mgbe a rụchara ya, ọ dịghị mgbè ọ rụchara ya; a na-ewu ya mgbè niile, mepụta ya, ma na-ewu ma na-emepụta ahụ ọzọ
N'ihi ya, ọrụ ahụ bụ mmebi nke anya nna ochie ma na-enye ike n'ịkọwa onwé nwanyị
Site n'oge ruo n'oge, n'ime abalị, mgbè ha na-agbalị ihi ụra ma na-ada, ndị mmadụ na-enwe nchegbu nke ịdị adị, ha maara ahụ ha dum, ụwa dum, na eziokwu niile n'onwe ya
Ọ dị ka ịmụrụ anya site na nrọ, ma ọ bụ ìhè na-enwu, ma ọ dị ka nnukwu ihe ịrịba ama 'Ị nọ ebe a' na-apụta n'eluigwe
Nanị eziokwu ahụ bụ na m bụ n'ezie ónyé dị adị ma na-eku ume n'ezie kụrụ m na mberede n'isi
Ọ na-eme ka m nwee obi mgbawa
Ọ na-akpata obéré nchegbu, dị ka mmalite nke egwu egwu
Ógè ahụ gafere n'oge na-adịghị ányá, mana ọ ka na-adịgide ọ na-atụ egwu

Enwere ike inyocha echiche nke masquerade dị ka ndọtị nke njirimara, n'adịghị ka akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu Oxford English nke na-adịghị eme nnukwu ọdịiche n'etiti ihe nkpuchi, disguise na masquerade na ebumnuche ma ọ bụ nkọwa
A na-ahụ ihe nkpuchi ahụ dị ka ihe mkpuchi; na disguise bụ ihe mkpuchi zuru oke
N'aka nke ọzọ, a na-akọwa ihe mkpuchi dị ka ikpuchi anya
Ihe mkpuchi ahụ na-egosi; ihe mkpuchi ahụ anaghị adị n'anya, ihe mkpuchi na-agbakwunye
Ihe nkpuchi ahụ bụ ihe na-adọrọ adọrọ; disguise bụ onyinyo na masquerade bụ caricature
N'ezie, ọbụlagodi na nkọwa nke akwụkwọ ọkọwa okwu, okwu 'disguise' pụtara na atọ ahụ
Ya mere, okwu ndị a kpọtụrụ aha n'elu masquerade, masquerade na disguise nwere ihe yiri nke na-apụta ìhè 'site na dialectic nke izochi na ikpughe'

Masquerade na-adọrọ uche gaa n'ihe ndị dị mkpa dị ka ọdịdị nke njirimara, eziokwu nke njirimara ahụ, nkwụsi ike nke ụdị njirimara na mmekọrịta dị n'etiti njirimara a na-eche na ngosipụta ya (ma ọ bụ isi na ọdịdị)
Ihe mgbagwoju anya 'na-eyi ka ọ na-egosi eziokwu n'ụdị aghụghọ, ma na-ekpughe n'usoro izochi'
Themba Ndaba (a mụrụ na 14 Febụwarị 1965) bụ onye Swazi - South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi
A maara ya nke ọma maka ịtụgharị na ihe nkiri Machine Gun Preacher na usoro Zone 14
Ọ na-apụta ugbu a dịka Brutus Khoza na usoro ihe nkiri South African Ferguson Films TV The Queen
A mụrụ ya na Soweto, Gauteng, ọ kwagara Swaziland (malite n'afọ 2018 a gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Eswatini) mgbe ọ dị obere a ma zụlite ya n'ebe ahụ
Ọ malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ n'afọ 1970 wee banye na St Marks High School n'afọ 1982
Ọ gara gụọ Economics na Statistics na Zimbabwe n'afọ 1983
Ọ lara ezumike n'agụmakwụkwọ wee rụọ ọrụ dịka onye na-echekwa ego na Harare ruo oge ụfọdụ
Site n'afọ 1986 ruo 1988 ọ gara Harare Polytechnic, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Higher National Diploma na Business Studies na ọdịiche na Economics na Statistics
N'afọ 2011, o ritere ihe nrite Golden Horn Award maka ịbụ ihe kachasị mma na ihe nkiri ma merie 2011 Africa Movie Academy Awards maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Hopeville
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ dịka Brutus Khoza na usoro ihe nkiri Ferguson Films TV The Queen
N'afọ 1998, ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Sophie Ndaba, onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ abụọ; ha gbara alụkwaghịm n'afọ 2007
N'afọ 2011, ọ lụrụ Josey Ndaba, onye ya na ya nwere otu nwa
Chrestinah Thembi Kgatlana (amuru 2 Mee 1996) bu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ South Africa nke na-egwu egwu n'ihu maka ụlọ ọgbakọ Spanish Primera División Atlético Madrid na otu mba ụmụ nwanyị South Africa
Thembi Portia Msane bụ onye omeiwu South Africa maka Economic Freedom Fighters Tupu ọ rụọ ọrụ na ndị omeiwu, ọ bụ onye otu KwaZulu-Natal Legislature site na 2014 ruo 2019
Ka ọ na-erule Septemba 2020, ọ bụ onye ọzọ so na Kọmitii Portfolio On Trade and Industry
Àtụ Current MPs of South Africa
Thembi Seete (amụrụ na 25 Machị 1977), bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-eti egwu, onye na-egosi telivishọn na ihe nlereanya
A maara ya nke ukwuu dị ka onye otu kwaito mbụ Boom Shaka
Ugbu a, ọ na-arụ ọrụ nke 'Gladys' na Mzansi Magic telenovela Gomora
A mụrụ Seete na 25 Machị 1977 na Soweto, Gauteng, South Africa
Nna ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ụma
O toro na Sebokeng na Vaal ya na nwanne nne ya na nwanne nna ya
Nne ya Rebecca Seete nwụrụ na Machị 2021
N'afọ 1994, ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ndị otu kwaito supergroup a na-akpọ Boom Shaka Ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri na otu ahụ ruo mgbe otu ahụ kewara na 2000
Mgbe ahụ na 2000, o mere ihe nene izizi ya na Hijack Stories na obere ọrụ
Mgbe ahụ, ọ sonyeere ihe nkiri SABC1 Yizo Yizo
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ bụrụ egwu 'Sure Ntombazana' maka ụda nke Yizo Yizo oge 2
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ sonyekwara ihe nkiri SABC1 Gaz'lam, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Lerato' ruo 2004
Ọ gara n'ihu na-eme ihe dị ka onye na-agụ egwu, ebe ọ wepụtara abọm izizi ya bu 'Lollipop' na afọ 2001
Mgbe ihe ịga nke ọma ahụ gasịrị, ọ wepụtara abọm nke abụọ 'S'matsatsa', nke gụnyere egwu ndị a ma ama dịka; 'Shayi Zandla' na 'Mphate Kahle'
N'afọ 2005, o mere ihe nkiri vidio Crossing the Line site n'ịrụ ọrụ nke 'Pumla'
Ka ọ dịgodị n'afọ 2006, ọ rụrụ ọrụ mbụ ya na SABC1 football drama serial Zone 14
N'ime usoro ihe nkiri ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke 'Nina Moloi' maka oge anọ na nyocha dị mma
Rhulani Thembi Siweya bụ ọnye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka osote minista na Presidency
Themsie Times (22 Septemba 1949 - 9 Disemba 2021), mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ ya Temsie Times ma ọ bụ Themsie Time, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn na South Africa
A mụrụ ya na Port Elizabeth, Cape Province na Union of South Africa n'oge ahụ, ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụnne asaa
Ọrụ ihe nkiri nke Times gụnyere ịpụta na ihe nkiri atọ ma ọ pụtakwara dị ka Maria Zibula na 7de Laan, ihe nkiri telivishọn, ịbụ otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe ngosi ahụ
Na Septemba 2008, ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Johannesburg, Gauteng, South Africa
Times nwụrụ na 9 Disemba 2021, mgbe ọ gbàrà afọ iri asaa na abụọ
Thenjiwe Niki Nkosi (amụrụ n'afọ 1980) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa-America na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri mgbasa ozi
N'afọ 2019, ọ meriri 15th Tollmand Award, ihe nrite South Africa kwa afọ màkà ónyé na-ese ihe
A mụrụ Nkosi n'afọ 1980 na New York n'aka nnà South Africa nọ n'ebe a chụgara ya na nné Greek-American
Ọ kwagara Harare n'afọ 1989 wee gaa Johannesburg na 1992
O nwere nzere bachelọ na Mahadum Harvard na MFA na School of Visual Arts na New York
Dị ka ọ na-adịkarị, ọrụ Nkosi na-enyocha ike na usoro ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ihe owuwu na ọha mmadụ
O gosipụtara ihe osise na ihe nkiri ya n'ọtụtụ mba gụnyere South Africa, United States, United Kingdom, France, Germany, Vernice na Portugal

Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ngosi ndị o gosipụtara na gụnyere; Standard Bank Gallery na Johannesburg, ifa Gallery na Berlin, South London Gallery na Tate Modern na London, Museum of Contemporary Art na Rio de Janeiro, Joburg Pavilion na 56th Venice Biennale na Fondation Louis Vuitton na Paris

Ọ bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nà XXVIIes Aterliers Internationaux, FRAC des Pays de la Loire nà France, VAIVEM na Sao Paulo, Vanilla Facts na Berlin, Cruces International, Montevideo na Bag Factory Artist Residency
Ihe ngosi nkè mbụ na Stevenson Gallery na Johannesburg, nkè akpọrọ 'Spanish' meghere n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 2020
N'ikwu okwu na 'Gymnasium', Thenjiwe na-ekwu 'Achọrọ m ịdọrọ uche gaa na mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ónyé ọ bụla na otu'
Thenjiwe bu n'uche ka ọrụ ya 'dọrọ uche ndị nọ n'etiti oge, nke a na-elegharakarị anya ma na-eleda anya dị ka akụkụ nke usoro mmeri, dị ka akụkụ ya'
Akụkụ vidio 'Suspension' (nke dị nkeji isii na nke dị nkeji iri anọ na ise) gosipụtara na ihe ngosi vidio n'ịntanetị nkè afọ 2020
N'afọ ahụ, ọ chịkọtara ihe nkiri nké ndị Black elite gymnastics si n'akụkụ ụwa niile n'oge na-adịghị anya tupu usoro ha ebido
Nnyocha New York Times kpọrọ mpempe akwụkwọ ahụ 'dị elu' na 'ihe niile na-agbadata-na-asọba-ọ bụ ihe a rụzuru ugbu a nke ngosi vidiyo' nkè e gosipụtara ya
Ọ na-arụkọ ọrụ ugboro ugboro na ónyé na-ese ihe MADEYOULOOK na Molemo Moiloa na Nare Mokgotho, yana Pamela Phatsimo Sunstrum
Nkosi bụ nné nkè otu nwa
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Johannesburg
Theo Baloyi bụ onye ọchụnta ego South Africa, na onye guzobere na onye isi ọrụ nke Bathu Shoes
Ọ malitere ụdị akpụkpọ ụkwụ ya na 2015, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Senior Associate na PwC na Dubai
E gosipụtara ya na ndepụta Forbes 30 Under 30 na 2019
N'afọ 2021, o meriri GQ's Business Leader of the Year
A mụrụ Baloyi ma zụlite ya na Hammanskraal, Gauteng ebe ọ nọrọkwa na nwata
Nna ya, Solly Baloyi, kwụsịrị ọrụ nọọsụ ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-ahụ maka ala na ụlọ ma ọ nwụrụ n'afọ 2014 Nne ya, Tshidi Baloyi, bụ onye Zulu
O nwere nwanne nwanyị a na-akpọ Goitsimang Baloyi
Baloyi gụrụ akwụkwọ na Shalom Primary School mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ debara aha ya na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
N'afọ 2009, Baloyi kwagara Johannesburg ma gụọ BCom Accounting na Mahadum South Africa
Tupu ọ hapụ Mahadum nke South Africa, Baloyi malitere njem azụmaahịa ya site n'ịbanye n'ire ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ site n'ụlọ ruo n'ụlọ
A họpụtara Baloyi ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na PwC South Africa n'okpuru mmemme gụsịrị akwụkwọ ha mechara rụọ ọrụ nke ọma nke mere ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ were ya n'ọrụ oge niile ma bufee ya na PwC Middle East na Dubai
N'afọ 2015, Baloyi hiwere Bathu, ụlọ ọrụ akpụkpọ ụkwụ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ma na-arụ ọrụ karịa ụlọ ahịa iri atọ na South Africa na mpaghara SADC
Baloyi bi na Eye of Africa, Johannesburg
Theo Pearl George (amụrụ n'afọ 2000 ma ọ bụ 2001) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ na Motswana nke na-agbachitere iju umu nwanyi na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Botswana
George agbaala bọọlụ maka iju umu nwanyi na Botswana
George gbara ọsọ maka Botswana na ọkwa dị elu n'oge 2021 COSAFA Women's Championship na 2022 Afrika iko mba nile iru eru
Àtụ Botswana squad 2022 Africa Women Cup of Nations
Theophilus Martins, ónyé a maara dịka Theo Martins, bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, onye na-ede egwu, na ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri
Martins guzobere Theo Martins Inc, ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ nke na-emepụta, na-ekesa ma na-ere ọrụ ya
Mmepụta ya enwetawo otuto site na ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere The LA Times, GQ magazine, The Washington Post na Wallpaper Magazine
A mụrụ Martins Theophilus Martins Jr na Providence, Rhode Island
Ọ bụ ónyé Yoruba
Nne ya si London si Lagos Island kwabata na nna ya si Surelere
Martins na-eto ndị mụrụ ya màkà ngosipụta egwu na nka ọ nwetara n'oge ọ na-etolite
O kwuru na nne ya chọtara oku na-achọ akwụkwọ akụkọ ọbọdọ mgbe nna ya bụ onye na-afụ opi na ónyé na-anakọta egwu
Martins malitere ọrụ dị ka DJ mgbe ọ gachara n'ụlọ enyi ezinụlọ nke nwere abụọ Technic SL-1200 turntables
Ọ gara Community College of Rhode Island tupu ọ gaa Mahadum nke Rhode Island, na-eme DJ set na campus
Mgbe o nwetasịrị ihe ịga nke ọma dị ka DJ, ọ malitere ịchụso ọrụ dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe n'onwe ya
A tọhapụrụ ọrụ mbụ nke Martins, The Birth, na mmekorita ya na ébé nrụọrụ weebụ Questlove, Okayplayer
N'afọ 2013, ọ wepụtara abọm, Wonderland ma kwado ntọhapụ ya na njem nleta na arụmọrụ na BET music video show, 106 & Park
Vidio egwu ya, KILLER gosipụtara dị ka mmemme ahụ, 'New Joint of The Day'
N'afọ 2014, Martins malitere Posture, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe na akara ndekọ iji kwado ọrụ nka ya
N'afọ 2017, Martins sonyeere ónyé na-emepụta Thelonious Martin na EP, TM
N'afọ 2019, ọ malitere Cereal & Such, usoro ọka na snacks
Mmalite ahụ sonyeere abọm nchịkọta nke gosipụtara, Asa Taccone, Shelley (FKA DRAM), Kelsey Bulkin, Mez na ndị ọzọ
Martins wepụtara otu, Be With You, na-eduzi vidiyo egwu ya na ónyé nduzi Jimmy Marble
N'afọ 2020, Martins wepụtara, Walking Music, abọm iji kwado atụmatụ ya na-agagharị agagharị
Abọm ahụ sonyeere, Walking Not Talking, ihe nkírí nke Martins dere ma duzie
N'afọ 2021, Martins wepụtara, 'Ọ bụ Right Where You Left It', akwụkwọ nwere akụkọ dị mkpirikpi, edemede na uri
Akwụkwọ ahụ, nke nwéré QR Codes, duuru ndị na-agụ ya gaa abụ ma ọ bụ vidiyo egwu site na isiakwụkwọ kwekọrọ
E wepụtara mbipụta nke abụọ, ya na ụdaolu na-eso ya
Onyinye sitere n'aka ndị na-ese ihe, CeeLo Green, Ts Madison, Live na Triathalon onye ọ bụla na-agụpụta akụkụ dị n'akwụkwọ ahụ
Ákàrá ụda ahụ gụnyere okwu mbido sitere n'aka onye bụbu onye America na-agba bọọlụ, Lamar Odom
A họpụtara Martins dị ka peeji na ihe nkiri akụkọ ihe mere eme, Amistad Martins pụtara na ihe nkírí ahụ, 'End of Babes', ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Gillian Zinser maka usoro mgbasa ozi NOWNESS
N'afọ 2017, ọ pụtara dị ka onwé ya na, 'United Colors of Shirley', ihe nkiri nke abụọ maka NOWNESS
N'afọ 2018, Martins dere ma duzie usoro weebụ, The Theo Show, na-egwu akụkọ ifo nke onwe ya
Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri ahụ, If You're Ready, na-enweta Vimeo Staff Pick na YouTube Short of The Week
N'afọ 2020, Martins gosipụtara, dee ma duzie, Food For Thought, usoro weebụ nke Issa Rae's Hoorae Media mepụtara
Martins malitere Posture, ụlọ ọrụ imewe na uwe
Ọ sochiri Cereal & Such, ụlọ mmanya ọka Los Angeles na akara ọka na-enweghị gluten na snacks
Nnyocha ya gụnyere mbipụta, mgbasa ozi, ahịa na azụmaahịa e-azụmahịa
O dèrè akwụkwọ abụọ, ọ bụ onye na-ebipụta Reading Material, magazin a na-ebipụ kwa nkeji iri na ise ma na-akwado mmemme telivishọn ugbu a, Theo Tian House na Vans Network

Theodore Dakpogan bụ onye na-ese ihe na Beninois Vodou
Ọrụ ya nwere mmetụta nke ihe ọkpụkpụ Fon nke senchiri nke iri na itoolu
A maara ya maka ihe ọkpụkpụ ya
Onye na-ese ihe si Benin bụ onye na-akpụ ihe n'oge gara aga
N'iji iberibe ígwè a tụfuru atụfu, ọ na-emepụta ọrụ nka, na-ejikọta ha na mgbọrọgwụ nke okpukpe Vodun
Dị ka onye na-ese ihe nke oge a, ọ na-egosi mmasị na esemokwu dị n'etiti oge gara aga na ugbu a, n'etiti ụwa 'nke mbụ' na 'nke atọ'
Ọrụ nka ya sitere na ihe ndị a tụfuru atụfu nke ịzụ ahịa na mmepụta buru ibu, na-arutu aka na ọnọdụ a na-edozighị edozi nke Africa mgbe ọchịchị ndị ọcha gasịrị
Theodore Orji (amuru ya na 1940) bu onye bu governor nke ndi Abia State na Naigeria
Amere ya elect na 29 Mee, 2007
Mbu ha nweta governorship na Abia State, ha bula onye Chief of Staff Orji Uzor Kalu, onye bula governor mbu ya
Thando bụ aha unisex nyere, nke a na-ama na ndida Africa, nke ihe 'ịhụnanya'
Ọ nwere ike na-ezo aka
Chief Theophilus Adeleke Akinyele (29 Febụwarị 1932 - 26 Ọktoba 2020) bụ onye ndụmọdụ azụmahịa na onye ọrụ obodo Naijiria
A mụrụ Akinyele na Ibadan
O nwetara BA na University College Ibadan, (nke bụzi University of Ibadan) n'afọ 1959
Ọ gụkwara akwụkwọ na Mahadum Oxford, Mahadum Connecticut na Harvard Business School

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide na Ministries of Agriculture and Finance nke Western State of Nigeria ochie, onye na-edebanye aha na odeakwụkwọ na Council of the University of Ife (nke bụzi Obafemi Awolowo University), Ile-Ife Nigeria, odeakwụkwọ nke Gọọmenti ndị agha na onye isi nke ndị ọrụ obodo nke Oyo Steeti ma bụrụkwa onye isi nke mmefu ego na onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche na mmefu ego nke onye isi ala Shehu Shagari site na 1979 ruo 1983
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọrụ ọhaneze, Akinyele rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ
O nwere aha onye isi nke Bobajiro nke ala Ibadan ma bụrụ onye isi nke Order of the Niger

Theoren Wallace 'Theo' Fleury (mùrù ya na 29 Önwa ishií, 1968) bu onye Kanada na á gba hoki mgbe mbu maka ndi Calgary Flames, Colorado Avalanche, New York Rangers na Chicago Blackhawks nor na National Hockey League (NHL), ma ndi Tappara nke SM-liiga Finland, na ndi Belfast Giants nke Elite Ice Hockey League Britain Ukwu
Ndi Flames dọsẹrẹ ya maka gburúgburù nke asaato, nke 166 ndi níle, na NHL Entry Draft 1987 na ọ kwụrụ egwuregwu rúrú 1,000 na NHL na étịtị afọr 1989 na 2003

Theresa Amerley Tagoe (December 13, 1943 ♡ Novembe na afọ 2010) nke a makwaara dị ka Iron Lady bụ nwanyị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana na onye isi otu New Patriotic Party na onye bụbu onye omeiwu nke Ablekuma South Constituency
A mụrụ Tagoe, nke ndị Ga, na 13 Disemba, na afọ 1943
Tagoe gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Aburi Girls Senior High School ebe ọ bụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na French na Mahadum Ghana

Tagoe nwere ụlọ akwụkwọ odeakwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị nke gụnyere French na usoro mmụta ya, yana ịmalite mmemme ọrụ ebere gụnyere otu iji nyere ụmụ mgbei na ụmụ agbọghọ nọ n'okporo ámá aka ịmụta ọrụ na-arụpụta ihe na mmemme ịgbazinye ego maka ụmụ nwanyị na-ere azụ kpọrọ nkụ n'okporong ámá Accra
Theresa Tagoe bụkwa osote Minista nke Greater Accra Regional na osote Minisita nke Ala, Ọhịa na Mmanụ ala n'okpuru ọchịchị John Kufuor
Tagoe bụkwa otu oge onye nhazi ụmụ nwanyị nke New Patriotic Party
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu na 7 Jenụwarị na afọ 1997 mgbe ọ nwesịrị mmeri na afọ 1996 Ghanaian General Elections
O nwetara 3990% nke ngụkọta vootu a tụbara nke ya na vootu 47,644 site na imeri Ebo Hawkson nke National Democratic Congress onye nwetara 3570% nke ya na 42,568 vootu
Tagoe jere ozi dị ka onye otu Council of State ma bụrụ onye otu Council nke Women World Leaders
A gụrụ Dansoman Roundabout aha ya nke a maara dị ka 'Theresa Ameley Tagoe Roundaboot' ma guzobe ihe oyiyi iji sọpụrụ ya
Theresa Tagoe nwere ụmụ nwoke abụọ
Theresa Anyuat Bola bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Sudan
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Mmepe Ọha nke Western Bahr el Ghazal kemgbe 18 Mee 2010
Theresa Knutson (amụrụ n'ubochi nke mbu n'afo1996) bụ onye America na-eme egwuregwu ice hockey, na-egwuri egwu ugbu a na Metropolitan Riveters nke National Women's Hockey League (NWHL)

Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Aquinas mana o sonyere na egwuregwu hockey maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndirị Onalaska, ebe ọ duziri steeti ahụ n'ịgba goolu afọ anọ n'usoro, a kpọrọ ya Wisconsin High School Offensive Player of the Year ugboro atọ, wee merie Wisconsin Miss Hockey Award na 2014
Bido n'afo 2014 wee ruo n'afo 2018, ọ gara Mahadum Connecticut, na-enweta akara iri asaa na iteghete na egwuregwu NCAA na akara nari na iri ato na ise
Ọ nyere goolu mbụ ya na kọleji n'ụbọchị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2014 megide Mahadum Syracuse
Ka ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ jere Germany ka ya na Mad Dogs Mannheim bịa nye aka na Fraueneishockey-Bundesliga
O nwetara akara iri isii na isii na egwuregwu iri abuo na asato na oge rookie Bundesliga, gụnyere goolu iri ano na asato, dị mma maka nke atọ na league na akara
Ọ laghachiri na North America maka oge 2020 na 21, na-etinye aka na Metropolitan Riveters nke NWHL
Theresa Lola (amụrụ na 6 Mee afọ 1994) bụ onye na-ede uri na onye edemede nke Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke afọ 2018 Brunel International African Poetry Prize
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2019, a mara ọkwa ya dị ka afọ 2019 Young People's Laureate maka London
A mụrụ Theresa Lola na Lagos, Naijiria, wee kwaga London, England na afọ 2007 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ
na afọ 2015, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na a mbụ-klaasị nzere na akaụntụ na ego na Mahadum Hertfordshire
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, Lola sonyere na mmemme Barbican Young Poets
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe edepụtara ya maka afọ 2016 Bridport Poetry Prize, ma mesịa merie afọ 2017 Hammer and Tongue National Poetry Slam
N'afọ 2018, ọ bụ onye mmeri nke afọ 2018 Brunel International African Poetry Prize
N'otu afọ ahụ, onye isi obodo nke London nyere ya iwu ka o dee ma gụọ uri na mmeghe nke ihe oyiyi Millicent Fawcett na Parliament Square
Otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị, n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2019, a mara ọkwa ya dị ka afọ 2019 Young People's Laureate maka London
N'afọ 2019, Nine Arches Press bipụtara nchịkọta abụ zuru oke nke Lola bụ In Search of Equilibrium, nke Pascale Petit kọwara dị ka 'abụ nsọpụrụ maka ịdị ndụ na mmerụ ahụ'
Theresa Makone bụ onye bụbu Minista Ọrụ Ọha na Zimbabwe
Ọ bụ onye otu House of Assembly maka Harare North (MDC-T)
Àtụ Zimbabwe government ministers 2009Àtụ 7th Parliament of Zimbabwe
Theresa Raizenberg bụ onye ama ama n'obodo ndi LGBTQ dika onye na-achọ ikike ndị LGBTQ
Ya na Midi Achmat na Sally Gross bu ndi e nyere 003 Galactic / Allison Masters Community Award
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị guzobere TAC
O dere akwụkwọ n'akwụkwọ akụkọ dị iche iche ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike na nzukọ Gay and Lesbian Memory in Action (GALA)
Therese Wagner (1797-1858), bụ onye emba ọchụnta ego German
Ọ ya bụ onye nwe Augustiner-Bräu na n'afọ 1846-1858
A gụrụ otu okporo ámá dị na Münich aha ya n'afọ 2020

Theresia Kyalo, bụ onye ọka iwu Kenya, onye ọchụnta ego, onye na-emepụta ọla na onye na-ese ihe dị iche iche, onye Beyoncé Knowles bịanyere aka na ya na ndekọ nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri nke Black Owned Businesses na July 2020
A mụrụ ya na Kenya n'ihe dị ka afọ 1996
Ọ gara Greenfield Community School, na Dubai, United Arab Emirates, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na diplọma ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ laghachiri na mba Kenya wee banye na Mahadum Riara dị na Nairobi, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere Bachelor of Laws na 2020
Theresia gụrụ akwụkwọ iwu mana ọrụ ya niile na nka na ọla
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na mgbasa ozi dị iche iche nakwa maka mgbasa ozi, gụnyere akwa, akwụkwọ, ihe nkiri, ọla na ígwè
Ọ na-esokarị ndị na-ese ihe ndị ọzọ na ọrụ ya
Ọ na-egosipụta ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi anụ ahụ na forum dijitalụ na vidiyo na foto
Ọ malitere ịnwale nka na 2016, mgbe ọ ka nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu
Malite na eserese akara, ọ gara n'ihu n'ụdị nka na mgbasa ozi ndị ọzọ
Ọrụ ya na-agụnye akwa, ígwè, akwụkwọ na ihe nkiri
Ọ bụ onwe ya ka ọ na-akụzi nka ya
Njikọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya gụnyere na ụdị ndị a ma ama, Adele Dejak na Love Studio
N'afọ 2019, o gosipụtara na abalị asaa na Nọvemba ebe ọ na-eduzi ụlọ ọrụ
Ebumnuche ya bụ ka ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ nwoke na-eyi ihe ịchọ mma ya
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ọtụtụ ọla, mana ọkachasị na ọla, si otú a hụ na ọrụ ya ga-efu ọha na eze
Therm-a-ezumike bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe n'èzí nke America nke na-ahụ maka matarasị, akpa ihi ụra, oche ogige, àkwà, na ndị na-akwọ ụgbọelu

Therm-a-ezumike malitere dị ka akara nke matarasị na-afụli elu, nke ndị injinia nke ụwa na ngwa ngwa gbaba n'ebe nile site n'ime ụmụ ndị nke dị ka onye isi oche nkeji Boeing abụọ na ndị na-eme ihe n'azụ azụ mepụtara na mbido afọ 1970
A na-akpọ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ Cascade Designs na mbụ, nke bụzi ụlọ ọrụ nne na nna nke Therm-a-Rest na ụdị ndị ọzọ dị n'èzí

Mattrise na-afụli elu nke na-eme ka ọ dị ọkụ na-agụnye envelopu ákwà naịlọn na-egbochi ikuku jupụtara na mpempe akwụkwọ ọrụ okwu ihe nọr na mkpóró ndị ogbi ozi esighi na site n'ime ụmụ gị nke obere, polyurethane foam na-emeghe
Mgbe a na-emeghe valvụ, ụfụfụ ahụ na-agbasa ma na-adọta ikuku n'ime matarasị ahụ
Mgbe matarasị ahụ jupụtara n'ụzọ zuru ezu, onye ọrụ ahụ na-emechi valvụ ahụ
Iji mee ka ọ sie ike, enwere ike ịfụ ikuku ole na ole n'ime matarasị ahụ
Iji pakọta matarasị ahụ, a na-emeghe valvụ ahụ ma na-afụkọta ya nke ọma iji mee ka ikuku pụọ, mgbe ahụ, a mechiri valvụ ahụ iji gbochie inflation ọzọ
Àtụ Climbing-navÀtụ Mattresses
Therman Statom bụ ónyé America Studio Glass artist ónyé isi ya bụ akwa iko
Ọ na-ebibi, na-ese ihe, ma na-achịkọta iko ahụ - na-agbakwunye ihe iko ndị a chọtara n'ụzọ iji mepụta ihe atọ a tụrụ atụ
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ndị a buru ibu
A maara Statom màkà nrụnye ya pụrụ iche nke ebe ọ na-eme ka ihe owuwu iko ya dị obéré karịa ónyé nleta
Ụda na ihe oyiyi dijitalụ a na-atụle bụkwa ihe ndị metụtara ọrụ gburugburu ebe obibi
Nwa nwoke nke dọkịta, Therman Statom amụrụ na Winter Haven, Florida na 1953 ma zụlite na Washington, DC
N'ebe ahụ, ya na Cady Noland, nwa nwanyị nke ónyé na-ese ihe na-enweghị atụ Kenneth Noland, ghọrọ enyi
N'oge ọ bụ nwata, a kọrọ na Statom gwara okenye Noland (ónyé na-arụ ọrụ na usoro ọ na-achọ n'oge ahụ), 意 nwere ike ise ihe dị ka nke ahụ
Statom na-ekwu na ọ bụ Kenneth Noland chọrọ ịbụ ónyé na-ese ihe
Ọ malitere ọmụmụ ya nke iko dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe na Pilchuck Glass School na Stanwood, Washington na 1971, na-aga n'ihu na-amụ ihe ọkpụkpụ na Rhode Island School of Design
Ọ natara Bachelor of Arts site na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1974 na Master of Arts site n'aka Pratt Institute School of Art and Design na 1978
Na Pratt, o ji ugegbe mee ọrụ mbụ ya (nke, na ụlọ ọrụ ugegbe, a na-akpọ ugegbe na-ese n'elu mmiri) n'ihi na ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ enweghị ihe maka ịrụ ọrụ ugegbe ọkụ
Na mbido afọ 1980, Statom natara akwụkwọ ịkpọ òkù site n'aka Richard Marquis ileta mmemme iko ọkụ nke ọ duziri na Mahadum California na Los Angeles
Mgbè Marquis hapụrụ mmemme ahụ na 1983 Statom duziri ya ruo mgbè e mechiri ya na 1985
Ọrụ ọkachamara ya afọ iri abụọ na ise gụnyere ihe ngosi na nnukwu ebe ngosi ihe mgbè ochie gafee United States
Ihe ngosi otu ónyé na-adịbeghị anya gụnyere ndị dị na Lowe Museum nkè Mahadum Miami, Coral Gables, Florida; Chrysler Museum of Art na Norfolk, Virginia na Toledo Museum of Art dị na Toledo, Ohio
Na mba ụwa, Statom egosila na Stockholm, Sweden; Paris, France; Hokkaido, Japan na Ensenada, Mexico
N'etiti ọrụ ọha na eze bụ ndị dị na California na Los Angeles Central Public Library na Los Angeles International Airport, Tom Bradley Terminal na Ice Center na San Jose
Na Nevada, enwere ike ịhụ ọrụ e nyèrè iwu na Harrahńs Casino na Las Vegas, na Arizona na Scottsdale Museum of Contemporary Art na New York na New York State Arts Commission
Therman Statom gụnyere n'etiti nsọpụrụ ya Outstanding Achievement Award nke UrbanGlass nyere na 2008, na Distinguished Artist Award nkè James Renwick Alliance nyere na 2006 na Washington, DC
National Endowment for the Arts nyere Statom onyinye fellowship na 1988 na 1982; ọ bụ ónyé natara Ford Foundation Artists Grant na 1997
E mere Statom Fellow nké American Craft Council na 1999
N'ọnwa Nọvemba, afọ 2015, a kpọrọ Statom onye United States Artists Fellow, nke gụnyere onyinye $ 50,000 na-enweghị mgbochi

Nzukọ ahụ na-achọ ịchọpụta 'ndị na-ese ihe na ndị na-emepụta ihe na-arụ ọrụ na ngalaba nke ihe owuwu na imewe, ọrụ aka, ịgba egwu, akwụkwọ, mgbasa ozi, egwu, ihe nkiri na arụmọrụ, nka ọdịnala na nka anya

Na United States, nchịkọta ọha na eze na-ejide ọrụ Therman Statomás gụnyere Metropolitan Community College-Elkhorn Valley Campus, Omaha, Nebraska; Art Museum of West Virginia University, Morgantown, West Virginia; California African-American Museum, Los Angeles, California; Cincinnati Art Museum; City of Seattle, Seattle, Washington, Washington, Corning Inc, New York; Detroit Institute of Arts, Detroit, Michigan; High Museum of Art, Atlanta, Georgia; Los Angeles County Museum of West West Virginia, Los Angeles Dukee Art Center; Min Min Min Min Men Men Men Men, Washington City City City City, Washington Men Men Men City, American Art, Washington Men, American Art Center, Washington Men's; American Art, American Art; Men Men Men's, Washington Men

Enwere ike ịchọta ọrụ ndị mba ofesi na nchịkọta nke Musée des Arts Décoratifs, Paris, France; Museum of Contemporary Design and Applied Arts na Lausanne, Switzerland; na Moscow, Russia na Maputo, Mozambique site na mmemme Art in Embassies nke Ngalaba Mba US
A thermo-hygrograph ma ọ bụ hygrothermograph bụ ihe ndekọ chaatị nké na-atụ ma na-edekọ ma okpomọkụ na iru mmiri (ma ọ bụ ebe igirigi)
Ngwaọrụ ndị yiri ya nké na-edekọ naanị otu parameter bụ thermograph màkà okpomọkụ na hygrograph màkà iru mmiri
Thermographs ebe edere ọdịiche site na iji foto ka ọtụtụ ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị kọwara n'afọ 1845, gụnyere Francis Ronalds ónyé bụ Honorary Director nkè Kew Observatory
E zigara ihe nlereanya emelitere nkè igwe mbụ ahụ gafee netwọk nyocha mba nke ụlọ ọrụ UK Met Office ọhụrụ guzobere n'afọ 1867 ma bụrụ nkè Kew Observatory haziri
A na-eji ngwá egwú ndị a eme ihe n'ụwa niile
Ntọala ọzọ nkè thermograph nwèrè mkpịsị akwụkwọ nke na-edekọ okpomọkụ na cylinder na-agbagharị
Pen ahụ dị na njedebe nke mkpịsị aka nkè a na-achịkwa site na eriri ígwè abụọ nke metal na-emetụta okpomọkụ nké na-agbaji ka okpomọkụ na-agbanwe
Enwèrè ike iji ntutu isi mmadụ mee ihe màkà iru mmiri na igwe ndị dị otú ahụ

Theron (/ ˈθɪərɒn/ THEER-on, / θəˈroʊn/) bụ aha nna Occitan (nke sitere na ebe-aha Théron, Thérond [terɔ̃] ụdị dị iche iche nke * Thoron - dị ka Le Thor (Vaucluse, Torum 1029) - sitere na PIE * tur- ma ọ bụ Latin torus 'ịdị elu'), na aha enyere na Bekee Ọ nwere ike na-ezo aka
Theunissen bụ obere obodo nwere naanị ụlọ mmanya, Theunissen Wine Farm, na mpaghara Free State nke South Africa
Ọ dị ihe dịka kilomita 95 n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Bloemfontein na ihe dịka kilomita 45 na ndịda Welkom
Ọ bụ onye ọchịagha Boer War Helgaardt Theunissen hiwere ya
Theuns bụ ụdị dị mkpirikpi ejiri na South Africa nke nwoke Dutch nyere aha Theunis, nke dị ka Teunis, ọ bụ ihe ewepụtara Anthonius (Anthony)
Ma Theunis na Theuns dịkwa ka aha nna nna

Thiago Neves Fragoso (1 Novemba 1981) bu onye Brazilian bu ọmẹka
Tiep ma ọ bụ thieb bụ nri ọdịnala sitere na Senegal nke a na-eri na Guinea-Bissau, Guinea, Mali, Mauritania, na Gambia
Ọ bụ nri mba na Senegal
A na-eji azụ, osikapa na tomato sauce esi n'otu ite akwadebe ụdị tiep a na-akpọ thieboudienne ma ọ bụ chebu jen (Wolof ; French thiéboudiène)
E nwekwara tiep yappa (nke nwere anụ) na tiep ganaar (nke nwere ọkụkọ)
Ihe ndị ọzọ na-agụnyekarị yabasị, karọt, kabbaji, japu, ose ọkụ, oroma na mmanụ ahụekere, na cubes ngwaahịa
N'akụkọ ihe mere eme, a na-ekwukarị na obodo Saint-Louis, na narị afọ nke iri na itoolu
Aha nri ahụ sitere n'okwu Wolof nke pụtara 'osikapa' (ceeb) na 'azụ̀' (鱼)
Na Pulaar a maara ya dị ka maaro e liddi ('osikapa na azụ')
A na-enye ya na nnukwu efere na osikapa n'ala na azụ, na-abụkarị grouper ọcha (Epinephelus aeneus), na akwụkwọ nri, ọtụtụ n'ime ha dum, debere n'etiti
Tiep nwere ihe yiri ya nke ukwuu n'ihe ndị mejupụtara ya, ngosi ya, na ihe ọ pụtara na Maghrebi couscous
Dị ka omenala si dị, a na-eri ya n'ime nnukwu efere ọha na eze na aka

Ọ bụkwa ihe nnọchianya nke Senegalese terranga (ile ọbịa) ezinụlọ, ndị enyi na ndị ọbịa na-eleta na-ezukọta gburugburu otu efere (nke a na-akpọ bolus) nke onye ọ bụla na-eri site na ya site na iji spoon (couddou Pulaar) ma ọ bụ otu achịcha
A na-eche na nri a ma ama n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka a maara dị ka jollof sitere na thieboudienne, mana a na-ejikarị anụ eme ya karịa azụ, a na-agwakọta osikapa n'ime ihe ndị ọzọ
Nri Gullah osikapa na-acha ọbara ọbara yiri thieboudienne, na-atụ aro ụzọ nri si West Africa na uwa ọhụrụ site n'aka ndị ohu Africa na ụmụ ha

Dị ka thieboudienne, e nwere ọdịiche dị iche iche nke osikapa na-acha ọbara ọbara na Gullah / Gechee ihe nketa omenala Corridor, gụnyere Savannah osikapa na acha ọbara ọbara na Charleston osikapa na acha ọbara ọbara

Ọ bụ nkwadebe nke azụ ọhụrụ ma ọ bụ nke a mịrị amị, na osikapa (osikapa Wolof), nke e ji akwụkwọ nri (dị ka akpu, ugu, cabbage, karọt, turnip, ma ọ bụ eggplant) sie, parsley, tomato paste, ose, galik na yabasị
N'ịbụ nke e ji azụ mee na mbụ, a na-ahụkarị ya na anụ ehi ma ọ bụ ọbụna ọkụkọ
N'ịbụ nke sitere na Senegal, usoro nri ọdịnala gụnyere azụ, osikapa, tomato na yabasị
Otú ọ dị, a na-eri tiep n'ọtụtụ mba dị na West Africa
Dabere na mba, usoro nri na ihe ndị e ji esi nri na-agbanwe ọbụna usoro isi nri nwere ike ịdị iche
Na Mali, a maara tiep dị ka 22h, nri nwere ọkụkọ, osikapa na akwụkwọ nri dịka tomato na yabasị
Ụdị tiep ọzọ bụ jollof ma ọ bụ djolof (n'asụsụ Wolof, asụsụ mba) osikapa a na-akpọkwa benachin nke pụtara 'otu ite' na Wolof
Ọ bụ nri a ma ama karịsịa na Naijiria na Ghana
Na Cameroon na Ivory Coast a na-akpọ nri ahụ riz gras
Ihe ndị mejupụtara ya yiri ihe ndị e ji eme nri mbụ ahụ tinyere tomato, osikapa na yabasị
Agbụrụ dị iche iche nke Senegal nwere ọdịiche nke ha na nri na iri nri, nke na-emetụta ma ọ bụ site na ịdị nso n'oké osimiri ma ọ bụ omenala nke nomadism na ịzụ ehi
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ndị si n'ebe ndịda Senegal na-agbakwunye ụfọdụ kouthia, [nkọwa dị mkpa] ebe ndị si Dakar na Saint-Louis ga-eji mkpụrụ obi (Wolof)

Nsụgharị ndị ọzọ nke aha ahụ gụnyere ceebu jen, cee bu jen, ceeb u jen, thebouidienne, theibou dienn, thiebou dienn، thiebou dinne, thiébou dieune, tíe biou dienne, thieb-ou-djien, thiebu djen ma ọ bụ osikapa na azụ

A na-enweta nke a site na ịgagharị n'ụwa ma zute ụfọdụ ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị, site na ndị ọkà mmụta ihe ndị dị ndụ ruo na ndị ọkà n'ihe ọmụmụ physics, ndị na-enyocha ihu igwe

Àkwà mmiri nke atọ bụ nke kachasị ogologo n'ime àkwà mmiri atọ jikọtara Lagos Island na isi ala, ndị ọzọ bụ àkwà mmiri ndị ọzọ dịka Eko na Carter
Ọ bụ àkwà mmiri kachasị ogologo n'Africa ruo n'afọ 1996 mgbe a rụchara àkwà Mmiri nke 6 nke Ọktoba dị na Cairo
Àkwà mmiri ahụ na-amalite site na Oworonshoki nke jikọtara ya na ụzọ awara awara Apapa-Oshodi na ụzọ awara ngwa Lagos-Ibadan, ma kwụsị na Adeniji Adele Interchange na Lagos Island
Enwekwara njikọ n'etiti àkwà mmiri nke na-eduga na Herbert Macaulay Way, Yaba
Ọ bụ Julius Berger Nigeria PLC wuru àkwà mmiri ahụ
Onye isi ala Shehu Shagari nyere iwu nke mbụ n'afọ 1980 ma onye isi ala Ibrahim Babangida rụchaa ya n'afọ 1990; ọ dị ihe dị ka kilomita 118 n'ogologo
Ka oruru N'afọ 2006, ọtụtụ ndị njem kọrọ na Àkwà Mmiri Mainland nke Atọ na-eme mkpọtụ nke ọma, na-egosi na ọ chọrọ nlebara anya ngwa ngwa
N'ihi ya, a malitere ọrụ nrụzi n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke àkwà mmiri ahụ n'oge dị iche iche, na-eduga na mmechi nke àkwá mmiri ahụ
Na Jenụwarị 2013, a rụchara ọrụ a
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, e nweela asịrị banyere oghere na ebe àkwà mmiri ahụ

Àkwà mmiri ahụ nwere ụzọ asatọ nwere ọdịdị ọhụrụ n'oge mmezi ikpeazụ, na-ese ihe nduzi àkwà mmiri na agba nke Naịjirịa akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ, ọcha, akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ nri, yana ihe osise n'ozuzu maka ọdịdị ọhụrụ
A rụchara ọrụ nrụzi n'àkwà mmiri ahụ ma meghee àkwà mmiri yango ọzọ n'October 30, N'afọ 2012
Àkwà mmiri nke atọ Mainland nwere okporo ụzọ ụgbọ ala dị elu n'ụbọchị izu, dịka ọtụtụ ndị bi na-aga ma na-esi na Lagos Mainland gaa n'àgwàetiti ahụ, nke bụ ebe azụmahịa nke Lagos State
Ndị bi na Ikeja, Agboyi-Ketu, Ikorodu, Isheri, Oworonshoki, Gbagada, Yaba, Maryland na Oshodi na-ejikarị àkwà mmiri ahụ eme njem ha kwa ụbọchị
Àkwà mmiri nke atọ bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke njem Lagos kwa ụbọchị, n'ihi ya, ọ chọrọ ka a rụzigharịa ya mgbe niile
Ọ ghọwokwa nnukwu ihe ngosi Lagos, na-enye echiche dị iche iche nke Lagos - Lagos Lagoon, Mahadum Lagos na Makoko, obodo dị mkpụmkpụ nke e wuru na Lagos Lagoon
Na 6 Julaị N'afọ 2020, a mara ọkwa na a ga-emechi Àkwà Mmiri Mainland nke Atọ ruo ọnwa isii n'ihi nrụzi
A ga-arụzi àkwà mmiri ahụ ọzọ site na Fraịde, Julaị 24, 2020 ruo Jenụwarị 24, 2021 maka dochie anya ihe ndị na-ebugharị na nkwonkwo mmụba
N'afọ ndị 1970, mgbe agha obodo Naịjirịa gwụsịrị, oge ọnụ ahịa mmanụ na-arịwanye elu sochiri na Naịjirị gafere usoro ọganihu akụ na ụba

Mkpa maka ụlọ ọrụ mmeziwanye ihe karịsịa na isi obodo Lagos nke gafere oge mkpọchi ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri na mgbe ahụ, ihe na-arịgo n'elu n'ụgbọ ala mepụtara ihe mkpali maka àkwà mmiri nke atọ na-ejikọta Lagos Island na-azụ ahịa na obodo ndị na-eto eto nke Lagos
E nyere nkwekọrịta maka àkwà mmiri nke atọ n'afọ 1976
E wuru àkwà mmiri ahụ n'ụzọ dị iche iche
Akụkụ nke mbụ e nyere nkwekọrịta na otu PGH consortium, ọrụ nke gụnyere, Impresit Girola na Borini Prono, ebe Trevi Group nyere ọrụ nkwado maka ịkwanye
E mere nke mbụ ka ọ bụrụ kilomita 5 n'ogologo, malite n'àgwàetiti ahụ ma kwụsị na Ebute Metta, n'akụkụ Yaba
Àkwà mmiri ahụ na-ebuli elu ruo kilomita 3 n'elu mmiri ma jiri simenti siri ike mee ya

Ntọala ntọala nwere omimi dịgasị iche iche n'etiti mita 36 na 54 na dayameta nke mkpọda dabere na okporo ụzọ nwere ike ibu, a na-eji dayameta 1500mm maka isi àkwà mmiri na-agafe ọdọ mmiri Lagos na maka ụzọ na-agagharị na ụzọ na-abịarute, dayameta dị n'etiti 800mm na 1200mm
E wuchara nke mbụ n'afọ 1980
E nyere ndị Julius Berger nke abụọ site na Ebute-Metta ruo Oworonshoki na Naịjirịa

Oge nnọkọ nke atọ nke Kọmitii Etiti iri na otu nke otu ndị Kọmunist China bụ nzukọ dị mkpa nke Kọmitii Etiti nke ndị otu Kọmunist China nke emere na Beijing, China, site na n'abalị iri na asatọ nke ọnwa Disemba ruo analị iri abụọ na abụọ nke ọnwa Disemba afọ 1978

Ọgbakọ a bụ mmalite nke amụma 'Ndozigharị na Imepe', a na -ahụkwa ya ebe niile dị ka oge Deng Xiaoping ghọrọ onye isi China na-anọchi Onye isi oche Hua Guofeng, onye nọgidere dịka onye isi oche nke otu Kọmunist China ruo 1981

Nzukọ a bụ oge mgbanwe dị mkpa na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke China mgbe 1949 gasịrị, na-aka akara mmalite nke ngụkọ azụ nke amụma Mao's ' Mgbanwe Ọdịnaala' Onye isi oche Mao, wee tinye China na ụzọ mgbanwe akụ na ụba mba
E mere Nzukọ a na họtel Jingxi dị na ọdịda anyanwụ Beijing
Tupu plenum, arịrịọ maka ịjụ mgbanwe mgbanwe ọdịbendị mụbara, ọkachasị ndị a kpagburu n'oge Mao Zedong n'afọ gara aga

N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 1976, Ejidere otu egwu radikal nke anọ nke nwunye Mao di ya nwụrụ Jiang Qing n'edu, Deng Xiaoping n'onwe ya - onye isi ndì na-ama Mao aka site na 1975 ruo 1976 - ka emezigharịrị nke ọma na 1977

Ọ bụ ezie na Hua Guofeng, onye nwere ihe ịga nke ọma dị ka onye isi oche nke ndị Kọmunist China na 'nnukwu onye enyemaka,' n'afọ 1976, nwara ịga n'ihu n'ụdị rhetoric kacha Maoist na inweta ikike dị ka nke Mao
O nyekwara ohere ịhazigharị ọtụtụ ndị enyi Deng, bụ ndị, na -akpọ maka mgbanwe akụ na ụba, wee nupụrụ ya isi

N'oge ogbako ọrụ nke afò1978 nke emere na Nọvemba, na-akwado maka plenum, Chen Yun welitere 'okwu isii' - Bo Yibo, Tao Zhu, Wang Heshou na Peng Dehuai ; ihe omume Tiananmen nke afò 1976; na mmejọ Kang Sheng - iji mebie ndị aka ekpe
N'otu ọgbakọ ahụ, Deng kwuru na ọ dị mkpa ịgabiga ihe mgbochi echiche

N'ịgbalị iwezuga onwe ya na omume mgbanwe ọdịbendị nke na-etinye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'ihu akụ na ụba, nnọkọ oge nke atọ rụrụ ụka na a ga -agbahapụ mkpọsa nkatọ dị ukwuu megide Lin Biao na ndị otu anọ ahụ iji kwado nnukwu nlebara anya na akụnụba
Mmezi ọgbara ọhụrụ anọ nke ụlọ ọrụ nrụpụta, ọrụ ugbo, nchekwa mba na teknụzụ sayensị ka a na-ahụta dị ka ọrụ dị mkpa otu ahụ maka oge ọhụrụ

Echiche nke onye isi ala mbụ Liu Shaoqi na n'okpuru ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, ọgụ klaasị bịara na njedebe, na ọ dị mkpa ịzụlite mmekọrịta nke mmepụta iji soro uto nke ndị na-elekọta mmadụ, kwadoro n'ihu ọha, ebe echiche Mao nke mgbanwe na-aga n'ihu n'okpuru ọchịchị mmekọrịta agbahapụrụ
mgbanwe maka njikwa akụ na ụba kwesịrị omume
Isiokwu ọhụrụ a bụ 'mee China mba ọgbara ọhụrụ, nke nwere ikike ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya tupu ngwụcha narị afọ a'
Agbanyeghị na o meghị mkpebi ọ bụla mepere emepe megide Mao, nnọkọ otu wakporo onye isi ya, na-egosi na ọ naghị ekwe nkwa ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya zuru oke ma ọ bụ Nduzi otu

Karịsịa, ọ katọrọ ojiji nke ịnye “ntuziaka” Mao, ebe ekwuru na 'Ọ nweghị echiche onwe onye nke onye otu nọ n'ọkwa ọrụ, gụnyere ndị ọrụ ibe nke Kọmitii etiti, ka a ga-akpọ 'nkuzi Ọ na -akwụsịkwa ọtụtụ mmadụ na -eme maka Mao na Hua, ọbụlagodi na -ezere iji utu aha 'Onye isi oche Mao' na 'Onye isi oche Hua'

N'ịkwalite ụkpụrụ 'Ịchọ eziokwu site na eziokwu', plenum bidoro ịjụ mmegharị nke Mgbanwe Ọdịbendị mkpọsa ' Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Reversal-of-Verdicts Trend ' nke ezubere megide Deng ka a jụrụ n'ihu ọha, na Peng Dehuai, Tao Zhu, Emezigharị Bo Yibo na Yang Shangkun
A jụrụ Mgbanwe Ọdịbendị n'ihu ọha naanị n'afọ 1981 na nnọkọ oge nke isii
A katọrọ adịghị ike nke Nzukọ mba na CỤlọ ikpe kasị elu n'oge a

N'agbanyeghị oke mkpa ọ dị n'ịkwalite echiche na idu ndú Deng Xiaoping, n'oge nnọkọ oge nke atọ ọ nweghị mgbanwe ọ bụla siri ike ma ọ bụ nke siri ike mere, na -emegide nnọkọ oge nke isii emere na 1981 mgbe ewepụrụ Hua Guofeng n'ọkwa nke onye isi oche otu
Otú ọ dị, a gbakwụnyere ihe ndị dị mkpa
A họpụtara Chen Yun dika onye otu Kọmitii na-ahụ maka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, yana onye osote onye isi oche otu na odeakwụkwọ mbụ nke Ụlọ ọrụ etiti maka ịdọ aka na ntị na nyocha
Deng Yingchao, Hu Yaobang na Wang Zhen bụcha ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, e nyekwara ha ọkwa dị mkpa na Kọmitii Nnyocha na ịdọ aka na ntị
Ndị otu ọhụrụ itoolu, onye isi ndị ọrụ izugbe PLA Huang Kecheng gara aga n'etiti ha, ka etinyere na Kọmitii etiti
Thirza Eagle Nash (1885 - 1962) bụ onye edemede South Africa dere maka ndụ ndị ọcha biri
A mụrụ Thirza Goch na South Africa, na-adịghị anya site n'ókè ya na South West Africa
Nna ya bụ Willem Carel Goch, Minista Wesleyan na onye ozi ala ọzọ na ọdụ ozi Leliefontein, Namaqualand, na nne ya bụ Louisa Anne Charleston
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Normal College of Pretoria, wee lụọ William Benjamin Nash na 1917
O so di ya, onye na-ahụ maka ebe a na-egwupụta akụ na ụba, gaa na mpaghara ndịda na South West Africa

The THISDAY Awards, nke akwụkwọ akụkọ na-asọpụrụ ndị na-eduzi ọkụ nke ọha mmadụ maka ọrụ ngalaba na mmezu nke ndụ, aghọwo ihe a na-achọsi ike ] Ndị natara ihe nrite a site n'aka ndị steeti gụnyere ndị isi oche mbụ, ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ na ndị pụrụiche n'ụdị dị iche iche na ụdị ndụ niile
THISDAY nwere ihe karịrị otu puku ndị ọrụ na ngalaba nchịkọta akụkọ na nke na-abụghị ọrụ editọ
A ga-ahụ ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'ọkwa ọchịchị na ngalaba ọha na nke onwe yana mgbasa ozi
Thishiwe Ziqubu (amụrụ n'abalị ise nke ọnwa Ọgọstụ afo 1985) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri South Africa, odee na onye na-eme ihe nkiri

O meriri Best Actress in a Supporting Role n'afọ 2016 Africa Movie Academy Awards maka ihe ngosi ya nke Tshaka na ihe nkiri ịhụnanya Tell Me Sweet Something N'afọ 2019, ọ duziri ihe omume nke MTV Shuga Down South
Ziqubu bụ nwanyị na-edina nwanyí ibe ya ma na-enwe mmekọrịta ya na onye mmekọ ya bu Mandisa Nduna
O mechara gaa African Film and Drama Academy (AFDA), bu ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri
Ọ rụzuru mmemme Acting for Film na Los Angeles campus nke New York Film Academy
Ziqubu mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri nke afọ 2011 Man on Ground, nke nyeere aka ịkwalite ọrụ ya

Dị ka onye n'ede ihe nkiri na onye nduzi, o dere ma duzie ihe nkiri mkpirikpi atọ Out Of Luck, Subdued na Between the Lines O deela maka usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn South Africa Isidingo na Rhythm City na Is'Thunzi
O jikọtara aka mepụta, dee (dị ka onye isi edemede) ma duzie usoro ihe nkiri anọ karịrị nke pụrụ iche n'ọdịdị nke akpọrọ Emoyeni
N'afọ 2019, ọ duziri ihe omume nke oge nke abụọ nke usoro TV MTV Shuga Down South
Angela Thoko Didiza (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 2 June 1965) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka Minista nke Ọrụ Ugbo, Mgbanwe Ala na Mmepe Ime Obodo
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Ọrụ Ugbo na Ala site n'ụbọchị 17 June 1999 ruo 22 May 2006 ma mesịa bụrụ Minista nke ọrụ ọha site n'ụbọchị 22 May 2006 ruo 25 September 2008
A mụrụ Didiza n'obodo Durban ma nwee nzere BA (Hons) na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọ lụrụ nwanyị ma nwee ụmụ ise

Mgbe onye isi ala Thabo Mbeki gbara arụkwaghịm n'ọnwa Septemba 2008, Didiza bụ otu n'ime ndị minista iri gbara arụkwapụ n'ụbọchị 23 Septemba, ọ bụ ezie na e mechara mara ọkwa na ọ nwere ike ịdị njikere ịnọgide n'ọkwa ya
Thokozani Khupe (amụrụ na 18 Nọvemba 1963) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Zimbabwe, onye otu ọrụ na onye isi oche nke MDC-T nke Movement for Democratic Change (MDC)
Ọ bụ osote praịm minista 2009-13

Mgbe onye guzobere otu Morgan Tsvangirai nwụsịrị na mbido afọ 2018 Khupe megidere ịrịgo Nelson Chamisa dị ka onye ndú nke MDC-T n'ihi na ọ bụ naanị otu n'ime ndị osote onye isi atọ a họpụtara site na ndị omeiwu, ebe Chamisa na osote onye osote onyeisiala nke atọ Elias Mudzuri bụ ndị Tsvangirai họpụtara
Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị otu ahụ kwadoro Khupe na nke a, mana Chamisa meriri ya n'ọgụ ike; Khupe na ndị na-akwado ya na-ewere òtù ha dị ka MDC-T ziri ezi ma gaa n'ihu na-eji aha MDC- T

Ha na-etinye aka n'ọgụ ụlọ ikpe na otu Chamisa maka aha otu, akara, akara ngosi na akara ahịa; edozibeghị okwu ahụ tupu ntuli aka nke 2018 na otu Khupe gbara ọsọ na ntuli aka dị ka MDC-T ebe otu Chamisa ka ukwuu gbara ọsọ dị ka akụkụ nke MDC Alliance
N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2018, a họpụtara ya n'enweghị onye na-emegide ya dị ka onye isi oche nke otu MDC-T ya na nnọkọ pụrụ iche na Bulawayo
N'afọ 2020, Douglas Mwonzora wepụrụ ya n'ọkwa onye isi oche nke pati n'etiti nkwupụta siri ike nke ime ihe ike na ịghọ aghụghọ site n'aka ndị na-akwado ya
A mụrụ ya na Bulawayo, Khupe gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1999 na Turin Centre na Turin, Ịtali, na asambodo na Information Technology

O nwekwara Bachelor of Arts na Media Studies site na Zimbabwe Open University, Master of Business Administration, MBA site na National University of Science and Technology, na PhD na Social Studies site na Mahadum Zimbabwe
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ nke Zimbabwe Amalgamated Railway Union (ZARU) na 1987
N'afọ 1991, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ nke ZCTU Women's Advisory Council ma bụrụkwa onye otu General Council nke ZC TU
N'afọ 1999, o sonyere n'ịmepụta otu Movement for Democratic Change, nke a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu National Executive nke na-ahụ maka Transport, Logistics na Welfare

Ọ bụ onye otu Kọmitii mmefu ego, ego na mmepe akụ na ụba; na Kọmitii Mmepe Ndị Ntorobịa, Mmekọahụ na Ọrụ ma họpụtara ya dịka osote onye isi oche nke Women's Parliamentary Caucus wee bụrụ osote onye omebe iwu nke MDC
Ọ nọgidere na mpaghara na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke Machị 2005
Ọ nọ na Kọmitii Nchebe, Home Affairs na Nchebe Mba na nke Budget, Finance na Economic Development
Na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke Machị 2008, Khupe gbara ọsọ maka nhọpụta ọzọ na mpaghara Makokoba dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa nke MDC-Tsvangirai, na-emeri Welshman Ncube, ode akwụkwọ ukwu nke MDC -Mutambara
O nwetara vootu 4,123 megide vootu 2,475 maka Ncube
Ọ bụ onye otu African Parliamentary Network megide nrụrụ aka ruo ọtụtụ afọ
Khupe bụ osote praịm minista nke Zimbabwe site na onwa 11 Febụwarị 2009 ruo Ọgọst 2013 na gọọmentị nke ịdị n'otu mba n'etiti MDC-T na ZANU-PF
Ọ bụ onye omeiwu maka mpaghara Makokoba tupu pati ya akpọghachi ya na 2018 n'ihi na ọ naghịzi anọchite anya ọdịmma ndị otu
N'afọ 2005, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke Movement for Democratic Change (MDC) na-anọchi anya onye otu ọrụ aka ochie bụ Gibson Sibanda
Na onwa Machị 2022, Khuphe gbara ndị Zimbabwe ume ka ha vootu maka Chamisa's Citizens Coalition for Change na ntuli aka nke ọnwa ahụ
